name: Meditation
text: Spend Order: Remove Meditation from the game: This character permanently gains +1 Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "The world changes, but we are resolute. The world cannot change us, but we can change the world." - Kerebrus

name: Call Verdatha
text:
Paladins perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a Steed this character can legally equip and equip it to this character.
errata:
May be performed by a spent Paladin.
The found steed must be legal to equip at the time the action is performed (No reacts to help can be played to make it equippable). Shuffle afterwards.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Storm hath not forsaken us, and neither shall our dragon-steeds." - Sir Magnus
"Our bloodthirsty beasts are attracted by one thing only: Fire." - Malcolm Aedroud

name: Disabling Unit
text: Order: Once per turn: Perform a +6 ranged strike that may target a character within one rank and does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target.
errata: The ranged strike inflicts no wounds even if you apply an effect like Strain the Shot.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ekssellent idea, but will dat hold a deemon?" - Scyrax
For when you don't need them dead.

name: Passing the Mantle
text: React: After one or more items are discarded from another character in this rank by an action or that character's death: Equip those items to this fighter, ignoring level restrictions.

setInfos.flavorText: "We cannot wait for Terak any longer. The aroch ride with Albrecht." - Sir Lorden

name: Fair Warning
text: Spend Order: This fighter gains Riposte +5, Defend +5, and +2 AC. The fighter may use the Riposte and Defend feats any number of times this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mourn is the most dangerous place I know of, but dying is the least of its threats." - Lady Tornhawk

name: Twist the Blade
text:
While this card is in your discard pile, your fighters have the ability to perform it with an additional effect of removing it from the game.
React: Before performing a melee strike from an attack: All strikes from the attack ignore AC bonuses not from Armor.

setInfos.flavorText: "A single cut might barely slay the creature. It's best to make sure you destroy something truely vital." - Sir Wallence
"Stay out of this, Sir Rhawn. You were warned once." - De'zicrah

name: Barbaric Rage
text: React: Before performing a melee strike, lose -5 AC and gain +5 ATK until the end of the turn. If this fighter is a Barbarian, he inflicts an additional wound when he hits with a melee strike this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sometimes, it's hard to tell the Sarakians from the Nothrog." - Sceth Hellbringer

name: Once Again
text: Order: Remove this card from the game: Retrieve a fighter action card from your discard pile and put it into your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Each time, the degenerate and unjust escape my wrath. No more. I shall strike against The Chosen." - Kerebrus
"Each time, the degenerate and unjust escape my wrath. No more. I shall strike against The Chosen." - Kerebrus
"Another battle. Another victory. Can't someone come up with a new challenge?" - Uthanak

name: Survivor
text: React: After a melee or ranged strike misses this character: All opposing characters who miss this rogue with a melee or ranged strike this turn (including this strike) suffer -5 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I remember the Andover long gone. When I am gone, Andover will remember me." - Rathe

name: Behind Enemy Lines
text:
May be played in an opposing formation. This is a Stealth action.
React: Before performing an attack: The attack is a Stealth action.

setInfos.flavorText: "We found something in Myreth, Lord Gahid. Something impossible." - Amara the Twined

name: Fire at Will
text:
Scouts gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
React: After you roll initiative, target a character within two ranks: Until end of turn, all non-spell ranged strikes against that character gain a bonus equal to this rogue's Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "I thought you'd never ask." - Shadith Glyn
"As you wish, High King." - Mithglyn

name: Grief
text:
React: After this rogue hits an opposing character with a melee strike, attach Grief to that character. While attached, that character has -3 ATK, -3 AC, and -3 skill.
If Grief is discarded from play, return it to your hand.

name: Guild Taxes
text:
May be played in an opposing formation. This is a Stealth action.
Order: Target one or more items on a character within one rank. Perform a Stealth check (DC 8 + total levels of items). If successful, remove the items from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "Paid on time, whether they know it or not." - Dusan Drake

name: Goth'ak
text:
React: After a Nothrog performs a ranged strike with a printed bonus greater than the Level of the target: Spend the target of the strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
errata: She uses her react AFTER the strike has been made completely.

name: Mana Shield
text:
Remove Mana Shield from the game after you play it.
Order: Attach a wizard spell from your discard pile to a character in play. While it is attached, the character has +2 AC and Magic Resistance +2. If the character leaves play, put the wizard spell in your hand.

name: Transference
text:
Spend Order: Move up to 3 Charge tokens from a card in play to a card in this rank.
Order: Spend an item.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our side. Thier side. Details are so dull, sometimes."-Asta Syneri

name: Summon Swarm
text: Spend Order: Put this card and the top two cards of your deck into play face-down within one rank as level 1 classless Monsters with +3 ATK, 9 AC, 1 HP, and the text, "Spend React: After entering play: Perform a melee strike." If the caster is not a SUMMONER, discard all three characters at the end of the turn.

name: Wyvern's Flames
text: Spend Order: Target a character within three ranks. Until the end of the turn, that character gains +7 ATK, and must make a magic save (DC 19) after he performs an action or suffer 1 wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hate. In that name, I would burn all that is to cinder, and crush the life from the ashes, if only to bury Krun in the waste of the world." - Padrig

name: Frozen Tomb
text: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks. Until the end of the turn, the character gains +5 AC and may not perform actions. The next two wounds inflicted on the character this turn are negated.

setInfos.flavorText: "A beast lairs in Mourn's heart, but its flesh is steel, and its heart molten iron." - The Loremaster

name: Uncertain Path
text: Spend Order: Attach this card to target character you control. While attached, the taget gains the ability, "Order: Remove a Charge from Uncertain Path: Move forward or backward one rank."

setInfos.flavorText: "Well done, JaQui. Well done, indeed." - Master K'Hallaek

name: Oubliette Hound
text: Spend React: After a Deverenian equips a Steed: Move him forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our troups must remember the price of failure." - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: The Front Line
text: Spend React: After a Deverenian in this rank kills a character with a melee strike: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our undead ranks suffer, my queen, but no less than their living." - Sileth Elestra

name: Justinian
text:
While in your discard pile, Justinian gains +2 levels.
React: Once per turn after a die is rolled, add or subtract 2 from the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Be not surprised. Thou didst right by us, dwarf."

name: Chaff
text: React: After Chaff is killed: Target a Deverenian in your discard pile and shuffle him into your deck.

name: Lelgha
text: Order: Once per turn: Perform a +5 ranged strike. If the strike hits, instead of wounding the target, the target gains the text "Characters in this rank have -3 AC against ranged strikes." until end of turn.
errata: The ranged strike inflicts no wounds even if you apply an effect like Strain the Shot

name: Torvald Tremayne
text:
Torvald's items are considered blank.
Spend Order: Equip an item from Torvald to one of your characters within one rank.
React: Once per turn, before a Deverenian is killed: Equip an item on that Deverenian to Torvald, ignoring level requirements.

name: Adinia Genecourt
text: React: Once per turn, before an action would remove a Deverenian from your discard pile or deck: Cancel the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Inquisitor, dost thou truly wish to demean my honor by suggesting I would harbor traitors to the throne?"

name: Jessup Myerdeth
text: React: Once per turn, after an equal or lower-level character Reacts to entering play: Cancel the React.

setInfos.flavorText: "Someone else hath slain an imperial aide. The emperor doth wait no longer to begin the rites."

name: Captain Karkos Tzin
text:
Karkos is a fighter and a wizard.
React: After Karkos is targeted by an action or strike, remove a Deverenian in your discard pile from the game: Redirect the strike or action to an adjacent Deverenian.

name: Taltos the Hale
text:
Taltos is a fighter and a wizard.
Taltos enters play as if he were level 5.
Order: Once per turn: Target a Weapon, Shield, or Steed in your discard pile and equip it to one of your Deverenians.

name: Sevanis the Lost
text: React: Once per turn, after one of your Deverenians moves forward a rank: He performs an Order.

setInfos.flavorText: "A city as large as Luthlarius, but hidden for all its days... until now."

name: Defiance
text: While spent, Defiance has -1 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is not my place to strike down the loathsome ones. I must merely buy enough time for my comrades to move into position. I do not need to survive to know triumph."
"I'll work with you, Imaran, but not for you."

name: Legend
text:
Legend has +4 ATK for each copy of Legend in your discard pile.
React: After being targeted with a melee or ranged strike, remove from the game a copy of Legend in your discard pile: Legend gains +4 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Flamestone Gargoyle
text:
You must have a cleric in your army to start with Flamestone Gargoyle or bring one into play.
React: After Flamestone Gargoyle is killed: Attach it to another Dwarf in your army as a level 5 Armor item with +3 AC.

name: Demand
text: While performing a melee strike against a higher Level character, Demand gains Powerattack +5 (+8 total).

setInfos.flavorText: "Shut it."
"Get me out of here, and I'll keep your people in line, bard."

name: Pogris
text: Spend Order: Once per turn, choose an opposing player: Perform a number of +0 ranged strikes equal to Pogris' Level, or ready Pogris and ghe premanently gains +1 Level, +3 Skill, and +1 HP, the chosen player decides.
errata: Note that if the stat bonus option is chosen, Pogris is also readied.

name: Trail
text: React: After an opposing character moves forward without spending: Move Trail forward one rank. Until the end of the turn, Trail gains +4 ATK when targeting that character with melee strikes.

name: Grim
text:
Grim may play fighter actions.
React: After a Dwarf in this rank suffers a wound: That Dwarf gains +3 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "Learn from it!"

name: Supply
text: Spend Order: Equip an item in your discard pile to one of your Dwarfes. The Dwarf has +2 levels for this action if an opponent has discarded any of your items this turn.

name: Destiny
text: Order: Once per turn, remove a Dwarf in your discard pile from the game. Permanently give a Dwarf in your army a bonus to his feats equal to the discarded Dwarf's level.

setInfos.flavorText: "No escape, so why bother?"

name: Malachite Gargoyle
text: You must have a level 4 or higher cleric in your army to bring Malachite Gargoyle into play. Wounds suffered by Malachite Gargoyle may not be reduced or removed. Gargoyles adjacent to Malachite Gargoyle may not be targeted with melee strikes.

name: Treyik
text:
After Treyik is discarded from your hand, you may put him into play from your discard pile.
Order: Kill an Undead: Target Elf gains +3 ATK and +3 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Positive life force, negatve life force. If you understand the arithmetic, you can use it!"
"What did Kelanor find?" - Master Anandale

name: Whey
text:
Whey dies at the end of the turn.
Order: Kill Whey: Target a player who must reveal and discard the top 3 cards of his deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "The 'High King' has many uses for us, of course, just few that involve dying old men." - Raziel

name: Isadra
text: React: Once per turn, after another player discards a card during the Order phase: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "He said he'd die before telling me about the Loremaster, as though that was really a problem."

name: Bone Fiend
text:
At the end of each turn, kill an Elf you control or remove an Elf in your discard pile from the game.
Order: Kill another Undead: Bone Fiend gains +3 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "More." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Kelemmen
text: Spend Order: Put an Elf from your discard pile into play face down in rank 1 as a level 1 Undead Skeleton with +3 ATK, 10 AC, and 1 HP. When that Skeleton dies, remove it from the game.

name: KabShiran
text:
React: After an opposing Warlord performs an Order: Put 1 Charge on KabShiran.
Order: Remove 2 Charges: Move a character in your army forward one rank.
errata: Kabshiran can only perform his React to an Order, not other Reacts. Attacking and equipping items are both Orders.

name: Eva Glyn
text:
Eva is a wizard and a rogue.
Eva enters play as if she were a level 5 character.
Your other Elves have Marksmanship +3.
Eva may use Marksmanship on spells.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

name: Feyd Rowan
text:
Feyd is a cleric, a rogue, and a wizard.
Order: Once per turn, remove an Elf in your discard pile from the game: Perform a ranged strike equal to the removed Elf's level.

name: Vietor
text: Spend Order: Discard your hand: Perform a number of consecutive +4 ranged strikes equal to the number of cards discarded.

setInfos.flavorText: "Netheryn's debates choke the courts, and yet Rellion no longer fights them. Why?" - Tepheroth

name: Jol Kirpatrick
text: Jol has an ATK bonus equal to the number of Free Kingdoms characters in your discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "I was a priest once, but no more. My love for the gods rests now with my son, beneath six feet of blood-soaked Andover mud. The war isn't over. It never will be. The dead make sure of that."

name: Albrecht
text:
Albrecht is a cleric, a fighter, and a rogue.
Order: Remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Until the end of the turn, give a Free Kingdoms character an extra melee strike per attack at +4 ATK. This can only target a character once per turn.

name: Jaega Reach
text: Order: Remove an item in your discard pile from the game: One of your Free Kingdoms characters gains an ATK and Skill bonus equal to the item's level until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "...and if any of the gear's faulty, last rites are free."

name: Uriah Blackwood
text: Spend Order: Target this or an adjacent rank. Until the end of the turn, all Free Kingdoms characters in the targeted rank gain an AC bonus equal to the number of characters in your discard pile.

name: Edge Fiend
text: Characters with the Astral or Ethereal trait lose the trait and gain +10 AC while adjacent to one or more Edge Fiends.

setInfos.flavorText: "Outside the Abyss, the abyssals are too real to fully exist. We may only truly slay them in their home. This is key." - Valhala Abyssbane

name: Salvation
text: Order: Once per turn: Perform a melee strike. If this strike misses, wound Salvation.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Dwarves had their chance with me. Now it's Yedraw's turn. Sorry, Nitesh, but not all sins are forgiven."

name: Weirdling
text:
Weirdling is Astral if your initiative roll was odd, and Ethereal if it was even.
React: Before Weirdling enters play, spend an Illusionist in your army: Weirdling enters play in an opposing first rank. This is a Stealth action.

name: Blackiron Mine
text: Warlords have the text: "At the end of each turn, all characters in the last rank of this army fall forward one rank if possible. If no character falls in this way, remove Blackiron Mine from the game."
errata: If either Warlord cannot fall forward any characters (Due to them all being in rank one, or otherwise) then the Black Iron Mine is removed from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: Deverenian mines hold many treasures, but they are unsafe even for those used to such small tunnels.

name: Gilbert Basc
text: Spend Order: Remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Permanently give a non-Monster character the Monster trait, +1 ATK, and +1 AC.

name: Brin Yscar
text: Order: Once per turn, target character within one rank must make a Will save (DC 13) or he may not perform melee strikes this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I don't believe in myths, either, milady Windson, but I believe in me."

name: Sedayah Rowan
text: React: Once per turn, before an opposing character readies from an opposing character's action outside the ready phase, target a character: The opposing character does not ready. You may ready the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "All life is precious. Alias understood that, Rathe. Her father did once, too. If you loved her, how can you not?"

name: The Restless
text: While the Restless is in your discard pile, your Warlord has the text, "Order: Discard a card: Put the Restless into your hand from your discard pile."

setInfos.flavorText: "The elves once ruled Tseleuse, but no more. The dead won't stay buried." - Kara Wadreth

name: Sceyenn
text: React: After an opposing character performs an action which causes you to discard one or more cards from your hand: Either cancel the action or discard an equal number of cards from the acting player's hand.

name: Shadow Breath
text:
Order: Once per game, attach a level 1 or 2 wizard spell from your discard pile to Shadow Breath.
React: After Shadow Breath performs a melee strike, spend a spell attached to him: Cast the spell as if he were a wizard.

name: Avatar of Magic
text:
This card is also a level 1 wizard spell.
React: Once per turn, after you play a spell, perform a Scribe check (DC 20). If successful, attach the spell to this character, as if it were scribed. This ability may not be used on scribed spells.

name: Nightmist
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: A Warlord within two ranks must make a number of Magic saves (DC 18) equal to the number of cards in his hand. For each failure, the player must discard a card.
Spend Order: Move forward or backward two ranks.

name: Durga
text: Order: Once per turn, remove a character in another player's discard pile from the game: Perform a +0 melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "These undead of the mummy queen are no different to those of the elves. Grind their bones to powder, and they'll have trouble rising again."
"Fight the elves long enough, and you learn to make sure everything's dead."

name: Heyga
text: Heyga gains a bonus to his ATK equal to the number of characters in all opposing first ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dwarven defenses account only for Abyssal insurgents, war chief, not for those from above."

name: Shifting Sands
text: After a player passes, that player must spend a ready character in their army if possible.
errata: The spending effect will happen after any Reacts to passing are played.

setInfos.flavorText: Centuries ago a great army charged across it. Swords gleaming, shields shining. Looks of glory on each face. Now their memories lie beneath the Shifting Sands, and treasures still clung to by sun bleached skeletons.

name: Orruga
text: Order: Once per turn, target a Nothrog in your army. Until the end of the turn, the target gains Powerattack with a bonus equal to the number of characters currently in your discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course I know what's become of Bear. Do you?"

name: Darast
text: Order: Discard a Nothrog from your hand: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to twice the level of the discarded character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why are the Deverenians here?! We did everything according to plan... didn't we?"

name: Bela d'Ilchant
text:
Bela is a fighter and a rogue.
Bela enters play as if he were level 4.
Characters targeted by Bela's melee strikes may not play Reacts to the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "He once served Duchess Brymin and Deverenia, but now the guild knows him as the man who betrayed both to Uthanak. Where else could he hope to find proof of his loyalty?" - Kenia

name: KarTal
text:
May not gain tokens from other cards.
React: After KarTal kills a character with a melee strike: Put a Charge token on him.
Spend Order: Remove all Charge tokens from KarTal: Perform a melee strike for each token removed.

name: Arkon
text:
Arkon is a fighter and a rogue.
React: Once per turn, after one of your characters kills an opposing character: Remove the opposing character from the game. Ready a Nothrog of lower level than the opposing character.

name: Bokos
text: Bokos may perform one fighter action card from your discard pile as if it were in your hand, once per turn. Remove the card from the game after the action resolves.

setInfos.flavorText: "You know better than this, Norn. You know who the true enemy is."

name: Hellbringer's Engine
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge, target up to three characters within one rank: Perform a melee strike against each target.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge: Move forward two ranks.

name: La Hashan Amulet
text: React: After this character is targeted by a strike or action, remove the Astral or Ethereal trait from this character until the end of the turn: Until the end of the turn, this character gains +8 AC and +8 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Before traveling the planes, best make your home safe first." - Avinaar

name: Darkwood Arrows
text:
Rogue and wizard only.
Undead have +2 levels to equip this item.
React: After this character kills a character with a ranged strike, spend the Arrows: Put the killed character face down in your first rank as a level 1 Undead Skeleton with +3 ATK, 10 AC, +0 Skill and 1 HP.

name: Signon's Scabbard
text: React: Spend the Scabbard before an illegal rank is fixed: Target a character in the illegal rank with a lower level than this character. Fall the target forward.

setInfos.flavorText: "Victory cometh not to he that warreth best, but to imposeth his own rules upon his enemy's battles." - Signon

name: Damothien's Dungeon
text: All non-Astral characters have -3 AC and the Ethereal and Undead traits.
errata: If a character gains the Astral trait while this dungeon is in play, the other effects immediately stop affecting it.

setInfos.flavorText: A labyrinth of bone and stone, designed to keep captives in and visitors out. House Netheryn's heritage is a dangerous thing to claim.

name: Wanderdust
text: Spend Order: Discard Wanderdust and target an equal or lower-level character within one rank: Move the target character back two ranks (three if this character is a Druid).

name: Healing Rod
text:
Does not ready during the Ready Phase.
React: After an opposing character removes a card from any discard pile: Ready Healing Rod.
Order: Spend Healing Rod: Remove a wound from another character within one rank.

name: The Maker's Call
text: React: After a character enters play from the discard pile: Your opponent's next action may not target that character with a melee strike or action. The character gains +3 ATK and +3 skill until the end of the turn.

name: Darkwood Cudgel
text:
Order: Spend the Cudgel: Perform a melee strike, which may only target a character of the opposite alignment.
Order: Once per turn, remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Ready the Cudgel.

name: Soul Shield
text: Order: Once per game, move this item to an adjacent character (ignoring class) and remove a character from your discard pile: The character with Soul Shield equipped has two extra hit points while the shield is equipped.

name: Isharan Staff
text: React: Before a melee strike targeting this character, remove one Charge token: The opposing character has -3 ATK and -3 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Cheap Sword
text: React: Before this character dies: Return Cheap Sword to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Gone through more hands than Baraxton has, but that means a quality lineage." - Jaega Reach

name: Mjol's Hammer
text: React: After a character within one rank readies during the Order phase, spend Mjol's Hammer: Perform a melee strike targeting that character which inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "After a while, they get meek, like prairie dogs..." - Jack Casey

name: Bone Armor
text:
Elves may equip this item regardless of class.
When Bone Armor comes into play, remove up to 3 characters in any discard pile from the game. Bone Armor permanently gains +1 AC for each card removed this way.

name: Collar of Damnation
text: React: Before target character is killed by this fighter: After the target dies, remove it and one card in any discard pile from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "I will not abide our kinsman shackled. We war against the Chosen until all Nothrog are freed." - Verusk
"Command loyalty, any way you can." - Vakeros

name: Syneri's Complex
text: Players may not ready more than 3 characters during the ready phase.
errata: The method of readying is irrelevant. If Priam Ironsoul manages to ready a character with his React, during the ready phase, that counts as one of the 3 characters you may ready.

setInfos.flavorText: "Far below Miseris, the generations of a hundred years wait for revenge."

name: Locked Ring
text: React: Once per turn, after an action targets another item within one rank, remove a Charge token: Cancel the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "A gift, Krun, from Mekk'iah. Beware thieves."

name: Darkwood Spear
text:
React: Before targeting a melee strike from the second rank, spend the Spear: The strike may target a character in an opposing first rank.
React: Once per turn, before a melee strike, remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Ready the Spear.

name: Sword of the Ancients
text:
Sword of the Ancients has +1 ATK for each item in your discard pile.
React: Before making a melee strike roll, discard an item from your hand: This character inflicts an additional wound if he hits.

name: Weapon Breaker
text: React: After target character targets this fighter with a melee strike, spend Weapon Breaker: This fighter must succeed with a Defend check (DC 16 + target's Level) to destroy an item equipped to the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "That's not all I'll break." - Hrunting

name: Wyvern's Scale
text: React: After this character cancels a spell, spend Wyvern's Scale: Inflict a wound on the caster of the canceled spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "No tricks, Sceth. You want to win, win on your own." - Vakeros

name: Blackiron Ring
text:
Deverenians have +2 levels to equip this item.
React: Before this character plays an action card, spend Blackiron Ring: This character has +1 level for playing that card.

setInfos.flavorText: "We lost Phrygai. The Dwarfes lost New Goldenaxe. The city is in play once more." - Lady Gracia Ghenis

name: The Maker's Way
text:
Dwarfes have +2 levels to equip this item.
React: Before this character equips an item, spend the Maker's Way: This character has +1 level for equipping the item.

setInfos.flavorText: "You'd be surprised how familiar our crafts are in the World Above." - Forge

name: Falling Stones
text: React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike, discard this Trap: The character performing the strike must make a Dexterity save (DC 18). If unsuccessful, inflict two wounds on the character. Otherwise, inflict two wounds on this character.

name: Burning Arrow
text:
Wounds from this rogue's non-spell ranged strikes may not be reduced.
React: Before target character is killed with a ranged strike by this rogue, spend Burning Arrow: Remove the target from the game after it dies.

setInfos.flavorText: "Light them up." - Scyrax

name: Springing Spear Trap
text: React: After target character targets this rogue with a melee strike, spend Springing Spear Trap: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "One of the classics." - Sipho Hamisi

name: The Shattered Spire
text: Characters have a penalty to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to their Level.
errata: This is a static effect. It is checked as soon as possible when you have the chance. That is, if a character's level changes mid-strike, or mid-action, the penalty from The Shattered Spire also immediately changes.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Shattered Lands await."

name: Ancient Trap
text: React: After this or an adjacent character is targeted with an action (not a melee strike), discard this Trap: The character performing the action must make a Dexterity save (DC 14). If unsuccessful, inflict two wounds on the acting character.

name: Borrow's Mirror
text: Spend Order: Retrieve an item this character can equip from any discard pile and equip it to him. If Borrow's Mirror or the targeted item are removed from this character, remove the item from the game.

name: Darkwood Pit
text:
Order: Spend Darkwood Pit: Perform a melee strike. If the strike is successful it inflicts no wounds, but spends the target.
Order: Once per turn, remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Ready Darkwood Pit.

name: Curtain's Fall
text: React: After a character in this rank is targeted with a melee or ranged strike, discard this Trap: The character performing the strike must make a Dexterity save (DC 20). If unsuccessful, inflict three wounds on the character.

name: Teufeltiger's Mask
text: React: After target character targets this wizard with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a will save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill) or suffer -5 ATK for the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I walk free, and the trickster is trapped in this mask. This is as it should be, and will forevermore be." - Dhamir il Maliq
"Some say they prefer my true visage to this one." - Morghen the Unliving
"One of many, I assure thee." - Lord Kestrel

name: Darkwood Staff
text:
Order: Spend Darkwood Staff: Shuffle a wizard spell from your discard pile into your deck.
Order: Once per turn, remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Ready Darkwood Staff.

name: Staff of Storage
text:
Order: Remove X Charges: Attach a Level X wizard spell to the staff.
Order: Remove a Charge, spend the Staff: Cast an attached spell (do not remove the spell from the Staff unless that is part of its effect).

name: Calix's Heart
text: Spend Order: Once per game (twice for Necromancers), target a character in any discard pile. Make a Magic check (DC 4 times target's level). If successful, that character enters play as if your own and becomes Undead. If Calix's Heart leaves play, the target character is killed.

name: Myerdeth Ring
text: React: Before casting a spell, spend Myerdeth Ring: Opponents may not React to the spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hm. Albrecht. Pack thy things, Bruin. We needs must visit Denska after all."

name: Tepheroth's Scepter
text:
Necromancers have +2 levels to equip this item.
React: After this wizard puts a character into play from the discard pile, spend the Scepter: The returned character permanently gains the Undead trait and +1 hit point.

name: Well Laid Trap
text: Order: Target lower Level character may not perform actions to move until end of turn. Move a character in your army forward one rank. If this character is a Ranger, he may perform an additional Order after this one.
errata: Any action which causes a character's rank to change (Your character, or someone else's) is an action to move and is prevented by this card.

name: Baraxton's Graveyard
text: After Initiative is rolled, until end of turn, Warlords gain the ability "Order: Once per turn: Put a character into play from your discard pile."
errata: The ability is granted after any initiative roll, and persists even if Baraxton's Graveyard is defeated or otherwise annuled. Thus, multiple uses of the Order may be granted, each one usable once per turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why do all these empty graves say Jonah?" - Muddflek

name: Armara the Twined
text: React: Once per turn, after Armara is targeted with an action (not a melee strike) by an opposing character: Target the character and perform the same action.

name: Duchess Mirella
text: React: Once per turn, after Mirella is targeted with a melee strike: Redirect the strike to an adjacent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Such love she inspires, that men cannot help but die for her." - Baudwyn Troubadour

name: Novice Matthias
text: React: Once per turn, after a character in this rank suffers a wound: The character who wounded him suffers -4 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not all hymns are of praise."

name: Reilya the Merciful
text:
May remain spent.
Spend Order: Until Crieh readies, stuns, or leaves play target Deverenian may not be targeted by melee strikes from lower level characters if they could legally target another character.

name: Sethra the Spark
text:
May remain spent.
Spend Order: Put the top card of your deck into rank 1 as a Level 1 Astral fighter with +1 ATK, 1 AC, +1 Skill, and 1 HP, which dies if Sethra readies, stuns, or leaves play.

name: Sir Edgard Rellion
text:
React: After you lose initiative by 5 or more: Move forward one rank.
React: After you win initiative by 5 or more: Perform an attack (spending as usual).

name: Tadin the Light
text: React: Before a higher-level Deverenian in this rank suffers a wound: Reduce the wounds by one. Tadin suffers a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Twould seem Genecourt hath allies we did not fathom."

name: Barricade
text: Dwarves adjacent to Barricade have +3 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Trust me, goblin. You don't want what's behind this door..."

name: Blasphemy
text:
May remain spent.
Spend Order: Target an adjacent Dwarf. Until Blasphemy readies, stuns, or leaves play the Dwarf gains +3 AC, +1 HP, and the Gargoyle trait.

name: Borrow
text: React: After Borrow enters play, remove an item in your discard pile from play: Search your discard pile for an item Borrow can equip, and equip it.

setInfos.flavorText: "You'll need some help, Nitesh. You'll need me."

name: Blackthorne's Quarters
text:
When Blackthorne's Quarters has no Charges, remove it from the game.
Rogues have the ability "Spend Order: Succeed with a precetion check (DC 15) or suffer a wound. If you succeed, search your deck for an item with Level equal to or less than twice this rogue's Level, put it in your hand and remove a Charge from Blackthorne's Quarters.
errata: You only remove a charge if you succeed with the check.

name: Brawl
text:
Brawl is a cleric and a fighter.
Brawl enters play as if he were Level 4.
React: Before Brawl is killed with a melee strike by target character: Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "You Nothrogs claim to be masters of warfare. Why'm I still breathing?"

name: Duty
text: React: After a Dwarf in this rank is targeted with a melee strike: Make a Defend check (DC 20). If successful, redirect the strike to Duty.

name: Envy
text:
Envy is a cleric and a rogue.
Envy enters play as if he were level 5.
React: Before making a melee strike against a spent character: The target has -3 AC.

name: Hellion
text: React: Once per turn, after a melee strike targeting Hellion is redirected: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "You've got a choice, Nothrog. You fight Duty, or your fight me."

name: Penitence
text: Spend React: After a character within two ranks suffers a penalty to AC, ATK, or Skill from an action: That character suffers an additional -2 to the same stats until the end of the turn.

name: Provider
text: React: Before Provider is killed by an opposing character: Dwarves in this rank gain +3 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "My friends will avenge me, Nothrog. Will yours?"

name: Slag Gargoyle
text:
You must have a cleric in your army to start with Slag Gargoyle or bring it into play.
Slag Gargoyle has +2 AC for each other type of Gargoyle in the same rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Whatever's handy. No time to be picky." - Providence

name: Tankard
text:
May not start in play.
React: Before Tankard suffers a wound, discard a cleric spell from your hand: Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Few things are hardier than a drunken dwarf." - Son of Clouds

name: Adinia Ghenis
text: Spend React: Before an Elf makes a ranged strike roll: Until the end of the turn, that Elf has +2 to all ranged strike rolls.

name: Longtusk's Arena
text: After Longtusk's Arena enters play, all players choose a character in their army. Each has +3 ATK and +3 AC while Longtusk's Arena remains in play and may be targeted by melee and ranged strikes ignoring rank restrictions.
errata: The effect ends if Longtusk's Arena leaves play.

setInfos.flavorText: The first among them to build real cities, Grath Longtusk realized civilized living could also include civilized warfare.

name: Ahdre
text: React: After one of your Elves targets an opposing character with a DC save or ranged strike, discard a card: Add +5 to the DC or ranged strike roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Always learn. Always."

name: Amatria Tansiq
text: React: Before target opposing character kills Amatria with a strike or action: The target must succeed with a poison check (DC 12) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Her face is a true work of art." - The Lady of Pain
"Be thankful the shadows mask her face." - The Lady of Pain
"Be thankful the shadows mask her face." - The Lady of Pain

name: Calea
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
React: Before an Elf within one rank dies: Move forward or backward one rank or gain Marksmanship +3.

name: Cybille
text: React: After an Elf within one rank dies: Look at the top 5 cards of any deck. You may shuffle that deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Behlial, my beloved mentor, is dead. The world is better off."

name: Hecia
text: Spend Order: Target a rank up to 2 ranks away. Each character in that rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or suffer -4 Skill until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Beware the fathomless waters, Ichaerus. They hunger."

name: Kaimir
text:
Kaimir is a rogue and a wizard.
Kaimir enters play as if she were Level 4.
Spend Order: Perform two +5 ranged strikes. This action is a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fire and Ice." - Artheon
"Fire and ice." - Artheon

name: Kilis of Flesh
text:
May remain spent.
Spend React: After an Elf dies during the decree phase: Return the Elf to play spent in the same location. It permanently gains the Undead trait, +3 ATK and +1 HP. Kill the Elf if Kilis of Flesh readies, stuns, or leaves play.

name: Naines
text: Spend Order: Remove any number of cards in your discard pile from the game: Retrieve an item from the discard pile with a level equal to or lower than the combined levels of the cards removed and put it in your hand.

name: Anyah
text: React: Before Anyah dies, target a Free Kingdoms in this rank: The target has an additional melee strike (base = target's primary ATK) the next time he attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "You left Bradley behind!?"
"Some things are worth dying for. Her, for instance." - Bradley

name: Chisulo Pra
text: Chisulo Pra gains one strike per attack if he has a Weapon equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "When may the world rest?"

name: Benedictus Armor
text:
You must spend a Level 3 or greater cleric you control to equip Benedictus Armor.
Order: Once per turn, spend a Level 5 or greater cleric in your army: Ready this character.

name: Enokki
text: React: After a melee strike targets Enokki: Look at the hand of targeting character's player.

setInfos.flavorText: "The whispered thoughts are useful, but incessant... I have seen Silas Tzin, Kedric. Or what's left of him."

name: Grend Vinn
text:
May remain spent.
Spend React: After a Free Kingdoms character kills an opposing character: Until Grend readies, stuns or leaves play, the Free Kingdoms character gains a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill, equal to the killed character's level.

name: Kun Iacob
text: Kun Iacob ignores Astral and Ethereal traits during melee strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "The soul is the key. Redeem it, or condemn it forever. Do either at your own peril."

name: Robin Jirar
text:
Robin is a fighter and a rogue.
Robin enters play as a level 5.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Sienne Lahr
text: React: Before Sienne dies: Target a number of characters in your army up to Sienne's level. Until the end of the turn, they each get an extra strike when attacking.

name: Yazid Alim
text: React: Before Yazid dies: Your lower level Free Kingdoms characters have +2 ATK and +2 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "We are more than the unseen."

name: Abyssal Vermin
text: React: After an opposing character casts a spell: Gain the Astral trait until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Warned you." - Barricade

name: Carcass Wyrm
text:
May not equip items.
React: After Carcass Wyrm hits with a melee strike: The target must make a poison save (DC 15) or lose two levels permanently. Kill the target if this reduces him below level one.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Devourer
text:
Will saves from the Devourer's actions are +2 DC for each card in your hand.
Order: Once per turn, remove up to three cards in your discard pile from the game: Remove that many cards of your choice in another discard pile from the game.

name: Dusan Drake
text: Spend React: After an opposing ready character moves to the front rank: Move that character to the second rank and spend it.

setInfos.flavorText: "Keziah? Keziiiiiaaaaah? Your father's looking for you..."

name: Neus' Armor
text:
This is a Neus' Set item.
React: Once per turn: Before this character performs an action: Any bonuses to ATK, AC, or Skill from the action are increased by the number of Neus' Set items this cleric has equipped, until end of turn.

name: Heresk
text: React: Once per turn, after one of your characters targets another character with an action or strike: Any wounds inflicted by the action or strike may not be reduced or negated.

name: Kabyrr the Insane
text:
Kabyrr may not start in play.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge token from Kabyrr: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
Order: Move a Charge token from Kabyrr to a card in this rank.

name: Kayle Rowan
text: React: Before fixing an illegal rank caused by a character's death, remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Put Kayle from your discard pile in the rank in the front of the illegal one.

name: Krost
text: React: After Krost is targeted with a melee strike: Spend an equipped Steed to gain Riposte +5 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yedraw found him in Markappal, if the smell's any hint." - Kumbani Apolo

name: Skorr
text: React: After an opposing character moves without spending: Put Skorr into play from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "If Hellbringer pays me enough, I'll find the Archmage, too."

name: Xeralis
text: React: Before Xeralis dies from a melee or ranged strike: Move the acting character back one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ha ha! The Dark Horsemen ride again!"

name: Yedraw
text:
Your entering characters may cause illegal formations if you already have at least one character in the rank.
Yedraw's Weapons may not be discarded by opposing players' actions.
Order: Once per turn, remove a bold trait other than "Warlord" from an opposing character for the rest of the turn.

name: Brakil
text: React: Before Brakil dies: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Just a little closer, Faiza?"

name: Forgak
text: Spend Order: An opposing character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Never let an old enemy live. They know you too well." - Krun

name: Grieze
text:
May remain spent.
Spend React: After a Nothrog is wounded: Ready the Nothrog. Until Grieze readies, stuns, or leaves play, the Nothrog gains the ability: "React: Once per turn, after an opposing character wounds this Nothrog: Ready this Nothrog."

name: Hammer of the Tribes
text:
This is a Neus' Set item.
Order: Spend an equipped Neus' Set item and target a character: The target's next melee strike this turn inflicts an additional wound.

name: Gurk
text: React: Before Gurk dies: Adjacent Nothrogs gain +4 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "He may be bad comedy, but he's our bad comedy." - Uthanak

name: Hagen
text: Hagen's melee strikes inflict two additional wounds against spent characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "And to think-they were so careful to avoid spilling Deverenian blood..."

name: Klath
text: React: Before Klath dies: Play a level 1 Nothrog from your hand. The Nothrog gains +5 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "The war continues, with neither Krun nor Sav'rukk gaining ground..."

name: Kra'ake
text: React: Once per turn, after a Nothrog dies: Kraake has +5 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I came of age in the foothills outside Lukkot, but now Baraxton... Baraxton is home."

name: Sken
text: React: Before Sken dies: Perform a melee strike which can only target a spent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "As if the damned Sarakians weren't bad enough. Tell Sceth that someone woke up something old... something bad..."

name: Vakeros
text: Order: Kill one of your characters in this rank: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the character's level.

setInfos.flavorText: "We all have sacrifices to make."

name: Wyvern's Breath
text:
May not equip items or attack.
Spend Order: Target a character two ranks away: The target must make a poison save (DC 14). Characters adjacent to the target must make a poison save (DC 9). Characters who fail become spent and suffer a wound.

name: Another Time
text:
Fighter and Monk only.
Monks do not spend to perform this action.
Spend React: After this character is wounded by a melee or ranged strike: Reduce the number of wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Well played, girl, but it won't save you." - Baruuk

name: Improved Critical
text:
Fighter and Monk only.
React: After this character kills an opposing character with a melee strike: Attach this card to this character.
While it is attached, natural 18's, 19's, and 20's count as Critical Successes for this character, and this character's Critical Successes ignore the Astral trait.

name: Nothing to Lose
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: After an adjacent character dies: Gain +4 AC if this is a rogue and +3 ATK if this is a fighter.

setInfos.flavorText: "Denskans know not honor, nor wit enough to kneel 'stead of taking up arms anew." - Cardinal Creigh

name: Fundisi Amulet
text:
+3 Skill
This character has +1 Level for casting spells while adjacent to another cleric.

setInfos.flavorText: After the great setbacks for Narawat, the Priests' Circle turned the nation towards learning and knowledge.

name: Playing Dead
text:
Monk and rogue only.
React: Before this character is killed by a card effect or receiving wounds, discard a card and move back a rank: The wounds are reduced to zero and this character does not die.

setInfos.flavorText: "Keep going, if you know what's good for you?"

name: Sabotage
text: Spend React: After costs for an action printed on an item are paid: Cancel the action and stun the item.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ingrate. And after all my hard work in giving it to you?" - Borrow

name: Tzin's Attention
text:
Mentalists and wizards only.
Spend Order: Target a character up to three ranks away, who must make one Will save (DC 12) for each card in their controlling player's hand. If at least one of them fails, the target suffers a wound, and is spent.
errata: This is a spell.

name: Wrong Target
text: React: After this character is targeted with a ranged strike: Cancel the strike. If this character is a rogue, you may instead redirect the ranged strike to any character within one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Well, I guess that explains why Jonah didn't come back." - Jack Casey

name: A Hero's Fall
text: React: After one of your characters dies: All of your characters have and ATK and AC bonus equal to the level of the dead character while in the rank the character was in.

setInfos.flavorText: "I do not mourn my death. Why would I mourn my son's?" - Yedraw

name: Calling Back Souls
text: Order: Remove any number of cards in your discard pile from the game: Shuffle characters from your discard pile into your deck. The total levels of characters shuffled in may be not more than twice the number of cards removed from the game.

name: Divine Favor
text: React: After a character spends to cast a spell more than two levels lower than this cleric: Ready that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "The storm knoweth our innocence, e'en an the Inquisition doth deny it." - Cardinal Bromin

name: Final Prayer
text: React: Before this character is killed: Target another character within 1 rank. Remove one wound from the target, and the target gains ATK and AC equal to the caster's level.

setInfos.flavorText: "Go, Duty. Save yourselves." - Gnorrow Yaw

name: Flesher Rites
text: Spend Order: Remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Put this card into play adjacent to the caster as a level 3 fighter with +1 Skill, 2 HP, 13 AC, and ATK equal to the level of the removed character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Useful abominations." - Ichaerus

name: Never Fade Away
text: React: After one of your characters dies: The character or characters who were adjacent to him gain an AC bonus equal to the dead character's skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let's go to work." - Duty

name: Hazium
text: Order: Spend Hazium: Move target adjacent spent character forward one rank. If this character is a Druid, you may target ready characters with this ability.

setInfos.flavorText: "It was to be Lucian's horse, but it chose me." - Samuel

name: Storm's Aegis
text: Spend Order: Target a rank. Until the end of the turn, opposing characters may not play Reacts during actions which target characters in that rank. Melee and ranged strikes against these characters inflict one less wound, with a minimum of one.

name: Thrice-Blessed
text: React: After an opposing character receives a bonus to AC, ATK, and/or skill from an action: Give one of your characters (up to three characters if this is a Cantor) the same bonuses until the end of the turn.

name: Close Ranks
text: React: Before a character you control in any rank in front of this fighter's rank is killed: Move this fighter forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Just like old times." - Guardian
"We live together. We fight together. We stand together. We will not fall together." - Duty

name: Debt of Blood
text: React: After a character in this rank is killed by a melee strike: This fighter targets the attacking character with a melee strike that inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'll live. Will you?" - Voldas

name: Into the Tunnels
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all players must discard a card from their hand as a cost to perform an action that targets opposing characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "The tunnels are secure. Begin the descent!" - Uthanak

name: No Surrender
text: React: Before making a melee strike roll: Gain an ATK bonus for this strike equal to the number of characters in your discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "Acceptable terms." - Sorceress Ygraine

name: Favored Steed
text:
Paladins may play this action as if they were rogues.
React: After equipping a Steed: Attach Favored Steed to the character. While it is attached, the character has Riding +5, and when this character performs an action to move forward or backward, other characters may not perform Reacts.

setInfos.flavorText: "Good, Lucien. We're almost ready." - Terak

name: Retaliation
text: React: After an opposing character performs a React during a melee strike by or targeting this character: Perform a melee strike targeting the reacting character.

name: Return Fire
text: React: After a ranged strike targeting this character resolves: Perform a +5 ranged strike targeting the originating character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Try aiming next time." - Kaimir

name: Automaton
text: Spend Order: Remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Put this card into play adjacent to the caster as a level 3 fighter with +1 Skill, 2 HP, 13 AC, ATK equal to the level of the item and Magic Resistance +4. Summoners may instead put it in an adjacent rank.

name: Godly Protection
text:
This is a Neus' Set item.
This character has +4 AC against ranged strikes.
React: Once per turn, after a ranged strike targets a character: The target has +2 AC for the strike for each Neus' Set item equipped to this character.

name: Foul Blight
text: Order: All characters in play have a penalty to AC and skill equal to the number of characters in their owner's discard pile, with a maximum of -4 (-8 if this character is a Necromancer).

setInfos.flavorText: Laughter rang through the Sarakian badlands. "Tell your master," the voice said. "Tell your master that I know how Hate died, and who is to blame."

name: Hand of Ichaerus
text: Spend React: After an opposing character moves within two ranks of this character: Move the opposing character back one rank. If the target is ready, you may shuffle this spell into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Take this as a warning, knight. The Kabal do not seek war, but also do not fear it."

name: Illusory Form
text: React: After target character targets a character within one rank with a strike, you may spend an Illusionist: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or the strike is canceled. If you spent an Illusionist, return Illusory Form to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "The living are so easy to deceive." - Morghen

name: Severed of Flesh
text: React: After one of your unstunned characters dies, before fixing ranks: Return the character to play in the same location with the Undead trait and one hit point. If the caster is not a Necromancer, spend the target.

name: Shallow Graves
text: Spend Order: Place one character (up to two if the caster is a Necromancer) from an opposing discard pile face down in your first rank as a level 1 Undead Skeleton with +3 ATK, 10 AC, +1 Skill, and 1 HP. At the end of the turn, if the caster is not an Elf, return the character to the owner's discard pile.

name: Soul Charge
text: Spend Order: Target a card within one rank with the Charges trait. Put a number of charge tokens on the card equal to this character's level or the charge value, whichever is less.

setInfos.flavorText: "The fallen are only good for one thing..." - Vakeros

name: The Emperor's Will
text: React: After this wizard succeeds at a save from an opposing character's action: The opposing character must make a magic save with the same DC and the same consequences for failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Denska is Deverenia, now and forever." - Sorceress Ygraine

name: Waking Terrors
text: Order: Target opposing character within 3 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 13, DC 18 if this wizard is an Illusionist) or move to the rank behind his formation's last rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "A multitude of haunts weakens the barriers to the ephemereal world." - Evon Myerdeth
"How curious-Order Genecourt is haunted." - Lord Kestrel

name: Holdout Dagger
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Before making a melee strike roll: Equip the Holdout Dagger from your hand or an adjacent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Tell him I'm busy, Drake." - Keziah

name: Isadran Amulet
text: Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge token from the Amulet: Gain the Astral or Ethereal trait until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our little secret." - Lord Kestrel

name: Compassion
text:
This is an Aroch Set item.
Order: Spend an equipped Aroch Set item and remove a wound from an opposing character: Remove a wound from a character in your army.
errata: Removing a wound from an opposing character is a cost, and as such, you cannot perform the action on Compassion without an opposing wounded character.

name: Lightning Gloves
text:
Monk and rogue only.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge token from the Lightning Gloves: Perform an attack without spending. The strikes may only target spent characters.

name: Tzin's Secret
text:
This character has -1 Hit Point.
When this character dies, Tzin's Secret must be equipped to an adjacent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Something to kill for. Something to die for." - Kedric

name: Blasphemous Sign
text: Adjacent characters gain +3 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "One man's basphemy is another man's canon." - Naram-Sin
"Say nothing of this to anyone." - Yedraw

name: Deima's Shield
text:
This cleric has +1 level, +3 skill, and +1 Hit Point.
Order: Once per turn: Gain Medicine +4, Scribe +4, or Magic Resistance +4 until the end of the turn.

name: Inquisitor's Mask
text:
This cleric and adjacent characters gain +X AC, where X is the number of characters attached to the Mask.
React: Once per turn, before target character you control is killed: Retrieve the target from your discard pile after he dies and attach him to the Mask.

setInfos.flavorText: "Oooh, I like it." - Daedelia

name: Pain Conduit
text:
Before another character in your army suffers wounds which are not a cost, reduce the wounds by one and this character suffers a wound.
Spend Order: Discard Pain Conduit.

name: The Cardinals' Blessing
text: React: After this character performs an action giving an ATK, AC and/or Skill bonus to another character, remove a Charge token: Increase the bonus (or bonuses) by +5.

setInfos.flavorText: Thou art under our protection now, Ygraine.

name: Aroch Helm
text: If this character is a Paladin, he gains Riposte +4 while targeted by strikes from characters of the opposite alignment.

setInfos.flavorText: "Denska must hold, men. Terak will be with us soon." - Sir Lorden

name: Beast Knight's Armor
text:
Evil characters only.
React: After a character misses this fighter with a melee strike, spend Beast Knight's Armor: Perform a skill check (DC 17). If successful, inflict a wound on the opposing character.

name: Bruntor's Axe
text: If this character has at least two other items with "Bruntor's" in the title, he gains an additional strike (base +2 ATK) when attacking.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is a legend..."

name: Favor of the Totem
text: Order: This character has an additional melee strike (Base +4) when he attacks until end of turn. If this character is a Barbarian, he may perform an attack (spending as normal).
errata: Bonuses to ATK stack on top of the base of +4.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Red Wolf Returns." - Taoth

name: Celestial Plate
text: Order: Spend Celestial Plate: Until end of turn lower Level characters may not target this character with melee strikes unless there are no other legal targets for the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Albrecht wore it centuries ago. No one dares wear it now." - Sir Lucian

name: Bruntor's Fist
text: This character gains the Powerattack feat with a bonus equal to the number of equipped items he has with the word "Bruntor" in the title.

setInfos.flavorText: "...because the Deverenians demand legends." - Lord Halbrook

name: d'Ilchant Signet
text: React: After this character targets a melee strike, remove a Charge token from the Signet: Gain +4 ATK for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Odd... Father always wore it on his right hand ..." - Porthos d'Ilchant

name: Helm of Lightning
text: React: After a melee strike targeting this character, spend the Helm: The opposing character must make a magic save (DC 13, 17 if the target has Armor equipped) or suffer a wound.

name: Rage Collar
text: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike against each opposing character in an adjacent rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "They're hellborn, but I know Hell better than they..." - Kul of Clan Tergoth

name: Roxx
text:
Order: Spend Roxx: Move forward one rank.
React: Before this character leaves play: Roxx enters play in this rank as a level 3 fighter with +5 ATK, 12 AC, +2 Skill and 1 Hit Point.

name: Sir Tython's Shield
text:
This fighter has +1 level and +1 Hit Point.
Order: Once per turn, gain Powerattack +6, Defend +6 or Riposte +6 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I never laid finger on him, but I slew him all the same..." - Maxmilian

name: Uriel's Armor
text:
Good characters only.
React: After a character misses this fighter with a melee strike, spend Uriel's Armor: Perform a skill check (DC 17). If successful, remove a wound from this character.

name: Wyvern Gem
text: React: Before this fighter makes a melee strike roll, remove a Charge from Wyvern Gem: The strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: The forbidden totem. Useful, though." - Krenthor Gouge
"Our men die, but not from their wounds?" - Sceth Hellbringer

name: Bag of Caltrops
text: Spend Order: Remove a Charge token from the Bag: Until the end of the turn, any character who moves forward one or more ranks without spending or becoming stunned must succeed with a Reflex save (DC 16) or suffer a wound and become spent.

name: Garme
text: Order: Spend Garme: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course, I taught the elves a few tricks..." - Timmuk

name: Perseverance
text:
This is an Aroch Set item.
Order: Spend an equipped Aroch Set item: Perform a +0 ranged strike that stuns the target instead of inflicting wounds. After the strike, if it hit, you may unstun a character in your army with a Level equal to or lower than the target of the strike.
errata: The ranged strike inflicts no wounds even if you apply an effect like Strain the Shot.

name: Griffin's Claw
text: React: Before rolling a melee strike roll against a stunned character, spend the Claw: The roll is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "A mark of distinction, a token of favor." - Envy

name: Jelial's Bracers
text:
This rogue has +1 level, +3 Skill, and +1 Hit Point.
Order Once per turn: Gain Riding +4, Marksmanship +4 or Stealth +4 until the end of the turn.

name: Martyr's Hide
text: This character may use the Defend and Riposte feats any number of times per turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "History? I'll drink to that!" - Tankard

name: Misearean Dagger
text: React: After this character hits with a melee strike: Spend all items on the opposing character.

setInfos.flavorText: Keziah kicked the weapon away. "I've already got some, thanks."

name: Nightmist Bow
text:
Scout only.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
React: After a ranged strike targeting this character: Perform a +5 ranged strike targeting the character who performed the ranged strike.

name: Bascaron's Call
text:
Summoners do not spend to use this item, but must spend Bascaron's Call.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge token from Bascaron's Call: Discard the top card from your deck and put it in your first rank as a level 1 Elemental wizard with +0 ATK, 10 AC, 1 Hit Point and the ability, "Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike."

name: Binding Wand
text: React: After this wizard succeeds with a save from an opposing character's action, spend Binding Wand: The originating character must make a magic save with the same DC, and the same consequences of failure.

name: Blood and Bone
text: Order: Remove a Charge token from Blood and Bone: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

name: Ivory Scepter
text: Order: Spend Ivory Scepter, target an opposing character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + number of characters in your discard pile) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "A field of the dead suits me just fine." - Morghen the Unliving

name: Kcal'den's Bracers
text:
This wizard has +1 level, +6 skill, and +1 Hit Point.
Order: Once per turn: Gain Charisma +4, Scribe +4, or Magic Resistance +4 until the end of the turn.

name: Staff of Kizazi
text:
Order: If an opponent has 1 or more cards in hand and Staff of Kizazi has less than 4 Charges: Put a Charge on Staff of Kizazi.
Order: Once per turn, spend Staff of Kizazi and remove 4 Charges: Ready a lower Level character.

name: Static Robes
text:
This wizard can't be stunned by card effects from opposing characters.
Spend Order: Target a character up to 3 ranks away who must succeed with a magic save (DC 18) or become stunned.

name: Undead Steed
text:
While Undead Steed is in the discard pile, Necromancers you control have the ability, "Order: Remove a character or Steed in your discard pile from the game: Retrieve Undead Steed from your discard pile and equip it to this character."
Order: Spend Undead Steed: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Circle Kick
text:
Fighter and Monk only.
React: Before this character makes a melee strike roll: Subtract 3 from the roll. If the strike hits, inflict a wound on an adjacent character with equal or lower AC than the target.

name: Coordinated Shot
text:
Scout and Ranger only.
Order: Spend another character in this rank with a printed ranged strike: Add the printed value of that ranged strike to all ranged strikes made by this character until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Those who survived Toris Kelt did not always return home.

name: Delirium
text:
Mentalist and wizard only.
Spend Order: Target non-Warlord must make a Will save (DC 8 + caster's skill) or he can't perform action until the end of the turn.
errata: This is a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why, Solace, what troubles thee so?" - Emil Tzin

name: Higher Awareness
text:
Mentalist and rogue only.
React: After this character is targeted with an action (not a melee strike) by an opposing character: The originating character must make a Will save (DC 8 + this character's skill) or suffer a wound and the action is cancelled.

name: Levitate
text:
Mentalist and wizard only.
Order: Move backward one rank or move to a different position in this rank.
React: Before this character falls forward from an illegal rank: This character does not spend or stun when falling forward.
errata: This is a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "Animals? We are paragons of men, and the elves still employ base beasts?" - Lady Eryne

name: Make It Count
text:
Fighter and Monk only.
React: Before this character performs a melee strike, cancel the strike: The next melee strike this character performs this turn has an ATK bonus equal to the cancelled strike's base ATK, and inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

name: Mental Assault
text:
Mentalist and wizard only.
Spend Order: Target a character within three ranks who must make a Will save (DC 9, DC 11 if this character is a Mentalist) for each card in his controller's hand. Each time the target fails, he suffers one wound.
errata: This is a spell.

name: Perfect Focus
text:
Monk and Mentalist only.
React: Before a melee strike roll: Add this character's Skill to his ATK for the duration of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kedric will not tell us what he saw in the Plane of Secrets." - Callenor Tzin

name: Peace
text:
This is an Aroch Set item.
Order: Spend an equipped Aroch Set item, and spend a character in your army: Target character with Level equal to or lower than the one spent may not attack until end of turn.

name: Rabid Bite
text:
Druid and Lycanthrope only.
React: Before inflicting wounds with a melee strike: The target must make a Fortitude save (DC 15) or suffer an extra wound.
Order: Attach this card to a Lycanthrope Form. While attached, the character may play Rabit Bite once per turn as if it were played from the controller's hand.

name: Slow Fall
text:
Monk and rogue only.
React: Before fixing an illegal rank this character is in: If this character is a Monk, move forward one rank. Shuffle Slow Fall back into your deck.
React: After an opposing character targets this character with an action to spend or stun him: Cancel the action.

name: Sweep
text:
Monk and rogue only.
React: After a character within one rank spends or stuns as a result of a card effect: Perform a melee strike against that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "I care not what you have heard of these people, Kedric. They're abominations." - Bem Kaundodo

name: Touch of Madness
text:
Mentalist and wizard only.
Spend Order: Attach this card to a character within three ranks: While it is attached, the target must make a Will save (DC 15) after paying costs for an action card or it is cancelled. The target has the ability: "Spend Order: Make a magic save (DC 20): remove Touch of Madness."
errata: This is a spell.

name: Angry Winds
text:
Spend Order: Put this card into play in any of your ranks as a level 2 fighter with +5 ATK, 13 AC, +3 Skill, 1 HP, the Elemental trait, and the text "Characters in this rank have +4 AC against ranged strikes."
The Elemental is killed at he end of the turn.
If the caster is Druid, the Elemental has 2 HP.

name: Collapsing Mines
text:
Druid or Gargoyle only.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, spend all characters entering play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do it! Break them down before the Noth-" - Gnorrow Yaw

name: Dire Portents
text:
Seers play this without spending.
Spend React: After an opposing character enters play, attach this card to the character: While it is attached, your clerics may perform the action: "React: Before a character makes a roll, discard Dire Portents from that character: Subtract 10 from the roll."

name: Forest's Hunger
text: Spend Order: Target a rank: Until end of turn, any character who moves into that rank must succeed with a Dexterity save (DC 5 + this cleric's Skill, DC 10 + this cleric's Skill if he is a Druid) or become spent. Spent characters who fail become stunned instead.

name: Lead in Prayer
text: Order: Target a character within one rank. Until the end of the turn, other characters in the target's rank and with the same alignment as this cleric have +3 ATK. If the caster is a Cantor, they have +3 AC and +3 skill as well.

setInfos.flavorText: "Flesh to Blood, Blood to Bone, Bone to Spirit." - Sileth Elestra

name: Neus Preserve Us
text:
Cantors play this without spending.
Spend React: After this character enters play or moves into the first rank: Target a character in your army who gains +5 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "That Deverenian madwoman's not giving up!" - Lord Halbrook

name: Dedication
text:
This is an Aroch Set item.
Your characters within one rank have +1 ATK, AC, and Skill for each Aroch Set item equipped to this character.
Order: Once per game, if this character has at least four equipped Aroch Set items: Ready all characters in play.
errata: If you manage to discard and reequip Dedication, you can use the Once per game ability again.

name: Secrets from Beyond
text: React: After this cleric enters play or move into the first rank: Add +5 to your Warlord's next initiative roll. If this cleric is a Seer add +10 instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "I know what Ananasia knew. Why risk more of the family to spare an ungrateful child?" - Yscar the Elder

name: Outmatched
text: React: After target opposing character enters play in the front rank or moves into the front rank: If this character is in the front rank, perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Twould seem the time hath come for us to remind the elves that we are their betters." - Master Anandale
"E'en with our empire lost, thou still canst not compare." - Squire Fastus
"E'en with our empire lost, thou still canst not compare." - Squire Fastus
"E'en with our empire lost, thou still canst not compare." - Squire Fastus
Some elves remembered too late why the Deverenians once ruled all the world.

name: Voice of the Storm
text:
Paladin only.
React: After this Paladin enters play or moves into the first rank: Until the end of the turn, characters in your first rank with the same alignment as this Paladin inflict an extra wound when they hit with a melee strike against characters of the opposite alignment.

name: Blackthorn's Legacy
text:
Bard only.
Spend Order: The next die roll one of your characters makes is a "10" (add bonuses as normal).

setInfos.flavorText: "Castle Blackthorn fell, but not before the paladin dealt a telling blow to the Dark Horsemen." - Baudwyn Troubadour

name: Countersong
text:
Bards play this without spending.
Spend React: After an opposing character casts a spell or uses a "Bard only" action: Perform a Charisma check (DC 15 + level of action). If successful, the action is cancelled.

setInfos.flavorText: "The albino ones really twitch if you time the high notes." - Jaqueline Windson

name: Dark Alley
text: React: After targeting a character at the end of a rank with a melee strike: Add +3 ATK for the strike. If this character is an Assassin, add +6 ATK instead.

setInfos.flavorText: Deserted elven streets proved no less dangerous to the Deverenian patrols.

name: Quick Shot
text: React: After winning initiative: Perform a +4 ranged strike. If this rogue is a Scout, this action may be performed after losing initiative.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is how we hunt in Markappal, Dukat." - Druala Wadreth

name: Uncanny Defense
text:
React: After this character is targeted with a melee or ranged strike: Add this character's skill to his AC for the duration of the strike.
Spend Order: Attach this card to a Monk. While it is attached, this Monk may use this card once per turn as if he was a rogue playing it from your hand.
errata: Erratum 2004/07/28: Should read "Monks may play Uncanny Defense as rogues. React: After this character is targeted with a melee or ranged strike: Add this character's skill to his AC for the duration of the strike. Spend Order: If this character is a Monk, attach this card. While it is attached, this Monk may use this card once per turn as if he was a rogue playing it from your hand."

name: Displacement
text: Spend Order: Switch the locations of two characters in the same army who are within one rank of each other. Opposing characters targeted must be lower level than this wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "Another time, sir knight!" - Ichaerus

name: Fireflies
text: React: After this character enters play or moves into the first rank: Target a number of ready cahracter in an opposing first rank up to the caster's level. The targets must succeed with a magic save (DC 12, DC 17 if cast by an Illusionist) or become spent.

name: Destroyer's Armor
text:
This is an Artificer Set item.
Destroyer's Armor may not be equipped by a cleric.
If this character has exactly one equipped Artificer Set item, this character's base stats are: +3/+3 ATK, 13 AC, +4 Skill, 1 HP, and Level 3.
errata: This replaces the base stats of the character. As such other bonuses or penalties to stats are applied afterward. This doesn't, however, affect the 'printed' stats of a character for the purposes of card effects. If more than one base stat modifier is on a character, use the most recent one.

name: Flaming Sphere
text: Spend Order: Target a number of characters in an adjacent rank up to the caster's level. Each target must make a magic save (DC 8 + this wizard's skill) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do you smell something?" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Glamered Glens
text: Spend Order: Target one of your characters. Until the end of the next turn, he may perform actions as though he were in an opposing formation. If the caster is an Illusionist, the target receives Stealth +4 until the end of the next turn.

name: Stolen Breath
text: Spend Order: Target an opposing character within three ranks, who must make a magic save (DC 10 + wizard's skill) or lose a level permanently. If this wizard is a Necromancer, gain a level permanently if the target fails the save. If the target's level drops below 1 in this manner, he is killed.

name: Dame Selen
text:
React: After losing initiative: Gain +4 AC until the end of the turn.
React: After winning initiative: Gain +4 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The end is nigh. Repent, or fall and be damned."

name: Dutan Genecourt
text: React: After a successful use of the Defend feat: Make a Defend check (DC 20) to cancel the redirected action or strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Order Genecourt hath long served the Church in loving faith. An thou findeth a traitor among us, I shall stand aside. Not before."

name: Emil Tzin
text: React: After Emil Tzin targets or is targeted by a melee strike: All items on the opposing character are considered blank for the duration of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "How very peculiar? this thing the Lady Eryne hath discovered doth spread like a thing alive and of its own mind."

name: Evon Myerdeth
text:
Evon Myerdeth may remain spent during the ready phase.
Spend Order: If your Warlord is a Deverenian, he gains +4 ATK, +4 AC, +1 HP, or +4 Skill until Evon Myerdeth readies, stuns, or leaves play.

name: Father Ansance
text: React: Once per turn, before a roll: If Ansance entered play this turn, the roll gains +15 and ignores Critical Failures.

setInfos.flavorText: "Lies and treachery. Whatever shadow you seeketh, you shall not find it here."

name: Fidelis Ghenis
text: Fidelis Ghenis may use the Riposte feat any number of times per turn, and gains +5 ATK during a strike caused by Riposte.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Emperor bids thee welcome." - Baruuk

name: Inquisitor Chyre
text:
React: After another character enters play and performs a React printed on himself: Chyre performs the same React.
React: Once per turn, after a character targets Chyre with a melee strike: Move Chyre back one rank. The strike is cancelled.
errata:
Erratum 2005/04/26: The first React should read "React: Once per turn, after another character enters play and performs a React printed on himself: Chyre performs the same React."
Erratum 2005/04/26: The second React should read "Spend React: After a character targets Chyre with a melee strike: Move Chyre back one rank. The strike is cancelled."

name: Fine Hilted Saber
text:
React: After you equip Fine Hilted Saber: This character has +1 HP until end of turn.
Spend Order: Perform two +3 melee strikes.
errata: The melee strikes may be performed by characters that can't attack.

setInfos.flavorText: "Give it to Jeffrey. I have a sword." - Sir Lucian

name: Inquisitor Piotr
text: Piotr may use the Defend feat as a React to any higher level Deverenian in his rank being targeted, instead of just adjacent characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Surrender to the Inquisition, Dutan. Our fight is not with thee."

name: Novice Catin
text: React: After an action or strike performed by a character in an adjacent rank is canceled: Perform a melee strike (base +3 ATK) targeting that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "And he speaketh out of turn again, Piotr, thou canst slay him."

name: Squire Fastus
text: Higher Level Deverenians in this rank gain +1 ATK and +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "This be but a trial. My devotion will be sore tested, but I shall endure. The Storm will not find me wanting."
"Ahh, the innocent and the devoted-how doth their faith spring up like flowers after a pure rain." - Ghed Mnettaor

name: Bleed
