text: React: Once per turn, after failing a Stealth check: Until the end of the turn, the next time Bleed suffers wounds, the wounds are reduced by one. This is a Stealth action.

name: Chain
text: React: After Chain enters play: Gain +3 AC and +1 HP until the end of the turn.

name: Drum
text: React: After Drum enters play: Spend a level 1 character.

setInfos.flavorText: "He pounded away as the Storm rolled past to d'Ilchant Keep, and kept the beat perfectly." - Purge

name: Havoc
text: React: After a Dwarf enters play adjacent to Havoc: Move Havoc forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothrogs now know fear." - Purge

name: Obsidian Gargoyle
text: You must have a cleric in your army to start with Obsidian Gargoyle or bring one into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "The magma gargoyles rose to follow us, but fell from Sjonegaard's favor in the journey." - Byaal Kadapati

name: Perfect
text: React: After Perfect enters play: Target a character in an opposing first rank who must make a Will save (DC 14) or be stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "There is no failure. Failure is luxury and laziness. We are better than that."

name: Roar
text: Spend React: After Roar enters play: Ready an equal or lower level non-stunned Dwarf you control.

setInfos.flavorText: "I do not understand this concept of 'nations'. Why are all humans not united in harmony?"

name: Madman's Blade
text:
This is an Artificer Set item.
Madman's Blade may not be equipped by a wizard.
If this character has exactly two equipped Artificer Set items, this character's base stats are: +6/+6/+0 ATK, 16 AC, +6 Skill, 2 HP, and Level 5.
errata: This replaces the base stats of the character. As such other bonuses or penalties to stats are applied afterward. This doesn't, however, affect the 'printed' stats of a character for the purposes of card effects. If more than one base stat modifier is on a character, use the most recent one.

name: Shale Gargoyle
text:
You must have a cleric in your army to bring Shale Gargoyle into play.
If at least one Dwarf is in your first rank, your Dwarves in opposing formations count as being in your first rank for determining illegal ranks.

name: Time
text: React: After one of your Dwarves is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, put Time into play from your hand: The Dwarf being targeted gains +5 AC for the duration of the strike.

name: Wreck
text: Order: Up to twice per turn, suffer -4 AC until the end of the turn: Until the end of the turn, Wreck gains either +4 ATK or inflicts an extra wound when he hits with a melee strike.

name: Calix Guard
text:
Calix Guard may not start in play or enter play normally.
React: After a character in an opposing first rank dies, you may put Calix Guard into play from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is how I use failures. Make a note of it, generals." - Tepheroth

name: Coriel
text: Spend React: Before an adjacent Elf targets a character with an action that does not produce melee or ranged strikes: The action may target one rank farther than usual.

setInfos.flavorText: "I see the spirit, necromancer. Do you?"

name: Kapix
text: React: After Kapix enters play: Discard an item within two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even Verdatha die to a well-placed arrowhead."

name: Lekar Osud
text:
All of your action cards are considered spells.
Order: Reveal a card from your hand: Perform a Scribe check (DC 20). If successful, attach the card to Osud, face-down. You may play the card at any time as if from your hand. If unsuccessful, discard it.
errata: Erratum 2005/05/25: His Order should read "Order: Reveal a card from your hand: Perform a Scribe check (DC 20). If successful, attach the card to Osud, face-down. You may detach and play the card at any time as if from your hand. If unsuccessful, discard it."

name: Nelwys
text: Spend React: After an Elf in the rank behind this one targets a non-spell ranged strike: The ranged strike inflicts an extra wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course, Artheon. What else to the Ten require."

name: Ophorus
text: Spend Order: Target a rank within three ranks. Ready characters moving out of that rank become spent before moving, and spent characters moving out become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "The dead leading the dead? How unnatural."

name: Saelin
text: Order: Once per turn: Target a character in an adjacent rank of this formation and make a Will check (DC 9 + level of character). If successful, move the character to this rank. Otherwise, suffer a wound.

name: God's Eye Helm
text:
Order: Once per turn, gain +2 AC until end of turn.
Spend Order: Gain +6 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "To wear it is to see what they saw." - The Nemesis

name: Stephana
text: Spend React: After Stephana enters play: Take the top card from your deck and put it in play face down in your second rank as a level 2 fighter with +5 ATK, 12 AC, +3 Skill, 1 HP, and the Monster trait.

name: Tarwyn
text: Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +5 ranged strikes. If a strike hits, the target is stunned instead of wounded.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've never seen anything like this before, Tarwyn, and you say the nimbics discovered this power of mind?" - Ichaerus

name: Tresven
text:
React: After Tresven enters play: Perform a +4 ranged strike against target spent character.
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I am back. You can tell the others. What? You are gurgling. Oh well, I'll tell them myself."

name: Adept Rey
text: React: After Adept Rey enters play: Until the end of the turn, Friar Rey performs an extra melee strike (base +1 ATK) when he attacks.
errata: Erratum 2004/06/29: "Friar Rey" should be "Adept Rey".

setInfos.flavorText: "Fire only burns if you let it. Kavara's too easily distracted."

name: Albrecht Novice
text: React: After Albrecht Novice enters play: Give adjacent characters +2 ATK and +2 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Denska is in need, and the Aroch rebuild. We will be with you soon." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Arstus Kant
text: React: Before Arstus Kant inflicts wounds with a melee strike: The target of the strike must make a Fortitude save (DC 11) or become spent.

name: Kara Wadreth
text:
Kara Wadreth may equip two Weapons.
React: After one of your Free Kingdoms characters enters play, discard a card: Move the character forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Go to the islands, Dukat said. They're practically a paradise, he told me."
"No kings here. Only mud."

name: Koranos
text: React: After Koranos enters play: Free Kingdoms characters in your front rank have +2 ATK and +2 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kor's faithful offer what help they can, Lord Halbrook."

name: Luka Yscar
text: Order: Spend an equipped Lycanthrope Form: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Baraxton to Lukkot to Mourn. I've... arranged it."

name: Roland Tzin
text: React: After Roland Tzin enters play: Move up to three of your equal or lower level Free Kingdoms characters forward or backward one rank each.

setInfos.flavorText: "An old line of Deverenian royalty, now so poor they cannot even afford weapons." - Vronish Kez

name: Athanae's Heritage
text:
This is a Vedoszentek Set item.
If there is an opposing cleric, this character has Powerattack +3.
React: After an opposing rogue or wizard performs an Order, spend an equipped Vedoszentek Set item: This character has +2 Skill until end of turn.
errata: The React doesn't occur until after the opposing action finishes.

name: Sir Lorden
text: Lorden may not be targeted by ranged strikes. Adjacent good Free Kingdoms characters have +1 Hit Point.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course it's impossible to learn the trade so quickly. Why else would I need faith?"

name: Sister Amanda
text:
Sister Amanda is both a cleric and a rogue.
Sister Amanda enters play as if she were Level 5.
Spend React: Once per turn, after target Free Kingdoms performs a Spend Order: Ready the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "We're not done yet."

name: Squire Argos
text: Other equal or lower level Free Kingdoms characters in this rank have +2 ATK and +1 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even as we train under the Grey Riders, Lucian learns from Terak alone."

name: Blackwaters
text:
May not equip items.
React: Before Blackwaters suffers more than one wound: Make a Fortitude save (DC 10 + level of the characters inflicting the wounds) to reduce the wounds inflicted to one.

name: Cheap Fodder
text:
If Cheap Fodder is in play at the end of turn, make a Will check (DC 12). If successful, shuffle him into your deck. Otherwise, he is killed.
React: After Cheap Fodder enters play: Move him forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't worry. The gods aren't done with this one."

name: Conscripts
text: React: After one of your characters kills an opposing character: Put Conscripts into play from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hire any able-bodied men you can, Sceth, and assign them to the front lines." - Krun

name: Crucin Bascar
text:
React: After a character enters play, discard a card: The character permanently gains the Monster trait. Do not discard a card if the character is yours.
Spend Order: Your Monsters have +3 ATK until the end of the turn.

name: Kun Atoll
text: React: After an attack during which Kun Atoll was targeted with one or more melee strikes: Perform an attack.

setInfos.flavorText: "Monks are supposed to be poor. Try telling him that." - Kun Tzin

name: Lost Yscarite
text: Lost Yscarite has an extra melee strike (+5 ATK) while attacking if in an opposing formation.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is a danger we all face: wanting power, but only wanting enough." - Varson Yscar

name: Markappal Ivy
text: Spend React: After target character enters play: Spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "It grows here as well? Gimme a break! No, wait. Gimme a knife..." - Jonah the Burglar
"It hides in the underbrush, and it's always hungry." - Percy Dorn

name: Elude
text: Order: Until end of turn opposing lower Level characters have -2 ATK and -2 Skill while within one rank of this character (within two ranks of this character, if this character is a Bard).
errata: Based on the location of the acting character. If the character moves (Or is killed) the effects will follow it (Or end).

setInfos.flavorText: "This one reminds me of Laurenna." - Tepheroth

name: Steel Dragon Insignia
text: This character has +1 Level for equipping items while adjacent to another fighter.

setInfos.flavorText: "Insanity! Nay, 'tis dedication to a cause." - Mistress Brigette

name: Mistiff
text:
You must have an Illusionist in your army to bring Mistiff in to play.
Characters hit by Mistiff's melee strikes are stunned but not wounded.

setInfos.flavorText: "One part shadow, on part substance, and morning dew rises as a hound to do thy bidding." - Xaros the Mist

name: Sarakian Ooze
text:
May not maneuver, attack or equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Target a character within two rank, who must make a Will save (DC 11) or become stunned.

name: Soul Hunter
text:
Soul Hunter ignores the Astral trait with his melee and ranged strikes.
If Soul Hunter has two adjacent characters, he may use the Stealth feat as if he were in an opposing formation.

name: Bohst
text: React: After Bohst enters play: Make a skill check (DC 9). If successful, move one of your Nothrogs forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Offer accepted, Krun." - Vronish Kez

name: Gi'Yarr
text: While he has no items equipped, Gi'Yarr has +4 ATK and inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "An heretic, trained not by the Spider, but by the Storm." - The Stone Spider

name: Hate Rider
text: React: After Hate Rider enters play: Gain Riding +10 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Loneley howls fill the night, and then the dwarves were dying."

name: Hrak
text: React: After Hrak enters play: Gain +5 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sarakia? Piddle. Ya ever try catchin' Shattered Lands snipe?"

"Blast... what I wouldn't give to taste the power the Nimbics stole from the temples."
Mekk'iah did not answer.

name: Ma'Ken
text: React: Before Ma'Ken performs a melee strike roll, discard a card: Ma'ken gains +4 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Tell Rreg'jenn that we will uphold our end of the bargain, but that we will make sure there are not further surprises." - Mekk'iah

name: Rrallic
text: Spend React: After an opposing level 1 character enters play: Perform a melee strike targeting that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Remember, don't harm any knights." - Tzarrik

name: Sword Chucks
text:
-1 Skill
Order: Once per turn: This character has +7 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Only a true master of the 2-handed Monkey Style can effectively use the Sword Chucks.

name: Rreg'gar
text: React: Once per turn, after a character two ranks away performs a React: Perform a +3 ranged strike targeting that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "They stay still just a moment too long, and these dwarves will remain that way."

name: Rrok
text:
Wounds inflicted by Rrok's melee strikes may not be reduced.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hate's dead, but his dream can still be reality."
"You shouldn'ta done what ya did."

name: Sceth's Spears
text:
May not attack.
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
React: After Sceth's Spears enters play: Gain Marksmanship +8 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mine's bigger." - Sceth Hellbringer

name: Chameleon Form
text:
Lycanthrope only.
After this items is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character.
This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms.
Feats performed by this character are considered Stealth actions.

name: Fighting Sticks
text:
Monk and rogue only.
React: After wounding an equal or lower level opposing character: Spend that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now, was that club, punch, thrust..." - Kun Hull

name: Great Crossbow
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Spend Order: Spend Great Crossbow: Perform a +5 ranged strike which targets a character exactly three ranks away and inflicts an extra wound if it hits. Stun Great Crossbow.

name: Kun Robes
text:
Monk and rogue only.
React: Before a melee or ranged strike targetting this character, spend the Robes: Gain an AC bonus until the end of the turn equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand.

name: Mind Gate
text:
Mentalist and wizard only.
Order: Spend the Mind Gate: Target a character and make a Will save (DC 10 + target's skill, DC 5 + target's skill if this character is a Mentalist) to move that character forward or backward one rank.

name: Monkey's Paws
text:
Fighter and Monk only.
If this character has no Weapon equipped, he performs an extra melee strike during attacks with a base of +2 ATK and inflicts one extra wound when he hits with a melee strike.

name: Shaped Will
text:
Mentalist and wizard only.
React: After targeting a character with a melee strike: Gain an ATK bonus until the end of the strike equal to the level of one item equipped by the target.

name: Deima's Focus
text:
This is a Vedoszentek Set item.
If there is an opposing rogue, this character has Charisma +3.
React: After an opposing wizard or cleric performs an Order, spend an equipped Vedoszentek Set item: This character has +2 AC until end of turn.
errata: The React doesn't occur until after the opposing action finishes.

name: Tiger Form
text:
Lycanthrope only.
After this items is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character. This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms.
React: After a ready character moves into an adjacent rank: Perform a melee strike targeting that character.

name: Wastrel's Stone
text:
Mentalist and wizard only.
Order: Spend Wastrel's Stone: Perform a +3 ranged strike against a character whose player has no cards in hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ten years... how little time, but too much to be anyone's lapdog." - Raziel

name: Bascaron's Favor
text: Order: Discard Bascaron's Favor: An adjacent character who has received no permanent bonuses gains +4 ATK, +4 AC, or +5 skill permanently. If this cleric is a Cantor, the character may instead gain +1 hit point permanently.

name: Book of Days
text: Order: If you have not discarded any copies of Book of Days this turn, discard all copies of Book of Days in your army: Your hand size during your next draw phase is increased by the number of Books discarded. Book of Days that are attached to Seers may be shuffled into deck instead of discarded.

name: Divining Cards
text: Order: Spend Divining Cards: Look at the top two cards of any deck (top five if this cleric is a Seer), and put them all at the bottom or on top of the deck in the same order.

setInfos.flavorText: "What, no dice?" - Sipho Hamisi
Behlial nodded. "Thank you, child. Now prepare for the next one."

name: Spirit Potion
text:
Order: Discard the Potion: Gain +4 ATK and +4 AC until the end of the turn.
Order: Equip the Potion to another character in this rank, regardless of class. Cantors may do this as a React to equipping the Potion.

name: Bruntor's Shield
text: While this character has at least two items with 'Bruntor's' in the title, this character has an extra +5 AC (+7 total) against ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "...and shield. Useless, without the man inside them." - Lord Halbrook

name: Bruntor's Mail
text: While this character has at least three items with "Bruntor's" in the title, this character has +1 level and +5 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Denskan king's armor and helm?" - Lord Halbrook

name: Claidh Mor
text: React: After inflicting one or more wounds with a melee strike, spend the Claidh Mor: Move the target of the strike back one rank and spend him.

setInfos.flavorText: Rraag'nar whirled about, and soon, no dwarf dared face him.

name: Maker's Gloves
text:
This is an Artificer Set item.
Maker's Gloves may not be equipped by a rogue.
If this character has exactly three equipped Artificer Set items, this character's base stats are: +8/+8/+4/+1 ATK, 19 AC, +8 Skill, 4 HP, and Level 7.
errata: This replaces the base stats of the character. As such other bonuses or penalties to stats are applied afterward. This doesn't, however, affect the 'printed' stats of a character for the purposes of card effects. If more than one base stat modifier is on a character, use the most recent one.

name: Gallows Root
text: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike which does an extra wound if it hits. Barbarians have Powerattack +5 for the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Out of the way, Yaw." - Uthas Battleheim

name: Sarakian Gloves
text:
React: After equipping the Gloves: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: After a character in this rank is targeted with a melee or ranged strike, spend the Gloves: If this fighter a Ranger, perform a melee strike against the targeting character.

name: Blade and Chain
text:
Melee strikes against this rogue gain no ATK bonus from Weapons.
React: After this rogue performs a melee strike from the Riposte feat that hit, target a Weapon equipped to the target of the strike: Destroy the Weapon.

name: Bola
text: Order: Spend Bola: Perform a +4 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Useful for bringing down those not worth an arrow, so that the Bone Fiends may feast." - Kaimir
"Useful for bringing down those not worth an arrow, so that the bone fiends may feast." - Kaimir
"If you need one alive." - Captain Dukat

name: Gloves of Trespass
text: React: After targeting a spent character with a melee strike, spend the Gloves: The target must make a fortitude save (DC 5 + rogue's Skill, DC 10 + rogue's Skill if this character is an Assassin) or the strike is a Critical Success.

name: Hurricane Horn
text: Spend Order: Target a rank within two ranks. Each character in that rank must make a Fortitude save (DC 5 + This rogue's skill) or be stunned. If this character is a Bard, Siege characters which fail are killed.

name: Lodestone Buckler
text:
Monks may equip this item.
+3 AC (+4 total) against ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Wait, what if they're using flint?" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Tainted Feed
text: Order: Discard the Feed: Target a Steed within two ranks and make a poison check (DC 8 + Steed's level). If successful, discard the Steed and spend the character it is equipped to. Assassins may target a Steed within three ranks.

name: Thunder Drum
text: Spend Order: Target a rank within three ranks. Until the end of the turn, any action performed in that rank requires spending as a cost. If this character is a Bard, characters in that rank may not cast spells or use "Bard only" actions.

name: Lykos
text:
+3 Skill
Order: Spend Lykos: Discard a Steed or Familiar within three ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not all the wolves at Phrygai bore Hate's Riders. I spied one watching and feasting upon the fallen." - Cador

name: Deverenus' Honor
text:
This is a Vedoszentek Set item.
Order: Once per turn: Until end of turn, opposing fighters must target this character with melee strikes if possible.
Order: Spend an equipped Vedoszentek Set item: Until end of turn this fighter has Riposte +3 and may use Riposte an additional time.
errata: "May not target unless there is no other target" trumps "must target if possible". Combining this card with Sir Searlus, for instance, level 1 characters may still only target him if there is no other legal option.

name: Mirage Potion
text:
React: After this character is targeted by an action that does not produce a melee strike, discard Mirage Potion: Cancel the action.
React: After equipping Mirage Potion: If this wizard is an Illusionist, equip Mirage Potion to another character in this rank, regardless of class and Level.

name: Morghen's Staff
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, gain a Skill bonus equal to the number of characters in one player's discard pile. If this wizard is a Necromancer, also gain an ATK bonus of the same amount.
errata: Erratum 2004/06/28: Its Order should be "Once per turn".

name: Sorscha's Reach
text: Spend Order: Target a lower level Monster you control within one rank (two, if this character is a Summoner.). Until the end of the turn, that Monster has the same class(es) and level as this wizard. Wounds inflicted on the Monster this turn are also inflicted on the wizard.

name: Alliance Standard
text:
Free Kingdoms Warlord only.
Order: Spend the Banner: Make a Charisma check (DC 20). If successful, target another Free Kingdoms character, who gains an ATK, AC, and Skill bonus equal to this character's level.

setInfos.flavorText: "Liberty. Fraternity. Equality."

name: Amulet of Waking
text:
For the purposes of card effects, this character is always considered Ready.
This character may perform non-Spend actions while stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "Vigilance is the watchword. Toris Kelt is the cradle of the alliance, and must never fall." - Captain Dukat
"Interesting days." - The Terror of Sharn Keep

name: Andover Signet
text: All Free Kingdoms characters in this rank have +1 bonus to their die rolls.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sir Robert entrusted it to Toris Kelt, in honor of the alliance's foundation." - Captain Dukat
"I will fight for what once was, and pray for what will be." - Sir Robert, Duke of Andover

name: Bear Form
text:
Lycanthrope only.
After this item is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character.
This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms.

setInfos.flavorText: "By the time you fight, you have already failed." - Rown Yscar
"Once the Master has given his blessing, you can never reject it. His scar will be with you forever." - Toren Yscar

name: Calix's Banner
text:
Elf Warlord only.
React: After one of your Elves makes a ranged strike roll, spend the Banner: Make a Charisma check (DC 20). If successful, add +4 to the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Eternity."

name: Chain Mail
text: Cleric and fighter only.

setInfos.flavorText: "It will do better against the Deverenians' swords than the Freemen's arrows, but we still need an edge..." - Elenitakis
"You humans call this armor? Bah! Give me three feet of ironcloth-I'll run from here to the Caves of Duughn, and break your swords to boot!" - Guardian
"You humans call this armor? Bah! Give me three feet of ironcloth-I'll run from here to the Caves of Duughn, and break your swords to boot!" - Guardian

name: Demonslayers
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: After this character targets an Astral or Ethereal character with a ranged strike, spend Demonslayers: Ignore the effects of the Astral or Ethereal trait.
If this character is a Ranger or Scout, the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

name: Kigyo Tanar's Prey
text:
This a Vedoszentek Set item.
If there is an opposing wizard, this character has Magic Resistance +3.
React: After an opposing cleric or rogue performs an Order, spend an equipped Vedoszentek Set item: Move forward.
errata: The React doesn't occur until after the opposing action finishes.

name: Deverenian Coronet
text: All Deverenians in this rank have +1 AC and +3 Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Deverenia shall wring from the Accordlands what is rightfully hers." - Lord Gahid Rellion
"We shall rise like the dawn, and the blood of our enemies will stain the skies of a new era." - His Imperial Majesty, Master of the Deverenian Empire, Heir of Signon and Lord of the Storm

name: Drac's Banner
text:
Deverenian Warlord only.
Order: Spend the Banner: Make a Charisma check (DC 20). If successful, gain an ATK, AC, and Skill bonus equal to twice the number of other Deverenians in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sum sine cupum. Sum optimum. Sum absum." - Drac family motto

name: Dwarven Warhammer
text:
Cleric and fighter only.
The Warhammer gives an additional +1 ATK while equipped by a Dwarf.

setInfos.flavorText: "To arms. We have a world to save." - Garn Hearthstone
"The Deverenian city of Phrygai is a stone in our tomb, nothing more. If it keeps the Abyss at bay for just one day more, then it was worth the lives we gave to seize it." - Saul Tombcarver

name: Elephant Form
text:
+2 HP
Lycanthrope only.
After this item is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character.
This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms.

setInfos.flavorText: "Move quietly when you can, but never let up. Push on, no matter the odds." - Rown Yscar
"The cult of Yscar has been hidden for decades... why return, only to be destroyed?" - Kenia

name: Fine Saddle
text: If this character's Steed is discarded, discard Fine Saddle.

setInfos.flavorText: "Polished and ready, milord." - Squire Edonloc
"We've a long ride to meet the d'Ilchant, Lucian. Make sure Helix is comfortable." - Terak

name: Footman's Pike
text:
You may have any number of Footman's Pikes in your deck.
Footman's Pike gives an additional +1 ATK for each other Footman's Pike in this rank.
React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike, spend the Pike: Discard a Steed equipped by the attacking character.

name: Gloves of Archery
text: Fighter and rogue only.

setInfos.flavorText: "I never miss." - Darian Windson

name: Hand Crossbow
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Order: Spend the Hand Crossbow: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Always have a holdout weapon. Always." - Captain Dukat
"Search the Baraxton prisoners properly this time." - Rreg'jen

name: Heavy Crossbow
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike that targets a character three ranks away.

setInfos.flavorText: "If they get too close, drop it. They're expensive, but you can always get another one eventually." - Captain Dukat

"I carried the news of Baraxton to Sir Robert... and brought Darian his wife's dagger. I've never seen a man's heart break that way... like it was shattered into nothing but shards of glass." - Jemman

"I carried the news of Baraxton to Sir Robert... and brought Darian his wife's dagger. I've never seen a man's heart break that way... like it was shattered into nothing but shards of glass." - Jemman

name: Hember's Sigil
text: All Dwarves in this rank gain +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "What price victory? Any price, save our souls." - King Xod
"A nation is not a place. It is a people." - Heart

name: Golden Warhammer
text:
Order: If an opponent has 1 or more cards in hand, and Golden Warhammer has less than 4 Charges: Put a Charge on Golden Warhammer.
Order: Spend Golden Warhammer, and remove 4 Charges: Perform two +4 melee strikes.
errata: The +3 ATK from the Warhammer adds to these melee strikes, making them effectively +7s.

name: Horn of Fog
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters have +4 AC against ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mammoth's tusks, there goes our line of sight. To the field, men!" - Sceth Hellbringer
Anandale glowered. "Blind their eyes, and thus cut the strings of their bows. 'Tis an old trick, Gahid-likely why you did not think of it."
Anandale glowered. "Blind their eyes, and thus cut the strings of their bows. 'Tis an old trick, Gahid - likely why you did not think of it."

name: Invisible Shield
text: You must spend a wizard to bring this card into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Wait. If Darso's inside, then that must mean... Oh, no..." - Gaston Bonhomme
Arak Spire stands amidst ruin; a lonely reminder of Corinth's prime.

name: Kerebrus' Standard
text:
Mercenary Warlord only.
Order: Spend the Banner: Make a Charisma check (DC 20). If successful, target a lower level Mercenary and move it forwards or backwards one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Order everlasting."

name: Kor's Banner
text:
Dwarf Warlord only.
React: Before one of your Dwarves is wounded, spend the Banner: Make a Charisma check (DC 20). If successful, reduce the number of wounds by 1.

setInfos.flavorText: "Faith. Hope. Duty."

name: Krun's Standard
text:
Nothrog Warlord only.
React: After one of your Nothrogs makes a successful melee strike roll, spend the Banner: Make a Charisma check (DC 20). If successful, the strike inflicts an extra wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Glory through triumph."

name: Main Gauche
text: Fighter and rogue only.

setInfos.flavorText: "Good for parrying, and even the occasional surprise attack. Only problem is that if you're close enough to hurt someone with it, they're probably going to be hitting you harder." - Sir Erik Kaisen

"Tepheroth pardoned Sedwin of his crime so that he could hunt Rowan for her. Elf does not kill Elf-but Sedwin had already spilled his own cousin's blood. What matter, then, if he should kill more? A mercy for him, that his death will be quick-and for Tepheroth, an assassin she can control." - Artheon

"Tepheroth pardoned Sedwin of his crime so that he could hunt Rowan for her. Elf does not kill elf-but Sedwin had already spilled his own cousin's blood. What matter, then, if he should kill more? A mercy for him, that his death will be quick-and for Tepheroth, an assassin she can control." - Artheon

name: Nothrog Bow
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Maybe if Nothrog had better bows, they'd be better archers. No wonder they can't hit the broad side of Baraxton." - Davon Ironthorn

name: Nothrog Warbanner
text: All Nothrog in this rank have +2 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "War without end." - Rraag'nar
"And I looked, and saw a pale horse upon the horizon. Its name was Death, and the banner it carried was the harbinger of Everlasting War..." - Nassiral Hate

name: Parrying Blades
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Weapons provide no ATK bonuses to melee strikes targeting this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "A gentleman's weapons. 'Tis no surprise thou daren't wield them." - Fauhn Boralis
"Hear that, elf? That's my master coming. See, I didn't need to hit you to kill you." - Seraphina Corazon

name: Patchwork Armor
text:
You may have any number of Patchwork Armors in your deck.
Characters higher than 2nd level may not equip Patchwork Armor.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why's everybody laughing?" - Bradley
"You've got to be kidding me." - Forge

name: Polished Plate
text: Order: Once per turn: Until end of turn this character has +4 AC and Level 1 characters may not target him with melee strikes.
errata: There is no "if possible" clause. Level 1 characters simply can't target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Thy armor showeth the prowess of thy abilities Baron. May the Storm bless thee always." - Brother Ansel

name: Rapier
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
This character gains an additional melee strike (ATK +1, +3 with the Rapier's bonus) during attacks.
Whenever this character inflicts wounds with a melee strike, reduce the wounds by one, to a minimum of one.

name: Roc Form
text:
Lycanthrope only.
After this item is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character.
This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms.
Order: Up to twice per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Scepter of the Seven
text: All Elves in this rank have +1 ATK and +3 Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "We all know this-the High Queen have overstepped her bounds. Who is with me?" - Ichaerus
"The Seven Houses will stand - Calix, Syneri, Glyn, Dythanus, Rowan, Wyrian and Tanisq-until the world shall end."
"The magic of mortals bears no power against the might of the Storm." - Bishop Koenraad

The Warrior smiled a tight, cruel grin as he advanced toward her, his sword eager for blood. "Feel free to try it again, my lady Deverenian. You've got one more chance before I slice your head from your shoulders. Do try to make it count..."

name: Spider Form
text:
Lycanthrope only.
After this item is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character.
This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms.
This character has an additional melee strike with a base ATK of +2 (+5 with the Spider Form's ATK bonus) whenever he attacks.

name: Staff of the Traveler
text: All Mercenaries in this rank have +1 ATK and +1 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Take what is needed. Leave what you can't carry. Fight to be strong, not to take what you cannot use." - Faiza Nyota
"Do not seek to follow in my footsteps. See to find what I sought." - Syneri the Archmage

name: Throwing Daggers
text:
Fighter and Monk only.
Spend Order: Perform five consecutive +0 ranged strikes. These strikes may not receive any bonuses to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "In truth, I've little talent for them, but why let on?" - Baudwyn Troubadour
"To our esteemed cousin, the Lord Hate: We have reason to believe one of the prisoners has something we need..." - Cassica Moonseed

name: White Sash
text:
Cleric and Paladin only.
Order: Once per turn: If this character's alignment is currently good, until the end of the turn this character's alignment is evil.
Order: Once per turn: If this character's alignment is currently evil, until the end of the turn this character's alignment is good.

name: Wolf Form
text:
Lycanthrope only.
After this item is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character.
This character may not equip items that are not Lycanthrope Forms.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't take the wolf form when people suspect you're about. Many people don't know we can take other shapes." - Rown Yscar
"Help me," he pleaded, showing the silvery scar upon his arm. "They have taken my soul..."

"And there wilt come a man of foul lies and ambitions unshackled by honor. He shall invoke prophecy for his own ends, though he himself believeth it not. In his hands shall hold the balance of the world, and his aims lead many to doom before his fall."
The Storm serveth no man, save he who is master of both Earth and Sky.

name: Drawing Stones
text:
At the beginning of each turn, put 1 Charge on Drawing Stones (2 Charges if this character is a Scout).
Order: Remove 1 Charge: This character adds +2 to his ranged strike rolls until end of turn.

name: Balian's Helm
text: Adjacent characters gain +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: He was a priest of the blood moon Bascaron, and its mutilating madness seeps from all his relics.
Otho licked his lips clean. One less to worry about.
"Mourn is no terror, no festering wound nor deadly trap. It is the model for the world."

name: Bascarite Mark
text: ATK, AC, and Skill bonuses from this character which affect one or more other characters are increased by +2.

setInfos.flavorText: "We draw our power from Bascaron, too, but never succumb to the temptation to desire beyond your training. That way lies madness." - Rown Yscar
"They're twisted and foul, aye, but they stick together." - Edge

name: Belt of Heroes
text: +2 Skill

setInfos.flavorText: "The tribes have returned, and with them, our relics. It is time to make the world fear us once more." - Faiza Nyota

Only the finest of the Northern Tribes can wear it. Every five years, the tribes would gather to allow their bravest to compete in the challenges. I wonder what will happen to it, now that the tribes have scattered to the winds?

Only the finest of the Northern Tribes can wear it. Every five years, the tribes would gather to allow their bravest to compete in the challenges. I wonder what will happen to it, now that the tribes have scattered to the winds?

name: Blessed Vestments
text: +1 HP

setInfos.flavorText: "We have nothing in our country that could compare to this ironcloth material your priests wear. I would ask for but the smallest scrap as a token of trust and fealty, Alaric. Do this and I will present you to our king." - Brom Frostbeard
With no ready supply of athril to make more, what little ironcloth the dwarves retain is passed on to their priesthood, a token of that which has been lost.
"Glory be to Neus for the food we eat, the people we live with, and the wisdom we read. Neus keep us from our fears, and lift us up to our true selves." - Reinholt

"I did not know the stars not the sun before we came upground, and I did not need them. I had Kor's word that they existed, passed down through Hember's Rune. I need faith to know my world, and nothing else." - Gnarrow Yaw

name: Bloodoak Staff
text:
This cleric gains the Druid trait.
React: Before this cleric suffers wounds, spend Bloodoak Staff, inflict the same number of wounds on other characters you control: Reduce this cleric's wounds to zero. You cannot inflict more wounds on one of your characters than his hit points.

name: Blue Willow Staff
text: React: Before a character in your army makes a magic save or poison save, spend the Blue Willow Staff: Add +10 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mercy and wrath. Ishara has little patience for those who do not appreciate her gifts." - Ruth Gwenelen
"Forgiveness is an attribute of the strong." - Zoe

name: Blue Willow Wand
text: Order: Target an adjacent character and discard the Blue Willow Wand: Remove one wound from that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "As fragile as a dying flower, but far more useful." - Phython
"Blue willow's been used for healing since the days when Andover left the Empire, long before even my grandmother's birth." - Zoe
"Blue willow's been used for healing since the days when Andover left the Empire, long before even my grandmother's birth." - Zoe

name: Ellyah's Children
text:
Evil only.
Order: While in the 1st rank, spend Ellyah's Children: They attack as a level 1 fighter with AC 10, 1 Hit Point, 0 Skill, and ATK of +1.

setInfos.flavorText: "More." - Rustiq Umbala
"Ellyah calls them her 'children', and mourns if they are destroyed. She does not weep when first their lives are taken-her tears are for the dead, but not the living." - Yanthorine

name: Helm of Kor
text: React: After an opposing character readies from an opposing character's action outside the ready phase, spend Helm of Kor: Ready a character you control.

setInfos.flavorText: "Uplanders neglecting the Accord is what brought us to this. Why should we go out of our way to help them?" - Vex Duntan
"I am ready to do what I must do. Are you, brother?" - Valhala Abyssbane
Avalanche locked eyes with Zeal for an instant, then whispered his first prayer to Kor in a decade.

name: Holy Symbol
text: Order: Discard the Holy Symbol: This cleric is +1 level until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our time is at hand. Repent, heretics, for the Storm cometh." - Bishop Koenraad
"Unless you believe, you shall not understand." - Bishop Koenraad

name: Pilferer's Gloves
text:
This is a Cartwright Set item.
Opposing lower Level characters within one rank have -1 ATK and -2 Skill.
React: Once per turn, after killing an opposing character: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck: You may put one revealed Cartwright Set item into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
errata: Shuffle your deck after using the React.

name: Mail of Virtue
text: React: Before this character suffers one or more wounds, spend the Mail of Virtue: Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Odd. This temple's already been plundered. Seraphina, are we backtracking?" - Anton
"It lies in the Temple of Katal, guarded by a demon the size of three horses. I doubt we shall see it again in our lifetime, my friend." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Morningstar
text: This character gains +2 ATK while performing a melee strike targeting a character of opposite alignment.

setInfos.flavorText: "War without hate. I never really knew how difficult that could be." - Frederik Lahr
"Confess, heretic." - Inquisitor Mastus

name: Opposition Talisman
text: Spend Order: Stun a character of opposite alignment and lower level up to three ranks away.

setInfos.flavorText: "Where in Kor's name did this come from?" - Gnorrow Yaw
"Worthless little dwarf," said Hate, fingering the talisman. "Wait here."

name: Pact of Bone
text: React: Once per turn, after this character spends to cast a spell, inflict one wound on this character: Ready him.

setInfos.flavorText: "A terrible waste of effort. Undeath is not true immortality." - T'kilth
"I can help you achieve immortality... but there is a price." - Othoreos

name: Phonstone
text: This character gains +3 AC while he is the target of a melee strike or ranged strike from a character of the opposite alignment.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't release the sprite. It will not thank you for its freedom." - Jaqueline Windson
"Remember, Alia, that love is no part of the final dream. Love ages and withers in darkness; it is a great hunger, and passion can be cruel." - Rathe
"Remember, Alia, that love is no part of the final dream. Love ages, and withers in darkness; it is a great hunger, and passion can be cruel." - Rathe

name: Pledged Oath
text: React: Before this cleric casts a spell, inflict one wound on him: Raise his level by 2 for casting the spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "Where art thou, heathen? I can smell thy magic and thy blood..." - Sorceress Ygraine
"These humans are a cowardly people, divided against themselves, and eager to beg aid from terrors. How did they survive even this long?" - High Queen Tepheroth

name: Stormwraith's Oath
text: This character gains the Astral trait.

setInfos.flavorText: Since her arrival, the Black Sun have served Mnettaor faithfully, remaining ever mindful of the price she would one day exact...
Join us...

name: Tears of the Storm
text: Spend Order: Remove a wound from target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Storm can not be vanquished. It is gathering strength again." - Ghed Nuri
"Beware, Strongarm. Some gifts come at too high a price." - Edge
"I've seen the Deverenian clerics collect rain in a golden chalice, and use it to heal their soldiers. The Storm is more than a mere darkness on the horizon..."
"I've seen the Deverenian clerics collect rain in a golden chalice, and use it to heal their soldiers. The Storm is more than a mere darkness on the horizon..."

name: Thunder Mace
text: While this character is performing a melee strike targeting an Astral or Ethereal character, he gains +2 ATK for the strike, and ignores the effects of the Astral or Ethereal trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "A few Abyssals that have surfaced have fallen to the Stormwraiths. I don't know whether to be thankful or not." - Purge
"Bear the arms of righteousness, daughter. You will need their might." - Modred, Hierophant of the Storm

name: Wolf Companion
text:
Druid only.
React: Once per strike, after a melee strike targeting this character, spend the Wolf Companion: Perform a melee strike (ATK +0) targeting the striking character.
React: Before this character suffers one or more wounds, discard Wolf Companion: Reduce the wounds by one.

name: Tail Swipe
text:
Assassins perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Target opposing character must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 13 + rank that character is in) or fall forward one rank.
errata: Characters in the first rank cannot fall forward, and so may not be targeted by this action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ss-saurth shall have his revenge." - Tanfess-sh

name: Khadraiq
text:
This is a Ma'rifi Set item.
Order: Remove 1 Charge: Until end of turn opposing characters have -1 ATK, AC, and Skill for each Ma'rifi Set item equipped to this character, while within one rank of this character.
errata:
The penalty is set when the action's cost is paid.
Using this Order more than once per turn will stack.

setInfos.flavorText: "Stand your ground!" Lord Gahid shouted as the arrows rained down. "We are Deverenians, and no mere elf can ever defeat us!"

"They shall pay," Gahid said bitterly, "for the destruction of a Deverenian city. No dwarf shall escape us. Let the mountain rats crawl back beneath their rocks, else they shall die skewered upon our blades."

"They shall pay," Gahid said bitterly, "for the destruction of a Deverenian city. No dwarf shall escape us. Let the mountain rats crawl back beneath their rocks, else they shall die skewered upon our blades."

name: Anandale's Armor
text: React: After a melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting this character, spend Anandale's Armor: The die is rerolled.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Lord Rellion learns slowly, like unto a backwards child, but e'en a child outlives the Elves." - Master Anandale
"Anandale was the strongest Knight in the Empire, the best of us. But now his time has passed..." - Lord Gahid
"Anandale was the strongest Knight in the Empire, the best of us. But now his time has passed..." - Lord Gahid

name: Black Banner
text:
If your Warlord is killed while the Black Banner is in play, this character gains the Warlord trait and you do not lose the game.
If this character is killed or loses the Black Banner while he has the Warlord trait, you lose the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "To war!" - Uthanak
"Let nothing stand in our way. Victory... or death." - Uthanak

name: Black Sun Shield
text:
+5 Skill
Evil Paladin only.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bear witness, Terak Justicebringer. I carry the Black Sun Shield, and no man or beast may threaten Deverenia, that I move not to protect her." - Ghed Mnettaor
"I will tear down your truths and show you the darkness behind the sun. And when you armies are crushed beneath my heel, Aroch will be no more than a handful of dust." - Rhawn d'Ilchant

name: Bruntor's Helm
text: +1 HP

setInfos.flavorText: "Denska may be a distant memory now, but the suffering of its people under the yoke of the Deverenian Empire is a tale that is still relevant. That Lord Halbrook and Albrecht both should rally to them an army capable of liberating the country from even the Eternal Emperor should be inspiration enough. We can do the same here..." - Keziah
"He was a great man, and now his kingdom consists solely of this helm. I do not gift it rashly, warrior." - Lork Halbrook, the Last Denskan
"A pebble can start a landslide, but could never stop one. Any action worth taking is worth first considering." - Valhala Abyssbane
"Walking up the mountain wearies you less than a stone in your boot. Small things can conquer large ones." - Dwarven proverb
"Walking up the mountain wearies you less than a stone in your boot. Small things can conquer large ones." - Dwarven proverb

name: Celestial Flame
text: This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with an odd melee strike roll.

setInfos.flavorText: Righteousness bound in solid form, burning with an uncertain fire.
Righteousness bound in solid form, burning with an uncertain fire.
"I claim you as my disciple, Angus Hammerfall. Together, we shall purge this world of those that befoul it." - Uriel
"My blade is in your hands, mortal, but it is still mine." - Uriel

name: Darkhide Armor
text: Melee and ranged strikes that inflict more than one wound inflict only one wound against this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Unclean magic and foul materials. It moves of its own accord. I'll take it." - Uther Killer-of-Bears
"'Took three men to make this armor,' the Nothrog smith said with a grin. I didn't ask what he meant, because I knew he'd worked alone." - Tyren Ruskin

name: Excessus
text: React: After this character hits with a melee strike roll: The strike inflicts two additional wounds. Inflict one wound on this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "There are hidden powers of the blade, of course. It wouldn't be very useful otherwise." - Giehox Nemesis
"The legendary Bascaron Blade, the Sword Sinister, had found its way to TOrnhawk's hand. Will it be her salvation, or her undoing?" - The Loremaster
"How do humans put up with this bulk?" - Guardian
"These are the Deverenians to fear-the ones who can afford the full armor, and have the training to wear it." - Elees
"No sword can pierce Deverenian plate. Where you see a knight, run. That's about the best defense you have." - Palethis

name: Gladius
text:
Shields may not prevent this character from making multiple strikes in a turn.
React: Spend the Gladius after this character targets a Melee Strike: Perform an additional melee strike against the same target after this one. Both strikes receive a -5 ATK penalty.

name: Cartwright Trinket
text:
+1 Skill
Opposing rogues are -1 Level for performing actions while this character is adjacent to another rogue.
errata: Pertains to performing any action, including equipping items.

setInfos.flavorText: "A guild split in two. Perfect." - Cear Adinerach

name: Golden Dragon Shield
text:
Good Paladin only.
Order: If this character is in the first rank, spend the Shield: Perform a melee strike with a base ATK of +3. This strike gains no ATK bonuses from Weapons.

setInfos.flavorText: "I will not be your king. I am unworthy." - Terak Justicebringer
"Never discount a good shield. It can protect you from your own mistakes." - Sir Wallence

name: Greaves
text: React: Before this fighter is spent by an opposing character's action, spend Greaves: This fighter does not spend.

setInfos.flavorText: "Any opponent going for a cheap shot to cripple you is in for a surprise." - Brymin
"Nobody looks tough hopping around and holding their leg, not even a barbarian." - Skurg Bloodlick
"Protect yer shins, son. No one thinks about his shins till it's too late." - Sir Wallence

name: Halberd
text: React: Before an opposing character plays a React during a melee strike targeting this fighter, spend the Halberd: Cancel the React.

setInfos.flavorText: "No, no. You're quite close enough already." - Iam Hotelen
"Lucien, hear me. What I do, I do for the elves. My allies are my own, but my heart is with the forest." - Maxt Stormcrow

name: Handaxe
text: Wounds inflicted by melee strikes from this character may not be reduced.

setInfos.flavorText: "Weapons of the forehatched!" - Shah'syss
"For the more awkward traps." - Urg
"Rockhome, city nearest the mouth of the Abyss. She's got two walls that surround her-one made of stone, and one of the bodies of the dead." - Rac Ironbone
"Rockhome, city nearest the mouth of the Abyss. She's got two walls that surround her-one made of stone, and one of the bodies of the dead." - Rac Ironbone
Kenia rode out to meet the barbarians' queen, spear in hand, but was unprepared to see the enemy carrying one of her own...
Kenia gazed at the bluish steel from the distant lands of the south as it shone in her hands, admiring its beauty and efficient deadliness. She had purchased it for her own... but at what cost?

name: Havat-lahn Stance
text: This fighter has an additional melee strike (base +1 ATK) when he attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Narawati taught me this stance many years ago. It may be all that now remains of their culture, for all I know." - Brymin
"It is not the only stance, or even the best stance. It is, however, a very aggressive stance considering its masters are little more than hermits." - Kun Hull
The Duchess watched the Narawat gladiator defeat ten Deverenian fighters before they subdued him. Stepping forward, she picked up the man's strangely bladed staff and returned it to him. "Teach me."
The Duchess watched the Narawat gladiator defeat ten Deverenian fighters before they subdued him. Stepping forward, she picked up the man's strangely bladed staff and returned it to him. "Teach me."

name: Hawk Hatchet
text: Order: Discard the Hawk Hatchet: If this character is a Ranger, Perform a +6 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is time, Varg. It is long past time." - Darian Windson

name: Helm of Terror
text: React: After this character is targeted by a melee strike: The opposing character must succeed with a fear save (DC = 8 + this character's Level) or the strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mortal flesh is no excuse. You are paladins. You are beyond mere men." - Ghed Mnettaor
"It's a simple offer." - Ter-Soth

name: Khrutyk Steed
text:
Khrutyk Steed enters play spent.
Order: Spend Khrutyk Steed: Perform a melee strike with an ATK of +4 (+6 total with Steed's bonus).
Order: Spend Khrutyk Steed: Move forward one or two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "I believe this one is named... Quadlibet." - Jehrico
"Beasts fashioned by sacrifice and twisted by Bascaron. That snake Jehricho makes them, blasphemy though they are." - Peredur
"It's only cold in the mountains if you stand still." - Uthanak
"It's easy to wear, as long as you can avoid bleeding to death on your own spikes." - Strongarm
"It's easy to wear, as long as you can avoid bleeding to death on your own spikes." - Strongarm

name: Gaudy Hat
text:
This is a Cartwright Set item.
React: Once per turn, before rolling a Skill check generated by a lower Level character: The roll is a Critical Success.
React: After passing a Skill check: Reveal the top 5 cards in your deck: Put a revealed Cartwright Set item into your hand.
errata:
Skill checks are ANY checks that involve your skill bonus.
Characters "generate" checks from attached cards' static text, or their own static text, or from actions they perform.
The second react may be used on any skill check, so long as it's passed (Feats, magic saves, etc.). Shuffle your deck after using the React.

name: Scales of the Storm
text:
Evil Paladin only.
This character may not be targeted with ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bear witness, Terak Justicebringer. I give to Ghed Mnettaor, favored of the Storm's chosen, the Scales of the Storm, that she might lead the Black Sun in my absence." - Sir Rhawn d'Ilchant
World without end, and without beginning. All shall be as one in the Dragon's Eye.

name: Sigilsword
text: Melee strikes performed by this character ignore the effects of the Astral and Ethereal traits.

setInfos.flavorText: "You don't want to know who made it, how, or why. Just use it if you need it." - Forge
A blade as true as virtue, with an edge that cuts like vice.

name: Squire Lucian
text:
Good Paladin only.
This character gains an additional melee strike per attack with an ATK of +3.

setInfos.flavorText: "When I first met my master, he was already a hero. Now, he must become a general, and a savior."
"Do your duty, and leave the rest to the gods."
"It's almost fun the way the Abyssals keep popping back up!" - Frenzy
"...just like watermelons." - Phar'dunn

name: The King's Lady
text: This fighter has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks and inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "I shall take no other until Legion lies dead." - King Alaric
Do not dwell on loss, brother. You have more than you know. - Valhala Abyssbane
"Xod has known no woman since Argeyth died. Now he holds only his duty, and his weapon-and he keeps it by his side as jealously as any Queen." - Kohn Peacehand
"Xod has known no woman since Argeyth died. Now he holds only his duty, and his weapon-and he keeps it by his side as jealously as any Queen." - Kohn Peacehand

name: War Elephant
text:
Order: Spend the War Elephant: Move forward one rank.
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike with an ATK of +12. The strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits. Other items equipped by this fighter have no effect on this strike.

name: War Horse
text:
Order: Spend War Horse: Move forward one rank.
Order: Spend War Horse: Gain +2 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Follow me and I shall bring you victory." - The Sable Knight
"It will suffice for now, serf." - Lord Argen
"The undead trample underfoot so very well. They must practice." - Sir Clifford

name: Armor of Blending
text: If this character has moved one or more ranks this turn, the Armor of Blending provides no AC bonus.

setInfos.flavorText: The Deverenians futiley scanned the treeline. Ninifaeer couldn't help but let out a little purr of satisfaction.
"Now do you understand?" - Basil Nemis

name: Assassin's Cup
text:
Spend React: After a character has used an action on an item: That character must make a poison save (DC 15) or suffer 1 wound.
React: Once per turn, after a character has used an action on an item: If this character is an Assassin, that character must make a poison save (DC 15) or suffer 1 wound.

name: Black Steel Dagger
text: During melee strikes targeting a spent character, this rogue has +5 ATK and inflicts an additional wound if he hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Black market goods from Deverenia's mines. Sometimes, getting more than you bargained for isn't a mixed blessing, but an outright curse. Ever see what the Deverenians do to thieves?" - Gharin Suul
"Black steel is our mark, Devon. Wear it always close to your heart and be ready for my call. The Nightwalkers have one more job to do." - Black Tom

name: Alchemy Kit
text:
This is a Ma'rifi Set item.
Saves from this character's non-spell actions have +2 DC.
Order: Spend Alchemy Kit: Put 1 Charge on each oher Ma'rifi Set item equipped to this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ma'rifi... Knowledge is everything." - Zaina

name: Bloodied Spear
text: React: After this character hits with a melee strike, spend Bloodied Spear: Reduce the target's AC by 2 permanently. For the rest of the game, the target may not Maneuver.

name: Boots of Silence
text: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike. If the target is stunned, the strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "They're so cute when they're asleep. Heh." - Lazarus Saul
"Fifteen guards bled to death while standing watch. Someone's in Toris Kelt." - Captain Dukat

name: Boots of Strudubg
text: React: After this character performs an Order, spend the Boots: Move forward or backward one rank if this character does not have a Steed equipped.

name: Cloak of Deception
text: This character is not considered the opposite alignment of any other character for the purposes of card effects.

setInfos.flavorText: "I only have the alliance's best interests at heart." - Vronish Kez
Kether slipped seamlessly into the Myreth guard.

name: Cloak of Many Things
text: Order: Discard the Cloak: Retrieve from your discard pile an item this character can legally equip, and immediately equip the item.

setInfos.flavorText: "It sounds fun until you trip, and suddenly you're surrounded by caltrops and otters." - Marius Dela
"What? I don't remember putting that in there. Hey, hang on... what's this?" - Basil Nemis

name: Drums of Panic
text:
Bard only.
Order: Spend the Drums: Target a character, who must make a fear save (DC 10) or be moved back one rank.
Spend Order: Target a character, who must make a fear save (DC 20) or be moved back one rank and then become spent, if ready.

name: Fixed Dice
text: React: After this character makes a die roll, spend the Fixed Dice: Add or subtract 1 to the roll. If this character is a Bard, you may add or subtract 2.

setInfos.flavorText: "You'd think I wouldn't need to tell them to fix the dice in my favor, though." - Zagreb Umbala
"Works like a charm for me." - Log

name: Glass Dagger
text:
This character's melee strikes inflict no wounds.
React: After this character successfully hits with a melee strike: The target of the melee strike must make a melee strike against a character in a rank behind the target (you roll for the melee strike).

name: Gloves of Mischief
text: React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike or action, spend Gloves of Mischief: Redirect the strike or action to an adjacent character, if possible.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Lady of Pain's idea of mischief is far removed from most other people's." - Artheon
"The Lady of Pain's idea of mischief is far removed from most other people's." - Artheon
"Let the Queen try to strike me down for my father's deeds. She'll find I'm ready for her temper... and my vengeance." - Kether

name: Horn of Battle
text:
Bard only.
Other characters gain +2 ATK and +2 AC while in the same rank as this character.

setInfos.flavorText: The drumbeat combined with a resonant horn, from within the city walls.
"Darian, let this vengeance go. You aren't honoring her memory by drowning it in blood." - Fauve Mightyheart

name: Beads of Iman
text:
This is a Ma'rifi Set item.
Order: Once per target per turn, remove 1 Charge: Target opposing character within two ranks must succeed with a desterity save (DC 16) or move to their front rank. This action may target an additional rank away for each other Ma'rifi Set item this character has.
errata:
"Their front rank" is always the first rank of the character's controller's army. You can use the Beads of Iman to get someone out of your army (If they have stealthed in).
This moves the target, but doesn't change orientation.

name: Keziah's Loris Daggers
text: Order: Once per turn: Until the end of the turn, this rogue suffers a -3 ATK, and gains an additional melee strike per attack equal to his highest ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: Keziah studied the weapons again, wondering if there was something more to them, as with the blue sphere.
"They were my father's. He didn't need them anymore-he had a whole kingdom of weapons to choose from." - Keziah

name: Leopard Claws
text: This character gains an additional melee strike per attack with an ATK equal to his lowest ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "No good for climbing, but who needs to do that anyway?" - Rathe
"A little to the left, Contal..." - Grukth

name: Misearan Poison
text:
Assassin only.
Order: Discard Misearan Poison: Target a character in this rank. The next melee strike performed by the target this turn inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "The labels came off in my pack." - Bradley
"The taste of it is sweet, like wine or candy... but it burns away the stomach and leaves nothing but a gaping hole." - Senek

name: Nightmist Cloak
text: This rogue gains +5 ATK and inflicts an additional wound while performing a melee strike against a spent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Like a shadow, I am." - Zaina
"I'll take on Toath, Basil. She may be a shaman, but she doesn't have eyes in the back of 'er head!" - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Pipes of Haunting
text:
Bard only.
Spend Order: Target a character within 2 ranks. The target must succeed with a fear save (DC 15) or you may do any one of the following:
1. Spend the target.
2. Have the target perform a melee strike to any character within 1 rank.
3. Move the target forward or backward one rank.

name: Rogue's Blade
text:
+2 Skill
Rogue's Blade gives no ATK bonus during a melee strike against an opponent with Armor equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "I find biology so very interesting, brother. Don't you?" - Krait
"Tell me, Dwarf. If absolute power corrupts absolutely then where does that leave your God?" - Absinthe

name: Shade Lion
text:
Order: Spend Shade Lion: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: Before this rogue falls forward to fix an illegal rank, spend Shade Lion: This rogue does not spend or stun before moving.

setInfos.flavorText: "Such marvelous beasts that these new arrivals have brought us." - Yvaalis
"We will teach these masked cowards to fear the night." - Scyrax
"We will teach these masked cowards to fear the night." - Scyrax
"Stay here. I will call you if I need you." - Norn
"The Nothrog use them as steeds, howling through the night like spectres, blood upon their fangs."
"The Nothrog use them as steeds, howling through the night like spectres, blood upon their fangs."
"Some pay in gold, others pay in tokens of favor. To be honest with you, I'm not that fussy, so long as the trinkets can help me make more gold. So what's your starting offer, horseman?" - Mad Mel
It hides the bearer from sight, but what use is that when The Chosen can smell the very soul?
"It's a little bit of nothing, the width and thickness of a common coin. Don't drop it, or you'll have to find a new one yourself." - Zandara
"Gaston taught Zoltan the ways of magic, but Logan taught him how to stay alive. I wish Logan hadn't done so good a job of it. I'll never get the wretched beggar out of my city." - Angelique

name: Short Bow
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Might as well use a sling." - Captain Dukat
"The harder you work, the luckier you get." - Angus Hammerfall

name: Steel Darts
text: Order: Spend the Steel Darts: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I remember these from when I was a kid. Stay away." - Marius Dela
Devon looked down at the gasping body on the street below him and smiled. "Stick with the old ways. They never fail you." With that, he leapt over the rooftop, and was gone.

name: Sleipnir
text:
This is a Nightwalker Set item.
Order: Spend an equipped Nightwalker Set item: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Sleipnir: Target character within one rank has -2 ATK for each Nightwalker Set item equipped to this rogue.
errata: The penalty is set when the action's cost is paid.

name: Studded Leather
text: -3 Skill

setInfos.flavorText: "Mmm. What I like." - Lazarus Saul

"Forever, gentle Alia of Rowan. You have given me life. Your blood now runs through the veins of us both," Rathe whispered in her mind, "and by the strength of your heart, we shall find life eternal."

name: Thief's Kit
text: This character may add his level to his skill when performing skill checks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Never leave the scene without it." - Gharin Suul
"The right tool for any job..." - Basil Nemis

name: Woodlands Cloak
text:
Rangers may equip this as a fighter item.
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike. This is a Stealth action.

setInfos.flavorText: The Deverenians and Elves fought on as Darian crossed Myreth.

name: Wraithstone Dagger
text: React: Spend the Wraithstone Dagger before this character makes a melee strike roll: Ignore the effects of the Astral or Ethereal trait for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't touch me." - Arionrhod
"I know how to deal with ghosts." - Rreg'jen

name: Wyvernsting Bow
text:
Order: Spend the Wyvernsting Bow: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "A fine weapon if you can get one. Of course, the wyverns don't care for them." - Captain Dukat
"A good yew bow is a thing of death-dead wood, dead aim, and dead elves." - Logan Ebonwoulfe
"A good yew bow is a thing of death-dead wood, dead aim, and dead elves." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Yedraw's Tooth
text: React: Spend the Tooth before this character makes a melee strike roll: Kill the target of the melee strike if this strike inflicts one or more wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "My father's tomb robbed, his weapon pilfered. Justice will be done." - Kerebrus
"Yedraw was my father. His blade killed a nation of warriors in honorable combat. Question its power, and I will repeat the task... beginning with you." - Kerebrus
"Yedraw was my father. His blade killed a nation of warriors in honorable combat. Question its power, and I will repeat the task... beginning with you." - Kerebrus

name: Barakiel
text:
+3 Skill
This wizard is evil while Barakiel is equipped.
Spells cast by this wizard have +5 DC.
Ranged strikes made by this wizard add +5 to their die rolls.

setInfos.flavorText: The imp's eyes shone as Tepheroth worked her art upon the knights.
Tepheroth's shadow moves and breathes, a living thing among the dead.

name: Black Journal
text:
Evil characters only.
This character is a Necromancer.

setInfos.flavorText: "What's written in the tome was not meant for human eyes." - Morghen Dythanus
"All things shall be as I command them. In this world, and the next." - Tepheroth

name: Bloodstained Dagger
text: React: After this character is targeted by a spell, discard Bloodstained Dagger: The spell is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "A bargain from a new friend." - Krait
"In the legends, it's called 'Elfbane'. If it helps me kill them, I'll call it useful." - Kenia
"In the legends, it's called 'Elfbane'. If it helps me kill them, I'll call it useful." - Kenia

name: Boots of Feather Fall
text: React: Before this character falls forward from an illegal rank, spend the Boots: This character does not spend or stun.

setInfos.flavorText: "'Tis simpler to stay in thy saddle." - Baudwyn Troubadour
"I can see my house from here!"

name: Shadow Cloak
text:
This is a Nightwalker Set item.
React: After an opposing character's melee strike or action targets this rogue, spend Shadow Cloak: Equip an item from your hand to this rogue. This rogue has +2 Levels for equipping Nightwalker Set items this way.
errata: You may equip 'over' it with another Armor. The item you equip may have another React to being targeted by a melee strike or action, which you may then perform (I.E. getting Magic Resistence in time to resist a spell).

name: Bracers of Deflection
text: React: Once per turn, after this wizard is targeted with a strike: This wizard gains +2 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "There is a price for my aid, but you will give it willingly. You know that I would not make outrageous demands, do you not?" - Dhamir il Maliq
Wizards prefer to wear less cumbersome protective gear, the better to weave their enchantments.
"Compassionate Kavara!" - Cassandra the Arcane
"One cannot command true magic without growing at least a little... cautious."

name: Cursed Spellbook
text: React: Before this wizard declares the target of a spell, spend the Cursed Spellbook: The target may be one additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's just one word, repeated. 'Hasu-'" - Jonah the Burglar
The screams echoed through the hall as unspeakable words were seared into the wizard's brain.

name: Doombringer
text: Order: Spend Doombringer: Perform a +2 ranged strike. This wizard may then perform a +2 ranged strike against a character that was adjacent to the first target.

setInfos.flavorText: "You were doomed the moment you stood against me." - Atiratu
White light seared the bushes. Evidently, Taoth was closer than Norn had thought.
"I found it in an abandoned keep, guarded by three demons-must be worth something, but it wasn't what I was looking for. You want it?" - Anton Cyldragen

name: Dragon's Blood
text: React: Before casting a wizard spell, discard Dragon's Blood: This wizard is +2 levels for casting the spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "I traded for it at Sharn. Why?" - Dakat
"Tis not safe, but true power never is." - Azhraan the Foul

name: Fireworks
text: Order: Discard the Fireworks: Target a character up to three ranks away. Target character and any characters adjacent to that character must make a fear save (DC 15) or be spent.

setInfos.flavorText: There is always a celebration in Order Myerdeth's lands.
"No enemy can stand against Amoudosi's flame. The Elves are no exception." Baqbou Umbala, Shattered Faith Part II
"I suppose some things are worth preserving." - Lord Joxanus
"Old. Wordy. Tedious. I'm sure it's useful... as kindling. When will humans learn that true magic rests not in mouldering words, but in unbreakable hearts?" - Dakat

name: Ironcloth Bracer
text: React: After this wizard is targeted with a ranged strike, spend Ironcloth Bracer: The strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "So why can I not wear them, again?" - Thekk Rockbender
"Only a few, and only to the Deverenians." - Purge
"What we've taken from the dwarves that have fallen is most impressive. If only we could manufacture this material ourselves." - Cordeos

name: Ivory Ring
text: React: Before another character you control makes a ranged strike roll, spend Ivory Ring: The strike gains +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "The mark of the High Queen's favored. I have been instructed to bear one to the Vaneris as a gift, as well as to judge if they are worthy of it." - Mistress Allandra
"A gift for you, High Queen." - Raubin
"It is carved from the tusk of the Rathemen's great beasts. It holds their power." - Rakhu Mennanakh

name: Learcat
text:
+2 Skill
React: After this wizard performs a save roll, spend the Learcat: Reroll the die.

setInfos.flavorText: "Tibius and I are very displeased." - Princess Dashkova
"Ssh, little ones. Though the night is dark, and hope is all but lost, you should have no fear. I am with you." - Navdai

name: Narawat Ring
text: Whenever this character performs a ranged strike from a spell, add 4 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Er, yeah... Narawati imports. Right. Only a few left!" - Zagreb Umbala
"My people were fine diplomats, but better archers. Negotiate when you are close, and when you are far away..." - Baqbou Umbala
"My people were fine diplomats, but better archers. Negotiate when you are close, and when you are far away..." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Shadow Blade
text:
This is a Nightwalker Set item.
This rogue's melee and ranged strikes ignore AC bonuses from Armor.
React: After a melee strike targets this rogue, spend an equipped Nightwalker Set item: Weapons equipped to the attacking character are blank for the duration of the strike.
errata: Ignores ALL bonuses from Armor cards, including those from abilities and static text on Armor equipped to other characters.

name: Ring of Air
text: React: Spend the Ring of Air before a ranged strike roll targeting a character in this rank: The ranged strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Just doesn't feel the way it used to." - Darso the Mad
"There's nothing enlightened about it." - Morghen Dythanus

name: Ring of Spiritwrack
text: Order: Spend the Ring of Spiritwrack: Perform a +0 ranged strike. If the ranged strike hits, the target is stunned instead of wounded. If you get a Critical Success, the target is wounded in addition to being stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: Keziah turned Sali's ring in her hands. "Johan. Where is Johan?"
"I've allies in Deverenia, but unless we move now, Johan, the Elves will be the least of our problems." - Sali

name: Robe of the Wind
text: This character gains an additional +6 AC (+8 AC total) against ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: A bolt fell to Norn's side. "Got you."
Within each thing of magic lies a dream of Dragon soul.
Within each thing of magic lies a dream of Dragon soul.

name: Rod of Shattering
text: Order: Once per turn: Target a character up to two ranks away who must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: Vareth batted the rod away. "You weren't expecting me at all, were you, ogre?"
"What these Elves do to the fallen... I can't imagine a more terrible fate." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Staff of Secrets
text:
React: After a character performs an action to draw a card or retrieve a card from their deck, spend the Staff: Cancel the action.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, characters may not perform actions to draw cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not yet, old foe. I will face you in time." - Sorscha
"Not this time, old friend. This time, you get to see no more of the future than any of us." - Sorscha

name: A Time of Naming
text:
Dwarf Warlord only.
Spend Order: If 5 or more wounds have been reduced or removed from your Dwarves this turn, attach this card to your Warlord.
While attached, your Dwarves have Defend +7.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Dwarf lands, like the Dwarves themselves, must earn their name." - Valhala Abyssbane

name: Advanced Planning
text: React: After this character performs a Spend Order, if this character has not performed a melee strike or ranged strike this turn, discard a card from your hand: Ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "You'll forgive me, Lady Bhaine, if I do not care for your offer. You did not help Hate, and I already have an ally..." - Krun
"This hill shall slow them down, and then we'll have them. It will be just that easy."

name: Anatomical Knowledge
text: React: Before this character performs a melee strike roll: Make a Medicine check (DC 20, DC 15 if this character is an Assassin). If successful the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Consider it a gift, Gueniveure. A token of our new friendship." - Havellin Tansiq
"To the south are our allies, who thirst for lore in all its forms." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Beheading
text: Spend Order: Target an equal or lower level character who is of a different faction than his or her Warlord. Kill the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "I would not wish to bring further war to Baraxton and the Nothrog. I will do whatever I can to make peace with you." - Krun
"Those Deverenians don't trust anybody. Including each other." - Timmuk

name: Blind Vengeance
text: Spend React: Before this character is killed: The next melee strike performed by a character you control this turn gains +5 ATK and inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Make them pay. Make them all pay." - the last words of Spencer Latham
"Make them pay. Make them all pay." - the last words of Spencer Latham
"Nassiral Hate is dead, Rraag'nar," Krun said. "And I know how to hurt those who killed him.
"Robert resists the call for revenge, but it cannot be easy to outlive every good man he's ever known." - Maxmilian

name: Diversion
text:
This is a Cartwright Set item.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
Order: Spend an equipped Cartwright Set item: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

name: Death Is But a Door
text:
Cleric and wizard only.
This is a spell.
Necromancers may perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Search your discard pile for a character card, show it to the other players, and shuffle it into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "...and sometimes, one best left shut." - Rustiq Umbala
"I can bring her back, but I will need a certain tome..." - Morghen Dythanus

name: Distrust
text: Spend Order: Target a character of equal or lower Level whose alignment is different than his or her Warlord: Kill the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "If we can stir up unrest amongst the thralls, the masters will be easy pickings." - Logan
