"A new wind blows on the forests, just as Ichaerus says. We reign through right of birth, and not even a queen can change that." - Mistress Allandra
"Begone, Damien, and let thy dogs feed upon thy savagery. I'truth, thou art no more fit than they to be called 'man'." - Duchess Brymin
"Begone, Damien, and let thy dogs feed upon thy savagery. I'truth, thou art no more fit than they to be called 'man.'" - Duchess Brymin

name: Excellent Aim
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Before this character makes a ranged strike roll targeting a character within two ranks: This strike ignores AC bonuses from Armor, Gauntlet, Helm, and Shield items.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Northern barbarians possess little culture or strength, we shall def-" - Lt. Dunbar
"Off the wall, through the window. Nothing but eye." - Jack Casey

name: Exhaustion
text:
Spend React: After a character performs an action: Spend the character.
Spend React: After a spent character pays the costs of an action: Cancel the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "I never thought it'd end like this. I didn't see it coming." - Timothy Windson
"You think you're tired?" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Fight in the Sewers
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Before this character makes a melee strike roll and there are fewer characters in his or her rank than in the target's rank: Either add +5 to the die roll, or the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits (your choice).

setInfos.flavorText: "In times of strife, the unlikeliest of heroes emerge and unite."
"We lost Mace and Tinder below, Yaw. something else is in the tunnels." - Claw

name: Forced March
text: React: After a stunned character falls forward from an illegal rank: That character suffers 2 wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: With Hate's death, Cynophontis broke free. Hordes of demon-hounds charged through Baraxton, and many more fell in their wake.
They march across the Andoverian plains and through the hills of Llyr, steadily driving the humans into the sea.

name: Heart of the Beast
text:
Lycanthrope only.
React: After equipping a Lycanthrope Form while one or more different forms are already equipped: Do not discard the current Form.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Elder was the first. Endless forms soar through the his mind and soul." - Parsis Yscar
Muscles rippled and molded into forms never found in nature.

name: High Tide
text:
React: Before any die roll: Add +1 to the roll.
Spend React: Before any die roll: Add +4 to the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "We have a choice: to continue a war, or to regroup and rebuild. It is no choice at all." - Rhiveth Yao
"Ishara's bounty will rain down upon us." - Rabinus Zon

name: Imprisoned
text: Order: Target a non-Warlord character in an opposing 1st rank with no items equipped. If the character is 3rd level or higher, put the character into his or her owner's hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Found one, Seraphina!" - Owen Haadh
"Being born noble does not mean that people will follow you. You must earn their trust." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Kharma
text:
React: After a card effect makes a die roll a Critical Success: Change the result to a Critical Failure.
React: After a card effect makes a die roll a Critical Failure: Change the result to a Critical Success.

name: Bow of Shadows
text:
This is a Nightwalker Set item.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +5 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away for every two Nightwalker Set items equipped to this character.
errata: Marksmanship may further increase the strike's range.

name: Lord of Baraxton
text:
Nothrog Warlord only.
Spend Order: If your Nothrogs have killed 5 or more opposing characters with melee strikes this turn, attach this card to your Warlord.
While attached, your Nothrogs have a +3 ATK bonus.

setInfos.flavorText: "It can't possibly be this easy." - Krun

name: Maddening Scream
text:
Wizard and Bard only.
This is a spell.
Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters have -5 Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: Kestrel's words were only a whisper, but they shrieked hideously in his would-be captor's skull.
"You should have recited your incantations with more care, son of Deverenus." - Lord Kestrel

name: Meet at the Inn
text: Order: All players may draw a card. You may draw an additional card (two total).

setInfos.flavorText: "It is of utmost importance that you succeed." - King Dukat
"All right, so it IS a magic sword. But brine fiends CAN look up!"
"Prancing what? No, we don't have that here."
"Let's play a game of cards'n'bones while we wait for the rest of the party to turn up."
"I tell you, it's getting to the point where you can't go down to the pub for a pint without getting hit up for a quest to destroy an artifact or save a princess."

"Come on, guys! I have an overwhelming urge to go to the nearest inn and meet a pair of strange travelers who will help us with our quest!"
"What, so soon after our two friends died?"

"Come on, guys! I have an overwhelming urge to go to the nearest inn and meet a pair of strange travelers who will help us with our quest!"
"What, so soon after our two friends died?"

"Come on, guys! I have an overwhelming urge to go to the nearest inn and meet a pair of strange travelers who will help us with our quest!"
"What, so soon after our two friends died?"

name: Perfect Aim
text:
Ranger and Scout only.
React: Before this character performs a ranged strike roll: Play one React as if this character were about to make a melee strike roll against the ranged strike's target. All ATK bonuses become bonuses to the die roll.

name: Precision
text: React: Before this character selects the target of a melee strike or ranged strike: You may select a character that could not normally be targeted due to card effects.

setInfos.flavorText: Sav'rukk struck quickly and deeply, and the paladin was no more.

name: Punch Drunk
text: Order: Target a stunned character. The target character performs a melee strike against an adjacent character of your choosing (you roll the strike for the stunned character).

setInfos.flavorText: Validan raised his sword to the kill, but while Kermess-sh struck out blindly, he also struck well.
"Now, Basil, there's a perfectly good explanation..." - Dustin St. Gulik

name: Riding Low
text: React: After this character is hit with a melee or ranged strike roll: Make a Riding check (DC 10 for ranged strike, DC 15 for melee strike). If successful, discard a Steed attached to this character: Reduce the wounds to zero.

name: Shattering Blow
text:
Fighter and Monk only.
React: Before this character makes a melee strike roll: All AC bonuses from items are ignored for this strike, and the strike inflicts an extra wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: Bonebreaker knew he could not die here, not like this. No one could take up his destinies if Nihil slew him now...
"That's what you get for buying Misearean, knight." - Raagnar

name: Sniper Shot
text:
Assassin and Scout only.
May be performed by Rangers, ignoring class and trait restrictions.
React: Before this character makes a ranged strike roll against a spent character within two ranks: Gain +5 to the roll, and the strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "I hit a knight's neck once, just below the base of his skull. I don't know what was funnier-that he was trying to pull it out, or that his armor didn't let him reach." - Maxt Stormcrow
"Generals. Kings. Priests. Uppity meat." - Maxt Stormcrow

name: Take Advantage
text: React: Before this character makes a melee strike roll targeting a stunned character: The strike is a Critical Success and inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: Lord Halbrook dropped the dagger in disgust. It was necessary, but it still felt so wrong...
"Before he could rise, the Nothrog struck him from behind. My father's life, taken by a coward's blow." - Serah ni Fhionn
"Before he could rise, the Nothrog struck him from behind. My father's life, taken by a coward's blow." - Serah ni Fhionn

name: Threaten
text: Spend Order: Move adjacent to target opposing character within two ranks in any army. The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 20) or be spent. If this rogue succeeds with a Stealth check (DC 20) ready him.
errata:
Does allow you to move into opposing armies.
The two checks aren't linked, and both must be rolled.

setInfos.flavorText: "Remember me?" - Goth'ak

name: Arbalest
text:
Order: If an opponent has 1 or more cards in hand, and Arbalest has less than 4 Charges: Put a Charge on Arbalest.
Order: Remove 4 Charges: Perform a +8 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

name: The Bascaron War
text:
Mercenary Warlord only.
Spend Order: If your front rank has at least 3 more characters than each opposing front rank, attach this card to your Warlord.
While attached, your Mercenaries have the ability: "Spend Order: Target an opposing lower level Mercenary within one rank. Stun the target."

name: The Coming Storm
text:
Deverenian Warlord only.
Spend Order: If this character has an ATK, AC, or Skill bonus of +10 or more from other cards, attach this card to your Warlord.
While attached, this Warlord has the ability: "Order: Once per turn, stun a ready Deverenian in this rank: Ready this Warlord."

name: The High Queen's Revenge
text:
Elf Warlord only.
Spend Order: If your Elves have killed 4 or more opposing characters with actions (not melee strikes) this turn, attach this card to your Warlord.
While attached, saves against actions performed by your Elves have +4 DC and ranged strikes performed by your Elves gain a +2 bonus.

name: To Seek a King
text:
Free Kingdoms Warlord only.
Spend Order: If one of your lower level Free Kingdoms characters has an ATK, AC, or Skill bonus of +10 or more from other cards (not including items equipped by the character), attach this card to your Warlord.
While attached, ATK, AC, and Skill bonuses given by any of your Free Kingdoms characters to other characters are increased by +2.

name: Twist of Fate
text: React: After another player uses a card effect to draw or retrieve one or more cards from their deck: Discard the card(s).

setInfos.flavorText: Krun entered the throne room, axe held high, but Hate had already breathed his last.
She smiles upon you now, but her favor is fickle, as always.

name: Aura of Protection
text: React: After this cleric is targeted with an action that does not produce a strike: The action is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "We elves have no true gods to worship, only the predatory Elements that hunger for our essence. Appeasement fends them off for a time, but drives my kin to depravities of their own." - Yanthorine
"Yes, yes. Let it all out. We'll talk when you're ready." - Tkilth
"Alia, like the miserable humans she protects will die. The children of Syneri will see to it soon enough." - Elenitakis

name: Avatar of Faith
text:
Spend Order: Put this card in any of your ranks as a level 5 cleric with ATK +7, AC 15, +0 Skill, 2 Hit Points, and the Avatar trait.
The Avatar is killed at the end of the turn.
The Avatar has the ability: "React: Before a character in this rank suffers wounds, reduce the wounds to zero. Kill the Avatar."

name: Banish the Wound
text: Spend React: Before target character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one.
errata: Erratum 2008/08/17: In 4E, the collector number should be 178.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Winterhold dwarves clearly have their own priests, yet they seem glad for us to perform minor miracles. Does that not strike you as odd?" - Thekk
"Through all our struggles, Kor has been with us. What makes you think he would abandon us now? We must be careful not to rely upon gods too much." - Mentor
"Allies are allies. Hold still." - Heart
"The evil that men do never dies with them. It must be purged with the fires of faith." - Faith
"The evil that men do never dies with them. It must be purged with the fires of truth." - Faith

name: Begone
text:
Summoners may play this action as if they were a cleric.
Spend Order: Target a character that is not a character card. Kill the target.

setInfos.flavorText: Athanaes' doors closed slowly and heavily, leaving throngs of the faithful outside.
"I have no need of such incompetents." - Sorscha

name: Cause Fear
text: React: Before a melee strike roll targeting this cleric: The cleric's opponent must succeed with a magic save (DC 15 + this cleric's level) or the strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Er... I don't think it's working." - Elemere
"Execution is a punishment; cruelty is an example. A proper torture educates the masses. Death teaches only one man." - Nassiral Hate
"Execution is a punishment; cruelty is an example. A proper torture educates the masses. Death teaches only one man." - Nassiral Hate

name: Dulon Shade
text:
This is a Dulon Set item.
This character may perform once per turn Orders on Dulon Set items twice per turn.
Order: Spend Dulon Shade and discard a spell: Search your deck for a spell, reveal it, and put it in your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "I will do anything..."

name: Cleanse
text: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks of this cleric. Discard all action cards attached to that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Many of those who die against Soren bear a trace of his dark power. I do what I can, and pray to Kor it is enough." - Kohn Peacehand
"If the undead hordes were so unstoppable, they wouldn't be dead in the first place." - Rabinus Zon

name: Clerics' Guild
text: Spend Order: Attach this card to this cleric. While it's attached, the cleric gains +3 AC and +3 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Faith is what ties the land together. Faith and hate..." - Behlial
...bringing the divine to the world, and seeking clarity in a moment's revelation...

name: Cure Lethal Wounds
text:
Spend Order: Target a wounded character: Remove all wounds from the target.
Spend React: Before target character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: "Magic can aid the healing process, but it's no substitute for good medical knowledge." - Strak
"We were too late to save our lord. Hurry now, and save his men." - Krun
"You killed the human that did this, yes? Good. Then I will heal you." - Xiat
"You killed the human that did this, yes? Good. Then I will heal you." - Xiat

name: Dark Blades, Dark Tidings
text:
Evil only.
Spend Order: Target and kill a character in your army. Until the end of the turn, all evil characters in your army gain +X ATK, where X is equal to the target's level.

setInfos.flavorText: Mkono-Djarat glows whenever evil is near. It always glows.
"Orazhuk, take one of the slaves and prepare your ritual. We attack tonight!" - Krun

name: Decay
text: Spend Order: Target an item whose Level is up to twice this cleric's Level within two ranks: Destroy the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Everything withers and fades. The Elements have an insatiable appetite. Fortunately, that appetite can be directed." - Raclesis
"The Storm's blessed need fear no mortal steel." - Ghed Lionel
"No sword is stronger than the hand that wields it." - Xiat
"No sword is stronger than the hand that wields it." - Xiat

name: Divine Barrier
text: React: After target character targets this cleric with a melee strike: Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "I warned you. To strike me is to court your own damnation!" - Rockbender
"Ghed Mnettaor, I invoke the right of sabbatical, as Signon did to the first of my line." - Sir Rhawn d'Ilchant
Striking a priest sometimes has its own risks.

name: Divine Intervention
text: Spend React: After an action (not a melee strike) targets a character in this cleric's army: The character generating the action must make a magic save (DC 18) or the action is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "All the races of the Lands of the Accord trust in divinity... save the Dwarves who pray to their below-ground demon, drink blood, and drown in stone." - Bishop Koenraad
"All the races of the Lands of the Accord trust in divinity... save the Dwarves, who pray to their below-ground demons, drink blood, and drown in stone." - Bishop Koenraad

name: Gift from Above
text: Order: Target a character in play. That character gains ATK and AC bonuses equal to this cleric's level until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "In this darkest hour, Neus is our light. He lifts us up and lends us strength. We stand proud, and we will not fall!" - Reinholt

"Kor is the stone that holds, the axe that cuts, and the hand that wields. Kor is the eye that sees in darkness, and Kor is the shield that defends us. By the blood of my father, I will bring victory home." - Dwarven battle-prayer

"Kor is the stone that holds, the axe that cuts, and the hand that wields. Kor is the eye that sees in the darkness, and Kor is the shield that defends us. By the blood of my father, I will bring victory home." - Dwarven battle-prayer

name: Greater Regeneration
text: Spend Order: Target a character in your army without a Greater Regeneration attached, and attach this card to the target. While this card is attached, that character has the ability: "Order: Once per turn, remove one wound from this character."

setInfos.flavorText: "The Storm offers much, but only a few know how little it asks in return." - Garth Drac
With the gods' blessing upon you, you shall not fall.

name: Grey Elf's Gratitude
text: Spend Order: This cleric targets a character in your discard pile. Put the character into your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Elf or dwarf or human-it makes no difference. I serve life." - Navdai
"In whispered words, she spoke her name... Navdai. She brought me back to life. Aye, an Elf... and something greater. I know no more than that." - Bruin Lenoire
"In whispered words, she spoke her name... Navdai. She brought me back to life. Aye, an Elf... and something greater. I know no more than that." - Bruin Lenoire

name: Kaballite Ring
text: Order: Discard 4 cards: Until end of turn, this character has +3 Levels, the Dragon trait, and his base stats are: +6/+6 ATK, 19 AC, +11 Skill, and 4 HP.
errata: This replaces the base stats of the character. As such other bonuses or penalties to stats are applied afterward. This doesn't, however, affect the 'printed' stats of a character for the purposes of card effects. If more than one base stat modifier is on a character, use the most recent one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even we are not safe from encroaching Deverenia." - Corsis

name: Hand of Fate
text:
Seers may perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Add +5 to your next die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: It has happened countless times. A minor combatant dies at a battle that would produce a great hero. Nobody notices, but history bleeds...
"The future is fluid. Few can ever know for certain what will happen. Most can only see the possibilites and prepare for what is likely to be. But not I." - Toren Yscar

name: Heal Mount
text:
Paladins cast this as a 1st level spell.
Order: Target a spent Steed in this rank. Ready the Steed.

setInfos.flavorText: The recruits from Andover are coming, sir." Terak nodded and said with a slight smile, "Good, now rest your horse, Lucian."
"Good, Lucian. Trust the horse, and he will trust you." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Insect Plague
text:
Druid only.
Spend Order: This druid targets a character up to two ranks away. All characters in the target's rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: As the Deverenians set the forest ablaze, a roiling swarm of vermin poured forth. Deeper in the wood, some trees uprooted and walked to the north...
"Siege? No, Krun. There will be no more siege. By tomorrow, Baraxton will already be starving." - Taoth

name: Kharmic Wheel
text:
Good only.
Order: Target a good character in play. Remove one wound from that character.

setInfos.flavorText: Sjonegaard touched the dying man's forehead, and took a piece of his cloth. The elemental's face smoothed, and his body grew more defined.
"In Narawat, a season of fire passes each year, leaving naught but ash behind. Yet as the wheel turns, seedlings push through the surface once again. Such is the way of all life." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Might of Faith
text: Spend Order: Target a fighter in your army. Until the end of the turn that fighter gains +3 ATK and Powerattack with a bonus equal to this cleric's level.

setInfos.flavorText: "Stand, men! Kor will never fail us unless we first fail him!" - Garn Hearthstone
Even after the loss of the Paladins of Aroch, Albrecht's blessings strengthened his warriors.

name: Mystic Fog
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters have +3 AC against ranged strikes. If this character is a Druid, all characters have +6 AC instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "Teufeltiger, God of Treachery and Secrets, cloak me in shadows as I do your work." - Isadran prayer
"Lahr!" Logan shouted. "Hide them! The Nothrog ride, and seek innocent blood!"

name: Premonition
text:
Seer only.
Spend React: After another player pays the cost for an action card: The action is canceled and returned to the player's hand.
Until the end of the turn, action cards with that name may not be played.

setInfos.flavorText: "Be wary of seers, Alaric. Knowing the future rarely offers comfort." - Truth
"What you see must come to pass, Melaegrance. Nothing can save us from ourselves." - Alhana

name: Sacrifice
text: React: Before target character you control suffers wounds, this cleric suffers one wound: Reduce the target's wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "I would be as ready to die for the man by my side as he would be for me. No single soldier is more important than any other." - Kerebrus
"We have lost too many to give up now. We cannot allow the innocent to have died in vain." - Gunter
"A man will often feel an itch in a limb that has been removed. I wonder, Robert, what will you feel of Cassandra's love, when I have taken her from you?" - Maxmilian
"A man will often feel an itch in a limb that has been removed. I wonder, Robert, what will you feel of Cassandra's love, when I have taken her from you?" - Maxmilian

name: Steel to Serpent
text:
Druids may perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Target a character up to two ranks away with a Weapon equipped. Perform a melee strike against the target as if this cleric had the weapon equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "Generally, I just do it myself." - Rown Yscar
"Place not your trust in steel..." - Orazhuk

name: Sudden Gale
text:
Druids play this without spending.
Spend Order: Target one character per rank in an opponent's 1st, 2nd and 3rd rank, if possible. The 1st rank target, then the 2nd, then the 3rd must each make a magic save (DC 16). Targets failing the save are immediately moved back one rank.

name: Flame of Dulon
text:
This is a Dulon Set item.
Order: Once per turn: Until end of turn, target opposing character has -1 Skill for each Dulon Set item equipped to this character, and this character gains that much Skill.
errata: The amount of skill you gain from this item is always equal to what you drain. Salace changing the 1 into a 2 will cause you to gain 2 skill for each set item equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "...to keep good men out of Kamatayon's hell." - Brett Lund

name: Summon Avatar
text:
Spend Order: Put this card in your 1st rank as a level 5 fighter with ATK +10, AC 20, 0 Skill, 3 Hit Points, and the Avatar trait.
The Avatar is killed at the end of the turn.
The Avatar has the ability: "Spend Order: Target any character of level 3 or less in the 1st rank of any army. Kill the target."

name: The Lady's Doom
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters have -5 AC while in the 1st rank of any army.

setInfos.flavorText: The Slate Gargoyle paused, her eyes shining darkly. The Abyssals backed away, but not quickly enough.
We did what we could. The ranks soon broke and the elven archers tore us apart. I have never seen a unit so shaken. Had I not fallen back, I would not be here to tell you the tale.

name: Vision of Thunder
text:
Seer only.
Order: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may return them to the top of your deck in the same order, or shuffle them into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "I know now what might have been. There is a terrible threat above..." - Sjonegaard
"I have never known a seer with Alhana's vision. If our plan is to succeed, we must find a way to steal her Sight." - Aenne the Tempest

name: Wall of Swords
text: Spend Order: Target a character in play. Until the end of the turn, the character has the ability: "React: Before a melee strike roll targeting this character: The attacker must succeed with a dexterity check (DC 17) or suffer two wounds."

setInfos.flavorText: "I am favored. Do not come near." - Rustiq Umbala
You're gonna need a bow. Better yet, a crossbow. - Sir Robert

name: Wild Shape
text:
Druid only.
Spend Order: Attach this card to this character. While this card is attached, this Druid is a Lycanthrope.
If this character equips a Lycanthrope Form that requires other items be discarded, those items are not discarded but are considered blank while the Lycanthrope Form is equipped.

name: Battle Rage
text:
Order: Until the end of the turn, this fighter gains +1 ATK and suffers -1 AC.
If the fighter is a Barbarian, he instead gains +5 ATK and suffers -2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "These Deverenians fight with cool, calculated technique. I fight with passion. Which is better?" - Edge
"The Nothrog aren't all bad. I can almost get along with the dead ones." - Poison

name: Break Through
text: Order: If this fighter is in the front rank with a Steed equipped, spend the Steed: Perform a Riding check (DC 13). If sucessful this fighter performs a melee strike targeting a character within 2 ranks.

name: Fighters' Guild
text: Spend Order: Attach this card to this fighter. While it is attached, the fighter gains +2 ATK and +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Deverenia holds the Fighters' Guild. Find one of ours there, and from there we can ensure we hold the pact." - Sceth
...or shattering shield and splintering blow, weaving swordplay into song...

name: Final Blow
text: React: Before this fighter makes a melee strike roll: If the strike hits, the fighter inflicts a number of additional wounds equal to the number of items the opponent has equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let me avenge my lord, and the Elite Hate Guard will do as you command." - Rraag'nar
"I said 'No prisoners'." - Uthanak

name: Find a Way
text:
React: After an action performed by this character is canceled: The action is not canceled and continues normally.
Spend Order: Target a Siege Character within one rank. Discard the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Have faith, Rraag'nar. Justice will be done." - Krun
I told you I would find a way in. I have yet to find a wall that can withstand a good piece of oak.

name: Bell
text:
This is an Anathema Set item.
This character has +1 Skill for each equipped Anathema Set item, and an additional +2 Skill if three or more are equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: Sound the Bell.

name: Great Cleave
text: React: After target character is targeted with a melee strike by this fighter: The target suffers one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: Stonefist couldn't look away, only watch in mute horror as his king tore the daemon apart.
"Mm. The plan would work, no doubt, but are we prepared to break our pact with Deverenia?" - Kzarrik
Dwarves are never defeated. They can only be killed.
Dwarves are never defeated. They can only be killed.

name: I Have Your Back
text: React: After another character in this rank is targeted with a strike: The strike is redirected to this fighter, if possible.

setInfos.flavorText: "We'll not lose you again, Robert." - Corten Lye
"We'll not lose you again, Robert." - Corten Lye
After the barbarian tribes' bloody departure, the Free Kingdoms armies at Toris Kelt returned to their homes. Each soldier knew, however, that they would meet one of their new friends again.
"My mother taught me not to fear thunder, Deverenian, and I've seen nothing to convince me that this 'Storm' of yours is a god." - Dakat
"My mother taught me not to fear thunder, Deverenian, and I've seen nothing to convince me that this 'Storm' of yours is a god." - Dakat

name: Instructed by Rren'the
text: Order: This fighter permanently gains the ability to equip two Weapons, but may not have two Weapons and a Shield equipped (destroy previously equipped Weapons and/or Shields as appropriate when an item is equipped). Remove this card from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our master is dead, felled by dwarven treachery. We will not rest until either we are dead, or the Dwarves are. We ride at dawn." - Rren'the
"C'mon, you squabs. You can fighter better'n that!" - Rren'the

name: Krun's Strategies
text: Spend Order: Target a number of your spent (not stunned) characters whose combined levels are less than or equal to this fighter's level. Ready the target character(s). If this fighter is your Warlord and has an ATK of +10 or more, you may move this fighter back one rank.

name: Lead from the Front
text:
Order: Move this character forward one rank.
Immediately after playing this card, you may shuffle it into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: Lord Gahid signaled the army to halt as he took his place in the first rank of the center. Lifting his sword, he shouted, "For Rellion!"
"Kill them all. Baptise thy blades to the hilt." - Sir Rhawn d'Ilchant

name: Leadership
text:
Order: Until the end of the turn, other characters gain +2 ATK and +2 AC while in the same rank as this fighter.
If this fighter is a Paladin, those characters receive an additional +2 ATK and +2 AC (+4 total).

setInfos.flavorText: Mnettaor's voice crackled over the battlefield. "To me! Stand with me before the enemy!"
"How fares thy sister, Beatrix?" Gahid laughed cruelly. "Thou hast led her to ground with the dogs and the boars, and as she rots, she curses thee."
"How fares thy sister, Beatrix?" Gahid laughed cruelly. "Thou hast led her to ground with the dogs and the boars, and as she rots, she curses thee."

name: Mounted Charge
text: Order: Spend a Steed equipped by this fighter: Move him or her forward one rank. If this moves the fighter into the 1st rank and he is ready, the fighter may immediately perform an attack with a +5 ATK bonus.

setInfos.flavorText: "The might of a Deverenian knight on a worthy steed is without peer, even in the forest." - Lord Gahid Rellion
"Even the skies shall become battlefields of blood..." - the Annales Devereniorum

name: Nice Try
text: React: Before an opponent performs a React during a melee strike targeting this fighter: If this fighter succeeds with a perception check (DC 10), the React is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "That will be enough." - Faiza Nyota
With three swift strikes, the beast leapt upon her. Its claws tore through silk and air, but never once touched bone.
With three swift strikes, the beast leapt upon her. Its claws tore through silk and air, but never once touched bone.

name: Put to the Test
text: React: Before this fighter equips an item: This fighter is +1 level for equipping the item.

setInfos.flavorText: "You earned this blade, Tornhawk. Now it is your responsibility." - Forge
"Aw, c'mon, lad. It's just a sword." - Uther Killer-of-Bears
"Aw, c'mon, lad. It's just a sword." - Uther Killer-of-Bears

name: Ravage
text:
Barbarians play this as a 3rd level action.
React: Before this fighter inflicts wounds with a melee strike, reduce the wounds to zero: Remove 1 wound from the fighter and inflict 1 wound on the target of the melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: The barbarian tribes cut a path through the Free Kingdoms, Elves, and Deverenians to distant Sarakia, never slowing once.
"No, no. Like this." - Uther

name: Shield of Dulon
text:
This is a Dulon Set item.
This character has +1 Level for casting spells.
Order: Once per turn: Until end of turn this character adds +2 to his ranged strike rolls from spells for each Dulon Set item equipped to this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "...I will pay any cost..."

name: Tough as Nails
text:
Barbarians may play this without spending.
Spend React: After this character is hit with a melee strike from a character without a Weapon equipped: Reduce all wounds from this strike to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: Sceth grabbed the Sakarian giant by the throat, and half-turned toward the city. "FIRE!"
"Come back when you're old enough to drink..." - Uther Killer of Bears

name: Unprepared for Battle
text: React: Before this fighter makes a melee strike roll targeting a lower-level character with no items equipped: The strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "Every time we retreat, that carrion eater Gahid takes our ground. No more." - Tepheroth
"Forgive the interruption, Milady of Misearis. Please, finish your dinner." - Krun

name: Vicious Block
text: React: After a melee strike roll targeting this fighter: Add this character's highest ATK bonus to his AC for the duration of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Master Anandale parried the elven blade aside and drove his own into Lucien Stormcrow's chest. "Thou art finished."
"Try again and again, elf, until thou art as old as the bone thou wieldest, and thou wilt not get through Deverenian steel." - Sir Delevere

name: Arterial Strike
text:
Assassins may play this as a 2nd level action.
React: After this rogue hits with a melee strike: The wounds are reduced to zero, and this card is attached to the target. While it is attached, this character suffers 1 wound at the end of every turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is the method of an ordinary assassin. Artless." - Zaina
"Quick? No. Deadly? Yes." - Lazarus Saul

name: Cear's Plan
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all of your rogues who target spent characters with melee strikes gain +5 ATK for the strike and inflict an extra wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "No. This won't do at all." - Artheon
"Ten men die a certain way at a certain hour, and everyone knows it's a ritual. A hundred? A thousand? Who can see through the tears?" - Black Tom

name: Exotic Training
Fallow Sap Poison
text:
React: Before this rogue performs a melee strike roll: If the strike roll hits, attach this card to to the target. While this card is attached, the character must succeed with a poison save (DC 12, 15 if the rogue is an Assassin) after readying or become spent.
Any adjacent character with the Medicine feat or cleric may discard this card as a Spend Order.

name: Killing Strike
text:
Assassins play as a 1st level action.
Spend Order: Target a stunned character within one rank. Kill the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't interrupt." - Rathe
A moment's hesitation-that's all it takes.

name: Nimble Fingers
text: Order: If this rogue is in the 1st rank, the rogue performs a Stealth check (DC 9). If successful, the rogue targets an item up to two ranks away which is discarded. If unsuccessful, the rogue is killed.

setInfos.flavorText: "So Taoth had an alliance with one of the Elven Houses. She really should have paid more attention to her notes." - Sav'rukk
"Watch thy weapons and thy lives. There's a thief about." - Sir Diotram
"Watch thy weapons and thy lives. There's a thief about." - Sir Diotram

name: Out of the Shadows
text: React: After target character targets this rogue with a strike: Redirect the strike to another character in this rank, if possible. If this rogue is an Assassin and the target is within one rank, this rogue performs a melee strike against the target after the original strike resolves.

setInfos.flavorText: "Over here." - Vareth
"Not this time. Not ever." - Logan Ebonwoulfe
"Not this time. Not ever." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Ritual Amulet
text:
+1 Skill
This character has +1 Level for casting spells for each two other wizards in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Emperor hath rewarded us." - Adonis the Cozener

name: Precise Shot
text: React: Before this rogue makes a ranged strike roll: Add this rogue's ATK (without modifiers from Weapons) to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Undead or not, ours or not, you don't advance on me like that and expect to get away with it." - Maxt Stormcrow
"Even dragons have eyes." - Rathe

name: Quick and Deadly
text: React: During a melee strike by this rogue, after the target performs a React: Cancel the React.

setInfos.flavorText: "Taoth has escaped your other agents, Lord Krun, but I promise to bring her before you." - Norn
"Send word back to the king," Darkness murmured, wiping her blade. "These Nothrog be a different evil than we have face before, but evil all the same."

name: Rogues' Guild
text: Spend Order: Attach this card to this rogue. While it is attached, the rogue gains +1 ATK, +2 AC, and +3 Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: Since the Assassins' Strike, Black Tom had all but disappeared completely. Those who tried to find him rarely lived long enough to regret their choice.
We all walk in whispers through this life, whether through shadow and craft, theft and guile...

name: Sneak
text: React: After this rogue is targeted with an action that does not produce a melee strike: Succeed with a perception check (DC 18) to cancel the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm not kidding around anymore. Be careful out there." - Logan
"The Plane of Secrets is less deadly than most planes, but no less hostile. Anything that can be known is there, but the plane hoards its knowledge for itself." - The Loremaster
"Even Nightwalkers aren't perfect. I assure you, though... we're persistent." - Devon Harper

name: Song of Blood
text:
Bard only.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters (including this Bard) inflict an additional wound with their melee strikes while in the same rank as this Bard.

setInfos.flavorText: "When you see a rattlesnake poised to strike, you don't wait until he's done before you crush him." - Keziah

name: Spirit Singing
text:
Bard only.
Spend Order: Target a spent character of equal or lower level. Ready the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Magheline is gone to the south, with Sanguinel. What she did with magic, I do with words." - Phon
"I do not order the spirits. I entreat them." - Elegy

name: Swift
text: Order: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "An army's only as fast s its slowest member. You fall behind, and you're going to have to learn how to catch up. Best to learn that now." - Logan
"Alex, find where Uriel has gone. It is of utmost urgency." - Rabinus Zon
"I don't have to outrun the Nothrog, old man. I only have to be faster than you." - Black Tom of Corinth
"I don't have to outrun the Nothrog, old man. I only have to be faster than you." - Black Tom of Corinth

name: Tag Team
text:
Scouts perform this action without spending.
Spend React: After an adjacent character hit an opposing character with a melee strike: Perform a melee strike targeting the same character.

name: Tales of Blood and Fire
text:
Bard only.
Order: All stunned characters in the same rank as this Bard become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Krun gave us our freedom because he thought it disarmed us. Let's show him his mistake." - Jaqueline Windson
"The kingdom of Miseris has made an alliance with the Nothrog, and turns its troops against the other human nations." The bard's eyes narrowed. "Now you know why I left."

name: Tales of Courage
text:
Bard only.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, characters in your army gain +5 to all saves.
Order: Give a character within 1 rank Powerattack +3.

setInfos.flavorText: "We have lost more than this, friends. Show the Deverenians what loss is." - Phon
"Sir Robert fights for our city. Friends, do not leave him now." - Fauve Mightyheart

name: Book
text:
This is an Anathema Set item.
React: Once per turn per equipped Anathema Set item, after an opposing character targets this character with a melee strike or action: That character must succeed with a magic save (DC = this wizard's Skill) or suffer one wound.
errata: If Book kills the opposing character, the action or strike is cancelled.

setInfos.flavorText: Close the Book.

name: Too Fast to See
text: React: After a strike roll targeting this rogue: The strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Once I've taken your eyes, you won't see me leave, either." - The Lady of Pain
"Once I've taken your eyes, you won't see me leave, either." - The Lady of Pain
"No fortress is safe from me or mine." - Rathe
"Baraxton is crawling with Nothrogs, Keziah. How are you going to get in and out without being caught?" - Logan Ebonwoulfe
"Baraxton is crawling with Nothrogs, Keziah. How are you going to get in and out without being caught?" - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Vital Distraction
text: React: After this rogue is targeted with a melee strike, the rogue gains Riposte +5 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "A toast to our house's future, Cordeos." - Krait
"While Robert fights the bull, he doesn't notice the viper." - Vronish Kez

name: Acid Arrow
text: Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike. If the strike hits, target and discard an item equipped by the target before wounds are inflicted.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hm. Was that supposed to happen?" - Darso the Mad
"We'll start out slowly, yes?" - Bek'tor

name: Blast
text: Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Magical fires tore through Myreth, and many Deverenians burned inside scalding armor.
"When the Nothrog march, we conquer the world. The Accordlands will soon be guided by the iron fist of true law." - Rren'the
"When the Nothrog march, we conquer the world. The Accordlands will soon be guided by the iron fist of true law." - Rren'the

name: Blink
text: React: After this wizard is targeted with a strike or action by an opposing character: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 14) to move to a different rank and cancel the strike or action.

setInfos.flavorText: "The messenger got away. I fear the humans may now know of our plans." - Shadith Glyn
"Next time, you act as decoy, Logan!" - Za'beth Candlebane
"It's not too late. I can set things aright again." - Maxmilian
"Where she was, she was not, and where she was not, she was." - Lucien Stormcrow
"Where she was, she was not, and where she was not, she was." - Lucien Stormcrow

name: Breath of Ice
text:
Necromancer only.
Spend Order: Target a lower-level character in your discard pile. Shuffle the character into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come back, Kyalid. I'm not done with you yet." - Tepheroth
"The Lord Winter sends his regards, your Majesty, and bids you remember the oaths your house has sworn." - Achilleus

name: Burning Hands
text: Order: Until the end of this turn, this wizard gains the ability: "React: Immediately before a melee strike roll targeting this wizard: Perform a melee strike with an ATK of +5 against the opponent."

setInfos.flavorText: "Not all my magic is simple trickery, sir knight. Try me and see." - Zartoch
"Burn, and let the souls of the dead hear your screams!"
"Burn, and let the souls of the dead hear your screams!"

name: Chain Lightning
text: Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike. If it kills, then this wizard may perform a +4 ranged strike against a character in a rank adjacent to the first target's rank. If the second strike kills, then this wizard may perform a +0 ranged strike against a character in a rank adjacent to the second target's rank. No rank can contain more than one target. These strikes inflict an additional wound.

name: Charm Person
text: Order: Target a character of lower level. That character may not attack this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "We have much to offer one another, Parthas." - Sorscha
"The daughter of the Emperor hath no need of shields to keep her safe on the battlefield. She doth need only her standard, and her wit. Most men would die for less." - Sir Beatrix
"The daughter of the Emperor hath no need of shields to keep her safe on the battlefield. She doth need only her standard, and her wit. Most men would die for less." - Sir Beatrix

name: Contagion
text:
Necromancers play this without spending.
Spend Order: Target a character in the 1st rank of another army. The next time the target becomes spent, he suffers a wound (if this kills the target, any action the target is performing is canceled).
The target's player may spend a cleric adjacent to the target to negate the wound.

name: Kaballite Staff
text:
Order: Once per game: Search your deck for a spell and attach it to Kaballite Staff.
Whenever this wizard casts a spell with the same name as the one attached to Kaballite Staff add 4 to all DCs and ranged strike rolls from that spell.

name: Crushing Hands
text: Spend Order: Target a character within 3 ranks. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + this wizard's skill) or be stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "Die and be done with it." - Lord Kestrel
"I prefer not to sully mine own hands." - Lord Kestrel

name: Curse of Heartless Lies
text: Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The truth of it will simply kill you." - Skisk Foulfire
"I struck you once, Taoth. The next time we meet will be your end." - Norn
"Even the word 'belief' has a lie in it... trust no one, Orazhuk. Not even me." - Taoth

name: Deadly Focus
text: React: Before this wizard casts a spell, inflict one wound on the wizard: Raise his or her level by 2 for casting the spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "Prepare for the coming days of glory." - Angu Mournwater
"My life for yours."

name: Dispel Magic
text: React: After costs for a spell are paid: This wizard and the caster both roll a die and add their skill to the roll. If this wizard's total is higher, the spell is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "Aye, you seem to have taken every precaution 'gainst me." - Lord Kestrel
"Without marrow, bones shatter. Elves without magic do the same." - Rren'the
"Without marrow, bones shatter. Elves without magic do the same." - Rren'the

name: Glimmer
text: Spend Order: Target another character in play. Reduce the target's skill by this wizard's Skill until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Light, shadow, and a little in between." - Zartoch
"One fewer knight in his August Majesty's service." - Sali

name: Haste
text: Spend React: Before rolling Initiative: Add this wizard's skill to your die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: News of Hate's death traveled quickly, and soon the Sarakians bore down upon Baraxton's walls.
"Ten times the speed, ten times the courage, and one-tenth the brain. That's your typical Nothrog." - Axe

name: I Call Forth Valor
text: Spend Order: Name a character card: Reveal the top 7 cards of your deck (15 if this wizard is a Summoner). If a copy of the named character is among these cards, you may put it into play, as long as you can do so legally. Shuffle your deck.

name: Innate Ability
text: Order: Attach a 1st or 2nd level wizard spell from your hand to this character. While it is attached, this character can cast the spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "I hope you found what you were looking for," Lord Kestrel said to his dead interrogators. "Please, don't get up."
"Magic is in my blood, foolish human. It is as much a part of me as my eyes or hands."

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this wizard's Skill that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "A little storm magic, for the benefit of my new followers." - Dhamir il Maliq
"Terrible weather you're having." - Mistress Allandra
"Yes! Yes! I have slain the Denskan king!" From his hiding place, Lord Halbrook shuddered at the sorceress' words.
"Blissful pain, hear me now. Bring my enemies all that they deserve." - Tepheroth
"Blissful pain, hear me now. Bring my enemies all that they deserve." - Tepheroth

name: Mass Hallucination
text:
Illusionist only.
Spend Order: Target an army in play. As long as this character is spent, characters in the target army must succeed at a perception check (DC = 15) after targeting each melee and ranged strike or the strike is cancelled.
The effects of this spell end immediately if the caster becomes Stunned or Ready.
The caster may choose to remain spent during the Ready phase.

name: Robe of the Planes
text: Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on this wizard: Play a spell from your discard pile, then remove it from the game.
errata:
The spell is never returned to the discard pile. It is removed from the game as part of the resolution of the action.
If the wound kills the wizard, the spell cannot be played.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothing here is what it seems. Remember that." - Lady al-Semmeya

name: Mental Block
text: Spend Order: Target a character within 3 ranks who must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or attach this card. While this card is attached, this wizard may perform the action: "React: After the attached character pays the costs for an action, discard Mental Block: Cancel the action."

setInfos.flavorText: "What was I doing again?" - Darso the Mad
"Why am I chasing this guy?"

name: Meteor Swarm
text: Spend Order: Target all characters in a rank within two ranks: Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill) or suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Take the city, Alexa? Where would be the fun in that?" - Yavlo the Kindled
"It would seem we have the High Queen's attention..." - Master Anandale
"Choose thy words carefully, Lord Gahid. No man insults me and lives." - Slayer the Unkind
"Choose thy words carefully, Lord Gahid. No man insults me and lives." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Power Bolt
text: Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike. For each level of this character above 1st, add +1 to this die roll. For each two levels of this character above 1st, perform an additional +2 ranged strike (which does not gain the bonus based on level).

name: Power Word Kill
text: React: After target character targets this wizard with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or suffer two wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's not the word itself, so much as the conviction with which I say her name." - Morghen
The world still echoed in Cador's mind as he awoke. "Suffer..."
"Whispers can cut like knives."
"Whispers can cut like knives."

name: Shatter
text: Order: If this wizard is in the 1st rank, target an item in any army's 1st rank. The target item is discarded.

setInfos.flavorText: Zartoch waved his hand, and Ygraine's enchanted mount tripped, breaking its neck.
"Nice weapon. Hope you weren't attached to it." - Quinthe
"Nice weapon. Hope you weren't attached to it." - Quinthe

name: Sphere of Silence
text:
Illusionist only.
Spend Order: Attach this card to a character in play. While it is attached that character gains Stealth +5 but may not cast spells or use actions restricted to Bards. While it is attached, the character may perform the action: "Order: Once per turn, perform a magic save (DC 15). If successful, discard Sphere of Silence."

name: Summon Ally
text:
Summoners play this without spending.
Spend React: Before you put a character into play in your army: Reduce the character's entering rank by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

setInfos.flavorText: "In war, you must choose your allies by the enemies they keep." - Zoe

name: Summon Guardian
text:
Spend Order: Put this card in your 1st rank as an Undead level 2 fighter with ATK +3, AC 12, 0 Skill, and 1 Hit Point.
The Guardian is killed at the end of the turn.
If this wizard has the Summoner trait, the Guardian is killed at the end of next turn.

name: Summon Object
text:
Summoners play this action without spending.
Spend Order: Search your discard pile for an item card, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand.
You cannot retrieve a card if you have already retrieved a card with that name from the discard pile earlier in the game.

name: Teleport
text: Order: Target a character: Move the target forward or backward one rank as long as the move will not create an illegal rank. This wizard may not target an opposing character of equal or higher Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "And now I'm in your camp..." - Scyrax
Norn emerged from a shadowy disc in the air. The hunt continued...
"No one trusts the Dwarves. The evil lives deep beneath the ground, driven there by the Storm. Why should they prove any different." - L'sara
"No one trusts the Dwarves. The evil lives deep beneath the ground, driven there by the Storm. Why should they prove any different." - L'sara

name: Fast as the Wind
text:
Order: Move forward or backward one rank. Opposing characters may not perform Reacts to or during this action.
React: Before this character performs a melee strike: Opposing characters may not perform Reacts to or during this strike.
errata: Prevents any form of react being performed while the Movement or Strike is being made.

setInfos.flavorText: "Well I thought that would work... RUN!" - Sebes

name: Candle
text:
This is an Anathema Set item.
Order: Spend an equipped Anathema Set item: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
Order: Destroy three Anathema Set items equipped to this character: Search your deck for a character you may legally play, and put it into play.

setInfos.flavorText: Quench the Candle.

name: Web
text: Spend Order: Target a character up to 3 ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 18) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "This cannot hold me at all. Really, what were you thinking?" - Valanthe
"House Rowan is destroyed, by the order of the High Queen." The sorcerer smiled, and the sticky strands quickly smothered the still-screaming scouts.
"House Rowan is destroyed, by the order of the High Queen." The sorcerer smiled, and the sticky strands quickly smothered the still-screaming scouts.

name: Wizards' Guild
text: Spend Order: Attach this card to this wizard. While it's attached, the wizard gains +4 skill and all spells cast by this wizard have a +3 DC.

setInfos.flavorText: Arak Spire stands lonely and forlorn, the last lingering reminder of Corinth's greatness.
...or seeking knowledge and power through sorcery's might. The trick is not to walk alone.
"He can recall epic songs in moments, is welcome far and near, and people gladly share with him gossip and legend. Only fools look upon him and see 'just' a bard." - Princess Dashkova
"He will sing thee songs of treason and deceit, as best suits an Emperor's fireside..." - Princess Dashkova
"He will sing thee songs of treason and deceit, as best suits an Emperor's fireside..." - Princess Dashkova

name: Bishop Koenraad
text: Other Deverenians in this rank have +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Knowledge is burden. To know thou wilt die is no relief. To believe thou wilt not is faith, and a life without faith is a poor thing indeed."
"They shall sink into the salt sea, seven hundred knights, the keen men of war found cold and dead, and only the Empire shall be spared." - the Annales Devereniorum
"They shall sink into the salt sea, seven hundred knights, keen men of war found cold and dead and only the Empire shall be spared." - the Annales Devereniorum

name: Black Sun Knight
text: Black Sun Knight gains +1 ATK and AC for each other evil Paladin in play.

setInfos.flavorText: "The knights of the Black Sun suffer no infidel to live. An it take a century, still shall we make this land pure and united."
"I once thought Sir Rhawn misguided. Now, I cannot help but envy the purity of his resolve, even as I fear its price." - Terak Justicebringer
"The Aroch were not thine to slay, dog."

name: Bruin Lenoire
text: Spend React: Before a Deverenian makes a melee strike roll: He gains +3 ATK for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bruin, Kestrel told me the strangest thing. Who is Navdai?" - Aenne the Tempest
Thinkest thou that sorcerers of the Empire serve dark forces? Tis not true. Some of us see the sun within the Storm.
Thinkest thou that sorcerers of the Empire serve dark forces? Tis not true. Some of us see the sun within the Storm.

name: Cador
text: Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Before you sayest that Euain slew my love, ask that e'en I remember her name."
"I do not hate thee, Euain. Hatred is a coward's revenge. I will find thee, and make of thee a truth not soon forgotten..."
"I do not hate you, Euain. Hatred is a coward's revenge. I will find thee, and make thee a truth not soon forgotten..."

name: Christopher Arcadis
text:
Christopher has +1 Hit Point while there is one or more Sir Magnus Arcadis in your army.
Spend Order: Target a character within one rank of this fighter, and a second character in the rank behind the first. Perform a melee strike against the first target. After this strike, if the target has been killed, perform a melee strike against the second target.

name: Father Nicodemus
text: Order: Once per turn: Give a +3 ATK to a Deverenian in this rank until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, the baron stayed here once while on his way to Genecourt lands. Why? Hath something befallen Baron Delvin?"
"Thou asketh of the old gods? I know nothing, of course, but if thou wilt come with me..."

name: Fauhn Boralis
text: You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Dwarves into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Ghenis whelp mistaketh punishment for honor, but he speaks to the Dwarves when others do not." - Lord Gahid Rellion
My liege, we are trying to reach peace with the Dwarves, not slaughter each one we see.

name: Cowl of Dulon
text:
This is a Dulon Set item.
Wounds from this character's spells cannot be reduced.
Order: Once per turn: Play a spell from your discard pile with Level less than or equal to the number of Dulon Set items equipped to this character, then remove it from the game.
errata: The spell cast from the discard pile is never returned to the discard pile. As part of the resolution of the action, it is removed from the game.

name: Ghed Lionel
text: Spend Order: Target a Deverenian in play: Ghed Lionel must succeed with a Skill check (DC 15) to remove one wound from the target.
errata: Erratum 2006/06/26: All characters with the Stormwraith flavor text are considered to have that trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Immortality is but one of the Storm's gifts."
"The Storm hath come to d'Ilchant Keep. Where saints and godlings tread the earth, there is fear in abundance, but no faith." - Cardinal Scelus
"Ghed is an ancient title of respect, given to those subsumed by th'Storm. Learn it well, Euain..." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Ghed Mnettaor
text:
Ghed Mnettaor may cast level 1 cleric spells.
React: After Mnettaor is targeted by a melee or ranged strike: The character performing the strike must make a fear save (DC 8 + number of other Deverenians in Mnettaor's rank) or the strike is cancelled.

name: Hagroth the Foul
text: Spend Order: Target an opposing 1st or 2nd level character. Stun the target, then stun Hagroth.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Shattered Lands are home to horror, but horror nests elsewhere."
"He is a pawn in thy games... naught else." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Inquisitor Mastus
text:
May equip 2 Weapons.
Spend Order: Discard a cleric spell from your hand: Target a spent character within three ranks. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: Redemption is found through pain.

name: Kane the Hunter
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your master's hunt ended here. Will yours?" - Johan Halfblood
"Damien's assistant is as loyal to his master as their hounds... but even he may learn to bite the hand..." - Degais

name: Lady Gracia Ghenis
text: Deverenians printed as 1st and 2nd level in your army are +1 level while in the same rank as Lady Gracia.

setInfos.flavorText: "Worry not, milady. Without thy example, I wouldst not see the folly of temptation." - Erebus Stormchild
"Thou must inspire thy troops before thou send'st them to Hell."
"Ambition is heady wine, each drought dearer than before. What cost, then, to sate an Emperor's avarice?"
She will give her oath to no house, but claims she has sworn herself to a higher calling...
She will give her oath to no house, but claims she has sworn herself to a higher calling...

name: Layamon
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "E'en a crippled son of Deverenia be worth twenty lesser men."
Slayer wiped a tear from his sleeve. "I suppose thou wert right about Theoloc after all."
"My body is twisted by birth, but my soul is strong. Mock my hobbled gait, sir knight, and soon you will walk not at all."

name: Lord Anguisant
text: Order: Once per turn: Perform a melee strike while spent.

setInfos.flavorText: At night, Anguisant rubs his stone fist, and tries to remember what he saw in Sharn's peak...
"Once he was Lord of Sharn, but now he is lord only of torn rocks and salted earth. The Nothrog have taken his city-them, and their dreadful Master." - Baudwyn Troubadour
"Once he was Lord of Sharn, but now he is lord only of torn rocks and salted earth. The Nothrog have taken his city-them and their dreadful Master." - Baudwyn Troubadour

name: Lord Gahid Rellion
text: Gahid rolls two dice for initiative, keeping either one.

setInfos.flavorText: "These forests are mine, Elven witch. An thou wantest them back, thou shalt choke upon their ashes."
The Empire will live no more in the folds of silence, but as a thunder that causes the heavens to tremble.

name: Rod of Lore
text:
Order: If an opponent has 1 or more cards in hand, and Rod of Lore has less than 4 Charges: Put 1 Charge on Rod of Lore.
Order: Spend Rod of Lore, and remove 4 Charges: Target up to three characters within two ranks who must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.
errata: May not target the same character more than once for a single activation. That is, you must target three different characters, not one three times.

name: Lord Joxanus
text: Spend Order: Target an item within two ranks. Discard the target item.

setInfos.flavorText: "'Twould seem the Elves have overestimated the quality of bonemail."
"He can turn the most sacred of artifacts to dust with a thought." - Khevanna

name: Lord Kestrel
text: Order: Once per turn: Give another Deverenian in play one of the following until Kestrel uses this ability again: +5 ATK, +5 AC, +1 HP, or +5 Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: When the Imperial Guard came for Lord Kestrel, his face changed. He had no reason to lie to dead men.
"Calm thyself, Bruin, I am the only devil thou needst ever fear."

name: Lord Miracus
text: Order: Spend an equipped Weapon: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kerebrus doth live? Then I mayest still be granted my vengeance."
"In times of crisis, boastful men turn silent, fearful that this time, they have said too much." - Ichaerus
"Blackthorn remembers Deverenia as it was and should be. He is not my lord, yet I serve him gladly."

name: Lord Theissen
text: You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Nothrogs into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course, milord Krun. The Emperor acknowledges thy claim of blood, and Taoth shall know no succor in his lands."
"I understand these animals. I know how to placate them, how to enrage them... how to make them ours."

name: Magellan
text: Order: Once per turn, target a Deverenian you control: Until end of turn, the target has an additional melee strike (base = target's lowest ATK) when he attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "So many dead, the priests now chant the last rights unceasingly."
"He is ever by the sorceress' side. Is he lover, aide, or friend?" - Lord Halbrook
Standing alone by the edge of a river, He's traded his life for a glass full of tears...

name: Malciaar of Ghenis
text:
Malciaar may not be targeted by melee strikes with an ATK less than +2.
Malciaar gains +3 ATK when performing a melee strike targeting a wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "Orders Ghenis and Tremayne are the least of knights: those who fight not with honor, but with words." - Sorceress Ygraine
My father's axe can cut through more men than the Dwarves have, sire.

name: Master Anandale
text: React: Once per turn, after target ready non-Warlord character is targeted with a melee strike by Master Anandale: Spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Discovery of a new world doth not excuse a lack of respect! An we forget the Empire's laws, we become no better than the savages here. 'Twould seem it falleth to me to restore decorum."
"To serve a man thou hatest, to bend the knee to thy lesser; to suffocate on thy duty. This is Deverenian honor."
"Fifty years ago, on a bloody battlefield, I swore an oath to guard the Empire. I will never forget it Gahid, no matter how much the Emperor tries to forget me."
"Fifty years ago, on a bloody battlefield, I swore an oath to guard the Empire. I will never forget it Gahid, no matter how much the Emperor tries to forget me."

name: Master Halvedar
text: Master Halvedar has +1 Hit Point if he has Armor equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "If Luthlarius will not fall by treachery, perhaps it is time for more stringent methods." - Lord Kestrel
"What bravery hath a man who fights only to protect?" - Sir Gahid Rellion

name: Nina Worth
text: Spend React: After an opposing character succeeds with a magic save: The character must reroll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come, come, sweet Bruin. Our lord showed me his true face our first night together."
"She hangs about him like a shameless harlot." - Aenne the Tempest

name: Princess Dashkova
text: Spend React: After any die roll: Reroll the die.

setInfos.flavorText: "Wizards and knights and all the world's demons, Lord Gahid-fear ye none as you wouldst a desperate man. The mightiest foe doth cower in the face of loss, but desperate men have naught to lose." - Master Anandale

"The Emperor's daughter delivers his messages to the men on the battlefield and guides their assault from her carriage. She may not lift a sword, but she's already slaughtered a thousand souls." - King Xod

"The Emperor's daughter delivers his messages to the men on the battlefield and guides their assault from her carriage. She may not lift a sword, but she's already slaughtered a thousand souls." - King Xod

name: Attack of Opportunity
text: React: After a character within one rank targets a ranged strike or pays the costs for a spell: Perform a melee strike targeting that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Forgive the interruption, good sir, but I dislike thy tone of voice." - Elsabet Drac
"Go ahead, wizard. Flinch." - Darian Windson
"Excellent, men, excellent. An Tepheroth dallieth much longer, she shall find her forests fortified against her."
"Hold the line, men. No one must get through."

name: Sir Clifford
text: Spend React: After you win initiative: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "He rode at the head of Gahid's army, celebrating triumphs over retreating Elves." - Valanthe
"He hath not the steel to be a true soldier. He is overeager to return to his comforts." - Anandale

name: Sir Magnus Arcadis
text:
Sir Magnus Arcadis may cast 1st Level cleric spells.
Other Deverenian fighters and rogues in this rank are +1 Level for performing action cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have done all that you have asked, milord, but I can do no more while the Voice is here."
If I die, and the Storm takes my life in the Emperor's name, then let them say only this of me: I have kept the faith.

name: Sorceress Ygraine
text:
Sorceress Ygraine is both a fighter and a wizard.
React: Once per turn, after casting a spell: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: The sorceress scanned the smoldering ruin of the Denskan throne room. "Such is the price of defiance."
Have no fear, for I am with thee. I will stand beside thee where weaker hearts fail.

name: Squire Arrigan
text: Arrigan inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against characters without an Armor or a Shield equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "Beware, my lord! brine fiends approacheth!"
"She hath refused Rellion knighthood... not by pride, but by the claim she wisheth to be truly worthy to join us." - Lord Gahid Rellion
"I have seen her fight, and she lets neither flesh nor bone stand in her way." - Strongarm
"To serve as a Deverenian squire is a sure mark of bravery. Such men become heroes, or they become dead." - Terak Justicebringer
Born of a noble house, he struggles to prove his name worthy of knighthood.

name: Squire Igerne
text: Deverenians adjacent to Igerne have +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Imperial Guard once served in Luthlarius only, but no longer. Now they scour all Deverenia, seeking signs of this conspiracy." - Princess Dashkova
"The hawk has returned, and with bad news, Lady. The wizard hath escaped us once again, with the help of a half-blood Tremayne... "

name: Squire Parthus
text: Spend Order: Squire Parthus performs a number of melee strikes equal to his level.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is a sad thing to witness a valiant soul drowning among the damned." - Strongarm
"Such potential festerith within Aedroud..." - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Storm Crows
text: May not equip items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Without will, men are naught more than beasts. Some of the Storm's greatest lessons are more than mere metaphor." - Bishop Koenraad
"Thousands of them came, like a black veil across the sky, heralding the beginning of the Storm's Passing..." - Cardinal Scelus

name: Storm Shadow
text: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike targeting a character in this rank. The strike inflicts two additional wounds if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: The Stormborn's eyes passed him over, and the thing behind Sir Sorlons' face sighed in relief.
Damn your prophecies. The gate is open and so shall it remain.

name: Flank Them
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: After targeting a melee strike: If this rank has more characters than the target's rank, the strike inflicts an additional wound or has +5 ATK (your choice).

setInfos.flavorText: "Your choice, ten fingers or nine. Either way I'm taking that ring." - Arrag
"The most deadly technique of all: bashing someone's head in when they're not looking." - Davon Ironthorn
"There ain't no such thing as a fair fight ya twit!" - Sir Wallence

name: Taumar the Protector
text: Deverenian fighters in the rank in front of Taumar the Protector have +2 AC and +2 Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "I know not where my son hath gone, and I care not."
"Sir Euain's father hath neither his son's temperament nor his vicious avarice. Verily, a man worthy of respect." - Cador

name: Thallen
text: Thallen is the same class(es) as your Warlord.

setInfos.flavorText: "My fellows doth cling to the old ways, but I see that we must adapt to survive. I shall follow any master that doth share this vision."
"But two types of men doth serve many lords: they who serve poorly... and they who serve opportunity." - Master Anandale
"The orders will not have him, so young Thallen searches for a master, ready to learn whatever he can." - Squire Edonloc

name: The Beast Knight
text: Your Warlord gains +2 to his initiative rolls.

setInfos.flavorText: "There is no winter in this blasted domain. All there is is ailing mounts, reeking sweat, and chafing armor."
"Winter hath passed, but spring bringeth no new hope. Damned I remain."
"It is a terrible thing to be supreme but still unworthy. Where injustice lives, there thrives Bascaron." - Balian
He hunts for souls, seeking to steal a shadow of humanity, while his own has been forever lost.

name: The Iron Duke
text: The Iron Duke inflicts an additional wound on higher level characters when he inflicts wounds with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "We have secured an alliance, as I promised, but sometimes even I wonder if perhaps we should have stood alone." - Purge
"Tell me more, my dwarven friend, and I shall grant thee more than a mere title." - Lady Gracia Ghenis

name: Viscount Nocens
text:
Viscount Nocens is both a fighter and a wizard.
Viscount Nocens enters play as if he were level 4.
React: Before making a melee strike roll: Subtract 5 from the die roll. The strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Suffer and burn, writhe and squirm; though thou plead'st in sorrow, the screw doth turn."
"Steel and spell, chant and chain. By fair and fell, I grant thee pain." - Viscount Nocens, called "The Blooded"

name: Wizard's Guard
text:
If Wizard's Guard is in a rank with one or more wizards, he gains +3 ATK and +3 AC.
React: After one of your wizards kills Wizard's Guard with a card effect: Shuffle Wizard's Guard back into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Slayer receivith no visitors or missives, milady Ygraine."

name: Axe
text: Axe has +2 ATK while he is adjacent to one or more Hammer.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do these 'knights' have steel and no fear? Then we can use them!"
Darkness rots the mountains beneath us. If the uplanders will not fight it, then by Kor, we shall fight them!
Darkness rots the mountains beneath us. If the uplanders will not fight it then by Kor, we shall fight them!

name: Barrier
text: React: After a character in another army with a Steed equipped moves into their first rank: Discard that Steed and inflict 1 wound on the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Watch your head!"
"Ironhall's walls collapsed in minutes. How can we fight when the very earth is against us?"

name: Basalt Gargoyle
text:
You must have a cleric in play to bring Basalt Gargoyle into play.
If Basalt Gargoyle has one or more wounds, it does not become ready during the ready phase.

setInfos.flavorText: "And one shall stray from the path, but remain steadfast. The earth endures, but it does not abide." - Hember's Rune
"...and the rocks themselves shall rise to your aid." - Hember's Rune
"...and the rocks themselves shall rise to your aid." - Hember's Rune

name: Blessed
text:
Blessed may use 1st and 2nd level fighter action cards.
Blessed may equip up to two fighter items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sjonegaard returned, but he was stronger, wiser... different. What is so fearsome to come, that even the stones themselves change?"
"I may die here today, but so will all of you."

name: Leveled
text: React: After this character performs a strike or action that killed an opposing character of equal or higher Level: This character permanently gains +1 Level, +3 ATK, +3 AC, +1 HP, and +2 Skill. Remove this card from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "I will never forget." - Sir Lucian
Study the bear. Seek peace, walk quietly, but if enemies threaten, send them to their graves.
Study the bear. Seek peace, walk quietly, but if enemies threaten, send them to their graves.
Study the bear. Seek peace, walk quietly, but if enemies threaten, send them to their graves.

name: Cobalt Gargoyle
text:
May not equip items.
You must have a cleric in your army to bring Cobalt Gargoyle into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of all their kind, the only ones to enjoy the Deverenians' company." - Faith
"They can talk just fine, but they're too good to speak to the likes of us." - Ash

name: Dodger
text: React: Once per turn, after a character within one rank of Dodger is targeted with a ranged strike: Dodger becomes the new target.

setInfos.flavorText: "There is another option. A mercenary army waits, watching these battles and remaining neutral."
"Merrick was a wash. These . Free Kingdoms' need allies as badly as we, but have more enemies."

name: Edge
text: While performing a melee strike against an evil character, Edge gains +5 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ye cannae make peace wi' monsters, no matter the mask they wear."
"The Deverenians hae forgotten the Accord, and worship that which they swore to contain."
I ha' seen the sky turn red as blood. How can ye who live beneath it forget yer past when it is painted o'such a canvas?

name: Flank
text: While Flank is adjacent to exactly one character, Flank gains +3 AC and the adjacent character gains +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "You... gave up your name?" - Duncan Kinslayer
"Anwar may have a new name and cause, but he is still an elf and a traitor, and shall be treated as such." - Quinthe

name: Garn Hearthstone
text: Order: Once per turn: Target another Dwarf in your army. Move one or more wounds from the target to another character in your army.

setInfos.flavorText: "The World Above needs heroes, and we have those to spare."
"Today we die, so that millions will live tomorrow."
"None shall pass. No Exceptions."
"I was here yesterday, and I will be here tommorrow. None shall pass."
"None shall pass."
"None shall pass."

name: Hammer
text: Hammer has +2 AC while he is adjacent to one or more Axe.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sjonegaard claims the very earth as close kin. What more do we need?"
Words are for those who have time to waste their breath.
Words are for those who have time to waste their breath.

name: Ice
text: Ice is considered two characters for determining illegal ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have seen him dancing upon reddened snow, and I wonder-is this what we have become?" - Shield
"I like this 'winter' of yours, Claw. It keeps me warm."

name: K'evan of the Green
text: You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Free Kingdoms characters into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Milord, there must be some mistake! You cannot seriously consider uniting with the Empire!"
My mentor was slain by Elves and returned as a... guardian. So long as I serve Ashrock, I'll also serve the good people of Andover.

name: Naked as a Babe
text: React: After this character targets a melee strike against a character with no items equipped: The strike has +5 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'd expected a foe wise enough to arm himself..." - Elsabet Drac
"Poor lad. Your sword may have been strong, but your flesh was weak." - Lady Ersane

name: Kohn Peacehand
text: Spend Order: Target a character within one rank: Remove one wound from the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Alaric has returned, the royal line is restored, and yet I am forced to turn to war again."
"For every man I save, ten more die of their wounds. How many have I murdered by growing old?"
Mercy should be mined from the heart as ore is dug from the mountains. With time, a vein can be opened, and the world will change.
Mercy should be mined from the heart as ore is dug from the mountains. With time, a vein can be opened, and the world will change.

name: Limestone Gargoyle
text:
You must control a cleric for Limestone Gargoyle to enter play.
Order: Once per turn, reveal five cards from the top of your deck: Put a revealed, non-Limestone, Level 5 or lower Gargoyle into play adjacent to Limestone Gargoyle. Shuffle Limestone Gargoyle and any equipped items into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now is a time for change, for good or ill." - Thekk Rockbender
"No, no, no! One and the same, one and the same!"
"Never. Never. Never. Not while I live."

name: Nitesh Imaran
text:
Nitesh Imaran may perform level 1 actions of any class.
Order: Once per turn: Target a lower level unstunned non-Warlord Dwarf within two ranks and make a Charisma check (DC 18). If successful, spend or ready the Dwarf.

name: Purge
text: You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Deverenians into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "The alliance with the Deverenians is a necessary evil, Stalwart."
No matter the words coming from their lips, I trust not the Deverenians. But I know determination when I see it and I cannot deny their strength.

name: Revenge
text: Revenge inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits a Monster with a melee strike.
