setInfos.flavorText: "Bonebreaker was right. Sending any Dwarf, even Zeal, against Nihil is like clashing shields together: more noise than effect. We need to try something new."
"His family died when Goldenaxe fell to the Abyss, but he refused to yield. Only vengeance has kept him alive this far... vengeance and destiny." - Faith

name: Rock Crawlers
text: You must have a cleric in your army to start with Rock Crawlers or bring one into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Every stone is different, yet of a kind. Each type of rock has its own personality, its own hopes and wants." - Sjonegaard
"As his sons are to Xod, so are the stones to me." - Sjonegaard
"As his sons are to Xod, so are the stones to me." - Sjonegaard

name: Shield
text: Shield has -3 AC while spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "When evil fights evil, only evil can win. Think on that, Purge."
I still hold hope that we shall find what we seek. These Deverenians are evil, but they cannot be all that remain of those we left behind so long ago.
I still hold hope that we shall find what we seek. These Deverenians are evil, but they cannot be all that remain of those we left behind so long ago.

name: Sjonegaard
text:
Sjonegaard may not equip Armor, Shield or Helm items.
Other Gargoyles in your army gain +2 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "Goldenaxe and Ironhall were but the first tremors, Xod. You were wise to place your faith in stone, rather than flesh."
You cannot destroy the earth. Hurl blows upon it, cast your spells-we will endure.

name: Sky
text: Spend React: Before a Dwarf you control makes a melee strike roll: The strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "By now I'd really give a lot to see anything overhead. Anything."
"We of the cleric caste dress in sky-blue robes. If that's not a sign, I don't know what is."
"The younger dwarf touched Duncan lightly on the shoulder, and pointed upward. 'Look,' he said, and Duncan smiled. I would give anything to know what they saw." - Stone
"He says he'll find the support pillar one day, and climb up to touch the blue ceiling." - Ash
"He says he'll find the support pillar one day, and climb up to touch the blue ceiling." - Ash

name: The Thrill of Victory
text: React: After an adjacent character performs a melee strike or action that killed a character of equal or higher Level than this character: Ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Deverenians never acknowledged borders. This was once out of pride. Now, it is because they do not have to." - The Loremaster
"Flee back to thy bone orchards, Elves. Myreth is ours." - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Slate Gargoyle
text:
May not equip Armor.
You must control a Level 5 or higher cleric for Slate Gargoyle to enter play.
When searching your deck, you may not remove Slate Gargoyle.
Spend Order: Ready another Gargoyle.
Order: Once per turn, spend an adjacent Gargoyle: Ready Slate Gargoyle.

name: Stalwart
text: If an effect (not a cost) causes Stalwart to become stunned, he is spent instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "Aye, Purge. More evil and less necessary with every passing day."
I will not falter. I will not wall.
I will not falter. I will not fail.

name: Staunch
text: React: Once per turn, after a Dwarf in your army of lower level than Staunch is killed: Shuffle the Dwarf into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "It was healing. Who knew?"
"Heal the Deverenians with one hand, bash them with the other. See which works best."

name: Steel Gargoyle
text:
You must have a level 3 or higher cleric in your army to bring Steel Gargoyle into play.
Spend React: Before a melee strike roll targeting Steel Gargoyle: Target a Weapon equipped by the attacker. After the strike, discard the weapon.

setInfos.flavorText: "Vain, light-loving creatures. Best not take one to the surface. We'll lose it to the sun." - Sky

name: Stern
text: Stern gains +1 ATK and +1 AC for each other Dwarf fighter in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "He walks around Ironhall's haunted ruins, muttering to himself. If the lines didn't hold there, where would they?" - Word
We thought the battle lost, then he arrived. - Hammer
The day darkened into night, and as the light seeped from the sky, Stone shivered uncomfortably. "Something is coming, Duncan. Something vicious and wild. I do not wish to be here when it arrives."

"You were his shieldman." Xod said gravely, his son's body pale upon the stone bier. "You were trusted with his protection, and yet you live, and he is gone. May your deeds weigh upon you like a stone into water, and may peace never know your true name."

"You were his shieldman." Xod said gravely, his son's body pale upon the stone bier. "You were trusted with his protection, and yet you live, and he is gone. May your deeds weigh upon you like a stone into water, and may peace never know your true name."

name: Stonefist
text: Stonefist inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "I turn my curse to my advantage. These daemons will learn to fear my strong right hand."
"The gargoyles have come to me. My flesh is as theirs, and I swear to them my aid."
"What, you thought I'd wait long enough for you to finish casting the spell?"

name: Tarpit Gargoyle
text:
You must have a cleric in your army to start with Tarpit Gargoyle or bring one into play.
Tarpit Gargoyle has +4 AC against ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "There are wellsprings where the Dragon's immortal evil poisons the earth beyond even Sjonegaard's power to redeem." - Gnorrow Yaw
Not all of Sjonegaard's brood can be trusted. The more twisted the stone from which they spring, the more corrupt their hearts.

name: Truth
text: Spend Order: Target character gains either +3 ATK or +3 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have prayed to Kor for so long to rid us of Poison and his ilk. Now he and his have left, and I fear their loss will be greater than I ever dared imagine."
The uplanders have sown the wind; they shall reap the storm.
The uplanders have sown the wind; they shall reap the storm.
"I... killed... you..." - Carock
Give me a blade, and I will forge the way. Give me ten men, and I will shatter these Deverenian walls. Give me an army, and I will bring victory!

name: Tracking
text:
Ranger or Scout only.
React: After a character in another army moves forward or backward: Move this character forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "How long can it take to find one little girl?!" - Donovan Che'har
"Find her for me, Grukth, and we'll split the bounty. What could you do with over seventy thousand golden Claw?" - Donovan Che'har

name: Valhala Abyssbane
text:
Valhala Abyssbane is both a fighter and a cleric.
Valhala Abyssbane may target any Dwarf fighter in your army with Medicine, regardless of rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Tread lightly, brother. Your kingdom must yet earn its name."
Our enemy screams in hunger. Let us feed them pain.

name: Watcher
text: Watcher ignores the Planar trait with melee strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "You Daemons aren't so different from the Abyssals. I still know your weaknesses, and how to break your ties to this plane."
"We cannot hold the line forever. The Abyssals are beyond true destruction, merely banishment to the Abyss..."
"I'm old, friend, not incompetent."

name: Word
text: React: Once per turn, after Word is targeted with a melee strike: Perform a Charisma check (DC 15 + attacker's level). If successful, the strike is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've found the strangest thing in the caverns above Ironhall..."
"Good news or bad, I'll get Xod's attention."

name: Absinthe
text: Order: Once per turn: Absinthe makes a skill check (DC 12). If successful, search your deck for a spell that Absinthe may cast, show it to the other players, and add it to your hand. If unsuccessful, Absinthe suffers one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hmm. The brother is such a tempting morsel. Such spirit."
They serve, that they might live... and one day, my beloved, you will join my beautiful pets...

name: Achilleus
text:
If Achilleus does not have a Weapon equipped, wounds inflicted with his melee strikes may not be reduced.
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Achilleus: Spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: We, who gave our lives for him long ago, follow Winter even after death.

name: Arionrhod
text: Arionrhod does not count as a character to prevent the rank behind her from being illegal.

setInfos.flavorText: "Soul must unite with flesh, Winter, or she will continue to fade." - Morghen Dythanus
"I can only gaze upon her, and know what I have lost-our hands cannot touch across the barrier of death. Syneri stole her from me, but even the Archmage could not part us forever." - Winter

name: Cashious
text: Spend Order: Target a character in an adjacent rank of your formation. Move the target character to this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Quickly, quickly. We must be ready before Robert's return."
He moves like a moth and strikes like a wasp. - Rora Blackmane

name: Catarina
text: React: Once per turn, after Catarina spends to cast a spell of 3rd level or lower, spend another character in your army: Ready Catarina.

setInfos.flavorText: "Go get me that book, Jigoral. I need more than you've told me of it."

name: Cestrel the Shaper
text: Spend Order: Discard a cleric spell from your hand: Summon a Skeleton (use the cleric spell to represent the Skeleton) into your 1st rank. The Skeleton is an Undead level 1 evil fighter with ATK +3, AC 10, +0 Skill, and 1 hit point. The Skeleton is killed at the end of the turn.

name: Cymaniel
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Damnable Deverenian armor!"
If Whispershot wishes my hand, then he will need a voice, not a bow. An arrow cannot make me his.

name: Loot
text: React: After this character kills an opposing Monster, Siege, Stormwraith, Lycanthrope, Gargoyle or Undead: Search your deck for an item card, reveal it, and put it in your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "The guild, 'united' against a common foe. How quickly people forget you, Tom." - Trevaine Cartwright
Seraphina smiled. "I'll follow Anton. When we fine the tome, we'll be richer than angels..."

name: Deslarion
text: Deslarion gains +4 ATK when performing a melee strike against a good character.

setInfos.flavorText: "I will avenge you, mistress, wherever Uther is now."
"Daedelia's apprentice is not as skilled with a knife as his Mistress. Sometimes his victims stop screaming to draw breath." - Rathe

name: Dythanus' Slaves
text:
You must have a Necromancer in your army to put Dythanus' Slaves into play.
Melee strikes and actions that inflict more than one wound inflict only one wound on Dythanus' slaves.

setInfos.flavorText: "Return to the city, Cordeos. We have much to consider..." - Morghen Dythanus

name: Elenitakis
text: Spend Order: Target a character, who gains +4 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Aedroud, aged seventy years... Fine vintage."
One sip, my friend, and all thoughts of mortality will be gone forever.
One sip, my friend, and all thoughts of mortality will be gone forever.

name: Freia
text: React: Before fixing an illegal second rank: If your Warlord is an Elf, put Freia into your first rank from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "You wouldn't believe what I found in the ocean."
"You wouldn't believe what I found in the ocean."
"Zon's monks have gone home, and the others at Toris Kelt will soon follow."
"I've studied these Isharans. I know how to deal with their ilk."

name: Gueniveure
text: Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "We do what we must to survive. Forgive me, my queen..."
"I have lived nearly thirty years, and my life is at an end. Yet before I die, I have one wish: to see the power of the Dragon Storm."
"I have lived nearly thirty years, and my life is at an end. Yet before I die, I have one wish: to see the power of the Dragon Storm."

name: Ichaerus
text:
Ichaerus is a fighter, a cleric, and a wizard.
Order: Once per turn: Ready an item equipped by Ichaerus.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is an affront to all the Houses. Calix elevates the dross above the gold."
I speak the tongues of men and angels; I command the mysteries of all the realms. Yet I am not High King. For that insult, Calix must fall.

name: Ilvion
text: React: Before Ilvion inflicts one or more wounds with a spell: The spell inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come close, Ilvion, my fair. I have another mission for you..." - Tepheroth
"Tepheroth wants to talk to you, Behlial. You do remember your High Queen, don't you?"

name: Jaridesse
text: Jaridesse gains +3 ATK while making a melee strike against a spent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "That should have killed you, Artheon. Now, tell me what you know."
"I've never seen such hatred burn with such a cold flame. I do not know what Jaridesse has against the Grey One, but the flame with be quenched-or it will destroy her." - Artheon

name: Kether
text: Kether may not target ready characters with melee strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Elves have no true gods. I have no one to pray to for my people's safety."
"Best he does not tell the Queen where his true loyalties lie." - Yanthorine
"Best he does not tell the Queen where his true loyalties lie." - Yanthorine

name: Krait
text:
Krait is both a rogue and a wizard.
Krait enters play as if she were level 5.
React: After Krait hits a character with a melee strike: The character must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm afraid my brother is... elsewhere, King Netheryn. May I be of use?"
"My sister's venom might not kill you, but when she is done, you will wish it had." - Cordeos

name: Frost Shock
text: Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. The target of the strike must succeed with a reflex save (DC 15) or may not attack until end of turn.
errata: The save must be made even if the strike misses.

setInfos.flavorText: "Originally perfected by a VoTaurr shaman. I find it useful." - Taoth

name: Ricochet
text:
Ranger or Scout only.
React: After this character performs a ranged strike that hit the target: Perform a +0 ranged strike targeting a character that was adjacent to the original target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Who's the Free King? Good question-I like the giant chicken rumor best." - Mayara Wadreth
"Hah! Ya missed m-" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Kyalid
text: React: After Kyalid is killed: Put him on the bottom of your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hah. Even the peasants outrank Wyrian's leavings now!"
"I care not what the Wyrian call themselves now. Filth is filth."

name: Laurle
text: You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Nothrogs into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Timmuk's forces may at last return to his people, and in protecting him, we've gained a stronger ally for it."
"Call it an 'alliance of convenience.' Our combined strength can crush our mutal foes... then we shall be free to settle any lingering issues between us."

name: Lenillion
text:
May not equip Weapons.
Spend Order: If Lenillion is in your first rank, target all characters in an opposing first rank. Perform a melee strike with an ATK of +1 against each target character.

name: Master Gyere
text: Spend Order: Target an Elf in this rank. The target gains a feat of your choice (at +5) until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The new general's ways are foreign, but the purity of his design is so... invigorating."
"To master spirit is to achieve true life. Forget bone, blood, and flesh - all you are, for what you wish to be."

name: Mistress Allandra
text:
React: Once per turn, after Allandra performs a ranged strike that killed the target: Ready Allandra.
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Grisly? It's just bone, human."
"Grisly? It's just bone, human."
"I do what I can, my queen, but the Deverenians are at the forefront of war magic."

name: Narasis
text: React: After Narasis enters play from your discard pile: Narasis gains +5 ATK and +5 AC permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "We are all outcasts. Tepheroth has moved beyond the need for the Council; mayhap it's time for the Council to surpass the High Queen."
"The legacy of Calix's betrayal lives on in our master."

name: Ninifaeer
text:
Ninifaeer has +5 AC while in an opposing formation.
Ninifaeer inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike while in an opposing formation.

setInfos.flavorText: "Where is my eastern support?!" - Lord Gahid Rellion
He came in the night, soft as the rain... and merciless as the Storm itself.

name: Noenare
text: React: After Noenare enters play: Shuffle one character card of lower level from your discard pile back into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "I need more heroes of old, Noenare. This new breed is not as Rathe's kind before them." - Tepheroth
She keeps the key to the tombs of those who sleep, and guards it with her life.
She keeps the key to the tombs of those who sleep, and guards it with her life.

name: Orthoreos
text: Orthoreos may cast 'Necromancer only' wizard spells as if he were a 3rd level wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Deverenians hate the undead, but hate is borne of fear..."

name: Phon
text: Other Elves in the same rank as Phon add +2 to all their die rolls.

setInfos.flavorText: "How wasteful the Deverenians are, to live so long and for so little."
The end of song is silence. The end of life need not be.

name: Shadow Bolts
text:
Rogue and wizard only.
This is a spell.
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike. If this character is a rogue, this strike inflicts an additional wound against spent characters. If this character is a wizard, perform another +4 ranged strike.

name: Rathe
text: Order: Discard a card from your hand: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "So Sir Robert seeks to come home. A pity he won't have one waiting for him."
For too long, I slept the ageless sleep of the dead only to awaken at the first taste of blood upon Elven ground. I have dreamed of new paths... and dark lores of revenge.
For too long, I slept the ageless sleep of the dead only to awaken at the first taste of blood upon Elven ground. I have dreamed of new paths... and dark lores of revenge.

name: Raubin
text: React: Once per turn, after Raubin kills a character with a melee strike: Perform an additional melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "She returned from her hunt one night, and soon after inlaid her daggers with ivory." - Rafkin
I loathe Sedwin. One day I'll see him speared at the end of his own blade-but at least I'll have the courage to accept punishment for a crime that saves our people.

name: Rustiq Umbala
text:
Other Undead characters in Rustiq Umbala's army have +2 ATK.
Rustiq may cast level 1 and 2 wizard spells.
Order: Once per turn, move another Undead Elf forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "War without end."

name: Sileth Elestra
text: Spend Order: Your Undead gain +1 HP until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Chosen are far more cruel than I. At least I wait for death before enforcing servitude."
"I have need of a private chaplain. Come to me when you return." - Tepheroth
"His ghouls may be strong, but like a simple club, they are crude." - Morghen Dythanus

name: Skeleton
text:
May not start in play.
Your Initiative rolls have a -1 penalty.
You may have any number of Skeletons in your deck.
You must have an unspent Necromancer in play to bring Skeleton into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bring me back an army, Saunginel. Restore the troops you wasted at Toris Kelt." - Tepheroth
Led by Djarat, Saunginel's troops faced the fire of Amoudosi. - Shattered Faith Part IV

name: Sulluman
text: You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Free Kingdoms characters into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'll listen, but you'd best make your case better than your predecessor did at Ghostwood, Caolwader."
"Our goals are not so different. Come to my tent, and I shall explain further."

name: Tepheroth
text: All Elves in this army can cast level 1 wizard spells.

setInfos.flavorText: "You call yourselves generals. Pretenders, all. If you cannot deal with the Deverenians, then I will."
Death is seduction. Embrace it, call it to your cold heart, make it your own.

name: T'kilth
text: Spend Order: Target a character within 1 rank and perform a Medicine Check (DC 20). If successful, inflict a wound on the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "My master has an offer, King Netheryn..."
"Find who resists me in Andover. I want this nation over, so we can aid against the Deverenians." - Rathe
"Enter Toris Kelt, then attack. Choke them on their own dead." - Saunguinel
"I'm glad you like it." - Havellin Tansiq
She is more cunning than the pets she trains, and far more deadly. Those who fight the elves would do well to remember that Valanthe's poison comes in two forms: the sting, and the smile.
She is more cunning than the pets she trains, and far more deadly. Those who fight the elves would do well to remember that Valanthe's poison comes in two forms: the sting, and the smile.

name: Summon Avalanche
text:
Cleric and wizard only.
This is a spell.
Spend Order: Target all characters in a rank within two ranks: Each target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 14) or become spent. Spent characters instead become stunned. Stunned characters instead suffer a wound.

name: Vereshja
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike. If the target is ready and the ranged strike hits, spend the target before wounds are inflicted.

setInfos.flavorText: "There is something of Calix magic in Valanthe, but something older, too..."
"Calix's penchant for spiders is well known, but even among us, she is strange. Vereshja has made her blood their own, and gained her immortality from their venom." - Lathos

name: Vorg
text: Spend Order: Spend a lower-level ready character up to two ranks away.

setInfos.flavorText: "We cannot fight the Deverenians. Not openly, anyway..."
"Ten men lie lost in that forest already, sleeping deep beneath new-fallen snow and dreaming of her eyes." - Reinholt

name: Whispershot
text: Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "'Twas like the arrow sprouted from within Lord Rhimian's helm..." - Squire Kelanor
"He does not speak. His bow speaks for him." - Gueniveure of House Glyn
"He does not speak. His bow speaks for him." - Gueniveure of House Glyn

name: Yanthorine
text: Yanthorine gains +1 Level for casting spells.

setInfos.flavorText: "No better chance to forget old quarrels, and yet still my people cling to their feud with the humans! I cannot pursuade them alone, but who will aid me?"
"What's this? How have we drawn the direct attention of a god?"
"She sits alone by the water, waiting for it to show her Elven dreams, but the images are fading, and the words are lost in blood." - Cordeos
"She sits alone by the water, waiting for it to show her Elven dreams, but the images are fading, and the words are lost in blood." - Cordeos

name: Zephiros
text: If Zephiros does not have a Weapon equipped, wounds inflicted by his melee strikes may not be reduced.

setInfos.flavorText: The smoke of Gahid's fires held off the Glyn snipers, but the damned barely noticed.
A cold wind blows through the Lands of the Accord, turning hearts to snow and blades to ice.

name: Zombie
text:
May not start in play.
You may have more than 3 copies of Zombies in your deck.
You must control a ready Necromancer in play for Zombie to enter play.
All characters in play have the ability: "Order: Spend an equipped Weapon, Kill a Zombie within one rank."

setInfos.flavorText: "No! I am not one of you! Take this cursed flesh back to your terrible king, but I will not join the Yscar!"
Some of the children of Yscar choose to hide their heritage... for a time.

name: Alex Fortnot
text: React: After Alex spends a Steed to move forward or backward one rank: Move him an additional rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Cassandra and Maxmilian are gone?"
"Sir Robert is lucky to have Maxmilian as a friend. He can concentrate on the war, knowing his wife is safe."

name: Angus Hammerfall
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Humans aren't so bad, I suppose. It's remembering your names that's difficult."
"I hear you know your way around a hammer." - Uriel
I don't work for you, human. I came to fight evil, and you just happened to be going the same way.
I don't work for you human. I came to fight evil, and you just happened to be going the same way.

name: Atu Amani
text: React: After Atu suffers one or more wounds, spend a Monster in your army: Inflict one wound on the Monster instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "Denska is conquered, but for the infernal Kaballite creations that spill over from the west!" - Sorceress Ygraine
"Creation is on his side. What are Ygraine's armies compared to that?" - Lord Halbrook

name: Equipment Shop
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Order: Ready target item equipped to this character.

setInfos.flavorText: Three items did the Nemesis craft. A candle to light the flame of creation. A book to bestow the knowledge of undying. And a bell that would toll only once in any man's life.

"30 crowns for a crossbow."
THUMP!
"Oh, it's YOU, Tanner." - Basil Nemis

name: Beniss Caolwader
text: You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Elves into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't threaten me, Sulluman. Our people can kill each other later. Neither of us want the Deverenians here now."
I say put an end to this war and bring an end to strife between man and elf. Sir Robert, shall we make it so?

name: Bradley
text: Spend React: After target character rolls a Critical Failure: The target rerolls the die.

setInfos.flavorText: "Whenever I see him I must weep. He never smiles anymore. War, hunger, and hurt have made his a lost generation." - Sir Robert
"Or maybe a paladin! Rescuing damsels, fighting off monsters... yeah, Neus' champion, that's me!"

"...and when I'm a hero, I'm going to have a cool name. Like the ones Deverenian wizards get. Blackraven, or Wolfsilverbane, or Darkmoor or something. And I'm changing my first name to Morgan. Or Xavier..."

name: Captain Dukat
text:
Ranged strikes by your other Free Kingdoms characters gain +3 to the roll.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
Order: Once per turn, discard a spell from your hand: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Then we are agreed. We must seek out one lord to whom all will bow."
"Let the outcasts be your saviors."

name: Darian Windson
text: Order: Once per turn: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm ready to pick up where I left off. For their sake, the Nothrog had best not have forgotten me, but I'll be sure to send them a reminder."
"My father and wife send their regards, Varg."
My sword belonged to my father, killed by the Elves, and my throwing dagger once guarded my poor Baraxton wife. One day, I will find the Nothrog who took her, and I will pay him in steel and blood.
My sword belonged to my father, killed by the Elves, and my throwing dagger once guarded my poor Baraxton wife. One day, I will find the Nothrog who took her, and I will pay him in steel and blood.

name: Darso the Mad
text: React: After Darso is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike: The attacking character must succeed with a perception check (DC 14) or the strike is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "I found him in the kitchens. He'd managed to walk through a hallway full of exploding eyeball runes." - Edouard
"Never heard of him." - Anton Cyldragen

name: Davon Ironthorn
text: Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let the nobles and heroes decide our fate. I still have a job to do."
"Toris Kelt may be our beacon of hope, Sir Robert," the ranger said. "But there's still an army of elves between it and us."

name: Enkida
text:
May not equip a Steed.
Order: Once per turn: Move Enkida forward up to two ranks.
Order: Once per turn: Move Enkida backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's as if she was born on this isle." - Angus Hammerfall
"My people wanted war, but the alliance did not give it to them. For everything, its price."
"So much blood around you, Uther. How can you tell who is bleeding?"

name: Ent Father
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target a rank in your army. Rearrange the positions of all the characters in that rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "We burn. You chose not to fight among us, and yet, we burn..."
They live for centuries, watching patiently over the land they love. But when aroused, their anger is equally unending-and fiercer than nature's own wrath.

name: Frederik Lahr
text: Spend React: Before a character in this rank makes a melee strike roll, give the character +2 ATK for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "My apologies for your treatment, but it is a new day in Baraxton. The tyrant is dead, and his prisoners freed." - Krun
The Elves have burned our temples, but they will never tear down our faith.
The Elves have burned our temples, but they will never tear down our faith.

name: Homunculus
text: Characters adjacent to Homunculus have +5 Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Master sends word. He forge crown for king."
Anton smiled down at the little creature, pleased with his creation. "C'mon, little friend," he smiled. "We've got work to do."

name: Well Supplied
text: Spend Order: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. Each of your characters may equip one revealed item that they may legally equip.

setInfos.flavorText: "An army travels on it's stomach." - Sargok

"I'm deft with a blade all right, I have nothing else. My only worth is the blood I spill, with lives saved through death. I'd trade all my skill for a life of peace, free of such dreadful responsibility."
"This is madness! We have the advantage, and we let the Elves free to regroup and destroy us all over again!"
"We didn't notice the bodies until morning. By then it was too late. Fifteen guardsmen and the heir to Toris Kelt lay dead."

name: Jack Casey
text: Spend Order: Target and move a character in this rank forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hmph. Looks like I'm the first one here."
"Never knew a Deverenian to have such a crush on a man. If she weren't always trying to kill me, I'd be flattered."
"Never knew a Deverenian to have such a crush on a man. If she weren't always trying to kill me, I'd be flattered."

name: Jaqueline Windson
text:
React: Once per turn, after performing a 'Bard only' Spend Order: Ready Jaqueline Windson.
React: Once per turn, before a Free Kingdoms character rolls a die: Add Windson's Skill to the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't forget Nassiral Hate when you look at Krun."

name: Jemman
text: React: After Jemman hits a character with a melee strike: Randomly select an item equipped by the target. The item is discarded.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why are we looking for a king, when Robert is already here?"
My Life ended when the dream of a free Baraxton died. What is left I give to Robert, that he may do more with it than I ever did.

name: Kerro
text: React: After Kerro enters play: Target a character in your 1st rank who has not permanently gained a Hit Point. The target character permanently gains 1 Hit Point.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do what you must. I will do the same." - Uriel
"There is a price to pay for freedom, Uriel. I pray you learn what Eiael did not."
"How very interesting." - Master K'Hallaek

When I was born, the clerics of my father's city claimed I had a destiny to fulfill. I've never waited around long enough to find out what it was. Life is too short to wait for fate to find you; you have to keep moving, and hope it catches up.

When I was born, the clerics of my father's city claimed I had a destiny to fulfill. I've never waited around long enough to find out what it was. Life is too short to wait for fate to find you; you have to keep moving, and hope it catches up.

name: Khalid al-Ashrad
text:
Khalid is a fighter, a rogue and a wizard.
Khalid may not start in play.
Khalid enters play as if he were level 4.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Free Kingdoms need a king, not a general."
Misearis sends its greetings, gentlemen.

name: Kun Hull
text: React: After Kun hits a character with a melee strike, and before wounds are inflicted: That character must discard an item card (opponent's choice) in addition to suffering a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Kun monks of Llyr lead a simple life, except for the biweekly brawl through the farmhouses and docks."
Seeing the Way is not difficult. You simply close your eyes.

name: Leun Moonstone
text: Leun has one Hit Point for each rank that your army occupies.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sir Rhawn does as he feels he must, Terak. That doesn't mean you cannot."
"Some things simply should not be: the Blackthorn duck and his allies chief among them."

name: Marius Dela
text: Order: Discard a card from your hand: Give a target character one of the following until the end of the turn: Defend +3, Magic Resistance +3, Marksmanship +3, Medicine +3, Powerattack +3, Riding +3, Riposte +3, or Scribe +3.

name: Ethereal Drain
text: Order: Target character within two ranks has -2 Levels for performing actions until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Oh will you now? I think not." - Cardinal Creigh
"Power, like all other material things, can be torn away." - Elenitakis, Priest of Blood

name: Martin Treek
text: Spend Order: All characters in the rank behind Martin gain Marksmanship +5 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I riled 'em up good, Logan, so when they burst through the treeline you'd best not miss."
"Like flushing out game for the folks back home. Of course, ducks don't fire back..."
"He makes our bowmen deadlier but takes no credit." - Darian Windson

name: Maxmilian
text:
If your Warlord is killed while Maxmilian is in play, Maxmilian gains the trait Warlord and you do not lose the game.
If Maxmilian is killed while he has the trait Warlord, you lose the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "Neus... what have I done?"
There are no more kings, no senates, and no justice in any land, Robert. Watch your back.
There are no more kings, no senates, and no justice in any land Robert. Watch your back.

name: Parsis Yscar
text:
Parsis is both a fighter and a rogue.
Parsis enters play as if he were level 4.
React: After Parsis equips a Lycanthrope Form: Instead of discarding any items equipped to Parsis, place those items on top of your deck.

name: Pol Deslines
text: Spend React: After Pol Deslines uses the Defend feat: He gains +5 AC until the end of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Toris Kelt is free, but Merrick, Baraxton, Misear, and Andover are still at war. We cannot fight a hundred battles at once."
He left Merrick to help other lands avoid its fate...

name: Rahku Mennanakh
text: Fighters adjacent to Rahku have +2 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "My homeland is lost, yet I remain. I shall endure until all her wounds are repaid in kind."
"A charging legion of Rathemen once made the earth shake. Then they fought the dwarves for the mountain passes, and now a handful of scattered soldiers is all that is left of Rathe." - Keziah
"A charging legion of Rathemen once made the earth shake. Then they fought the dwarves for the mountain passes, and now a handful of scattered soldiers is all that is left of Rathe." - Keziah

name: Reinholt
text: Reinholt may play fighter action cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "Back, unclean things! You are our kin no longer!"
"Neus is a gentle god, but he is also protector of his faithful. You pray for their souls, Frederik; I will give them justice."

name: Rhiveth Yao
text:
Rhiveth loses one strike per attack (your choice) for each item she has equipped.
React: After Rhiveth hits an opposing character with a melee strike, but before wounds are inflicted, reduce the wounds by one: Select and discard an item equipped by the target.

name: Rora Blackmane
text: Spend React: After Rora enters play: Perform a melee strike with a -2 penalty to the strike roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hello, Jack. Been a while."
Make enemies deliberately, and kill them slowly. That's what keeps life interesting.
Make enemies deliberately, and kill them slowly. That's what keeps life interesting.

name: Rown Yscar
text: Rown is +1 level for equipping Lycanthrope Forms.

setInfos.flavorText: "Choose, child Aeshe. Time draws short, and your true family needs you now."
"Find our precious prodigals, Rown, before the Bascarites do." - Yscar the Elder

name: Ruanned Wadreth
text: Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike. If the target is a Monster, the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ah, Denska. If it's not monsters, it's Deverenians."
I've never taken a human life, but these beasts deserve their fate.

name: Quick Shielding
text: React: After target character within two ranks is targeted with a strike: The target gains a bonus to AC equal to this cleric's Level until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Barbaric oaf. Who said that you could kill anyone?" - Naram-Sin
"That's enough. We have what we came for." - Taoth
Ruth whispered a prayer to Ishara. Her quest for allies had come too far to die to a single Nothrog.

name: Ruth Gwenelen
text:
Ruth Gwenelen is both a cleric and a fighter.
Ruth enters play as if she were level 4.
Ruth has +5 AC when she is the only character in her rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Gahid stemmed the tide, for good or for ill.
The road to Ishara's wisdom is hidden beneath the sweep of waves against the sand. The ocean is her heart, and the people are her tears.

name: Selah Cohler
text: Spend React: After a spell targets a card in Selah's army: Make a Magic Resistance check (DC 15 + caster's level). If successful, you may redirect the spell to a legal target in another army.

setInfos.flavorText: "A woman's illusions are her own affair."

name: Serah ni Fhionn
text: Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm not going back to the farm just yet. There's still more to put right."
"Serah has been forged in the fires of Llyr, and the flames have hardened her heart to stone." - Logan Ebonwoulfe
"Serah has been forged in the fires of Llyr, and the flames have hardened her heart to stone." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: ShiLara
text: ShiLara has +2 AC while she is the target of a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "My people stand with the Nothrog. It is... shameful."

The VoTaurr men are hideous beast-headed beings, but their women are more beautiful than sirens. They are worshiped as goddesses, and any man who sees one is doomed to lose his heart forever to her smile.

name: Sir Erik Kaisen
text: Other good characters in this rank gain +3 ATK while performing melee strikes against evil characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Lower your bow, brigand. You should save your arrows for the beasts that pursue me, as we fight them together."
"Cruelty breeds cruelty. I doubt the Elves will accept our mercy, but I cannot justify destroying them without first offering it."
"The wicked never win," Erik proclaimed. Wallence snorted in response.

name: Sir Kwell d'Ilchant
text: React: After Sir Kwell d'Ilchant is killed by an opposing character: Select one Free Kingdoms character of equal or lower level than Kwell in your army. Until the end of the turn, wounds suffered by that character are reduced to zero.

name: Sir Selenoth
text:
May cast level 1 cleric spells.
Spend Order: Remove a wound from an adjacent Free Kingdoms character.

setInfos.flavorText: "He looks away to his homeland every dawn and every dusk. He will not disobey his true master, but must worry over his brothers." - Squire Lucian
"My two finest trainers. They shall follow thy every command, until I come to claim them." - Sir Rhawn

name: Son of the Clouds
text: You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Dwarves into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Dwarves did me a good turn once. It saddens me that they've thrown their lot in with the Emperor."

name: Terak Justicebringer
text:
Terak may cast level 1 and 2 cleric spells.
Other good characters gain +2 AC while in the same rank as Terak.
Good characters gain +3 ATK while adjacent to Terak.

setInfos.flavorText: "Deverenia has set an unerring gaze upon us, and to stand against the Storm, we must first rebuild what the Elves tore away."
He is the last Paladin of Aroch. He will not waver. He will not turn. When his last breath takes his soul to eternity, only then will he cease to believe.

name: Xanthis
text:
May not equip a Steed.
Xanthis can cast level 1 and 2 wizard spells.
Spend Order: Move forward or backward two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Corinth has fallen, but its tower remains for now."
"Feed me no more of your lies, Palethis," Elenitakis snarled. "There are no more centaurs."

name: Quick Strength
text: React: Before target character within two ranks makes a melee strike roll: The target gains a bonus to ATK equal to this cleric's Level until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Free Kingdoms' ferocity is born not of true devotion, but of desperation." - Sister Megaria
"You are proud and strong, but no tribe can stand before the Storm. Return to me." - Huntress Volda
Lightning lanced through Sir Magnus' arm as he struck down the infidel. Glancing behind him, he saw Mnettaor salute him before attacking another trespasser.
Atu stared at the oncoming troops, his silence as threatening as any battle cry.

name: Xerxes
text:
May not equip a Steed.
Spend Order: Move forward or backward two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Free Kingdoms have seen enough of death, Loremaster. Where shall I go now?"
Be content with what you are, and wish not change; do not dread your last day, nor long for it.

name: Amon-Selket
text: After a melee strike kills Amon-Selket, the attacker must immediately succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 10) or suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: One night, the southern skies burst into four pillars of flame, visible as far north as the Kabal lands. At the same time, hundreds of crypts fell open...
Still wrapped in the last vestiges of their past lives, cryptgaunts spread disease and pestilence to those who disturb their rest.

name: Bansidhe
text:
May not attack.
Spend Order: Bansidhe gains +1 level permanently. Bansidhe cannot exceed level 5 using this ability.

setInfos.flavorText: "Who wakes me?" - Rustiq Umbala
"Their screams call the dead back to this world, but at whose behest?" - Master Loth

name: Bek'tor Elshemeer
text: Spend React: After a character performs an action to draw a card or retrieve a card from their deck: Inflict one wound on the character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Damnable, accursed man... Neus cautions against revenge, but there are those that try even the gods' tolerance." - Frederik Lahr
Let me show you the meaning of pain. Get over here!

name: Blackwind
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Target all characters in an adjacent rank: Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or suffer one wound.

name: Cael Ben-Jinn
text: Spend React: After a melee strike, ranged strike, or action targets Cael, move him backward one rank: Cancel the action or strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Bradley tucked the lamp away in his pack. "Never know when I might need a good lantern."
"Your wish, my master?" the djinn said respectfully to the stupefied Nothrog, bowing to cover his smile.

name: Castle Gate
text:
May not attack, equip items or use action cards.
All other characters in a rank with one or more non-stunned Castle Gate have +4 ATK.

name: Cerebrul
text:
May not equip items.
While Cerebrul is in play, stunned characters that move forward suffer 1 wound.

setInfos.flavorText: A centipede crawled through Mourn's outer gates, and past the creature's many eyes. Otho had passed the first test.
"It stands guard in the heart of Mourn, but for whom?" - Toren Yscar

name: Defensive Wall
text:
May not attack, equip items or use action cards.
May not start the game in play.
Any character may perform the action 'Order: Spend characters in your front rank with 3 or more combined levels: Kill the Defensive Wall."

name: Demon of Kvar
text: Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, stun the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "It followed us to this world. If it is here, others will not be far behind. We must prepare." - King Alaric
"I... have found something, yes, Uriel." - Angus Hammerfall
"The beasts have destroyed three caravans this year. If I didn't know better, I should think the blasted things were intelligent, and tying to ruin me." - Maxmilian
"The beasts have destroyed three caravans this year. If I didn't know better, I should think the blasted things were intelligent, and tying to ruin me." - Maxmilian

name: Retribution
text: React: After a target character wounds one of your characters with the same alignment as this character: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 13 + wounded character's Level) or suffer a wound if the caster is evil, or become stunned if the caster is good.

name: Faiza Nyota
text:
May not Attack.
May play one React per ranged strike as if it were a melee strike.
Items and Reacts that increase Faiza's ATK add to her ranged strikes.
Spend Order: Once per turn: Perform a +6 ranged strike, then a +1 ranged strike. These may target characters closer than 2 ranks away.

name: Fireridge Cyclops
text:
Cyclops has -2 to perception checks.
Cyclops may not maneuver.

setInfos.flavorText: Logan looked back. "To the Storm with me..."
The greatest trackers in the Shattered Mountains. Once a Cyclops has your trail, he'll follow you from Baraxton to Sadrasheer, from Myreth to the caves of the dwarves, and he'll never let you go.
The greatest trackers in the Shattered Mountains. Once a cyclops has your trail, he'll follow you from Baraxton to Sadrasheer, from Myreth to the caves of the dwarves, and he'll never let you go.

name: Forge
text: Spend React: After a character performs an action to discard an item in your army: Cancel the action. The item remains equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nope, never heard of anyone called Forge. Sorry."
"You lost your what? Okay, gimmie an hour..."

name: Golgoth
text: Order: Once per game: Attach a 1st level wizard spell to Golgoth. While it is attached, Golgoth can cast the spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand and Golgoth were a wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "They gather in the Abyss, but they do not press upward. They're waiting for something." - Stalwart
"A golgoth took me father. He fought to the end, cuttin' an' screamin' all the way. If I die like that, I'll be content." - Rage

name: Jehricho
text: Spend Order: Target a character up to two ranks away. The target gains the Monster trait until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "'Evil' is such a judgmental word. We create where others destroy."
"Half of the day belongs to the moon. Half of the world should rightfully be ours."

name: Keridwen
text: Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "This land is strange, and life is bountiful. But the monsters are just as deadly and those called The Chosen corrupt everything. This I can not condone."
"I just pick the scraps the brine fiends leave behind. That's not much, but it's an easy life."
"I just pick the scraps the brine fiends leave behind. That's not much, but it's an easy life."
"The barbarian tribes return to Sarakia. Will wonders ever cease?"
"A peacock feather for each of your eyes, Deverenian. Too bad your side couldn't spare more gold..."
"A peacocks feather for each of your eyes, Deverenian. Too bad your side couldn't spare more gold..."

name: Kermess-sh
text: React: Once per turn, after Kermess-sh is targeted with an action (not a melee strike): Cancel the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Validan was used to fighting men and beasts, not some strange mix of both. Alas, poor Validan..." - Vronish Kez
"Even lowly beasts have their uses." - Black Tom

name: Kumbani Apolo
text: Kumbani Apolo may equip two Weapons.

setInfos.flavorText: "If my enemy joins me, is the battle not won? Come, Kerebrus, you must consider other means to your goal."
A truly great warrior can convince his enemy to become his friend. This is of much greater value than simply killing him. Anyone can do that.

name: Lady Tornhawk
text:
If your Warlord is a Mercenary, Lady Tornhawk gains +1 HP.
Lady Tornhawk inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against Monsters.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've never feared Bascaron. Why start now?"
"Through tested by trials of spirit and skill, I will win my way to the ancient Temple of Lore. There I will face the Loremaster and learn the truth - as the Seers have foretold."

name: Lazarus Saul
text: Order: Once per turn: Perform a melee strike targeting a spent character one rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "For enough money, he'll kill anyone." - Black Tom of Corinth
"The Prince of Toris Kelt yet lives? See to it, Saul-and triple the rate." - Black Tom
"The Prince of Toris Kelt yet lives? See to it, Saul-and triple the rate." - Black Tom

name: Take Me
text: React: After another character in your army is targeted by a melee strike: Redirect the strike to this character, ignoring rank restrictions.

setInfos.flavorText: "A king allied us with the Storm's heirs. We need a king to undo this devil's bargain." - Wall
"Look at you lot. The worst the Abyss has to offer? Pah! Cowardly offal that can't even take an old man like me." - Garn Hearthstone
"Peredur prodded the dusty Denskan earth... and then was gone." - Lord Halbrook
It had a thousand fingers, and a thousand hands, and they all reached out to me at once. All the time, the beast was whispering with my dead wife's voice, "Come to me... come to me..."
It had a thousand fingers, and a thousand hands, and they all reached out to me at once. All the time the beast was whispering with my dead wife's voice, "Come to me... come to me..."

name: Naomi of Sarakia
text:
Naomi is both a cleric and a wizard.
Naomi enters play as if she were level 4.
React: Before a character in your army suffers one or more wounds, discard a wizard spell from your hand: Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Free Kingdoms' cast-offs came to Sarakia, but I don't know what they expected to find."
"A few still live there... a very few."
"Hmm... Nehris, I think it is time for the family to meet." - Yscar the Elder

They steal away innocent children and replace them with lycanthrope spawn. Like magpies, the Yscar breed, birth, and abandon, waiting until the children are grown to tell them of their hideous heritage.

name: Nightclaw
text: Nightclaw gains +1 ATK for each other Abyssal in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "We've been finding them all over the World Below, Rac. Perhaps they've found another tunnel." - King Xod
"Some of our number risk much to infiltrate the Bascarites. Those who return have stained their souls for our cause." - Parsis Yscar
"I don't trust creatures with more than four limbs." - Khevanna

name: Predatory Slime
text:
May not equip items.
React: After Predatory Slime targets a stunned character with a melee strike: The strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "It boils up from caverns far below, alive, but barely so. It is the befouled blood of the earth, tainted by the Dragon's carcass." - Angus Hammerfall
"We need to go back. Now." - Angus

name: Ramparts
text:
May not attack, equip items or use action cards.
All other characters in a rank with one or more non-stunned Ramparts have +4 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Phyrgai. New Goldenaxe. The most protected village in Deverenia's fallen once already, Uthanak." - Krun
"Do not confuse want with need, child Aeshe. Those who do lose Yscar's touch, and never regain it." - Rown Yscar
"Another of the Yscar clan. This one has been cursed to wear the scars of his transgressions." - Tanner Trollson
"Another of the Yscar clan. This one has been cursed to wear the scars of his transgressions." - Tanner Trollson

name: Sakarian Giant
text: Sakarian Giant inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't fight them in the city, fool! They'll fall over and hit something!" - Krun
"Given the choice between fighting them or the Nothrog... I'd run." - Basil Nemis
"Given the choice between fighting them or the Nothrog... I'd run." - Basil Nemis

name: Scymmeran
text: Order: Once per turn: Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Infidel Defilers. They shall all drown in lakes of blood." - Yscar the Elder
"Bascarite chass." - Yscar the Elder

name: Consume from Within
text:
Spend React: After target character dies, return it to play in the same location with the same orientation.
While the target remains in play, your Necromancers have the ability "Order: Kill the target: Each character in the rank it was in must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound."
errata:
The granted ability can be used to kill opposing characters.
Your Necromancers can perform the action even if they weren't in play when Consume from Within was performed.

name: Veiled Passing
text: React: After an opposing character pays the cost of a React to one of your character's actions, strikes or movements (not death): Cancel the React.

setInfos.flavorText: Before the new day, they were gone. Those loyal to the fallen Emperor Drac had either fled, or fallen before his heir's power.
"We cannot fight the Deverenians directly, but when have we ever?" - Lord Halbrook

name: Shambling Mound
text:
May not equip items.
The Mound has +5 AC against ranged strikes.
Order: Once per turn: Target a character in an adjacent rank. The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 14) or suffer -4 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Oh, he likes me!" - Jonah the Burglar
"The little ones are so... pretty." - Brindle

name: Shield Wall
text:
Shield Wall may not attack.
Shield Wall and adjacent characters have +10 AC against ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even the Deverenians think Sarakia untameable. The best that can be done is to avoid it, and defend against the raiders it spits forth." - Sethusk
"We stole it from the Nothrog. You should've seen their faces when they saw their god's horns pointed at them for a change." - Johan Halfblood
"We stole it from the Nothrog. You should've seen their faces when they saw their god's horns pointed at them for a change." - Johan Halfblood

name: Skincrawler
text: Order: Spend an Abyssal in the rank in front of this one: Move Skincrawler forward one rank. If Skincrawler is in the 1st rank, he may attack.

name: Sorscha
text: Order: Once per turn: Search your deck for a lower level character with the Monster trait, show it to the other players, then put the Monster on top of your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "So many of our fellows are dead, Mithglyn. It is as though someone led our foes to us." - Master K'Hallaek

name: Squire Orban
text:
Orban has +3 ATK and +2 AC when the Warlord of his army is a good fighter.
React: After your warlord is targeted with a melee strike or action, if your Warlord is a good Fighter and adjacent to Squire Orban: Redirect a melee strike or action targeting your Warlord to Orban.

setInfos.flavorText: "'Tis thee I wish to serve, noble Kerebrus."
"Disillusioned, he searcheth for new illusions." - Alhana Genecourt

name: SS-saurth
text:
SS-saurth may not equip Armor.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a melee strike with an ATK of +3. Weapons equipped by SS-saurth are considered blank for the duration of this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The hissing, flailing thing leapt from the trees and crushed Orazhuk. We are still prey." - Taoth
"He's uglier than Brindle's kiss, and twice as foul, but at least he can fight." - Urg
"He's uglier than Brindle's kiss and twice as foul, but at least he can fight." - Urg

name: Stirges
text:
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, after Stirges perform a melee strike that hit: Stirges perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "These are just birds, right? RIGHT?" - Jonah the Burglar
"A little help, here?" - Kylia Smythe
"I don't have the blood you crave!" - Bradley
"There are some things that all adventurers have to go through, just to call yourself 'experienced'. This'd be one of 'em." - Jack Casey

name: The Quest Beast
text: Immediately after it attacks, the Quest Beast moves to the rank behind your last occupied rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I... see. Thank you, noble beast. I must consider." - Yscar the Elder
"Seventy and nine knights have sought for it, begging the power it is said to command. Only one man knows its name." - Magnus
"Seventy and nine knights have sought for it, begging the power it is said to command. Only one man knows its name." - Magnus

name: Titan
text: React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Titan: Move the target backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "We are the guardians of the ancient accord. You know nothing, mage."
"Stomping, rampaging, mad paragons of truth and justice." - Terak Justicebringer
"Is that a tree he's swinging?!?" - Timothy Windson

name: Trogid
text: React: After Trogid dies: Move a Monster in your army forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "From the highest Rathean peak to the starkest valley in the Sundered Lands, my agents are everywhere." - Sorscha
"My blood for the spawn of the Blood Moon!"

name: Bright Blessings
text:
Seers perform this action without spending.
Spend React: After one of your characters enters play: Attach this card to that character. While attached, the character has the ability "React: Before this character makes a die roll, discard Bright Blessings: Add +10 to the roll."

name: Umberhulk
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Target an opposing ready character in an adjacent rank. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 12) or become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "I found their home warren-a maze of twisty passages, all alike." - Ash
"They burrow through solid stone as fast as you can run. They're to blame for the chasms that the Abyssals crawl up. If we could kill all the umberhulks, we'd be getting somewhere." - Ruthless

name: Yscar the Elder
text:
Order: Once per turn: Retrieve a Lycanthrope Form from your deck, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand.
Order: Once per turn: Discard a Lycanthrope Form equipped by Yscar.

setInfos.flavorText: "The first lesson of prophecy is do not seek to fulfill or escape it. Prophecy does as prophecy will."
"Do not believe Elven lies. The future is as malleable as our flesh..."

name: Zandara
text: Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +3 ranged strikes. Characters hit by these strikes are spent instead of wounded.

setInfos.flavorText: "Zartoch's illusions would not fool Ygraine, except for the real monsters she faces. What else lurks in Denska?"
"They are no more than dogs. They are no match for Zartoch."

name: Zartoch
text:
You may have up to 5 copies of Zartoch in your deck.
React: After Zartoch is killed while he is your Warlord: Target another Zartoch in your army who becomes your Warlord instead.
Order: Spend all Zartochs in your army: Search your deck for a Zartoch, and put him in your hand.

name: 'Mad' Pat Carrik
text: 'Mad' Pat inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText:
"Uh, sir? He's in the line of fire."
"You heard Hellbringer. Keep firing. Maybe a load of shot will clear his head."
"I've never met a Hill Giant that wasn't completely raving mad. Must be something they eat. Like slow Nothrog." - Jack Casey

name: Ac'vuk
text: At end of turn: If Ac'vuk did not inflict any wounds on an opposing character this turn, kill him.

setInfos.flavorText: "Tactics? All the tactics I need are right here!"
"Uthanak's Legion can be recalled to active duty, and they're perfect for the job." - Kzarrik
"Blood lust sustains him. It is his greatest strength and greatest weakness."

name: Axoron
text: If Axoron has a Weapon equipped, he has the ability "Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. Wounds from this strike cannot be reduced or negated."

setInfos.flavorText: "You. That elfskin? Good. Mount up-you're Boar Legion now." - Norn
Ain't never seen an elf I couldn' kill. Fancy their skins for leather, I do.

name: Azh'guttk
text: You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Elves into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Timmuk, I have wonderful news..."
You call these shards of bone, weapons? Surely the Nothrog armies can help equip you in your war with the humans.

name: Ballista Crew
text:
May not attack.
Spend Order: Stun Ballista Crew: Perform a +3 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound and ignores any AC bonus from Armor, Shield, or Helm items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Getting the right kind of wood is the trick, not the blueprint." - Scyrax
"A means to blood the enemy's charge. Works like a charm." - Kul of Clan Tergoth
"That's what I call a 'critical hit'." - Sethusk
"That's what I call a 'critical hit'." - Sethusk

name: Basilisk Charger
text:
May not equip items or attack.
Spend Order: Select a target for a +4 ranged strike, then if possible target a second character in the rank behind the first. If the first strike kills its target, perform a +2 ranged strike against the second target.

name: Calm
text: Spend Order: Target an equal or lower Level character in the front rank of any formation: Spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "You mortals know nothing but strife. You need to know your true enemy, and unite against him!" - Niobe
Ruskin kneeled before his new master. "Do this, and I am yours."
"Iron rusts from disuse, and yea, even so does inaction sap the vigors of the mind." - Bishop Koenraad
"Iron rusts from disuse, and yea, even so does inaction sap the vigors of the mind." - Bishop Koenraad

name: Battering Skull
text: May not equip items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ready when you are, Rraag'nar." - Uthanak
"I love the smell of burning villages in the morning." - Sceth Hellbringer

name: Cahic
text: Spend React: After a character within one rank of Cahic performs an action: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Not all who went north were with the Elite Hate Guard. Some just wanted to kill.
C'mon, flinch!

name: Catapult Crew
text:
Catapult Crew cannot equip items.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that may target a character one additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fire!"
"Fire!"

name: Dakat
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "You're not to touch a knight. Anyone else is game." - Uthanak
Send me against the Deverenians, Uthanak, and my skyfire will cut them down. I hunt them for their pretty clothes... and their pretty screams.
Send me against the Deverenians, Uthanak, and my skyfire will cut them down. I hunt them for their pretty clothes... and their pretty screams.

name: Dogs of Hate
text:
May not equip items.
React: After a character performs a melee strike targeting the Dogs: Stun the attacking character. Any additional melee strikes from this attack are lost.

setInfos.flavorText: "The vicious beasts bred by Hate now serve Krun instead, but even he dreads touching them." - Uthanak
"Going somewhere?" - Rreg'jen
"Is... is that one frothing?" - Naomi of Sarakia
Crack bone! Tear flesh! Death will follow with bloodstained hands, and the gods will see Nothrog strength!
Crack bone! Tear flesh! Death will follow with bloodstained hands, and the gods will see Nothrog strength!

name: Hechun
text: Hechun may equip items as if he were a level 1 fighter.

setInfos.flavorText:
"Fenris does not answer anymore. What has happened, Krun?"
"Be quiet, Hechun!"
Hate will hold Baraxton until the Storm comes or the world ends. Pray for the second.

name: Hrunting
text: React: After Hrunting hits with a melee strike: The strike inflicts an additional wound. Inflict one wound on Hrunting after the strike resolves.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sav'rukk will return to save us. I believe in him."
"Hate is dead!" Hrunting shouted, and Sav'rukk's legion cheered. Few noticed their missing leader.
"They try to stop Sav'rukk. I stop them."

name: Husuk
text: React: After Husuk inflicts a wound on a spent character with a melee strike: Perform another melee strike against that character. This ability may be used any number of times per turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "There was no sign of Taoth, but I may have found Bruu'kaal."
Elves deserve no honor. Like the bones they wear, they are already dead.
Elves deserve no honor. Like the bones they wear, they are already dead.

name: Kang'xi
text: React: After Kang'xi maneuvers: Move any number of Barbarians that were in her previous rank into her new rank, in any order.

setInfos.flavorText: "Twenty-three to go, and a war party on the horizon. Lead on, Uthanak, lead on."
The shaman told me that one hundred souls would buy my way into the afterworld. Only thirty-six to go.

name: Chosen
text: Order: Target a character you control: Until end of turn, while performing a strike against a character of opposite alignment than this cleric, the target gains +4 ATK and the strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Apparently being Chosen can include vastly different concepts." - Kohn
"There's no greater honor than dying to further the Emperor's plans." - Atonir Genecourt

name: Kenia
text: Kenia gains +2 AC while she has a Weapon equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: Kenia clutched the ring tightly as her father dispatched messengers with the news.
"Half-human?" Orochoff snarled. "Call her that yourself. I want to live to see the sun set."
"Half-human?" Orochoff snarled, "Call her that yourself, I want to live to see the sun set."

name: KoVarth
text:
KoVarth can equip a fighter Weapon.
React: Once per turn, after KoVarth spends to cast a spell: Ready KoVarth.

setInfos.flavorText: "Rreg'jen came to the VoTaurr, asking for listeners in the dark and eyes in the shadows."
Minotaurs are born with magic in their souls.

name: Krun
text: Krun inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hate is dead, Sav'rukk, and now we begin our work in earnest."
Steel your hearts and ready shield! To victory, or to death!

name: Kul of Clan Tergoth
text: React: Before Kul makes a melee strike roll, Kul suffers -5 ATK for the strike: The strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "No one's 'steading' me!"
"Aha!" shouted Kul, spying the raiders. "At last, some sport."
"Trust me on this one, little man. It's bloody cold in hell..."

name: Kzarrik
text: You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Deverenians into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "There are fine points of the pact to consider, Krun. If we do not attack a Deverenian, we are not in violation."
The Deverenians offer wealth and steel, neither of which we need. Our armies are fed and our rearguard protected. Yet, Kzarrik accepts their gifts without balking.
"It's almost too easy, watching the Sarakians die one scream at a time."
They die easily, these humans. Easier than beasts, who at least have the sense to hide when the hunter comes.
They die easy, these humans. Easier than beasts, who at least have the sense to hide when the hunter comes.
"What're you pointing at, Grukth? I don't think Taoth's here this time..."
I fight for victory. I fight for blood. I fight for Krun-he will give me both.
I fight for victory. I fight for blood. I fight for Krun-he will give me both.

name: Makusog
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +3 ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: The lumbering beasts charged forth, crushing raiders and soldiers alike underfoot.
"Mount up, boys," Maddawc snarled. "It's time to clear the road."

name: Norn
text:
Norn is a rogue and a wizard.
Norn is -1 level for equipping items.
Spend Order: Target all opposing spent characters in an adjacent rank. Each character must pass a magic save (DC 13, DC 20 if stunned) or suffer a wound.

name: Or'reck
text: Or'reck gains +2 ATK and +2 AC while he is adjacent to two other characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Taoth is on the move. Tell Sav'rukk."
"Savrukk eludes me yet, Lord Hate, though I fear I now know why..." - Taoth

name: Confusion
text: Order: Target character has a penalty to Skill equal to this cleric's current Skill, until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I don't know, doesn't seem that effective to me." - Tyren Ruskin
"When the uninitiated are granted visions they are usually unable to deal with what they see." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Orochoff
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I haven't fallen yet, Lord Krun, and I don't intend to."
Logan smiled. "Don't worry, Serah. One day he'll fall, with all his precious messages. When he does, we'll be a pack of wolves on the forest floor... and he'll never fly again."
Logan smiled. "Don't worry, Serah. One day he'll fall with all his precious messages. When he does we'll be a pack of wolves on the forest floor... and he'll never fly again."

name: Phython
text: Spend Order: Target a character in your army. Inflict a wound on the target character: Remove a wound from a Nothrog in your army.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Elite Hate Guard has joined with Uthanak's Legion, two armies bent on destruction for its own sake."
"Uthanak fights well, but his Bear totem is weakening. Soon he will make a critical error, and Bear will flee. When it does, we sting... and Uthanak will die." - Taoth

name: Pike Wall
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: If Pike Wall is in your 1st rank, target a character in another player's 2nd rank with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Krun speaks of a new, free Baraxton, but the patrols march the streets more often than under Hate." - Jaqueline Windson
"Baraxton's fallen, and this is Hate's message to those who want it back." - Kerebrus

name: Ram'zar
text:
Order: Once per turn: Gain +5 ATK until the end of the turn.
Order: Once per turn: Until the end of the turn, melee strikes by Ram'zar inflict an additional wound.

name: Rrek'tor
text: Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hate dies, Krun takes over, Taoth flees, bandits attack, the slaves go free, and I go to avenge a man I met twice in twenty years. Wonder what tomorrow'll be like."
"Storm, lightning, and thunder... look out!" - Sir Delevere

name: Rren'the
text: Rren'the may equip 2 Weapons.

setInfos.flavorText: "Who did this, Krun? Who killed our lord?"
When we are done with you and your city, human, there will be nothing left except red snow...
When we are done with you and your city, human, there will be nothing left except red snow...

name: Sceth Hellbringer
text:
Sceth inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
Order: Once per turn: Ready a spent (not stunned) character with the Siege trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fire, steel, and death. Mammoth sups well on war tonight."
Come not between the Warmaker and his wraith.

name: Siege Engine Crew
text: Spend Order: Move a Siege character in your army forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "We serve Sceth either as crew or as ammunition."
"Position your troops where you may, you still will not catch me." - Sav'rukk
"This is stupid. Why are we hunting dwarves, when Sav'rukk's the one who would have done this?"
"You! You in the corner! Don't move, I'm gonna come over there an' stick you. It'll hurt more if you make me run."

name: Taoth's Axemen
text: Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Norn?" Taoth laughed. "Does Krun think so little of me that he sends a failure to do what he could not?" - Taoth
"Ten legions of Nothrog fight at Captain Taoth's command. I'd wager the city of Baraxton has three days left. No more." - Darian Windson
"Ten legions of Nothrog fight at Captain Taoth's command. I'd wager the city of Baraxton has three days left. No more." - Darian Windson

name: Courage from Faith
text: Order: Unstun target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "We must stand together. They must not see us falter without our king." - Hope
"Terak sleeps little these days, but he hath lost no keeness of mind or strength of body for it." - Sir Kwell d'Ilchant

"Yaw is brave," she whispered. "But that does not make him less a fool. If he will not see the truth, then I will call upon King Xod to force withdrawal from the surface. We waste our time above while we are slaughtered below."

name: Timmuk
text: Timmuk inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hate is dead. Now to avenge my father's death, and at last, Boar while be whole again."
I say we ally with the Elves. We want blood, they want bone. Perfect.
I say we ally with the Elves. We want blood, they want bone. Perfect.

name: Urg
text: React: Once per turn, after an adjacent character is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike: Urg becomes the target instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "Guard the gates. Not one brigand sets foot in Baraxton, do you understand?" - Kenia
"I serve Takh. He will forge a blade worthy of my father's soul."
"I serve Takh. He will forge a blade worthy of my father's soul."

name: Urukhu
text:
May not start the game in play.
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
Spend React: After you win initiative: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

name: Uthanak
text: Order: Once per turn: Move a Nothrog in your army forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "We've waited for the chance to attack for years, and now is the time. For Hate!"
Raise the black banner, and shed blood for the gods of war!
Raise the black banner, and shed blood for the gods of war!

name: Uthanak's Tower
text:
May not attack, equip items or use action cards.
Adjacent characters gain +5 AC and Riposte +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "The dwarves speak of Nothrogs near Phrygai, but how could they survive the mountains?" - Lady Gracia Ghenis
"Are you sure we're going the right way? This doesn't look like the Battle of Three Vales..."

name: Vareth
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike, then a +2 ranged strike.
React: Once per turn, after Vareth hits with a melee strike or ranged strike: The strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bruu'kaal sought my mistress. He found me."
"Taoth's pet killer. Every throat slit is a devotion to his mistress." - Sethusk

name: Varin
text:
Spend Order: Discard a card: Ready an adjacent non-stunned Siege character.
Spend React: Before an adjacent Siege character makes a die roll: Add +3 to the die roll.

name: Vhakadron
text: Order: Once per turn, if you did not win initiative this turn: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "By the time anyone sounded the alarm, it was too late to save Hate... but a few of his killers had joined him."
"Watch 'im. With 'is last breath, e'll spit on ye." - Axoron

name: Yemat
text: Order: Once per turn: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've seen these 'Chosen' enslaving Nothrog! What do we do about it?"
"Raiders! Raiders from the west!"
Death hangs in the air like an archer's kiss. Though the sun shines above the northern plains, we will send them shadow.

name: Arcane Attack
text:
Fighter and wizard only.
This is a spell.
Spend Order: Target a character one rank away and perform a magic check (DC = target character's AC). If successful, inflict a wound on the target. If this character is a fighter, add his ATK to the magic check roll. If this character is a wizard, you may target up to two ranks away.

name: Cure Serious Wounds
text: Spend Order: Remove all wounds from target character in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Denska's loss cost us much, but not as greatly as would avenging it." - The Free King
"Next time, Dunbar, get out of my way. Robert can take care of himself." - Frederik Lahr
"Next time, Dunbar, get out of the way. Robert can take care of himself." - Frederik Lahr

name: Attrition
text:
May not be played by characters over 3rd level.
Order: Target an opposing non-Warlord character with a printed level 6 or highter. Attach Attrition to this character. While this card is attached, this character gains +4 ATK, an additional strike at +0 ATK, +4 AC, +4 skill and +2 HP. Discard this card when the target character leaves play.

name: Blackwaters Shrine
text:
Warlord only.
Spend React: After a character you control kills an opposing character with a ranged strike: If your characters have killed at least three opposing characters with ranged strikes this turn, attach this card to your Warlord. While this card is attached your Warlord has +8 Skill.
Discard this card if any other player plays an Eastern Territory.

name: Cutpurse
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks and perform a Stealth check (DC = 5 + target's Skill): If successful and this character is a fighter, perform a melee strike against the target. If successful and this character is a rogue, discard an item from the target.

name: Hold the Line
text: Order: Spend all of your characters in your front rank: Until the end of the turn, all characters entering your front rank or brought into your front rank become spent. In addition, until the end of the turn, all characters in your front rank gain +6 AC.

name: Ill-Gotten Gains
text:
Cleric and rogue only.
This is a spell.
React: After an opposing character performs an action to draw or retrieve a card from the deck: Spend the target. If this character is a cleric, the target has -3 AC and -3 ATK until the end of the turn. If this character is a rogue, perform a melee strike against the target.

name: Isadran Library
text:
Warlord only.
Spend React: After a character you control reduces, redirects, or removes a wound: If your characters have reduced, redirected, and/or removed at least three wounds this turn, attach this card to your Warlord. While this card is attached your Warlord has +1 HP. Discard this card if any player plays a Southern Territory.

name: Mystic Strike
text:
Fighter and wizard only.
This is a spell.
React: Before this character makes a melee strike roll: If this character is a fighter, gain an ATK bonus equal to twice this character's level. If this character is a wizard and the strike hits, spend the target.
errata: Erratum 2005/05/06: The React should read "React: Before this character makes a melee strike roll: If this character is a fighter, gain an ATK bonus equal to twice this character's level for this strike."

name: Purity of Light
text:
Cleric and wizard only.
This is a spell.
Order: Target a character of opposite alignment up to two ranks away who must perform a magic save (DC 10 + this character's skill). If unsuccessful and this character is a cleric, stun the target. If unsuccessful and this character is a wizard, inflict one wound on the target.

name: Rough Road
text: Spend React: After an opposing character has moved forward without spending: Spend that character. If that character is already spent, stun that character.

name: Shatteredplains Tomb
text:
Warlord only.
Spend React: After a character you control kills an opposing character with a melee strike: If your characters have killed at least four opposing characters with melee strikes this turn, attach this card to your Warlord. While this card is attached, your Warlord has +5 ATK. Discard this card if any player plays a Western Territory.

name: Holy Infusion
text: React: Before target character becomes stunned: The target becomes spent instead of stunned.
