setInfos.flavorText: "Humility is no virtue, Gunter. You know how the Free King seized power." - Vorgurn
"Of course I can keep them in line, Orban. Just tell me why I should." - Jianna

name: Spiritual Duel
text: Spend Order: Target a character up to two ranks away. This character and then the target each make a will check (DC = other character's AC). If a roll is successful, inflict a wound on the other character. On a Critical Success, also stun the other character. Monks and Mentalists add their ATK to the roll.

name: Temple of the Doomed Sky
text:
Warlord only.
Spend React: After a character you control kills an opposing spent or stunned character: If your characters have killed at least three opposing spent or stunned characters this turn, attach this card to your Warlord. While this card is attached your Warlord has +4 AC. Discard this card if any player plays a Northern Territory.

name: Abundant Step
text:
Monk only.
React: After an opponent has moved a character into or out of his first rank: Move this character forward or backward one rank.
Spend React: After this character is targeted with a melee or ranged strike: The strike is a Critical Failure.

name: Dallen's Aid
text:
Cleric and fighter only.
This is a spell.
React: Before another character in this rank makes a melee strike roll: If this character is a cleric, add half this character's Skill (round down) to the strike. If this character is a fighter, add half this character's ATK (round down) to the strike.

name: Inspired Aim
text:
Cleric and rogue only.
This is a spell.
React: Before this character makes a ranged strike roll: If this character is a cleric and the target is of the opposite alignment, the ranged strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits. If this character is a rogue, perform a Marksmanship check (DC 15). If successful, add this character's level to the ranged strike roll.

name: Isadran Treachery
text:
Cleric and wizard only.
This is a spell.
After this character is targeted with a melee strike: Gain +2 AC for the duration of the strike. If this character is a cleric, gain an additional +2 AC until the end of the turn. If this character is a wizard, perform a melee strike targeting the attacking character after the strike resolves.

name: Shatter Steel
text:
Monk only.
React: Before rolling a melee strike against an opposing character: Discard an item equipped by the opposing character.

setInfos.flavorText: "I warned you that I intended to fight you as an equal." - Duard

name: Thought and Action
text:
Mentalist only.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike with a bonus to the roll equal to this character's skill.
Spend Order: Discard an item equipped by a character up to two ranks away.

name: Ancient Feuds
text:
Mentalist only.
Spend Order: After an opposing character has played a Spend Order or Spend React action card: Cancel the effects of the action card and ready the character.

name: Cavalry Charge
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Order: Spend a Steed equipped by this character: This character performs a Riding check (DC 20). If successful, ready this character. This character may not attack or play a copy of Cavalry Charge again this turn.

name: Mud Slick
text:
Druids may target any character regardless of Level.
Spend Order: Target a lower Level character: Move the target backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Those who do not agree with my methods may return to the filth from which they crawled." - Khilkhameth
"Nature still heeds my call. Like me, it abhors the elves." - Enkida
Etra laughed "Don't need the help of a human say you? What makes you think I am a child of man?"
"It is a long way to your home, monster. Forgive me if I do not wish you good journey." - Valhala Abyssbane
"If the elves cannot stand," Robert said knowingly, "they cannot fight."

name: Divine Inspiration
text:
Cleric and fighter only.
This is a spell.
Order: Make a Charisma check (DC 17): If successful and this character is a cleric, target a character you control who gains +4 ATK and +4 AC until the end of the turn. If successful and this character is a fighter, until the end of the turn characters adjacent to the fighter gain +4 ATK and +4 AC.

name: Energy Arrow
text:
Rogue and wizard only.
This is a spell.
React: After this character chooses the target of a ranged strike: Make a Marksmanship check (DC 20). If successful and this character is a rogue, the target is considered stunned for the duration of the ranged strike (overriding other card effects). If successful and this character is a wizard, spend the target.

name: Flawless Motion
text:
Monk only.
React: After any character has performed an Order: This character attacks (spending as usual).

setInfos.flavorText: "My people have dwelled in this Storm-forsaken deathtrap for too long. Our patience is at its end." - Duard

name: Healing Meditation
text:
Monk or Mentalist only.
Spend Order: Remove all wounds from this character. You may immediately perform another Order.

name: Infinity's End
text:
React: After a character uses an ability or action card that the character has already used this turn: The character suffers 2 wounds.
React: After an opposing character performs an action to draw or retrieve a card from the deck: Target the character's controller. If the player has fewer than 10 cards in his deck, discard the deck.
errata: May be used if a character attacks twice as stated in the rules. However, if either attack is generated from another source (i.e. Bull Rush, Ahdi's react), Infinity's End may not be played. [Nick Simmonds, 2005/04/11]

name: Timeless Body
text:
Monk or Mentalist only.
Spend Order: Stun this character: If you have no cards in your hand, this turn ends immediately.

setInfos.flavorText: "The ritual's completion changed all at hand forever, bestowing gifts of the mind." - Will

name: Unstoppable
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Before this character inflicts wounds with a melee strike: The wounds may not be reduced or redirected.
React: Before this character moves forward: Opposing characters may not React to the move or to the entering of a new rank.

name: Negotiated Surrender
text:
Warlord only.
If your opponents have no cards in their decks and your total number of Monks and Mentalists in your front rank exceeds the number of characters in each opposing front rank, you win the game.

name: Perfect Self
text:
Monk or Mentalist only.
Order: Until the end of the next turn, this character may not be targeted with melee strikes by a character without a Weapon of level 8 or higher equipped, and may not be targeted with ranged strikes by a character without a Bow or level 8 or higher equipped.

name: Halt
text: Spend React: After a character within one rank is targeted with a melee strike: Cancel the strike.

name: Atone for Your Sins
text: React: Before target character within one rank suffers wounds, this character suffers one wound: Reduce the wounds being suffered by the target by one. At end of turn, remove one wound from this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "The needs of the many, my lords. You will follow me." - The Free King
"One man's sacrilege is another man's piety." - Corbas

name: Repel
text: Spend Order: Target all opposing characters within one rank of opposite alignment and equal or lower level. Move all targets back one rank, in any order.

name: Deathly Fatigue
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, any character that becomes ready due to its controller's card effects suffers one wound.

name: Vae Victus
text: Spend Order: All stunned characters suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "The VoTaurr were all but spent from the battles when a new army marched upon them. Though the VoTaurr turned back the Dwarves, the effort itself slew nearly as many soldiers as did the Dwarves."

name: Endless Bloodshed
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all fighters in play have the ability: "Order: Once per turn, stun this character: Perform an attack without spending."

name: Ranged Ambush
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all of your fighters and rogues in your second rank with an ability that generates a ranged strike have the ability: "Spend Order: After an opposing character moves into his or her army's front rank: Perform a +X ranged strike targeting that character. X equals this character's level."

name: Isadran Assault
text: Spend Order: Move all of your ready rogues in your second rank forward one rank, in any order.

setInfos.flavorText: "Knowledge and secrecy are all-important. Assassins must not merely be silent, they must be scholars as well." - Baruuk

name: Vantage Point
text:
Non-Warlord only.
Order: Until the end of the turn, this rogue may not be targeted by actions or strikes. This character may not perform any actions until the end of the turn. If this character is a Scout, he may still perform actions that produce ranged strikes.

name: Cornering the Mark
text: Order: Target an opposing stunned character in an opponent's front rank, up to two ranks away. Move this rogue to your front rank and perform a melee strike against the target. If the strike hits, you may immediately perform another Order.

name: A Quick Death
text:
May only be played by a rogue in another player's formation.
React: After this character wounds a spent character with a melee strike: Kill the target of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Deverenians found the bodies of several Free Kingdoms soldiers, each slain where they stood." - The Loremaster

name: Easy Target
text: Order: Perform a melee strike against target stunned character within 1 rank that inflicts X additional wounds, where X is this rogue's level.

setInfos.flavorText: "You made a mistake, running so far ahead of your brethren." - Acanothropis
"The Narawati believed their homelands impervious to assault, but the VoTaurr knew better." - Vronish Kez

name: Phantasmal Killer
text: Spend Order: Target a character in a front rank: Succeed with a Skill check (DC = target's AC) to inflict a wound on the target. If this wizard is an Illusionist, the target must succeed with a fear save (DC 19) or suffer a wound.
errata: Forcing the target to make a save does not depend on whether the acting wizard made his skill check.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your fears, or mine...?" - Morghen
"What you can't see can kill you." - Coreos Bodach

name: For the Fallen
text: Order: Target character you control has +1 ATK and +1 AC for each character card currently in your discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: Only the Drac family mourned their patriarch's death, for with him died their honor.
"The Emperor wishes to rule, and that is why we will win. Even he cannot reign over the dead." - Lord Halbrook

name: Paying the Price
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: After killing an opposing character with a melee strike: Perform another melee strike with the same base ATK targeting an opposing spent character. If this character is a fighter, add +5 to the strike. If this character is a rogue, the strike inflicts an extra wound.

name: Arcane Coordination
text: Spend React: After a wizard in your army targets another character with a spell producing a ranged strike or DC check: Increase the bonus of the ranged strike or target of the DC check by this character's level.

name: Flesh and Bone
text: Spend React: After a stunned character falls forward: Discard all cards in the character's controller's hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "The nimbics are everything an elf craves and fears. They are greater than us in nearly every way, but for a mere decade of life." - Ichaerus

name: Plague Rot
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, after any character performs a Spend Order or Spend React, that character suffers one wound. Until the end of the turn, all clerics have the ability: "React: When Plague Rot inflicts a wound on a character in this army, spend this cleric: Reduce the wounds to zero."

name: Abd al-Hakiim
text: Spend Order: Target an item in an adjacent rank and perform a Stealth check (DC = 15 + level of the item). If successful, discard the item.

name: Ibn al-Xuffasch
text: Order: Once per turn: Target a character in this or an adjacent rank. The target character's alignment is changed to the opposite of its current alignment until the end of the turn.

name: Regina Tremayne
text: Order: Spend a Weapon equipped by Regina: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the Weapon's ATK bonus (minimum +0).

setInfos.flavorText: Try not to bleed all over the shipment.

name: Elena
text: Spend Order: Target an opposing lower-level character in an adjacent rank. Inflict a number of wounds on the target equal to the number of cards in target's controller's hand minus 4.

name: Halo of Secrets
text:
May not perform actions other than the following:
Spend React: After a Deverenian is targeted by an action (not a melee strike): Cancel the action.

name: Deverenian Scout
text: If any opposing Warlord is a cleric or wizard, Deverenian Scout has +2 HP and Stealth +10.

name: Hold Monster
text: Order: Stun target non-Warlord Monster, Siege, Stormwraith, Lycanthrope, Gargoyle or Undead within three ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "No, it won't hold forewer. But it will hold long enough. Tell me, demon, where is your master?" - Allisara
"What have you done with Zeal?" - Gnorrow Yaw

name: Dallen Stormlost
text:
Dallen is both a cleric and a fighter.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand: Remove one wound from Dallen.
Order: Once per turn: Choose an opposing player who must shuffle his hand into his deck and draw 4 cards.
errata: The opposing player cannot be prevented from drawing the four cards by any card effect, since you are the one forcing them to draw.

name: Lady Eryne
text: Spend Order: Target a character within one rank. The target must succeed with a fear save (DC 10 + Lady Eryne's skill) or be moved back two ranks.

name: Sir Edgar Ghenis
text: React: Once per turn, target an opposing character after he enters or moves to an adjacent rank: Reveal your hand to your opponents. If you do not have any character cards in your hand, Sir Edget may perform a melee strike against the target.

name: Castus the Burning
text: Castus inflicts an additional wound with Fire spells.

setInfos.flavorText: "These thralls have been bred to serve. They merely require worthier masters, and who better than we? Perhaps we should entertain this assassin's offer..."
Hail to thee, Baruuk. I bring thee thy new orders...

name: Duard
text: React: Once per turn, before Duard rolls a melee strike: If Duard hits, the strike inflicts a number of wounds equal to the number of cards in the target's controller's hand.

name: Watchful
text: React: Once per turn, after an adjacent Dwarf suffers a wound: Ready Watchful.

setInfos.flavorText: We survived Ironhall only to find new horrors awating us above. Whatever the Deverenians had done to us marked us forever.

name: Talon
text: React: After Talon wounds another character with a melee strike, kill Talon: Inflict an additional wound on the target of the melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Something happened after Ironhall fell. The caves opened up to the World Above.

name: Will
text: Spend Order: Target up to two opposing characters up to two ranks away. Each target must succeed with a Will save (DC 11) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: Use power wisely, or not at all. A loss to greed is a loss to the Abyss.

name: Devotion
text: React: After a Dwarf one rank ahead of Devotion is killed, causing an illegal rank: Move Devotion forward one rank before correcting the illegal rank.

name: Hymn
text: Spend React: After one of your level 1 Dwarves is targeted with a melee strike: All of your level 1 Dwarves gain +2 ATK and +2 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Holy Energy
text: Spend Order: Ready target spent character within one rank. If that character has already performed an attack this turn, it may not perform an attack until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come home, Timothy, to your father Jorel and I. You are too young, and I am too old to see you die." - Mara Windson
"Come home, Timothy, to your father Jorel and I. You are too young, and I am too old to see you die." - Mara Windson

name: Thatch
text: Thatch inflicts an additional wound when he hits with a melee strike if the target's controller does not have any cards in his hand, or has not played a card from his hand this turn.

name: Door to the World
text:
May not perform actions other than the following:
Spend React: After one or more wounds are inflicted on a Dwarf: Reduce the number of wounds by one.

name: Suffering
text:
Spend Order: Inflict a wound on Suffering: Remove one wound from an adjacent character.
Spend Order: Remove one wound from Suffering.

name: Chaos
text: React: After one of your Dwarf Barbarians is killed: Move Chaos forward one rank. You may use this ability while Chaos is stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: Whatever called us here changed us. We are not as we once were.

name: Black Sand Gargoyle
text:
May not equip items.
You must have a cleric in your army to bring Black Sand Gargoyle into play.
Opposing characters in the same rank as Black Sand Gargoyle have -5 ATK, -5 AC, and -5 Skill.

name: Ahdi Akkhar
text:
Your Barbarian Dwarves have Powerattack +10.
React: Once per turn, after an attack in which one of your Dwarves kills an opposing character: One of your Barbarians performs an attack (spending as normal).

name: Yarr
text: React: Immediately before Yarr is killed by an opponent's melee strike or action, target another player: Draw and discard the top 2 cards of that player's deck.

setInfos.flavorText: There is a price in every death, Deverenian, and you bartered yourself poorly.

name: Ciane
text: React: Before Ciane makes a melee strike roll against a spent character: Ciane gains +5 ATK for the strike and the strike inflicts an additional wound. Remove Ciane from the game after the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Try as she might, Thalaasa could not fathom the diminutive creature's suicidal bravery.

name: Hippal
text: Ranged strikes performed by characters in this rank get +2 to the die roll.

name: Esopa
text: React: Once per turn, after Esopa rolls a die: Reroll the die.

setInfos.flavorText: We lost little this day, and gained much indeed... Tell me, did the Deverenians' victory' grace them half as well?

name: Divine Fury
text: Spend React: After a target opposing character kills one of your characters: All characters have -4 AC (-8 if the caster is a Cantor) while in the same rank as the target until end of turn. (This includes the target.)

name: Loravon
text: Spend Order: Kill Loravon: Target all characters in an adjacent rank. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 12) or suffer one wound.

name: Qadlin
text: Order: Discard a card from your hand: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Saunginel's agent did not trust the Dominar's advice. He cares nothing for the temples, only for conscripting the people of the desert.

name: Wyrian's Blood
text:
May not perform actions other than the following:
Spend React: After an Elf is killed: Shuffle that Elf back into the deck instead of sending it to the discard pile.

name: Xiola
text: Spend Order: Target all items equipped by a stunned character in an adjacent rank: The items are discarded.

setInfos.flavorText: Saunginel's undead marched side-by-side with our nimbic troops, a small favor from Ichaerus to the necromancer.

name: Jianna
text: Spend React: After another player brings a character into play, if that player has brought 2 or more characters into play this turn: Until the end of the turn, all characters enter play spent.

name: Quilian Adinerach
text: Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand: Retrieve a 1st level wizard spell from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand.

name: Tarrell Adinerach
text: React: Before Tarrell casts a spell: Increase his level for casting the spell by 1. After the spell resolves, inflict one wound on Tarrell.

setInfos.flavorText: The nimbics are the results of vile Wyrian experiments. They are part elf, and part... something greater.

name: Raziel
text:
While Raziel is in play your characters may not perform actions to draw cards.
Order: Discard a card and target a player: Discard a random card from the target's hand.
Spend Order: Once per turn, target an opposing non-Warlord character: Until the end of the turn, the target's text box is considered blank.

name: Badu Lutalo
text: React: After an opponent targets Badu with a melee or ranged strike: Roll a die. If this roll is higher than Badu's printed AC, Badu's AC is raised to the roll for the duration of the strike.

name: Kun Tzin
text: React: Once per turn, after Kun Tzin performs a successful melee strike: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Llyr, lend Narawat aid, that the desert people might join the Free Kingdoms." - Vronish Kez

name: Forewarning
text:
Seers perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Choose an opposing player: That player must reveal his hand. Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sjonegaard envisioned the future and our return to the surface." - Avinoam Blightlifter
A sudden feeling of fear passed through Gnorrow Yaw like a wave. His expression changed to one of alarm. "My King is in danger..."

name: Shomari Jawara
text: Shomari may not target good characters with melee or ranged strikes. Good characters of equal or lower level may not target Shomari with melee or ranged strikes.

name: Kato Lembua
text: React: After Kato kills an opposing character with a melee strike, Kato gains +3 ATK until the end of the turn.

name: Ananasia Yscar
text: Order: Equip the Spider Form, ignoring level requirements.

setInfos.flavorText: "The coming battle cannot end but with all invaders retreating, lest our war on Bascaron be all the harsher for it." - Yscar the Elder

name: Callenor Tzin
text: Monks adjacent to Callenor gain +2 ATK and +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: When Vronish Kez heard of the armies marching to the desert, he gave Baqbou troops like myself to fight off the attackers.

name: Chioke Addo
text: Order: If your Warlord is Free Kingdoms, perform a teleportation check (DC 15). If successful, move Chioke forward any number of ranks. Otherwise, Chioke is killed.

name: Oasis Shrine
text:
May not perform actions other than the following:
Spend React: After a Free Kingdoms character performs the last melee strike during an attack: That character performs a melee strike.

name: Fatima
text: Order: Kill Fatima: Kill a lower-level non-Warlord Mentalist or Monk up to 3 ranks away.

setInfos.flavorText: I always warn them not to fall in love. They never listen.

name: Okpara Lembua
text:
Okpara may remain spent during the ready phase.
Spend Order: If your Warlord is Free Kingdoms: While Okpara remains spent (not stunned) and in play, your hand size is increased by 1.

name: Seraphina Foluke
text: Spend React: After a player declares a pass that ends the turn: If you have exactly five cards in hand, draw 2 cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "A cousin to Sanaa's fundisi, Seraphina serves the goddess less by worship than by insipiration." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Kedric
text:
May use level 1, 2, and 3 fighter actions.
React: After an opposing character performs an action to draw a card: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "A lonely wonderer from the north, and a great pupil of the haval-lahn." - Baqbou Umbala

setInfos.flavorText: "His magic is foul, strange... and wondrous." - Gnorrow Yaw

name: Keep Up the Pace
text: React: After this fighter enters play: Move forward one rank, if possible. If this fighter is a Ranger, he may perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "There's no time for respite in warfare," Grudurk explained to the goblins, "so any that can't keep up the pace are gonna die. Like our Deverenian friend here..."
"Denska will not sate the Deverenians. They will destroy us all in their Emperor's name." - Sir Lucian
"Phrygai is besieged! I must warn Yaw!" - Squire Parthus

name: Byaal Kadapati
text:
All Gargoyles in play have the ability: "Spend Order: Target another Gargoyle who gains a bonus to its ATK and AC until the end of the turn equal to this character's ATK."
Spend Order: Put up to three Gargoyles into play from your hand following the normal rules for putting characters into play.

name: Healer
text: Spend Order: Target and spend a character in your army to remove one wound from the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Chaim left the Seers in a fit of madness and despair, your eminence." The Hethrhod sighed. "I fear for him... and us."

name: Honor
text: React: After a character in your army suffers one or more wounds, Honor gains +1 ATK and +1 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: After the battle and against orders, Honor returned to Ironhall's ruin. "You will be remembered, Pillar. You will be remembered, Boulder..."

name: Shame
text: React: After Shame is put into play you may search your deck for a level 1 Dwarf character and put it into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "There is no excuse, my king. I was not strong enough, and Ironhall died for it."

name: Adoramus Te
text:
Adoramus Te is both a cleric and a wizard.
Adoramus Te enters play as if he were level 5.
Order: Discard a card from your hand to give Adoramus Te +1 level until the end of the turn.

name: Avatar of Spirit
text: Order: Kill the Avatar to target up to three characters in an adjacent rank. Inflict one wound on each target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Djarat sides with the Elves? How can this be?" - Baqbou Umbala, Shaken Faith Part V

name: Veleshan
text: Spend React: After Veleshan enters play, make a skill check (DC 11). If successful, he may target one character in your opponent's first rank who suffers one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: The Elements hunger. Appease them, and live forever.

name: Avatar of Bone
text:
Avatar of Bone has an ATK bonus equal to the number of character cards in your discard pile.
Order: Kill one of your characters in this rank to remove all wounds from the Avatar.

name: Geltran
text: React: After Geltran is targeted with a melee strike, if he is spent, you may take one character card from your discard pile and add it to your hand. This ability may be performed while stunned.
errata: Erratum 2003/10/17: His React should read "React: After Geltran is targeted with an opposing character's melee strike, if he is spent, you may take one character card from your discard pile and add it to your hand."

name: Rafkin
text:
Spend Order: Ready an Elf or Free Kingdoms fighter of up to 4th level.
Spend Order: Target an Elf or Free Kingdoms fighter in your army. Give that fighter +3 ATK and +3 AC (+5 ATK and +5 AC for a Paladin) until the end of the turn.

name: Bloodthirsty
text: React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that killed an opposing character: This fighter performs a melee strike with an ATK equal to the previous strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "One can be battle-crazed and still retain his senses, with the correct training. This is what separates us from barbarians." - Dar'rak
"The only way to bathe." - Hrunting
"The only way to bathe." - Hrunting
"The Free King is a liar and a thief, but better him than the Nothrog." - Gunter
"Wherever these dwarves came from, we will send them back. In pieces." - Uthanak
"Wherever these dwarves came from, we will send them back. In pieces." - Uthanak

name: Llyr Irregulars
text: Spend React: When you have an illegal rank due to a character being killed, retrieve another Llyr Irregulars from your deck and put into play it in your first rank.

name: Moropha
text:
Morophus' skill equals the number of Druids and Rangers in play.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: The arrow flew from nowhere, and bit deep into her side. She would be the only one to survive the Battle of the Wounded Lady.

name: Raylor Magicbane
text:
Raylor may play wizard spells up to 2nd level.
If Raylor is your Warlord, your Critical Failures are considered Critical Successes and all of your other Free Kingdoms characters have +4 Skill.

name: Qultan the Student
text: Spend React: After another of your characters has completely resolved the playing of a wizard spell, you may play that spell again with Qultan as the one playing the spell if Qultan could legally play the spell while unspent.

name: Andlewick
text: Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand to perform an attack without spending. These strikes may only target stunned characters.

name: Avatar of Amoudosi
text: Order: Once per turn, remove up to 2 wounds from the Avatar.

setInfos.flavorText: "I call upon Amoudosi to fight for Misearis and the Free Kingdoms!" Baqbou Umbala, Shattered Faith Part I

name: Blood Hound
text:
May not equip items.
React: After Blood Hound inflicts one or more wounds on another character, that character may not ready during the next Ready Phase.

name: Children of Yscar
text: If Children of Yscar is in your discard pile, you may spend a character in your army as an Order to put the Children of Yscar into your hand.
errata: Erratum 2003/10/17: Its ability should read "If Children of Yscar is in your discard pile, you may spend a character of higher level in your army as an Order to put the Children of Yscar into your hand."

setInfos.flavorText: "Unnatural mockeries of Amoudasi's pure, true flame." - Azamereth Flamekeeper

name: Gallows Fiend
text: Spend Order: Target a spent or stunned adjacent character of 4th level or less. The target becomes ready, but may not perform an attack until next turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Servitude is its own price." - Lady Bhaine
Loner crept past the sleeping beast. The glint of metal shone brightly in the icy lair. "My Lady," he whispered to himself, "I have found it."

name: Bull Rush
text: Spend Order: Move this fighter forward one rank. If this fighter is now in your front rank and he is not stunned, he may perform an attack without spending. Barbarians gain +3 ATK for the duration of the attack.

setInfos.flavorText: "You were a fool to come here, elf." - Krenthor Gouge
"You were a fool to come here, elf." - Krenthor Gouge
"I've had enough of politics. I want blood!" - Uther Killer-of-Bears
"Baraxton's walls stood for centuries. They've withstood Deverenian treachery and Elven magic. Yet simple Nothrog brutality made them fall." - Husuk

name: Kaballite Tower
text:
May not perform Actions.
Wizards adjacent to one or more Kaballite Towers gain the ability: "React: Once per turn, after this wizard spends to play a spell, ready the wizard."

name: Kasugoan
text:
Kasugoan's alignment is the same as your Warlord's alignment.
React: Once per turn, after a character in your army is killed with a melee strike, you may immediately attack with a character in your army.

setInfos.flavorText: "You can defy law, but not justice." - Kerebrus

name: Terratorn
text: Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "With Ygraine's constant sieges, they're the only things profiting from Condor Pass." - Lord Halbrook

name: The Temple of Lore
text:
May not start in play or perform actions.
Your characters come into play as though they were one Level higher and have a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to their Level.
Your 4th Level or greater characters have +1 HP.

name: Avatar of Yscar
text: When a Monster of 5th level or less is brought into play, Avatar of Yscar copies the ATK, AC, skill, and hit points of the Monster. The Avatar also gains all of the text and abilities in the Monster's text box while losing any other previous abilities. The Avatar retains this ability and all its printed traits.

name: Avatar of Djarat
text: May equip any number of Weapon items.

setInfos.flavorText: From the ranks of the dead came a huge warrior with many arms, each carrying a great sword. He looked across the field at Amoudosi, but did not waver. - Shaken Faith Part III

name: Death Fog
text:
May not equip items.
When Death Fog enters play, all players may put a character with the Monster or Undead trait into their hands from their discard piles.

setInfos.flavorText: Majeral grinned at his foes' moaning forms. Then he reached for his chains...

name: Maelifcorum
text:
You must spend a wizard to bring Maelifcorum into play.
Maelifcorum may equip up to three Weapons, up to three Shields, up to three Armors, and up to three Helms.

name: Misearean Slaver
text:
Slaver may remain spent during the ready phase.
Spend Order: If this character is in the first rank, target a non-Warlord character of lower level in an opponent's first rank. The target character gains Stealth +5 and is under your control as long as this character remains spent and not stunned.

name: Nactaar
text:
May be targeted with melee strikes regardless of rank.
Spend Order: If Nactaar is in your last occupied rank, perform a melee strike targeting a character in another army's last occupied rank.

name: Victory to the Bold
text:
React: After winning Initiative: Perform an attack (spending as normal).
Spend React: After losing Initiative: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Vyacheslav fell because he was weak. An Signon's Heir wonders of me so, he need only remember your ends." - Elsabet Drac
"You'd think fewer people would be caught unaware by a glowing sword." - Lady Tornhawk

name: Ogre
text: React: After a character in your army is killed, move Ogre forward one rank.

name: Sakarian Bloodknight
text: Sakarian Bloodknight is considered to be of the same faction(s) as your Warlord as well as being a Mercenary.

setInfos.flavorText: "The money's not important. You let them kill, and they're yours for life." - Lady Bhaine

name: Sakarian Manticore
text:
May not equip items.
Sakarian Manticore does not spend when using Spend Order Action cards.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand to perform a +0 ranged strike.

name: Shadowfiend
text:
May not equip items.
React: After Shadowfiend kills a character, attach the top card of your deck face down under Shadowfiend.
React: After Shadowfiend suffers one or more wounds, discard a facedown card attached to Shadowfiend to reduce the wounds suffered to zero.

name: Unakhan
text:
May not equip Weapons.
React: After Unakhan hits with a melee strike, make a Skill check (DC 15). If successful, his next melee strike is a Critical Success. This effect is lost at the end of the turn.

name: Avatar of Sanaa
text: When a character successfully hits the Avatar with a melee strike, the character's player chooses and discards one card from his hand. Players with no cards ignore this effect.

name: Nightslasher
text:
Nightslasher inflicts an additional wound whenever it hits with a melee strike.
Nightslasher may only attack a character in an army if all of the characters in that army's first rank are spent or stunned.

name: Tobrinsk
text: Order: Once per turn, choose another player and name any card type. That player must reveal the top card of his or her deck. If that card is the named card type, it is discarded. If not, the player may add that card to his hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "My name is Tobrinsk. Have you heard of me?"

name: Bershar Nin
text:
Spend Order: Move all of your non-Nothrog characters forward one rank.
Order: Put a lower level character into play without a loyalty penalty.

name: Brown Kratchling
text: React: After Brown Kratchling comes into play, search your deck for a Green Kratchling, show it to the other players and put it in your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Keep an eye on the young one, my pets." - Malrog

name: Gahid's Stand
text: Spend Order: Spend up to one character in each rank behind this character: Perform a +5 melee strike for each character spent in this way. Perform an attack without spending.

setInfos.flavorText: "I am here, Death Knight."

name: Koratcghuk
text:
Koratcghuk inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
While Koratcghuk is in play, all characters coming into play enter play as if they were one level higher.

name: Na'Chuk
text:
You may choose to leave Na'Chuk spent during the Ready phase.
Spend Order: If Na'Chuk is in your front rank, target and spend a character of lower level in an oppoent's front rank. As long as Na'Chuk is in play and spent, the targeted character may not ready.

name: Hurgg
text: Hurgg is +2 levels for using fighter action cards. Hurge gains +3 ATK and an additional strike at +2 (+5 total) if he is involved in a Pit Fight.

setInfos.flavorText: "Impressive, for a grandstander." - Validan

name: Green Kratchling
text: If Green Kratchling is killed, shuffle it into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hordes of the little buggers crawl through the eastern passes, as if some unseen hand directs them." - Kothkah

name: Destin the Sighted
text: Destin may equip and use "Eyestalk" cards as if he were three levels higher and a Reaver. After Destin uses an action on an "Eyestalk" card, the "Eyestalk" card is discarded.

name: The Horror of Merrick
text:
May only equip items with "Eyestalk" in the title.
After the Horror suffers a wound, it must discard a random item with "Eyestalk" in the title.
Spend Order: Target a card with "Eyestalk" in the title in your army and add that card to your hand.

name: Bear
text:
You must spend a Shaman or Uthanak to bring this card into play.
Order: Once per turn, move a character in your army of the same faction as your Warlord forward or backward one rank.

name: Black Moss
text: Order: Spend Black Moss to do 1 wound to this character and 1 wound to a character in an adjacent rank. If Black Moss kills this character, you may choose to equip Black Moss to one of your characters in the same rank.

name: Votaurr Charm
text: Spend Order: If this character is in your army's last occupied rank, he or she may perform a melee strike targeting a character in another army's last occupied rank. Until the end of the turn, all opposing characters may target this character with melee strikes regardless of rank.

name: Flame Steed
text:
This character suffers 1 wound at the end of each turn, unless he or she has a Ring of Fire Resistance equipped.
Spend Order: Move forward or backward up to 3 ranks.
Order: Spend Flame Steed to perform a +5 melee strike.

name: No Prisoners
text: React: After performing a melee strike that killed its target: Perform a melee strike targeting any characters that were adjacent to the original target, with a -3 ATK penalty to each strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Deverenians are too like us to let live. We both would happily reign over kingdoms of dead men." - Laurena Kennet
"In the distant northern forests, Lord Rellion fights off the High Queen's attempts to reclaim Tyraniel." - Castus the Burning

name: Skeltis
text:
Spend Order: Look at an opponent's hand.
Spend Order: Discard Skeltis and name a card. Target a player who must retrieve all copies of that card from his or her deck and discard them.

name: Mammoth
text:
You must spend a Shaman or Sceth Hellbringer to bring this card into play.
Order: Once per turn, ready a spent (not stunned) character with the Siege trait.

name: Mindfire Medallion
text: React: After an opponent draws or removes a card from his deck during the Order Phase, spend the Medallion to force the player to reveal the cards drawn or removed. You may choose to have that player keep those cards, or discard them and draw that many cards from the top of that player's deck.
errata: Erratum 2003/09/15: Its React should read "React: After an opponent draws or removes a card from his deck during the Order Phase using his own card effect, spend the Medallion to force the player to reveal the cards drawn or removed. You may choose to have that player keep those cards, or discard them and draw that many cards from the top of that player's deck."

name: Potion of Blurring
text: Order: Discard the Potion of Blurring. Until the end of the turn, all characters targeting this character with a melee strike or action, must make a Perception check (DC 22). If the check is failed, the action or strike is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "The important thing to remember, Kez, is that I was never here." - Kenia

name: Ring of Fire Resistance
text: Order: Once per turn, until the end of the turn, this character may not be targeted by spells that create ranged strikes or require magic saves.

name: Ring of the Skylords
text: React: After this character suffers one or more wounds, shuffle him or her back into your deck. Discard all cards equipped by and attached to the character.

name: Scarab
text:
You must spend a Shaman or Taoth to bring this card into play.
Ranged strikes performed by this character receive +4 to the die roll. Saves against action cards played by this character have a +3 DC.

name: Stone of Fortune
text: React: Spend the Stone after this character has made a roll to reroll the die.

setInfos.flavorText: "Never seems to work for me." - Zagreb Umbala

name: Cynophontis
text:
You must spend a Shaman or Nassiral Hate to bring this card into play.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a character, show it to the other players and add it to your hand.
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on or remove a wound from, a character of the same faction as your Warlord.

name: Viper
text:
You must spend a Shaman or Sav'rukk to bring this card into play.
All characters in your army of the same faction as your Warlord have the ability: "Spend React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike, move this character forward or backward one rank to cancel it."

name: Sir Willems
text: React: After you make an Initiative roll: If you won, until end of turn Sir Willems gains the fighter class, +3 ATK, +2 AC and an additional melee strike (Base +3) when he attacks. If you lost, until end of turn Sir Willems gains the wizard class, +6 Skill and +1 Level.
errata: If you make multiple initiative rolls in a turn, Sir Willems can react to each. The bonuses and/or extra strikes are cumulative.

name: Primal Rage
text: Order: Suffer one wound: Until end of turn, this character has +5 ATK, and an additional melee strike (Base +1) when he attacks, and if this character is a Barbarian, Monster or Lycanthrope his melee strikes inflict an additional wound.

name: Avatar of Neus
text: +2 Skill  +1 HP

setInfos.flavorText: "Neus teaches that all pain is fleeting. Do your worst, Nothrog. You cannot harm me." - Frederick Lahr

name: Bascarite Necklace
text: Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand to reveal the top five cards of your deck, one at a time. If you reveal a character, stop and bring that character into play if you may legally do so. You may move him or her forward up to two ranks. Discard the other cards drawn.

name: Bracers of Weaponry
text: Order: Discard the Bracers of Weaponry to search your deck for a Weapon item. This cleric equips it, ignoring class restrictions.

name: Soul Gem Tenira
text:
All your characters in your army have +2 skill.
If you have three other Soul Gems in play as well, all characters in your army have an additional +2 skill (+4 total) and this card's ATK and AC bonuses are doubled.

name: Avatar of Albrecht
text: +2 Skill  +1 HP

setInfos.flavorText: "Thy way is the way of faith and charity. Gird thy heart with these, and thy god shall grant thee favor." - Sir Selenoth

name: Banner of Rallying
text: While the Banner is equipped by a character in your first rank, opposing characters must make a fear save DC 13 after moving into their first rank. If the save is failed, move the character back one rank.

name: Giant Strength Potion
text: Order: Discard Giant Strength Potion to perform a +10 melee strike that inflicts an additional wound.

name: Invulnerability Potion
text: Order: Discard Invulnerability Potion to give this character +2 AC and +4 hit points until the end of the turn.

name: Soul Gem Medera
text:
All characters in your army have +1 ATK.
If you have three other Soul Gems in play as well, all characters in your army have an additional +1 ATK (+2 total) and this card's ATK and AC bonuses are doubled.

name: Whip of Despair
text:
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: Once per turn, if this character is in the second rank, ready all characters in the first rank who are 1st or 2nd level and not stunned.

name: Bear's Soul
text: Order: Perform a melee strike. You may shuffle Bear's Soul into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Found in the heart of the greatest warriors." - Shah'syss
"This new totem rewards our slaughter, but always desires more. Suits me." - Krenthor Gouge
Some Denskans fled too late, and found nothrog waiting. It was not a battle, but a slaughter.
"Uthanak no longer sleeps. He doesn't need to, so long as he has people to kill." - Phython

name: Arrow of Slaying
text:
Order: Discard the Arrow of Slaying to make this character's ranged attacks inflict 2 additional wounds against a specific faction until the end of the turn. Roll a die:
1-3 Mercenaries,
4-6 Deverenians,
7-9 Dwarves,
10-12 Elves,
13-15 Free Kingdoms,
16-18 Nothrogs,
19-20 any character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Leave a warning, Mithglyn." - Cear Adinerach

name: Avatar of Fineltour
text: +2 Skill  +1 HP

setInfos.flavorText: As the cell door closed behind Keziah, she thought she heard laughter... but she knew that she didn't hear the lock catch.

name: Soul Gem Yelera
text:
All characters in your army have +1 AC.
If you have three other Soul Gems in play as well, all characters in your army have an additional +1 AC (+2 total) and this card's ATK and AC bonuses are doubled.

name: Cear's Stone
text:
This character may remain spent during the Ready Phase.
Spend Order: Give all of your characters Stealth +5 while this character remains spent.

name: Avatar of Kavara
text: +2 Skill  +1 HP

setInfos.flavorText: "Some call her the goddess of unnecessary explosions, but they are wrong. The explosions are very necessary." - Cassandra the Arcane

name: Chainmail of Loyalty
text:
Good characters only.
React: After a character of the same faction as your Warlord in your army is killed, this character gains +1 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Soren and Zeal warred upon each other... and then the earth fell in on Ironhall." - Word

name: Eyestalk of Will
text:
Reaver only.
React: Spend the Eyestalk before a character up to 3 ranks away makes a save. The DC of the save is increased by twice the number of Eyestalks equipped to this character.

name: Helm of Undying
text:
Necromancer only.
Order: Once per turn, kill a ready character in your army to put a character of equal or lower level from your discard pile into your hand.
Spend Order: Kill a ready character in your army to put a character of equal or lower level from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Reaper's Shadowbox
text:
Illusionist only.
Spend Order: Move any character of equal or lower level in your army to your first rank. That character is discarded at the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "'Tis a charm so lovely that it once enraptured Death himself. No mortal can resist its quaint allure." - Lord Kestrel

name: Ring of Spell Storing
text: Spend Order: Reveal from your hand and attach to this item a wizard spell of 5th level or less. You may discard the attached spell at any time to play it as if it were in your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sometimes Anton forgets to study." - Owen Haadh

name: Alert
text: React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike: This rogue must succeed with a perception check (DC 20) to ready.

setInfos.flavorText: "Slow, Nothrog. Fatally slow. But your death at my Lady of Pain's hands will be slower still." - Freia
"The nothrog raid our forests now, too. Is it cowardice, or some greater plan?" - Laurena Kennet
"Wait. Watch. Learn." - Nehris Yscar
"...but perhaps more is at stake." - Duchess Cassandra of Andover

name: Ring of Spell Turning
text: Spend React: After this character is targeted by a spell from another army, spend the Ring to get any one spell from your deck and add it to your hand, then discard one card from your hand.

name: Soul Gem Kashira
text:
All your characters in your army have Magic Resistance +0.
If you have three other Soul Gems in play as well, all characters in your army have an additional +2 to their Magic Resistance (+2 total) and this card's ATK and AC bonuses are doubled.

name: Quite a Speech
text: React: If this character has Charisma and a character in your army fails a roll (including a Critical Failure), make a Charisma check (DC 15). If successful, the other character may reroll.

name: Dragon's Hoard
text:
React: After this character kills a Dragon with a melee strike or action, search your deck for any item card, show it to your opponents, and add it to your hand. This character is +5 levels for equipping items until the end of the turn.
Spend Order: Draw a card.

name: Friction
text:
Order: Spend a character adjacent to a character of opposite alignment.
Spend Order: Stun a spent good character adjacent to a character of opposite alignment.

setInfos.flavorText: "I don't care who Krun has. If he wants my support, he can match Hate's offer." - Vronish Kez

name: Inspired Leadership
text: Spend React: When your Warlord dies and this character has the Charisma feat, this character makes a Charisma check (DC 20). If the check succeeds, you do not lose the game and this character permanently gains the Warlord trait.

name: Solidarity
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, players may not bring characters into play that are a different faction or alignment from their Warlord.

setInfos.flavorText: "Logan's gone. You can either go off after him or join me. Be quick about it though-we have a city to save." - Adarymy

name: One in a Million
text:
Ranger or Scout only.
React: Before this character targets a ranged strike, he or she makes a Marksmanship check (Dc 30). If successful, this strike may target any character in play, regardless of ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Great shot kid!" - Davon Ironthorn

name: Words of Hope
text: Order: Target a Stunned character within two ranks. This character makes a Charisma check (DC 14). If successful, the target becomes spent.

setInfos.flavorText: The dwarves gathered close to listen to Zeal.

name: Pinned Down
text: React: Play after this character performs a ranged strike to perform a Marksmanship roll. The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC equal to the Marksmanship roll) or be spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Misearean arrows held the refugees down long enough for the Nothrog to reach them." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: One Among Many
text: React: After an opposing melee or ranged strike targets this character: This character has +1 AC for each other character currently in this rank, until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "We have not been idle, Trespass. There's someone you should meet." - Patience
Word darted about the knights legs. They had their orders, just as did he had his.

name: Resuscitation
text: Spend Order: If this character has the Medicine feat, target a character in your discard pile who was killed this turn. This character performs a Medicine check (DC 25). If successful, place the target into your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "On your feet, whelp-die on your own time!" - Rac Ironbone

name: Reversal of Fortune
text: React: Play when this character rolls a '1' on a die roll (unadjusted by card effects). Change the result to a '20'.

setInfos.flavorText: "And what do you want in return, Sir Rhawn?" - Terak Justicebringer

name: Living Blade
text: Spend Order: Target a Weapon in your army. Until the end of the turn, the weapon becomes a classless character in its current rank with 2 HP, 20 AC, +0 Skill, and with level and ATK as printed. The weapon has an additional strike per attack if its level is greater than 5. At the end of the turn, the weapon is reequipped by the same character, if possible, ignoring level requirements (otherwise, it is discarded).

name: Cat's Grace
text: Spend Order: Target a character within one rank. Until the end of the turn, the target may play 1st level rogue actions. If the target is a rogue, he or she gains +2 levels for using actions until the end of the turn.

name: Clerical Blessing
text: Order: All characters in this rank gain +8 skill until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Kavara blesses those who embrace their emotions.

name: Dust Devil
text: React: Play before a character within 3 ranks makes a ranged strike roll to make the roll a Critical Failure. If this cleric is a Druid, the character performing the strike may not perform any more ranged strikes this turn.

name: Healing Choir
text: Order: Spend any number of clerics and Bards in your army. For each character spent, you may remove a wound from a character in your army.

setInfos.flavorText: The Hymn of Athanaes spread peace throughout the city.

name: Inspired
text: Spend Order: Target a character in your army. Give the character the feat of your choice at +5 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "A bard's words can fill the heart and make you believe anything is possible." - Jack Covit

name: A Knight's Commitment
text: Spend React: When your Warlord would be killed with a card effect, he or she is not killed. Kill this fighter.

setInfos.flavorText: Sir Selenoth knelt before Terak. "Mine body shall be broken 'fore thy blood be spilt."

name: An Honor to Die
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, this fighter has the ability: "React: When a character in this rank is targeted with an action or melee strike, this character becomes the new target."

name: Steady Aim
text: Order: Target an item within two ranks: This rogue must succeed with a dexterity check (DC 8 + the item's Level) to destroy the item. If the check fails, the character with the item equipped may perform a melee strike targeting this rogue.

name: Harm Touch
text:
Evil Paladin only.
Order: Attach this card to this character if he or she does not have Harm Touch attached. While this card is attached, this character has the ability: "Order: Once per turn, target a character within one rank. That character must make a magic save (DC 13) or suffer one wound."

name: Know Thine Enemy
text: Order: Target an opposing Warlord. Perform a Tactics check (DC 15 plus the target's skill, DC 5 plus the target's skill if he is the same faction). If successful, the target may not use actions printed on his or her card and equipped items until the end of the turn.

name: Lay Hands
text:
Good Paladin only.
Order: Attach this card to this character if he or she does not have Lay Hands attached. While this card is attached, this character has the ability: "React: Once per turn, when another character in this rank is suffering wounds, reduce the wounds by one."

setInfos.flavorText: "We protect when we can, soothe when we cannot." - Sir Selenloth

name: Skin Like Steel
text: React: When this character is hit by a melee strike, make a Defend check (DC 20). If successful, reduce the wounds to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: "That was your free shot. Now it's my turn."

name: Superior Reach
text: React: Play when this fighter is targeted with a melee strike. If this fighter has a Weapon equipped that is also a Shield, perform a melee strike targetingthe attacker.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dost thou wish to kill me? Come closer..."

name: Try Again, I Dare You
text: React: Play before this character makes a melee strike roll as a result of a Riposte check. If the strike hits, it inflicts an additional wound and you may discard one item equipped by the target (before wounds are inflicted).

name: Black Blood Poison
text: React: Play before this rogue performs a melee strike roll. If the strike roll hits, attach this card to the target. While this card is attached, at the beginning of each turn, this character suffers 2 wounds. Any adjacent cleric or character with the Medicine feat may discard this card as a Spend Order.

name: Hidden Motives
text:
React: Play when an action by this rogue is being canceled. If the rogue succeeds with a Stealth check (DC 15), the action is not canceled.
Order: This rogue gains Stealth +5 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Gahid's armies advance his own designs, now. The Empire never ordered him to enter Myreth." - Isil Loth

name: Judas Root Poison
text: React: Play before this rogue performs a melee strike roll. If the strike roll hits, attach this card to the target. While this card is attached, the character has -10 ATK. Any adjacent cleric or character with the Medicine feat may discard this card as a Spend Order.

name: Midnight Poison
text: React: Play before this rogue performs a melee strike roll. If the strike roll hits, the target must succeed with a poison save (DC 10, DC 20 if the rogue is an Assassin) or die.

setInfos.flavorText: "Obstacles need to be removed. When they are inanimate, you hire laborers. Otherwise, you hire me." - Hobart Olafsson

name: To Fight Another Day
text: React: After this rogue is targeted with a melee strike: If moving backward one rank will not create an illegal rank, cancel the strike and move backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Someone tell me why we keep Muddflek around again?" - Sohadze
"And Uthanak thought it better to stay in the tunnels. Idiot." - De'zicrah
"You cannot defeat Death... but you can chain him." - High Queen Tepheroth
"You cannot defeat Death... but you can chain him." - High Queen Tepheroth

name: Mobility
text: React: Before this rogue makes a melee strike roll: This rogue gains +4 ATK for the strike, and moves backward one rank after the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Leave them no opportunity." - Sohadze
"Getting out of the way is the best defense." - Basil Nemis

name: Spring Up
text: React: When a character readies outside of the readying phase, perform a melee strike against that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Surprise is as much a weapon as any blade." - Lady Tornhawk

name: Reckless Assault
text:
May only be played by characters in an opposing formation.
Order: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Have you ever noticed how their armor is heaviest on the front?"

name: The Favor of Fools
text: React: After this rogue rolls a die, re-roll it if there is a cleric of the same alignment and faction within one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Jonah awoke with a choking cough. "Welcome back," said Baqbou.

name: Fields of Bone
text:
Necromancer only.
Spend Order: All players may take characters of lower level than this wizard from their discard pile and place them into play into their 1st ranks. Players may not retrieve more than one copy of a Unique character, nor more total levels than three times the Necromancer's. Until the end of the turn, these characters have the Undead trait and are evil. At the end of the turn, discard the characters.

name: Improved Invisibility
text:
Illusionists play this as a 2nd level spell.
Spend Order: Attach this card to a character within 2 ranks. While this card is attached, the character gains Stealth +10 and may not be targeted by characters. This effect ends after the character performs a strike or action that targets another character, or the end of the next turn, whichever comes first.

name: Mystic Visions
text:
Druid and Shaman only.
This card is a spell.
Spend Order: Look at the top 10 cards of your deck. Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Trust not your left hand. Trust not your right hand. Trust not your eyes. Betrayal is all around you." - Toren Yscar

name: Power Word Blind
text: React: When this character is targeted with a melee attack, the opponent must make a magic save (DC 17) or attach this card. While this card is attached, this character suffers -10 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: The last thing he saw was the scaled monster with the evil grin...

name: Shadow Walking
text:
Illusionists play this as a 3rd level spell.
Spend Order: Give a character in your army the Astral or Ethereal trait until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I can still access the other realms. Be thankful of that." - Lord Kestrel

name: The Wind at Your Back
text:
Shaman only.
This action may be performed by a stunned character.
Order: Ready this Shaman.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Tansiq draw their power where they may, even if it means killing other elves."

name: Backstab
text: React: Before this rogue makes a melee strike roll: If the target of the strike is spent, this rogue gains +5 ATK for this strike and the strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Betrayal is one of the constant risks of the life, so why should I be above using a little pre-emptive punishment myself?" - Mad Mel
"Why don't they e'er look behind them?" - Talin Tzin
"Too easy. No art to it." - The Lady of Pain
"Too easy. No art to it." - The Lady of Pain
"I'm sure there's a lesson in unwise alliances here somewhere." - Cairbre Netheryn
"Merrick is a lesson to our kind-the Upworlders are not to be trusted." - Trench
"Twenty Elves for every one of us. It's not fighting dirty-it's fighting smart." - Logan Ebonwoulfe
"Twenty Elves for every one of us. It's not fighting dirty - it's fighting smart." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Wave of Pain
text: Spend Order: All non-Undead and non-Siege characters in play must make a Fortitude save (DC 10) or become spent. Stunned characters are unaffected.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ichaerus shall bow before me yet!" - Tepheroth

name: Calling the Fury
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters must succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 13, DC 20 if this wizard is a Shaman) after they maneuver or suffer 1 wound.

name: Charismatic Influence
text:
Good characters only.
Paladins play this card without spending.
Spend Order: This fighter makes a Charisma check (DC 20). If successful, bring a lower-level character into play from your hand, adjacent to this fighter.

name: Master Caremus
text:
Caremus is both a fighter and a rogue.
Caremus enters play as if he were a 4th level character.
Caremus may equip 2 Weapons.
Caremus gains +2 AC for every Weapon he has equipped.

name: Sir Galvedir
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, Sir Galvedir does not count towards illegal ranks while he has a Steed equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "E'en a Denskan can earn his place in an Order, though he's naught but a fool to try." - Ygraine

name: Ramah the Cruel
text: Order: Once per turn, kill another character in your army to draw a card. Ramah may immediately cast a spell Order (or Spend Order) that he is capable of casting.

setInfos.flavorText: "Slayer's greatest student-the only man to betray him and live-mine." - Azhraan the Foul

name: N'totk
text: N'totk inflicts an additional wound on melee strikes against Nothrogs.

setInfos.flavorText: "Uthanak may preach strength, but these dwarves know what strength truly is."

name: Mirth
text: When Mirth dies, all Dwarves in your army suffer -1 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "He reminds us that there is more to life than just war." - Garn Hearthstone

name: Anneal
text: React: When Anneal removes a wound with a Medicine check, give the target a +2 ATK permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "We are beset on all sides by evil, but we shall be strong."

name: Furore
text:
Furore may not equip Armor or Shield items.
Furore may equip 2 Weapons.

setInfos.flavorText: He remembers nothing of his past, before Ter-Soth came.

name: Leap of the Clouds
text:
Order: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike: This rogue gains +4 AC for the duration of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Impressive athletics, yes, but the magic boots help a lot." - Talin Tzin
"Have I mentioned how much I hate this?" - Sipho Hamisi
"Have I mentioned how much I hate this?" - Sipho Hamisi
Zagreb held his breath as the nothrogs roared, then he jumped...
"Someone was waiting for us in there. Daedelia... didn't make it." - Hassimal
"Mmn. A runner. Fire when ready." - Sceth Hellbringer

name: Durick Havard
text: React: After Durick is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike, he makes a Defend check (DC 22) if he is the only character in this rank. If the check is successful, cancel the strike.

name: Soren Nihil
text:
Soren can cast 1st and 2nd level cleric spells.
Dwarves in Soren's army are evil.
React: When a wound is removed from Soren, he gains +2 ATK permanently.
errata: May only react once to a single 'healing' effect, regardless of whether one or all wounds are removed.

setInfos.flavorText: "You are Zeal no more." - Ter-Soth

name: Scorch
text:
Spend Order: Inflict a wound on a Siege character in this rank. This is a Stealth action.
Spend Order: Inflict a wound on all Siege characters in this rank.

name: Rubble
text: Rubble's ranged strike rolls receive +1 for each Elemental and Gargoyle in your army. Rubble may cast 'Gargoyle only' spells as if he were a level 5 cleric.

setInfos.flavorText: "The seers placed him with the wizards, yet I do not believe that was his true calling." - Gnorrow Yaw

name: Havellin Tansiq
text: Order: If Havellin Tansiq is your Warlord, kill an Elf in your army to give an Elf in your army +1 HP permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "I am not a butcher. I am a murderer. Know the difference, and know House Tansiq."

name: Nanji
text: Order: Discard a Weapon attached to Nanji to perform a +5 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "I may not love Lord Netheryn, but he at least will not exterminate the humans. Without them, we die."

name: Zachary Blaise
text:
If Zachary is the only character in this rank, he is killed.
Spend Order: Inflict a wound on a good character in an adjacent rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "He betrayed his family and his lands. Now the only thing he has to lose is his life."

name: Amberlyn
text: Order: Discard a card from your hand to give an Elf in your army +3 AC or +3 ATK until the end of the turn.

name: Andel
text: React: When a character in your army is killed, Andel is +1 level for casting spells until the end of the turn.
errata: Erratum 2003/10/17: His React should read "React: When a character in your army is killed by an opposing character's action, Andel is +1 level for casting spells until the end of the turn."

setInfos.flavorText: Tapping into the decaying flesh, Andel's power grew as his companions died.

name: Thekem
text: React: Once per turn, after Thekem spends to cast a spell, ready him.

setInfos.flavorText: "Well done, my young apprentice." Ichaerus smiled coldly.

name: Springblade
text: React: After target character falls forward to within one rank of this rogue: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 10 + this rogue's Skill) or suffer a wound and become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is why I let others walk ahead of me." - The Lady of Pain
"Tom set you at each other's throats once. You cannot trust him now." - Trevaine Cartwright

name: Rr'gent
text:
If Rr'gent is in play during the end phase, your hand size is reduced by one.
While Rr'gent is in play, players may not use card effects to draw cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "They fight for freedom. I ask you, does Sav'rukk do any less?"

name: Fredrick Brunner
text: Order: Once per turn, target a player. That player's next Order may not be an attack. You may immediately perform another Order.

setInfos.flavorText: "I patch them up and send them back out. Sometimes I wonder why I bother..."

name: Vronish Kez
text:
Vronish Kez gains +2 ATK, +2 AC, and +2 Skill for each faction other than Free Kingdoms in his army.
React: Once per turn, ignore the loyalty penalty when bringing an evil character into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fools."

name: Hobart Olafsson
text: Spend Order: Search your deck for a card with "Poison" in the title, reveal it, and add it to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Right side - wrong side... I just want the winning side."

name: Stephen Blake
text: Stephen inflicts an additional wound when performing a melee strike against a spent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mercy is a luxury we cannot afford."

name: Benedric
text:
Benedric may not attack.
Order: Perform a melee strike. Benedric suffers 1 wound after the strike which may not be prevented or reduced.

setInfos.flavorText: "Balian has given his soul; his brother has given his body. I wonder who received more in return?" - Elemere

name: Behemoth
text: React: Once per turn, when a character moves within 1 rank of the Behemoth, inflict 1 wound on the character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let's see if it's friendly." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Ataxian
text:
Ataxian may be in any Warlord's starting formation, regardless of faction.
React: Once per turn, inflict a wound on a stunned character who falls forward.

setInfos.flavorText: "He's as fickle as the winds he calls." - Sir Robert the Vigilant

name: Ararn
text: Spend Order: Search your deck for a Lycanthrope Form or a character with the Lycanthrope trait and put it in your hand. Discard a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "He shows curious insight, for one unmarked." - Yscar the Elder

name: Bourdon
text: Order: Once per turn, roll a die. On an odd number, move Bourdon to any rank in your army.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even they don't seem to know where they'll land." - Keziah

name: Zaina's Treachery
text: React: Before target character makes a melee strike roll targeting this rogue: This rogue may equip any number of items from your hand. Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "I guess you didn't see THAT coming." - Gethseme Steelshard
"Such ignorance, to label skill as treachery." - Scyrax
"Semmeya can be anywhere..."
"These Deverenians think us their allies. The Saladin would be amused."

name: Hagerd Halfkin
text:
May start in the army of a Dwarf or Deverenian Warlord.
Hagerd gains +4 ATK when he targets a Dwarf or Deverenian with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "No, sire. No exile has ever survived for long on the surface." - Poison

name: Moon Fever
text:
When Moon Fever enters play, search your deck for a Lycanthrope Form and attach it to him.
React: When Moon Fever is targeted with a melee strike, the opponent must succeed with a fear save (DC 12) or the strike is canceled.

name: Racine Pendrak
text: Spend Order: Search your deck for a Bow and equip it to Racine.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your crime is forgiven, but Toris Kelt may no longer be your home." - Captain Dukat

name: Angu Mournwater
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters are +1 or -1 level (your choice) for casting spells.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Blood Moon. The Broken Moon. Bascaron. The Mad Father Which Rebirthed Us All."

name: Shraan
text:
You must have a level 4 or higher wizard in your army to bring Shraan into play.
React: After a melee strike targets this character, the attacker suffers one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "He creates nothing, and destroys all he touches." - Cael Ben-Jinn

name: Mason Tallow
text: React: When Mason is suffering wounds from a melee strike or ranged strike, discard a card from your hand to reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Gold is gold, no matter what Kerebrus says."

name: Mangonel
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +0 ranged strikes that cannot receive bonuses to the roll. Stun Mangonel.

setInfos.flavorText: Nothrog ingenuity is a scary sight to behold.

name: Wroth
text: React: Once per turn, when a Nothrog adjacent to Wroth is targeted with a strike, move that Nothrog backward one rank to retarget the strike to Wroth.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's nice to be on the winning side."

name: Sav'rukk
text: If Sav'rukk is your Warlord, all Nothrogs in this army have the ability: "Spend React: When this character is targeted with a melee strike or action, move forward or backward one rank to cancel it."

name: B'haya
text:
May only equip items with "Eyestalk" in the title.
After B'haya suffers a wound, it must discard a random item with "Eyestalk" in the title.
While B'haya is in the 1st rank, players may not bring 1st and 2nd level characters into play.

name: Inquisitor Tamas
text: Spend React: After one of your higher Level Deverenians kills an opposing character, target an opposing equal or lower Level character: The target must succeed with a will save (DC 15) or lose one Level permanently, and Inquisitor Tamas gains +1 Level permanently.
errata: The target must be equal or lower level than Inquisitor Tamas.

name: If You Still Breathe
text: React: After targeting a melee strike: After the strike, perform a melee strike targeting the same character.

setInfos.flavorText: "So long as the Emperor's flesh is still soft at his throat, I wouldn't say he's 'Eternal'" - Cairbre Netheryn
"I got him! I got..." - Dieter the Slow
"I got him! I got..." - Dieter the Slow

name: Ablung's Quickmail
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Order: Once per turn, ready this character. If this character has attacked this turn, he or she may not do so again.

setInfos.flavorText: "Too slow. Once more, you feel Viper's Venom." - Sav'rukk

name: Thievesbane
text: While Thievesbane is equipped, rogue actions that may target this character must do so, and actions that may discard this item must do so.

setInfos.flavorText: "Oh, you fell for it too?" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Giant Bat
text:
Evil characters only.
Order: Spend the Giant Bat to move forward or backward exactly two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Graceful? Oh, yeah, they fly like an arrow-and steer like a cow." - Basil Nemis

name: Gloves of Grasping
text:
Spend Order: Stun this character to stun a lower level character in an adjacent rank.
Order: Discard the Gloves of Grasping to discard a non-Armor item within one rank.

name: Whirlwind Boots
text: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike targeting a character 2 ranks away.

setInfos.flavorText: "Since when have you let distance get in your way?" - Sav'rukk

name: Misear Mace
text: Misear Mace has an additional +1 ATK for each Druid, Shaman, Barbarian, Ranger, and Scout in your army.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's as subtle as I get." - Donovan Che'har

name: Sacred Texts
text: Spells cast by this cleric may not be cancelled.

setInfos.flavorText: "There's much to be learned at the library of Athanaes, but remember to eat and sleep well."

name: Hestior
text:
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, this character gains an AC bonus equal to his or her skill (plus Riding feat, if he or she has it).
Order: Spend Hestior to move forward one rank.

name: The Martyrs' Blade
text:
Good characters only.
Melee strikes performed by this character ignore the effects of the Astral and Ethereal traits.
React: When this character hits an Undead or Abyssal character with a melee strike, stun this character to inflict 2 additional wounds on the target.

name: Heavy Charger
text:
+1 HP
Order: Spend Heavy Charger to move forward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The point, dear cousin, is to keep thy horse beneath thee." - Sir Alain D'Ilchant

name: Knife After Dark
text: React: After targeting a spent character with a melee strike: The strike inflicts an additional wound. If this character is an Assassin, the strike is a Critical Success. After the strike this character may perform a Stealth check (DC 10 + target's Skill) to stun the target.

name: Redeemer
text: When this fighter hits a character of the same faction with a melee strike, he or she inflicts 2 additional wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "Soren is the greatest traitor the dwarves have ever known. Thank Kor we have Zeal to aid us against him." - King Xod

name: Thunderstrike
text: React: After this fighter hits a character with a melee strike, the target and unspent adjacent characters must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 12) or be spent.

name: Envy's Teeth
text: React: Spend Envy's Teeth when wounds from a melee strike by this character are reduced to inflict 2 wounds on the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "My daughter's in Baraxton. Do I have any volunteers?" - Vronish Kez

name: Bracers of Defense
text: This wizard may not gain AC bonuses from other items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Thou wilt not touch me, mortal, no matter how thou mayst try." - Aenne the Tempest

name: Cloak of Flames
text: React: When this wizard is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike, discard a spell from your hand to give the wizard an AC bonus until the end of the turn equal to twice the spell's level.

name: Razel
text: Order: Spend Razel and discard a wizard spell to draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Many secrets are observed by eyes borne upon soft paws." - Master Isil Loth

name: Staff of Power
text:
Characters in your army adjacent to this wizard have -1 Hit Point.
React: Once per turn, this wizard may ignore the class requirement of an action card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Knowledge that powerful doth cost dearly. Ne'er the less, I shall pay." - Azhraan the Foul

name: Terrorshaard
text:
May not equip items.
Terrorshaard inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
Spend Order: Destroy an item up to 2 ranks away.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Fire Imp
text:
+5 Skill
React: When targeting a spell, spend the Fire Imp to increase the range of the spell by two ranks.

name: Sir Serane Myerdeth
text:
Order: Once per turn, target a Deverenian in your army. The target is +1 level for performing actions until the end of the turn.
Spend Order: If your Warlord is a Deverenian, target and ready your Warlord. Select an opposing player who may ready his or her Warlord.

name: Misear Diplomacy
text:
React: After an opponent retrieves cards from his discard pile: Retrieve this card from your discard pile and put it in your hand.
Order: Target a character within one rank: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 20) or suffer one wound (two if this rogue is an Assassin).

name: Lying in Wait
text: Spend Order: If this rogue is in the last rank of your army and in rank 4 or higher, perform a Stealth check (DC 22). If successful, perform a melee strike targeting a character in the last rank of another army. If this rogue is a Scout, add +5 to the die roll. If this rogue is an Assassin, the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

name: Steelcutters
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Non-spell ranged strikes performed by this character ignore AC bonuses from Armor, Gauntlet, Helm, and Shield items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Two inches of metal that tear through Deverenian steel. Two inches of steel, and Denska is free." - Lord Halbrook

name: Fleshcutters
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Characters wounded by non-spell ranged strikes performed by this character may perform only one melee strike per attack until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: The Elf's scream reverberated through the mountains, and the snow buried his men.

name: Renedain the Crimson
text: Spend React: Before you put another Deverenian into play, reduce the entering rank of the character by one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Gather thy minions while ye may, Slayer." - Azhraan the Foul

name: Snakewyrm
text:
May not equip items.
Snakewyrm cannot gain ATK bonuses or bonuses to melee strike rolls.
Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +3 melee strikes.
Spend Order: Perform six consecutive +0 melee strikes.

name: Quick Draw
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Before declaring the target of a melee strike, this character may equip a Weapon from your hand that he or she may legally equip.

setInfos.flavorText: "Elves give their lives so carelessly, considering what they claim to fight for." - Maxmilian

name: Fell Blow
