text: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike targeting a character within two ranks. If this wizard is a Necromancer, this strike may target any character in play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Death cannot be eluded, nor tricked, nor bargained with." - Giehox Nemesis

name: Aialla Truthlight
text:
Aialla is both a cleric and a wizard.
Aialla enters play as if she were level 5.
Aialla is +1 level for casting spells.

setInfos.flavorText: "Purge says that only Doricen died at Sharn. Gnorrow... nobody's seen Zeal."

name: Na'Gra'Thok
text: Spend React: After a Nothrog in your army is targeted by a melee strike, move that character back one rank to cancel the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Thou art a deluded fool, an thou believest on dwarven lies of Nothrog near Phrygai." - Lord Gahid

name: The Revel of Bascaron
text: Order: This wizard must succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 14) or suffer two wounds. If the wizard succeeds, then until the end of the turn, all characters in play have the Monster trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "This could take all day." - Lady Tornhawk

name: Call the Abyss
text:
Summoners perform this action without spending.
Spend React: After this wizard moves into your front rank or enters play: Put this card into play as an evil Level 1 fighter with the Planar and Monster traits, +4 ATK, 1 AC, +2 Skill, and 1 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course, our daemons don't come from your 'Abyss', dwarf." - Atiratu

name: Archmagus Staff
text:
This character is +1 level for casting spells.
Order: Discard the Archmagus Staff to target all characters within one rank (including this wizard). Inflict one wound on the target characters.

name: Feint
text: React: Play before this character makes a melee strike roll. Perform a Dexterity check (DC = target's AC plus his or her skill). If the check succeeds, spend the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Misearis is human land, your treaties be damned. Let me through!"

name: Stza Fasthand
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target another character in play. The target may perform a melee strike targeting Stza. If Stza is still in play after the strike (or if no strike is performed), she performs a melee strike against the target character.

name: Dragon's Blade
text: If this rogue misses with a melee strike, he must make a melee strike targetting himself.

name: Menander Holworth
text: Spend Order: Target all characters in one rank of your army. The target characters gain +4 skill until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Nemesis is here. I can sense him."

name: Dragon's Aura
text:
Dragon only.
Order: Until the end of the turn, any character targeting this Dragon with a melee strike must succeed with a fear save (DC 10 + the Dragon's skill) or the strike is canceled and the attacking character is spent.

name: Asimon
text: React: Once per turn, after an opponent discards a card from his or her hand as a result of an action, draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Zandara thinks her morals somehow make her superior. She can keep her morals; we'll take the gold."

name: The Motivator
text:
May not equip items or attack.
Characters adjacent to one or more unstunned Motivators gain the ability: "Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike."
Spend Order: Once per turn, target any lower-level spent characters adjacent to the Motiavator. Ready the target character(s).

name: Technomancy
text: This character's ranged strikes that are generated from an item add +3 to the roll. Skill checks and saves generated from an item on this character have a +4 DC.

name: Essence Flow
text: React: Player after this character spends to cast a spell. Kill a character in your army to add +8 to any ranged strike rolls or magic save DCs produced by the spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "I thank thee, Antoine. That shall suffice." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Hand of the Queen
text:
Order: Spend target equal or lower Level character within one rank.
Order: Stun target spent equal or lower Level character within one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Kennet's eyes narrowed. "That's a Tremayne standard. Attack! Attack NOW!"
"Anyone else wish to question my decision?" - Tepheroth
Your death began at life's first breath; so too does life first start at the touch of death.

name: Shade Mephit
text: React: After an opposing player performs an action to draw one or more cards, spend the Shade Mephit to draw two cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come closer, Tornhawk. Come to Mourn."

name: Sorscha's Cloak
text:
Order: Once per turn, move this character forward up to two ranks.
React: Spend Sorscha's Cloak instead of stunning (not spending) this character when he or she falls forward from an illegal rank.

name: Lust of Death
text: Spend Order: Target a number of characters up to this wizard's level within one rank. Until the end of the turn, each target gains an additional melee strike (ATK +0) whenever he or she performs an attack.

name: Last Breath
text:
Necromancer only.
Spend React: Play after another character within one rank is killed. This wizard gains +1 hit point and +2 skill permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "No need to waste." - Cordeos

name: Staff of Necromancy
text:
Necromancer only.
React: Spend the Staff after this character casts a spell to allow you to search your deck. You may search your discard pile in additional to your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "What price forever?"

name: Staff of the Wild
text:
Shaman only.
React: Spend the Staff before a character in your army moves forward or backward a rank without Maneuvering. That character may move one additional rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Tear the forest apart, and bring me the trator's head." - Tao

name: Hail Storm
text: Spend Order: Select a rank within two ranks of this wizard. Perform a +2 ranged strike targeting each character in that rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "How wonderful is your immortality now that it's underneath three tons of ice?" - Sir Wallence

name: Viscount Jameth
text: React: After you put a character from another faction into play, that character permanently gains the Deverenian trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come, milady Dashkova. The view from above is so much sweeter..."

name: Jack Covit
text:
Jack can play 1st level action cards of all classess.
Spend Order: Target a lower-level non-stunned character within two ranks. Spend or ready the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come on, then. We're ready for you now."

name: Davaenus
text: Order: Once per turn, target another character in play. Roll a die and add Davaenus' Skill to the roll. If the target fails a Luck save (Davaenus' total), he or she is stunned, Davaenus is stunned instead.

name: Invoke Spirit
text: React: After this character pays the costs for a spell: Targets of that spell may be an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: Slayer grimaced, his eyes smoking with fury "Euain thou devil."
"Every item has a soul within it, he told me... A stolen reflection, a memory, some piece of a greater whole..." - Euain

name: Assassin's Arrow
text: React: Play before this rogue makes a ranged strike roll targeting a spent opponent within two ranks. The strike is a Critical Success and inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now, there's a pretty girl." - Rathe

name: Baron Delvin
text:
Baron Delvin is both a rogue and a wizard.
Baron Delvin enters play as if he were level 5.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course they are but parlor tricks, milord. Harmless fancies to soothe thy spirit."

name: Amnesia
text: Order: Until the end of turn, players may not draw cards or retrieve them from their decks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Tsk, tsk, Kelanor. I did not tell thee to share." - Azhraan the Foul

name: Hex
text: Order: Target a character within three ranks. Until the end of the turn, subtract 3 from all rolls made by the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Curses so simple, even mephits can cast them." - Sorscha

name: Tallenis
text: Spend Order: Target an Elf adjacent to Tallenis. Move the target character forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "You first."

name: Zoris
text: Spend React: After an opposing character begins to perform an Order printed on his or her card, cancel the Order if Zoris is in the 1st rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "How weak these men must be, if simple cantrips distract them."

name: Dreamslayer
text: React: Spend an Illusionist before you put Dreamslayer into play to put it into play in your first rank. If brought into play this way, Dreamslayer is killed at the end of the turn.

name: Weapon Finesse
text:
Fighters and rogues play this as a 3rd level action.
Order: Attach this card to a Weapon equipped by this character. While this card is attached, the Weapon has the ability: "React: Spend this Weapon after this character fails a melee strike roll to reroll the die.

name: Ancient Beasts
text: React: Play before putting a Monster into play from your hand. Put the Monster into play as if it were two levels higher than normal, and attach this card to that character. While this card is attached, the Monster gains +2 ATK, +2 AC, and +1 hit point.

setInfos.flavorText: "The bigger ones are more fun to kill." - Avalanche

name: Mind Control
text: Spend Order: Target another character within two ranks and perform a skill check (DC 20). If successful, the target performs a melee strike against a character of your choice adjacent to the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Return, Anguisant, and bring a mighty host." - The Terror of Sharn Keep

name: Jump
text: Order: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "You can't blame us! How were we supposed to know she was a wizard?" - Lorik
"Catch me if you can!" - Za'beth Candlebane
"Thanks, Thad. Something's got them riled..." - Maia Casey
Zartoch saw himself across the pass, then was there. Ygraine's gambit could cost Denskans dearly.
"Three battles, and still you escape our best trackers. You owe us a death, Logan... preferably your own." - Lucien Stormcrow
"Three battles, and still you escape our best trackers. You owe us a death, Logan... preferably your own." - Lucien Stormcrow

name: Infiltration
text:
Assassin only.
React: Play after this Assassin declares the target of a melee strike. If the Assassin succeeds with a Stealth check (DC = 10 + the number of characters in the target character's rank) you may retarget the strike to a character in the rank behind the current target.

setInfos.flavorText: "I assure you, Misearis is perfectly safe."

name: A Fool and His Money
text: Order: If this rogue is in your first rank, discard all cards in play with the Treasure trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "...are always welcome at my inn."

name: Heat Poison
text:
Assassin only.
Order: Target a character within two ranks with Armor equipped, and perform a Stealth check (DC 9 + target's Skill). If successful, attach this card to the Armor. While attached, the target character must succeed with a poison save (DC = 9 + Assassin's Skill) before initiative each turn or suffer one wound.

name: Tara
text: Tara gains +5 ATK while she performs a melee strike targeting a Siege character, and inflicts an additional wound if she hits. Tara gains +5 AC while she is the target of a melee strike or ranged strike by a Siege character.

name: Repulsion
text: Spend Order: If this wizard is in the first rank, target up to three characters in another player's first rank. The target characters must each succeed with a magic save (DC 19) or move back one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Away with you, Vermin." - Master Loth

name: Slayer's Curse
text: Spend Order: Target an item in play with a level equal to or lower than this wizard's level +2. Attach this card to the item. While this card is attached, all of the ATK and AC bonuses of the item are treated as negatives. The item gains the Cursed trait.

name: Rockhide
text: Spend Order: Attach this card to this wizard. While this card is attached, any wounds this wizard suffers beyond the first of each turn are reduced to zero. Place a token onto this card for each wound reduced in this fashion, and discard this card when the number of tokens on it equals or exceeds this wizard's level.

name: Spring Attack
text: Spend Order: Move this rogue forward one rank. If this moves the rogue into the first rank, he or she may perform a melee strike and then move back one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Scream for me, and I'll keep the necromancers away from you."

name: Dimensional Blade
text: React: Spend the Dimensional Blade before this character declares the target of a melee strike. The target may be one additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bleed for me, inside your invisible prison." - Jalallaek

name: One More Time
text: React: Play after all players pass consecutively. You may perform one additional Order. The turn then ends normally.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hm. And he was so happy, too." - Lazarus Saul

name: Magic Missiles
text: Spend Order: Perform a number of +0 ranged strikes equal to this wizard's Level. These strikes may not receive any bonuses to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "These wild men shalt learn soon the power of a decent education. I'll wager that I can kill more than thou, Layamon." - Caleb the Shifter
"Aw, the Bodach's pets are hungry? Fine, chew on this." - Keira Syneri
Ygraine let loose a wave of shimmering darts, but Zartoch was already gone.
"One fewer obstacle to the Empire."

name: Screened Shot
text: Spend Order: If this character is in your second rank, perform a ranged strike with a bonus to the die roll equal to twice the number of characters you have in your first rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The infantry on the front lines keeps the enemy at bay and keeps me alive. In turn, my arrows keep them alive."

name: Shade Gremlin
text:
Shade Gremlin may not start the game in play.
Shade Gremlin may not be targeted by spells.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dismiss your imps before they get ideas." - Balian

name: Adarymy
text:
Adarymy can equip fighter and rogue items.
1st level characters in your army gain +2 ATK and +2 AC.
Order: Once per turn, search your deck for a 1st level character without the Monster trait, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand.

name: Rune of Protection
text: Spend Order: Target an item in play and attach this card to it. Other players' actions may not target an item with a Rune of Protection attached.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is my greatest find ever, and I will protect it at all costs. All costs." - Anton Cyldragen

name: Power Word Stun
text: Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike that may target a character an additional rank away. If successful, the target is stunned instead of wounded.

name: Fire Fiends
text:
May not equip items.
Order: If the Fire Fiends are in your 1st rank, discard them to target a 1st or 2nd level character in an opposing 1st rank. Kill the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "They're so cute!" - Muddflek

name: Anthem of Baraxton
text:
Bard only.
Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters gain Charisma +1 while in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let them play their pretty songs. Baraxton is mine now." - Nassiral Hate

name: Gravel Spawn
text: If Gravel Spawn is in your discard pile when a Gargoyle or Elemental in your army is killed, you may put Gravel Spawn on top of your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hember bargained with Sjonegaard for an alliance, but what did the Elemental King get in return?" - Poison

name: Assassin Training
text: Spend Order: Attach this card to this character. While this card is attached, this character is an evil Assassin and has the ability: "React: After this character hits a stunned character with a melee strike, kill the target."

name: Ancient Riddles
text: Order: Target a spent character within one rank. During the next Ready Phase, the character must succeed with a Perception check (DC 10) or the character does not ready.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course! Geramond of Athanae!"

name: Retributive Strike
text:
Order: Destroy an item equipped to this character: Perform a +7 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Attach this card to this character. While it is attached, this character may perform Retributive Strike once per turn, as if from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "I want to be free, Tepheroth. What do you want?" - Raziel

name: Spotter
text: Spend Order: Stun this character if he or she is in your first rank and select one opposing first rank. Until the end of the turn, any ranged strike targeting a character in that opposing rank receive +2 to the die roll.

name: Decoy
text: Spend Order: If this rogue is in your first rank, target up to two characters in an opposing first rank whose combined levels are less than or equal to this rogue's level. Spend the target characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Perhaps I should have thought this through a little more..." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Trebuchet
text:
May not equip items or attack.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that may target a character in any rank. Stun the Trebuchet.

setInfos.flavorText: "Where are you, Savrukk?" - Taoth

name: Hit the Ground Running
text: React: Immediately after this character enters play, move this character forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "They're in!" - Captain Dukat

name: Pain Eater
text:
May not equip items.
React: After Pain Eater suffers one or more wounds, redirect the wounds to characters adjacent to Pain Eater. Wounds redirected in this way cannot exceed the hit points of the character(s) they are inflicted on.

name: Bindings
text: Spend Order: Target an Astral or Ethereal character within three ranks. If the target fails a magic save (DC 20), attach this card to the target. While it is attached, the target character loses the Astral or Ethereal trait and gains the ability: "Order: Once per turn, make a magic save (DC 20). If successful, discard Bindings."

name: Helm of Death
text: +1 HP

setInfos.flavorText: "We kill for Xod, though we do not burden him with details." - Darkness

name: Darkfeast Harpy
text: Other Harpies in this rank have +1 hit point.

setInfos.flavorText: "They circled Toris Kelt for months, but ran out of dead upon which to feed."

name: Kresh
text: Spend Order: Target a lower-level character within two ranks. Inflict one wound on the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "I only have two questions: who do you want and how much are you paying?"

name: Unbroken Chain
text: React: Play when this character is in an illegal rank. Move this character back one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Misearis to Baraxton, Baraxton to Lukkot. The south of the Accord is mine." - Nassiral Hate

name: Ball Lightning
text: Order: Target a character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Embrace the Storm, worthless thrall." - Layamon
"I invoke thy rules of hospitality." Adonis said, grinning, "unless thou wishest to strike down a humble ambassador."
After the Deverenians had left, Lord Halbrook approached the charred armor of his legendary king. Inside was nothing left but dust.
"Don't let the Deverenians tell you they invented such sorcery. It was around long before the Empire, and destroyed more nations than even the oldest histories tell." - Anton Cyldragen
"Don't let the Deverenians tell you they invented such sorcery. It was around long before the Empire, and destroyed more nations than even the oldest histories tell." - Anton Cyldragen

name: Quadlibet
text: Characters targeting Quadlibet with melee strikes and ranged strikes receive no bonuses of any kind to the die roll.
errata: Erratum: Her ability should read "Characters targeting Quadlibet with melee strikes and ranged strikes receive no bonuses of any kind to the die roll. Effects which would raise Quadlibet's AC are ignored."

setInfos.flavorText: "As planned, the humans have routed our forces, Lord Ichaerus."

name: Fire Mount
text:
Order: Spend the Fire Mount to move forward one rank.
React: Spend the Fire Mount instead of spending or stunning this character when he or she falls forward from an illegal rank.
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike.

name: Trade Routes
text: Spend Order: Search your deck for three different items and show them to the player to your left. That player selects one item. Put the selected item in your hand and discard the others.

setInfos.flavorText: "Markappal, Andover, and Lion's Jaw have ports enough to allow trade, and without Elven interference." - Maxmilian

name: Timid Imp
text: After you put another character into play in this rank, return Timid Imp to your hand. You may not put any Timid Imps into play this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "When you're done playing, Edouard, we can get back to studying." - Gaston Bonhomme

name: Hyel
text: Hyel may ignore class restrictions when equipping items.

setInfos.flavorText: "What... have... you... done?"

name: Azhraan the Foul
text: React: Once per turn, after a 1st through 3rd level Deverenian in your army is killed, if the character does not have the Ethereal trait he or she is not killed, but is instead moved to the rank behind your last rank. Remove all wounds from the character, who permanently gains the Undead and Ethereal (odd strikes miss) traits and -10 AC.

name: Fire Trap
text: Order: Attach this card to an item equipped by a character in your army. After an opposing character's action discards this item, that character must make a magic save (DC 20) or suffer one wound.

name: Masterwork Blade
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Your army gains +3 to its initiative roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Perfection is my right hand, and devotion is my left." - Kerebrus

name: Still Mind
text: Order: This rogue gains +6 skill until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Watch the enemy long enough, and they will kill themselves for us." - Rabinus Zon

name: Will O' Wisp
text:
May not equip items or attack.
May not be targeted by ranged strike or spells.

setInfos.flavorText: "The bog's choked with Brindle's potions, and with those who drank them." - Keziah

name: Brother Ansel
text: Spend Order: If you won Initiative this turn: The next time your Warlord performs an action card this turn, he has +1 Level for performing that action.
errata:
The action may only be performed if you won ANY initiative roll this turn.
Only affects the very next action card played by your Warlord.

setInfos.flavorText: "My charge be to destroy this blasphemous place."

name: Fiery Bolts
text: Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike. If there are at least two other characters in this rank, this character has Marksmanship +5 for this strike, and may apply Marksmanship to this spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "...suppose throwing rice for Taoth wasn't appropriate anyway."
"I do believe that Squire Orban wanted it intact, dearest Temb'w'bam..." - Regina Tremayne

name: Blood Purge
text: Spend Order: Target a character in play. Discard all action cards attached to that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Enough entertainment. How goes the war?" - Tepheroth

name: Phantasm
text:
Illusionists cast this as a 2nd level spell.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a character of equal or lower level and put it into play in the first rank, ignoring level requirements and loyalty penalties. The character is killed after it suffers one or more wounds or at the end of the turn, whichever comes first.

name: Marko the Cleft
text: Order: Once per turn, if your Warlord is Slayer the Unkind, discard a card from your hand to ready Marko.

setInfos.flavorText: "Slayer's assistant these last forty years. He lives on, though he hath seen scores die to his master's appetites." - Theoloc

name: Bardic Knowledge
text:
Bard only.
Order: Choose a number. If this character succeeds with a skill check (DC 10 + chosen number), look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the chosen number. Put one of the cards in your hand. Return the remaining cards to the top of your deck in the same order.

name: Ablung's Prism Cloak
text: React: Once per turn, after a character performs a melee strike targeting this character, stun the attacker. Any additional melee strikes from this attack are lost.

setInfos.flavorText: "There is strength in madness. Just don't ask me where." - Anton Cyldragen

name: Sigil of Bonding
text: Order: Target a character within one rank and attach this card to the character. While this card is attached, items equipped by the character may not be discarded by actions other than spells. If an item equipped by the character is discarded, he or she suffers one wound.
errata: Erratum: The Sigil of Bonding will not prevent an item from destroying itself.

name: Loyalty to the Coin
text: Spend Order: Target any Mercenary character in play other than a Warlord. That character's Warlord must make a Charisma check (DC = 5 x level of target, 3 x level if the Warlord is also a Mercenary). If unsuccessful, discard the target character, then search your deck for any character of equal or lower level, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand.

name: Clay Golem
text:
React: Before you put Clay Golem into play, stun any number of your ready characters. For each character you stun in this way, Clay Golem gains +1 ATK and +1 AC permanently.
React: Before you put Clay Golem into play, kill any number of your ready characters. For each character you kill in this way, Clay Golem gains +1 hit point permanently.

name: Kobassi
text: Kobassi may not perform any actions while your Warlord is ready.

setInfos.flavorText: "His ambition outstrips his loyalty." - Black Tom

name: Not This Time
text: Spend React: Play this card after an opposing character casts a spell. If there is another copy of the spell in that player's discard pile, and this rogue succeeds with a skill check (DC 18), the spell is canceled and the caster is stunned.

name: Forget
text: Spend Order: Target character within two ranks may not perform actions printed on him or his items.
errata: Erratum 2007/10/08: The Spend Order should read "Spend Order: Target character within two ranks may not perform actions printed on himself or his items, until end of turn."

setInfos.flavorText: "Help... Me?"
"Who am I?"

name: Crippling Hex
text: Spend Order: Target another character in play. Until the end of the turn, the target may not use any Feats.

setInfos.flavorText: "Away from me, thou clumsy fool!" - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Boomerang
text: Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. If the strike hits, the target is stunned instead of wounded. After the strike (whether successful or not), return the boomerang to your hand. A player may play only one Boomerang per turn.

name: Rubble Gargoyle
text: You must have a cleric in your army to start with Rubble Gargoyle or bring one into play. If Sjonegaard is your Warlord, Rubble Gargoyle has +1 hit point.

setInfos.flavorText: "They rise from the ruins and fight beside us. Ours is not the only home we are defending." - Sjonegaard

name: Dimensional Anchor
text: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks with the Astral or Ethereal trait. The target character loses the Astral or Ethereal trait until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "What happens to a ghost if I kill it, hmm?" - Cassandra the Arcane

name: Stone Skin
text: Spend Order: Target a character in your army and attach this card to the character. While this card is attached, the character has the ability: "Characters without a Weapon equipped may not target this character with melee strikes." Discard this card at the end of the turn 3 turns after this one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Finished so soon, Denskan? Permit me then, to retort." - Sorceress Ygraine

name: Eclipse
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, all Undead characters have +2 ATK, +2 AC, and the ability: "React: Once per turn, after this character is targeted with an action (not a melee strike), cancel the action.

name: Baraxton Wraiths
text:
May not equip items.
React: Oncer per turn, after the Wraiths are targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike, cancel the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not all of the guild escaped that night." - Basil Nemis

name: Rr'tak
text: React: Before this character becomes stunned, perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I serve Hate, but my life is my own. I have but to seize its energies, and everything will change."

name: Deverenian Suit
text: Deverenians equip this as a 5th level item.

setInfos.flavorText: "Thy true skin, for thy true duty." - Lady Jenia

name: Nareduk
text: Spend Order: Select an adjacent rank. Target all Nothrog in the selected rank, who gain +3 AC until the end of the turn. Stun Nareduk.

setInfos.flavorText: "Baraxton and Misearis prosper for their allies. Why not Toris Kelt?"

name: Minor Globe of Invulnerability
text: Order: Level 1 and 2 characters may not target this character with melee strikes, ranged strikes, or spells, until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now where'd I put that globe..." - Supply

name: The Time to Act
text: Spend React: Play after you win Initiative by at least 10. You may perform an additional Order before your first Order of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I win, good sir knight. Go back to your family."

name: Kun Davill
text: Spend React: After this character is targeted by a melee strike, cancel the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our order has never known war. I fear that some of us still wish that were true." - Kun Hull

name: Great Axe of Rage
text: While Great Axe of Rage is equipped, this character may not perform any Orders except a Maneuver (forward only) or an attack.

name: Dark Shade
text: React: After Dark Shade hits a characters with a melee strike, kill Dark Shade to attach it to the target. While Dark Shade is attached, it is not a character and the target must succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 16) before initative each turn or suffer one wound. If the save is successful, or the target leaves play, put Dark Shade in the rank behind the last occupied rank in your army, and inflict one wound on it.

name: Abyssal Plate
text:
Evil characters only.
This character has the Abyssal trait.
This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he or she hits with a melee strike if he or she does not have a Weapon equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "Take it and live." - Ter-Soth

name: Divine Mercy
text: Spend Order: Target a character within one rank. Until the end of the turn, whenever the target suffers one or more wounds, reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kor is with us, now and forever. Though the Abyss empty over us all, Kor shall keep us safe." - Faith

name: Vines that Bind
text:
Druid only.
Order: Target all characters in one opposing rank. All items equipped by the target characters become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is our forest, manling. Even in your victory, you should have remembered that." - Draven

name: Nothrog Legionnaire
text: React: After the Legionnaire is killed, shuffle him back into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Baraxton is now ours in truth as well as law, Lord hate." - Krun

name: Carock
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
React: Stun Carock before he declares the target of a ranged strike to target a character one additional rank away.

name: Malfleur Drac
text: Spend Order: Spend another Deverenian in your army to target an opposing character whose level is lower than the Deverenian's. Spend the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Speak not to me of thy dead. I would slay thee to the last, an it return Denska to our Emperor."

name: Push
text: Spend React: Before a character moves into or out of the first rank: The character does not move. (The target still pays all costs of the move.)

setInfos.flavorText: "Got no time for this." - Tinker
"I don't know why he helped me, I only knew that I was suddenly across the river, and the Dwarf was alone with the Nothrog." - Euain
"I don't know why he helped me. I only know that I was suddenly across the river, and the Dwarf was alone with the Nothrog." - Euain

name: Theodor Hyral
text: Order: Once per turn, discard an item equipped by Theodor to perform a ranged strike. Theodor receives a bonus to the ranged strike roll equal to the level of the discarded item.

setInfos.flavorText: "There's no room for pride in war."

name: Ebon Gauntlets
text: Order: Discard a card from your hand to give this character +1 ATK and +1 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Patch them up, take them home, and tell Tepheroth that they all died." - Ichaerus

name: Lord Rhimian
text: Spend Order: Target a spent character within one rank of Lord Rhimian. Stun the target character. Lord Rhimian may not target a character he targeted with this action on the previous turn.

name: Dancing Shield
text:
This character may not perform multiple melee strikes while the Dancing Shield is ready. The Dancing Shield provides no AC bonus while spent.
Order: Target a character in this rank. Spend the Dancing Shield to give the target +3 AC while the shield remains spent.

name: Great Sword
text:
May only be equipped by a character with a base ATK of +5 or greater.
React: After this character performs a melee strike that inflicts one or more wounds, spend the Great Sword to perform an additional melee strike with the same ATK and bonuses against the same character.

name: Blessing of Kor
text: Spend Order: Target a number of characters up to this cleric's level within one rank. Each target gains +1 HP until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Be still, my king. Everything is as it must be." - Valhala Abyssbane

name: Open Fire
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all of your characters not in your first rank add +2 to their non-spell ranged strike rolls.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothing to see here. Well, there won't be." - Contal

name: Cut Supply Lines
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all opposing characters are -2 levels for equipping items.

setInfos.flavorText: "There's nothing you can do for them, Basil! We have to go!" - Logan

name: Jules Wynnplane
text: Order: Discard a spell from your hand to give Jules +5 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Did I break thy concentration?"

name: Burn the Inn
text: React: After an opposing character performs an action to draw one or more cards, reduce the number of cards that player draws by two. Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Curse thee, Toren." - Daevanus the Drunkard

name: Winter's Shadow
text:
Necromancers gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
React: After target opposing lower Level character enters play: The target may not attack or maneuver until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sorry I'm late. I... got lost." - Patience
"My master sends your Majesty his blessings." - Achilleus

name: Shore Up
text:
Paladins play this as a 3rd level action.
React: Play when bringing a character into play from your hand. The character may enter play in any legal rank of your army greater than the rank he or she would normally enter.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is why we fight, Lucian. Not to destroy evil, but to harbor the innocent." - Terak

name: Jolan Yew
text: Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike that targets a character two ore three ranks away. The distance of this ranged strike may not be increased or reduced in any way.

name: Rhyene
text: A character adjacent to Rhyene gains an additional melee strike (ATK +1) whenever he or she performs an attack.

setInfos.flavorText: "To stare into Uriel's eyes is to know the will of the Heavens. How could I not follow him, and how could he not accept me?"

name: Gaol
text: Order: Once per turn, target a character in this or an adjacent rank. Move the target back one rank. If Gaol targets an opposing character, he must spend to perform this action.

setInfos.flavorText: "The uplanders never know to stay up, and the Abyssals never know to stay down."

name: Vigil
text: Spend Order: Attach this card to this character. While this card is attached, this character is a Paladin and can cast 1st level cleric spells.

setInfos.flavorText: "If good cannot come from evil, how did the Aroch paladins come from the Black Sun?" - Squire Lucian

name: Mourn
text:
Mourn may not start the game in play.
Immediately after he enters play, Mourn suffers one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "A common name in Rockhome, but never for long." - Rac Ironbone

name: Talise
text: Spend React: After another character performs a melee strike targeting Talise, if he is still in play, Talise performs a melee strike targeting the attacking character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Myreth was our home before it was Signon's."

name: Curse
text:
Order: Target a character within three ranks. Until the end of the turn, subtract 2 from all rolls made by the target character.
Order: Target a character of opposite alignment within three ranks. Until the end of the turn, subtract 5 from all rolls made by the target character.

name: Sarakian Madman
text: Spend Order: Put another Sarakian Madman into play from your hand into this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Get outta my wasteland!"

name: Allessia
text: React: After an opposing character within one rank performs a ranged strike or casts a spell, Allessia performs a melee strike targeting that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Arionrhod?" - Lord Winter

name: Expanded Spell
text: React: After an opposing character rolls a magic save from an action this wizard is performing: A character that was adjacent to the target, but not already targeted by the action, must succeed with the same magic save or suffer the same consequences for failure.

name: Solid Blow
text: React: Play before this character makes a melee strike roll. If the strike has an ATK of +15 or higher, the strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "...and stay dead!"

name: Might of Arms
text: React: Play after this character hits with a melee strike. Move the target back one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Back to the pit with you!" - Avalanche

name: Meilliki
text: React: Before a melee strike roll targeting Meilliki, roll a die. If the attacker's unmodified melee strike roll is not higher than Meilliki's unmodified die roll, the strike is a Critical Failure.

name: St'rga
text:
May not attack.
Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike with an ATK of +3.

setInfos.flavorText: "She kills only on command. Why is she with Uthanak?" - Krun

name: Mount Up
text: Order: If this character succeeds with a Riding check (DC 15), search your deck for a Steed of up to 5th level and equip it.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hey, wait for me!"

name: Gris Ironfist
text:
Gris can cast 1st and 2nd level cleric spells.
If Gris is your Warlord, other good characters in your army have the ability: "Melee strikes and ranged strikes by this character ignore the effects of the Astral trait."

name: Adulation
text:
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: Attach this card to this cleric. While this card is attached, adjacent evil characters gain the ability: "Spend React: After an adjacent character suffers one or more wounds, inflict the wounds on this character instead".

name: Graft
text:
Spend React: Discard a character from your hand after a character in your army suffers wounds. Reduce the wounds by two.
Spend React: Discard a character from your hand before a character in your army makes a magic save. Add a bonus to the die roll equal to twice the discarded character's level.

name: Holy Aura
text: Spend Order: Target a character in play. The target gains +3 AC and Riposte +3 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Scions are the chosen of Kor, his direct servants among the Dwarves." - Valhala Abyssbane

name: Contal
text: Spend Order: Search your deck for a Siege character, show it to the other players, then shuffle your deck and put the character on top of the deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let us build mighty weapons in Mammoth's image, and bring them down on his enemies."

name: Fireball
text: Spend Order: Target a character two ranks away, target any characters adjacent to the target: Perform a +4 ranged strike against the first target. After the ranged strike, all targets must succeed with a magic save (DC = this wizard's Skill) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Everything gets better with practice." - Corsis
"Give the Elves a warning." - Lord Gahid
"It's beautiful..." - Muddflek
"It's beautiful..." - Muddflek

name: Crisis of Faith
text: Spend Order: Select a player who has one or more characters in play with the printed "Warlord" or "Overlord" trait that are not currently Warlords. Kill those characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have avenged Aroch, but how worthy were they, to fall to lowly highwaymen?" - Sir Rhawn d'Ilchant

name: Dor of Clan Manaka
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Vels is a simpleton. Most of us can say more than 'Me Giant! Me Smash!'"
"Logan sabotaged the catapults, did he? Well, that's just too bad."

name: Prepared Position
text: Spend React: After a character equipped with a Steed moved into an adjacent rank, this fighter performs a melee strike targeting the moving character. If the moving character is still in play after this strike, a character adjacent to this fighter may perform a melee strike targeting the moving character.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Nothrog knew where we were." - Frederik Lahr

name: Mindripper
text: Order: Spend Mindripper to have this character inflict two additional wounds whenever he or she hits with a melee strike until the end of the turn. Until the end of the turn this character receives a penalty to his or her skill equal to the character's current skill.

name: Aggressive Attack
text: Spend React: Immediately after you perform an Order, perform another Order.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now!" - Sir Robert the Vigilant

name: Strength
text:
While in play, Strength is considered two characters for determining illegal ranks.
Spend Order: Remove two wounds from Strength.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do your worst, Abyssal. I will not fall!"

name: Trick Riding
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: After this character is targeted by a melee strike or ranged strike, spend a Steed equipped by this character to give him or her +5 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "That's it. Follow right after me." - Darian Windson

name: Vandal's Dance
text: React: After this character makes a melee strike roll that hits the target, target an item equipped by the opponent. The target item is discarded.

setInfos.flavorText: "I hear thy courage has followed thy weapon, brigand." - Duke Blackthorne

name: Erebus Stormchild
text: React: After an Order (not a melee strike) targets Erebus, cancel the Order.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Annales Devereniorum warneth us that our eyes might deceive us-but mine shall not."

name: Dimensional Binding
text: Spend React: Play after a character in your army declares an attack (but before the target of the first strike is selected). The character ignores the effects of Astral and Ethereal traits for the duration of the attack.

name: Frozen March
text: Spend Order: Target up to three characters within two ranks. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 7 + caster's Skill) or be stunned. Spent characters also suffer a wound. Stunned characters instead suffer two wounds.

name: Dark Bolt Axe
text: Melee strikes performed by this character ignore the effects of the Astral and Ethereal traits. This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he or she hits an Astral or Ethereal character with a melee strike.

name: Rejuvenation
text:
Cleric or wizard only.
This card is a spell.
Order: Target a character that will be killed at the end of this turn by a card effect. The character is killed at the end of the next turn instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "Just a little longer, sire..." - Master Isil Loth

name: Mass Heal
text: Spend Order: Target up to three other characters within one rank. Remove up to two wounds from each target character.

name: The Power of Faith
text: React: Before this character casts a spell that requires a magic save, target up to two other unstunned characters in your army. Stun the target characters to add their combined levels to the spell's DC.

name: Weapon Master
text:
Barbarian only.
Order: This character may immediately equip a Weapon, ignoring class requirements for that Weapon.

setInfos.flavorText: "Blessings unto all. The Storm cometh." - Modred of Carcius

name: Antlers of the Stag
text:
+2 HP
Barbarian only.

setInfos.flavorText: "They're insane. All of them." - Timothy Windson

name: Edge of Immortality
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, whenever a character in your army suffers one or more wounds, reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Spirit. Flesh. Bone. Blood. None of it touches you today." - Behlial

name: Reincarnation
text: Spend React: After another character in your army is killed, you may reveal cards from your deck until you reach a character of equal or lower-level than the killed character, or until you reveal your entire deck. Put the revealed character into your hand, then shuffle the other revealed cards back into your deck.

name: Thundercall Javelin
text: Spend Order: Discard the Thundercall Javelin to make a +4 ranged strike. If it hits, the strike inflicts an additional wound and spends the target. Characters adjacent to the target must then succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or become spent.

name: Guardian Daethor
text: Order: Once per turn, target a character in your formation within one rank. The target must succeed with a Stealth check (DC 22) or be killed. This action cannot be canceled with the Stealth feat.

name: Sonic Blast
text: Spend Order: Target a number of characters within two ranks up to the number of ranks in your army. Each must succeed with a magic save (DC 5 + caster's Skill) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: Somewhere over Phrygai, lightning clashed, and thunder roared.
"Scream. Not for me, but for him." - Vakeros

name: Bear Mantle
text: This fighter gains the Barbarian trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Uther fights with us, sire, but for how long?" - Lieutenant Dunbar

name: Grudge
text: React: After Grudge kills a Monster with a melee strike or action, he gains +2 ATK permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "So Purge won the duel. Good on him. Now, about these bloody Sewer Monsters..."

name: Winter's Chill
text: React: After this character inflicts one or more wounds with a melee strike on a character that already has one or more wounds, kill the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Live or die-either way, you'll talk." - Lord Winter

name: Ettin
text:
Ettin may equip two Helms.
Ettin adds +5 to perception check rolls.

setInfos.flavorText: "Two against one won't help you." - Lady Tornhawk

name: Ghostblade
text:
May only be equipped by Astral and Ethereal characters.
Melee strikes performed by this character ignore AC bonuses from items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Guilt. Suffering. Fear. These are fleshly sensations. I shall free thee of them." - Master Caudecus

name: Hold This Position
text: Order: Attach this card to this fighter. While this card is attached, the fighter is considered to be two characters for determining illegal ranks and gains the ability: "Order: Discard an attached 'Hold This Position'."

setInfos.flavorText: "Greetings, Senator Maltis. I was wondering if we could talk." - Krun

name: Scimitar of Fire
text: React: After this character performs an attack, spend the Scimitar to ready this character. This character may not perform another attack this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "A gift from your friends in the south." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Alholland
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike with an ATK of +0. The strike inflicts two additional wounds if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do not bring your evil here."

name: Mak and Makob
text:
Mak and Makob are both a fighter and a cleric.
Mak and Makob enter play as a 5th level character.
Mak and Makob may equip two Armor, Shield, Helm, and Weapon items, if one of each is a fighter item and the other is a cleric item.

name: Open Ground
text: React: Play before rolling initiative. All players gain a +3 bonus to initiative for each Steed in their army.

setInfos.flavorText: "Too risky. We slip up, and there's no hope of escape." - Johan Halfblood

name: Arc Lightning
text: Spend Order: Target a character within three ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC = target's AC) or suffer two wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "Another reason why elves wear armor made of bone, not metal." - Kilis of Flesh
"I am mortal, but you are dead." - Ter-Soth
"Is this the best Denska hath to offer in its defense?" - Sorceress Ygraine
"What messenger, my Queen? Was I supposed to receive a messenger?" - Ichaerus

name: Diamond Gargoyle
text:
May not equip Armor.
You must have a level 5 or higher cleric in your army to bring Diamond Gargoyle into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "As pure as the jewels that begat him, and twice as unyielding." - Knowledge

name: Poisoned Water
text: Spend Order: Target all characters with a Steed equipped. Each target character must succeed with a Medicine check (DC 18, DC 22 if this cleric is a Druid) or the Steed is discarded.

name: Ring of Regeneration
text: Order: Spend the Ring of Regeneration to remove one wound from this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "An endless torrent of blood drenches the Accordlands. In times such as these, I give thanks." - Behlial

name: Intimidating Rage
text:
Barbarians play this as a 1st Level action.
React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting this fighter. The attacking character must succeed with a fear save (DC 15 + this fighter's Level) or the strike is a Critical Failure.

name: Scent of Blood
text:
Rangers play this without spending.
Spend React: Play after another character in your army hits with a melee strike targeting an opposing character. This fighter performs a melee strike targeting the same character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Run, Timmy. I'll meet you at the rendezvous." - Jack Casey

name: Arm Up
text: Spend Order: Characters in your army may immediately equip any items currently in your hand that they may legally equip.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kill the Elves until you can't stand up anymore. Then fall on the last one." - Sir Wallence

name: Token of Thanks
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike, then move this character forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Misearis is far too interesting for my tastes." - Keziah

name: Superior Positioning
text: Order: This character gains +3 ATK until the end of the turn. Melee strikes and ranged strikes targeting this character subtract -3 from their rolls until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "We can stave off the Elven attack from here for a while." - Maeve ni Duhonn

name: Port of Call
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, your characters do not suffer loyalty penalties when entering playing.

setInfos.flavorText: "Lion's Jaw Bay was safe, but what is safety when innocents suffer and die for it?"

name: Baqbou's Charm
text: Order: Discard Baqbou's Charm to target a character in your army. THis character switches places with the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "I didn't call you here, but I'll make do." - Absinthe

name: Squire Dashiell
text: Order: Squire Dashiell has +2 ATK (+3 ATK if you won Initiative this turn) until end of turn. You may use this ability a number of times per turn equal to the highest character Level in this rank.
errata: His own level counts, so he can always use the ability at least once.

setInfos.flavorText: "As you wish, your Grace."

name: Empowered Spell
text: React: After this character spends to pay the cost for a spell: Magic saves from this spell have a bonus to the DC equal to this character's current Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "We command the souls of the dead. Why should the Dragon's ghost be any different?" - Coreos Bodach
"I am High Queen of Calix. Who dares challenge my reign over these forests?!" - Tepheroth
"There is only one Queen of Lightning." - Aenne

name: Conner Mac
text:
May not attack.
Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike with an ATK of +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "A proper kill is about timing your blow, not about swinging it."

name: Suicidal Charge
text: Spend Order: Move this character forward one rank. If this moves the character into the 1st rank, he or she may immediately perform an attack without spending, and with an additional melee strike (ATK +1). This character is killed at the end of the turn.

name: Gurlda
text:
Gurlda is both a cleric and a fighter.
Gurlda enters play as if she were level 4.
Order: Once per turn, remove one wound from Gurlda.
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

name: Kothkah
text: Order: Once per turn, look at the top five cards of your deck. Put one of the cards into your hand and discard the remaining cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm no bumpkin or fool, but savage? Yes, I suppose that I am."

name: Armored Gauntlets
text:
Fighter or cleric only.
Armored Gauntlets provide no ATK bonus while this character has a Weapon equipped.

name: Enthrall
text:
Bards may cast this spell as if they were clerics.
Spend Order: Target all characters in an adjacent rank. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 10) or be unable to perform melee strikes until the end of the turn.

name: Full Helm
text:
-5 Skill
Fighter or cleric only.

setInfos.flavorText: "The overture endeth. I warned thee of what cometh next, but thou shalt know it not 'til thy final act." - Magellan

name: Blessed Steel
text: Order: Target a Weapon of up to 5th level equipped by a character in your army. The Weapon gains an ATK bonus equal to this cleric's skill until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "For our brothers of Aroch!" - Sir Magnus Arcadis

name: Dac'Lar
text:
Spend Order: Target a Nothrog in your 1st rank and remove one wound from the target character. Select another player who must inflict a wound on a character in their front rank.
Order: Once per turn, remove a wound from Dac'Lar.

name: Clothuo
text: Order: Once per game, target an Elf in your army who has not gained one or more permanent hit points since the start of the game. The target character gains +1 hit point permanently.

name: No Rest
text:
Necromancer only.
Spend React: After target opposing character dies: If this wizard succeeds with a Skill check (DC = five times the target's Level) return the character to play, spent, in your first rank under your control with the Undead trait.

name: Death Knight's Mail
text:
Fighter or cleric only.
Elves equip this as an 8th level item.
This character gains the Ethereal trait (odd strikes miss).

setInfos.flavorText: "The dead do not require armor and thus cannot miss it." - Behlial

name: Scale
text:
Scale's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against Dragons.
React: Before Scale makes a save roll during an action performed by a Dragon: Gain +10 for the save.
React: After Scale kills a Dragon: He gains +5 ATK and +1 HP permanently.
errata: Erratum: Dragon Slayer is a flavor trait. Scale is not a Dragon.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Dragon spawned far deadlier children than the Abyssals."

name: Staff of Light
text:
This character gains +2 AC when targeted by a melee strike or ranged strike performed by an Undead character.
Order: Discard the Staff of Light to target all Undead characters within one rank. Inflict one wound on the target characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Away with you, pretenders to terror." - Modred of Carcius

name: Low Tide
text:
React: Play before any die roll to subtract 1 from the roll.
Spend React: Play before any die roll to subtract 4 from the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ishara's wrath shall flood our foes." - Ruth Gwenelen

name: Tender Mercies
text: Spend Order: Target a character in an opposing first rank. Until the end of the turn, the target suffers -5 AC and may not attack.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hush. It will all be over before you know it." - Behlial

name: Arcane Archery
text:
Fighter or rogue only.
Order: Discard a spell from your hand to give this character Marksmanship +10 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Told you she loved me." - Jack Casey

name: Blood Oath
text: React: After this character equips an item: Attach this card to the character. While Blood Oath is attached, characters performing an action targeting any items on this character must discard a card as an additional cost for the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "I accept your terms, Aenne, but I have a few of my own..." - Cador

name: Breach the Wall
text: Spend Order: Target a Siege card within one rank. Discard that card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Only one big, dumb Nothrog holds the south wall. That's our way out." - Logan

name: Burn it to the Ground
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all rogues have +3 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "All my stuff's back there!"

name: By the Seat of Your Pants
text: React: Play before this character plays a 1st level action card to ignore the class requirements of that card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Very funny." - Keziah

name: Thrice-Fell Horrors
text: Spend Order: Put this card into play adjacent to this wizard as an evil Level 3 fighter with the Abyssal and Monster traits, +5/+3 ATK, 9 AC, +6 Skill, and 2 HP. If the caster is a Summoner, it also has the Planar trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Thrice, and thrice again, threefold terror to my side..." - Atiratu

name: Luthlarius Defense
text:
Deverenian only.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all Deverenians have +2 AC while in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "More than steel guardeth the streets of the Emperor's city." - Master Halverdar

name: New Goldenaxe Defense
text:
Dwarf only.
Spend React: After this character suffers one or more wounds, spend an adjacent Dwarf to reduce the number of wounds to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: "Gahid's forces have doubled in the last two days, but he has not pressed his advantage. Something's happening outside, Strongarm, and I want to know what it is." - Gnorrow Yaw

name: Andover Assault
text:
Elf only.
Order: Target an opposing Siege character within one rank. Perform a melee strike targeting a character in the rank behind the Siege character.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'd like to see the Elves try to get past these walls." - Sir Wallence

name: Repair Crew
text:
+1 HP
May only be equipped by Siege characters.
May be equipped by Siege characters that can not normally equip items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do that stupid voice again, and you'll be the one who 'canne take it.'" - Sceth

name: Fight Across the Rooftops
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, this character has the following ability: "React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike or action, perform an Acrbatics check (DC 17). If successful, the strike or action is canceled; if not, this character suffers one wound."

setInfos.flavorText: "AAAAAAAAAAAAaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhh..." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Baraxton Defense
text:
Free Kingdoms only.
Spend Order: Discard any number of cards from your hand. This character performs a number of consecutive +2 ranged strikes equal to the number of cards discarded. These strikes may not receive any bonuses to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Nothrog want the city, let's give it to them. One brick at a time." - Logan

name: Enfilade Fire
text: React: Play before this character declares the target of a ranged strike. If your army's 1st rank has more characters than the target's army's 1st rank, your character has Marksmanship +10 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Taoth is coming, boys. Send her my regards." - Savrukk

name: Inheritance
text: React: After this rogue kills an opposing character with a melee strike or action, search your deck for an item this rogue may legally equip, and equip it to him or her.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm sure he wanted me to have it, whoever he was." - Dustin St. Gulick

name: Life Tap
text:
Undead only.
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks. Inflict one wound on the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Life is wasted on the living." - Giehox Nemesis

name: Misear Strike
text:
Mercenary only.
React: Play before this character performs a melee strike roll targeting a spent character. The melee strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Figure my father'll wake up with flea any day now." - Keziah

name: Toying with Prey
text: Spend Order: Attach Toying with Prey to target character within 3 ranks. While it is attached, the character has the text "After initiative is rolled, all characters in the same rank as this character must succeed with a poison save (DC 12) or suffer a wound (including this character)."

setInfos.flavorText: "Tis just sport, Bruin. Why worry thyself so?" - Lord Kestrel

name: Lukkot Ambush
text:
Nothrog only.
Spend Order: Target a Siege character in play. Move the target character forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: The fire rained down. Shops, temples, and homes were destroyed in a single volley.

name: Regeneration
text:
Monster only.
React: Play after this character is killed. Put this character into your hand instead of the discard pile. All attached actions and equipped items are still discarded.

setInfos.flavorText: You will need oil, a lot of oil, and a big torch if you want to take that thing down. You had best take my sword as well.

name: Religious Council
text: Spend Order: If this is your first action of the turn, shuffle your entire hand into your deck and draw 5 cards. If this cleric is a Seer, you man draw 6 cards. Until the end of the turn, you may not draw cards or retrieve cards from your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: Everyone knows that you can trust a priest with a secret.

name: Bane
text: Order: Target a character in play. Until the end of the turn, the target character has -2 ATK and -3 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have never known fear like the terror I felt in that cave." - Axe

name: Blessed Ground
text: Order: Target a spent item equipped by this cleric. Ready the item.

setInfos.flavorText: If the Free Kingdoms wish to attack again, lead them here. Ellyah's Children will be waiting. - Saunginel

name: Divine Protection and Guidance
text: React: Play after an action by an opposing character directly spends or stuns a character in your army. Ready your character.

setInfos.flavorText: My lord is my guide and I am his hand. I shall not waver and in his care I lay my trust. - Paladin's Battle Prayer

name: Symbol of Warding
text: Spend Order: Target a rank in any player's army. The next character that moves into that rank this turn must make a magic save (DC 13) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: I have heard of a king's son who liked the look of it so much that he took the glyph as his name.

name: Necromantic Regeneration
text: Spend Order: Target an Undead character within three ranks. Remove two wounds from the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: Don't waste your time with the zombies and skeletons. The smart warrior takes the fight straight to the Necromancer.

name: Divine Selection
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, this cleric may not suffer wounds or perform actions.

setInfos.flavorText: Some welcome a god's calling; others are blinded by it.

name: Treetalk
text:
Druid only.
Spend Order: Target a Siege character in play. Kill the target character.
Spend Order: Target a Siege character in play. Remove all wounds from the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: She is like a blacksmith. Her hands are her hammer and anvil. The wood in her hands formed like heated metal.

name: Cone of Cold
text: Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound. The target, then any characters that were adjacent to the target, must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or be stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "Keira's power is great, but what of her loyalties." - Naia Calix
"Nobody invited you here, elf." - Sorscha
"Invigorating." - Ice

name: Wall of Stone
text:
Gargoyle only.
Spend Order: Target this cleric's rank. Until the end of the turn, all characters gain +8 AC while in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "That should hold them until Al'drich and his beasts arrive." - Lord Gahid
"At Hember's request, I placed a wall around Rockhome. I swore that it would stand until the Abyss had been defeated, and I will keep that promise." - Sjonegaard the Elemental

name: Get Down
text: React: Play after a melee strike roll targets this fighter with an ATK of +6 or less. The strike is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: Get down again!

name: Strong Arm
text: Order: Perform a melee strike with an ATK of +0. Items equipped by this fighter have no effect for the duration of this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: It don't break the skin, but it leaves a nasty bruise. And when he wakes up in a few days, he'll remember my blow.

name: Favored Enemy
text:
Ranger only.
Order: Name a faction and attach this card to this character. While it's attached, this character adds +3 to any melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting a character of the selected faction.

name: Holy Ground
text: React: After an opposing character of opposite alignment targets this fighter with a melee strike, this fight performs a Fortitude check (DC 16). If successful, ready this fighter.

setInfos.flavorText: Glory to the Storm. Glory to the Emperor. All hail the Queen of Lightning.

name: Narrow Alley
text: React: Play after this character suffers two or more wounds. Reduce the wounds being inflicted to one.

setInfos.flavorText: It's not so much who you're fightin' as where you're fightin' them.

name: Watchful Guards
text: Spend React: After a character moves into this or an adjacent rank, cancel the move.

setInfos.flavorText: The Nothrogs have the North Quarter and the West Gate. In no time, they'll control the merchants and then where are we?

name: Tavern Brawl
text:
While Tavern Brawl is in your discard pile, you have -1 hand size and your characters have Riding +7.
Order: Discard up to 2 cards from the top of your deck (up to 4 cards if this character is a Scout): Perform a +5 ranged strike for each item card discarded this way.
errata:
The effects of multiple copies in the discard pile stack.
You must discard at least one card. (Zero Effect rule)

setInfos.flavorText: Bar wench?!? Another ale to bash this bugger's skull with.

name: Flashing Hooves
text: Order: Spend a Steed equipped to this character to perform a melee strike with an ATK of +3. Items equipped by this character other than the Steed do not affect the strike.

name: Blackoak Arrows
text: React: Play before this rogue makes a ranged strike roll to add +3 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: More accurate than regular arrows and harder to pull out of someone's skin once they've punched through the armor. Yeah, I'd say they're worth 2 gold crowns each.

name: Dimension Door
text: Spend Order: Target a number of characters whose combined Levels are less than or equal to this character's Level +2. Move each target forward or backward one rank. You may not move an opposing character if it will create an illegal rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "What's on the other side? Secrets. Many secrets." - Baruuk al-Semmeya

name: By Cover of Night
text: Spend React: Play after this character is targeted by a melee strike or ranged strike. This character switches places with another character in your army. The other character now becomes the target of the strike.

name: Disguise Kit
text:
This rogue gains an AC bonus equal to the number of other characters in this rank. The AC bonus cannot exceed the rogue's skill.
The rogue loses the AC bonuses from all other items he or she has equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "They'll be expecting an army at Luthlarius, Sali, not a couple of Misearean traders." - Johan

name: Heart of the Stag
text: Order: Shuffle this character and all items equipped by the character into your deck (discarding all attached action cards.) If your Warlord leaves play in this way, you lose the game.

name: Stupid Luck
text: React: Play before this character makes a die roll. Roll two dice and choose which one to take.

setInfos.flavorText: Luck and fate are never the same. Luck and idiocy are often related, though.

name: Reckless Leap
text: Order: Move this character forward up to two ranks. The character has -5 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nobody can make that!"

name: Burr Under the Saddle
text: Order: Target a character within two ranks with a Steed equipped. The target character must succeed with a Riding check (DC 15) or the Steed is discarded and the character is spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Time to find out whether your master is truly the horseman he claims to be."

name: Animdar
text: After Animdar suffers a wound, he becomes stunned and permanently gains the trait Undead and the class wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "They say he's trapped between life and death, age and reason, want and need. Bloated and worthless is more like it." - Sir Wallence

name: Back Alley Tavern
text:
React: After another player uses a card effect to draw a card or retrieve a card from his or her deck, draw two cards.
Spend Order: Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "That ain't mold. It's 'local color'."

name: Through a Table
text: Spend React: Play after a melee strike roll targeting this character. If the strike missed, stun the attacking character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Whoop! Time to go..."

name: Use Magic Device
text: Order: Equip a wizard item to this rogue, ignoring class restrictions.

setInfos.flavorText: "Time to see if that doddering old fool has his theories straight."

name: Face of Mirrors
text:
Illusionists play this as a 3rd Level spell.
Spend React: After an opposing character inflicts wounds on a character in your army with a melee strike: Inflict that many wounds on a character adjacent to the opposing character. Reduce the wounds being suffered by your characters to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: "Be forwarned, any attack against me could be an attack against your brother." Zartoch smiled, and smiled, and smiled...

name: Trembling Earth
text: Spend Order: Target a Siege character in play. Inflict three wounds on the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: The earth calls no man master. We scuttle across her surface like ants, never aware-even in war-of how small and insignificant we truly are.

name: Flight
text: Order: Target a character in your army. Until the end of the turn, that character has the ability: "Order: Discard a card from your hand to move forward or backward one rank."

setInfos.flavorText: A beautiful fantasy, a dream of men for countless milennia... now turned to the purpose of destruction.

name: Gift of Life
text: Spend Order: Target a spent or stunned wizard in play. Kill this character to ready the target wizard. If this character is a Necromancer, he or she is not killed but suffers one wound instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "They will never give it willingly. Pity."

name: Intuition
text: Spend React: After a character in your army performs an Order, perform an additional Order.

setInfos.flavorText: "I see it... yes... yes, it could work... Now! Strike now!"

name: Magic Shop
text: Order: Target a spent item equipped by this character. Ready the target item.

setInfos.flavorText: "You break it, you bought it, O' Almighty Spellslinger."

name: Soul Binding
text: Spend Order: Discard up to three cards from your hand. Your opponent must discard the same number of cards from his or her hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't struggle, dear sir. We have all eternity to get to know eac other..."

name: Hold Person
text:
Spend Order: Target a ready lower-level character. Spend the target character.
Spend Order: Target a spent lower-level character. Stun the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm sorry, noble warrior, but I'm afraid I can't allow you to leave."

name: Time Stop
text: Order: This wizard may now perform any number of Orders in a row until he or she declares "done". Characters other than this wizard may not perform Reacts until the wizard is done.

setInfos.flavorText: He froze in place, his mucles locked in a single moment in time.

name: Inquisitor Chroneus
text: Spend React: Before rolling initiative: Your Warlord gains +10 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now, more than ever, heresy cannot be tolerated. The Storm can ill afford protection for those of weak temperament, and in Its name I hunt them."
"Fate is not a road; it is a wheel. to see its spokes, you merely have to note how quickly it turns."

name: Mistress Kohn
text:
May not equip items except Weapons.
Mistress Kohn may not Attack unless she has a Weapon equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "My second, but I daresay she fighteth for any reason save but to fight." - Master Halvedar

name: Medusan Lords' Gambit
text: Spend Order: Target up to two characters in different ranks who must succeed with a magic save (DC 5 + caster's Skill) or suffer a wound. If a target fails by 10 or more or rolls a Critical Failure, he suffers an additional wound. Characters may not perform Reacts to or during this action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Best laid plans..."

name: Master Isil Loth
text:
May play 1st and 2nd level fighter actions.
Spend Order: Target a rank within two ranks of Isil Loth. Until the end of the turn, all characters have -5 AC while in that rank.

name: Trench
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, Dwarves in your army gain +3 AC and Riposte +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "I give Rockhome a month, two if my men reinforce Rac's. Any longer, and King Xod won't have to worry about allies anymore."

name: Digger
text: Digger gains +2 ATK and +2 AC for each Siege character in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "A two-handed axe?! Don't make me laugh. that's about as usefulas a ballista down here."

name: Resistance
text:
Spend Order: Resistance gains +8 AC until the turn.
Spend Order: Target another character in play. The target character gains +4 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Stone is my ally. I am as constant as the rock itself."

name: Draven
text: Order: Discard a card from your hand to give Draven +2 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "We need to figure out how Tepheroth delivers her orders. We do that, and the war's all but ours." - Sir Robert

name: Saunginel
text:
Your hand size is increased by one.
Characters in your army may not use card effects to draw cards or retrieve cards from your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Please, cousins, treat them gently. the humans should recognize our fodder, or else it's just savagery."

name: Olrik Hammerfall
text: Dwarves add +5 to the melee strike roll when targeting Orlik with melee strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: Orlik swore fealty to Angus, but was destroyed by Douglass. Later, the elves found the body and made it whole again. Almost.

name: Myhrena
text: Spend React: Before an Elf in your army makes a ranged strike roll, add +10 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: No matter how much control the Nothrog exert over this city, they'll never control the sewers and alleys and roofs.

name: Syad
text:
Order: Once per turn, change Syad's alignment to evil, permanently.
Order: Once per turn, change Syad's alignment to good, permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: In such times, madness may be the only defensible refuge.

name: Borgen Ferriss
text: Spend Order: Look at the top 10 cards of your deck. If one of them is a Steed, show it to your opponents, then put it in your hand. Put the other cards on the bottom of your deck.

name: Prismatic Surge
text: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks. That character must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + caster's Skill) or suffer two wounds. Any characters that were adjacent to the target must succeed with a magic save (DC = the caster's Skill) or suffer two wounds.

name: Ronan Cody
text: React: Once per turn, after Ronan is targeted with a melee strike, or ranged strike, he gains +10 AC for the duration of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "He'll get the message through."

name: Daric Tully
text: React: After a character in your army rolls a natural '20', ready Daric.
errata: Erratum 2003/10/17: His React should read "React: After a higher-level character in your army rolls a natural '20', ready Daric."

setInfos.flavorText: "We used to employ him during our assassinations, to cover our escape. Last I heard of him, he was with Logan." - Black Tom

name: Dustin St. Gulik
text: React: After a character performs an action to discard an item in your army, perform a melee strike targeting that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Diamond-studded lock picks?!" - Basil Nemis

name: Harty Tate
text:
Will only join a Free Kingdoms Warlord.
Spend Order: Discard a card to draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "He's a dying man; he only wishes to live to see peace come once again."

name: Archer Tower
text:
May not attack, equip items or use action cards.
All other characters in a rank with one or more non-stunned Archer Towers add +6 to their ranged strike rolls.

name: Silver Bane
text:
May not equip items.
Evil characters within one rank have -3 ATK and -3 AC.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Target another character within one rank. Remove all wounds from the target character.
errata: Erratum: Silver Bane is a Mercenary.

name: King Dukault
text:
Dukault inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
You must spend an evil cleric you control for King Dukault to enter play.
After the ready phase, all good characters you control suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "The bonds are ever weakening. Our time will come."
"The Assassins Strike impressed some more than others." - Giehox Nemesis

name: General Lund
text: Spend Order: Once per turn, target up to two lower level spent (not stunned) Mercenary characters. Ready the target character(s).

setInfos.flavorText: "If we must meet Death today, let us not meet him empty handed!"

name: Thunic Roc
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, more forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: I've never seen the Thunic lands, but I fear its beasts and its survivors.

name: Griis
text:
Griis is +3 levels for equipping items.
When Griis leaves play, put all items equipped to him into your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: Ruuslik, my brother, we do not belong here. This is not our war. These are not our people.

name: Armageddon
text: Spend Order: Inflict one wound on all characters in play. Kill this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Order Myerdeth hath harbored defiance. For all things, a price." - The Eternal Emperor
"Mourn is, was, and shall ever be." - Jehricho

name: Ghost Bog
text: Spend React: After a character performs an action, spend the character.

setInfos.flavorText: Most believe the ghost bogs are dead women, forced to live a tormented afterlife. But I've seen them. They are no ghosts. Anything that can eat flesh is real.

name: Kallus
text: Spend React: When bringing a character from another faction into play, ignore the loyalty penalty, and give that character the Nothrog trait, permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "Look up again meat puppet, and I'll stripe your back down to the bone."

name: Jalallaek
text:
Jalallaek may not be targeted by spells.
Spend Order: Target a wizard within one rank. Inflict one wound on the target wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "A Nothrog? At Arak Spire? Preposterous." - Anton

name: Rreg'jen
text:
Your hand size is reduced by 4.
