All opposing Warlords have the ability: "Order: Discard all cards from your hand."
React: After the player to your left performs an Order, draw a card if the player has one or more cards in his hand and Rreg'jen is your Warlord.

name: Draljaca Tar
text: Spend Order: Target a character within one rank. The target character has -5 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Portable Wall
text:
This character may not Maneuver, attack, equip items or use action cards.
Siege characters cannot target this character with actions.
This character and those adjacent have +6 AC versus ranged strikes.
Order: Spend and adjacent character to move this character forward or backwards one rank.

name: Blackiron Medallion
text: Order: Discard a spell from your hand to give this character +3 ATK, +3 AC and +1 level until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The kingdom of the Storm is at hand." - Cardinal Scelus

name: Armor of Malluk
text:
This character gains an additional +3 AC (+6 AC total) whenever he or she is the target of a melee strike or ranged strike by a character of opposite alignment.
This character is +1 level for casting spells.

name: Malluk's Hammer
text: This character inflicts two additional wounds whenever he or she hits a Siege character with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is said that Malluk saw the development of catapults and ballistas as the end noble warfare." - Khevanna

name: Sigil of Strength
text:
You must spend a cleric to put this card into play.
May only be equipped by Siege characters.
May be equipped by Siege characters that can not normally equip items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Orazhuk, when you finish the ritual, prepare the machine. We will drown them in their own blood." - Krun

name: Apprentice Trist
text: React: After Apprentice Trist performs an action that redirects a strike or action to himself from an equal or higher Level Deverenian: Apprentice Trist premanently gains +1 Level, +1 HP, +1 AC, and Defend +3.
errata: He gains the stat augmentation as soon as the strike or action is redirected before any other reacts and before the strike or action continues resolving.

name: Dagger
text:
Spend Order: Destroy Dagger: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
Order: Destroy Dagger: If this character is a rogue, perform a +0 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "One in the hand or two in the back. Your choice, Trevaine." - Black Tom of Corinth
"I saw Sir Gahid charge a legion of Nothrog once. He returned. They didn't. That, my lord, is all I need to know." - Squire Kelanor
"I saw Sir Gahid charge a legion of Nothrog once. He returned. They didn't. That, my lord, is all I need to know." - Squire Kelanor

name: Sacred Altar
text: Order: Spend a character in this rank to give this character +1 level for casting spells until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Should you fall, my lord, I will bring you back." - Cardinal Scelius

name: Blackiron Shield
text: Order: Discard a spell from your hand to give this character +3 ATK and +3 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Magic feeds it, but its powers run far deeper than mere sorcery.

name: Hammer of Flattening
text: This character inflicts two addition wounds whenever he or she hits a Siege character with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "We were going to call it 'Hammer of Unimaginable Pain Beyond the Ken of Mortals,' but it wouldn't fit on the handle."

name: Serrated Broadsword
text: Order: Spend Serrated Broadsword to give this character +4 ATK or +3 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: A proper weapon need not kill immeadiately. Cut deeply enough, and your opponent will bleed out like a hog in a slaughterhouse.

name: Blackiron Dagger
text: Order: Discard a spell from your hand to give this character +3 ATK and +3 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: You can sense its power, even from a distance. Wise men do not trifle with such weapons.

name: Bow of Destruction
text:
Rangers may equip the Bow of Destruction as if they were rogues.
Order: Once per turn, perform a +6 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike. This strike inflicts two additional wounds on Siege characters.

setInfos.flavorText: Vengeance flew from the elf's bowstring like thunderbolts from the heavens.

name: Cold Iron Shackles
text: Spend Order: Target a lower-level rogue within three ranks. Spend the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Scream all you like, thief. None can hear you but the dead..."

name: Blackiron Wand
text: Order: Discard a spell from your hand to give this character +3 ATK, +3 AC, and +1 level until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Even a wizard can become a fearsome combatant with the right tools.
"They hate the light do they? Send them my way; I might change their minds."

name: Eyestalk of Resistance
text: Reaver only.

setInfos.flavorText: As hard as diamonds it was, an alien piece of an utterly horrifying being.

name: Light Crossbow
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "No. No more debates. Denska only fell to the Storm, but it died to greedy politicians." - The Free King
"Bigger isn't better. It's just clumsier." - Keziah

name: Shadowreaver
text:
Melee strikes against Shadowreaver with an ATK less than 5 automatically miss.
Order: Once per game, attach a 1st or 2nd level wizard spell to Shadowreaver. While attached, he can cast the spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand and he were a wizard.

name: Mirror Magic
text: Order: Target an adjacent character card and select an action printed on the target. This character is considered to have that action printed on his or her card until the end of the turn.
errata:
Erratum: The Order should read "Order: Perform an Order on an adjacent character as if it were printed on this character, paying all costs as necessary."
Erratum: There's a React that should read "React: Play when a React on an adjacent character could be performed as if it were printed on this character. Perform the action as if this character had that printed text."

setInfos.flavorText: The image rippled like water as the energy streamed through the barrier.

name: Stormchaser
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, target a character withing one rank who must succeed with a magic save (DC 23) or be stunned.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Kor's Forge
text:
Cleric or wizard only.
This is a spell.
Order: Target a character up to two ranks away with Armor equipped. The character must discard the armor or suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not even a Deverenian should die like that." - Strongarm

name: Full Gallop
text: Order: Target and ready a Steed in your army. Discard the Steed at the end of this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Barbaric. Simply barbaric." - Revan

name: Just a Flesh Wound
text: React: Play after one of your characters is killed by another player's card effect. The character is not killed, but suffers one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've had worse." - Jonah the Burglar

name: The Will of Neus
text: React: Play after a character in your army kills another player's character of equal or higher level with a melee strike or action. Attach this card to your character. As long as this card is attached, the character is +1 level and is a cleric.

name: Battlefield Promotion
text: React: Play after a character in your army kills another player's character of equal or higher level with a melee strike or action. Attach this card to your character. As long as this card is attached, the character is +1 level and is a fighter.

name: Moving Up the Ladder
text: React: Play after a character in your army kills another player's character of equal or higher level with a melee strike or action. Attach this card to your character. As long as this card is attached, the character is +1 level and is a rogue.

name: Sorcerous Epiphany
text: React: Play after a character in your army kills another player's character of equal or higher level with a melee strike or action. Attach this card to your character. As long as this card is attached, the character is +1 level and is a wizard.

name: Riding Horse
text: Order: Spend Riding Horse: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "You've heard of Isadran's fine stallions? Well, these ain't them." - Joan Drake
"All the dignity and comfort of a trip to the Chirurgeon." - Davon Ironthorn
"Nothrog ride wolves because nobody told them horses weren't for eating." - Rora Blackmane
"Nothrog ride wolves because nobody told them horses weren't for eating." - Rora Blackmane

name: Elven Patience
text:
Fighter or rogue only.
Order: This character gains Marksmanship +5 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "A good arrow shot is like a good elven wine: slowly made, well savored, and bloody." - Maxt Stormcrow

name: Wild Attack
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, this character gains +5 ATK, but suffers -8 AC (minimum 1.) If this character is a Barbarian, he gains an additional +5 ATK (+10 total).

setInfos.flavorText: "What a lovely noise humans make when we break them over our knees..." - Maddawc

name: Minister the Wounds
text: Spend Order: Target a character in this or an adjacent rank. All wounds in the target's rank are removed.

setInfos.flavorText: "The holy ground of Athanaes welcomes all living things, no matter their religion or race... save those who serve the Storm. Soon, Sir Rhawn, you will learn why..." - Behlial

name: Avatar of Power
text: Spend Order: Put this card into any of your ranks as a level 5 wizard with +4 ATK, 13 AC, and 2 hit points. The Avatar is killed at the end of the turn. The Avatar has the ability: "Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound if it hits."

name: Avatar of Poison
text: Spend Order: Put this card in any of your ranks as a level 5 rogue with ATK +8, AC 20, and 2 hit points. The Avatar is killed at the end of the turn. The Avatar has the ability: "The Avatar inflicts two additional wounds whenever he hits a spent character with a melee strike."

name: Oathbound
text: Spend Order: Target a character with an action card attached. Discard the action card.

setInfos.flavorText: His will, my Master's word, had come to us. Gahid. Rhawn. and Kestrel were sworn to guard the borders. Modred and Slayer were bound to the Emperor's City... but to what end?

name: Hember's Hammer
text: Spend React: Play before a character in this army performs a melee strike roll. For the duration of this strike, the character's ATK is equal to his or her printed ATK and the target's AC is equal to his or her printed AC.

setInfos.flavorText: Though the Dwarves retreated to New Goldenaxe, Ter-Soth's unholy legions lost as many as they slew.

name: Aid the Faithful
text: React: Play immediately after a character suffers two or more wounds. Reduce the wounds suffered to one.

setInfos.flavorText: "You can do very little with faith, but you can do nothing without it." - Frederik Lahr

name: Seize the Day
text: Spend React: Play after you make an initiative roll to make the roll a 20.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let us make the most of battle, before the politicians and councilors seize noble Glory and pen it to death upon their writs." - Viscount Nocens, the Blooded

name: Summon Weapon
text:
Paladin only.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a Weapon that this Paladin may equip. The Paladin equips the Weapon.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is light to the touch, but Avenger is a burden heavier than mountains." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Soft Leather Armor
text: Fighter, rogue or cleric only.

setInfos.flavorText: "...hold on, is this a tattoo?" - Joan Drake
"That's really inexpensive." The scout smiled. "What did you say this hide was, again?"
"That's really inexpensive." The scout smiled. "What did you say this hide was, again?"

name: Never Turn Your Back
text: React: Play after a character moves out of an adjacent rank. This fighter performs a melee strike targeting that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "...on a Nothrog, you idiot. Ah, well. You get what you deserve." - Uther Killer-of-Bears

name: Prisoner
text: Spend Order: Target a stunned character within one rank of this fighter. If this fighter succeeds with a Strength check (DC = 13 + target's skill), kill the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Uthanak said 'kill them all,' but I have my doubts..." - Taoth

name: Valhala's Shout
text:
Barbarians perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Put one or more characters into play from your hand, in any order you choose.

setInfos.flavorText: "For all that we are, all that we were, and all we shall die to protect!" - Valhala Abyssbane

name: Heavy Blow
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. Subtract 5 from the die roll. This strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hmph. You call that tiny thing a 'hammer' do you boy?" - Sceth Hellbringer

name: Trip
text: React: Play before a melee strike roll by or targeting this character. The opposing character must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 7 + this character's skill) or become stunned. Continue resolving the strike normally (even if the attacker is now stunned).

setInfos.flavorText: "If you choose the correct moment to attack, the battle is half won." - Krun

name: Leg Sweep
text: React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by this rogue: Spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's teamwork that takes out the big ones. Someone sets them up, and the other knocks them down." - Kylia Smythe
"Stop it, Wallence. No more talk of defeat. If we must lead these men to death, then we will at least lead them in hope and not in despair." - Anton Cyldragen

name: Evasion
text: React: Play after this rogue suffers one or more wounds during a ranged or melee strike. Reduce the wounds to 0 and stun this rogue.

setInfos.flavorText: "How many arrows do you have left, elf?"

name: Crypt Wine
text: React: Play before this rogue makes a ranged strike roll. The strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: A poison made of the blood of ancient necromancers-very rare, and very expensive. One touch, and you know what death truly feels like...

name: Song of Bravado
text:
Bard only.
Order: This character targets a character in play. The character is +1 level until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: On our song, built of courage, shall a shattered world emerge in light.

name: Gaze of the Infinite
text: Spend Order: Target a character within one rank who must succeed a magic save (DC 12) or be killed.

setInfos.flavorText: "Tear out thy eyes, stripling, else thou must gaze upon me and see the true wrath of the Storm." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Long Sword
text: Fighter or rogue only.

setInfos.flavorText: "No, no. The trademark's nothing significant. Just a passing fancy by the maker, truly." - Lilah
"The Elves were geased by an Andover wizard not to use their sorcery for one hundred years. Now that time has passed... and the Elves have risen for vengeance." - Keziah
"The elves were geased by an Andover wizard not to use their sorcery for one hundred years. Now, that time has passed... and the Elves have risen for vengeance." - Keziah

name: Spectral Touch
text: Spend Order: Target a character within one rank who must succeed with a magic save (DC 18) or attach this card. While this card is attached, the target is -2 levels, -3 AC, and -3 ATK. If a character's level or AC is reduced below 1 by this card, the character is killed.

name: Yscar's Mark
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets a character in your army. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or suffer two wounds. If successful, the target permanently gains the Lycanthrope trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "When you were born, it was already too late..." - Sabith Yscar

name: Dance of Bones
text:
Necromancer only.
Spend Order: Search your discard pile for up to three Undead character cards, show them to the other players, and shuffle them into your deck.
Spend Order: Search your discard pile for a character card, show it to the other players, and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Primal Fear
text:
Wizards higher than 5th level play this without spending.
Spend React: Play after this wizard is targeted with a melee strike. Cancel the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your life ends here, human... but your pain never will." - High Queen Tepheroth

name: Labyrinth
text: Spend Order: Target a character of lower level and attach this card to the target. While Labyrinth is attached, before the target readies, he or she must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or does not ready.

setInfos.flavorText: If he'd've gone that way, he'd have gone straight to the castle...

name: Kiss of Lethe
text:
Spend Order: Target a player who must discard a card from his or her hand (if possible).
Spend Order: Play after an opposing player draws a card as a result of that player's card effect. The player must discard two cards from his or her hand (or all if the player has fewer than two).

name: Feeble Mind
text: Spend Order: Target a character up to two ranks away. Until the end of the turn, the target has -5 ATK and cannot inflict more than one wound per melee strike.

name: Wizard's Duel
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets another wizard in play and performs a skill check (DC = target's AC). If successful, inflict one wound on the target. If the target survives, he or she may perform a skill check (DC = this wizard's AC); if successful, the target inflicts one wound on this wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "This ends now, Euain." - Cador
Death walks beside me. He is my brother, my shieldman, and my slave. When you face me, human, you face us both, and Death shall have his way.

name: Lrent
text: React: Lrent may perform this action once per turn, after he kills a character with a melee strike. If that character had no items equipped, Lrent performs a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: More for me.

name: Nothrog Daggers
text: This character's melee strikes have +3 ATK and inflict an additional wound against higher Level characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ah, interrogation time again? A woman's work is never done." - Samope
"It's time. At long last, it's finally time." - Uthanak
Sav'rukk smiled to himself as he watched the band of Nothrog scour the woods. "Perhaps this time I will let them find me before they die."

name: Rraven'a
text: Order: Once per turn, take an item from a character in your army and equip it to another character in your army who could legally equip it.

setInfos.flavorText: If Krun betrays Lord Hate, he'll soon find himself eating ashes and drinking sand.

name: Terror of Condor Pass
text: May only equip items with "Eyestalk" in the title. After the Terror suffers a wound, it must discard a random item with "Eyestalk" in the title.

setInfos.flavorText: For now, Condor Pass is contested between two human countries, but one day soon, all will know it's true master.

name: Cassandra the Arcane
text:
Cassandra is both a cleric and a wizard.
Cassandra enters play as if she were level 5.
React: Once per turn, discard a cleric spell from your hand after casting a wizard spell (or vice versa) to ready Cassandra.

setInfos.flavorText: Knowledge is power.

name: Cockatrice
text: Any character who performs a melee strike targeting the Cockatrice suffers one wound after the strike resolves.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ever been a gibbering wreck? Want to try it?" - Edge

name: Babbling Mouther
text: May not equip items.

setInfos.flavorText: "You chatter, gibber, and babble, but those voices serve as a counterpoint to my own. They're most calming, and let those who cannot stand the cacophony serve as your repast! They come willingly to your lair when I speak of the treasure, the witless fools!" - Jigoral

"You chatter, gibber, and babble, but those voices serve as a counterpoint to my own. They're most calming, and let those who cannot stand the cacophony serve as your repast! They come willingly to your lair when I speak of the treasure, the witless fools!" - Jigoral
"It cannot be... it cannot be... it cannot be..." - A whisperer in the darkness

name: Tortured Spawn
text: All good characters within one rank of Tortured Spawn gain the ability: "Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike targeting Tortured Spawn."

setInfos.flavorText: "Some of the beasts that feast on dragonflesh are not as lucky as others-or as resilient." - Hearth

name: Edos the Executioner
text: Melee strikes and actions that inflict more than one wound inflict only one wound against Edos.

setInfos.flavorText: "Never smile at the executioner. You'll only encourage him." - Jack Casey

name: Giehox Nemesis
text: Order: Kill a character in your army to remove all wounds from Giehox.

setInfos.flavorText: I know the seething hell and the black infernal wind of death. I have seen its face, and spit into the eye of both the eternal and the divine. They have no power over me.

name: Rabinus Zon
text:
Rabinus is both a cleric and a rogue.
Rabinus enters play as if he were level 5.
Order: Once per turn, target a character in your army. That character has Powerattack +5 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Courage is to endure the relentless pain that life offers, and yet to keep on living.

name: Angelique
text:
Angelique is both a fighter and a rogue.
Angelique enters play as if she were level 3.
Angelique may not start the game in play.

setInfos.flavorText: Logan screwed up. He lost Baraxton to his own bad luck. He'll find no haven in Torham, no allies my thieves. The low road is sealed.

name: Woodsman's Bow
text:
Ranger or Scout only.
Spend Order: If this character is a Scout, perform two +3 ranged strikes.
Spend Order: If this character is a Ranger, perform a +2 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.

name: Zoltan
text:
Zoltan is both a rogue and a wizard.
Zoltan enters play as if he were level 3, and may not start the game in play.
Order: Once per turn, discard 2 cards from your hand to ready Zoltan.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ugly, foul-smelling, and disgruntled. If he weren't so damned useful I would have had his hide ages ago." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Garth Drac
text: While Garth Drac is in play, your hand size is increased by one if your warlord is Free Kingdoms.

setInfos.flavorText: Forebear. Thy enemy is not the Storm, but those who seek to subjugate it.

name: Owen Haadh
text: Order: Once per turn, target a character in your army. The target is +1 level for equipping items until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Stop staring at the treasure and start looking for the traps!" - Seraphina Corazon

name: Maeve ni Duhonn
text:
Maeve may ignore class requirements when equipping Weapons.
Maeve has +1 level for equipping Weapons.

setInfos.flavorText: If these lands are to be saved, it will be through strength of spirit.

name: Bone Golem
text: React: Before Bone Golem suffers wounds, spend a Necromancer: Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "I couldn't find any owlbears." - Skyyrek
Sometimes the elves don't raise the dead-they just use them for spare parts.

name: Wretched Horde
text: Any time that you have no fighters within one rank of Wretched Horde, Wretched Horde is killed.

setInfos.flavorText: "I really don't know why House Netheryn keeps its slaves alive. It seems so... inefficient." - Ellyah

name: Danae
text: React: After Danae performs a melee strike, move him backwards one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Thank you for your instruction so long ago, master Taraniel. Now I am Master of the Wind... and you and your house will soon be nothing but ash.

name: Rocetmal
text: Characters adjacent to Rocetmal have +1 hit point.

setInfos.flavorText: The humans have no real magic, only tricks and illusions, the hopeless dreams of a child who is afraid to face the truth. We will destroy them.

name: Tareshinal
text:
Tareshinal may not be targeted by ranged strikes.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Glyn didn't just teach his children to shoot a bow. He taught them to understand the archer's mind.

name: Aradiel
text: React: After this character enters play, move him forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: What do generals know? Nothing. The war will be won or lost down in the trenches, and they won't even realize when we're done.

name: Alchemist's Arrows
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Scouts and Rangers have +2 Levels for equipping this item.
React: After this character performs a non-spell ranged strike that hit, spend the Arrows: Characters that were adjacent to the original target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 10) or suffer a wound.

name: Battle Bear
text:
May not equip items.
Battle Bear may enter play adjacent to a ready Claw, ignoring rank requirements.

setInfos.flavorText: The Scions of the Dwarves are born of prophecy, and only a few rise in any generation. They are incapable of betrayal. If one should ever lie, his sword and his heart will shatter forever.

name: Barhon Ironblade
text: Barhon has +1 hit point while he is adjacent to one or more Gargoyles.

setInfos.flavorText: "He earned his name against the Abyssals. He will earn his fate by bringing low a nation." - Vision

name: Keeper
text: Keeper is +1 level for casting cleric spells for each item he has equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: St. Vhorim preaches 'waste not, want not,' and by Kor, I'm taking him up on it!

name: Blue Jasper Gargoyle
text:
You must have a level 4 or higher cleric in your army to bring Blue Jasper Gargoule into play.
Blue Jasper Gargoyle does not ready during the Ready Phase.
Order: Once per turn, Blue Jasper Gargoyle may perform a dexterity skill check (DC 14). If successful, ready him.

name: Douglas Hammerfall
text: If possible, Douglas must always select Angus Hammerfall to be the target of melee strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'll do it, Poison. Not for you, but for him..."
"He remembers more ways to put us back together than the Abyssals have of taking us apart. Lucky us." - Rac Ironbone

name: Achirenus
text:
Achirenus is both a cleric and a fighter.
Achirenus enters play as if he were level 4.
Order: Discard a cleric spell from your hand to perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "He used to be a man of the cloth. Now he uses the cloth to clean his sword." - Keziah

name: Lady Peregrine
text: React: Before Lady Peregrine performs a melee strike, discard a card to give her +3 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: Her parents named her for their best hawk, and indead, she is both huntress and pursued.
"I would follow my liege lord to the ends of the Earth. That is my choice, my honor, and my destiny." - Dunbar
"With this, I can do anything. I can even cure a man of a 50 foot fall, provided he didn't actually hit the ground, of course..." - Basil Nemis

name: Bracers of Ichaerus
text:
If this character is a cleric, adjacent characters have +2 AC.
If this character is a fighter, he has +2 AC.
React: After a melee strike targets this character, spend Bracers of Ichaerus: If this character is a wizard, the strike is a Critical Failure.

name: Rod of Smiting
text: Spend Order: Target an Undead character of lower level than this character. Stun the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Away with you, unclean one," said Behlial, his hand upraised in forbiddance. "You may not tread upon this holy ground." Without a word, the lich withdrew, and the message he bore was forever lost to Athanaes.

name: Uthanak's Ring
text: React: Before fixing an illegal rank, spend Uthanak's Ring: Move a character you control forward or backward one rank if the move will make the rank legal. This is a Tactics action.

setInfos.flavorText: "The ring made a brute into a general." - Set'rokh
"Where did you get that, Kenia? Tell me!" - Krun

name: Wyvernsteed
text: Order: Spend Wyvernsteed: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Pitiful mockeries of the noble verdatha, and with even less patience. Truely not worth the effort-and lives-it takes to break them." - Sir Magnus Arcadis
"Brutal, stupid beasts, with no loyalty. I've seen them feed on their fallen masters while battle rages around them. I wouldn't ride one for all the gold in Sharn." - Yemat

name: Helm of Corruption
text: React: After a character in this rank fails a skill check, spend the Helm to reroll the die.

setInfos.flavorText: "Savrukk burns his way through the lands of Baraxton, and Hate sends Taoth to intercept. The humans never asked why." - Timmuk

name: Bow of Farsight
text: Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "It allows its owner to see for leagues, but doesn't grant any extraordinary skill at shooting. One still has to aim, but at least there's no danger if you miss." - Logan
"Do you think you are safe back there, you cowardly, slow moving..." - Angus Hammerfall

name: Bone Hound
text: React: After this wizard kills a character with a spell, spend the Bone Hound to ready the wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: Lord Winter's pets are as fierce as a winter's storm. They have no taste for mercy.

name: Wards of Peril
text: React: Spend the Wards to cancel a React played during a melee strike or ranged strike targeting this wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "Amateurs." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Brindle's Brew Potion
text:
Order: Once per turn, equip the Potion to another character in this rank, ignoring class and level requirements.
React: After this character suffers one or more wounds, discard the potion to reduce the wounds to zero. This character loses one hit point, permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "As sweet as my kiss." - Brindle

name: Weapon Grab
text: Order: Target a Weapon equipped by an opposing character within one rank. This rogue and the target character each roll a die and add their skill. If the rogue's total is greater, the rogue may either equip the Weapon if he may legally do so, or else discard it.

name: Pit Trap
text:
Ranger and Scout only.
Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters in one opposing army must succeed with a Perception check (DC 10) after they move into the first rank, or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not bad, for your first try." - Pitfall

name: Camel
text:
Order: Spend Camel: Move this character either forward one rank or to another position in this rank.
Order: Once per turn, spend Camel: Ready a non-stunned item of Level 5 or less equipped to this character.

name: Baraxton's Signet
text:
+3 Skill
May only be equipped by a Free Kingdoms character.
React: Before you put a Free Kingdoms character into play, discard the Signet to reduce the entering rank of the character by up to 2 ranks.

name: Calix's Signet
text:
+3 Skill
May only be equipped by an Elf character.
React: Before you put an Elf into play, discard the Signet to reduce the entering rank of the character by up to 2 ranks.

name: Hate's Signet
text:
+3 Skill
May only be equipped by a Nothrog character.
React: Before you put a Nothrog into play, discard the Signet to reduce the entering rank of the character by up to 2 ranks.

name: Hember's Signet
text:
+3 Skill
May only be equipped by a Dwarf character.
React: Before you put a Dwarf into play, discard the Signet to reduce the entering rank of the character by up to 2 ranks.
errata: Erratum: Should be level 9 with no ATK or AC modifications.

name: Signon's Signet
text:
+3 Skill
May only be equipped by a Deverenian character.
React: Before you put a Deverenian into play, discard the Signet to reduce the entering rank of the character by up to 2 ranks.

name: Aenne the Tempest
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike that inflicts two additional wounds if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "She has been touched by the fury of the Storm... but her heart is too weak to hold the truth." - Slayer the Unkind
"She has been touched by the fury of the Storm... but her heart is too weak to hold the truth." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Alesandressa
text: Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +4 ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "The elves call her the 'Lady of the Will'o'wisps', but I don't recommend you call her anything. If you tried, you'd already be too close." - Basil Nemis
"The elves call her the 'Lady of the Will'o'wisps', but I don't recommend you call her anything. If you tried, you'd already be too close." - Basil Nemis

name: Alia
text: Alia gains +4 ATK when making a melee strike against a spent opponent.

setInfos.flavorText: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
In the end we will remember not the words of our enemies but the silence of our friends.

name: Amulet of Force
text:
Order: Spend the Amulet to perform a +3 ranged strike.
Order: Discard the Amulet to perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Life is but a childhood. Death is ever after." - Artheon
"Life is but a childhood. Death is ever after." - Artheon

name: Artheon
text: Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Can you count to Ten, meddling human?"
The end of life is the beginning of wisdom, human. What you stole from us long ago, we will now teach you to fear.
The end of life is the beginning of wisdom, human. What you stole from us long ago, we will now teach you to fear.

name: Malcolm Aedroud
text: Order: Discard a card: Malcolm gains +4 ATK until end of turn. Choose an opposing player. You each make an Initiative roll. If you win, you may perform an additional Order after this one.
errata:
All initiative rolls are made by the Warlord.
Add any bonuses to the roll as normal.

name: Helm of the Djinn
text:
If this character is a cleric he has +4 skill.
If this character is a rogue he has +2 AC.
Order: Spend Helm of the Djinn: If this character is a wizard, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Assassination
text: React: Play before this rogue makes a melee strike roll targeting a spent opponent. The strike roll is automatically a 'natural 20' and inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Night is the darker half of life, Logan. Never turn your back on it. Or me." - Black Tom of Corinth
"Night is the darker half of life, Logan. Never turn your back on it. Or me." - Black Tom of Corinth

name: Avalanche
text: Whenever Avalanche is targeting a Monster with a melee strike, add +5 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: Ye fight w'monsters, aye? Then watch that ye do not become one.
Ye fight w'monsters, aye? Then watch that ye do not become one.

name: Azamereth Flamekeeper
text: Spend React: Before a melee strike roll targeting Azamereth, Azamereth performs a melee strike targeting the attacker.

setInfos.flavorText: All flame is born in the Desert of Narawat. It is the beating heart of the world.
All flame is born in the Desert of Narawat. It is the beating heart of the world.

name: Bag of Holding
text: Order: Spend the Bag of Holding and discard a card from your hand to draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "An old man in Baraxton used to use it to smuggle beer past his wife, but I've got other ideas..." - Basil Nemis
"An old man in Baraxton used to use it to smuggle beer past his wife, but I've got other ideas..." - Basil Nemis

name: Balmtear's Potion
text:
A character may not equip more than one Balmtear's Potion per game.
React: Discard Balmtear's Potion after this character suffers wounds. Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Filthy books can't teach you anything. To learn, you must experiment!" - L'sara
"Filthy books can't teach you anything. To learn, you must experiment!" - L'sara

name: Baqbou Umbala
text: Spend Order: Target a character in your army. Baqbou switches places with the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "One can never be too swift to save his brother."
"One can never be too swift to save his brother."

name: Bar Fight
text: Spend Order: This fighter targets a 1st rank character in an opposing army. The fighter performs a melee strike against the target, regardless of the fighter's current rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Sometimes a peasant's tool can be a warrior's greatest weapon.
Sometimes a peasant's tool can be a warrior's greatest weapon.

name: Basil Nemis
text: Basil gains +4 AC if all other armies have more characters in their 1st rank than your army has in its 1st rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Basil used to be the best second-story man in Baraxton, 'til Logan's wild ideas ruined 'im." - Jonah the Burglar
"Basil used to be the best second-story man in Baraxton, 'til Logan's wild ideas ruined 'im." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Battle Plans
text: Spend Order: This fighter must succeed with a perception check (DC 12) to move any number of characters you control forward or backward one rank, in any order you choose.

setInfos.flavorText: "An Deverenia is to survive, she must adapt to this new world." - Brymin
"The world's a big place, Timmy. But it's getting smaller every day." - Jack Casey
"The world's a big place, Timmy. But it's getting smaller every day." - Jack Casey

name: Behlial
text:
May start the game with clerics from other factions.
Clerics joining your army suffer no loyalty penalty
Order: Once per turn, look at the top five cards of your deck. You may return them to the top of the deck in the same order, or shuffle them into the deck. Draw a card.

name: Mkono-Djarat
text:
If this character is a fighter, he has an additional melee strike (Base +4) when he attacks. If this character is a rogue, he has Riposte +3.
React: Once per turn, after performing a melee strike that wounded the target: If this character is a cleric remove one wound from him.

name: Below the Helm
text: React: Play after a melee strike by this rogue hits a character. The character is stunned instead of wounded.

setInfos.flavorText: "Where the helm meets the gorget, there's a hole just big enough for a swordblade. Deverenians don't like us knowing about it, but it just might save your life." - Lieutenant Dunbar
"Where the helm meets the gorget, there's a hole just big enough for a swordblade. Deverenians don't like us knowing about it, but it just might save your life." - Lieutenant Dunbar

name: Between the Ribs
text: React: Play after this rogue fails a melee strike roll. You may reroll the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our trade is death, Hassimal, not gold. See that the King of Toheuth remembers that. Begin with his brother." - Black Tom
"Our trade is death, Hassimal, not gold. See that the King of Toheuth remembers that. Begin with his brother." - Black Tom

name: Bless
text:
Order: Target a character in this cleric's army. The target gains +4 AC until the end of the turn.
Spend React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting a character in this cleric's army. The target gains +4 AC for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The humans do not yet know us, Faith," Gnorrow said. "Give them time, and they will understand."
"The humans do not yet know us, Faith," Gnorrow said. "Give them time, and they will understand."

name: Blind
text: Order: This cleric targets a character in the 1st rank. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or have his ATK changed to -5 until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "'S a foolish idea, human. Even wi'out eyes, Nothrog can still smell you." - Gorzhek
"'S a foolish idea, human. Even wi'out eyes, Nothrog can still smell you." - Gorzhek

name: Bloodsteed
text:
Order: Spend the Bloodsteed to move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Discard the Bloodsteed to move to any rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sins cast long shadows, if your eyes are sharp." - Nassiral Hate
"Sins cast long shadows, if your eyes are sharp." - Nassiral Hate

name: Bracers of Archery
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Ranged strike rolls made by this character add +4 to the die roll.
If this character rolls a natural 20 for a ranged strike roll, the strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "An arrow does not hear your screams. It does not turn aside for pity or for gold. Do not waste the breath-it will be your last." - Gueniveure
"An arrow does not hear your screams. It does not turn aside for pity or for gold. Do not waste the breath-it will be your last." - Gueniveure

name: Bracers of Hember
text: React: Discard the Bracers after a melee strike roll targeting this character. The strike automatically fails.

setInfos.flavorText: "There are truths that can kill a nation. Hember knew that, Gnorrow. Why can you not see it, before it is too late?" - Faith
"There are truths that can kill a nation. Hember knew that, Gnorrow. Why can you not see it, before it is too late?" - Faith

name: Bracers of Ogre Power
text: This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he or she hits with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText:
"I've never heard of the Tribe of Bears," Maxmilian said. "Where do they live?"
"They used to live in the lowlands," Uther replied with a savage grin. "But not anymore."

"I've never heard of the Tribe of Bears," Maxmilian said. "Where do they live?"
"They used to live in the lowlands," Uther replied with a savage grin. "But not anymore."

name: Breastplate of Power
text: Other characters in this rank gain +2 ATK and AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "The armor itself has no power-that's its secret. But the confidence it inspires in my men allows them to realise the true potential within themselves." - King Alaric
"Our sovereign Emperor commands, and we will do our duty. No rein can hold obedience forever." - Lady Beatrix
"Our sovereign Emperor commands, and we will do our duty. No rein can hold obedience forever." - Lady Beatrix

name: Bull Strength
text: Order: Target a character in this cleric's army. The target gains +3 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our camp was ambushed by these creatures. We dragged out our dead for burial... but judging by the creatures' cooking fires, we didn't get them all." - Guardian
"Our camp was ambushed by these creatures. We dragged out our dead for burial... but judging by the creatures' cooking fires, we didn't get them all." - Guardian

name: Ursus
text:
Druid and Ranger only.
Order: Spend Ursus: Ursus performs a melee strike as a Level 3 fighter with +7 ATK, 12 AC, +3 Skill, and 1 HP. Ursus' melee strikes stun the target in addition to wounding.

setInfos.flavorText: "Never underestimate the threat of bears."

name: Caltrops
text: Spend Order: Can only be performed by a rogue in the 1st rank. Until the end of the turn, this rogue has the ability "React: Once per strike, before a melee strike roll targeting a character in this rank, perform a melee strike with an ATK of +0 (+3 versus characters with a Steed equipped) targeting the opponent."

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't worry about us being followed. I've got that part covered." - Davon Harper
"Don't worry about us being followed. I've got that part covered." - Devon Harper

name: Cardinal Scelus
text: Order: Once per turn: Move a Deverenian you control forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The fat schemer had fallen out of favor when Rhawn ascended to the throne. Now he is back, picking riches out of ruins." - Magellan
The Storm, that Lion within the Sky, bids us open our arms and welcome its righteous strength, And so say I: gather what thou needest, mage. The Church will be with thee in thy quest.
The Storm, that Lion within the Sky, bids us open our arms and welcome its righteous strength, And so say I: gather what thou needest, mage. The Church will be with thee in thy quest.

name: Chinua Ukwu
text: Chinua cannot become ready if he is in the same rank as an evil character.

setInfos.flavorText: The darkness... is almost too much to bear.
The darkness... is almost too much to bear.

name: Cleave
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. If the strike hits, the fighter inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "You live in a forest, elf. Forests can be cut down." - Husuk
"You live in a forest, elf. Forests can be cut down." - Husuk

name: Come Get Some
text: Order: Until this fighter is killed or the turn ends, other characters in the same rank can't be targeted with melee strikes. Until the turn ends, this fighter can be targeted with melee strikes regardless of card effects.

setInfos.flavorText: If you aren't with us, you're against us.
If you aren't with us, you're against us.

name: Cordeos
text: Spend Order: Target a character up to 3 ranks away. Cordeos and the target each suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: Humanity is a disease that we will boil down to clean, white bone.
Humanity is a disease that we will boil down to clean, white bone.
There is no beast so fierce that he does not know some mercy, some pity. I know none, and therefore, I am no beast.
There is no beast so fierce that he does not know some mercy, some pity. I know none, and therefore, I am no beast.

name: Critical Strike
text: React: Play after this fighter fails a melee strike roll. You may reroll the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Magic, prayers, cunning... these things cannot save you from the Sword." - Sethusk
"Magic, prayers, cunning... these things cannot save you from the Sword." - Sethusk

name: Crystalsphere Staff
text: Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike that can target any character in play, regardless of ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Faith is your guide; Neus will not cast away an innocent man." - Frederik Lahr
"Faith is your guide; Neus will not cast away an innocent man." - Frederik Lahr

name: Daedelia
text: After Daedelia enters play, draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Such sweet music she makes of torture. Men die just to hear her play..." - Absinthe
"Such sweet music she makes of torture. Men die just to hear her play..." - Absinthe

name: Calavera
text:
Cleric and wizard only.
Order: Spend Calavera and target an item in your discard pile that this character may legally equip: Shuffle the item into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Law-hammer is key. We find Lothian, and we hold the Emperor's voice." - Elsabet Drac
"Reveal to me Bruntor's vestments." - Sorceress Ygraine

name: Darius
text: Darius and adjacent Deverenians gain +1 Level for equipping Weapons.

setInfos.flavorText: "Find me a source of blackiron, and I can forge weapons worthy of our noble crusade."
"With each battle, men die, and more soldiers have need for swords. War is good for business, son. Remember that."
"With each battle, men die, and more soldiers have need for swords. War is good for business, son. Remember that."

name: Darkness
text: React: After Darkness kills a higher Level character with a melee strike, draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "The dwarven nation needs the King's Assassins to continue their duty, whether or not the king himself approves. Our bond of secrecy must merely draw tighter, until it bleeds."
Your father is just a man, Alaric, which is why he needs my father and me all the more...
Your father is just a man, Alaric, which is why he needs my father and me all the more...

name: Death Blow
text: Order: If this fighter has not already attacked this turn, the fighter does not spend the next time he performs an attack. The fighter is killed at the end of this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "There are two true deaths, uplander-the center of the earth, and the Great Storm. You fight your enemies above; we fight ours below." - Axe
"There are two true deaths, uplander-the center of the earth, and the Great Storm. You fight your enemies above; we fight ours below." - Axe

name: Death Rune
text: Spend Order: This wizard attaches this card to a Weapon in your army that does not have a Death Rune. While the rune is attached, the weapon inflicts an additional wound whenever it hits with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kill sound, kill breath, kill light, bring death." - Chant of Silverflame
"Kill sound, kill breath, kill light, bring death." - Chant of Silverflame

name: Deverenian Hound
text: Order: When in the 1st rank, spend the Hound to have it attack as a Level 1 fighter with AC 10, 1 hit point, and ATK of +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "The only thing worse than the dogs is their infernal Master." - Husuk
"The only thing worse than the dogs is their infernal Master." - Husuk
"You hired me to silence him, your honor. I assure you, dead men don't speak."
"You hired me to silence him, your honor. I assure you, dead men don't speak."

name: Distraction
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn only higher-level chaacters may target this rogue with melee strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ah, the old vine-across-the-path trick. I've seen this more times than I can count... wonder why they thought it'd work today?"
"Ah, the old vine-across-the-path trick. I've seen this more times than I can count... wonder why they thought it'd work today?"

name: Divine Guidance
text: Order: Discard a card from your hand: Ready this cleric.

setInfos.flavorText: "Many call it a new path. I simply think of it as speeding progress along the old." - Kerebrus
"You can be taught religion. You can never be taught faith." - Frederik Lahr
"You can be taught religion. You can never be taught faith." - Frederik Lahr

name: Dodge
text: React: Play before a melee strike or ranged strike roll targeting this rogue. The rogue gains +8 AC until the end of this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "You've got a great big sword, and still that's the best a Baraxton guard has to offer? Here, let's see what my little ones can do." - Keziah
"You've got a great big sword, and still that's the best a Baraxton guard has to offer? Here, let's see what my little ones can do." - Keziah

name: Doppleganger
text: React: After the Doppleganger kills an opposing character with a melee strike, the Doppleganger may permanently copy one of the following from that character (replacing the Doppleganger's stat): Class, Level, base ATKs, AC, hit points, or skill.

setInfos.flavorText: Do you trust your brother, Rhawn?
Do you trust your brother, Rhawn?

name: Icetalon
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
This character's non-spell ranged strikes inflict an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Careful Freeman, Vivian can strike you twice before you breathe again." - Elees
"Hm. Spoils of war." - Captain Dukat
An ancient bow, made, it is said, from the bone of the Great Dragon himself.

name: Duchess Brymin
text:
May start the game with fighters from other factions.
Fighters joining this army suffer no loyalty penalty.
React: Once per turn, after Brymin kills a character with a melee strike, draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: Destiny. A tyrant's excuse for butchery, a coward's excuse for failure. I will make my own path.
Destiny. A tyrant's excuse for butchery, a coward's excuse for failure. I will make my own path.

"I found him on the road, a babe abandoned by his legion because of his blood. I raised the boy as my apprentice. He's like a son to me now. A simple-minded, foolish, arrogant wretch of a son, but a son nontheless." - Gaston, Chatelain of Arak Spire

"I found him on the road, a babe abandoned by his legion because of his blood. I raised the boy as my apprentice. He's like a son to me now. A simple-minded, foolish, arrogant wretch of a son, but a son nonetheless." - Gaston, Chatelain of Arak Spire

name: Elaneor Tremayne
text: Elaneor is +1 level for using rogue action cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "The blasphemed Elf that married her mother is long since dead, but her halfbreed brother still lives. If the lady sill not reveal him, then I will hunt him down and purge the Accordlands of their defiant blood." - Count Damien

"The blasphemous Elf that marred her mother is long since dead, but her halfbreed brother still lives. If the lady will not reveal him, then I will hunt him down and purge the Accordlands of their defiant blood." - Count Damien

name: Ellyah
text: Spend Order: Target an opposing character up to two ranks away and a character in your army. Until the end of turn, the opposing character suffers -4 AC and the character in your army gains +4 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: We of Dythanus serve an eternal cause and an eternal master.
We of Dythanus serve an eternal cause and an eternal master.

name: Extensions
text: Spend Order: This wizard lets you look at the top five cards of your deck. You may put one card in your hand. Return the remaining cards to either the top or bottom of your deck, in any order.

setInfos.flavorText: "They have forgotten the blood and the pain. They have forgotten why the Storm gathers, and that will be their undoing..." - Sorscha
"They have forgotten the blood and the pain. They have forgotten why the Storm gathers, and that will be their undoing..." - Sorscha
A mountain does not need allies. It needs roots, and it needs strength. Nothing more.
A mountain does not need allies. It needs roots, and it needs strength. Nothing more.
"Tell Sir Robert that I'm returning the blade he left behind!" The dagger sank into the human's flesh, and as it did, the woods echoed with mortal screams.
"Tell Sir Robert that I'm returning the blade he left behind!" The dagger sank into the human's flesh, and as it did, the woods echoed with mortal screams.

name: Fett Anjaran
text: Order: Once per turn, target a character in this or an adjacent rank who gains +2 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fett, the wizard. He did chant, and methinks a scream that was not my own did escape my soul. I fear he put a spirit within me that day, one that will never leave my shadowed heart." - Lady Ersane
"Fett, the wizard. He did chant, and methinks a scream that was not my own did escape my soul. I fear he put a spirit within me that day, one that will never leave my shadowed heart." - Lady Ersane

name: Final Stand
text: Spend Order: If this fighter is in the 1st rank, target any number of characters in another army's 1st rank. This fighter performs consecutive melee strikes against each target with a penalty to his or her ATK equal to the number of targets. If the fighter fails to kill a target with a strike, the remaining strikes are lost.

name: Finesse
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. If this fighter has a Weapon equipped, the AC bonus of the opponent's items are negated for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "That's two, human. How many more do you have in your quarrel? I'll wager it isn't enough." - Lathos
"That's two, human. How many more do you have in your quarrel? I'll wager it isn't enough." - Lathos

name: Spiked Shield
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
If this character is a fighter, he has an additional melee strike (Base +1) when he performs an attack.
If this character is a rogue, he has Riposte +5.

name: Flame Arrows
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike. This wizard may then perform a +2 ranged strike against a character that was adjacent to the first target.

setInfos.flavorText: "I could expound at length about my love of flame. But I think that I'll demonstrate it to thee." - Yavlo the Kindled
"Everyone dies. Just set them on fire, Quinthe. You will see." - High Queen Tepheroth
"Everyone dies. Just set them on fire, Quinthe. You will see." - High Queen Tepheroth

name: Fumble
text: React: Play after a character rolls a natural 1 on a strike or save roll. The character suffers one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Oops." - Jonah the Burgler
"Oops." - Johan the Burglar

name: Giant Growth
text: React: Play before a character in this wizard's army makes a melee strike roll. The character gains +2 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "It ate ten men and three horses before it shrank back to size. I've never seen anything like it, and I never wish to again!"
"It ate ten men and three horses before it shrank back to size. I've never seen anything like it, and I never wish to again!"

name: Glyph of Fate
text: Order: Discard the Glyph to make the next roll your army makes a 'natural 20'.

setInfos.flavorText: All the races agree on this: in the beginning, the world was formed by the power of words.
All the races agree on this: in the beginning, the world was formed by the power of words.

name: Gnorrow Yaw
text: Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand to search your deck for a card with the Gargoyle trait, show it to the other players, then add it to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: If you risk nothing, you risk everything.
If you risk nothing, you risk everything.

name: Grukth
text: Nothrog in the rank behind one or more Grukth gain +3 to non-spell ranged strike rolls.

setInfos.flavorText: "They offer battle on the open plain. How foolish can you be?"
"Just tell me where to point the bow." - Maakh
"Just tell me where to point the bow." - Maakh

name: Halberdier
text: Your army gains +1 to its initiative roll.

setInfos.flavorText: The kingdom of Andover has fallen to the Elves, and Llyr is aflame as well! There is nothing left in the south, Gen'ral-nothing but blood and bone!
The kingdom of Andover has fallen to the Elves, and Llyr is aflame as well! There is nothing left in the south, Gen'ral-nothing but blood and bone!

name: Hammer of Peronor
text: This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he or she hits characters of opposite alignment with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is said that Peronor, Templar of Llyr, was betrayed and murdered. I do not know if it is true, but I have never seen the weapon unstained with blood, no matter how you clean it." - Keziah
"It is said that Peronor, Templar of Llyr, was betrayed and murdered. I do not know if it is true, but I have never seen the weapon unstained with blood, no matter how you clean it." - Keziah

name: Hamstring
text: React: Play before this rogue makes a melee strike roll. The rogue makes an additional melee strike to the same starget with ATK equal to the impending strike roll. If the additional strike hits, it does not cause a wound, but the target suffers a -5 AC penalty until the end of the turn.

name: Hassimal
text: Order: Spend Hassimal and another character in your army to draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's easy to pick the pockets of a dead man."
"It's easy to pick the pockets of a dead man."

name: Symbol of Kor
text: This character is +1 Level for casting spells and adds +2 to his magic saves.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kor bless us with your wisdom." - Atone
"Kor empower me to move the earth when I must, and to humbly accept your will at all other times." - Truth
When first we saw it, it was covered with earth; after the battle of Nyothes, it was stained with blood. Do not trust these butchering Dwarves. They have no concept of honor.
When first we saw it, it was covered with earth; after the battle of Nyothes, it was stained with blood. Do not trust these butchering Dwarves. They have no concept of honor.

name: Ice Bolt
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to three ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ice, like all forces of nature is even more deadly when controlled by the intellect of a sorcerer." - Fett Anjaran
"Ice, like all forces of nature, is even more deadly when controlled by the intellect of a sorcerer." - Fett Anjaran

name: Imperial Guard
text: Imperial Guard has +2 ATK and +2 AC while Princess Dashkova is in play.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is said that Imperial Guardsmen can see the world through the eyes of their hawks. Most people think that's ridiculous. I know better." - Sali
"It is said that Imperial Guardsmen can see the world through the eyes of their hawks. Most people think that's ridiculous. I know better." - Sali

name: Improvised Weapon
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. The fighter gains +3 ATK for this strike. The fighter has a Weapon for this strike (even if he or she already had one equipped).

setInfos.flavorText: I may not make it out of this cursed mine, elf-but neither will you.
I may not make it out of this cursed mine, elf-but neither will you.

name: Inferno
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets one to three different characters that are up to two ranks away and adjacent to each other. Select the order of attack, then this wizard performs a +5 ranged strike to each target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Rathe was sworn to Alia, and pledged to Rowan... until Tepheroth condemned the House. Now his love has turned to hate, and fire to ice." - Fethinos
"Rathe was sworn to Alia, and pledged to Rowan... until Tepheroth condemned the House. Now his love has turned to hate, and fire to ice." - Fethinos

name: Invisibility Potion
text: Discard the Invisibility Potion at the end of the turn or the next time this character performs a strike or action, whichever comes first.

setInfos.flavorText: "Elves do not know fear, Taraniel, but humans do. We must teach our brethren what they have been missing." - Alia of Rowan
"Elves do not know fear, Taraniel, but humans do. We must teach our brethren what they have been missing." - Alia of Rowan

name: Jack of All Trades
text: Order: This rogue is +1 level until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "A shovel? A pair of marching boots? Is that an anvil? By Kor! What else have ye got in that bag, lad?" - Hammer
"A shovel? A pair of marching boots? Is that an anvil? By Kor! What else have ye got in that bag, lad?" - Hammer

name: Johan Halfblood
text: Spend React: Immediately after you perform an Order, perform another Order.

setInfos.flavorText: "I hate the Elves. If I could, I'd steal my father's blood back from them. Because I cannot, I'll have to be satisfied with theirs."
"I hate the Elves. If I could, I'd steal my father's blood back from them. Because I cannot, I'll have to be satisfied with theirs."

name: King Xod
text:
Dwarves in your army are +1 level for equipping items.
Order: Once per turn, search your deck for an item of level 5 or less, show it to the other players, then add it to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have buried three sons, I will not bury a nation."
"I have buried three sons, I will not bury a nation."

name: Knowledge
text: Order: Kill Knowledge to search your deck for a card with the Gargoyle trait. Show it to the other players, then place the Gargoyle on top of the deck.

setInfos.flavorText: No, Alaric, you are wrong. Strength is in the will, the power of the mind and the conviction of the spirit. Perhaps one day you will see.
No, Alaric, you are wrong. Strength is in the will, the power of the mind and the conviction of the spirit. Perhaps one day you will see.
"Beatrix has her honor, but Rellion ne'er will let her forget the terrible price she paid to restore it." - Lord Anandale
"Beatrix has her honor, but Rellion ne'er will let her forget the terrible price she paid to restore it." - Lord Anandale

name: Armor of Faith
text:
Your Cantors have the ability "Spend Order: Equip Armor of Faith from your discard pile."
Order: Spend Armor of Faith: Target character within one rank has +3 ATK or +3 AC until end of turn.

name: Lathos
text: React: Once per strike, after a melee strike against Lathos, Lathos may make a melee strike against his opponent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Too slow, human. You lose the other ear. Would you like to try a third time, or would that be too humiliating for you?"
"Too slow, human. You lose the other ear. Would you like to try a third time, or would that be too humiliating for you?"

name: Logan Ebonwoulfe
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike. Perform a +1 ranged strike.
React: Once per turn, after target opposing character makes a melee strike roll: The target rerolls the die.

setInfos.flavorText: "They were born free, too."
I was born free. I will die the same.
I was born free. I will die the same.

name: Loyal Nag
text: Order: Spend Loyal Nag: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sometimes it seems as if we two are the only ones that remember, old girl. But I swear, you will live long enough to see old gods returned to prominence." - Haseeka
"I'm a soldier, not a stableboy!" - Stanley
"Too bad she can't cook."
"Too bad she can't cook."

name: Loyalty's Reward
text: Spend Order: Draw two cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "Once Alia of Rowan was a queen, but fires and fortunes have stripped the lady of everything-including honor." - Count Damien
"Once Alia of Rowan was a queen, but fires and fortunes have stripped the lady of everything-including honor." - Count Damien

"One hundred years... did you think we would forget so easily? Our oath is fulfilled, and it is time to show you humans how well we remember. I will give you one cut for each year, on the body of your king."

"One hundred years... did you think we would forget so easily? Our oath is fulfilled, and it is time to show you humans how well we remember. I will give you one cut for each year, on the body of your king."

name: Maakh
text: Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Kill a soldier, and one man suffers. Kill a king, and a nation bleeds.
Kill a soldier, and one man suffers. Kill a king, and a nation bleeds.

name: Madriga's Defense
text: React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting this fighter. Roll a die. If your opponent's melee strike roll is not higher than your roll (ignoring all modifiers), the strike automatically fails.

setInfos.flavorText: Try as I might, I couldn't lay a hand on her!
Try as I might, I couldn't lay a hand on her!

name: Magheline
text: Order: Once per turn, target a stunned character. The target becomes spent.

setInfos.flavorText: All our pretty secrets, asleep in tombs of curling vine. We shall wake them... In time. In time.
All our pretty secrets, asleep in tombs of curling vine. We shall wake them... In time. In time.

name: Mass Blessing
text: Order: Target one rank in your army. Until the end of the turn, all characters gain ATK and AC bonuses equal to this cleric's level while in that rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Three sons, Gnorrow, and countless brothers-in-arms. I sent them out to death, and now their faces haunt me..." - King Xod
"Three sons, Gnorrow, and countless brothers-in-arms. I sent them out to death, and now their faces haunt me..." - King Xod

name: Mixed Potion
text:
Order: Once per turn, equip the Potion to another character in this rank, ignoring class.
Order: Discard the Mixed Potion to produce a random effect. Roll a die:
1: Turns into a frog and is killed.
2-6: suffers 1 wound.
7-12: +3 ATK/+3 AC until the end of the turn.
13-17: +1 hit point, permanently.
18+: +1 level, +3 ATK, +3 AC, and +1 hit point, permanently.

name: Healing Potion
text:
A character may not equip more than one Healing Potion per game.
Order: Destroy Healing Potion: Remove a wound from a character in this rank.
React: Before target character in this rank suffers wounds, destroy Healing Potion: Reduce the wounds to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: "Give it to Sakal, but don't let him go near the heavy weapons for a day." - Donovan Che'har
"Ugh. What cruel man said this tasted of cherries?"
"Who cares where it came from, as long as it works!" - Devon Harper

name: Not Fast Enough
text: React: Play before this rogue makes a melee strike roll. Choose one item on the defender. The item has no effect on play (is considered blank) until the end of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Just avoid their sword arm. After that, a Deverenian isn't much more than a big pile of tin. Slow-moving tin, at that." - Rora Blackmane
"Just avoid their sword arm. After that, a Deverenian isn't much more than a big pile of tin. Slow-moving tin, at that." - Rora Blackmane

name: Only Ruined My Shield
text: React: Play after this fighter suffers wounds. Discard a Shield or Armor the fighter has equipped to reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "I hate to think what would have happened if I hadn't been under a flag of truce!"
"I hate to think what would have happened if I hadn't been under a flag of truce!"

name: Orazhuk
text:
Spend Order: Move forward or backward two ranks
Spend Order: Target and move a character in your army forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Ambition can creep as well as soar.
Ambition can creep as well as soar.

name: Overhand Block
text: React: Play after a melee strike roll targeting this fighter. The fighter gains +2 AC for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: You are weary, human. Give up now, and your death will be swift. Fight, and it will be an eternity until the dawn.
You are weary, human. Give up now, and your death will be swift. Fight, and it will be an eternity until the dawn.

name: Overrun
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. If the fighter has a Steed equipped, the strike inflicts an additional wound, if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText:
"There is one advantage we have against the elves," Robert said thoughtfully. "Speed."
"But how can speed help us?" Dunbar asked.
Robert grinned. "Watch and see."

"There is one advantage we have against the elves," Robert said thoughtfully. "Speed."
"But how can speed help us?" Dunbar asked.
Robert grinned. "Watch and see."

name: Palethis
text: Spend Order: Move to any rank in your army if the move will not create an illegal rank.

setInfos.flavorText: He goes about the business of the noble houses, watching the war unfold and trying not to think of the human that once saved his life.
He goes about the business of the noble houses, watching the war unfold and trying not to think of the human that once saved his life.

name: Phar'Dunn
text: Phar'Dunn may only move backward using a card effect.

setInfos.flavorText: "They call him 'The Ogre', and for good reason. He besieges the south wall of Baraxton... alone." - Axe
"They call him 'The Ogre', and for good reason. He besieges the south wall at Baraxton... alone." - Axe

name: Poison Dagger
text: React: Spend the Dagger after this character fails a melee strike roll to make another melee strike roll at ATK +0.

setInfos.flavorText: "One day, Tepheroth, you will turn and find me behind you, my father's blade shining with your blood." - Taraniel
"One day, Tepheroth, you will turn and find me behind you, my father's blade shining with your blood." - Taraniel

name: Poisoned Blade
text: React: Play before this rogue makes a melee strike roll. The target of the rogue's strike must roll a die. If the roll is greater than their printed AC (without modifiers), the target immediately has -4 ATK and -3 AC permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "If you have a mercenary for a friend, you don't need any enemies."
"If you have a mercenary for a friend, you don't need any enemies."

name: Portable Hole
text:
Order: Spend Portable Hole to move this rogue up to any rank in your army, as long as the move will not create an illegal rank.
Order: Once per turn, discard an item equipped by this rogue to draw a card.

name: Shield of the Storm
text: React: After target character in your army dies, kill this character: Put the target into your hand from the discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "Throughout the Empire, they marched, visions of glory in their minds. The Eternal Emperor enthroned, but work yet to be done."

name: Prismatic Spray
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to three ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or suffer one wound and be stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now, I bid you, run. You strive against things impossible, and we have the better of you." - Bruin Lenoire
"Now, I bid you, run. You strive against things impossible, and we have the better of you." - Bruin Lenoire

name: Relentless
text: Order: Move this rogue forward or backward one rank. If the rogue moves into the 1st rank, he or she may immediately attack.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'd rather fight beside a human than die to a Nothrog... but don't make me think about it for long." - Lucien Stormcrow
"I'd rather fight beside a human than die to a Nothrog... but don't make me think about it for long." - Lucien Stormcrow

name: Reserves
text: React: Play after a character in your army is killed, creating an illegal rank. Put a character from your hand into play in the rank in front of the illegal rank. If the character's level is greater than the rank, the character is stunned. You may not play a character that you could not legally play with your army's current formation.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let the dwarves have the mountains. I have too many wounded, too few to bear the burden of our protection, to worry about their 'quest'." - Sir Robert the Vigilant

name: Righteous Faith
text: React: Play after this cleric rolls a die to add 3 to the result.

setInfos.flavorText: "May the strength of the Storm be within thy good arm, and the wind of holy righteousness follow thee all the days of thy life." - Deverenian blessing
"May the strength of the Storm be within thy good arm, and the wind of holy righteousness follow thee all the days of thy life." - Deverenian blessing

name: Rod of Roaring Flames
text: Order: Spend the Rod of Roaring Flames to perform a +0 ranged strike. Add this character's level to the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nafcallisar!" the dwarf shouted, and a torrent of flame ripped from his wand, charring the undead to ash.
"Nafcallisar!" the dwarf shouted, and a torrent of flame ripped from his wand, charring the undead to ash.

name: Rune of Swift Striking
text: Spend Order: This wizard attaches this card to a Weapon in your army that does not have a Rune of Swift Striking. While this rune is attached, the weapon provides an additional melee strike with a base ATK of +0 whenever its character attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Take that, Myerdeth scum! And that! And that!" - Johan Halfblood
"Take that, Myerdeth scum! And that! And that!" - Johan Halfblood

"She has stolen the secret of the Deverenian hawks, and escaped to the Free Kingdoms with little more than her life. It will not be long before the Emperor's guard finds her... and us." - Timothy Windson

"She has stolen the secret of the Deverenian hawks, and escaped to the Free Kingdoms with little more than her life. It will not be long before the Emperor's guard finds her... and us." - Timothy Windson

name: Sand in Your Eyes
text: React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting this rogue. The rogue's opponent suffers a -5 ATK penalty until the end of this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't fight fair. That's like saying your enemy's as good as you, and worth respect." - Kenia
"Don't fight fair. That's like saying your enemy's as good as you, and worth respect." - Kenia

name: Saul Tombcarver
text: After Saul enters play, you may kill a character in your army to give Saul +1 hit point permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: He climbs on the walls of the Abyss, seeking the bones of fallen dwarves. "I can't leave them," says Saul. "Would you so easily forget me?"
He climbs on the walls of the Abyss, seeking the bones of fallen dwarves. "I can't leave them," says Saul. "Would you so easily forget me?"

name: Scavenge
text: React: Play when this rogue is equipping an item. The rogue has +1 level for equipping this item.

setInfos.flavorText: "What's wrong with taking a sword or two, an our squires have need? These Free Kingdom curs shan't be using weapons henceforth." - Lady Elaneor
"What's wrong with taking a sword or two, an our squires have need? These Free Kingdom curs shan't be using weapons henceforth." - Lady Elaneor

name: Sir Searlus
text: Characters 3 or more Levels lower than Sir Searlus may not target him with melee strikes unless there is no other legal target.

setInfos.flavorText: "For the good of mine soul, I betrayeth mine Emperor."

name: Wyvern Hammer
text: This character has +1 ATK for each other character in this rank with the same alignment as this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "You know the Wyvern Legion's been awflully quite since the dragons invaded..."
"Loyalty is a tool. My tool." - Vakeros

name: Sethusk
text: Spend Order: Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Checkmate. Baraxton falls." The Nothrog didn't even bother to reach for his sword. "You die."
"Checkmate. Baraxton falls." The Nothrog didn't even bother to reach for his sword. "You die."

name: Shade Harpy
text: Shade Harpy gains +2 ATK for each other Shade Harpy in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "When a harpy sings her head off, she usually improves her appearance." - Basil Nemis
"When a harpy sings her head off, she usually improves her appearance." - Basil Nemis

name: Shield Bash
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. The fighter gains +6 ATK for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "War does not call for heroes-it creates them from the blood and bone of lesser men." - Lord Anandale
"War does not call for heroes-it creates them from the blood and bone of lesser men." - Lord Anandale

name: Signon's Armor
text: This character may not be targeted by ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "And the breath of the Dragon did enfold him, and sheathe him in a steel so fine that not arrow nor dagger's pierce could cut away its scale." - the Annales Devereniorum
"And the breath of the Dragon did enfold him, and sheathe him in a steel so fine that not arrow nor dagger's pierce could cut away its scale." - the Annales Devereniorum

name: Sir Diotram
text: Sir Diotram is +1 level for equipping items.

setInfos.flavorText: "He is a crow, and doth circle the battlefield-the last arrival, and the last to leave." - Lady Ersane
"He is a crow, and doth circle the battlefield-the last arrival, and the last to leave." - Lady Ersane

name: Sir Euain
text: Euain may enter play in any rank of your army.

setInfos.flavorText: I go where I please, and with whom I please. An thou not like it, minstrel, then I shall feed thee to my wolves!
I go where I please, and with whom I please. An thou not like it, minstrel, then I shall feed thee to my wolves!

name: Sir Robert the Vigilant
text: You may bring Free Kingdoms characters higher than 3rd level into play as if they were 1 level lower.

setInfos.flavorText: They say it is the blood of the soldier that makes a general great. I pray that is not true else I will be remembered as the greatest general in history.
They say it is the blood of the soldier that makes a general great. I pray that is not true else I will be remembered as the greatest general in history.

name: Smite
text: React: Play after a character in this cleric's army makes a melee strike roll targeting a character of opposite alignment to this cleric's. Reroll the die.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't waste your time looking for immortality, Elf. You aren't even going to live to see tomorrow." - Logan Ebonwoulfe
"Don't waste your time looking for immortality, Elf. You aren't even going to live to see tomorrow." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Speed of the Gods
text: Spend Order: This cleric targets a character in play. Until the end of the turn, that character has an additional melee strike with a base ATK of +0 whenever he or she attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Go, Urg, to the battlefield. Bring me blood, steel, and pain, and when you return, we shall forge a sword fit for your father's soul." - Takh
"Go Urg, to the battlefield. Bring me blood, steel, and pain, and when you return, we shall forge a sword fit for your father's soul." - Takh

name: Spite
text: React: Play after a character adjacent to this fighter is killed by a melee strike. The figher immediately targets the attacking character with a melee strike. Only one Spite may be played for each character killed.

setInfos.flavorText: "Tyraniel, once the lands of House Rowan." Lord Gahid smiled, and clenched an iron fist. "Ours."
