"Tyraniel, once the lands of House Rowan." Lord Gahid smiled, ad clenched an iron fist. "Ours."

name: Helm of Faith
text: Magic saves from this character's spells have +3 DC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mekk'iah sent us this. He said we will need it in the deserts... what did he mean?" - Taoth
"Ishara guides us all, although she guides you to your grave." - Rabinus Zon
"Go into Myreth, noble Kelanor. Bring to me the Dragon's skull that rests atop Tepheroth's throne. Then, and only then, wilt thou be worthy to stand at my side." - Lord Gahid
"Go into Myreth, noble Kelanor. Bring to me the Dragon's skull that rests atop Tepheroth's throne. Then, and only then, wilt thou be worthy to stand at my side." - Lord Gahid

name: Staff of War
text: This rank will contain two additional characters before it is illegal.

setInfos.flavorText: "As long as there are humans, this symbol will not find a restful place." - Nekrast

name: Staff
text: This cleric gains +3 AC while targeted with a strike by a character of the opposite alignment.

setInfos.flavorText: Faith is a priest's real weapon.
"They are easy to make, these trinkets, but useful... very useful." - Padrig
"They are easy to make, these trinkets, but useful... very useful." - Padrig

name: Stinking Cloud
text: Order: If this wizard is in the 1st rank, target an army. Until the end of the turn, all characters have -3 ATK and -2 AC penalties while in the target army's first rank.

setInfos.flavorText: The great city of Baraxton was not entirely without defenses, as the Nothrog quickly discovered.
The great city of Baraxton was not entirely without defenses, as the Nothrog quickly discovered.

name: Strongarm
text: Roll a die after each time Strongarm casts a spell. If the roll is odd, he suffers one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: If pain brings victory, then gladly will I suffer for my king.
If pain brings victory, then gladly will I suffer for my king.

name: Summon Champion
text: Spend Order: Put this card in your 1st rank as a level 3 fighter with ATK +5, AC 14, and 1 hit point. The Champion is killed at the end of the turn. If this wizard has the Summoner trait, the Champion is killed at the end of next turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "It rose from the smoke with a challenge of fire, and I levied my sword against it with the ice of righteous purpose." - Sir Sorlons d'Ilchant
"It rose from the smoke with a challenge of fire, and I levied my sword against it with the ice of righteous purpose." - Sir Sorlons d'Ilchant

name: Summon Imp
text: Spend Order: Put this card in your 1st rank as a level 1 fighter with ATK +2, AC 10, and 2 hit points. The imp is killed at the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Imps are immortal. Discover their true names, and they are condemned to an eternity of servitude."
"Imps are immortal. Discover their true names and they are condemned to an eternity of servitude."

name: Summon Monster
text: Spend Order: Search your deck for a card with the Monster trait, show it to the other players, and place it on top of your deck. If this wizard has the Summoner trait, the Monster goes into your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "As simple as cutting away innocence." - Slayer the Unkind
"As simple as cutting away innocence." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Tales at the Inn
text: React: Play after a character with less than half of this fighter's ATK hits him or her with a strike (negative ATK is considered a zero). The strike automatically fails.

setInfos.flavorText: "I swear it! The beast... beasts, I say, because there were, uhm, two of them! Twenty feet high, and as red as the sunset! Look at this scar! Don't you believe me?"
"I swear it! The beast... beasts, I say, because there were, uhm, two of them! Twenty feet high, and as red as the sunset! Look at this scar! Don't you believe me?"

name: Taunt
text: Order: This rogue targets a character in the 1st rank of another army. The first time the target has an opportunity this turn, he or she must perform an attack targeting this rogue.

setInfos.flavorText: Utinam logica falsa tuam philosophiam totam suffodiant!
Utinam logica falsa tuam philosophiam totam suffodiant!

name: Spirits' Blessings
text:
Spend Order: Discard Spirits' Blessings: Ready a non-stunned character of lower Level within one rank.
Order: Discard Spirits' Blessings: If this cleric is a Druid, ready a non-stunned character of lower Level within one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "We are not gods, we just help them." - Niobe
"Return to the fold, brothers and sisters. We will make you a home." - Huntress Volda
Atu stood silently before Lord Halbrook, the king's effects in hand.

name: Test of Faith
text: React: Play after this cleric makes a melee strike roll to reroll the die.

setInfos.flavorText: Where there is no hope left, there is also no fear.
Where there is no hope left, there is also no fear.

name: The Better Part of Valor
text: React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting this rogue. The strike is canceled. The rogue must move back at least one rank, but may move back any number of ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "You can hide the fire, but what are you going to do with the smoke?" - Baqbou Umbala
"You can hide the fire, but what are you going to do with the smoke?" - Baqbou Umbala

name: The Gauntlet
text: Spend Order: If this fighter is in your 1st rank, target a character in an opposing 1st rank. The fighter performs a number of consecutive melee strikes against characters in the target's rank equal to the difference between the number of characters in that army's 1st and 2nd ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Life is full of hard knocks. Get used to it." - Jack Casey
"Life is full of hard knocks. Get used to it." - Jack Casey

name: Theoloc
text: Theoloc has +1 level while Slayer the Unkind is in his army. This does not affect Theoloc entering play.

setInfos.flavorText: He struggles day and night with his magic, hoping that he will not join the row of whispering skulls that hang above the Master's door.
He struggles day and night with his magic, hoping that he will not join the row of whispering skulls that hang above the Master's door.

name: Throw
text: Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't count a nighwalker dead, you fool. Not unless they're in more pieces than their armor." - Black Tom of Corinth
"Don't count a Nightwalker dead, you fool. Not unless they're in more pieces than their armor." - Black Tom of Corinth

name: Timber Wolf
text: Order: When in the 1st rank, spend the Wolf to have it attack as a Level 1 rogue with AC 10, 1 hit point, and ATK of +1.

setInfos.flavorText: "We will seize fate by the throat and steal death from its jaws." - Serah ni Fhionn
"We will seize fate by the throat and steal death from its jaws." - Serah ni Fhionn
I was there when the Elves destroyed Sir Robert's armies. We thought we were ready, but there was nothing we could do against them. Sometimes, at night, I can still hear the sentries screaming...
I was there when the Elves destroyed Sir Robert's armies. We thought we were ready, but there was nothing we could do against them. Sometimes, at night, I can still hear the sentries screaming...

name: Toren Yscar
text: Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand to look at the top five cards of your deck. You may take one of the cards and add it to your hand. Return the remaining cards in the same order.

setInfos.flavorText: Do not ask, and I will not answer.
Do not ask, and I will not answer.

name: Trample
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. If the fighter has a Steed equipped, he or she gains +4 ATK for this strike, and may reroll the die.

setInfos.flavorText: "Humans are fit for one thing only: to coushin the ground beneath the hooves of my steed!" - Varg
"Humans are fit for one thing only: to cushion the ground beneath the hooves of my steed!" - Varg

name: True Aim
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a ranged strike roll. Add +2 to the die roll. Add an additional +3 (+5 total) to the die roll if this fighter is a Ranger.

name: Teufeltiger's Lies
text:
While Teufeltiger's Lies is ready, other characters in this rank gain +3 ATK and suffer -5 AC.
While it is ready, they also inflict an additional wound with melee strikes against characters of equal or lower Level (compared to their own).
Order: Spend Teufeltiger's Lies.

setInfos.flavorText: "Found by your own hand, my love." - The Lady al-Semmeya
"Find him, Zaina, or the Deverenians will. I will not abide being treated thus." Bayuuk al-Semmeya

name: Tsinanok
text: Characters adjacent to Tsinanok have +1 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothrog legions live and die together on the battlefield. The best of them will jump into fire to save a comrade. When you see a Nothrog shieldman, be sure to look around for his friends." - Hassimal

"Nothrog legions live and die together on the battlefield. The best of them will jump into fire to save a comrade. When you see a Nothrog shieldman, be sure to look around for his friends." - Hassimal

name: Turn Undead
text: Order: Target an Undead character of equal or lower level than this cleric. Stun the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Begone, lest Kor hurl you back to the Abyss from whence you came!" - Knowledge
"Begone, lest Kor hurl you back to the Abyss from whence you came!" - Knowledge

name: Turned to Stone
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or suffer two wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "Oh, heavenly spirits. Not again." - Jonah the Burglar
"Oh, heavenly spirits. Not again." - Jonah the Burglar

"The Eastern Tribes were once known for their ferocity and their tales. That was before the Nothrog sacked their villages. When this war is done, they'll be lucky to be remembered at all." - Basil Nemis

"The Eastern Tribes were once known for their ferocity and their tales. That was before the Nothrog sacked their villages. When this war is done, they'll be lucky to be remembered at all." - Basil Nemis

name: Uthival Tremayne
text: Deverenians in your army are +1 level for equipping Armor, Shield, and Helm items.

setInfos.flavorText: "The court may hate my cousin, but they still have need of my swords. Our house is safe, Elaneor. For now."
"The court may hate my cousin, but they still have need of my swords. Our house is safe, Elaneor. For now."
"The beast be big as a tree, and hits like a mountain! I'll not go back to that forest Uthanak-not in all my years!" - Last words of an unknown Nothrog
"The beast be big as a tree, and hits like a mountain! I'll not go back to that forest Uthanak-not in all my years!" - Last words of an unknown Nothrog

name: Varg
text: Varg may enter play as if he were 3rd level, but becomes spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "I remember your Baraxton wife, human scum... she was the one who begged for mercy. She found none, nor will you."
"I remember your Baraxton wife, human scum... she was the one who begged for mercy. She found none, nor will you."

name: Virtue
text: React: Play before a character in this cleric's army makes a melee strike roll. The character gains +5 ATK for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Righteousness exalteth a nation." - Lady Meleagrance
"Righteousness exalteth a nation." - Lady Meleagrance

name: Vorpal Blade
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: After this character rolls a natural '20' on a melee strike, kill the target of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Always remember that Ablung was mad..." - The Archmage Syneri
"Always remember that Ablung was mad..." - The Archmage Syneri

name: Wall of Air
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters in this cleric's army have +8 AC versus ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "It was so bad, I couldn't tell if I took aim at my sister, or the Elves!"
"It was so bad, I couldn't tell if I took aim at my sister, or the Elves!"

name: Chirurgery Kit
text: Spend Order: Target a character in this rank: Succeed with a Medicine check (DC 20) to remove one wound from the target.

setInfos.flavorText: A crude science, but a welcome one.
"Hey, wait, that one's rusty!" - Jonah the Burglar
A hooded figure passed through the Denskan infirmary like a ghost. While others worked mundane means to heal the wounded, a few miracles followed in Atu's wake.
"Now hold still. Just twenty more stitches." - Fredrick Brunner

name: Whirlwind Attack
text: Spend Order: If this rogue is in the 1st rank, the rogue targets every character in another army's 1st rank with a melee strike. The ATK of each strike is equal to the rogue's lowest ATK. Determine the order of strikes before performing the first strike.

name: Wythien
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The screams of my enemies make me forget the pain in my bones."
"The screams of my enemies make me forget the pain in my bones."

name: Kcarrn Fal
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target a character in an adjacent rank. The target has -3 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Weapon Focus
text:
Fighters play this card as a 2nd level action.
Order: Attach Weapon Focus to a Weapon equipped by this character. While attached, the weapon gains +2 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "Everyone's so frightened of Rathe, but I tell you this: without that human forged dagger of his... he's nothing." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Ambush
text: Spend React: Play before another character in this rank makes a melee strike roll. The strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits, but the attacker must use the ATK of this character for the strike if it is lower than the ATK of his or her strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now yer learnin' how to fight to win..." - Sir Wallence

name: Follow Me
text: Spend Order: Ready a lower-level spent (not stunned) character in this rank. That character may not attack if he or she has already attacked this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not far now to the Shattered Lands. We'll be safe there. Only fools would follow us." - Keridwen

name: Curse of Steel
text: Spend Order: Discard all items in play of level 5 or less.

setInfos.flavorText: "Wither and die, crack and shatter. Fall from grace, die from within." - Cardinal Scelus

name: Howling Rain
text:
Druid only.
Spend Order: Spend all Steeds in play. Until the end of the turn, any character who maneuvers becomes stunned, and all Steeds enter play spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "It came down so heavy we could hardly see the path. I looked at Vorgurn. He smiled that awful smile and said, 'Nothrog camp in the lowlands.'" - Jemman

name: Animate Objects
text: Spend Order: Target a character in an opposing 1st rank, and discard any number of item cards from your hand. This cleric performs a melee strike against the target (from any rank) with an ATK equal to the combined levels of the items discarded. Items equipped by this cleric have no effect on the strike.

name: Cause Serious Wounds
text: Spend Order: Target a character in an adjacent rank: This cleric must succeed with a Skill check (DC 10 + the target's Skill) to inflict two wounds on the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sometimes the gods' gifts must be turned to other uses." - Kerebrus
"Bascaron's blessings be upon you." - Balian

name: Lightning's Iron
text: Spend React: Before target character suffers wounds, remove a Charge from Lightning's Iron: Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: It can barely contain the Storm's rage, which swells with each burst of pain that it channels.
"The kingdoms existed before me," the Free King whispered to Volda. "They must survive me, too."
"It draweth suffering as a lodestone doth draw steel." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Blood Beneath Your Wings
text: Spend Order: Ready all other characters in play (but not this cleric).

setInfos.flavorText: "Welcome to Athanaes." - Behlial

name: Searing Light
text:
Good characters only.
Spend Order: This cleric targets an evil character up to two ranks away, who must make a number of magic saves (DC 11) equal to this clerics level. The target suffers one wound for each save he or she fails.

setInfos.flavorText: "It burns... how it burns!" - SS-ssaurth

name: Hand of the Sun
text: React: Play before a character in your army makes a save roll. Add this cleric's level to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Leave this place, paladin. Though I bear you no ill will, you are not welcomed here." - Kerebus

name: Too Stubborn to Die
text: React: Play after this character is killed by a melee strike. Remove all wounds from the character, who is no longer considered killed. Kill the character at the end of this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I ain't got time to bleed!" - Avalanche

name: Weapon Specialization
text: Order: Attach this card to a Weapon equipped by this fighter that has a "Weapon Focus" attached. While this card is attached, the weapon gains +3 ATK, and inflicts an additional wound whenever this character hits with a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The trick of it is not to wield the blade, but to let the blade wield you." - Madriga's Treatise of Swordsmanship

name: Back at You
text: React: Play before a melee strike roll targetting this fighter. Kill this fighter to inflict one wound on the attacking character.

name: Hammer Toss
text: React: Before picking the target for a melee strike, you may target a character one rank farther away. After the strike, discard one Weapon attached to this fighter (if he or she has one equipped).

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't be so proud, Sir William. The dwarf certainly seems to know what he's talking about..." - Frederik Lahr

name: Light of Truth
text:
Good characters only.
React: Play after this character rolls a die to add 2 to the result.

setInfos.flavorText: "We cannot stand alone, Aenne. We must draw unto us a conspiracy of light." - Bruin Lenore

name: Shadow of Lies
text:
Evil Paladin only.
Order: This Paladin targets a good character up to two ranks away. The target moves back one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's us or them, Wallence. You know it, and so do I." - Vorgurn

name: Great Leap
text:
Barbarian only.
Spend Order: Move this character forward or backward up to three ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: Edge leapt over the edge of the precipice, determined to follow the Abyssal Lord, but he was too late-it had already vanished into the chasms above.

name: Staff of Reincarnation
text: Spend React: After one of your characters within one rank is killed: Shuffle the character and all items that were equipped to that character from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Archery Practice
text: Order: If this fighter succeeds with an archery skill check (DC 13), attach this card to the fighter. While attached, add +2 to all ranged strike rolls made by the fighter.

setInfos.flavorText: "An arrow for each tooth in thy wretched smile." - Baroness Lucana

name: Run Like Hell
text: Order: Discard all items equipped by this character and move him backward any number of ranks (minimum 1 rank).

setInfos.flavorText: "That's it. We're finished!" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Madriga's Quick-Strike
text: Order: Play when your opponent has no cards in his hand. This rogue performs a melee strike targeting one of that player's characters, one rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "Once you have won, walk away. There's no room for pride on the battlefield."

name: From the Shadows
text: Spend Order: Move forward one rank. If this rogue is now in your front rank and not stunned, he may perform an attack without spending. Assassins gain +4 ATK for the duration of the attack.

setInfos.flavorText: "Die quietly, traitor. I must surprise your master." - Taisia
"For ten years I have hunted the grey elf Navdai. One by one, I kill her creations, and soon, I will have the witch as well." - Jaridesse

name: Three Drops of Poison
text: Order: This rogue targets a character in an adjacent rank. The target must make a poison save (DC 11, 15 if this character is an Assassin) or suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: One for Terak. One for Robert. One for Anton. Neus help us all, if it comes to this...

name: Jump Back
text: React: Play after this character suffers one or more wounds from a melee strike or ranged strike. Reduce the number of wounds to zero. This character is stunned.

name: Just Part of the Job
text: React: After this rogue rolls a die, add 2 to the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "First you must learn to walk. Then you can try to run." - Kun Hull

name: Acrobatics
text: React: Play before a melee strike roll by or targeting this rogue. If this rogue has no armour equipped, add or subtract 2 from the roll (your choice).

setInfos.flavorText: "Nobody tells me where I can and cannot go, Nothrog. Send my regards to Donovan, when you see him in hell." - Keziah

name: Gravity Flux
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets a character in play. Until the end of the turn, that character counts as three characters for determining illegal ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "The wraiths of the Storm are not undead. They still live, frozen spirits in rotted flesh. Each has sworn an oath of blood to the Storm. Its spirit, the realm of its creation, sustains them. If the Stormwraiths leave its side for too long... they will die." - Keziah

name: Sea of Flame
text: Spend Order: Destroy all level 1 characters in play.

setInfos.flavorText: Perenor screamed as the flames engulfed him. The Templar of Llyr was no more... but his hammer, the legacy of his line, was melted into solid rock. It would remain there until the next hero came to claim it for his own.

name: Armor of the Earth
text: Spend Order: Remove one or more Charges: Put a cleric action with a Level equal to the number of Charges removed from your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Duplicate
text: Spend React: Play before you put a card into play. That card may be an additional copy of a Unique card already in your army. You may not play an additional copy of a character with the printed Warlord trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do you honestly think that any man is completely unique?" - Anton Cyldragen

name: Windwalk
text:
Shaman only.
Spend Order: Move a character in your army forward or backward two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: Uriel the fallen angel, light of the southern sky. Your star shall burn out long before your shame.

name: Rise, and Obey
text:
Summoner only.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a character card, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand.

name: Tidal Blast
text: Spend Order: This wizard performs a +6 ranged strike. If the ranged strike hits, the target suffers one wound, then moves back one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "My elven companion and I take exception to trespassers. We've an Emperor to kill, you see, and have no time for idle visits." - Sir Corwin Lorath

name: Magic Shifting
text: React: After this wizard pays the costs of a spell: Magic saves produced by the spell gain +3 DC. Ranged strikes produced by the spell gain a +3 bonus.

setInfos.flavorText: "At all times must one accounteth for the resistances of magical beasts. Some doth require burning, others a freezing touch-telling these apart elevates an apprentice to a true wizard." - Caleb the Shifter
"With the right word, even an Empire can change." - Bruin Lenoire

name: A Touch of Power
text: React: Play after this wizard spends to cast a spell that is 2 or more levels lower than the wizard. Ready this wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "Be warned, Aenne, lest thou dare think to question me!" - Slayer the Unkind

name: Face of Death
text: React: Play after this wizard is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike. The opposing character must succeed with a magic save (DC 12 + this wizard's level) or the strike is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "These humans have such weak spirits that they cannot bear to look upon it..." - Varg

name: Conjuration
text:
Summoners play this spell as a 2nd level spell.
Spend Order: Search your deck for an item with level less than or equal to this wizard's level +2. Show it to the other players and add it to your hand.

name: Spell Mastery
text: Order: Name a wizard action card. Until the end of the game, this character is +1 level for casting that spell.

setInfos.flavorText: Anton does the work for me. When he is weak from the fight, I will simply take my book from his cold, dead hands.

name: Hand of Destruction
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed a magic save (DC 14) or suffer one wound and move back one rank.

name: Litany of the Dead
text: Order: Destroy Litany of the Dead and name a non-Warlord character card: Characters with that name may not perform actions or enter play until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: The Loremaster looked up from the scroll. "Why are there lines through five names?"
"It's not my soul you should worry about, false priest." - Death

name: Kharban
text: Kharban has +4 AC against ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: I'm just a soldier. I don't make decisions, and I don't give commands. But I'm the one with the most important job of all. I do the killing.

name: Murgan
text:
May not equip a Weapon.
Order: Once per turn, remove a wound from Murgan.

setInfos.flavorText: Trolls are the very soul of nightmare, each one born of screams. We tear apart the silence of night, and feast on the bones of dreamers.

name: Baddrazhek
text:
If Baddrazhek's AC is ever below 10, he is killed.
Order: Give Baddrazhek +3 ATK and -3 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "He says he's a poet. Writes his verse in blood." - Takh

name: Fiendlings
text: May only target stunned characters with melee strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "The plains of Kvar were so blasted by that banshee moon that they can't support life anymore. Thus, they are forced to take it from others..." - Gaston Bonhomme

name: Woundwraith
text:
May not equip items.
Woundwraith has -8 AC until the end of the turn if it has performed any action this turn other than a Maneuver.

setInfos.flavorText: "More sadistic Nothrog use them for prison guards. Woundwraiths feed on insanity, and delight in causing pain. There's no such thing as a temporary sentence in Nassiral Hate's lands." - Sali

name: Barrowgrim
text: Barrowgrim inflicts two additional wounds when it hits with a melee strike.

name: Famine Harpy
text: Other Harpies have +2 AC while in the same rank as this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even worse than their sisters. These don't even bother to kill their food." - Basil Nemis

name: Clariste
text: Spend React: After a wizard in this rank spends to cast a spell whose level is equal to or less than Clariste's, ready the wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "The ungrateful wretch would serve the Spire no more and took to the streets, leaving only chains in her wake. Catch her, bring her to me, and I will reward you well." - Anton Cyldragen

name: The 9 Cats of Hell
text: May not equip items.

setInfos.flavorText: "An ancient legend, good sir, and one to be believed. I saw them once, long ago. Just being that close turned my hair white. I can't tell you what they did to th others... If I thought too much about it, I'd go mad." - Lord Rhys Melnorac of Myerdeth

name: Jackals of Mourn
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, if Jackals of Mourn are in rank 4 or higher, move forward three ranks
Order: Move backward three ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "The city of Mourn has fallen to Bascaron, and nothing is left but waste and the echoes of their people." - Jehricho

name: Fire of God
text:
Your characters have +1 Skill for each Charge on Fire of God.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge: Choose a rank in your army. Until end of turn, characters have a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the Level of this character while in that rank.

name: Freya
text: Order: Once per turn, move another Direwolf in this rank forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: She is a spirit that leads the wolves howling in the night; free and eternal, running through fields of endless gold.

name: Su-tatra
text:
May not equip Armor or Shields.
Su-tatra suffers -4 AC while spent.
Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike that inflicts no wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Home!"
"Effective. Graceful. Efficient. Methinks these Sutek aren't as primitive as we have been led to believe." - Duchess Brymin

name: KoTaahl
text: If KoTaahl is in rank 5 or higher, he gains the ability: "Spend Order: Perform a melee strike targeting a character in the last rank of an opposing army," and all characters in other army's last ranks have the ability: "Spend Order: Perform a melee strike against KoTaahl."

setInfos.flavorText: "Such noble creatures. Such awesome magics. I'm rather proud of them..." - Sorscha

name: Uriel
text:
Uriel inflicts two additional wounds whenever he hits with a melee strike.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: I wander in Death's own shadow; never to truly live, and never to die.

name: Seraphina Corazon
text: Spend Order: Look at the top ten cards of your deck. Seraphina may immediately equip one item from among those cards that she may legally equip. Shuffle ther remaining cards back into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: Anton, Anton. You're far too soft-hearted.

name: Gahred Nenrayhil
text:
Gahred may cast spells as a 5th level wizard.
After Gahred casts a spell which is higher level than himself, he must succeed with a magic skill check (DC 15) or the spell is cancelled.

setInfos.flavorText: "Gahred's discovered a new form of magic-sometimes it works, sometimes we run like mad." - Keziah

name: Qephire
text: Spend Order: Target a 1st or 2nd level character up to two ranks away. Move the target forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Winter burns away the forest's weakest parts, leaving strength in its harrowed wake.

name: Othoreos
text: Othoreos may cast "Necromancer only" wizard spells as if he were a 3rd level wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: If you have your enemy at your mercy, and do not kill him, then you are your own worst foe.

name: Lord Winter
text:
Wounds taken by Lord Winter may not be reduced or removed.
React: When Lord Winter takes a wound, ready him.

setInfos.flavorText: Like the cold touch of love destroyed, so too is winter found in the embrace of death denied.

name: Esa
text: Order: Once per turn, Esa may subtract 3 from either his ATK or AC, and add it to the other.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Myreth elves speak not of their deep woods cousins-and that is best. The beasts twist flesh with their magic, shaping men into dark sculptures of pain." - Marcos Genecourt

name: Master Eyrk
text:
Order: Once per turn, stun a ready lower Level Deverenian in your army: Master Eyrk has +1 Level until end of turn.
Order: Once per turn, stun another ready equal or higher Level Deverenian in your army: Master Eyrk gains +1 Level permanently.

name: Ceremonial Shield
text:
This fighter is considered to be an additional character for determining illegal ranks.
React: Before fixing an illegal rank: Equip Ceremonial Shield from this fighter, or from your hand, to target fighter in front of the illegal rank.

name: Unclean Spirits
text: React: After Unclean Spirits inflict a wound with a melee strike or spell, remove one wound from them.

setInfos.flavorText: "Three generations of my people were forced to lay their bodies down in death. It would be wrong not to allow them to be first to find revenge." - Tepheroth

name: Gethseme Steelshard
text:
Gethseme is a fighter and a rogue.
Gethseme inflicts an additional wound with melee and ranged strikes against Monsters.
React: After one or more wounds are removed from Gethseme: Perform a +5 melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Where there is no hope, there is also no fear.

name: Markappal Basilysk
text:
Melee strikes performed by Basilysk ignore the effects of the Astral and Ethereal traits.
React: Once per turn, after a character misses Basilysk with a melee strike, that character suffers one wound.

name: Awl Beetle
text:
When targeting a melee strike, Awl Beetle must target a character with Armor or Shield equipped, if it can.
React: After Awl Beetle hits a character with a melee strike, and before wounds are inflicted, select and discard one item equipped by that character.

name: Vision
text: Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand to draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText:
"There will come a time when you regret faith in Poison, my lord," the seer whispered.
Xod's eyes were haunted. "Has there ever been a time when I have not?"

name: Ruthless
text:
Ruthless gains +5 ATK when targetting a Monster with a melee strike.
React: Perform after a melee strike or ranged strike against Ruthless. If the strike hit Ruthless, perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Rac says that one of the Abyssals escaped to the surface. Now its my job to bring him down."

name: Earth Elemental
text:
You must have a cleric in your army to bring Earth Elemental into play.
Spend React: After a spell targets Earth Elemental, cancel the spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "They lack the basic intelligence of the gargoyles, but they're not half-bad pets if you know what to feed them." - Kohn Peacehand

name: Hearth
text: Ranged strikes performed by Hearth receive +2 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: These humans count their days by hours, the slow crawl of the sun across the sky. We dwarves count time by the march of out feet-and our 'night' is an eternity long.

name: Signon's Disciples
text: Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Unnumbered knights have followed Signon's steps into the Storm. Didst thou truly think they would ne'er return?" - Magnus Arcadis

name: Sir Corwin Lorath
text: Sir Corwin has +4 AC against ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Never ask the price of the deeds I must do..." - Maxt Stormcrow

name: Nothrog S'sike
text: React: After target opposing character moves to within one rank of this fighter, spend Nothrog S'sike: Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Needs more blades." - Bokos
"Crude weapons that waste valuable resources..." - Bis
"Gimme that before you hurt yourself!" - Hrunting

"Which way do I point it again?"
"That way... I think." - Tek and Ket

name: Revan
text: Spend Order: Search your deck for a Steed, show it to the other players, then add it to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Shh, now. Th' Storm comes soon, proud one, and you shall fly anon..."

name: Modred of Carcius
text: Modred gains +1 ATK and +1 AC for each Astral Deverenian character in your army.
errata: Erratum 2006/06/26: All characters with the Stormwraith flavor text are considered to have that trait.

setInfos.flavorText: There are none so blind as those who will not see.

name: Duke Logranth
text: Logranth can cast spells as if he were a level 1 wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: If you quest, then you must walk past this bridge. I warn thee, beware. The beast is mine, and mine alone; I shall fight to the death to keep you from it. If you do not know its name, then you have already lost.

name: Master Caudecus
errata: Erratum 2006/06/26: All characters with the Stormwraith flavor text are considered to have that trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fierce riders prowl the edges of the storm. Those who seek to enter must challenge their Master, or be destroyed."
In the dark halls beneath the Imperial Palace, the Chiurgeons of Order Loth do whatever they must in order to keep the Emperor alive.

name: Torch
text: When this character is performing a melee strike, AC bonuses from any source other than the target's Armor, Shield and Helm are ignored.

name: Elven Chainmail
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Elves equip this as a 3rd level item.

setInfos.flavorText: Winter sits on his throne of ice, watching in impassive sorrow as snow and cold sweep out across the world. "Father," he whispers, "how did it come to this?"

name: Direwolf Mount
text:
This character gains the Direwolf trait.
Order: Spend the Direwolf Mount to move forward one rank.
Order: When in the 1st rank, spend the Direwolf Mount to have it attack as a level 1 fighter with AC 10, 1 hit point, and ATK of +0.

setInfos.flavorText: As one, the wolf-riders bore down upon the village.

name: Mantle of Control
text:
Spend Order: Spend a Monster of opposite alignment to this character.
Spend Order: Ready a lower level Monster that is the same alignment as this character. If the monster has already attacked this turn, it cannot attack again.

name: Ebonwood
text: Order: Spend Ebonwood to give a character to give a character in this or an adjacent rank either +3 ATK or +3 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Cut from the dark heart of the forest, its sinister power can be felt by those who draw near.

name: Double Bladed Sword
text: React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that hit, spend Double Bladed Sword: If the strike roll was 11 or better, this fighter performs a melee strike with an ATK equal to the previous strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Originally a weapon of the Havat-Iahn, only one fighter in the Accordlands can claim to master it.

name: Krow Imp
text: Spend Order: Target an Astral or Ethereal character. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: Imps can see through the very dimensions that surround us-and more, their gaze can petrify those who walk such planes.

name: Snow Elk
text:
Paladin only.
Order: Discard a card from your hand to move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "VoTaurr maidens are as beautiful as stars. They fight like warriors, and rule their lands like kings." - KoTaahl

name: Foeshredder
text:
If Foeshredder is spent, this character gains no AC bonus from it
React: Spend Foeshredder after this character spends to attack. This character gains +4 ATK until the end of the turn.

name: Hurricane Gauntlets
text: Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand to perform a +6 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The deepest oceans are as nothing to the spirits. They walk the rivers, and steal the breath from drowning sailors. Their power... our strength." - Takh

name: Abyss Edge
text:
At the end of any turn that this character has not used the React below, this character suffers one wound
React: Once per turn, after this character inflicts a wound with a melee strike, this weapon gains +1 ATK permanently.

name: Myreth Training
text: React: Spend Myreth Training after a melee strike targeting this character resolves. Perform a melee strike targeting the attacker.

setInfos.flavorText: "You'll have to do better than that next time, or you'll be left to bleed and die on the battlefields when you fall." - Lucien Stormcrow

name: Lance
text: This weapon provides no ATK bonus if this character does not have a Steed equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: Revan nodded. "It will have to do."

name: Lezheer Gem
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Spend Lezheer Gem before this character declares the target of a ranged strike. The target may be one additional rank away.

name: Boot Knife
text: "This card may also be brought into play using the following action: "React: Equip Boot Knife to a rogue before the rogue makes a melee strike roll."

setInfos.flavorText: "What do you mean, you didn't search his shoes?"

name: Sling Shot
text: Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand to perform a +4 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "If I can pick it up, then it is a weapon." - Jamr ibn Al-as

name: Improvised Shield
text: React: Before this character suffers wounds, destroy Improvised Shield: Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "After years of fighting, we had nothing left. Nyota led us to ruin." - Gunter
"Whatever's handy. Better that than your head." - Kang'xi
In the heat of battle, even the flimsiest defense can save a man's life.

name: Encumbered
text: Order: Spend a character with a number of items equipped equal to or greater than his or her level. If the character was already spent, he or she is stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "What do you need a ten-foot pole for, anyway?" - Timothy Windson

name: Animate Skeleton
text:
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: Put this card in your first rank as a level 1 Undead fighter with ATK +5, AC 14, and 2 hit points. The Skeleton is killed at the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Oh, Narawi, sweet Narawi... such lovely savages. Darling, return, and join us; your men are waiting. You, and I, as it should be, forever..." - Absinthe

name: Athril Hammer
text:
This character may not ready during the Ready Phase if the Hammer is spent.
React: Spend this hammer before this fighter makes a melee strike roll to add +6 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: Anthril, the metal spun into Ironcloth. It's as heavy as the heart of the earth, but stronger than faith.

name: Archer Team
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Spend another Archer Team in this rank to perform a +7 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "You don't see much of Savrukk's soldiers. Just an arrow, and a rustle in the woods." - Rren'the

name: Aurora Flame
text: Spend Order: This cleric targets a character of equal or lower level up to three ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: The northern lights can be seen from the mountains of Toris Kelt, shining like the eyes of the gods in the blackness of the void.

name: Avenger
text:
May only be equipped by a good Paladin.
React: Roll a die after this character is targeted with a spell. If the roll is even, the spell is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: Forged into its blade is this simple phrase: "The innocent shall be avenged!"

name: Bands of Force
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or this card is attached to him or her. A character with Bands of Force attached must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) before initiative each turn or suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Alaric, Maul has forsaken us. Why seek him?"

name: Baron Voghul
text:
You must have Sir Rhawn d'Ilchant in your army to bring Voghul into play.
Voghul may not start the game in play.

setInfos.flavorText: Gifted by the storm, borne on verdatha wings: I am law, I am justice, I am strength.

name: Blessed Water
text: Order: Discard the Blessed Water to perform a +7 ranged strike that may only target an Undead character. This strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've killed you once. I'll kill you again." - Xiat

name: Catching Arrows
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Play after this character or an adjacent character is targeted with a ranged strike. The target gains +5 AC for the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "And you said it couldn't be done." - Kun Hall

name: Pike
text:
This character's melee strikes have +3 ATK against characters with steeds equipped.
Spend Order: If this character is in the first rank: Perform a melee strike targeting a character in an opposing second rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Sethusk waved to Bhaine in the courtyard.
"Hold, set... steady, now!"
"Hold, set... steady, now!"

name: Conversion
text:
Paladin only.
Order: Target a character in play. Until the end of the turn, the target is the same alignment as this Paladin.

setInfos.flavorText: "Forget your past, Kerebrus. It is time to plan a better future." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Curse of Rage
text:
Evil characters only.
Order: Add +5 to all players' melee strike rolls and ranged strike rolls until the end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Every heart holds some cruelty within it. Tap the source, and you will release the flood. - Cardinal Scelus

name: Daanso Batoq
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target a stunned character in an adjacent rank. The character suffers one wound and permanently loses a level. If the target is level zero, he or she is killed.

setInfos.flavorText: " My cousin. My friend. My failure." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Defensive Posture
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, this character has +3 AC but must subtract 2 from all melee strike rolls.

setInfos.flavorText: "You saved my life..." he whispered, cradling the injured cleric in his arms. "Who are you?"

name: Degais
text: After Degais enters play from your hand, reveal the top card from your deck - if it is a character, you may put it into play immediately. If it is not a character or if you cannot legally put the character into play, put the card on the bottom of your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: Fear has many eyes.

name: Demonic Possession
text:
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to two ranks away that is not a good cleric or good Paladin, nor adjacent to one. If the target fails a magic save (DC 13), he or she immediately performs melee strikes against a character of your choice adjacent to the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "I told Jigoral it was too dangerous..." - Raubin

name: Disarm
text: Order: If this fighter is in the 1st rank, target an item in another player's first rank. If this fighter succeeds with a skill check (DC 8 + target character's skill), the item is discarded.

setInfos.flavorText: "Children shouldn't play with sharp toys." - Maddawc

name: Divine Anguish
text: Order: This cleric targets an opposing character in an adjacent rank. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or move back one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "No mortal eyes can withstand the light of true faith." - Behlial

name: Divine Right
text:
Paladin only.
React: Play after a character of the opposite alignment to this Paladin makes a magic save roll. The die is rerolled.

setInfos.flavorText: "...and my Neus forgive your sins, my son." - Frederik Lahr

name: Dragon Plate
text:
+1 HP
May only be equipped by a good Paladin.

setInfos.flavorText: "If a man has not discovered something he is willing to die for, then he is not fit to live." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Ritual Scars
text:
Ritual Scars may not be targeted by actions.
If Ritual Scars would be destroyed, instead they remain equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "That's supposed to make you look tough? It's elven script for 'easy mark'." - Donovan Che'har
"And I thought I'd never see something I'd call barbaric..." - Edge

name: Earthquake
text: Spend Order: You must discard a card from your hand to cast this spell. All 1st level characters in rank 1 become stunned. Ready 1st level characters in rank 2 and ready 2nd level characters in rank 1 become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "The earth tore asunder' from the depths crawled horrific creatures. An these dwarves rise from the same abyss, we must then forfeit our lives to eradicate them entire." - Bishop Koenraad

name: Earth's Fury
text:
Gargoyle only.
Order: This cleric targets an adjacent rank. All ready characters in that rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 12) or become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: Rockhome, born of dream. The Abyss, born of nightmare. It is time for both to awaken...

name: Elegy
text: Whenever Elegy makes a melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting a character who has killed a dwarf this turn, add +5 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: She sings them their last song in this world... and their first in the next.

name: Eye of Morghen
text:
You may only play this card if you have a 5th level or higher Lich in your army.
Order: Spend the Eye to target a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 6 + this characters skill) or be stunned.

name: Eyestalk of Confusion
text:
Reaver only.
Order: Spend this eyestalk to target a ready character of lower level. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Seventh... monkey... mudpie... butler... you're welcome..."

name: Eyestalk of Disintegration
text:
Reaver only.
Order: Spend the Eyestalk to perform a +5 ranged strike. Armor and Helms do not add to the target's AC for this strike.
Order: Spend the Eyestalk to target an item card up to 2 ranks away. The target's character must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or discard the item.

name: Eyestalk of Fear
text:
Reaver only.
React: Spend the Eyestalk before a melee strike roll targeting this character. The attacking character must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or the strike automatically fails.
Order: Spend the Eyestalk to target an opposing character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or move back one rank.

name: Eyestalk of Sleep
text:
Reaver only.
Order: Spend the Eyestalk to target a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: Sleep is but a little walk from death.

name: Eyestalk of Sloth
text:
Reaver only.
Order: Spend the Eyestalk to target a character with more than one melee strike per attack. Until the end of the turn, the target loses his or her last strike per attack.

setInfos.flavorText: The battalion of dwarves that rose beneath the grounds of Sharn Keep did not live to tell the tale.

name: Eyestalk of Stoneflesh
text:
Reaver only.
Spend Order: Target a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or suffer two wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "The creature gazed upon me, and my hand began to change. I know not what magic was used, but I fled with my life-and a token, to remind me of my folly." - Lord Anguisant of Sharn

name: Tanning Knife
text:
This fighter inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against Monsters and Dragons.
React: Before target opposing Monster or Dragon is killed by this fighter: If this fighter is a Ranger, equip the target as an item card with the Armor trait and an AC bonus equal to its printed Level, regardless of class and Level.
errata:
Erratum 2007/10/08: The React should read "React: After killing target opposing Monster or Dragon: If this character is a Ranger, equip the target as an Armor item with an AC bonus and Level equal to its printed Level, ignoring class and Level requirements."
(The 4E MRP supersedes this ruling)

name: Full Defense
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, this fighter receives a bonus to his or her AC equal to his or her ATK (use the first ATK if there is more than one).

setInfos.flavorText: "Hold the line! For the sake of your wives and your children, lads, hold the line just a few more minutes!" - Lieutenant Dunbar

name: Fury
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting a character of opposite alignment. Add +4 to the die roll. If this fighter is a Barbarian, add an additional +2 (+6 total) to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ersane still lives, and I shall find her. She will not be allowed to forget her oath to me so easily." - Sir Magnus Arcadis

name: Gas Grenade
text: Spend Order: Target a rank up to two ranks away from this rogue. Until the end of the turn, all characters have -2 AC while in that rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Finish her." - L'sara

name: Gaston Bonhomme
text: Spend Order: Target a character in play. That character is +1 level until end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't mind father. He's like that with everyone." - Edouard

name: Grimjack
text: Characters adjacent to Grimjack have -3 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Toheuth is south of most human lands, near the mashes of Markappal. Some say they prefer the alligators in the swamp to their own kind. " - Fauve Mightyheart

name: Hand of Morghen
text:
You may only play this card if you have a 4th level or higher Lich in your army.
Order: Spend the Hand to target a character in an adjacent rank. The target suffers a -2 ATK, AC or skill (your choice) until the end of the turn. This character gains +2 to the same stat.

setInfos.flavorText: Morghen sacrificed his hand to save his father, but in vain. It was returned with his father's skull...

name: Helix
text:
May only be equipped by a Terak Justicebringer.
Terak's first melee strike each turn inflicts an additional wound if it hits
Order: Spend Helix to move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Once more, brave friend, into the skies that gave you birth." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Hurled Dagger
text: Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "One down, ten thousand to go." - Darian Windson

name: Inspiration
text:
Bard only.
Order: Until the end of turn, all characters (including the bard) add +3 to their die rolls while in the same rank as this bard.

setInfos.flavorText: "Follow me, and I will lead you to glory!" - Keziah

name: Jad'harak
text: Spend React: After you perform an Order, Jad'harak performs a skill check (DC 13). If successful, a character in this rank may immediately perform another Order.

setInfos.flavorText: "Never regret. Regret kills dreams."

name: Griffon of Misear
text:
Order: Spend Griffon of Misear: Move forward one rank.
React: Before this fighter falls forward to fix an illegal rank, spend Griffon of Misear: This fighter does not spend or stun before moving.

setInfos.flavorText: "Thessyria has not seen their like before." - Keziah
Flying cavalry are impressive, provided they don't stray too near the Storm.
Used extensively in the years of war, they have become almost rare now.
Flying cavalry are impressive, provided they don't stray too near the Storm.
"Winged killers, one and all. Wonderful pets." - Vronish Kez
"They were once noble companions. Now they are dying... along with my country's honor." - Keziah
"They were once noble companions. Now they are dying... along with my country's honor." - Keziah

name: Jamr ibn Al-as
text: Jamr can use action cards of all classes.

setInfos.flavorText: A Havat-lahn spends his life preparing to be judged by the Nine Gods. When he dies, he must prove his worth. Perfection is rewarded with ascendance. Failure-the ultimate arrogance-is rewarded with an eternity of pain.
"Andover burns, mother. I cannot stay to grieve for you. This great nation needs my prayers to lighten its burden, and I cannot pray when my voice is choked with tears."

name: Killing Blow
text: React: Play after another character in your army kills a character with a melee strike, ranged strike, or action. This character is considered to have killed the character instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not bad, Andover," Jamr said. "But I had to finish the job. I don't know your ways, but in Narawi-we don't take prisoners."

name: Lava Burst
text:
Gargoyle only.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Find allies, Gnarrow, and do not fear for us. If you can find them, we will be saved. If not, then do not return. There will be nothing left to come home for." - King Xod

name: Leave it to Me
text: Spend Order: Target a ready character in your army up to two ranks away. Spend the target character and switch the positions of this character and the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do not fear for Cassandra, Robert. I will guard your Lady with my life and my blood while you are away. As I always have." - Maxmilian

name: Life Drain
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to three ranks away. The target is -1 level until the end of the turn. If the target is level zero, he or she is killed.

setInfos.flavorText: "The soul is the source of pain. Anyone who has ever loved can tell you that." - Tepheroth

name: Lunassa
text: This wizard can use action cards as if he or she were a 1st level rogue.

setInfos.flavorText: "Walk with me, dear one. We have work to do... and a little time before the dawn." - Aenne

name: Magma Gargoyle
text:
You must control a cleric for Magma Gargoyle to enter play.
React: After Magma Gargoyle performs a melee strike that hit, target one item equipped to the target of the strike: Destroy the item.

setInfos.flavorText: "The blood of the earth, given form." - Claw

name: Memory's Flame
text: Order: Target another player. That player must select and discard a card from his or her hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "A wizard's mind is the source of his power. Burn away the memories, and you burn away the man." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Morghen Dythanus
text: Other Elf wizards in this rank are +1 level for casting spells.

setInfos.flavorText: Turn from the temporal. Embrace the eternal.

name: Scale Mail
text: This fighter gains +2 AC while targeted with a ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I may lack the resilient hide of my daemon-kin, but steel can be just as discouraging to those thrice-damned assassins." - Galam-Reth
"It has saved my life many times from a coward's arrow." - Kerebrus
"It has saved my life many times from a coward's arrow." - Kerebrus
"The Free King is wise to trust the Elves' aims, and not their motives." - Jin Valford
"We must prepare for Kamatayon's legacy." - Kerebrus
"Sing of Kerebrus, Baudwyn, and let us see if cowardice by music can be dignified into honor." - Princess Dashkova
"Sing of Kerebrus, Baudwyn, and let us see if cowardice by music can be dignified into honor." - Princess Dashkova

name: Nokhtkruger
text:
May only be equipped by an evil Paladin.
Order: Spend Nokhtkruger to give this character +5 to all melee strike rolls until end of turn.
Order: Spend Nokhtkruger to move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Verdatha. Storm Demons. Ask me no more." - Balian

name: Point Blank Shot
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Play before this character declares the target of a ranged strike. The strike may target a character in an adjacent rank. If this character is a Scout or Ranger, draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Going somewhere?" Cymaniel smiled sweetly.

name: Poisoned Blood
text:
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: This cleric targets a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or this card is attached to him or her.
A character with Poisoned Blood attached must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) before initiative rolls each turn or suffer one wound.

name: Protection from Evil
text: Spend React: Play before an evil character makes a melee strike roll. The strike automatically fails.

setInfos.flavorText: "The labor of righteous hearts is to seek the good within each creature and shield it from harm. If we can do that, then we can save the world. One soul at a time." - Kohn Peacehand

name: Protection from Good
text: Spend React: Play before a good character makes a melee strike roll. The strike automatically fails.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ask not why good fails; why does evil prevail? In every heart there is some touch of evil, some darkness that shall always seek its source." - Slovien

name: Protection from Missiles
text: Order: Target a rank. Until the end of the turn, all characters gain +6 AC against ranged strikes while in that rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I do not know why she saved me. Perhaps she sensed that there was still good within my heart, or perhaps the elves were her enemies. I only know that I live, and owe her more than I can say." - Maakh

name: Qaiya Mennanakh
text: React: Once per strike, before Qaiya males a melee strike roll, randomly rearrange the characters in the target's rank.

setInfos.flavorText: She follows her father into war, riding the steed of her noble birth.

name: Rain of Shards
text:
Gargoyle only.
Spend Order: Target an adjacent rank. This cleric performs a melee strike with an ATK of +2 against each character in that rank. The ATK of these strikes cannot be modified.

setInfos.flavorText: "They will fail because they have a finite number of warriors. I have an infinite number of stones." - Sjonegaard, Lord of the Earth

name: Ritual of Eternal Darkness
text:
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: This wizard targets another character in this rank. The target must succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 10) or suffer 3 wounds. If the target succeeds, he or she permanently gains +1 hit point, +3 AC and the Undead trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "A moment of pain... an eternity everafter."

name: Rod of Wonder
text:
Order: Spend the Rod to roll a die.
1-3: Nearby grass grows quickly (no effect).
4-7: Stun a character up to two ranks away.
8-12: Perform a +8 ranged strike.
13-19: +4 ATK, +5 AC until end of the turn.
20: A target character up to three ranks away must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer two wounds.

name: Sword of Truth
text: This character has +1 ATK for each item equipped to another character in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "You take it, Corten," Sir Lucian said. "I already have a sword."
"I'm sure the windows and orphans would be most intersted in hearing your thoughts on means and ends, Laird Hawthorne." - Sir Erik Kaisen

name: Scouting the Target
text: Spend React: Play before another character makes a ranged strike roll. Add +3 to the die roll. If this character is a Scout, add an additional +3 (+6 total) to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Orochoff finds dwarves scuttling to the surface, and he sets traps for them. Like roaches in caves, soon enough, they die." - Taoth

name: Sir Rhawn d'Ilchant
text:
Rhawn may cast spells as if he were a 2nd level cleric.
While Rhawn is in the 1st rank, characters in the other players' 1st rank must succeed with a fear save (DC 9) to ready.

name: Skull of Dythanus
text:
You may only play this card if you have a 4th level or higher Lich in your army.
This character is +1 level.

setInfos.flavorText: "My father was the first necromancer, and the source of our freedom. Damn Syneri, and damn his perfect blade..." - Morghen Dythanus
"Keep that pretty one alive, Rrek'tor. She's worth twice as much to me, and I'll crush your hands if you break her. Scar her up a bit, though. Make her useful." - Varg

name: Sleight of Hand
text:
Order: Target an item on this character and equip it to another character in this rank that may legally equip it.
Order: Target an item in this rank that this character may legally equip. This character equips the item.

setInfos.flavorText: "Senator Palis, there is a man here to see you."

name: Soul Chamber
text:
You may only play this card if you have Morghen Dythanus in your army.
React: After Morghen suffers a wound that will kill him, and if the Soul Chamber is equipped by a different character, negate the wound and move Morghen to the rank behind your current last rank.

name: Spiritreaver
text:
+6 Skill
You may only play this card if you have a 5th level or higher Lich in your army.

setInfos.flavorText: The black bird feeds upon the souls it scavenges, leaving the dead flesh for its master's works.

name: Stealing from the Dead
text: React: Play after this rogue kills an opposing character with a melee strike. Target an item equipped by the killed character. Search your deck for an item of equal or lower level that this rogue may immediately equip, and equip the item.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's just easier this way." - Devon Harper

name: Stormbrand
text:
May only be equipped by an evil Paladin.
React: After this character kills an opposing character with a melee strike, perform a skill check (DC 20 minus the opposing character's level). If successful, this character gains 1 hit point permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: Ablung's last blade... his death, sheathed in steel

name: Storm's Caress
text:
Druid only.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters entering play in ranks 1 and 2 are spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Emperor will succeed in his quest... after a fashion." - Toren Yscar

name: Mistress Brigette
text:
Mistress Brigette has +2 ATK for each opposing Level 1 character.
Order: Stun a Level 1 Deverenian in your army: Mistress Brigette has +3 ATK while that character remains stunned. You may choose not to unstun that character during the ready phase.
errata: To pay the cost of stunning a character, that character must be unstunned beforehand.

name: Tower Shield
text: React: After this fighter is targeted with a ranged strike, spend Tower Shield: Gain +10 AC for the duration of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's not cowardice-it's sound tactical sense!" - Grudurk

name: Summon Gargoyle
text:
Dwarf only.
Order: Search your deck for a card with the Gargoyle trait, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: The art of creation is far older than the art of war.

name: Terror of Sharn Keep
text: May only equip items with "Eyestalk" in the title. After the Terror suffers a wound, it must discard a random item with "Eyestalk" in the title.

setInfos.flavorText: Pain. Sorrow. Fear.

name: Vehdred
text: React: After Vehdred kills an opposing character with a melee strike, remove a wound from Vehdred.

setInfos.flavorText: "The raven is hoarse, its voice stolen by the night. It cannot cry her passage, cannot warn you of the danger that walks within your halls..." - Absinthe

name: Vengeance
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll or a ranged strike roll targeting a character of opposite alignment. Add +10 to the die roll. If this fighter is a Paladin, the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "The earth knows naught of hate nor love, peace nor war, but vengeance? Aye, it knows vengeance." - Avalanche

name: Walk on Wind
text: Order: This wizard targets another character in this rank. Move the character forward or backward one rank. If this wizard is a Shaman, he or she may then move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "His eyes bleed, and he claims the Storm calls to him. Master, I tell thee, Euain is wholly unwell." - Theoloc

name: Word of Recall
text: Spend Order: This cleric targets a non-Warlord character in your army. Put the character into your hand. All effects (including wounds) currently affecting the character end. If this cleric is a Seer, put all of your items equipped by the character into your hand; otherwise, they are discarded."

setInfos.flavorText: "And then I go home again. Just like in the deal."

name: Acid Breath
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets a character one rank away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 11) or suffer three wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: There are worse things than quicksand in the swamps of Markappal.

name: Alhana Genecourt
text: After Alhana comes into play, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a character, you may immediately put him or her into play, as long as you can follow all the normal rules for bringing that character into play. Otherwise, it is shuffled back into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: Do not sleep... do not sleep tonight...

name: Anton Cyldragen
text:
May start the game with wizards from other factions.
Wizards joining your army suffer no loyalty penalty.
Spend React: Perform before equipping a wizard in your army with an item. The wizard is +2 levels for equipping this item.

setInfos.flavorText: Nothing is ever truly lost.

name: Baroness Lucana
text: Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "I shall teach thee, Jack, what it is to be pierced by the storms of fate."

name: Aroch Mail
text: If this character is a Paladin or cleric, other characters in this rank with the same alignment as this character have +1 ATK and +3 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "How many must die to keep a secret? How many more would die if it's lost?" - Sir Lucian
"The blessings of the sun, the aegis of Albrecht, the scales of the golden dragon." - Sir Lorden

name: Breastplate
text: Cleric and fighter only.

setInfos.flavorText: "In this climate it seems to be the only sensible armor." - Sir Robert
"Teaching someone to fight is easy. There's only one lesson: Don't die." - Kerebrus

name: Dragonscale Shield
text:
This character may not perform multiple melee strikes.
Order: When in the first rank, spend the Dragonscale Shield to have it attack as a level 1 fighter with AC 10, 1 hit point, and as ATK of +3.

name: Excellent Reflexes
text: React: Play before this character makes a skill check or magic save. Add +5 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "That's how I've stayed alive so long." - Basil Nemis

name: Experienced Archer
text: React: Play after a fighter or rogue in your army kills another player's character of equal or higher level with a ranged strike. Attach this to your character. As long as this card is attached, the character is +1 level, +3 skill, and has the ability: "Order: Once per turn, perform a +3 ranged strike."

name: Far Shot
text:
Ranger or Scout only.
React: Play before this character declares the target of a ranged strike. The target may be one additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "That must have come as a nasty surprise," Logan chuckled.

name: Fauve Mightyheart
text: Spend Order: Target a player, who must select one of his or her ready characters. The selected character becomes spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "She fought her way through Elven lines to sing songs of courage, and tell us that Toris Kelt still stands. There is yet hope..." - Sir Robert

name: Flail
text:
Fighter, rogue or cleric only.
Melee strikes performed by this character ignore any AC bonus from Shields or Weapons.

setInfos.flavorText: "Logan led the Baraxton thieves; Black Tom is Master of the whole guild of the Accordlands. I don't want to know what they have against each other. It'd just lead to knives in dark alleys, and I'd rather stay alive." - Basil Nemis

name: Heart
text: React: After players roll initiative, kill Heart to add +10 to your roll.

setInfos.flavorText: I have seen the beasts of the Abyss, and I know their cruelty. Whatever you say of us, uplander, we know more of pain than you could ever understand.

name: Howl of the Wolves
text:
Bard only.
Spend Order: Remove one wound from each character in the same rank as this bard (including the bard).

setInfos.flavorText: "Not all songs are written by humans." - Darian Windson

name: Improved Initiative
text: Spend React: Play before initiative rolls. Your army gains +5 to its roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "True power comes in the moment before the strike. Use it well. Make them scream." - Rora Blackmane

name: Black Sun Helm
text: This fighter gains +1 Level for equipping items.

setInfos.flavorText: "The greatest darkness falls right after the dawn." - Sir Magnus
"This is the world father died for?" - The Broken Earth
"The day shall be as night, the night as day. The dead and the living shall nevermore be strangers, and this world shall become perfect and new in the Storm's embrace." - the Annales Devereniorum

name: Invisible Servant
text: Invisible servant gains +8 ATK, +8 AC, and +1 hit point while adjacent to a wizard of 3rd level or higher.

setInfos.flavorText: "You cannot kill what you cannot find." - Sorscha

name: Nemeseth
text: If your Warlord is an Elf, Nemeseth may enter play in any rank of your army when you are putting him into play from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: Awaken, Rathe. Your betrothed awaits, and your Queen has need of you.

name: Over the Top
text: Spend Order: Move this rogue forward or backward one rank. You may perform another Order immediately after this one.

setInfos.flavorText: Even a journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.

name: Protection
text: Order: This cleric targets a character in your army. Until the end of turn, other players cannot target that character with actions. The character can be targeted with melee strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "'Angus'? He has not earned that name. He was known as 'Maul,' but since the day he bargained with the Abyssals, his name is nothing at all." - Gnarrow Yaw

name: Rac Ironbone
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, Rac gains +4 ATK and his melee strikes inflict an additional wound. Rac suffers one wound. This ability is usable only once per turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Dwarves must be stronger than steel.

name: Rapid Shot
text:
Ranger or Scout only.
React: Play after this character performs a ranged strike. This character performs an additional ranged strike with the same modifiers and effects as the previous strike. The additional strike receives a -2 to the die roll.

name: Rhydin
text: Rhydin had +4 AC while he is adjacent to one or more fighters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come, victory, or come destruction! We shall no longer wait for thee!"

name: Rhythm of Defiance
text:
Bard only.
Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters (including the bard) gain +2 ATK and +1 AC while in the same rank as the bard.

setInfos.flavorText: "By th'Storm! Methinks we should declare war on them just to stop their noise!" - Sir Sorlons d'Ilchant

name: Robe of Eyes
text: Order: Spend the Robe of Eyes and discard a card to draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "They are Slayer's looking glass and his mute witness, seeing the world through a thousand eyes and witnessing the atrocities performed in the Empire's name. So long as they don't repent, and weep, he has no need of conscience." - Sir Gahid

name: Rod of Resistance
text: +1 HP

setInfos.flavorText: "Anton says he's an archaeologist, but I think that's just a fancy way to say 'tomb-looter'. He does find the darndest things, though..." - Sir Wallence

name: Great Axe
text: This character's melee strikes inflict an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "I don't see what's so great about it." - Donovan Che'har
It's the backswing that really gets you...

name: Scry
text: Order: This cleric lets you look at the top two cards of any deck. If the cleric is a Seer, you may look at the top ten cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "All things are one, both future and past. All the world's blood runs as a river through our veins, carrying our petty hatreds into a sea of strife." - Toren Yscar

name: Sedwin Elfhunter
text:
Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to Sedwin's Skill.
React: After Sedwin kills a character: Sedwin permanently gains +1 Skill. If the character was an Elf, he also permanently gains +1 Level. Sedwin cannot exceed Level 5 using this react.

name: Senek the Poisoner
text: Whenever Senek hits a character with a melee strike, the character must succeed with a poison save (DC 11) or be killed.

setInfos.flavorText: "I saw Senek coat the inside of a Deverenian's breastplate with a heat-poison. The man boiled to death inside his steel." - Devon Harper

name: Shield of Ancient Kings
text: This fighter may not perform more than one melee strike per turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Deep in a chasm below the Shattered Mountains, two humans crawled to freedom, the last survivors of more than forty soldiers. Something stirred beneath the earth... and its hunger had not been appeased.

name: Shot on the Run
text: React: Play after this rogue performs a ranged strike. Move the rogue forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've seen how Kerebrus marshals his forces to the south of Baraxton, keeping an eye on the war. Once an offer suits his fancy, he'll move the mercenaries in... and we can only pray they'll be on our side." - Sali

name: Sir Delevere
text: Whenever Delevere moves into your 1st rank, you may rearrange the position of all your 1st rank characters.

setInfos.flavorText: Our victories shall be taken o'er the bodies of the dead, and our right shall batten upon the wrongs we must perform.

name: Sleep
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets either two level 1 characters or one level 2 character. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sleep, but do not dream. Tonight will be a night of a thousand nightmares, and of a thousand knives." - Sorscha

name: Speed of the Cheetah
text:
Barbarian only.
Order: Move this Barbarian forward or backward one rank. Spend React: Play after this Barbarian is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike. If moving back one rank will not create an illegal rank, the strike is canceled and this Barbarian moves back one rank.

name: Strength of Death
text:
Necromancers play this as a 3rd level spell.
Order: Select a player and target a character in play. Until the end of the turn, the target character gains either an ATK or AC bonus (your choice) equal to the number of characters in the selected player's discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "We do not wear bones, human. We wear death. Soon you will know the difference." - Cordeos

name: Tek and Ket
text: Tek and Ket are considered 2 characters for determining illegal ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm not telling you what we saw in that chasm, but we ain't going back!"

name: Sword of the Storm
text:
If you won Initiative this turn, this fighter has an additional melee strike (Base +4) when he attacks.
If this character is a Paladin, your Warlord has +3 Initiative.

name: Tome of Divine Wisdom
text: While the Tome is equipped, this character has +1 level, +1 hit point, and +2 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Knowledge comes, but Wisdom lingers." - Carved on the entrance to the City of Corinth

name: Tome of Champions
text: While the Tome is equipped, this character has +1 level, +1 hit point, and +2 skill.

name: Tome of Shadows
text: While the Tome is equipped, this character has +1 level, +1 hit point, and +2 skill.

setInfos.flavorText:
"The difference between me and you, Tom, is an understanding of honor," snarled Logan.
"You're wrong, boy," Black Tom grinned, sharpening his knife. "The difference is that I will still be alive in a year."

name: Tome of the Archmage
text: While the Tome is equipped, this character has +1 level, +1 hit point, and +2 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "It once belonged to Syneri, and in its pages are said to be the answers to the mysteries of life and death, and magic beyond reason. I have searched all my life for it, and one day it will be mine." - Anton Cyldragen

name: Training at the Guild
text: React: Play before this rogue makes a skill check or magic save. Add +5 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "I hear that Rora is calling herself the Bandit Queen." Keziah laughed, "Well, it's nice to have ambition, I suppose."

name: Uriens the Defiant
text: Uriens can equip one fighter item.

setInfos.flavorText: All Deverenian wizards must pass the Trial Perilous before they are granted their robes. Those who succeed are forever known by the means they defeated the test... and those who fail are not remembered at all.

name: Valorous Shield
text:
Only good characters.
This character may not perform multiple melee strikes.
React: Spend the Valorous Shield before an evil character targets this character with a melee strike roll. The die roll is automatically a '1'.

name: Vampiric Touch
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets a character in another army, one rank away. The target suffers one wound. If this wizard is a Necromancer, he or she gains +1 hit point permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: Euian laughed. "Thy venom clamors of a jealous woman, Cador. Prithee, turn more thought to thy studies, and less to thy cowardice!"

name: Vital Spot
text:
Assassin only.
React: Play before this Assassin makes a melee strike roll. Item cards do not add to the target's AC for this strike. Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Elves' time on this world may be short, human, but you will not live to see us die..." - Hassimal

name: Wall of Fire
text: Spend Order: Until the end of turn, whenever a character in your army is targeted with a melee strike (but before the roll), the attacker must succeed with a magic save (DC 10) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothrog weapons are impressive, but ultimately inferior. Let us see how they deal with Deverenian fire." - Slayer

name: Axe of Tergoth
