text: This fighter has an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Too big for you!" - Kul of Clan Tergoth
"Too big for you!" - Kul of Clan Tergoth
"First we're besieged by dragons, then the Storm, now giants? Is this the gods' idea of a joke?" - Sir Thomas of Celinar
"Come to me, men of the plains! Come to Kul, that he might send you shivering to the depths of Hell!" - Kul of Clan Tergoth
"The symbol of our clan's champion, chosen through battle and bloodshed. I will use it on the humans the same way I earned it!" - Kul of Clan Tergoth

name: Wheel of Fate
text:
Seers play this without spending.
Spend Order: Discard the remaining cards in your hand, then draw the same number of cards that you just discarded, plus one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Neus, grant me the courage to change what can be altered..." - Sir Robert

name: Amulet of Illusion
text: React: Spend the Amulet of Illusion before a melee strike roll targeting this character. If the opponent is lower level than this character, the strike automatically misses.

setInfos.flavorText: Brindle's trinket even has the power to make her seem lovely and kind... but not for long.

name: Andover's Quill
text:
Only Free Kingdoms may equip.
While equipped, this character gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "The book of freedom is written with steel, and drawn in the blood of loyal men." - King Michael of Andover

name: Ash
text: Order: Discard two cards from your hand to move Ash backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "He should have excellent footwork. He practices it every time he retreats." - Guardian

name: Balian
text: Mercenaries adjacent to Balian have +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: The moons are changing, and if you open yourself to their power, they will give you strength.

name: Barbed Lash
text: React: Play before you bring a character into play. If your Warlord is evil, the character does not suffer a loyalty penalty.

setInfos.flavorText: "All they needs is a bit o'persuasion."

name: Battle Axe
text: React: Spend the Battle Axe before this character makes a melee strike roll. If the strike's target has a Shield equipped, it is discarded.

setInfos.flavorText: "The dwarves marched out of the mountains just below the Deverenian city of Phrygai. They killed two ambassadors sent to turn them away, and from then on, it was open war." - Johan Halfblood

name: Blade of Syneri
text:
Only Mercenaries may equip.
While equipped, this character gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: Wrought by the Archmage Syneri, the blade is said to be forged from a piece of Bascaron's own shadow.

name: Brindle
text: Spend Order: Look at the top 10 cards of your deck. If one of the cards has the word "potion" in the title, you may show it to the other players and add it to your hand. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: Her hideous appearance is matched only by her foul, cold heart.

"A legion of Nothrog took the field that day, against half as many humans. Though Llyr fought bravely, they could only stave off the inevitable: Farhaven was burned, the Five Cities destroyed in flame." - Serah ni Fhionn

name: Battle Rhino
text: Order: Spend Battle Rhino: Move forward one rank. This character may perform an attack (spending as normal).

setInfos.flavorText: "...suddenly, I yearn for the stables of Deverenia." - Julien
"Mount up, men. Bring down their artillery." - Faiza Nyota

name: Circle of Protection
text: Order: Target this cleric or a character in this or an adjacent rank. The target gains +6 AC and +6 to magic saves until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Stand within a circle of arms, each a shield to the others, and Neus will do the rest." - Frederik Lahr

name: Deverenian Shield
text:
Fighter and cleric only.
This character may not use multiple attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "They call Robert the hero of the Andover Wars. I call him meat, and nothing more." - Uthanak

name: Dirge
text: Dirge is +1 level for equipping items.

setInfos.flavorText: "He wears the blue of the cleric caste but his heart burns red with thoughts of war." - Prince Alaric

name: Divine Protection
text: Order: This cleric targets a character. Until the end of the turn, the target has the ability: "Spend React: Before a melee strike roll targeting this character, make a melee strike roll targeting the opponent."

name: Duncan Kinslayer
text: Duncan has -1 AC for each other character in his rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "He'd best find his path among the humans-there's no time for redemption underground." - Poison

name: Dwarven Signet
text: Order: Spend the Dwarven Signet to give this character +5 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Best not let the Dwarves see you with that. They might start wondering how you got it." - Sali

name: Edge of Silverflame
text:
Only Elves may equip.
While equipped, this character gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: All things pass away. We elves, who burn more brightly than you, die all the more swiftly for it.

name: Faith Will Provide
text: Order: This rogue may immediately equip an item that he or she could not normally equip because of class. The item is discarded at the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Peace... at any price." - Gnorrow Yaw

name: Fenris
text:
You must spend a wizard to bring Fenris into play.
Order: Kill a character in your army to give Fenris +3 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "All Nothrog legions have a totem. If enough of their legionnaires give blood and their shaman knows the spell, they can give it form... and use its power to destroy us." - Darian Windson

name: Follow Through
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. If this fighter's opponent does not have Armor equipped, this fighter gains +5 ATK for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Tepheroth's guard set fire to the Rowan estates, but too late. Before she could destroy them, the Deverenians seized Rowan Palace... dangerously close to Myreth.

name: Gloves of Mercy
text:
This character's melee strikes inflict an additional wound.
React: After this character hits with a melee strike, the strike inflicts no wounds: Stun the target of the strike.

name: Frenzied Skirmish
text: Spend Order: This fighter gains +8 AC until the end of the turn. The fighter is killed at the end of the turn.

name: Gabriel of Llyr
text: Gabriel of Llyr gains +3 AC while he is the target of a melee strike or ranged strike by a character with a Steed equipped and +3 ATK while attacking a character with a Steed equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: War is death's feast.

name: Grimsteel
text:
Only Nothrogs may equip.
While equipped, this character gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is a death worse than being burned in a forge fire, and life eternal within hard-forged steel." - Krun

name: Hember's Fist
text:
Only Dwarves may equip.
While equipped, this character gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Honor can be purchased only with vigilance, and with courage." - Hember, First Dwarven Hethrhod

name: Hiding in Plain Sight
text: Order: Characters of equal or lower level may not target this rogue with melee strikes. This effect ends when this rogue attacks, performs an Order, or when the turn ends - whichever occurs first.

setInfos.flavorText: The assassination of the Andover King sealed the fate of his nation. After that, the Elves took the city as easily as a wave crashing on the shore... leaving nothing behind but the empty sand.

name: Kerebrus
text:
Kerebrus is a fighter and a cleric.
Evil characters within one rank suffer -2 ATK, AC, and Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "No soldier can stand alone."
"I have been away for too long."

name: Lady Ersane
text: While Ersane is spent, she and any adjacent characters gain +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "She guarded the passes into Deverenia, once. Now she must find her own path, and make new allies. The tale doth tell how Kerebrus was the only man to best her in combat, yet he refused her attentions. His horsemen so dwindled, can he afford to spurn her once more?" - Magellan
setInfos.flavorTraits: The Knight of the Steel Rose

setInfos.flavorText: "You must face dangerous temptations if you travel the road to the Empire of Storms..." - Basil Nemis
setInfos.flavorTraits: The Knight of the Steel Rose

setInfos.flavorText: "Protect your head, dunderbrain, or the Nothrog will eat it." - Ash

name: Lieutenant Dunbar
text: React: If Dunbar is adjacent to Sir Robert when Robert is suffering wounds, you may apply the wounds to Dunbar instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "I followed Robert through the burned fields of Llyr, and the ruins of once-mighty Corinth. If he leads me into death, it will be just one more journey I am willing to take by his side."
"It's not right for a Dwarf to live alone. It's unnatural." - Kohn Peacehand

name: Verdatha Mount
text:
This fighter gains Riding +5 if he is a Paladin.
Order: Spend Verdatha Mount: Move forward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, spend Verdatha Mount: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Beauteous." - Sir Magnus

name: Long Bow
text: Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, the bone is probably from humans, fused by unholy elven magic. But now I use it against them." - Graham Heyward
"One target, one arrow. Anything more is a waste of time." - Gueniveure of House Glyn

name: Lothian, Law-Hammer
text:
Only Deverenians may equip.
While equipped, this character gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is the weapon of the Emperor himself, passed down to his chosen Champion." - Lord Gahid of Rellion

name: Mage Armor
text: React: Play before a melee strike or ranged strike roll targeting a character in this wizard's rank. The character gains +3 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "It was an ancient shield, of strange design... I felt my hammer clang against it, staggered back from the blow, and when I looked again, it was gone." - Loner

name: Marcos Genecourt
text: Marcos has +1 level for equipping items.

setInfos.flavorText: To know a thing, first thou must possess that thing... and so it shall be for the Empire.

name: Minor Regeneration
text: Spend React: Play after a character in this cleric's army (including the cleric) is killed. Shuffle the character back into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Three days of complete rest, and you'll be as good as new." - Darian Windson

name: Mirror Image
text: Order: Target this wizard or a character in this rank or an adjacent rank. Until the end of the turn, before any melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting Mirror Image's target, the opposing character must succeed with a Perception check (DC 15) or else the melee strike or ranged strike misses.

setInfos.flavorText: "Catch me if you can, Deverenian." - Strongarm

name: Padrig
text: Spend Order: Look at the top card of any deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have seen the future, and it has been bound by chains of iron."
"The future is no longer bound, it answers to me."

name: Poison Dart
text: Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike that ignores AC bonuses from items.

setInfos.flavorText: "All too easy, Sir Dinnian. Thou art a fool to think I could care about thee enough to turn over my brother-and now, thou shalt be a dead fool." - Lady Elaneor Tremayne

name: Poor Man's Bow
text: Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I give you ten to one it breaks before you get the arrow away." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Potion of Shrinking
text: Order: Discard the Potion of Shrinking to target a character in this rank, who gains +5 AC and suffers -5 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: In the marshes of Myreth lives a hag so rancid that even the touch of her cold fingers will kill a man. Yet she brews such potions that many still seek her out... and some even manage to return.

name: Drac Mail
text: This character has +2 Hit Points and is considered an additional character for determining illegal ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "We are few. We are hated. We are scattered. We are not lost." - Elsabet Drac
"Deverenia's heart is her honor, my Lord Rellion. Whom dost thou honor?" - Corinne Drac

name: Prepared for Battle
text: Order: If this fighter has an Armor, a Weapon, and a Steed equipped, then he or she gets +6 ATK and +6 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: In his youth, the Emperor was one of the greatest knights of Deverenia. Age, and time have stolen the sharpness of his blade, and now he is only an old man with a fading Empire.

name: Quinthe
text: Whenever Quinthe kills a wizard of the same level or higher with a melee strike or spell, he gains +1 level, permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "Llyr has fallen, as has Andover. We must hunt down the rest of these 'humans' my Queen, and rid the world of their pestilence."

name: Rage
text: Order: Once per turn, Rage gains +4 ATK and -4 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Death is my freedom.

name: Run Him Through
text: Spend React: Play before a character in this rank makes a melee strike roll. The character gains +3 ATK for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "In truth, it grieves me to see so false a thief meet so fair an end." - Sir Marcos Genecourt

name: Sandstone Gargoyle
text: You must have a cleric in your army to bring Sandstone Gargoyle into play.

setInfos.flavorText: Made of stone, the gargoyles don't get tired, they don't retreat, and they don't know fear.

name: Shield Block
text: React: Play after this fighter suffers wounds. Discard a Shield the fighter has equipped to reduce the wounds to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothrog make good smiths. Their shields can be expensive, but at least they aren't made out of the hide of the last man they killed." - Kerebrus

name: Short Sword
text: Fighter and rogue only.

setInfos.flavorText: "The scouts have returned, Lord, and bless their speed, for the Nothrog are at their very heels!" - Squire Edonloc

name: Sir Sorlons d'Ilchant
text: Order: Discard an equipped item from Sir Sorlons to move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Trust thyself only, and another shall not betray thee.

name: Sir Wallence
text: Spend Order: Stun Sir Wallence to make a melee strike from the 2nd rank as if he were in the 1st rank.

setInfos.flavorText: It's a matter of survival. Live men don't see me coming, and the dead don't bother to watch me go. This war won't be won by honor, Robert. The sooner you learn that, the sooner our men stop dying.

name: Slovien
text: Whenever Slovien kills a character with a melee strike or spell, he gains 1 hit point permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "An elf that doth wish to live beyond his years hath but two choices; deal with death or steal another's life." - Lady Beatrix

name: Plot Hook
text:
Seers have +1 Level for performing this action.
Spend Order: Reveal a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to twice this character's Level. You may put one revealed dungeon card into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
errata:
Plot Hook is not a cleric action or spell, even when performed by a Seer.
You may reveal a dungeon but not put it into your hand, just to shuffle your deck.

name: Baron Bastein
text:
React: After target non-Warlord character three or more Levels lower than Baron Bastein performs a melee strike that wounded Baron Bastein: Kill the target.
Order: Once per turn Discard a Deverenian card from your hand: Remove a wound from Baron Bastein.
errata:
The melee strike must have inflicted a wound in order to use the react.
Banishing the wound completely prevents the use of the kill react.
A Deverenian card, is a character card with the Deverenian trait.

name: Dragon Buckler
text:
This fighter inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that hit, target up to two items equipped to the target of the strike that provide an AC bonus: Destroy the items.

name: Smoke Bomb
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, before each melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting this rogue, the opposing character must succeed with a Perception check (DC 15) or else the rogue gains +7 AC for the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothrog have better eyesight than you poor humans. But don't worry-at least you'll die slowly." - L'sara

name: Strike True
text: React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. The fighter gains +10 ATK for this strike but suffers one wound after the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'll gladly give my life to defeat you Deverenian. Your army has only two commanders; the Free Kingdoms have hundreds more like me."

name: Sword of Chaos
text: Whenever this character rolls a natural 20 on a melee strike roll, he or she may immediately perform an additional melee strike after this one.

setInfos.flavorText: It feeds upon your strength before it takes the blood of your enemies, and in its wake leaves a trail of soulless men.

name: Takh
text: Takh can equip one fighter item.

setInfos.flavorText: He says his knife's for skinning-not fur, but Deverenian mail.

name: Taraniel
text: Order: Once per turn, move backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: He has cut his hair, forsaken his past and given his sword to his son. Now he has only two reasons to live: his lady, and his vengeance against the High Queen.

name: To Me
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all other characters gain +1 ATK and +1 AC bonuses while in the same rank as this fighter.

setInfos.flavorText: "I don't know what effect these men will have on the enemy, but by the Storm, they frighten me."

name: Vedisalaron
text: Spend Order: Inflict a wound on a character in your army to target a character. The target character gains +5 ATK until the end of the turn.

name: War Rune
text: Order: This wizard targets a Weapon. The weapon gains +4 ATK permanently. Place this card with the weapon. A weapon may not have more than one War Rune.

setInfos.flavorText: "Carve it on the steel, but never the flesh. The one will cut through, the other will melt away." - Fett Anjaran

name: Xiat
text: Spend Order: Target a character in this rank who gains either +3 ATK or +2 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "If you should fall, another will replace you, and the power of the Nothrog will continue on beyond your name." - Krun

name: Soul Blade
text: React: After this character performs a melee strike or action that killed an opposing character: Choose one action printed on that character. While Soul Blade remains equipped, this fighter can perform that action until he uses this ability again.

name: Zoe
text: Spend Order: Target a character, who gains +1 hit point until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: My sons, my grandsons, they said I was too old to go to the battle. They died, one by one, and I find that the war has come to me.

name: A Common Purpose
text: React: Before rolling initiative: You may target teammates' characters this turn as if they were in your army.

setInfos.flavorText: "We're being used. Fighting each other only serves our enemy." - Squire Orban

name: A Prophecy Fulfilled
text:
Warlord only.
Spend Order: If this character has an Eastern Territory, a Western Territory, a Northern Territory, and a Southern Territory attached, you win the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "In the end, the Deverenians seized the four temples, and unleashed a new power on the world: the Ironhall refugees." - The Loremaster

name: Abd al-Jalaar
text: React: After Abd al-Jalaar enters play, kill one of your characters of a level equal to or greater than Abd al-Jalaar's: Move Abd al-Jalaar to your front rank.

name: Advice
text:
You can have up to six copys of Advice in your deck.
May only be played by John Zinzer.
Order: Ask for advice from one person around you. Draw a card.
Order: Perform two +5 melee strikes.

name: Al'drich von Grossynkiir
text:
Begins the game with one Dragon in rank 3 and one in rank 4.
May bring dragons into play 3 ranks below their printed level.

name: Altus Darkhart
text:
Your Dragons are non-Unique Mercenaries with Stealth +0 and may enter play adjacent to Altus if he is unstunned, even if he is in an opposing formation.
React: After an adjacent Dragon moves: Move Altus adjacent to the dragon.

name: Ambushed in the Snow
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
Order: Target a stunned character up to 2 ranks away. This character may immediately attack without spending, with all strikes targeting the stunned character.

name: Amulet of Bymynn
text:
Taliesin may start with this item equipped.
Characters in your army have +1 ATK, AC, Skill, and HP for each action card attached to this character.
Actions performed by this character may not be cancelled or redirected.
Order: Spend Amulet of Bymynn: Target character gains the Astral or Ethereal trait until end of turn.

name: Anathem
text:
Anathem may not be targeted by opposing characters while equipped to Irad.
React: After one of your characters dies: Return the character to play in the same location ready with the Ethereal trait. Remove him from the game the next time he dies.

name: Thunderhammer
text:
This character's melee strikes inflict an additional wound.
Order: Spend Thunderhammer: Perform a +6 ranged strike.

name: Around the World in 1 Night
text: Order: Ready Christophe Kringle.

setInfos.flavorText: What to my Narawat eyes should appear? A chariot sleigh and four demonic reindeer.

name: Athanaen Hammer
text: React: Before a character within one rank suffers more than 1 wound, spend the Hammer: Reduce the wounds to 0.

name: Athanaes Falls
text:
Spend Order: If characters in your army have used a cleric action, a fighter action, a rogue action, and a wizard action this turn (4 separate cards), attach Athanaes Falls to your Warlord.
While Athanaes Falls is attached, your characters have +5 ATK, +5 AC, +5 skill, and +2 hit points.

name: Atu, the Poisoned Field
text:
You play cards ignoring class restrictions and loyalty penalties.
Opponents play with their hands revealed.
You may play opposing players' cards as though they were your own.
Black Tom has +1 hand size while facing Atu, the Poisoned Field.

setInfos.flavorText: "I remain as pure as the lands, but now my voice speaks on her behalf."

name: Aura of Power
text:
Paladin only.
Spend Order: All Paladins in your army gain an ATK bonus equal to this Paladin's highest ATK bonus.

setInfos.flavorText:
"And if Terak manages to sway the Black Sun?" Bhaine asked.
"It matters not," replied Blackthorn. "My aide simply takes charge all the sooner."

name: Avatar of the Storm
text:
You may only put Avatar of the Storm into play if an Astral Deverenian has been killed this turn, or you spend an Astral Deverenian character to bring this character into play.
If the Avatar kills the highest level character in an opponent's first rank or is killed, shuffle the Avatar into your deck.

name: Avinaar Esmirik
text:
Begins the game with Blade of Torment and Mark of Siret equipped.
Avinaar may not be spent or stunned by opponents' actions.
Kara Wadreth has +2 HP while opposing Avinaar.

name: Avinoam Blightlifter
text: React: Before a Dwarf within one rank suffers wounds, discard a card: If Avinoam is ready, reduce the wounds by one.

name: Barrow Wight
text: While Barrow Wight is in your discard pile, your Warlord has the text: "Order: Once per turn: Barrow Wight performs a melee strike as if it were in your front rank. If the strike misses, remove it from the game."

name: Baruuk al-Semmeya
text:
Baruuk is a fighter and rogue, and starts with One Hundred Poisons and Zaina's Band equipped.
His items may not be targeted by opposing characters.
Order: Kill a character: Target non-Warlord character must succeed with a will save (DC 20) or ready, gain Stealth +10, and is under your control permanently.

name: Scout Pony
text: Order: Spend Scout Pony: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "My tribe does not tame the wild horses that roam the plains. We entreat them to aid us, and care for them in return." - Keridwen
"Pack up enough for a return trip. Not that we'll need it." - Farrel Wadreth
"Get in, get out. If we don't know what you saw, you died in vain." - Captain Dukat
"You can't win a war through ignorance." - Sir Robert the Vigilant

name: Baruuk's Band
text:
This character may not be killed or moved by opposing card effects.
When Baruuk al-Semmeya dies his army remains in play but cannot perform actions until the end of turn. At end of turn if Baruuk al-Semmeya is not in play, he returns to play in the first rank of his army with One Hundred Poisons and Zaina's Band equipped.

name: Bascarite Ring
text: React: After this character succeeds with a Magic Resistance check, spend the Bascarite Ring to immediately cast the canceled spell (If this character could normally cast it) as if it were cast from your hand.

name: Bescez
text:
Bescez enters play in the rank behind an opponent's last occupied rank.
When Bescez Maneuvers, it is considered a Stealth action.
If Bescez is in your army, your Warlord gains the ability: "Order: Once per turn: Move an opposing character forward or backward one rank."

name: Battle Ring
text: This character is also a fighter.

setInfos.flavorText: "So the Stormknights think they can take my forest? It is time they learned respect." - Tepheroth

name: Belt of Champions
text:
+2 Skill
This card may only be equipped by your Warlord.
Order: Once per turn, this character selects a class. He or she is considered to be of that class in addition to his or her original class until the end of the turn.

name: Beradah Dythanus
text: React: After Beradah inflicts one or more wounds on a character with a spell: Target all characters in the rank of the spell's target. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or become spent. Stun any targets who fail and were already spent.

name: Blackblade
text:
Blackblade may not be discarded while Eiael Darkfeather is in play.
This character inflicts additional wounds when he or she hits with a melee strike equal to the number of cards in your hand.
This character's ATK, AC, Level, Skill, and hit points may not be reduced.
This character's Critical Failures are considered Critical Successes.

name: Black Petre
text: Spend Order: Search your deck for a non-unique item, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand. You may only perform this action if Christophe Kringle is your Warlord.

setInfos.flavorText: Beside him sat Black Petre, a cranky old elf; I ran for my life, in spite of myself.

name: Black Wyrm's Egg
text: React: Spend the egg after this character inflicts one or more wounds with a melee strike. Reduce the target's AC by 3 permanently, and discard one item equipped by the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Black, the color of swamp, and decay, and corruption."

name: Black Wyrm Helm
text: React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike, spend the Helm: The source of the strike must make a magic save (DC 14) or suffer a wound and discard an equipped item at random.

name: Angel's Tears
text: Order: Discard a card: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "What we do now, we do for the greater good of all." - Black Tom of Corinth
"I have not come to judge you, mortals, but there are some whose deeds are so foul that I can but weep... and destroy them." - Uriel

name: Blade Dancer
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target a stunned character within two ranks. Kill the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: To the city streets they fly, surmount its stone walls. Now wipe them out, wipe them out, slay one and all.

name: Blade of Torment
text:
May not be discarded while attached to Avinaar Esmirik.
React: After performing a melee strike: Perform another melee strike. Blade of Torment may not React to strikes generated by itself.

name: Blessed Edge
text: Your fighters permanently gain the Paladin trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Thou hast helped me in the past, yet there are still enemies on the field; I hunger, and your sacrifice shall help me tear them asunder!"

name: Blood Worm
text:
May not equip items.
After Blood Worm performs an attack, stun Blood Worm.

setInfos.flavorText: "Talk quickly, boy, or they'll finish before you do." - Majeral

name: Blue Wyrm Helm
text: React: After target character targets this character with an action that does not produce a melee strike, spend Blue Wyrm Helm: Perform a +4 ranged strike against the target.

name: Blue Wyrm's Egg
text: React: After this character kills an opposing character with a melee strike, spend the Egg to perform an additional melee strike targeting a character in the rank behind that of the original target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Blue, the color of the open steppe, and wind, and vice."

name: Boots of Speed
text: Order: Spend the Boots of Speed to move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothing is more important in war than maneuverability. Your enemy can't hit you if you aren't in front of him." - Johan Halfblood

name: Bounty
text: React: After equipping Bounty, target an opposing non-Warlord character. While Bounty is equipped, this character has a +10 bonus to all rolls for actions and strikes against the target, and for all checks and saves caused by the target.

name: Burst of Inspiration
text: React: Before using an action card: This character is +1 level for performing the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Dragon died at mortal hands. Needs create results." - Marcus Shaw

name: By Your Word
text:
Warlord only.
Spend Order: Target a lower-level character from this character's faction. If the target is spent or stunned, ready the target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Toris Kelt. The first of the freed kingdoms, but not the last." - Sir Robert

name: Garrotte
text: While performing a melee strike against a spent character, this rogue gains +5 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "A small amoung of pressure will steal the truth from a man. A little more and it will steal his life." - Taisia
"Useless for interrogations, and a little messy, but easy to improvise when you've lost your knife." - Rress
"No, Tom. No deals. No alliances." - Trevaine Cartwright
"Speak up, Nin. I can't hear you apologize for what you said about Krun." - Rreg'jenn
We are the only animal that remains on good terms with our victims-right up until we eat them.

name: Calenar
text:
May not perform actions other than Maneuvering.
If Calenar is not stunned, all other Free Kingdoms characters within one rank have Marksmanship +8.

name: Canis
text:
If Canis is in play at the start of the game, your deck may consist of more than 50% of one card type.
If Canis is in play at the start of the game, you begin with 3rd level characters in place of first level characters and 5th level characters in place of 2nd level characters.

name: Cassica Moonseed
text:
Begins the game with Crown of Domination and Hand of Control equipped.
May not be targeted with melee strikes while there is another legal target in her army or opposing players' actions while there is another character in her army.
Sorscha has +5 skill while opposing Cassica.

name: Cassica's Cages
text:
May not be discarded or targeted by opposing players actions while attached to Cassica Moonseed.
Order: Spend the cages: Target a non-Warlord character in play: The target is removed from the game. Reacts may not be played in response to this action.

name: Cathel Rowan
text:
Spend order: Perform 2 consecutive +3 ranged strikes.
React: After Cathel hits with a ranged strike: Spend the target of the ranged strike.

name: Cear Adinerach
text:
If Cear is wounded by a melee strike from Logan Ebonwoulfe with the Knives of Betrayal attached, Cear is Killed.
Begins the game with The Black Knives attached and Black Tom in the third rank.
Order: Before you perform an action, discard a card from the top of your deck to move one of your Rogues forward or backward one rank.

name: Chain the Psyche
text: Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to three ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 21) or suffer two wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even if the soul has not been released from the bounds of the flesh, it can be made to bleed." - Tepheroth

name: Chakram of Tatiyana
text:
Equip this item to Dexton at the start of the game if he is your Warlord.
Chakram may not be targeted by opponents' effects.
Order: Once per turn: Perform two +5 ranged strikes.
React: Before inflicting wounds, reduce the wounds to zero: Move all wounds from this character to any characters within 3 ranks.

name: Chance
text:
May not be discarded while attached to Latnok.
Your characters ignore Critical Failures.
Your opponent's characters ignore Critical Successes.
When one of your characters needs to roll, use two d30, keeping either one.
10's, 20's, and 30's are Critical Successes for your characters.

name: Change of Leadership
text: Spend Order: If this character's Level is greater than 4, this character becomes your Warlord permanently. Your previous Warlord suffers 1 wound and permanently loses the Warlord trait.

setInfos.flavorText: Power comes only to those willing to take it.

name: Fortune's Helm
text: +5 Skill

setInfos.flavorText: "Kind of silly-looking, isn't it?" - Zagreb Umbala
"I, uh, I'll be on my way, then?" - Borrow

name: Chariot
text:
Order: Spend the Chariot to move forward one rank.
React: Spend the Chariot instead of spending or stunning this character when he or she falls forward from an illegal rank.

name: Christophe Kringle
text:
Christophe is a Warlord on December 24th and 25th.
If Christophe is your Warlord, you may replace your starting characters with Reindeer characters, ignoring character levels.
Order: Once per turn, ready a Reindeer.

setInfos.flavorText: The Deverenians were hanged by the ramparts with care as bait to draw the red warrior there.
"Ironcloth-forged steel, so delicately made that it is spun into clothing, yet resists even our strongest weapons. I've seen nothing like it before, m'lord." - Darius the Smith

name: Cloak of Skin
text:
Wizard or cleric only.
React: After this character is killed, but before he or she is discarded, discard the Cloak of Skin. The character is no longer killed, but is stunned instead. Remove all wounds from the character, who gains the Undead trait permanently.

name: Colbert
text: Colbert may equip two Bows.

setInfos.flavorText: "What the elves did to Corith was a crime. What Rustiq did to Corith was an abomination."

name: Comet
text:
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, after Comet kills a character with a melee strike or action, that character's player must discard a card from his or her hand.

setInfos.flavorText: Unnerving it was, I heard on the roof. The clawing and scratching of each demon's hoof.

name: Contract Killer
text: Spend Order: Target an opposing character. During the next turn, this rogue gains +5 ATK when performing a melee strike against the target. If this rogue is an Assassin, he or she also inflicts an additional wound with each successful melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Is this the entire family, then your highness?" Lazarus Saul grinned. "How thoughtful."

name: Cookies and Milk
text: Order: Remove all wounds from Christophe Kringle.

setInfos.flavorText: Seeing his eyes and the sword drawn over his head, I knew that I and my unit soon would be dead.

name: Corrupt Idol
text: Order: Spend the Corrupt Idol and another wizard in this rank: This wizard's level for casting spells is increased by the level of the spent character for the next spell the wizard casts this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Slayer refused its power, but I am not so foolish." - Azhraan the Foul

name: Crown of Command
text: Order: Spend the Crown to target a lower level character in any army's 1st rank, who becomes spent.

name: Glyn Quiver
text:
This rogue gains +1 Level for equipping Bows and Arrows, and may equip two Arrows.
If Glyn Quiver is destroyed, destroy all Arrows equipped to this rogue.
Order: Spend Glyn Quiver: Ready all Arrows equipped to this rogue.

name: Crown of Domination
text:
May not be discarded or targeted by opposing players actions while attached to Cassica Moonseed.
Order: Up to twice per turn, target an opposing non-Warlord character. That character performs an attack, spending as normal if not already spent or stunned, against targets of your choice within one rank of the character.

name: Crushbone Mace
text: Roll a die when this character successfully hits a character with a melee strike. If the roll is odd, this character inflicts an additional wound.

name: Crypt Ghoul
text: React: Before a wizard in your army would cast a spell, discard one card: The wizard need not spend to cast the spell. If your Warlord is Majeral, you may return the discarded card to your hand as an Order this turn.

name: Death
text:
May equip fighter items.
Begins play with the Gauntlet of Control and Death's Axe equipped.
Valhala Abyssbane may perform an additional melee strike per attack while opposing Death.
React: Cancel an action targeting Death from a character more than 2 ranks away.

name: Death By Poison
text: React: After this rogue hits with a melee strike: The target of the strike must succeed with a poison save (DC 8 + this rogue's skill) or be spent. If this rogue is an Assassin, inflict a wound on the target if he fails.

setInfos.flavorText: "His favorite blend." - Trespass

name: Death or Glory
text: React: After an opposing player passes: Discard all cards in that player's hand, or target a character within three ranks who must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: As the Nothrog stood over the Kaballite dead, the eastern skies darkened... their victory had come too late.

name: Death's Axe
text:
Death's Axe may not be discarded while Death is in play.
React: When a character performs an action that adds a card to that player's hand, spend Death's Axe to kill that character.

name: Death's Bargain
text:
This fighter receives an AC bonus equal to the number of charges on Death's Bargain.
React: After this fighter kills an opposing character with a melee strike: Put a Charge on this item.

name: Death's Call
text: Order: Spend Death's Call: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill) or suffer a wound and be stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "Life is suffering, and suffering can be eternal." - Beradah Dythanus

name: Death's Snare
text:
All Undead characters gain +1 ATK and +1 AC for each character in your discard pile.
All of your Undead characters have the ability "Spend Order: Kill this character to inflict one wound on a target character within 2 ranks."
Opponents may not remove cards from their discard piles.

name: Stones of Corrosion
text: Spend Order: Remove a Charge: Target an item within two ranks and succeed with a Stealth check (DC 8 + Level of item) to destroy the item. If you fail, suffer a wound.

name: Deathflail
text:
May not be discarded while Lady Bhaine is in play.
React: Once per turn, you may change the result of a melee or ranged strike roll by or against Lady Bhaine to a 1 or a 20, even if the result cannot be changed.

name: Deathwing
text:
May begin the game in play adjacent to a Dragon Lord.
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target all characters in adjacent rank. Each must succeed with a magic save (DC 11) or die.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Deck of Faces
text: Order: Spend and stun the Deck: Name a character card and look at an opponent's hand. If that character is in the opponent's hand, all copies of that card are discarded from his or her hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Funny, Zon never struck me as the gambling type." - Ruth Gwenelen

name: Deck of Many Things
text: Order: Spend the Deck and discard a card from your hand to look at the top five cards of your deck. You may immediately play one of those cards as if from your hand as a normal Order (playing an action, equipping, etc) as long as you can legally play the card. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.

name: Decrepit Ghoul
text:
While one or more Decrepit Ghouls are in play, your Ghouls have +2 AC.
React: Once per turn: Reroll any die roll. If Majeral is your Warlord, you may perform this React three times per turn.

name: Deima
text:
If Deima is your Warlord, your other Deverenians within 1 rank have an additional melee strike per attack equal to their first.
Order: Move an adjacent Deverenian forward one rank.

name: Demonslayer
text:
Good characters only.
Melee strikes by this character ignore the effects of the Astral trait.
Whenever this character targets a Monster with a melee strike, he or she gains +5 ATK (+9 total) and the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

name: Desert Martyr
text: Spend React: Kill Desert Martyr before a die roll is made to make the roll a natural '1'.
errata: Erratum 2003/10/17: His React should read "Spend React: Kill Desert Martyr before a melee or ranged strike to make the strike a Critical Failure."

setInfos.flavorText: "Earn this," he whispered, just before the enemy's spears fell upon him. I silently promised he would not die in vain.

name: Dexton Feldark
text:
When drawing cards, draw 3 additional cards.
Cards in your hand may not be targeted by your opponent.
Your Free Kingdoms characters within one rank have +5 AC and gain an additional strike with a base of +0.
Inquisitor Chyre gains an additional strike while opposing Dexton.

name: Diadem of Insight
text:
You may change your starting army after all players reveal theirs.
You may choose up to five cards to start the game in your hand.
Your characters are Astral, and spells targeting your characters do not ignore the Astral trait.
Opposing Stormwraiths have +5 skill.

name: Trap Kit
text: Whenever this rogue performs an action on a Trap, saves for that action have +5 DC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Welcome home Poison." - Trespass
"It was an accident, milord. Really." - Tripwire

name: Dirge of the Dead
text:
Bard only.
React: Play after a character in your army is killed by wounds. That character remains in play until wounded again or the end of the turn, whichever comes first.

setInfos.flavorText: "If Chaim must die, then let Death live!" - Death

name: Donnar of Clan Hel
text:
Donar inflicts an additional wound when he hits with a melee strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike which may target an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "The winter blows in from Hel."

name: Down the Chimney
text: Order: Move Christophe Kringle to your first rank. Unless he is stunned, Christophe performs a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: As he drew his sword unnoticed by those around, down the chimney the red warrior jumped to the ground.

name: Dragon's Call
text:
May begin the game equipped to Gwyr'neth-Ra.
Card effects do not affect this item while Gwyr'neth-Ra is in play.
Order: Target a non-Dragon character. That character permanently gains the Dragon trait, +5 ATK, +5 AC, an additional melee strike while attacking (base +0 ATK), +5 Skill, and +2 Hit Points.

name: Dragon's Majesty
text:
Dragon's Majesty may begin the game equipped to Gwyr'neth-Ra, and may be played from the discard pile as if from your hand.
Your hand size is increased by two.

setInfos.flavorText: "Humans? Pah! Hardly even finger food!"

name: Draxon Rhull
text:
Draxon is both a cleric and a fighter.
Draxon enters play as if he were level 9.
Your Dragons are not Unique.
Begins the game with an additional Dragon in rank three.
If Draxon is not stunned, your Dragons may enter play in the rank behind Draxon instead of their normal entering rank.
Order: Once per turn, ready a Dragon.

name: Dread
text: Spend Order: Move backward one rank and then perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Dwarves have discovered a new tactic after Goldenaxe and Ironhall-retreat." - Soren Nihil

name: Eiael Darkfeather
text:
Eiael begins play with Seeing Halo and Black Blade equipped.
Eiael is both a fighter and a rogue.
If Uriel is the opposing Warlord, Eiael loses the Astral trait.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward up to 3 ranks.

name: Emaline Faydra
text:
Begins the game with Emaline's Vow equipped.
React: After Emaline kills a character with a melee strike: Your opponent's hand size is reduced by one for the next turn.
React: After Emaline hits with a melee strike: Discard an item equipped to the target.

name: Emaline's Vow
text:
May not be targeted while Ossay is in play.
Begins the game with Ossay in rank 3.
If Emaline is your Warlord, so is Ossay.
React: After Ossay is targeted by a melee strike or action and is within one rank: Emaline becomes the new target, ignoring targeting restrictions.

name: Adina
text:
React: After you lose an Initiative roll: Adina has +1 Level until end of turn.
React: After you win an Initiative roll: Until end of turn Adina gains the ability "Order: Once per turn: Perform a +0 ranged strike." (You may gain this ability more than once).
errata: May react to any initiative roll.

name: Collapsing Bow
text:
Order: Spend the Collapsing Bow: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
Order: Once per turn: If this rogue is a Scout, perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "They fold down small enough that a typical gateguard won't notice it." - Yemat
"They fold down small enough that a typical gateguard won't notice it." - Yemat
"Someone once told me, all you need to kill a man is to kill what he loves. What does the Emperor love?" - Laurena Kennet

name: Epoch
text:
Equip this item to Dexton at the start of the game if he is your Warlord.
Epoch may not be targeted by opponent's effects.
Once per turn, this character may play a spell as a wizard.
Characters in your army have their alignment changed to evil, gain the Free Kingdoms trait, and the ability: "Spend React: After this character is targeted with a strike or action: Perform 2 melee strikes on the attacker."

name: Erriydh
text: Order: Discard a card: An opposing character within three ranks must make a magic save (DC 13 + level of discard) or suffer a wound.

name: Etain Drac
text:
Other characters in this rank are Astral.
React: After a Deverenian within one rank is targeted by a melee strike or action, discard a card. If Etain is ready, redirect the strike or action to another legal target.

name: Evade
text: React: After a wound Evade would suffer is reduced or redirected: Perform a melee strike.

name: Eversmoking Bottle
text:
Order: Spend the Bottle to move backward one rank.
Order: Spend the Bottle to give all characters in your army +4 AC against ranged strikes until the end of the turn.

name: Eye Eater
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Inflict 2 wounds on a stunned character within 1 rank.
Spend Order: Target a character in a adjacent rank. That character must succeed at a magic save (DC 18) or become stunned.

name: Eye of the Storm
text:
Hero and Warlord only.
React: Before this character dies or is removed from the game: Target a character within 2 ranks who must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer two wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "At long last, let all be mine." - The Emperor

name: Eyestalk of Control
text:
Reaver only.
You begin the game with three Level 3 Reavers in rank 1 and two Reavers in rank 2.
Your Reavers are +3 Levels for equipping items.
You may ignore "Unique", "Warlord", and faction traits when putting Reavers into play.

name: Eyestalk of Insight
text:
Reaver only.
React: When another player draws or retrieves one or more cards: Retrieve the same number of cards from the deck or discard pile. Card effects may not React to this effect.
Order: Discard a card: Ready an Eyestalk.

name: Famine Ghoul
text:
While one or more Famine Ghoul are in play, opposing characters have -2 ATK.
If Majeral is your Warlord, while one or more Famine Ghoul are in play opposing characters have -2 AC and the opposing player's hand size is reduced by 1.

name: Falter Stones
text: React: After a ready character moves forward or backward, remove a Charge from Falter Stones: Spend the character.

setInfos.flavorText: Donovan frowned, pulled off his boots, and shook loose the pebbles. He would arrive fifteen minutes late...
"Lose something?" - Keziah

name: Far um Far
text:
Begins the game with Slaughter attached.
Far um Far may equip two Weapons.
Counts as 2 characters in his rank and the rank behind him.
Begins the game with a Nothrog Warlord in rank one, and another in rank three.
May not be moved, stunned, or killed by opposing card effects.
Begins play in rank one.
Any time Far um Far would suffer more than one wound, reduce the wounds to one.

name: Fate
text:
Seer only.
May not be discarded while attached to Latnok.
Order: Discard a card: Draw a card.
React: After a character declares an action, discard a card: Cancel the action.

name: Feigning Death
text: Order: Discard a copy of this character from your hand to ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: I hid beneath Tom's lifeless body for 22 days, until the Nothrog left our village. I fed on bugs and bloodsoaked grass.

name: Figurine of Power
text: Order: Put Figurine of Power into play adjacent to this character as a Level 4 fighter with +8 ATK, 15 AC, +5 Skill, 2 HP and the ability "Spend React: Before an adjacent character attacks: Strikes from the attack may not be cancelled or redirected."
errata: Erratum 2006/04/14: It is a fighter item.

name: Figurine of Protection
text: Order: Put Figurine of Protection into play adjacent to this character as a Level 4 cleric with +5 ATK, 14 AC, +7 Skill, 2 HP and the ability. "React: Before an adjacent character in this rank suffers wounds: This character suffers the wounds instead."
errata: Erratum 2006/04/14: It is a cleric item.

name: Figurine of Trickery
text: Order: Put Figurine of Trickery into play adjacent to this character as a Level 4 rogue with +6 ATK, 16 AC, +6 Skill, 2 HP and the ability, "React: Once per turn after an adjacent character is targeted with a melee strike or action: Redirect the strike or action to this character."
errata: Erratum 2006/04/14: It is a rogue item.

name: Figurine of Wonder
text: Order: Put Figurine of Wonder into play adjacent to this character as a Level 4 wizard with +4 ATK, 13 AC, +9 Skill, 2 HP and the ability, "React: Before an adjacent character casts a spell, suffer one wound: Raise the adjacent wizard's level by 1 for casting the spell and saves created by the spell have +4 DC."
errata: Erratum 2006/04/14: It is a wizard item.

name: Fist of Albrecht
text:
May not be discarded while attached to Raath.
Your hand size is increased by 1, and you may bring multiple Paladin Warlords into play.
This Character may not be killed by card effects while his AC is 27 or higher.
React: When drawing a card, you may instead target a card in your discard pile and put it in your hand.

name: Flesh and Will
text:
Mentalist only.
Equip this item to Silas Tzin at the start of the game if he is your Warlord.
Order: Kill a target Mentalist: Remove a number of wounds from this character equal to the target's level, and move to that character's former position before correcting illegal ranks.
This card may not be discarded while Silas Tzin is in play.

name: Flory's Monster Guide
text:
All non-Monster characters in your army inflict an additional wound with melee and ranged strikes that target Monsters.
Order: Spend the Guide: Search your deck for a Monster that may legally enter play, and put it into play.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Heartstrings
text:
Order: Spend Heartstrings: Target lower Level non-Warlord character must succeed with a Will save (DC 15) or he may not attack until end of turn.
Order: Spend Heartstrings: If this rogue is a Bard, target lower Level non-Warlord character may not attack until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even Deverenians fall prey, if you know which to pluck." - Phon

name: Forged in Battle
text: React: After this character kills another character: Attach Forged in Battle to this character. While Forged in Battle is attached, and this character has a Weapon equipped, his melee strikes are a Critical Success on a die roll of 18 or greater, and he has +3 ATK.

name: Forlourne
text: Forlourne does not automatically fail when he rolls a 1.

setInfos.flavorText: "That cursed Rowan traitor. Who is to say he will be more loyal to us than he was to Alia and her father? Tell me, when we will find his dagger buried in our back?" - Artheon

name: Forsaken Keeper
text:
Order: Once per turn, move a Ghoul forward of backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, if Majeral is your Warlord: Search your deck for a Ghoul and put it into play legally. This action may not be canceled.

name: Frost
text: React: After one of Frost's melee strikes rolls results in a natural 18, 19, or 20 or a Critical Success, inflict 1 wound on all characters adjacent to the target if Frost is your Warlord.

name: Gauntlet of Control
text:
Gauntlet of Control may not be discarded while Death is in play.
After your opponent's Warlord is revealed, name two players. These players sit at your left and right with decks of your choosing and reveal their Warlords as your allies.
Your opponent must kill your Warlord to win this game.

name: Gelatinous Wall
text:
May not equip items.
Gelatinous Cube may not target ready characters with melee strikes.
errata: Erratum: "Gelatinous Cube" should be "Gelatinous Wall".

setInfos.flavorText: "This tunnel's clear!" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Getting's World Atlas
text:
React: After you bring a character into play: Move that character forward one rank.
Order: Spend the Atlas: Target an opponent's character that is not in the same faction as his or her Warlord and perform a melee strike against that target regardless of rank. This melee strike inflicts 2 extra wounds.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Glyph of Healing
text:
A character may not equip more than one Glyph of Healing per game.
React: Discard the Glyph of Healing when this character is suffering wounds to reduce the wounds to zero.

name: Green Dragon Inn
text:
May not start in play.
May not perform actions.
While Green Dragon Inn is in play and in the first rank, all players have +1 hand size.
Characters adjacent to the Inn have Defend +3 and Riposte +3.

name: Green Wyrm's Egg
text: React: After this character inflicts one or more wounds with a melee strike, the target must suceed with a magic save (DC 10) or suffer two additional wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "Green, the color of the deep forest, and memory, and forsaken truths."

name: Sewer Worm
text: Order: Spend Sewer Worm: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "...don't drink Baraxton water. Trust me." - Jiyacin Fret
"Ride it or feed it." - Trespass

name: Green Wyrm Helm
text: React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike, spend the Helm: The opposing character and any characters adjacent to him must each make a Fortitude save (DC 16) or suffer a wound.

name: Grihilga
text: Order: Once per turn, all players reveal their deck's top card. You choose whether the revealed cards will be drawn or discarded.

name: Gwyr'neth-Ra
text:
Gwyr'neth-Ra begins the game with a Dragon Lord in the third rank.
Opposing characters other than Syvonne Ashenstorm may not target Gwyr'neth-Ra with action cards.
Order: Discard a card: Take a Dragon from your collection and put it into play adjacent to one of your characters.

name: Hand of Control
text:
May not be discarded or targeted by opposing players actions while attached to Cassica Moonseed.
Order: Once per turn, target a character. That character may not perform actions this turn.
Order: Spend the Hand: Kill a stunned character.

name: Hand of Cunning
text: Order: Target a character within one rank and remove all cards attached or equipped to the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "...and our fallen comrades schemed and died in our absence..."

name: Hand of Might
text:
Monks may play this as if they were fighters.
Order: Perform an attack without spending.

setInfos.flavorText: "...enemies, witting or otherwise, array against us..."

name: Hand of Power
text:
Mentalists may play this as if they were wizards.
Spend Order: Each opposing character must make a Will save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "...it is time, I think, to try something new." - Master K'Hallaek

name: Hands of Faith
text: Spend Order: Remove one wound from your characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Prophecies are treacherous masters..."

name: Harn
text: React: Once per turn after Harn is targeted with a melee strike: Perform a Riposte check (DC 20). If successful, perform a melee strike against the attacker.

setInfos.flavorText: "Shut up and die already. I'm in a hurry."

name: Harp of Ancients
text:
Bard only.
Taliesin may start with this item equipped.
This character may use Charisma on any die roll.
Order: Spend Harp of Ancients: Spend or ready, in any combination, any number of characters whose combined levels are less than or equal to this character's Skill.

name: Zaina's Darts
text: Order: Destroy Zaina's Darts: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this rogue's Stealth targeting a character within one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nightwalkers? Ain't never heard of 'em?" Tom smiled "Oh really? Now, that's just too bad."

name: Heerman's Epic
text:
All characters in your army are +1 level for using action cards.
Order: Spend the Epic: Target one of your characters in an adjacent rank. Search your deck for a character 1 level higher than the target character. Discard the target and replace him or her with the retrieved character.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Hel's Handmaiden
text: React: After this fighter hits with a melee strike: The target of the strike must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + the ATK of the strike) or be spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "A harbinger of your fate." - Donnar

name: Hel's Rune
text:
Order: Attach Hel's Rune to a Weapon.
While Hel's Rune is attached, the Weapon gives an additional +2 ATK. Additionally, after a character with the Weapon equipped has a Critical Success with a melee strike, stun the target of the strike and inflict an additional wound.

name: Helm of Vision
text: +4 Skill

setInfos.flavorText: "Without a goal worthy of greatness, we should all be common men. We have such a goal-defeating the elves. Upon that cause rests our freedom and our lives. Follow me, beyond this time of pain, to a world that we shall rebuild. Together." - Sir Robert of Andover

name: Hema
text: React: Once per turn, when a character within 2 ranks dies from a melee strike or ranged strike, Hema makes a Charisma check (DC 20). If successful, Hema gains 1 HP permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why, yes, I'll have some wine."

name: Hero's Gambit
text: Order: Perform an attack without spending. This character's strikes inflict an additional wound if they hit during the strike. Kill this character after the attack. (This death can not be negated unless the entire action is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "Denska hath no heroes, only martyrs." - Ghed Mnettaor

name: Ice Blade
text: React: Spend and stun the Ice Blade after this character successfully hits with a melee strike to force the target of the strike to make a magic save (DC 20) or become spent and force the target's controller to discard a card from his hand.

name: Ice Scale
text:
Cleric and fighter only.
React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike, spend the Ice Scale: The attacking character must succeed with a magic save (DC = this character's AC) or be stunned.

name: Ice Shield
text:
+1 HP
React: Spend and stun the Ice Shield when this character is suffering wounds to reduce the wounds suffered by 1 (minimum 0).

name: Imperial Amulet
text:
Magic saves (+3).
React: Spend the Amulet after a melee strike roll targeting this character. This character gains an additional +5 AC for this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do not fear for me, good Gahid, but go forthwith. I shall not need thee, nor thy tender care. I will mention thy 'vigilance' to my Father." - Princess Dashkova

name: Cloudracer
text:
Order: Discard a card from your hand: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Cloudracer: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "She's been with me since the start. The nearest thing I have to family now." - Logan
"She's been with me since the start. The nearest thing I have to family now." - Logan
"She's been with me since the start. The nearest thing I have to family now." - Logan
The heralds rode over the length and breadth of the Free Kingdoms. For every town that celebrated the Free King's coronation, two more cursed his name.
One by one, the Cartwrights reunited. Of Logan, there was no sign.
"Faster my friend! We may already be too late."

name: Invasion
text:
Warlord only.
While Invasion is in your discard pile, you may play it as if from your hand, then remove it from the game.
React: After a character enters play: Put up to two characters into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Denska. Baraxton. The Kabal. What can stand against the Black Sun?" - Sorceress Ygraine

name: Iquitos
text:
May not equip items.
You may kill any number of characters in your army before Iquitos enters play. For each character killed in this way, Inquitos' starting rank is reduced by one. Inquitos may not receive bonuses to her ATK or melee strike rolls.
React: After Inquitos kills a character with a melee strike, ready her. This ability may not be copied.

name: Irad Syneri
text:
Irad starts the game with Anathem and Spectree equipped.
Irad may cast cleric spells up to 5th level.
If the opposing Warlord is not Fasolt, opposing characters may only target Irad with melee strikes.
React: After Irad wounds a character: Ready Irad.

name: Ironhall
text:
Other Gargoyles in Ironhall's army have +1 Hit Point.
React: After a Gargoyle in Ironhall's army dies: Attach it to Ironhall. While it is attached, Ironhall has +1 to ATK, AC, Skill, and HP.
Order: Discard an attached Gargoyle: Perform a melee strike.

name: Ironhall's Fury
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, all Gargoyles have an extra strike when attacking (base +0 ATK).

setInfos.flavorText: "Where many gargoyles die, gravel spawn rise, but we remembered too late." - Ardenal

name: Ironhall's Reach
text:
Gargoyle and Druid only.
Spend Order: Put this card in play in the front rank as a level 3 classless character with the Siege and Gargoyle traits, +6 ATK, 15 AC, +0 Skill, 2 Hit Points and Riposte +10. This character may not perform actions other than Riposte, which can be used any number of times per turn.

name: Ironhall's Rise
text:
Gargoyle and Druid only.
Spend Order: Target a rank in play. Each character in that rank must make a Dexterity save (DC 15, DC 20 if the caster is a Gargoyle) or move back one rank and become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Is this supposed to happen?!" - Honor

name: Isadran Warrior
text: If your Warlord is Deverenian, you may bring Isadran Warrior into play in any of your ranks adjacent to a rank you occupy. Isadran Warrior gains a permanent ATK bonus equal to the rank he entered play.
errata: Erratum 2005/04/26: His ability should read "If your Warlord is Deverenian, you may bring Isadran Warrior into play in any of your ranks of 3 or higher adjacent to a rank you occupy. Isadran Warrior gains a permanent ATK bonus equal to the rank he entered play."

name: Ja'leeque
text: Order: Once per turn, spend Ja'leeque or stun one of your Shamans in this rank to select a rank up to 3 ranks away. Until the end of the turn, characters become stunned immediately after moving out of the selected rank.

name: Jartik
text:
Jartik inflicts an extra wound when he hits with a melee strike.
Order: Kill a character in this rank: Move forward one rank.

name: Hawthorne's Arrows
text: React: After this rogue performs a non-spell ranged strike that killed the target, spend Hawthorne's Arrows: Perform a +2 ranged strike against a character in the rank that was behind the killed character.

setInfos.flavorText: "These arrows show Hawthorne's fletching. I had thought he was dead." - Logan
"If anyone kills an Elf, it'd better be because they had no choice. I'll find out otherwise." - The Free King
"We win by making them lose. That simple."

name: Je'lial
text:
Je'lial is both a fighter and a rogue.
Je'lial's attacks are Stealth actions.
May equip items and use Action cards while in an opposing formation.
React: Once per turn, after Je'lial has wounded a character, that character is killed.

name: Jorn of the Summit
text: React: Once per turn before one of your other Dwarves equips an item: The target Dwarf is +1 level for equipping the item. Ready the target.

name: Journal Entry
text: Spend Order: Remove Journal Entry from the game: Retrieve an action this character can perform from your deck and add it to your hand. Shuffle the deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Day 37 in these Storm-forsaken tunnels. The things I must do for my Emperor." - Fauhn Boralis

name: Kaan Mallock
text:
Your other Free Kingdoms Rangers and Scouts have Stealth +5.
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
Order: Target and spend one of your Rangers or Scouts in the same rank as an opponent's Warlord. Choose and discard one card from the opponent's hand.

name: Kerebrus' Signet
text:
+3 Skill
May only be equipped by a Mercenary character.
React: Before you put a Mercenary into play, discard the signet to reduce the entering rank of the character by up to 2 ranks.

name: Knives of Betrayal
text: React: Spend Knives of Betrayal after this rogue hits with a melee strike. The target must succeed a poison save DC 14 (DC 20 if this rogue is an assassin) or suffer an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hidden poisons, hidden blades." - Senek

name: Kolivan
text:
Order: Once per turn, take up to two cards from the top of your deck and attach them face down to Kolivan as Pets.
Order: While in the first rank, spend a Pet attached to Kolivan, to have that Pet attack as a level 1 classless character with a +0 ATK, 6 AC, 1 hit point, and +0 skill.

name: Kringle's Armor
text:
Order: Once per turn, remove one wound from this character.
Order: Once per turn, remove one wound from Christophe Kringle.

name: Kringle's Bag
text:
React: After an item equipped by this character is discarded, shuffle the item into your deck.
React: Once per turn, if this bag is equipped to Christophe Kringle, reveal cards from the top of your deck until an item is revealed. Put the item into your hand, and shuffle the other cards back into the deck.
errata:
Erratum: Its first React should read "React: After an item equipped by this character is discarded by another player's card effect, shuffle the item into your deck."
Erratum: Its second ability is an Order.

name: Kringle's Sleigh
text:
Reindeer in your army have the ability: "Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank."
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: I heard him exclaim as he drove out of sight "I'll be back for more carnage one year from tonight!"

name: Viper's Tongue
text: React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by this rogue, spend Viper's Tongue: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 14, DC 19 if this rogue is an Assassin) or suffer a wound and become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "We're all men and women of the world. If anyone can kill the Emperor, it is us." - Black Tom of Corinth
"Through all this, where is Sav'rukk?" - Kenia

name: Lady al-Semmeya
text:
Lady al-Semmeya is a wizard and cleric, and starts with Diadem of Insight and Baruuk's Band equipped.
Her items may not be targeted by opposing characters.
React: Before declaring a spell, discard a card: Search your deck for that spell.

name: Lady Bhaine
text:
May equip two Weapons.
Begins the game with Deathflail equipped.
Melee strikes and ranged strikes targeting Lady Bhaine by a character with Soul Stealer equipped inflict 2 additional wounds.
Card effects cannot kill Lady Bhaine.
May cast 1st to 3rd level cleric spells.

name: Latnok
text:
Begins the game with Fate and Chance equipped.
React: After one of your characters is targeted: Redirect the action or strike to another of your characters, even if the targetting is not normally legal. Sjonegaard may cancel this React once per turn as a React.

name: Light of Albrecht
text:
Good Paladin only.
Order: Target a lower level non-Warlord evil character in your opponent's army. Move the target behind your last rank. You gain control of the target until it leaves play. While in your formation, the target's alignment is changed to Good.

name: Limited Wish
text: Order: Rip Limited Wish in half: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. This action cannot be canceled.

setInfos.flavorText:
"Do not let the world change you. Change the world." - Kerebreus
"Sometimes wishing is all you have left." - Sister Amanda

name: Logan's Ring
text: This character may perform 'Once per turn' actions twice per turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I don't have time to show you what to do, so I'll just do it myself."

name: Lost Warrior
text:
If Majeral is your Warlord, Lost Warrior has an additional strike at +2 ATK.
React: After Lost Warrior kills an opposing character, discard a card to put that character into play in your army's front rank with the Ghoul and Undead traits. If your Warlord is Majeral, you need not discard a card.

name: Majeral
text:
After starting armies are revealed, play up to 3 Ghouls from your deck into any ranks.
Your Undead are Mercenaries.
Your Ghouls are not Unique.
If Majeral would be defeated, the winning player instead wins a Ghoul (unless none remain) and the game ends.
Paladins inflict an additional wound with melee strikes against your Ghouls.

setInfos.flavorText: "Cassica moonseed, A fair face and a twisted soul, a fiend that enjoys playing with her toys." - Lady Bhaine

name: Map of the Back Alleys
text:
+2 Skill
Order: Spend the Map to move this character to the rank behind your last occupied rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Any thief worth his picks would kill for that parchment.

name: Sword of the North
text: Order: Spend Sword of the North: Move forward one rank, or gain +4 ATK until end of turn, or this character has an additional melee strike (Base +0) when he attacks until end of turn.

name: Marcus Shaw
text:
At the start of the game, pick a faction. Your characters of that faction enter play without loyalty penalty.
Marcus can use the Charisma feat with any character in your army, regardless of rank.

name: Mariah Blackthorn
text:
Mariah's strikes may not be canceled.
React: Once per turn, after a strike targets Mariah: Cancel the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I will atone for my father's deeds, milady Brymin. I just ask for a chance to prove myself."
"Let us speak of thy father, and of thy place in the new world." - Master K'Hallaek

name: Mark of Siret
text:
May not be discarded while attached to Avinaar Esmirik.
Your opponent must play with his hand face up.

name: Master K'Hallaek
text:
Begins the game with Storm Gem equipped.
Your hand size is 10 cards.
Anton Cyldragen can target Master K'Hallaek with spells, regardless of how many ranks away he is.

name: Masterwork Armor
text: This character gains an additional +3 AC (+5 total) while spent.

name: Masticus Aedroud
text:
Begins the game with The Assembly and one random item from his deck equipped.
Your items may not be targeted by opponent's card effects.
Your other Paladins gain +1 Level, +3 ATK, +3 AC, +1 HP, and +2 Skill.
Masticus may cast level 1 & 2 cleric spells.
React: Kill another character in your army: Ready Masticus.

name: Medwin's Codex
text:
All characters in your first rank have +2 ATK, +2 AC, and +2 skill.
Order: Spend the Codex: Target up to three unspent characters in your first rank. You may immediately attack each of these characters consecutively.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Mephit
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I shall pluck your limbs from your frame, manling. Do you scream? Do you shriek? How loudly shall you plead for death?"

name: Mithglyn
text:
Begins the game with Mithglyn's Bow equipped.
Once per turn, Mithglyn may play a Rogue action.
React: Before you play a card, change it to be any card in your collection if Mithglyn is your Warlord. Once per turn, Adarymy may cancel this effect-the card is discarded.

name: Mithglyn's Bow
text: Order: Discard a card from your hand to perform a +10 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

name: Altus' Cloak
text: This rogue gains +2 Skill for each character in this rank and +1 AC for each rank in your formation.

setInfos.flavorText: Altus was a thief before he was a Dragon Lord, but his old possessions lie scattered in his wake. Their potency has not been lost.
"That one has always been full of cunning..." - Black Tom of Corinth

name: Morrigan De Danaan
text:
Your Dragons are not unique and enter play in rank 3.
Order: Once per turn, put a card from your hand into play face down: This card is a level 6 evil wizard with the following stats: +9/+6 ATK, 16 AC, +5 Skill, 3 HP, the trait Dragon, and the ability: "Order: Once per turn move forward or backward one rank."

name: Nassiral Hate
text:
Begins the game with Canis equipped.
Any player may spend the Eye of Morghen as a React when Hate casts a spell to cancel it.
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on or remove a wound from a Nothrog character.
Spend Order: Get a Nothrog character from your deck and put it in your hand.

name: Olivark the Quiet
text:
React: After Olivark enters play: He gains a class and a faction of your choosing permanently.
React: After a character of the same faction as Olivark is targeted by an action (not a melee strike), kill Olivark: Cancel the action.

name: One Hundred Poisons
text:
Opposing characters may not perform Reacts unless they are a Seer.
Before the start of the first turn, search each opponents' deck and remove up to three cards from the game.
Order: Once per turn: Succeed with a Stealth check (DC 25) to move forward one rank.

name: Orm al'Ghast
text:
Opposing characters may not target Orm Al'Ghast with action cards.
Order: Spend a character in your army and target an unstunned character: Move the target forward or backward one rank.

name: Ossay M'Andaeus
text:
Begins the game with Ossay's Vow equipped.
React: At the end of the main phase: Search your deck for a number of cards equal to the number of wounds on Ossay and add them to your hand, then remove all wounds from Ossay.

name: Ossay's Vow
text:
May not be targeted while Emaline is in play.
Begins the game with Emaline in rank 3.
If Ossay is your Warlord, so is Emaline.
Order: Inflict a wound on Ossay: Ready Emaline or Ossay. You may play this ability while stunned unless the the opposing Warlord is Tepheroth.

name: Pendant of Grandeur
text: This character gains +2 levels while he or she is the target of an opponent's action.

setInfos.flavorText: "I bear the mark of the Lord Mayor himself. Harm to me is harm to him."

name: Perfect Stance
text:
Mentalist only.
Equip this item to Silas Tzin at the start of the game if he is your Warlord.
React: Before another player draws or retrieves a card during the Orders phase: Cancel the action. Ready this character. This action may not be prevented and may be performed while stunned.
This card may not be discarded while Silas Tzin is in play.

name: Planar Tides and Currents
text:
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all evil characters gain +5 skill and all good characters have -5 skill.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all good characters gain +5 skill and all evil characters have -5 skill.

name: Kermenes the Spry
text:
Order: Once per turn: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to Kermenes' Level.
React: After Kermenes performs an Order, discard a card and choose an opposing player: You and that player make an Initiative roll. If you win, you may perform another Order after this one.
errata: All initiative rolls are made by your Warlord.

name: Envy's Snare
text: React: After a melee strike targets a character in this rank, destroy Envy's Snare: The attacking character must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 19) or suffer one wound and this character may destroy two of the attacking character's items.

name: Potion of Youth
text:
You must spend a wizard to put this item into play.
Order: Discard the potion of Youth. This character gains +3 AC and -1 level permanently. Characters reduced below 1st level are discarded.

setInfos.flavorText: "It did wonders for my skin, heeheeheehee!" - Brindle

name: Punch Daggers
text: Characters wounded by this fighter must make an endurance save (DC = 10 + fighter's level) or become spent; spent characters become stunned.

name: Pustulant Horror
text:
All of your Ghouls inflict an additional wound with melee strikes when the die roll is even.
If Majeral is your Warlord, any of his spells that target a character may target an additional character within one rank.

name: Putrid Rogue
text:
While Putrid Rogue is in play, your Warlord's actions (not melee strikes) may target one additional rank farther than usual.
If Majeral is your Warlord, your spells inflict an additional wound.

name: Qor-Teth
text:
Abyssals in this army all gain Magic Resistance +0.
If Qor-Teth is your warlord, there is no limit to the number of each Abyssal in your deck and you start with an additional 1st and 2nd level character in play.
Order: Once per turn, get an Abyssal from your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck.
Order: Once per game, attach a 1st through 5th level wizard spell to Qor-Teth. While attached, he can cast the spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand and he were a wizard.

name: Raath
text:
Your characters gain a bonus to ATK equal to the number of characters in your army.
Raath gains a bonus to AC equal to the number of other characters in your army.
Evil Paladins facing Raath and good Paladins in Raath's army gain an additional strike with a base of +0.

name: Ravenwild
text: React: Once per turn, after a character in your army is targeted with a melee strike, ranged strike, or action, select another character in the same rank who becomes the new target.

setInfos.flavorText: "You could hire Zartoch... or you could hire Asimon and be sure the job is done right."

name: Red Wyrm's Egg
text: React: Spend the egg before this character makes a ranged strike roll. The strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
