setInfos.flavorText: "Red, the color of volcanoes, and fire, and wrath."

name: Red Wyrm Helm
text: React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike, spend the Helm: The targeting character must make a magic save (DC 20) or suffer a wound.

name: Rescue
text:
Warlord only.
React: After a character in your army is targeted by an action (not a melee strike): Cancel the action and attach Rescue. While it is attached, this character has -5 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sir Robert is alive, Dukat. We can free him, as he freed us." - Jin Valford

name: Grappling Crossbow
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike that may target a character an additional rank away.
React: After this character performs a ranged strike that hit, spend Grappling Crossbow: If this character has no subclass, move the strike's target forward one rank.

name: Ricart Darpor
text: Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike, then a +3 ranged strike. These may target characters an additional rank away.

name: Ring of Resilience
text: React: After another player's card effect that would kill this character resolves, spend or discard the Ring: Cancel the action.

name: Robes of Kor
text: Spend Order: All characters in your army gain +3 ATK until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "In Kor's name I rise, and in Kor's name I shall fall." - Faith

name: Rod of Absorption
text: Spend React: After a spell targets a character in this or an adjacent rank, this wizard performs a magic test (DC 16). If successful, cancel the spell, then search your deck for a wizard spell of equal or lesser level. Show it to your opponents and put it in your hand.

name: Rod of Destruction
text:
Spend Order: Target a Siege character within three ranks. Stun the target character.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike targeting any Siege character in play. This strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Take this when you fight the Nothrog and bring home a victory." - Cardinal Scelus

name: Rod of Stone
text:
Order: Spend the Rod to target a Gargoyle within 3 ranks. Remove a wound from the target character.
Order: Spend the Rod to target a Gargoyle within two ranks. Inflict a wound on target character.

setInfos.flavorText: If you know what animates the beasts, you can undo their power... or strengthen it to godlike proportions.

name: Rod of Striking
text: Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike. The ranged strike is +3 if the character is a wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "Power unused will fall from you, and strengthen another. If you wish to keep your throne, rule from it." - Nassiral Hate

name: Rotting Priest
text:
Your Ghouls have +1 HP.
After a Ghoul suffers one or more wounds, the character causing the wounds also suffers the same number of wounds.
Spend React: After Majeral is targeted by an action or melee strike, Rotting Priest becomes the target.

name: Rowan's Duty
text: React: After this character performs a strike or action that killed an opposing character of equal or higher Level that was more than one rank away: This character permanently gains +1 Level, +1 HP, +5 Skill, and a +4 bonus to ranged strikes. Remove this card from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our true duty has been long forgotten." - Sedayah
"Our true duty has been long forgotten." - Sedayah

name: Sakar
text:
May only start the game with good Deverenians and Mercenaries.
If Sakar is your Warlord, your good characters suffer no loyalty penalty and your evil characters enter play as if they were one level higher.
Sakar may begin the game with any one rogue item of level 8 or less equipped.

name: Sarakian Ox
text:
Order: Spend Sarakian Ox: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: After this rogue is targeted by a melee strike, spend Sarakian Ox: Redirect the strike to Sarakian Ox, which becomes a Level 2 Astral rogue with +6 ATK, 9 AC, +8 Skill, 1 HP, and Riposte +5 until after the strike.

name: Scythe of Souls
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: After this character hits with a melee strike: The target of the strike suffers -5 ATK, -5 skill, and -5 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Seeing Halo
text:
Seeing Halo cannot be discarded while Eiael Darkfeather is in play.
This character may play action cards while in an opposing formation.
This character does not return to his or her formation when he or she loses Stealth or because of a lack of characters in his or her army.
This character's actions are Stealth actions.

name: Selene du'Marguerite
text:
Your Dragons are non-Unique Undead Mercenaries and may enter play within one rank of Selene if she is not stunned.
You may start with a Dragon in play in rank 3.
Order: Discard a scribed spell: Succeed with a Medicine check (DC 20) to inflict a wound on a character within three ranks.

name: Shadow Wraith
text: Spend React: When you have an illegal rank, move Shadow Wraith back one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Resiliant and greedy, but protective of those they hold dear." - Fett Anjaran

name: Shield of the Summit
text:
Fighter and cleric only.
React: Before this character suffers one or more wounds from a melee or ranged strike, spend the Shield of the Summit: Reduce the wounds by one and inflict a wound on an adjacent character.

name: Siegemaster Kcal'den
text:
Kcal'den may not be targeted with ranged strikes if there is a character with the Siege trait within one rank in your army.
Spend Order: Target a character in play. Move the target character back a number of ranks equal to the number of items he or she has equipped.

name: Sigil of Ishara
text:
Good characters only.
Spend Order: Spend an evil character of lower level than this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "In the name of the Queen of Oceans and Tears, I command you to fall to your knees in penance for your deeds!" - Rabinus Zon

name: Silas Tzin
text:
May not target characters with Limited Wish equipped unless there are no other legal targets.
Your deck and hand may not be targeted by opponents.
Silas may not be killed or moved by opposing card effects.

name: Sir Rallen
text:
If Rallen is your Warlord, your Deverenians have the ability "Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this character's level. This ranged strike may not receive any bonus to the roll."
Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +3 ranged strikes.

name: Sir Tython
text:
May equip two Weapons.
React: Inflict a wound on Tython after he is targeted with an action that moves, spends, stuns, or kills him, to cancel the action and ready him.
React: After an opposing character performs an action that draws a card, perform a melee strike.
errata: Erratum: His first React should read "React: Inflict a wound on Tython after he is targeted with another player's action that moves, spends, stuns, or kills him, to cancel the action and ready him."

name: Logan's Longbow
text:
Order: Spend Logan's Longbow: Perform a +0 ranged strike that inflicts two additional wounds.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike. Add this character's ATK to the strike.

name: Sjonegaard's Mace
text:
Order: Spend the Mace to give a target Gargoyle +4 ATK, +4 AC, and +4 Skill until the end of the turn.
Spend Order: Spend the Mace to put a Gargoyle from your discard pile into play (if it may legally enter play) or into your hand.

name: Skull of Great Omgah
text: Nothrog gain an additional Powerattack +5 (+7 total).

setInfos.flavorText: "It takes center-place amongst my collection." - Krenthor Gouge
The spirit of Omgah still fills its bearer with rage...

name: Slaughter
text:
React: If discarded, return Slaughter to your hand, you can not equip Slaughter this turn.
React: Before this character performs a melee strike, cancel the strike: The next melee strike this character performs this turn has an ATK bonus equal to the cancelled strike's base ATK, and inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

name: Slayer's Tome
text: React: Spend the Tome after this character casts a spell to draw two cards. Discard a card from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: Theoloc crept slowly up the stairs to his master's study, his heart hammering in his chest. If he could only get the book, he could prove his worth. Then Slayer would be forced to give him power beyond dreams...

name: Soul Stealer
text: Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Forge without heat, cut without blade, sing without sound... and then you will have a blade that harvests souls." - Albung, the Maker

name: Spectree
text:
May not be targeted by opposing characters while attached to Irad.
Order: Move forward one rank.
Spend Order: If this character is in the first rank, wound him: Perform a melee strike against each opposing character.

name: Spirit Wing
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand to move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mourn stands as the foremost sin of the world, a foul treachery in the heart of the Shattered Lands." - Yscar the Elder

name: Squire Andreas
text:
If your Warlord is Deverenian, Andreas may enter play in any of your ranks adjacent to a rank in which you have one or more characters.
Until he leaves play, his level equals the rank in which he came into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Find Terak. Find why the Aroch split from the Black Sun." - Blackthorn

name: Squire's Banner
text: React: Once per turn, before target adjacent Warlord suffers wounds, inflict the same number of wounds on this character: Reduce the target's wounds to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: "I can't say that I approve of the design." - Magellan
"Squire Kelanor foolishly carrieth his lord's banner onto the battlefield. His only accomplishment shall be a quick death."

name: Squire's Sash
text: While equipped to a non-Warlord character that shares alignment and a faction with your Warlord, your Warlord gains the ability "React: Before target character kills a character you control with Squire's Sash equipped: Perform a melee strike against the target."

setInfos.flavorText: Kelanor bowed to Gahid. "I will obey."

name: Wyrmling Mail
text:
Order: Twice per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Wyrmling Mail: Until end of turn, after a melee or ranged strike targets this character, the attacking character's controller must discard a card or the strike is a Critical Failure.

name: Srykin
text:
Srykin is both a cleric and a wizard.
Srykin enters play as a level 4 character.
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15, DC 20 for Monsters) or the target suffers a wound and you may remove a wound from an Elf in this rank.

name: St. Leda's Hammer
text:
React: After targeting a melee strike, spend the Hammer: If this cleric is a Gargoyle, the strike inflicts an extra wound if it hits.
React: After targeting a melee strike, spend the Hammer: If the target has the opposite alignment, the strike inflicts an extra wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ever hear of a wizard that wanted to know more than was good for him? The Kabal lands are full of those guys." - Davon Ironthorn

name: Storm Dasher
text:
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, after a Reindeer is targeted with a melee or ranged strike, cancel the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: Tally ho ye demons, Comet and Blade Dancer! Get a move on, foul beasts Blitzer and Storm Dasher!

name: Storm Gem
text:
Storm Gem may not be discarded while Master K'Hallaek is in play.
This character does not need to spend to cast wizard spells.

name: Storm's Judgement
text: Order: Target an opposing character in play. That character must make a Will save (DC 10 + this character's skill) or be removed from play. Additional copies of this character may not be played by your opponent for the remainder of the game.

name: Strike with Impunity
text: React: Before this character performs a melee strike: The strike gains an ATK bonus equal to his AC -10. The next melee or ranged strike targeting this character has a penalty equal to the final ATK of the first strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "So I meet my fate here, in the aftermath of your salvation? So be it!" - Edge

name: Supremus
text:
Supremus' level for entering play is reduced by 1 for each "Wyrm's Egg" attached to your Warlord.
May not equip items.
Supremus' melee and ranged strikes inflicts two additional wounds.
Spend Order: Move forward up to three ranks.
Spend Order: Perform five consecutive +9 ranged strikes.

name: Swamp Gaunt
text: Order: Once per turn, kill a character in this rank to remove a wound from Swamp Gaunt.

setInfos.flavorText: Death does not bring rest... it brings hunger.

name: Symbol of Kerebrus
text: +4 Skill

name: Spell Book
text:
This wizard gains +1 Level for casting spells.
Magic saves from this wizard's spells gain +2 DC.

setInfos.flavorText: The magics utilized by The Chosen cannot be contained easily within tomes, for such power has a will of its own.
"Why must I memorize what I could cast yesterday?" - Kelaris
"Tricks of the trade. Look at it wrong, and it gets angry." - Zartoch
"Devastation is an art." - Slayer the Unkind
"Devastation is an art." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Talespinner
text: Spend Order: Spend an opposing lower-level character within two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Any knife may cut the throat, but it takes talent to wrench out the heart."

name: Taliesin
text:
Begins the game with a Free Kingdoms Warlord in the third rank.
Taliesin may use action cards of any class.
Opposing card effects may not spend, stun, or kill Taliesin or target cards attached to him.
Order: Once per turn: Attach an action card to Taliesin. You may perform an action on the card once per turn.

name: Tempt Hold
text: Spend Order: Once per game, choose one bold trait from this character (other than Warlord) and equip the Tempt Hold to an adjacent character (ignoring requirements): While Tempt Hold is equipped, the target gains that trait.

name: Terror of Ithan Spire
text:
May only equip items with "Eyestalk" in the title, and begins the game with any number of items equipped.
Actions on Terror's items may be used one rank farther than usual.
DCs of Magic Saves from the Terror's actions are increased by 5.
The Terror's items may not be targeted by other characters.
The Terror may not target Kerebrus with actions printed on items.

name: The Assembly
text:
If Masticus is your Warlord: Begin play with an additional character in your first through fourth ranks.
You may play characters with the Warlord trait (who lose that trait in play), and may have characters with the Warlord trait in your deck.
Your other Deverenians gain the text, "Spend React: After this character (or Masticus) is targeted by an action: Cancel the action." This React may not be cancelled or prevented.

name: The Black Knives
text:
May not be discarded while Cear Adinerach is in play.
Characters wounded by an action or melee strike from this character are killed.
During your Draw phase, draw 5 cards instead of drawing until you have 5 cards.
Order: Once per game, you may declare an "Assassin's Strike." During this turn, all of your Rogues' melee strikes inflict an additional wound.

name: The Queen of Syneri
text:
Begins play with Undying Crown and Death's Snare equipped.
React: When an opposing character is killed, retrieve from your deck or discard pile any number of Undead characters with a combined level equal to the killed character's level and put them into your front rank. The characters enter play spent if Atu Amani is the opposing Warlord.

name: Thieves' Fingers
text:
Rogue and wizard only.
Order: Spend Thieves' Fingers to spend an item up to 3 ranks away.

setInfos.flavorText: "The elf's gloves sparkled as she grasped the air, and my blade was wrenched from my hands. I ran, forthwith." - Kelanor

name: Thunic Hydra
text:
May not equip items.
Thunic Hydra has one fewer melee strike (losing its primary ATK first) when it attacks for each wound it has.

setInfos.flavorText: "What do you mean, they grow heads?" - Stanley
"Somehow they look bigger here." - Arve Yscar
"You say you traveled through Thun? I don't believe you. You still have all your limbs attached." - Timmuk

name: Tyrgen the Brave
text: Spend Order: Bow for a +7 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: I ask nothing from my men other than this: beat the unbeatable, kill the unkillable, win the unwinnable.

name: Ring of Vorn
text: Order: Spend Ring of Vorn, target a character in this rank: Move the target forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Vorn was our greatest assassin, utilizing magic to speed his kills." - Amatria Tansiq
"Vorn was our greatest assassin, utilising magic to speed his kills." - Amatria Tansiq
"All that magic in one place, and the Kabal uses it for research. I'll drag their noses from their books." - Syvonne Ashenstorm
"Thank you, Naomi. I shall lead from here." - Faiza Nyota
"You first, wizard." - Hassimal
"You first, wizard." - Hassimal

name: Undying Crown
text:
May not be discarded while The Queen of Syneri is in play.
React: After this character is targeted with an action (not a melee strike), kill a character in this army to cancel the action.
React: After a character performs an action to draw one or more cards, spend one of your Undead characters to cancel the action.

name: Unleash Hell
text: Order: Target an opposing character within one rank, who rolls a die. Make a skill check (DC = target's roll + skill + ATK), adding your ATK to the roll. If successful, stun the target. Otherwise, stun this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, 'tis long past time." - Ghed Mnettaor

name: Unseen Arrow
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Discard Unseen Arrow before this character makes a ranged strike roll to add +3 to the roll. This strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

name: War Journal
text: This character can use the Scribe feat for action cards of any class.

setInfos.flavorText: "Better to learn from others' wisdom than to simply read what others wrote." - The Loremaster

name: War Spikes
text: All numerals on fighter items with the Armor, Shield, Helm, or Weapon trait equipped by this character are increased by one.

name: War Wagon
text:
May not attack, start in play, or attach items.
War Wagon may enter play in any rank greater than its level.
Spend Order: Move the War Wagon and up to 3 other characters in the same rank forward one rank.

name: White Wyrm Helm
text: React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike, spend the Helm: The character performing the strike must make a magic save (DC 16) or become spent. If he is already spent, he is stunned.

name: White Wyrm's Egg
text: React: Spend the Egg before this character performs a melee strike roll. If the strike hits, spend the target of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "White, the color of the polar plains, and snows, and frozen hearts."

name: Withering Souls
text:
Counts as two characters for determining illegal ranks.
React: After Whithering Souls is killed: All characters in the rank of the character who killed it must make a poison save (DC 12) or suffer 1 wound.

name: Winter Armor
text: Spend React: Spend and stun the Winter Armor after an opposing character moves into an adjacent rank to have this character perform an attack without spending, with all strikes targeting the character who just moved into the adjacent rank.

name: Living History
text:
+3 Skill
React: Before fixing an illegal rank: Put Living History into play in the rank in front of the illegal rank as a Level 1 classless Monster with +1 ATK, 10 AC, +0 Skill and 1 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: A terrible sentience, with its personality dictated by its text.
"Never forget the past. Sometimes it comes back to remind you why it's important." - The Loremaster
"Nothing ever ends." - The Loremaster

name: Winter Warfare
text:
Warlord only.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, characters may only move unless Maneuvering or falling to correct illegal ranks. Readied characters falling forward become stunned (if not already stunned) and suffer 1 wound.

name: Winter's Ring
text: Order: Spend Winter's Ring to give this character the Ethereal trait (odd strikes miss) until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Lord Winter is the reason the Archmage never returned. Some say Winter is his son. Others say Winter holds Syneri's soul in a box. But the real truth is that Winter knows the secret to the perfect blade..." - Valanthe

name: With My Last Breath
text: React: Play after this character suffers one or more wounds. The character gains +2 hit points until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: I have seen determined paladins take more damage than any other man, and fight until the fight is done, only then to fall to their knees and an endless rest.

name: Wretched Servant
text:
While one or more Wretched Servants are in play, your hand size is increased by 1 card.
If Majeral is your Warlord, your hand size is increased by an additional 2 cards.

name: Wyvern
text:
Wyvern inflicts two additional wounds when he hits with a melee strike.
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on Wyvern: Ready Wyvern.

setInfos.flavorText: "I know what you did, Krun. And vengeance will be mine." - Padrig

name: Xaxxon
text:
May not equip Steeds.
Inflicts an additional wound when he hits a spent character with a melee strike or ranged strike.
Order: Twice per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: After killing a spent character, discard a card: Perform a melee strike.

name: Xaxxon's Fire
text: Order: Spend Xaxxon's Fire: Perform a +5 ranged strike targeting a spent character from one to four ranks away. If the ranged strike hits, inflict an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Loremaster taught me much, and I can share..."

name: Yeti
text:
Yeti inflicts an additional wound whenever it hits with a melee strike.
React: After Yeti inflicts a wound with a melee strike, the target must succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 13) or be stunned.

name: Zaina's Band
text:
This character may not be killed or moved by opposing card effects.
When Lady al-Semmeya dies, her army remains in play but cannot perform actions until the end of turn. At end of turn if Lady al-Semmeya is not in play, she returns to play in the first rank of her army with Diadem of Insight and Baruuk's Band equipped.

name: Hammer of Stone
text: Order: Spend Hammer of Stone, and if this cleric isn't a Seer discard Hammer of Stone: Reveal the top cards of each players' deck. You may choose to discard those cards.

setInfos.flavorText: Abyssals screeched with fear, trapped, dead and dying; immortal no more. The end neared. Rubble flooded the room. The King and the Lord fought as the cavern tumbled down.

name: Spell Components
text: React: Before a character rolls a Magic save from an action performed by this character, remove any number of Charges: Increase the DC of the save by twice the number of Charges removed.

name: Invader's Banner
text:
Warlord only.
This character may remain spent.
You must spend to equip Invader's Banner.
If this character's orientation changes, discard Invader's Banner.
At the end of each turn, move any number of characters in your army forward one rank.

name: Epic Mantle
text:
This character has +1 ATK, AC, and Skill for each level he has greater than his printed level.
This character has +1 Hit Point for each 3 levels he has greater than his printed level (rounded down).

setInfos.flavorText: Everybody starts somewhere.

name: Dragon's Breath
text:
Dragon only.
This is a spell.
Spend Order: Target a number of characters within two ranks up to this Dragon's level. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 7 + caster's Skill) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let them feast on fire." - Sethusk
"Well, at least things can't get any worse." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Bleeding Eye Cohort
text:
React: Once per turn, after a melee strike or action targets Bleeding Eye Cohort: If Argus Gawk is your Warlord, cancel the strike or action and ready Bleeding Eye Cohort.
Spend React: After you perform an Order, perform an additional Order after this one.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Destiny of the Bleeding Eye
text:
Destiny of Argus Gawk.
You may have up to 7 Cohorts in your deck.
Order: Choose an opposing player who must reveal their hand. Choose a card and discard it. Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the discarded card's level.
Order: Once per turn, look at the top five cards in a deck and discard one. Your characters have a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the discarded card's level.

name: Calif's Heir Cohort
text:
If Corten Lye is your Warlord, Calif's Heir Cohort and adjacent characters have a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the number of characters in your discard pile.
Calif's Heir Cohort has -2 Levels while in a discard pile.
React: After Calif's Heir Cohort enters play: Search your deck for three characters and put them into your discard pile.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Destiny of the Calif's Heir
text:
Destiny of Corten Lye.
You may have up to 7 Cohorts in your deck.
Opponents may not remove cards from your discard pile.
You start with three characters in your discard pile and may have more than 50% characters in your deck.
React: After one of your Free Kingdoms dies: Put a character into play in rank one from your discard pile with Level lower than the killed character.

name: Noble Blood Cohort
text:
Noble Blood Cohort has a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to his HP.
React: After Noble Blood Cohort enters play: If Bis is your Warlord, Noble Blood Cohort's HP are set to the number of cards in the opponent's hand.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Nehil
text:
+2 Skill
React: After this wizard spends to cast a Level 1 or 2 spell, spend Nehil: Ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Was it worth it?" She asked, but the owl only blinked back at her. "I guess I'll have to make sure it will be."
"The owl is still here, but Sali is gone..." - Keziah
"Two Deverenians approached on a moonless night-but Sali had already seen them, and was far, far away." - Timothy Windson
"Two Deverenians approached on a moonless night-but Sali had already seen them, and was far, far away." - Timothy Windson

name: Destiny of Noble Blood
text:
Destiny of Bis.
You may have up to 7 Cohorts in your deck.
Opposing characters may not perform actions if their Level is less than the number of cards in their owner's hand.
After an opposing player passes, they must discard a card.
React: After you put a character or item into play: Return an opposing non-Warlord character or item to its owner's hand.

name: Silvered Fount Cohort
text:
Order: Once per turn: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 15) to force an opponent to inflict a wound on one of their characters.
React: Before Silvered Font Cohort dies: If Crimson Rigel is your Warlord, your next die roll this turn is a Critical Success.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Destiny of the Silvered Fount
text:
Destiny of Crimson Rigel.
You may have up to 7 Cohorts in your deck and start with one in play in rank 3.
Crimson Rigel has two additional strikes (Base +0) when he attacks.
Order: Kill one of your Cohorts: Each opponent must choose and kill one of their characters.
React: After any player rolls a Critical Success or Failure: Choose an opponent who must inflict a wound on one of their characters.

name: Etal Freste
text: Order: Once per game: Target an opposing non-Warlord character. Etal Freste gains the target's classes permanently. The target permanently becomes classless.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have learned of many things, of Dallen's 'Luck' and Malrog's return."

name: Destiny of the Raging Mind
text:
Destiny of SanUris.
You may have up to 7 Cohorts in your deck.
Your characters have +1 HP, +1 Level, and +3 ATK for each Charge on them.
Your characters have the abilities "Spend Order: Perform a number of melee strikes equal to this character's Level" and "React: Once per turn, after killing an opposing character: Put 2 charges on this character."

name: Edric D'Ilchant
text:
Edric D'Ilchant has +1 Level for equipping Steeds and may not receive penalties or bonuses to his stats from action cards.
React: Once per turn, after Edric performs a melee strike that killed the target: Draw a card, or shuffle two cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Embersmane
text:
Paladins have +1 Level for equipping Embersmane.
Order: Spend Embersmane: Move forward or backward one rank.
If no dungeons are in play, this card gives no ATK or AC bonus.

name: Castle Lorath
text:
You must spend 12 Levels of Paladins to put Castle Loranth into play.
Castle Loranth has +1 Challenge Rating for each Paladin in play.
Your Paladins have a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to their Level.

name: Devastating Charge
text: React: After this character performs a melee strike that killed the target: If this character has a Steed equipped, perform a melee strike targeting a character two ranks away.

setInfos.flavorText: "Death rides upon swift wings." - Edric D'Ilchant

name: Returned Cohort
text:
React: After Returned Cohort enters play: If Lilah is your Warlord, search your deck for a spell and add it to your hand.
React: After a character casts a spell: Returned Cohort has +2 ATK and HP until end of turn.
React: After a non-Cohort enters play: Return Returned Cohort to your hand.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Takson the Intricate
text: React: Once per turn, before initiative is rolled: If you control more Levels of characters in play than any opponent, your initiative roll is a Critical Success and Takson may kill target opposing non-Warlord Level 1 character.

name: Faluha
text:
+4 Skill
Order: Spend Faluha: Look at the top card of your deck. Put it on the top or bottom of your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "If the Eternal Emperor has a weakness, he keeps it secret... hmm. I have an idea." - Temb'w'bam
"The Deverenian falcons are loyal, but a little persuasion always works." - Dakat
"Take wing, my friend, and lead us to Sav'rukk." - Dakat

name: Destiny of the Returned
text:
Destiny of Lilah.
You may have up to 7 Cohorts in your deck and may start with one in play in rank 3.
Lilah adds +7 to her ranged strike rolls, and her actions and ranged strikes may not be redirected or cancelled.
Spend Order: Return any number of Cohorts in play to their owner's hand: Perform a +5 ranged strike for each card in your hand.

name: Final Purge Cohort
text:
Final Purge Cohort has +1 HP for each class your Warlord has.
React: After Final Purge Cohort enters play, name a card: If Fel Rowan is your Warlord, search each opponent's deck, discard pile, and hand for copies of the named card, and remove them from the game.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Destiny of the Final Purge
text:
Destiny of Fel Rowan.
You may have up to 7 Cohorts in your deck.
Fel Rowan has all classes and subclasses.
Order: Once per turn: Remove target non-Warlord character from the game. Until end of turn, each non-Warlord character in play is a copy of the removed character.
Order: Once per turn: Put a character from your hand into play in rank 1.

name: Scarlet Rose Cohort
text:
Scarlet Rose Cohort has +1 HP and Charisma +10 if Bascia Tremayne is your Warlord.
React: Once per game, after a die is re-rolled: Scarlet Rose Cohort gains an additional strike (Base +0) whenever he attacks and +1 HP permanently, and may move forward one rank.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Destiny of the Scarlet Rose
text:
Destiny of Bascia Tremayne.
You may have up to 7 Cohorts in your deck.
Bascia has two additional strikes (Base +0) when she attacks.
Your characters may use once per game abilities once per turn.
React: After a die is re-rolled: Opposing characters have -2 ATK and AC until end of turn.
Order: Spend two characters in your army that don't share a class: Search your deck for a character and put it into play.

name: Worldfall's Ally Cohort
text:
React: After Worldfall's Ally Cohort enters play: If Peyton Latham is your Warlord, perform three +0 ranged strikes.
Spend Order: Perform two +5 ranged strikes. If either strike hit, Worldfall's Ally Cohort gains +1 HP permanently.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Destiny of Worldfall's Ally
text:
Destiny of Peyton Latham.
You may have up to 7 Cohorts in your deck.
Your characters' ranged strikes inflict an additional wound, have +5 to the strike roll, and may target an additional rank away.
Your characters' melee strikes inflict an additional wound.

name: Robert's Savior Cohort
text:
React: After Robert's Savior Cohort enters play: If Jiyacin Fret is your Warlord, remove any non-Warlord character from the game. Robert's Savior Cohort permanently gains a bonus to HP and Level equal to the removed character's HP.
Order: Remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Move forward or backward one rank.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Destiny of Robert's Savior
text:
Destiny of Jiyacin Fret.
You may have up to 7 Cohorts in your deck.
Jiyacin Fret has two additional strikes (Base +1) when she attacks.
Order: Once per turn: Put all of your cards removed from the game in your hand.
Order: Once per turn: Remove the top 3 cards of each player's deck from the game.

name: Black Banner Cohort
text:
Whenever Black Banner Cohort would be killed by a card effect, he is wounded instead.
React: After Black Banner Cohort performs a melee strike that killed the target: If Kovit Treeraiser is your Warlord, Black Banner Cohort gains +2 HP and +5 ATK permanently.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Mourn Pattern
text: React: After casting a spell which put a character into play, destroy Mourn Pattern: Ready this wizard. Summoners may perform this action once per turn without destroying Mourn Pattern.

setInfos.flavorText: "Such sights to show you."

name: Destiny of the Black Banner
text:
Destiny of Kovit Treeraiser.
You may have up to 7 Cohorts in your deck.
Kovit has three additional strikes (Base +9) when he attacks and +3 hand size.
Order: Once per target per turn: Move one of your characters to rank one. That character performs an attack without spending. Kill the character at the end of turn if possible.

name: Off the Beaten Path
text: Spend Order: If there is exactly one dungeon in play, search your deck for a dungeon with a lower Challenge Rating and put it into play. The original dungeon is considered blank while the new dungeon is in play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Well, if it's on our route anyway..." - Farrel Wadreth

name: Devious Illusions
text:
Rogue or wizard only.
React: After this character is targeted by a melee strike, succeed with a dexterity check (DC 16): If successful and this character is a rogue, the strike is a Critical Failure. If successful and this character is a wizard, inflict a wound on the attacker.
errata: This is a spell.

name: Subdue
text:
Rogue or cleric only.
Order: Target a stunned character within one rank: If this character is a rogue, the target suffers a wound. If this character is a cleric, the target doesn't unstun during the next ready phase.
errata: This is a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "A truce, when you are beaten. Cowards." - Fernon Wynard

name: Torment
text:
Fighter or cleric only.
React: After this character targets a melee strike: If this character is a fighter, he has +5 ATK for the strike. If this character is a cleric, the strike inflicts an additional wound.
errata: This is a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "There is wisdom in the King's alliance, just few can see it." - Dawes

name: Rush to Battle
text:
Fighter or wizard only.
Order: Target one of your characters: If this character is a fighter, the target has Powerattack +10 until end of turn. If this character is a wizard, move the target forward one rank.
errata: This is a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hold still human! I'll free you!" - Rockhome

name: Grasp of Vengeance
text:
Druids have +1 Level for performing this action.
Spend Order: Target a number of characters within one rank up to this cleric's Level: Each must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or move backward one rank. If they fail by 10 or more, or have a Critical Failure, they move backward two ranks instead.
errata: Move the characters that fail the save as each one does.

name: Power of the Ancients
text: React: After this character performs an action that readied a character: That character may perform an additional Order after the current one.

setInfos.flavorText: "My foes have a foothold here. I need one too, Abraxas." - Ter-Soth

name: Final Blessing
text:
React: After target character pays the costs of an action to retrieve cards from a discard pile: Cancel the action. The target suffers a wound.
React: Before target character suffers wounds: The target gains +1 HP until end of turn.
errata: Static effects like Fevered Shade are not actions and will not trigger Final Blessing.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not Yet." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Revitalize
text: Order: Spend any number of clerics in your army: Put a character from your discard pile on top of your deck for each cleric spent.
errata: You must spend at least one cleric.

setInfos.flavorText: "These are not the Nothrog you used to know, Deverenian." - Natalja Wynard

name: Necklace of Fireballs
text: Order: Remove a Charge, spend this character or remove another Charge: Perform a +4 ranged strike. After the strike, any characters that were adjacent to the original target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 9) or suffer one wound.

name: Nature's Corrosion
text:
Druids have +3 Levels for performing this action.
Order: Target a lower Level character within three ranks. On your next Order, skip that Order and destroy an item equipped to the target.
errata: You may target a character without an item equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even the plants here have their secrets." - Eleora

name: Anointed by the Storm
text: Order: Target character has +1 HP until end of turn. On your next Order, skip that Order and give the target a bnous to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to this cleric's Level until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Humility comes not before honor. They are one and the same." - Brother Vallerand

name: Deceitful Aid
text: Spend Order: Target a character. On your next Order, skip that Order and ready the target.
errata: You may target a ready character (or a character that cannot ready), since the action will have an effect even if they do not ready (the skipped order).

setInfos.flavorText: "Here any ally can seem an enemy. Which are you, truely?" - Samuel

name: Soothing Aura
text: Spend Order: Spend X clerics in your army: Reduce to zero the next wound done to a character in your army this turn, and reduce to zero the next X wounds done to characters in your army this turn after the first.
errata:
Erratum 2007/10/08: The Spend Order should read "Spend Order: Spend X clerics in your army: The next X + 1 times any character in play would suffer wounds this turn, reduce the wounds suffered by one."
Erratum 2007/08/16: The Spend Order should read "Spend Order: Spend X clerics in your army: Reduce to zero the next wound done to a character in play this turn, and reduce to zero the next X wounds done to characters in play this turn after the first."
Can reduce the wounds from Medusan Lord's Gambit, since it is an ongoing effect not a react.
A character only 'suffers wounds' once per wounding, even if multiple wounds are being inflicted. Thus, Soothing Aura will reduce the number inflicted by one, but will no longer negate all the wounds.

name: Secrets of the Storm
text:
Before you pay the costs for this card, spend X clerics in your army. This character has +X Levels for performing this action.
Order: Until end of turn, characters may not perform melee or ranged strikes.
errata:
Erratum 2007/08/16: The Order should read "Order: Until end of turn, characters may not target characters of higher Level with melee or ranged strikes."
The character is only Level 9 for the effect of this action. Reacts and static effects on other cards (including the performing character and his items) will use the character's actual Level.

setInfos.flavorText: The heart of Signon's plan.

name: Inspiring Strike
text:
Paladins have +1 Level for performing this action.
React: After this character performs a melee strike that hit by 10 or more or was a Critical Success: Until end of turn, your characters in your first rank have a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to this character's Level.
errata: Even a Critical Success that missed an Astral character will trigger Inspiring Strike.

name: Overwhelm
text: Order: Spend any number of fighters in your army: Perform an Order for each fighter spent, and then an Order for each Ranger spent.
errata:
Erratum 2007/08/28: The Order should read "Order: Spend any number of fighters in your army: After this order, perform an Order for each fighter spent, and then an Order for each Ranger spent."
You must spend at least one fighter.

setInfos.flavorText: "Deverenia is threat enough that you make peace with the elves. You must accept the Children of Yscar also, Dukat." - Jin Valford

name: Backswing
text: React: After this character performs a melee strike: This character has -3 ATK until end of turn. Perform a melee strike.
errata:
The strike generated by Backswing comes after the -3 ATK penalty is in effect.
It is therefore modified the same as all other strikes for the rest of the turn will be.

setInfos.flavorText: "You want to die faster puny elf? We'll go faster." - Brikta

name: Powerful Swing
text: Order: On your next Order, skip that Order and perform a melee strike. After that strike, if the strike hit and this character is a Barbarian, destroy an item equipped to the target of the strike.
errata: This melee strike uses the character's first strike as a base and is modified by items and/or any modifiers from other card effects.

setInfos.flavorText: "Leave some alive. They must tell the tale." - Rathra Dak

name: Defy the Chains
text:
Fighters may perform this action while stunned.
React: After an opposing character performs an action that spent, stunned, or moved this fighter, suffer one wound: Ready this fighter. If this fighter is a Barbarian, he gains +3 ATK until end of turn.
errata:
The React is played after the action that stunned, spent, or moved the fighter is completed. Any illegal ranks created by the movement are corrected before Defy the Chains is played.
If the wound is reduced or negated then this action is canceled.

name: Wand of Negation
text: Order: Spend the wand and target an item in an opposing army: Until end of turn, the item grants no bonus to ATK or AC and its text box is blank except for bold traits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Academically speaking, Syvonne, skill beats might." - Corsis

name: Slow March
text: Order: On each of your Orders this turn, if this character is not in the front rank, skip that Order and move this character forward one rank.
errata:
Erratum 2007/08/28: The Spend Order should read "Order: On each of your Orders this turn, if this character is not in the front rank and can move forward, skip that Order and move this character forward one rank."
If the character is unable to move forward, the Order is not skipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fools, canst thou not spy the Nothrog design? Smart, Krun... But we are smarter." - The Eternal Emperor

name: Reckless Abandon
text: Spend Order: Spend X fighters in your army: Until end of turn, this fighter gains +X HP and the ability "Order: Suffer a wound: Perform a melee strike." Until end of turn, this character's wounds may not be removed or reduced by action cards.
errata:
Items and character effects can reduce and remove the wounds. It only excludes the use of action cards.
For example, the react granted by The Broken Earth will remove his wounds, and he will retain the Reckless Abandon effects until the end of turn (no matter how many times his react is used).

name: Secrets of the Suns
text:
Before you pay the costs for this card, send X fighters in your army. This character has +X Levels for performing this action.
Order: Perform a +6 melee strike targeting each opposing character within two ranks.
errata:
The character is only Level 9 for the effect of this Action. Reacts and static effects on other cards (including the performing character and his items) will use the character's actual Level.
These melee strikes are modified by items and/or any modifiers from other card effects. The only thing that doesn't modify it is the character's own ATK bonus, as this is replaced by the ATK bonus on the card.

setInfos.flavorText: Aroch, former brethren.

name: Vengeful Strike
text:
Assassins have +1 Level for performing this action.
React: After a melee strike targeting this rogue misses by 10 or more or is a Critical Failure: Perform a number of melee strikes targeting the attacker equal to this rogue's Level.
errata: These strikes cannot be redirected, since the action states that they all target the original attacker.

name: Persecute
text: React: After this character is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, spend any number of rogues in your army: This character has +2 AC until end of turn for each rogue spent. The attacking character has -2 AC until end of turn for each rogue spent.
errata: You must spend at least one rogue.

name: Facing the Demons
text: Order: Perform a +0 melee strike. On your next Order, skip that Order and instead this character performs a +0 melee strike.
errata: These melee strikes are modified by items and/or any modifiers from other card effects. The only thing that doesn't modify it is the character's own ATK bonus, as this is replaced by the ATK bonus on the card.

setInfos.flavorText: "We achieved what the ancients could not when we sealed the Abyss. What could they possibly have to offer us?" - Vex Dutan

name: Undermine
text: React: After a character pays the costs of an action: Target character has -3 ATK, AC, and Skill for the duration of the action. If this character is a Bard, instead all opposing characters have -3 ATK, AC, and Skill for the duration of the action.
errata: The duration of all actions is the time is takes to perform them. In the case of generating an ongoing effect (such as Lift Up Your Voices or Raze), the action ends once the effect is in place - they do not have the same duration.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now you tell me a tale. I'm always interested in new ones." - Ferris Bachman

name: Clearing the Mark
text: Spend Order: Target an item in play up to twice this rogue's Level. On your next Order, skip that Order and instead remove that item from the game.
errata: Removes the card from the game as long as the card has not left play (which would end all effects on it, per usual).

setInfos.flavorText: "I see you have drunk quite well. Let me get the 'tab' for you."

name: Focused Shot
text: Order: Target a character two ranks away (Two or three ranks away, if this character is a Scout): On your next Order, skip that Order and instead perform a +5 ranged strike against the target.
errata:
The ranged strike will still be performed against the target no matter where he moves, since he has already been declared the target.
The original targeting of the action can be redirected, but the ranged strike itself cannot (since the target has already been set).
Marksmanship can be used at the time of the skipped order, but only to gain a +5 bonus to the roll or an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "I don't know about you, but where I come from, we wait until our men are out of the firing line before we shoot." - Trevor Magson

name: Will to Survive
text: React: Before this character suffers wounds: Discard any cards in your hand and reduce the number of wounds being suffered by one.
errata: In the event you are unable to discard cards from your hand (due to a card effect or having zero cards in hand), the action is still legal because discarding the cards is not a cost.

setInfos.flavorText: "You're just not fast enough." - Selye

name: Serpent's Tooth
text: Spend Order: Remove X Charges: Target a character X ranks away who must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + this character's Skill) or suffer one wound and fall forward one rank.

name: Hunting for Sport
text: Order: Target a spent character within one rank: For each of your next three Orders, skip that Order and perform a melee strike against the target.
errata:
The melee strike will still be perfomed against the target no matter where he moves, since he has already been declared the target.
The original targeting of the action can be redirected, but the melee strike itself cannot (since the target has already been set).

setInfos.flavorText: "Elf may not kill Elf, but those at the meetings do worse, bickering while our enemies gather. Damn that council." - Cairbre Netheryn

name: Passing the Knives
text: Spend Order: If this character is in your first rank, spend X rogues in your army: Target a character in play, up to X ranks away. Perform a melee strike against the target, then perform X +0 melee strikes against the target. These strikes may not receive any bonuses to ATK, and ignore all bonuses to the target's AC.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: The last sentence should read "These strikes may not receive any bonus to ATK, and ignore all bonuses and penalties to the target's AC."

name: Secrets of the Guild
text:
Before you pay the costs for this card, spend X rogues in your army. This character has +X Levels for performing this action.
Order: Remove Secrets of the Guild from the game: This rogue permanently gains the ability "React: Once per game, after this character performs a melee strike that wounded the target: Kill the target."
errata:
Erratum 2007/10/08: The granted ability should read "React: Once per game, after this character performs a melee strike that wounded target lower Level character: Kill the target."
The character is only Level 9 for the effect of this Action. Reacts and static effects on other cards (including the performing character and his items) will use the character's actual Level.
Whether the target is lower Level is based on the rogue's current Level, not the Level they were when they performed the Order.

setInfos.flavorText: "Logan, remove your mask." - Krun

name: Astral Blast
text:
Illusionists have +1 Level for performing this action.
React: After an opposing character rolls a save or check that failed by 10 or more or was a Critical Failure, target a number of characters in your army up to the caster's Level: Each target gains the Astral trait and Defend +10 until end of next turn.
errata: Can be triggered by any save or check, not just ones generated by the caster.

name: Combat Casting
text: React: After this character casts a spell that inflicted a wound on an opposing character: Return a Level 3 or lower spell from your discard pile to your hand.
errata: If you return another copy of Combat Casting to your hand, you may cast it when the game returns to the original trigger (the resolution of your spell). You may not stall the game by cycling two copies of Combat Casting this way, unless there are other reacts or effects being triggered.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've had long to prepare what I'm going to do to you 'Master' K'Hallaek," mused Arden Tide.

name: Chaotic Flames
text: Order: Spend any number of wizards in your army: Opposing characters have -2 Skill until end of turn for each wizard spent.
errata:
You must spend at least one wizard.
Counts the number of wizards actually spent. If a wizard is not spent (does not need to spend for cost of an action) then it will not add to the number of wizards spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's amazing what you can learn to do in just a few centuries." - Rockhome

name: Summon Planar
text: Spend Order: Put this card into play in your first rank as a Level 1 Monster fighter with +3 ATK, 10 AC, +0 Skill, and 1 HP (and Stealth +10 if the caster is a Summoner). On your next Order, skip that Order and instead the Monster gains +6 AC and +1 HP.

name: Grave Robbing
text: Spend Order: Target a lower Level character in your discard pile: On your next Order, skip that Order and instead put the target into play in your front rank with 1 HP and the Undead trait. If this character is not a Necromancer, kill the target at end of turn.
errata: If the character to be returned to play is removed from the game (e.g., Dev'irga, Ashling), then your turn is skipped and the targeted character is not retrieved.

setInfos.flavorText: "My voice... my power has been restored to me."

name: Disintegrate
text: Order: Target an unwounded character within 2 ranks: Succeed with a Skill check (DC = target's AC) to inflict a wound on the target or destroy an item equipped to the target.
errata: An 'unwounded' character is one without any wounds currently on them.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let the Elements eat others and you shall be spared. It is a simple creed that I live by." - Austerion
"A bad spell. It leaves nothing to raise." - Jevae
"A bad spell. It leaves nothing to raise." - Jevae
"All things turn to dust." - Keira Syneri

name: Raze
text: Spend Order: For each of your next three Orders, skip that Order and instead perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this wizard's Skill. These strikes may target an additional rank away if you have more cards in your hand than each opponent.
errata:
Number of cards in hand are checked when each strike is performed.
The ranged strikes are considered 'from a spell' (or spell-generated) - they ignore Astral and Ethereal, gain bonuses or additional wounds from effects like Ring of Blasting or Allestair the Attentive, and cannot have Marksmanship applied.
Magic Resistance cannot be used when targeted by the ranged strikes, since MR is a react to an Action targeting the character.

name: Wyvernskin Robe
text: Other wizards you control gain +1 Level for casting spells.

setInfos.flavorText: Dragons don't appreciate the fashion statement.
"The Deverenians aren't the only ones with such power." - Taoth
"We all must make our sacrifices..." - Lord Kestrel
Be cautious when dealing with powers tou do not understand.
Be cautious when dealing with powers tou do not understand.

name: Kaballite Defiance
text: Spend Order: Spend any number of wizards in your army: Perform a +8 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound, and then perform a +3 ranged strike for each other wizard spent.
errata: You can perform this action without spending any additional wizards.

setInfos.flavorText: "Krun, we cannot stop the inevitable. The plane will open." - Talyn

name: Secrets of the Trials
text:
Before you pay the costs for this card, spend X wizards in your army. This character has +X Levels for performing this action.
Order: Opposing characters within four ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 19) or fall forward one rank.
errata:
Even characters in the front rank must save. They do not spend, stun, wound or move if they fail, but they still must roll.
The character is only Level 9 for the effect of this action. Reacts and static effects on other cards (including the performing character and his items) will use the character's actual Level.

setInfos.flavorText: Die before failing.

name: Ghed Brehm
text: Order: Once per turn: Target character within one rank must succeed with a fear save (DC 9) or become spent. Spent characters instead become stunned.
errata: May not target a stunned character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Learn by the examples of thy betters."

name: Sister Megaria
text: Spend Order: Target a higher Level Deverenian you control: The target gains +2 ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Storm's followers are a testament to Its power. Faith born of fear is still faith."
"I do not release you to death. Thou yet owest service to thy Emperor."

name: Brother Vallerand
text: React: Once per turn, after Brother Vallerand performs an action that gave a Deverenian a bonus to ATK, AC, Skill, or HP: Give the same bonuses to another Deverenian of equal or higher Level than the first, with the same duration.
errata: When he reacts to copy Anointed by the Storm, he only copies the bonus HP. He is reacting after playing the action, and the action has only given out that bonus at that point.

name: Roman Aedroud
text: Adjacent higher Level Deverenians have +2 ATK and +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Storm doth not kill me, Novice. Indeed it makes me stronger, to fight for thy Empire."

name: Ghed Bodmin
text: While Ghed Bodmin is in your hand, your Deverenian Illusionists have the ability "Spend React: After a Deverenian in your army is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, reveal Ghed Bodmin from your hand and discard a card: Redirect the strike to a different character in the same rank."
errata:
You may discard Ghed Bodmin to the action he grants.
All redirection must be to a legal target.

name: Ghed Trussen
text: React: After an opposing character targets Ghed Trussen with a melee strike: The opposing character must succeed with a fear save (DC 12) or the strike is a Critical Failure and Ghed Trussen gains +4 ATK until end of turn.

name: Ghed Vengir
text:
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character kills another Deverenian in this rank: All opposing ready characters must succeed with a fear save (DC 15) or become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Open the temple, breach the Plane."

name: Laela
text: React: Once per turn, after a melee strike targets one of your Deverenians: The ATK for the strike is changed to +0.
errata:
She changes the strike's ATK to 0, not just it's base. Items, ongoing effects, etc are all 'wiped out'.
Only bonuses generated after her React will add to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Talib searches for answers even the saladins dare not seek."

name: Kavara's Glare
text: Spend Order: Destroy Kavara's Glare: Choose a rank within two ranks. Each character in that rank and any adjacent ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or suffer two wounds.

name: Talib al-Sirr
text:
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character targets one of your Deverenians with a melee strike or action: Redirect the strike or action to another legal target.
React: After one of your Deverenians performs an action that redirected a melee strike or action, kill one of your Deverenians: Draw a card.
errata:
Erratum 2007/10/08: The React should read "React: Once per turn, after one of your Deverenians performs an action that redirected a melee strike or action, kill one of your Deverenians: Draw a card."
Can redirect actions and non-attack melee strikes back onto the performing character if they are a legal target.
He reacts to kill a Deverenian and draw a card after the redirecting action is complete. If he kills the new target, the strike or action will likely fizzle.

name: Mozbach the Devious
text: Order: Once per turn: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 7 + Mozbach's Skill) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "My lord Dallen, I am loyal to you alone."

name: Mina the Disturbing
text: React: Once per turn, after Mina casts a spell: Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a spell, put that card in your hand and you may perform another Order after the current one.
errata: If the revealed card is not a spell, it is put back on the deck and the deck shuffled.

setInfos.flavorText: "Away fear. Away pain. Away all."

name: Grigori the Spineless
text:
Grigori the Spineless may Scribe any number of times per turn.
React: Once per turn, after one of your Deverenians is targeted by an action that doesn't produce melee strikes, remove a spell scribed to Grigori from the game: Cancel the action.

name: Grace Hearthpride
text:
Grace Hearthpride is a cleric and a rogue.
Your Dwarf clerics have the ability "Spend React: Before a Dwarf suffers wounds, discard a cleric or rogue action card from your hand: Reduce the wounds by one, or unstun a Dwarf."
errata:
For the purposes of the discarded card, remember that actions that say 'Rogue only' or 'Cleric only' are rogue or cleric actions, respectively.
The Dwarf that is unstunned does not have to be the Dwarf that was wounded.

name: Battle
text: Spend Order: Discard a Dwarf character from your hand: Remove a wound from target Dwarf.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't worry about the others. You'll be fine, and that's all that matters."

name: Nilrem
text: Your other Gargoyles have +2 ATK, +2 AC, and +2 Skill.
errata: The bonuses from multiple copies of Nilrem stack.

setInfos.flavorText: "Once more, gargoyles and dwarves stand together. But this time, we shall follow your lead." - Sigrida Valora

name: Justice
text: React: Once per target per turn, after target opposing character kills one of your characters: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or stun.

setInfos.flavorText: "This will not be another Ironhall." - The Broken Earth

name: Endure
text: React: Once per turn, after an action which readied an adjacent Dwarf: Ready Endure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Etor, call a truce now, before we are overwhelmed. We cannot win, but there are alternatives to fighting."

name: Rancor
text: React: Before Rancor dies: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "A name that spreads true fear amongst all of our enemies." - Balance

name: Staff of Calix
text: Order: Remove a Charge: Attach a Level 1 wizard spell from your hand to the Staff. Characters with Staff of Calix equipped may cast this spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand.

name: Brass Gargoyle
text:
After Brass Gargoyle enters play: Inflict a wound on it.
Order: Once per turn, spend one of your clerics: Remove a wound from Brass Gargoyle.

setInfos.flavorText: "You didn't have any iron?" - Focus

name: Grit
text: Order: Once per turn: Ready Grit.

setInfos.flavorText: "Groundswell's a'right, I suppose. High walls, no enemies, and the bare sky above your head. It's just... not home."

name: Eamon Geist
text: While Eamon is in your hand, your Dwarves have the ability "Spend React: After this character pays the costs of an action, reveal Eamon from your hand and discard a card: Whenever that action would unstun or remove a wound from a Dwarf, instead ready that Dwarf."
errata:
You may discard Eamon Geist to the action he grants.
The action that Eamon's granted React modifies must be a legal action before his React is used. That is, there must be a wounded or stunned Dwarf that is targeted by it.

name: Traveler
text:
Traveler has +3 ATK and +1 HP while there is a dungeon in play.
Traveler has +1 Level for each Charge on him.
React: Once per turn, after you defeat a dungeon: Put a Charge on Traveler.

setInfos.flavorText: "I need a helper for my journey."

name: Preen
text: React: Once per turn, after a melee strike that targeted a Dwarf: The attacking character must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dwarven women? All bearded ain't they?" - Josef Krieg

name: Militia
text:
Militia may equip fighter items.
Order: Once per turn: Put a Charge on target character.
Order: Once per turn: Unstun target character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Forever shall the Order guard Groundswell."

name: Rockhome
text:
Order: Spend an equipped item: Put a Charge on Rockhome.
Order: Remove 4 Charges: The next spell Rockhome casts this turn does not require spending as a cost.
errata:
His Order allows him to cast Spend Order and React spells while spent.
He may still spend to be counted for spells like Chaotic Flames, if he wants.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hember's Rune makes no mention of a 'brother'." - Chant

name: Fevered Shade
text: After Fevered Shade is put into the discard pile from anywhere: You may remove a card in your discard pile from the game. If you do, target character has -2 AC and -2 Skill until end of turn.
errata:
The effect is not an action, so any React that triggers off "after targeted by an action" will not be triggered by his text.
Fevered Shade may remove himself to obtain the effects of his own static text.

name: Skeletal Archer
text:
While there is a dungeon in play, Skeletal Archer has Marksmanship +8.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fiore fears nothing so much as becoming like these creatures. Her curse would be tragic, if it wasn't so fortunate for us." - Averisk Glyn

name: Averisk Glyn
text:
Averisk Glyn is a rogue and wizard.
React: After Averisk Glyn performs a scribed action: Perform a +4 ranged strike against a target of that action.
Averisk's ranged strikes may target characters in an adjacent rank.
errata: Any of his ranged strikes can target characters in an adjacent rank, not just the one from his React.

name: Cloak of Faces
text:
May not gain Charges.
Opposing characters have -2 Skill.
React: After this character is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, remove a Charge: The strike is a Critical Failure.

name: Selye
text: Spend Order: Shuffle an Undead Elf from your discard pile into your deck. If there is a dungeon in play, you may put that Elf on top of your deck instead.
errata: The Order is retrieval from the discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "This place plays tricks on you. Ophinuchus is dead, along with the other Elven gods. You must have seen someone else."

name: Tenanye
text: Order: Once per turn, remove two cards in your discard pile from the game: Search your deck for a character and put it into your discard pile.
errata: The Order is retrieval from the deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hope falters, like a dying candle. The curtain rushes to end this sad, little tragedy." - Ophinuchus

name: Vanden
text: React: After Vanden performs a scribed action: Look at the top 5 cards of any deck. Return those cards to the top or bottom of that deck in any order.
errata:
All five cards are placed back together - it is your choice in which order and whether top or bottom, but the cards 'stay together'.
If used on your own deck, the react is retrieval from the deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "That reminds me of another excruciatingly long story..."

name: Fiore
text:
Fiore may Scribe fighter actions and is +1 Level for performing action cards.
React: Once per game, after Fiore performs a scribed action: She permanently gains +10 Skill, +2 HP, and the Ethereal trait. Put up to 4 Levels of Undead Elves from your discard pile into play.
errata:
The +1 Level applies to her scribe checks (allowing Level 2 fighter actions).
The React is retrieval from the discard pile. It is optional whether to put any Undead into play.

name: Ophinuchus
text:
Wounds inflicted by Ophinuchus may not be reduced.
React: After a wound is removed from Ophinuchus, discard a card: Inflict a wound on a character within one rank.
errata:
May only react once to a single 'healing' effect, regardless of whether one or all wounds are removed.
The wounds he inflicts may not be reduced (or negated) at the time they are inflicted, but they may be removed later.

setInfos.flavorText: "Undying. Unforgiving."

name: Coblyn
text:
Coblyn may scribe rogue actions.
React: Once per turn, after Coblyn performs a scribed action: Return a Level 5 or lower item from your discard pile from hand.
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
errata: The React is retrieval from the Discard pile.

name: Ashling
text:
After you roll initiative: If Ashling is in the discard pile, you may remove a card in any discard pile from the game.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
Order: Kill Ashling: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
errata:
The static text happens after Reacts to rolling Initiative but before it is determined which player wins Initiative.
The static text triggers on any Initiative roll.
If several players have an Ashling in their discard piles, the player who won Initiative for the previous turn goes first.
Erratum 2007/08/28: "Order: Once per Turn: Perform a +3 ranged strike. Kill Ashling"

name: Orne
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
While Orne is in your hand, your Elf rogues have the ability "Order: Reveal Orne from your hand and discard a card: Gain Marksmanship +8 and Stealth +8 until end of turn."
errata: You may discard Orne to the action he grants.

name: Tisiphone
text: Spend Order: If Tisiphone is in your first rank: Put a Level 2 or lower Undead Elf into play from your discard pile.
errata: The Order is retrieval from the discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "The humans, the deverenians, the dwarves. We cannot risk making an enemy of Krun as well. Kill Etra."

name: Maes
text:
Maes may scribe spells from the discard pile as though they were in your hand.
After Maes casts a scribed spell, remove that spell from the game.
errata: The Scribe action is retrieval if the card comes from the discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "I could make you a skeleton instead, if you prefer."

name: Genecourt Initiate
text: React: Before Genecourt Initiate is killed: The next strike this turn against a character you contol is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "All this sand gets into my eyes. The future does not promise anything else, my liege."
"The future is bleak, yet nothing compared to what we have endured already."
"Let us descend to the cellars, and carve us a heretic."
"Alhana is dead, but Genecourt knoweth the future still." - Cardinal Bromin

name: Dawes
text: Spend Order: Target an opposing non-Warlord Level 1 character within one rank: At end of turn, if Dawes is still in play, kill the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "You have a point, Spence. Maybe we should give these elves a few corpses of their own to play with..."

name: Eleora
text: Order: Once per turn, reveal an Astral character from your hand: Free Kingdoms characters have +2 ATK and +2 AC while in your army until end of turn.
errata: Affects characters that enter play later in the turn as well.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sometimes-most times-secrets are secret for a very good reason."

name: Thayes Ainsworth
text: React: Once per turn, after target Free Kingdoms character moves forward or backward: Give the target +3 ATK or +3 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Plenty of adventures in books. At my age, I prefer the safety."

name: Aron
text: Order: Once per turn: Target Free Kingdoms character's next melee strike this turn ignores the Astral and Ethereal traits.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've been studying the elven ghosts. Just in case."

name: Sestian
text: Order: Twice per turn, move an adjacent Free Kingdoms character backward one rank: Sestian has +3 AC, Defend +5, and Riposte +5 until end of turn.
errata: Fix any illegal ranks created by the Order's movement-cost before gaining the bonuses.

setInfos.flavorText: "Go. Now! Trevor wants Dragon's Keep taken by nightfall."

name: Natalja Wynard
text: React: After Natalja Wynard kills a character: Choose an opponent who must reveal their hand.
errata: All players see the revealed cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "The chance of losing one's destiny should not be one of those reasons, Elora!"

name: Heath Stafford
text: React: Once per turn, after a character pays the costs for an action: Target Free Kingdoms has +5 Skill for the duration of the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "We had a bunch of adventures trying to find somebody to replace Jeffrey."

name: Kieran
text: While Kieran is in your hand, your Druids have the ability "Spend Order: Reveal Kieran from your hand and discard him or two other cards: Search your deck for a Lycanthrope and put it into your hand."

name: Nora Tristram
text: React: After Nora Tristram performs a melee strike that killed the target: Until end of turn your Free Kingdoms have +3 ATK and +3 AC while in your army.
errata: Affects characters that enter play later in the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "We'll bind the wound. This one obviously didn't come from the keep."

name: Fernon Wynard
text: React: Once per turn, after a higher Level character targets Fernon Wynard with a melee or ranged strike: Fernon Wynard gains the Astral trait until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Maybe you do have some use after all."

name: Biana the Mystical
text:
React: Once per turn, after Biana performs an action that killed an opposing character: Biana gains +1 Level permanently.
Spend Order: Once per game: Perform a number of +0 ranged strikes equal to Biana's Level.
errata: The number of strikes she makes is set when the action's cost is paid.

name: Ghed Nuri
text: React: After a melee strike targets a Deverenian you control: Put Ghed Nuri into play from your hand adjacent to the target. If you do, redirect the strike to Ghed Nuri, if possible.

name: Geraint the Grin
text: React: Once per turn, after Geraint targets a melee strike: You may remove from the game an item of Level 6 or lower equipped to the target of the strike. If you do, Geraint gains +2 ATK permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "Need a sword paladin? I got one dead cheap!"

name: Ferris Bachman
text:
You may have other copies of this Warlord in your deck.
Ferris Bachman enters play in rank 3 with the Warlord trait.
Order: Once per game: Target character must target this character with melee or ranged strikes whenever possible. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
errata:
Does not break the 3 copies per deck rule.
Does override the rule that characters with the Warlord trait lose that trait when they enter play.
If he would be a legal target for the melee or ranged strike by the character affected by his Order, then Ferris must be targeted by the strike.
If two Ferris Bachmans have affected the same character with the Order, then that character may freely choose between them when targeting.
The Order does not force the affected character to perform actions or strikes - it only limits his targeting choices when he does.

name: Arden Tide
text: React: After target character rolls a magic save that failed by 10 or more, or was a Critical Failure: Inflict a wound on the target.
errata: The wound from his React is inflicted before the effect(s) of failing the save. The wound Arden inflicts is separate from any effect the original action has.

setInfos.flavorText: "Madness is all that remains, 'Master'."

name: Dorath Sa'dul
text:
Dorath Sa'dul is a cleric and a wizard.
Order: Once per turn: return target non-Warlord character to its owner's hand. This ability may not target opposing characters with items equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "How can we help you?"

name: Jautya Syne
text: After starting armies are revealed: Put a lower Level non-multiclass character from your deck into play ready in rank 3. It permanently gains the Warlord trait, +1 HP, and the ability "Order: Reveal Jautya Syne from your hand and shuffle him into your deck: Ready this character." Shuffle Jautya Syne into your deck.
errata:
Your rank structure must be able to support the retrieved character coming into play legally.
Any 'copy' effect that the retrieved character has, that is based on your warlord, copies Jautya Syne.
If two players both reveal Jautya Syne as their Warlord, then they roll-off to see who will trigger his text first.
Erratum 2007/08/28: Characters may not perform actions before the first turn. Thus, any 'entering play' Reacts cannot be used.

name: Shadowblaze
text:
Shadowblaze is a rogue and wizard, enters play as though he were Level 6, and can't equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a Spend Order printed on an adjacent character as if it were printed on Shadowblaze.
errata: Can copy Once Per Game abilities multiple times, since each use of the Order is a new copy of that ability.

name: Riad Blight
text: Spend Order: Monsters have a bonus to ATK equal to Riad Blight's Level while they are in your army until end of turn.
errata: Affects Monsters that enter play later in the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Upstarts. That's all they are." - Brett Lund

name: Richard Key
text:
Order: Discard a card: Richard Key has +1 Level for defeating dungeons until end of turn.
React: Once per turn, after you defeat a dungeon: Draw two cards.
errata: Cards are drawn before any static text for defeating the Dungeon are put into effect. Thus, when Reche's Labyrinth is defeated the cards drawn by Key's react will be discarded by the text on the Labyrinth.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hired hand? Never. I'm an independent man, my failures are my own and my successes are my family's. I do not need your treasure."

name: Enigmist
text:
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, after another Monster in your army suffers wounds: Move forward one rank.
errata: The React is performed before the character is killed from the wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "Choose wisely, one gift is your wildest dream, the other is your wildest dream turned inside out."

name: Belan
text: React: Once per turn, after a character within one rank targets a ranged strike: Add Belan's Skill to the ranged strike roll.
errata: If in the first rank, he may react to any ranged strikes performed by characters in their front rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Being a great sniper requires a little accuracy but it's mostly not falling asleep while you wait."

name: Deverenian Courtier
text: Deverenian Courtier may not attack.

setInfos.flavorText: Deverenian diplomats arrived at courts across the lands. To turn them away is to demand retribution, but to accept them is to court slow death by betrayal...
"My court toyeth with me. Politickers all they gape and jest as their master toileth. So be it." - The Emperor

name: Actelli
text: Spend Order: If Actelli is in the first rank: Look at the top 5 cards of any deck. Discard one, and return the rest in any order.
errata:
Only you may see all five cards - they are not revealed.
The discarded card, of course, is discarded face up.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Horsemen got too involved. Dorath knows better."

name: Wanderetch
text: Order: Twice per turn: Succeed with a Stealth check (DC 20) to spend target lower Level character within one rank.
errata: The Order may only target ready characters. (Zero Effect rule)

setInfos.flavorText: "Two of us monsters there are, offering gifts to all from afar."

name: Amoudasi's Candle
text: After a melee strike that missed Amoudasi's Candle: Kill Amoudasi's Candle and search your deck for a card named Amoudasi's Blaze and put it into play spent in this rank.
errata:
Fix any illegal ranks created by the Candle's death before retrieving the Blaze.
The static effect will always trigger from any missed strike, even if you know there is no Blaze to retrieve.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's my cousin you want, he knew all about fire..."

name: Amoudasi's Blaze
text: After Amoudasi's Blaze attacks: Kill Amoudasi's Blaze and search your deck for a card named Amoudasi's Inferno, and put it into play spent in this rank.
errata:
Fix any illegal ranks created by the Blaze's death before retrieving the Inferno.
The static effect will always trigger from any attack, even if you know there is no Inferno to retrieve.

setInfos.flavorText: "...But he's gone now..."

name: Isa the Tabernacle
text:
Isa the Tabernacle may not target ready characters with ranged strikes.
Order: Discard a card: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
errata: Her targeting restriction applies to any ranged strike she performs.
