Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, Sidor the Avenged has +2 ATK for each spell in your discard pile.

name: Aridun of the Stone
text: React: Once per turn, after target Gargoyle in your army is killed: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. You may put a revealed Gargoyle of equal or lower Level than the target into play ready in target's former location in any army. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.
errata:
Erratum 2007/09/14: Its React should read "React: Once per turn, after target Gargoyle you control is killed: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. You may put a revealed Gargoyle of equal or lower Level than the target into play ready in target's former location in any formation. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck."
Fix any illegal ranks before performing the React.
You may use the React to 'replace' a Gargoyle that was in your opponent's formation.
The chosen Gargoyle must be able to come into play legally (cannot create an illegal rank, possible cleric restrictions, etc), but does not count as being 'played from hand' (Athril Gargoyle).

name: Danres
text:
Daybreak - Spend React: Before a Dwarf within one rank suffers wounds: If it is the first turn reduce the wounds by one.
Nightfall - React: Before Danres dies: If it isn't the first turn adjacent Dwarfs have +4 ATK until end of turn.
errata:
May use the Daybreak React to reduce wounds done to himself.
Multiple copies of Danres may react to the same instance of wounding to reduce multiple wounds.

name: Icesecret Gargoyle
text: Spend Order: Remove Icesecret Gargoyle from the game: Put target Gargoyle in your discard pile into your hand.
errata: The React counts as retrieval from the discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course we mourn Sjonegaard's passing, but we have not seen him in centuries."

name: Madnessfire Gargoyle
text:
Daybreak - React: After Madnessfire Gargoyle enters play, inflict a wound on him: If it is the first turn he permanently gains +4 ATK.
Nightfall - React: Once per turn, after a wound is removed from Madnessfire Gargoyle: If it is not the first turn he permanently gains an additional melee strike (Base +4) whenever he attacks.
errata:
If the wound from his Daybreak React is reduced or negated, then the action is canceled. The wound may be removed at a later time without penalty.
Opal Gargoyle may ready him even after he has gained additional melee strikes from his Nightfall React (they do not count as 'printed').

name: Nevan Mendlight
text:
Nevan may use Medicine a number of times per turn equal to his Level.
React: Once per turn, after Nevan reduces or removes a wound on another equal or higher Level Dwarf: Nevan permanently gains +1 Level, +1 HP, and Medicine +3.
errata: The number of times per turn he can use his ability is based on his current level. If he has used it once, but is level 2, he may use it again.

name: Duke Blackthorne
text:
After a melee strike targets Duke Blackthorne with +6 or less ATK, the strike is a Critical Failure.
Duke Blackthorne may play Level 1 cleric spells.

setInfos.flavorText: Blackthorne Castle lies in ruins, its master slaughtered long ago. Destroyed, shattered... but not empty.
"I've spoken to Modred, my fair Duchess, but the Hierophant hath no time for the likes of thee."

name: Spiteful
text:
Adjacent Dwarfs have Defend +6.
Nightfall - React: After target opposing character kills an adjacent Dwarf: If it is not the first turn melee strikes by Assassins in your army inflict an additional wound against the target until end of turn.
errata: The additional wound from the Nightfall React affects Assassins that enter play later in the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The King is dead. Has our sense of duty followed him?"

name: Lambaste
text:
Wounded Dwarves in this rank have +5 ATK.
Adjacent Dwarves have Defend +7.
errata:
It is not a +5 bonus for each wound, it is +5 for one or more wounds.
The bonuses from multiple copies of Lambaste stack.

setInfos.flavorText: "We defeated the Abyss! These islands' terrors cannot hope to compare. Onwards!"

name: Destruction
text:
React: After entering play, search your deck for a Level 8 or lower item and equip it to Destruction.
React: Once per turn, after Destruction equips an item: Ready him.
errata: He must meet Level and class requirements for equipping the Weapon. Shuffle your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "I deserve no other name."

name: Rouse
text:
Daybreak - React: After Rouse enters play: If it is the first turn ready up to two characters in your army.
Nightfall - If it isn't the first turn, you must have a character in rank four to play Rouse and he enters play in rank 1 stunned with 1 wound.
errata:
His Nightfall text causes him to enter play stunned - he does not enter play then become stunned. Similarly, he does not suffer the wound - he just has a wound when he enters play.
His Nightfall text only requires you to have a character in the fourth rank when playing him from your hand.
If he becomes your Warlord in a Jautya Syne deck, he enters play ready and unwounded in the third rank.

name: Berlian the Stout
text: Order: Target an item in your army and discard a card: Equip the item to a different Dwarf in your army. If you do, ready the item.
errata:
The Dwarf must meet Level and class requirements to equip the targeted item.
The item can be moved while ready.

setInfos.flavorText: "They wish for us to end our alliance with the Deverenians. I will give the humans and elves a chance to prove their words-but why did they bring me to this strange place?"

name: Quest
text:
Daybreak - React: Once per turn, after wounds are reduced or removed from Quest: If it is the first turn, he gains +1 HP permanently.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn Quest has +4 AC.

name: Temper
text:
Daybreak - React: After an opposing character kills a Dwarf: If it is the first turn put Temper into play from your hand in rank three.
Nightfall - React: After target character kills a Dwarf in your army, discard a card: If it is not the first turn Temper's next melee strike this turn against the target is a Critical Success.
errata: He may not create an illegal rank when he enters play with his Daybreak React, unless another effect allows otherwise.

name: Faceless
text: React: Once per turn, after Faceless performs an action during which he succeeded with a Stealth check: Ready Faceless.
errata: His react will be triggered by either of the actions granted by the Stealth feat - he can be ready after he 'stealths' into an opposing army.

setInfos.flavorText: "This island left its mark on me, as the Deverenians left their mark on all the lands of the Accord. No more."

name: Fleshstone Gargoyle
text:
Daybreak - Spend React: After entering play: If it is the first turn move Fleshstone Gargoyle to the first rank of an opposing formation.
Spend Order: Target an opposing character within one rank: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 10 + Fleshstone Gargoyle's Skill) or become stunned.

name: Stockpile
text:
Spend Order: Return target item within one rank to its owner's hand.
Nightfall - React: Once per turn, after target Dwarf in your army equips an item: If it is not the first turn the target may perform an additional Order after the current one.

name: Sir Geoffrey Drac
text:
Adjacent Deverenians have Defend +10.
Spend Order: Remove Sir Geoffrey Drac from the game: If he was in your first rank, perform any number of Orders until you pass.

setInfos.flavorText: "We are Deverenians yet. What the unworthy do not give, we take."
"As you wish." - Baron Fabrice Rellion

name: Twisted Shade
text:
Twisted Shade is a wizard and a rogue and enters play as if one Level higher.
Order: Kill target Elf you control: Do one of the following: All characters in the rank the target was in must succeed with a reflex save (DC 13) or suffer a wound; Move a character that was within one rank of the target into the rank the target was in.
errata: Fix any illegal ranks before proceeding with the effects of the Order.

name: Serolia Calix
text:
Serolia Calix is a wizard and a cleric.
Daybreak - If it is the first turn your Elves have the ability "Order: Once per turn: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 20) to inflict a wound on a character within one rank."
Order: Kill one of your Elves: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may put a revealed spell into your hand.
errata:
Erratum 2007/10/08: The Order should read "Order: Once per turn, kill one of your Elves: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. You may put a revealed spell into your hand."
If the character killed for the cost of her Order does not die (eg. Skyyrek), then the cost is not considered paid and the action is canceled.
Her Order is draw and retrieval from the deck if you choose to put a revealed spell into your hand.
It cannot be performed when you have no cards in the deck. (Zero Effect rule)

name: Valdania Calix
text: Daybreak - Spend Order: After target opposing character moves without spending or stunning: If it is the first turn the target must succeed with a will save (DC 16) or spend, stun if already spent.
errata: React will be triggered by falling forward only when some effect (eg. Griffon of Misear) negates the spending or stunning.

name: Aellano Sessaran
text:
May equip two Weapons.
React: Once per turn, after killing an opposing character with a melee strike, remove it from the game: Perform a ranged strike equal to the Level of the killed character.
Daybreak - Order: Discard a card: If it is the first turn move forward or backward one rank.
errata: Erratum 2007/09/14: The React should read "React: Once per turn, after killing an opposing character with a melee strike, remove it from the game: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the Level of the killed character."

name: Pravian
text:
Daybreak - React: After entering play: If it is the first turn, move forward one rank and gain Powerattack +10 permanently.
Nightfall - React: After entering play: If it is not the first turn permanently gain +1 HP and "After you roll Initiative: Opposing characters within one rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 11) or suffer a wound."

name: Flaming Spirit
text:
If there is an Illusionist within one rank of Flaming Spirit, he is Ethereal.
If there is a Summoner within one rank of Flaming Spirit, he has +1 HP.
If there is a Necromancer within one rank of Flaming Spirit, wounds from his melee strikes may not be reduced.
errata:
A character with more than one of the named subclasses will count for multiple effects.
Any character within one rank can count - including opposing ones.

name: Zevil Adinerach
text: Order: Once per target per turn, Discard a card: Until end of turn target character within 2 ranks has -2 ATK, AC, and Skill, and one of your other Elves has +2 ATK, AC, and Skill.
errata: The bonus to another Elf may be given to the same Elf multiple times.

name: Cheadlon
text:
Cheadlon may cast Level 1 and 2 wizard spells.
Order: Once per turn, target non-Warlord character within 3 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or cannot perform actions this turn.
errata: When performing 1st and 2nd Level wizard actions he will be considered both a wizard and a rogue for only the effects of that action. For all other Reacts and effects during the action, he is just a rogue.

setInfos.flavorText: "Humans are the same the world over."

name: Nildrach
text:
Daybreak - Spend React: After entering play: If it is the first turn Nildrach has -1 HP permanently and moves to the first rank of an opposing army.
Nightfall - Order: Once per turn, discard a card: If it is not the first turn perform a melee strike that inflicts an additional wound against spent characters.
errata: The Nightfall Order's melee strike uses the character's first strike as a base and is modified by items and/or any modifiers from other card effects.

name: Edonal Rowan
text:
Daybreak - Spend Order: If it is the first turn perform two +0 ranged strikes that stun instead of wound.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn Edonal has -4 AC, is Undead and Ethereal and has the ability "React: Before Edonal dies: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 16) to inflict a wound on a character within one rank."
errata: Since the ranged strikes from the Daybreak Order stun instead of wound any effect that would increase the number of wounds does not affect it.

name: Zaina
text: React: After an opposing character targets Zaina with an action (not a melee strike): Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "They almost believe that I am one of them."
When faced with darkness, fools fear and the wise serve. So it is with Baruuk.

name: Scetis
text:
Scetis has +1 Level while in an opposing formation.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, Scetis may enter play into the front rank of any army.

setInfos.flavorText: "I do my best work after dark, and no ghost is going to stop me."

name: Idrol
text: Order: Discard a card: If Idrol is in the first rank target character has -1 Skill for each character in a discard pile of your choice until end of turn.
errata: If the card discarded for the cost of his Order is a character, it will increase the penalty the target suffers if you choose your own discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "Deverenia attacks my people and yours alike. Only together can we oppose it."

name: Terbero
text: React: After one of your Elves dies, discard 1 card: Put a Level 1 Elf from your discard pile into play.
errata:
Erratum 2007/10/08: The React should read "React: Once per turn, after one of your Elves dies, discard 1 card: Put a level 1 Elf from your discard pile into play."
The React may return to play the character that died or the card that was discarded (if it was a character) and counts as retrieval from the discard pile.
The discarded card comes from your hand (not your deck).

setInfos.flavorText: "What need have we of allies, when we create our own every day?"

name: Spectre of Madness
text:
While Spectre of Madness is in the discard pile your Necromancers have the ability "Spend Order: Remove Spectre of Madness from the game and target an item within 2 ranks: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 8 + item's Level) to destroy the item."
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

name: Shadan Alder
text:
Shadan Alder enters play spent.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn Shadan Alder enters play in rank 3 and has +3 ATK, AC, and Skill, +2 HP, and two additional strikes (Base +0) whenever he attacks.
Spend Order: Return Shadan Alder to your hand.
errata:
Erratum 2007/10/08: "Shadan Alder enters play spent." was changed to "Shadan Alder may not start in play."
The bonuses from his Nightfall effect are not dependent upon entering play after the first turn.
The Spend Order will return him to his owner's hand regardless of control.

name: Yscarite Sentry
text:
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, your characters in play have +2 AC while Yscarite Sentry is in the discard pile.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, your characters in play are Lycanthropes if you have two or more copies of Yscarite Sentry in your discard pile.
errata:
The bonuses from multiple copies of the Daybreak effect stack.
Your characters gain the Lycanthrope bold trait from the Nightfall effect.

name: Gladys Tynron
text:
Daybreak - React: After Gladys Tynron enters play: If it is the first turn, move target character in any first rank backwards one rank.
Nightfall - React: After Gladys Tynron enters play: If it is not the first turn, move a character forward one rank.
errata: Both Reacts may target any character in play.

name: Sadina Gleson
text:
Daybreak - Order: Once per turn: If it is the first turn, move forward one rank.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, Sadina Gleson has an additional strike (Base +0) whenever she attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "But there's not so much as a breeze here..."

name: Hex Starsmore
text: Daybreak - If it is the first turn, Hex Starsmore's melee strikes are Critical Successes.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is just the beginning. If we let the Eternal Emperor reign unchecked, the whole world will be as this. I say we stop him."

name: Robert Mason
text: Order: Once per turn: Move a Ranger in your army forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The elves once fought against us, and now by our side. I fear that the Deverenians won't follow their example."

name: Hendric the Mirage
text: React: Once per turn, after target character performs an action: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or you may spend a character adjacent to the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Did I survive by chance, or did the Emperor spare me?"
"So many, many rivals to the throne, but so few acknowledge the primary claim."
"Actually, Lord Kestrel, I may know a sage who could help us..."

name: Arve Yscar
text:
Your non-Arve characters in this rank gain the feat(s) Arve Yscar has, but at +0.
Order: Once per turn: Until Arve uses this ability again, he gains your choice of Riposte +5, Defend +5, or Magic Resistance +0.
errata:
He keeps the feat he gives himself past the end of the turn.
If a character uses a feat, loses the trait, then regains it (eg. moving out of then back into Arve's rank) - it is still considered used and cannot be used again.

name: Naro Yscar
text:
Your Rangers in play are considered to have the Lycanthrope trait.
Your Lycanthropes in play are considered to have the Ranger trait.

name: Haden Rhys
text: React: After a melee or ranged strike that missed Haden Rhys: Your Free Kingdoms in this rank gain +2 ATK and AC until end of turn.
errata:
The bonuses will affect characters that enter the rank later in the turn.
The bonuses will continue affecting the rank until the end of turn, even if Haden is killed or moves to another rank.

name: Vermin Swarm
text:
Daybreak - Order: Once per turn, if it is the first turn: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
Nightfall - Order: Once per turn, if it is not the first turn: Move forward or backwards one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes my minions, go for the eyes!"

name: Beastmaster Eladric
text:
Your Lycanthropes have +2 ATK, AC, and Skill.
React: Once per turn, after one of your Lycanthropes suffers a wound from target opposing character: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 18) or stun.
errata: The React is used after the wound has been suffered (i.e. after any 'healing' effect) but before it is determined whether the character has been killed.

setInfos.flavorText: "Welcome to this place, and do not fear for yourselves."

name: Feral Yscarite
text:
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, Feral Yscarite has +3 AC for each Charge on him and the ability "Order: Once per turn: Gain a Charge."
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, Feral Yscarite has an additional strike (Base +0) whenever he attacks and +2 ATK for each Charge on him.
errata: His Nightfall effect grants an additional strike and the ATK bonus for each Charge.

name: Loren
text:
Daybreak - React: After Loren enters play: If it is the first turn, perform a +8 ranged strike targeting any equal or lower Level character in play.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, Loren's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against spent characters.
errata: The ranged strike from the Daybreak React can target a character within two ranks.

name: Kevrosh Dathar
text:
Spend Order: Search your deck for a dungeon, and put it into play if possible, otherwise put it into your hand.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, your Monsters have a bonus to ATK equal to half the printed CR of the dungeon in play (Rounded Down).
errata: The ATK bonus from the Nightfall effect comes from the Dungeon's printed CR only. Bonuses from other effects, such as Malrog's Lair's text, do not count.

name: Nadlon Dathar
text:
Dungeons in play have +2 Challenge Rating.
React: Once per turn, after you put a dungeon into play: Nadlon Dathar gains +1 HP permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "A Sutek King? Hssst-speak not to me of our lesser cousins."

name: Bran Segula
text:
Daybreak - Order: Once per game, remove a Charge: If it is the first turn move forward one rank and gain +2 ATK, AC, and HP permanently.
Nightfall - Order: Once per game, remove a Charge: If it is not the first turn, search your deck for a Dragon of Level 6 or lower, and put it into play adjacent to Bran.
errata:
Erratum 2007/09/14: He has the Mercenary trait.
The Daybreak Order may not be used while in the front rank, since it requires forward movement. (Illegal Effect rule)
The Dragon retrieved from the deck for the Nightfall Order may not enter play into an illegal rank, unless an effect would allow otherwise.

name: Lady Jenia Aedroud
text:
Lady Jenia has +1 Level for equipping items and for performing actions on items.
Lady Jenia has -1 Level for casting spells.
React: After Lady Jenia targets a ranged strike generated by an item: Add +3 to the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Isadrans forge their blades as though I had trained them from birth."

name: Lightspawn
text: If there is a dungeon in play, Lightspawn has Stealth +15 and is +1 Level for using Stealth.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come children-Dorath is expecting us, and you know how much we both enjoy our little visits." - Kevrosh Dathar

name: Shadowlurkers
text:
Dungeons have +3 Challenge Rating.
Shadowlurkers has +3 ATK, AC, & Skill if there is a dungeon in play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothing comparess to the ssport to be had on the Isless of Light and Sshadow come ssunsset." - Kevrosh Dathar

name: Lessari
text: Order: Once per turn, if there is a dungeon in play, target character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + the printed Challenge Rating of the dungeon in play) or suffer a wound and become spent.

name: Belinda
text: Nightfall - Spend React: After you bring a character into play: If it is not the first turn move the character forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The danger is real-but only if you know the wrong people."

name: Turgan
text:
Adjacent Nothrog have +1 HP.
Nightfall - Order: Once per turn: If it is not the first turn, put a Charge on Turgan. Until end of turn your Nothrog have +2 ATK for each charge on Turgan.
errata: The Charge he gains from the Nightfall Order will be included when the action calculates the bonus.

setInfos.flavorText: "Flames coat the night, so darkness never falls. Unnatural."

name: Nemtok
text:
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, your Nothrog inflict an additional wound with melee strikes.
Nightfall - If it isn't the first turn, your Nothrog in this rank have Powerattack +5.
errata: If a character uses the Powerattack feat, loses the trait, then regains it (eg. moving out of then back into Nemtok's rank) - it is still considered used and cannot be used again.

name: Ker'zath
text:
Order: Once per turn: Perform a melee strike. Suffer 1 wound.
Order: Once per game: If Ker'zath has 3 or more wounds on him, remove all wounds from him and he permanently gains +3 HP and the text "Ker'zath has an additional strike (Base +0) whenever he attacks, for each wound on him."
errata:
The wound is suffered after the strike has completely resolved.
The melee strike uses the character's first strike as a base and is modified by items and/or any modifiers from other card effects.

name: Carg'rag
text: Daybreak - React: After Carg'rag enters play: If it is the first turn, draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "'The time for subterfuge is over,' Krun says. Open war is all the Deverenians will understand, and that suits me just fine."

name: Krasin
text: After Krasin performs an attack: Inflict a wound on one of your Nothrog.
errata: The wound is suffered after the attack has completely resolved. It may be inflicted upon Krasin.

setInfos.flavorText: "Are you sure that this is the Isle of Ice? Seems a bit warm to me."

name: Egrart
text:
Egrart may equip two Weapons.
React: After Egrart equips a Weapon: Move him forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Those were your best shots? They're also your last!"

name: Lord Argen d'Ilchant
text:
Lord Argen may perform actions, and is treated by card effects, as if he were a Warlord.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Deverenian in this rank: Ready Lord Argen.

name: Ar'bruz
text:
Order: Kill another of your Nothrog: Perform a melee strike.
Order: Once per game, target a Warlord you control: Ar'bruz gains the Warlord trait permanently. Kill the target.
errata: Fix any illegal ranks caused by the cost of the first Order before performing the strike.

name: Skrim Spindlespleen
text: Nightfall - Order: Once per turn: If is is not the first turn: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. Each of your Nothrog may equip one revealed Weapon that they may legally equip. Discard all remaining revealed cards.
errata:
The Nightfall Order counts as retrieval.
You must have at least one card in your deck in order to perform the Order, but do not have to have ten.

setInfos.flavorText: "Arm up. Malrog wants no survivors."

name: FirRal
text:
Daybreak - React: After FirRal enters play: If it is the first turn move FirRal forward three ranks. Kill him at end of turn.
Nightfall - React: After FirRal enters play: If it is not the first turn he and one of your other Nothrog that has not gained any permanent HP, gain +1 HP permanently.
errata:
When performing his Daybreak React, he moves all three ranks at once. He does not move forward three separate times.
There does not need to be another legal target in order to use his Nightfall React.

name: Baxod Firedancer
text:
Baxod Firedancer may cast wizard spells.
React: After Baxod casts a spell: Target Nothrog inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes until end of turn.
errata:
When performing wizard actions, he will be considered both a wizard and a rogue for only the effects of that action. For all other reacts and effects during the action, he is just a rogue.
He may use his React even if the spell is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "Whether the Ironface succeeds or fails, it will make an epic tale."

name: Dorril
text:
Daybreak - Order: Once per turn: If it is the first turn, put a Charge on Dorril.
Nightfall - Order: Once per game: If it is not the first turn, put a Charge on Dorril.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike for each Charge on Dorril.

name: Ar'tol
text: React: After a melee or ranged strike targets Ar'tol: Put up to two Nothrog from your hand into play and move them forward one rank if possible. Shuffle Ar'tol into your deck.
errata:
The React cannot be used to put characters into play in an illegal rank, unless an effect would allow otherwise.
Both characters enter play (one at a time, triggering reacts to a character entering play as appropriate) before either is moved forward.
Correct any illegal ranks caused by the first character's movement before moving the second character.
May be performed if you have one or no Nothrog in your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm never alone. Got my axe, for one thing."

name: Ga'dok
text:
React: After Ga'dok performs an action that killed a character: Put a Charge on him.
Order: Draw a card for each Charge on Ga'dok. Kill Ga'dok.
errata: An action that kills multiple characters (eg. Magic Missiles) will only trigger the React once, after the action has completely resolved.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your opinion is of no consequence-DerRist will support neither you nor the Ironface."

name: DerRist
text:
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, DerRist's ranged strikes may target an additional rank away.
Spend Order: Remove the top 6 cards of your deck from the game: This turn is considered the first turn.

name: Isle of Madness
text:
Daybreak - Warlords have the ability "Spend Order: Discard two cards: If it is the first turn, Draw two cards."
Nightfall - After the draw step, if it is not the first turn, each player reveals their hand. The opponent of their choice chooses any number of cards in their hand which are discarded. The player then draws that many cards.
errata:
Players resolve the Nightfall effect in the order of the previous turn's Initiative.
If a player controls an Opal Gargoyle, they may choose whether to resolve the Dungeon's or the Gargoyle's 'after draw step' effect first.

name: Isle of Sorrow
text:
Daybreak - If Isle of Sorrow is defeated on the first turn, each player searches their deck for a character and puts it into his hand.
Nightfall - If Isle of Sorrow is defeated on a turn other than the first, each player reveals their hand and discards any revealed characters.
errata:
Each player must reveal the character that they drew (per the rulebook on search effects).
The Daybreak effect is both draw and retrieval from the deck, but it is not an action.

name: The Bloody Countess
text:
React: Before rolling Initiative, spend any number of your Deverenians: Add +3 to this roll for each Deverenian spent.
React: After winning Initiative, discard up to two cards: Draw that many cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "Stationless mayhap, hopeless never."

name: The Bastion of Bascaron
text: It is the first turn.

setInfos.flavorText:
"I don't know what's inside, or who's guarding it, or even how to get back, but Dukat thinks it's vital. That's enough." - Kara Wadreth
"But you needn't enter alone." - Beastmaster Eladric

name: Isle of Wind
text:
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, ranged strikes may target an additional rank away.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, characters may not perform ranged strikes.

name: Isle of Secrets
text:
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, when Isle of Secrets is put into play: Each player discards two cards.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, when Isle of Secrets is defeated: All players draw two cards.
errata:
If a player only has one card in hand when the Daybreak effect is triggered, they discard that card.
If a player only has one card remaining in their deck when the Nightfall effect is triggered, they draw that card.

name: Isle of Ice
text:
Stunned characters must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) to unstun during the ready step.
Warlords have the ability: "Order: Once per turn, target a character in your army: Until end of turn the target has +5 AC and +1 HP. Stun the target if possible.

name: Isle of Fire
text:
Characters who unstun during the ready phase may attempt a magic save (DC 15) to ready.
Warlords have the ability: "Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on target character in your army: Until end of turn the target has +5 ATK and inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes."

name: Symbol of Unity
text:
This is a Faith Set item.
Order: Once per turn, spend a cleric in your army and name a subclass: Until end of turn characters in your army with that subclass have +2 ATK, AC, and Skill for each Faith Set item equipped to this character.
errata: Affects characters that either gain the subclass trait or enter play with the trait later in the turn.

name: Ruby Staff of Selection
text:
This is a Faith Set item.
Order: Once per turn, spend a cleric in your army and name a subclass: Target character gains the subclass until end of turn.
errata: The targeted character gains the bold trait for the subclass as well.

setInfos.flavorText: "I do not choose those worthy of Kor's blessing. The staff does." - Lambaste

name: The Cohorts' Ark
text:
This is a Faith Set item.
Order: Once per turn, spend a cleric in your army: Search your deck for a Faith Set item and put it into your hand.
Order: Once per turn, spend a cleric in your army: This character may use abilities on Faith Set items an additional time this turn.
errata:
Erratum 2007/10/08: It has the Unique trait.
The first Order is retrieval and draw from the deck.
The second Order allows each action on each Faith Set item, even ones equipped later in the turn, to be used an additional time this turn.

name: Gossamer Mantle
text:
Spend Order: Choose an opponent who must reveal their hand. You may discard one revealed character. If you do, that opponent draws a card.
React: After you equip Gossamer Mantle: If this character is a Ranger, move forward one rank.
errata:
The acting player may choose not to discard a character.
If there is more than one character, the acting player gets to choose which is discarded.

name: Calamity's Steel
text:
React: After this character kills an opposing character: This character has +3 ATK and +1 AC until end of turn.
Order: Spend Calamity's Steel: If this character is a Barbarian, and has +24 or more ATK, ready him.
errata: The ATK Bonus checked for the Order is the character's first printed strike, modified by items and/or any modifiers from other card effects.

name: Cardinal Creigh
text:
React: After an opposing character kills a Deverenian in your army: Put a number of Charges on Cardinal Creigh equal to the killed Deverenian's Level.
Order: Remove up to 5 Charges: Target character has -1 ATK and -1 AC for each Charge removed until end of turn.

name: Aithon
text: Spend Order: Perform a Charisma check (DC 11). If successful, target each character in your army that shares a subclass with this character. You may move each target forward or backward one rank.
errata:
The acting character may move himself.
All movement occurs one character at a time, fixing illegal ranks as necessary.

name: Mercy's Edge
text: React: After this characters targets a melee strike: He has +2 ATK for the strike. If the strike hits, the target is stunned instead of wounded.
errata: Since the melee strike stuns instead of wounds, card effects that do additional wounds will have no effect on this strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Leave them alive. It looks like a beautiful night to be helpless." - Skrim Spindlespleen

name: Balios
text: Nightfall - React: After an opposing character performs an Order, spend Balios: If it is not the first turn, move forward or backward a rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ride with swift hooves. The Fire is coming." - Serolia Calix

name: Phantasmal Panther
text: Nightfall - Order: If it is not the first turn, spend Phantasmal Panther: Phantasmal Panther performs a melee strike as if it were a Level 3 Rogue Assassin with +4 ATK, 14 AC, 1 HP, 5 Skill, and Powerattack +5.
errata: While performing the melee strike, it counts as a summoned character (not an item) and is considered to occupy the same space as the acting character (for purposes of adjacency).

setInfos.flavorText: "Do not make the mistake of thinking we natives defenseless during the day." - Beastmaster Eladric

name: Frozen Servant
text:
Daybreak - If this is the first turn, all Illusionists have +2 AC.
React: After wounding target opposing character, discard a card: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15, DC 18 if the caster is an Illusionist) or become stunned.
errata: The Daybreak bonus is granted to all Illusionists, not just yours.

name: Nostrum's Whisper
text:
React: After performing an action that put target character into play, spend Nostrum's Whisper: The character permanently gains +3 ATK, and +3 Skill (and +1 HP, if this character is a Summoner).
React: After this character inflicts a wound on a summoned character: Kill that character.
errata:
The first React is only triggered by actions that this character performs that put a character into play. It is not triggered by the player using the standard Order under Raising Troops in the rulebook, nor by similar actions from other characters.
Summoned characters are characters that are not character cards.

name: Crown of the Isles
text:
Order: Remove X Charges and spend Crown of the Isles: Put a character of Level less than X into play from your discard pile.
Nightfall - React: Once per turn, after this character kills a character: If it is not the first turn put a Charge on the Crown. Necromancers may perform this action more than once per turn.
errata:
Necromancers can perform the react any number of times per turn.
The Order counts as retrieval from the discard pile.

name: Clandestine Crest
text:
You may not equip Armor.
React: After a melee or ranged strike targets this character, discard a card: The strike receives no bonus to the die roll. Illusionists may perform this React once per turn without discarding a card.
errata:
Erratum 2007/09/14: Its static text should read "This character may not equip Armor."
The React's effect is to prevent the roll from receiving Any bonuses. That is, it does not merely reduce the current bonus to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now we may speak safely. What makes this Emperor such a threat?" - DerRist

name: Tide's Ascension
text: React: After this character kills an opposing character with Level 3 or more greater than this character's remove this card from the game: This character permanently gains +6 ATK, +6 AC, +2 HP, +2 Level, +4 Skill, and the Hero trait.

name: Medusa's Heritage
text: React: Target an opposing character without the printed Warlord trait: This character gains a bonus to ATK and AC until end of turn equal to the target's Level. If this character is Sorscha and the target is a Medusan Lord, you may remove this card from the game to gain +2 HP and +6 Skill permanently.

name: Slayer the Unkind
text: Order: Once per turn, kill another character in your army: Ready Slayer the Unkind.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothing is beyond our reach. Deverenia is eternal, and now so too her Emperor."
Control the past, and you will command the future.
Control the past, and you will command the future.

name: Malrog's First Test
text: When Malrog's First Test is defeated, that player gains control of it and puts it into their first rank as a Level 4 Mercenary wizard Dragon with +6/+6 ATK, 16 AC, +6 Skill, and 3 HP.

name: Sack of Baraxton
text:
Characters higher than Level 5 perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Remove target dungeon from the game (It is not defeated).

setInfos.flavorText: "From Nassiral Hate, and Master K'Hallaek to Death, and the Queen of Syneri, I gathered a legion of strong allies. Together we have shaped the lands of the Accord. They all have been slaughtered or diappeared, leaving me with nothing to carry out my great plan. Now a cult has made themselves more useful in my quest than the others had ever been. With the Cult of Cohorts, I shall become immortal and the Nothrog will have their own god." - Malrog Ironface

name: Veil of Secrecy
text: Order: Remove target non-Warlord character you control from the game. At end of turn, put that character into play as though from your hand, if possible. Otherwise return it to your hand.

name: The Haunted
text: Order: Target a character and remove The Haunted from the game. If you control the target, it has +1 ATK, +1 AC, and +1 Skill permanently. Otherwise it gets -1 ATK, -1 AC, and -1 Skill permanently.

name: Calling the Storm
text: Order: Discard up to three cards: Kill all non-Warlord characters with Level equal to the number of cards discarded.

name: Medusan Lord's Might
text:
Fighter or rogue only.
Overlords perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Choose an opposing player and name a card. Search that player's hand and deck for all copies of that card. Remove each copy from the game.

name: Medusan Lords Guile
text:
Wizard or cleric only.
Overlords perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a card and add it to your hand.
errata: This is a spell.

name: Helena Dascum
text:
React: After you perform an Order, discard a card: Helena Dascum performs an additional Order after the current one.
Order: Destroy an equipped item: Perform a +6 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

name: Qor-Teth Firefist
text:
Qor-Teth Firefist may cast one wizard spell per turn.
Order: Once per game attach a lower Level fighter action card to Qor-Teth Firefist. While attached Qor-Teth Firefist may perform it once per turn and is +1 Level for performing it.

name: Adonis the Cozener
text: Your Deverenians have the ability "React: Once per turn, after a melee or ranged strike targets this Deverenian, the acting character must succeed with a perception check (DC 12) or the strike is a Critical Failure and Adonis gains +2 Skill until end of turn."

name: Arcane Qor-Teth
text:
Arcane Qor-Teth may cast wizard spells.
Once per turn, Arcane Qor-Teth may perform an action card in the discard pile as though it were in your hand.
Order: Once per turn: Move target Abyssal forward one rank.

name: Elder Qor-Teth
text:
Your Abyssals are wizards.
Order: Once per turn: Attach a wizard spell to Elder Qor-teth. While attached he can cast it once per turn.
React: After Elder Qor-teth casts a spell, spend an Abyssal: Cast the spell again.

name: Archos Loth
text:
Archos is both a wizard and a fighter.
Starts the game with Corruption equipped.
Order: Once per turn: Permanently take control of target non-Warlord character.
Order: Kill a character you control: Inflict a wound on each character in the rank that character was in.

name: Corruption
text:
Corruption may not be removed from the game or destroyed.
React: After this character performs an action that killed an opposing character, spend Corruption: Put all characters killed by that action into play in an opposing first rank, under your control, with the Undead trait.

name: Builder Cohort
text:
Order: Remove a Charge: Do one of the following: Target character has +4 ATK until end of turn; Move target character forward one rank; Draw a card then discard a card; Put 1 Charge on any item; Spend or ready target item.
Order: Once per turn: If Craft is your Warlord, put 4 Charges on Builder Cohort.

name: Wisdom Lost Cohort
text:
React: After an opposing character targets a character in your army with a melee strike or action: If Takson the Intricate is your Warlord, the target must succeed with a perception check (DC 15) or the strike or action is cancelled.
Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike.
errata: Erratum 2007/08/16: May only be played in Open.

name: Judge Aeacus
text:
While performing a melee strike against a character of opposite alignment Aeacus gains +3 ATK and the strike inflicts an additional wound.
Order: Discard a card from your hand: Switch Aeacus' alignment permanently. Any player may perform this action.

name: Reflection of Fortune
text:
+2 Skill
This character inflicts an additional wound against spent characters with melee and ranged strikes.
React: Once per turn, after being targeted by a melee strike, ranged strike, or action: Redirect the strike or action to an adjacent character.

name: Reflection of Glory
text:
+1 HP
This character inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.

name: The False Emperor
text:
For each Charge, this character has +2 ATK, +2 AC, +2 Skill, +2 hit points, and +2 Levels.
For each Weapon equipped to this character, this character has an additional melee strike (base +0) and Deverenians within one rank have +3 ATK, +3 AC, and +3 Skill.
Order: Once per target per turn, spend a Deverenian you control: Target another Deverenian. Either move the target forward one rank, or the target performs an attack without spending.

name: Denali Sagebound
text: Spend Order: Target a Dwarf within one rank that hasn't gained any permanent bonuses: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may remove a revealed item from the game to permanently give the target +1 Level, +1 ATK, +1 AC, +1 Skill, and +1 HP.
errata:
Shuffle after using her ability.
"Permanent bonus" only refers to changes to a character's numeric stats, excluding feats.

name: Chant
text: Dwarves adjacent to Chant gain +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Silent determination is one thing, lads, but nothing frightens the enemy more than a line of soldiers willing to sing their own funeral dirge as they stare death in the face."
"I know what to give them, Hope, but how do we find it?"
"We sing of hereos fallen and of Kor's boundless mercy, and of the lost relic of St. Vorhim."

name: The Shadow Singer
text:
For each Charge, this character has +2 ATK, +2 AC, +2 Skill, +2 hit points, and +2 Levels.
Your Elves have Marksmanship +8 and Stealth +8.
React: After you discard a card: You may immediately play the card as if from your hand.

name: Miasmic Horror
text:
Miasmic Horror enters play spent.
You may have more than 3 copies of Miasmic Horror in your deck.
Spend Order: Search Your deck for a copy of Miasmic Horror and put it into play spent.

name: Lawrence Pheen
text: React: After Lawrence Pheen enters play: Move a number of your Free Kingdoms with combined Level of 6 or less forward or backward one rank.

name: Lukkot Piledriver
text: React: After Lukkot Piledriver performs a melee strike that hit the target, discard a card: Perform a melee strike against the same target.

name: Shadow Bracers
text:
Assassin only.
Shadow Bracers begins the game equipped to Mortvoritan and may not be targeted by opposing card effects.
Your other characters have Stealth +7.
Your characters' melee strikes ignore Astral and Ethereal when targeting spent characters.
Opposing wizards without a subclass have +1 HP and +3 Skill.

name: Mortvoritan the Baneful
text:
Mortvoritan is a cleric and a rogue.
Other characters you control have a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to their Stealth.
Opposing card effects can not kill, move, or stun Mortvoritan.
Order: Spend a target character you control: Mortvoritan performs an attack without spending as if he were in the same position as the target.

name: Shadow Walker
text:
Shadow Walker begins the game equipped to Mortvoritan and may not be targeted by opposing card effects.
Order: Put a Free Kingdoms into play in any rank of any army, even if the target would enter play in an opposing formation or illegal rank.
Order: Once per turn, ready a target character you control in an opposing formation.

name: Mortvoritan's Wrath
text:
Cleric and rogue only.
Order: Choose an opposing player. That player picks a character he controls, and a second character if the caster is a rogue and cleric, as the target for this spell. Kill any stunned targets. Wound any spent targets. Stun the targets.

name: Jernar Thanatoc
text:
Jernar Thanatoc is a fighter and cleric and starts the game with Wages of War and McEachern Blade equipped.
Other multiclass characters have +1 Level.
After starting armies are revealed, search your collection for a character of each faction and put them into play without loyalty penalty.

name: McEachern Blade
text:
May not be targeted by opponent's actions while equipped to Jernar Thanatoc.
Order: Kill a character or destroy an item. This ability may only target a card that shares a name with a card in play or in any discard pile.
React: After a character pays the cost of an action card: Cancel the action if that card shares a name with an action card in play or in any discard pile.

name: Martyr
text: React: After a melee strike targets Martyr: Perform a Defend check (DC 15 + the attacker's Level). If successful you may kill Martyr to inflict one wound on the attacking character.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is a heavenly garden, but one too long unkept."
"Snap out of it, man. We need you. Your king needs you." - Nitesh Imaran
"For once, they suffered, that I may live. The debt will be repaid, but another day."

name: Wages of War
text:
May not be targeted by opponent's actions while equipped to Jernar Thanatoc.
Cards may not be removed from discard piles by opponents.
Opposing characters must spend a ready character in their army as an additional cost to perform Orders and must discard a card as an additional cost to perform Reacts.

name: Master's Plans
text:
May start in play equipped to Golvannon.
May not be targeted by opposing card effects while equipped to Golvannon.
While there is a dungeon in play, your characters have +4 ATK, +4 AC, +4 Skill, +1 HP, and +1 Level.
React: After a dungeon enters play: Target non-Warlord opposing character must succeed with a reflex save (DC = this rogue's skill + the dungeon's Challenge Rating) or be killed.

name: Living Stones
text:
May start in play equipped to Golvannon.
May not be targeted by opposing card effects while equipped to Golvannon.
While there is a dungeon in play, your non-spell melee or ranged strikes may not target characters more than one rank away.
React: After a dungeon enters play: Search your deck for a Gargoyle and put it into play ready in your first rank, ignoring play restrictions.

name: Golvannon
text:
Golvannon is a wizard and a rogue.
After starting armies are revealed: Search your deck for a dungeon and put it into play.
Order: Once per turn: Defeat a dungeon in play.
React: Before one of your dungeons is defeated: Shuffle it into your deck. Draw a card.

name: Raimund Aedroud
text: Order: Spend an equipped Steed: Raimund Aedroud gains a bonus to ATK, AC or Skill equal to his Level until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Fear not the blade nor the charger. It is the mind of the true knight that deals the lethal blow.

name: Kargaz Dythanus
text:
Kargaz may perform actions while stunned.
React: After Kargaz enters play: Put a Level 1 Undead from your discard pile into play in any rank.
React: Before Kargaz leaves play: Put a Level 1 Undead from your discard pile into play in any of your ranks.

name: Legion
text:
Legion begins the game with an additional Level 1 character in the first rank and an additional Level 2 character in the second rank.
After starting armies are revealed, attach 2 spells from your collection to Legion. He may cast these spells once per turn as if from your hand.
React: After Legion is targeted with an action (not a melee strike), kill one of your Abyssals: Cancel the action.

name: Staff of Damnation
text:
Staff of Damnation begins the game equipped to Legion.
Items equipped to Legion may not be targeted by opposing characters.
Your other Abyssals have +6 ATK, +6 AC, +6 Skill, and +1 HP.
Your deck may contain any Abyssal without limit.
Opposing cards which enter the discard pile are removed from the game.
Spend Order: Perform a number of melee strikes equal to the number of Abyssals you control.

name: Madrigorian
text:
Madrigorian begins the game equipped to Legion.
Order: Once per turn, kill an Abyssal you control: Search your collection for an Abyssal and place it in any rank of your army.
React: After one of your Abyssals kills an opposing character: Put an Abyssal from your collection of equal or lower Level than the killed character into play in your front rank.

name: Ta'anar Tol'son
text: Order: Once per turn, target an opposing character within two ranks: Until end of turn, your characters' strikes against the target gain +2 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have no idea why they keep calling me Trollson."

name: Linnea Warsong
text: React: Before Linnea is killed: The next wounds suffered by a Dwarf you control are reduced by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Each hymn the Winterhold choirs sing touches my heart. But I hear a dissonant note that reminds me of something..."
"Svanna's way is one of sacrifice."
"Sing for me when I am gone."

name: Paymaster Corr
text:
Paymaster Corr's Level is equal to the rank he is in.
If your Warlord is a Mercenary, Paymaster Corr enters play in any rank. (The rank must still be legal.)
React: Once per turn, after target lower Level Mercenary enters play: Move the target forward or backward one rank.

name: Soul of the Storm
text:
For each Charge, this character has +2 ATK, +2 AC, +2 Skill, +2 hit points, and +2 Levels.
Your Deverenians gain the Stormwraith trait.
Your Deverenians with the printed Stormwraith trait gain Magic Resistance +6.
React: Before this character suffers wounds, inflict 1 wound on a Stormwraith you control: Reduce the wounds by 1.

name: Mimik
text: React: After target character hits Mimik with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 14) or the target may not ready during the next ready phase.

name: Treasure Chest
text:
May not perform actions.
Treasure Chest does not count as a character to prevent the rank behind it from being illegal.
Opposing characters have the ability: "Order: Spend five or more Levels of characters in your front rank: Kill Treasure Chest."

setInfos.flavorText: "Just your standard loot container." - Jonah

name: Loki
text:
Loki gains +1 Level for equipping items, but suffers -1 Level for casting spells.
Constructs you control gain +1 ATK for each item equipped to Loki.
Ranged strikes and save DCs from actions performed by Loki from items gain +5.
errata: Erratum 2008/10/07: His static text should read "Ranged strikes and save DCs from actions performed by Loki from items gain +2."

name: Flesh Golem
text: React: After Flesh Golem enters play, remove an equal or lower Level character in any discard pile from the game: Flesh Golem permanently gains a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to the removed character's Level.

name: Reflection of Faith
text:
+2 Skill
After this cleric reduces or removes one or more wounds from one of your characters, that character gains +2 ATK, +2 AC, and +2 Skill until end of turn.
React: Once per turn, before a character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds to 0.

name: Taisia
text: React: Once per turn, after Taisia performs a melee strike that hit target character: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 18) or become spent and may not perform action cards until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I annihilate and I learn."
"The Usurpers are easily tricked."

name: Serpentscale Gargoyle
text: You must have a cleric in your army to start with Serpentscale Gargoyle or bring one into play. Serpentscale Gargoyle has +1 Hit Point while the number of characters in the rank behind him is equal to or greater than the number in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The earth did not change, Sjonegaard. You did."

name: Pyrothraxas
text:
May not equip items.
May perform fighter action cards.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward up to two ranks.
Order: Once per turn: Target character within one rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 23) or suffer two wounds. The target may destroy any number of equipped items and gains +10 to the die roll for each one destroyed.

name: Redu Bir
text: Redu Bir gains +1 HP while in a rank with a The Chosen non-Thrall wizard or cleric.

setInfos.flavorText: "I forsook my family for this opportunity to serve the masters. You are less than nothing."

name: The Vessel
text: Spend React: Before target cleric or wizard within one rank suffers wounds, The Vessel suffers one wound: Reduce the target's wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Attend me, Vessel. I must confront these stunted newcomers." - Naram-Sin

name: Britomar
text: React: Before Britomar is killed with an action by a character you control: Britomar performs a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "My last breath, given to violence. And then, oblivion."

name: Naram-Sin
text:
Your Thralls gain +1 ATK and AC.
While Naram-Sin has 10 or more Charges, he gains the fighter class, +5 ATK, +5 AC, and +1 HP, and has two additional melee strikes (base +0 ATK) when he attacks.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Level X Thrall: Put X Charges on Naram-Sin.

name: Besh-Kar
text: React: Before Besh-Kar is killed with an action by a character you control: Target non-stunned character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 10) or become spent. Spent characters who fail become stunned instead.

name: Aimonos
text:
Aimonos gains +2 ATK and Skill for each Charge he has.
React: After Aimonos enters play, kill up to five ready Thralls: Put an equal number of Charges on Aimonos.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge: Move forward one rank, perform a +10 ranged strike, or Aimonos inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes until end of turn.

name: Getraxos
text:
Getraxos inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes and cannot be stunned by card effects.
Order: Once per turn, kill a ready Thrall: Move forward one rank.

name: The Seed
text: Spend React: Once per turn, before The Seed is killed as part of an action's payment, stun The Seed: The Seed is not killed but the cost is considered paid.

setInfos.flavorText: "Properly sown, a crop may yield more than expected." - Naram-Sin
"Properly sown, a crop may yiend more than expected." - Naram-Sin

name: The Wheat
text: React: After a Thrall in your first rank is killed and before fixing any illegal ranks: Put The Wheat into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "But this isn't even harvest season!" - Stanley

name: War
text: Spend React: After another character in this rank dies: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "No more of my brothers, elf! No more!"
"Where are all the bodies?"
"I've faced Abyssals without flinching, but I knew fear when the earth itself turned against Ironhall."

name: Galgalax
text:
May not start in play.
React: Before making a melee strike roll, kill an adjacent Thrall: Galgalax gains +5 ATK for the strike and the strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Abomination." - King Alaric

They worked the fields unceasingly, without conversation or complaint, long into the night with not a glance spared for the soldiers that passed by them. And why should they? The masters would protect them from any harm.

name: Pagophoros
text:
Opposing stunned characters within one rank of one or more Pagophoros must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) to unstun.
React: After Pagophoros enters play, kill one or more ready Thralls: Move forward an equal number of ranks. Permanently gain +1 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "Takes true heroes to get rid of them." - Kohn
"The natives call it 'Bearer of Ice'" - Angus

name: The Harvest
text: The Harvest gains +2 Levels when killed with an action by a character you control.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Chosen name their thralls as they perceive them." - Niobe

name: Master Asrapi
text:
While Asrapi has 3 or more Charges, he inflicts an additional wound with ranged strikes.
Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the number of Charges on Asrapi.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Level X Thrall: Put X Charges on Asrapi.

name: Shalta
text: React: Once per turn, after a character you control is killed with an action by a character you control: Shalta gains +3 ATK and AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The masters do not kill us without good reason. They love us."

name: Master Naxagoras
text:
Naxagoras is a fighter and a wizard.
Naxagoras enters play as if he were Level 4.
Your Thralls gain +1 ATK.
Order: Once per game, kill a Thrall: Naxagoras permanently gains either +6 ATK and Powerattack +6 or +1 Level for casting spells and +5 Skill.

name: Enhe
text: React: Before Enhe is killed with an action by a character you control: Target non-Thrall permanently gains +1 ATK and AC. Remove Enhe from the game after he dies.

setInfos.flavorText: "You would pit yourself against Misear's greatest gladiator? So be it!" - Validan

name: Shulgi
text: React: Before Shulgi is killed: Target ready character within one rank must succeed with a poison save (DC 11) or become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Lay down your sword, 'free' man. Even if you kill me, you cannot escape."

name: Patience
text: React: After an opposing character performs an action that removed or reduced wounds: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hmm? No, been with the rest of you all along. Why?"
"No, never met anybody by that description."

name: The Earth
text: React: Before The Earth is killed with an action by a character you control: Put a Level 1 The Chosen from your discard pile into your hand. Remove The Earth from the game after it dies.

setInfos.flavorText: "That came from earth, returns to earth." - Naram-Sin

name: Master Mardu
text:
Your Thralls gain +1 AC and Skill.
Spend Order: Once per turn, kill a ready Level X Thrall: All Thralls you control gain +X ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Forsake your old gods!"

name: Master Tir-Koltis
text:
Spend Order: Your Thralls gain one of the following until end of turn: +3 ATK, +3 AC, +4 Skill, Powerattack +3 or Riposte +3.
Order: Once per turn, kill a ready Thrall: Ready Tir-Koltis.

name: Duanna
text:
You may have more than 3 copies of Duanna in your deck.
React: Before Duanna is killed: Shuffle her into your deck after she dies.

setInfos.flavorText: "If they saw us as tyrants, I'm sure they'd voice complaint." - Naram-Sin

name: Atiratu
text: Order: Once per turn, kill any number of ready Thralls: Search your deck for a Daemon whose Level is equal to or lower than twice the combined Levels of the killed Thralls and put it in your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "The price of defiance is death, Nothrog."

name: Nish-Bakr
text:
React: After a character you control is killed: Nish-Bakr gains +2 to ranged strikes until end of turn.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Some of them use their skills against their own brethren to improve their meager lot." - Dame Martha

name: Dahlia Genecourt
text: React: Once per turn, after target opposing character wounds a Deverenian you control: The target suffers a penalty to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to the wounded Deverenian's Level.

name: Brymin of the Marches
text:
Adjacent lower Level Deverenians gain Defend +3.
React: Once per turn, after Brymin performs a melee strike that killed its target: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. You may put one revealed fighter action card into your hand. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.

name: Squire Fendric
text: Order: Once per turn, spend a character in this rank: Move forward one rank. If Fendric moves, he may perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "An a foe knoweth not fear in the face of our charge, then he ne'er shall."

name: Gustave
text: React: After target character targets an adjacent Deverenian with a strike or action: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 12) or the strike or action is redirected to Gustave, if possible.

name: Hope
text: React: After Hope enters play: Shuffle a Level 3 or less cleric action from your discard pile into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "We have overcome one impossible foe. We can do it again."
"Beloved, I have terrible news." - Maakh
I believe that in every heart there is some bright spark of good. Even in yours, my friend.

name: Yavlo the Kindled
text:
Yavlo adds +3 to strike rolls and DCs from Fire spells.
React: Once per turn, after spending as part of the cost of a Fire spell: Ready Yavlo. (The cost is still considered paid.)

setInfos.flavorText: "Insanity." - Brymin

name: Nath'rak
text: React: Once per turn, after Nath'rak casts an Air spell: Move a Nothrog you control forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "He keeps my siege engines from sinking into the mud. Thus, he gets to live." - Scyrax

name: Six'La
text: Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "She had her mother fall in battle too young, and now she is working hard to send her servants for the afterlife." - Rrok

name: Scyrax
text:
Scyrax is a rogue and a wizard.
Your Siege gain +2 to all strike rolls.
Your Level 4 or higher Siege gain +1 HP.
Order: Spend a Nothrog wizard: Move a Siege you control of equal or lower Level than the spent wizard forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The witch will never catch me."

name: Skisk Foulfire
text:
Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to Skisk's Skill.
React: After paying the costs for an action, discard a spell: Skisk's gains +3 Skill until end of turn. If the discarded spell has the Air trait, the action inflicts an additional wound, if possible.

name: Krenthor Gouge
text:
May not equip Armor or Helm.
Your Nothrogs gain +5 ATK while they have one or more wounds.
Order: Once per turn: Remove a wound from Krenthor.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bah, you're no more than a light snack!"

name: Stanley
text: Stanley gains a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to the highest Level of an adjacent Free Kingdoms.

setInfos.flavorText: "My family is all dead, idiot."
"I ne'er thought it'd be like this."

name: Sergeant Fulford
text: While Sergeant Fulford is adjacent to another Free Kingdoms fighter, he and adjacent characters gain +1 ATK, AC, and Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hold the line, boys and girls, just like we practiced! We'll get through this together!"

name: Graham Heyward
text:
While adjacent to an equal or higher Level Free Kingdoms, Graham gains Marksmanship +5.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike. Perform a +0 ranged strike.

name: Niobe
text:
While Niobe is spent, she and adjacent Free Kingdoms gain +2 AC and Riposte +5.
Spend Order: Target a Free Kingdoms you control within 2 ranks: Move the target adjacent to Niobe.

setInfos.flavorText: "The gods stir and strain against the bonds."
"I am spirit. It is your thoughts that shape me."

name: Sorrow
text: React: Before target adjacent character suffers wounds, inflict that many wounds on Sorrow: Reduce the wounds being suffered by the target to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: "You'd think it was his name." - Martyr
"Bonebreaker's anguish overshadowed even my own. If he does not return, I hope he finds rest."
"Merrick or Rockhome... it doesn't matter. Wherever we go there is pain and suffering."

name: Profit
text: While in an opposing formation, Profit gains +4 Levels for equipping items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Look here. No more mercenaries for this army, I'd wager."
"Smuggling weapons past the guards is no mean feat in itself, but t'kill would be a lot harder on them."

name: King Alaric
text:
Alaric gains +2 ATK and Skill for each adjacent Dwarf.
React: Once per turn, after a Dwarf you control within one rank is killed and before fixing illegal Ranks: Put a Dwarf of equal or lower Level than the killed character into play from your hand in the killed character's former location with the same orientation.

name: Helt Royalwarden
text:
Helt inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against Daemons and Monsters.
Helt may equip items and use actions on items while he is stunned.
Order: Once per turn, destroy an equipped item: Perform a melee strike.

name: Rust Gargoyle
text: React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Rust Gargoyle: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 6 + total Levels of the target's equipped items) or destroy one item of your choice.

name: Thekk Rockbender
text:
Adjacent Dwarf characters gain the Gargoyle trait.
Your Gargoyles within one rank gain +3 ATK and Powerattack +5.
Dwarf clerics you control may equip one fighter item.

name: Betwys
text: React: Once per turn, after a ready Undead you control is killed: Search your deck for a card with the same name, reveal it and put it into your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "There are always more, willing or otherwise."

name: Morghen the Unliving
text:
After starting armies have been presented, you may search your deck for Dythanus' Essence and equip it.
Order: Up to twice per turn, target a character within one rank: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

name: Shadith Glyn
text: Order: Once per turn, spend a character in this rank: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why should we follow a monster and a madman? At least the sea-elves provide us with the chance to kill humans; Khilkhameth preaches weaknesses like 'patience' and 'planning'. I don't see why Morghen trusts him."
"The elven nation has no more tolerance to give. Our arrows shall serve as ambassadors."
"The elven nation has no more tolerance to give. Our arrows shall serve as ambassadors."

name: Rotale Dythanus
text: Order: Once per turn, kill a higher Level Elf: Perform a +5 melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "An elf's life may be short, but his undeath is eternal."
"An elf's life may be short, but his undeath is eternal."

name: The Lady of Pain
text:
Order: Discard a card: Until end of turn, opposing characters within one rank of The Lady suffer -2 ATK, AC, and Skill.
Order: Once per turn, target a character with negative ATK or Skill: The target suffers one wound.

name: Wall
text: Spend React: Before a strike roll against a Dwarf within 1 rank: The Dwarf gains +5 AC for the duration of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "It feels... reassuring to be behind fortifications again."
"The greatest wall is the one that separates us from Kor."
"This is not the World Below, brothers. This is a place of subtler evils."
"He patrols the ramparts without end. He has known Abyssals and Deverenians aplenty, but never peace." - Gnorrow Yaw
"He has lost everything but his faith." - Claw

name: Krenthor's Maw
text: React: Once per turn, after target opposing character performs a melee strike that missed this fighter: Perform a +3 melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "If this doesn't eat you, I will." - Krenthor Gouge

name: Hashashin Blade
text:
Assassins gain +1 Level for equipping Hashashin Blade.
Order: Spend Hashashin Blade: If the next melee strike this rogue performs this turn is against a spent character, this rogue gains +3 ATK for the strike and the strike inflicts an additional wound.

name: Dythanus' Essence
text:
Lich only.
Order: Equip Dythanus' Essence to an adjacent character regardless of class, Level and Lich trait.
React: Before target Lich you control is killed, shuffle Dythanus' Essence into your deck: Spend the target if possible, remove any wounds, and move him adjacent to this character. The target is no longer killed. Kill this character.

name: Shroud of Lost Souls
text: Order: Spend Shroud of Lost Souls, remove a character in any discard pile from the game, target a character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 11 + Level of the removed character) or suffer a wound (two if this wizard is a Necromancer).

name: Hod's Legacy
text:
Spend Order: Spend Hod's Legacy: Ready target lower Level spent (not stunned) character of the same faction.
Order: Spend Hod's Legacy: Unstun target lower Level character of the same faction.

setInfos.flavorText: "But Hod has deserted us, how can they...?" - Hallur
"As easy as drawing stone from blood." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Shield of the Simurgh
text:
Strikes that inflict more than one wound only inflict one wound against this cleric.
Wounds from strikes against this cleric may not be reduced.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's old and battered, yet it still is imbued with great power. And it's mine." - Ghed Lionel

name: Niobe's Leaf
text: React: Once per turn, after this cleric performs a melee strike that killed the target: Retrieve a character from your discard pile and put it on top of your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Life, death... Both move in a cycle, dancing without rest." - Niobe

name: Thwarted
text:
Spend React: After target character of equal or lower Level performs an action: Spend the target.
Spend React: After target spent character of equal or lower Level pays the costs of an action without spending: Cancel the action.

name: Aegis
text: React: Before target character in this rank suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by two. The target gains Defend +10 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Otherworldly crows roost amongst the Storm's clouds. Faith alone keeps them there." - Niobe
"Otherworldly crows roost amongst the Storm's clouds. Faith alone keeps them there." - Niobe

name: Revigorate
text: Spend Order: Ready target equal or lower Level non-stunned character you control.

setInfos.flavorText: "Get up and fight!" - Mentor
The greatest priests need no sermon to rally their flock; a glance is enough.

name: Crux
text: Crux's melee strikes inflict an additional wound while he is adjacent to two Dwarves.

setInfos.flavorText: "No defeat is absolute." - Ter-Soth
"Your majesty, Alaric needs a new shieldman. Might I make a recommendation?" - Zeal
Of course, some of those who fought alongside Zeal eventually came home...

name: One with the Blade
text: Order: This character permanently gains the ability, "Order: Spend a Weapon equipped to this character: Perform a +0 melee strike." Remove this card from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "Keep 'em coming." Iam Hotelen

name: Commit the Reserves
text: Spend Order: Choose a Level higher than 1: Until end of turn, reduce the entering rank of your characters of the chosen Level by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "And after each battle, there are fewer to commit to the next." - Sir Robert

name: Coup de Grace
text: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike that may only target a spent character. The strike inflicts an additional wound and the die roll is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "No surprise that the elves first coined the term." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Incinerate
text:
Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform two +9 ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "No, Castus. The power the jester has given me is more than real. It is as if the door to another realm has opened." - Yavlo the Kindled
"Let them bring their armies, Castus. I will make of them an ash such as will coat this land for twenty leagues across." - Yavlo the Kindled

name: Lordly Might
text:
Order: All target non-stunned characters within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC = this wizard's Skill) or become stunned.
Spend Order: All target opposing non-stunned characters within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill) or become spent. Spent characters who fail become stunned instead.

name: Anselm Beaucourt
text: While performing a melee strike against an evil character, Anselm gains +3 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "I require no payment, general. Justice is reward enough."

name: Sin-Marduk
text:
Your Daemons are not Unique.
Sin-Marduk may cast wizard spells.
React: After Sin-Marduk performs a melee strike or spell that kills: A Daemon enters play, from your hand, in the former location of the killed character, regardless of formation.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Perform a melee strike that may target an additional rank away.

name: Alex Venator
text:
Alex is both a cleric and a fighter.
Alex may equip any number and class of Familiars.
Alex may begin the game with Aquila and Fenrir equipped.
Alex cannot be killed, stunned, or have his items desroyed by opposing card effects.
React: Once per turn, after killing an opposing character: Search your deck for an action card with the Barbarian, Druid, or Ranger trait printed in its textbox and add it to your hand.

name: Call of the Wild
text:
Cleric and fighter only.
Order: Reveal the top 10 cards from your deck. You may put a character (two characters if this character is a Barbarian, Druid, or Ranger) revealed into play adjacent to this character, even if it causes an illegal rank. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.

name: Aquila
text:
This character does not spend to perform cleric action cards.
Order: Once per turn, perform a +9 ranged strike.
Order: Spend Aquila and target an action card in your discard pile with the Druid trait printed in its textbox: Return that card to your hand.

name: Karena Brightkindle
text: Spend Order: Target a number of your Dwarves within one rank up to Karena's Level: Each target has a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to half the Level of target item equipped to Karena until end of turn.
errata:
If Karena has no item equipped, this ability has no effect and may not be performed.
If the targeted item is later removed, the bonus remains.

name: Pitfall
text: Spend Order: The next time a melee strike targets a character in this rank, Pitfall performs a +8 melee strike targeting the attacking character. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)

setInfos.flavorText: "You know why dragons're always so angry? Look at the size of their lair entrances."
"I do not feel safe in this New Goldenaxe. In the caves, I can trap the enterance, but an attack can come from any side up here."
So much for ten-by-ten corridors.

name: Fenrir
text:
This character does not spend to perform fighter action cards.
React: Before fixing illegal ranks: Move this character forward up to two ranks.
Order: Spend Fenrir and target an action card in your discard pile with the Barbarian or Ranger trait printed in its textbox: Return that card to your hand.

name: The Angel's Vengeance
text:
For each Charge, this character has +2 ATK, +2 AC, +2 Skill, +2 hit points, and +2 Levels.
Other Free Kingdoms in this rank have +2 ATK, +2 AC, +2 Skill, and an additional melee strike (base +4) when attacking.
React: Once per turn per game, after one of your Free Kingdoms in the discard pile is removed from the game: Target other Free Kingdoms permanently gains +3 ATK, +3 AC, and +3 Skill.

name: Iron Golem
text:
Iron Golem may perform the Magic Resistance feat twice per turn.
May only equip Weapons.
If Loki is your Warlord, you may have Iron Golem in your deck despite the Overlord trait.
React: After Iron Golem succeeds with a Magic Resistance check: Perform a melee strike.

name: Blade Hag
text:
May only equip Weapons.
May equip four Weapons.
Blade Hag gains +3 ATK and AC for each equipped Weapon.
Blade Hag gains Powerattack +10 and Riposte +10 if she has three or more Weapons equipped.
Blade Hag gains +2 HP and Levels if she has four Weapons equipped.

name: Into the Breach
text: Order: Until end of turn, while this character is in your front rank, your characters that enter play adjacent to this fighter, or move adjacent to this fighter may immediately attack (spending as normal).

setInfos.flavorText: "Form up!" - Sir Robert

name: Axe of Tergoth (Treasure)
text: This fighter has an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "You see how the runes glow red? Only a very few of these have been forged."

name: Flaming Long Sword
text: Actions by this fighter that produce melee strikes are Fire actions.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do you reckon it's magical?" - Stanley

name: Weeping Crescent
text:
+1 HP
The Chosen only.
This character has an additional melee strike (base his primary ATK) when he attacks.
Order: Destroy Crescent: Ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "It belonged to the last Prince of Thessyria. Now the Daemons have tainted it." - Taisia

name: Mace of Severance
text:
This cleric's melee strikes ignore the Planar trait.
This cleric inflicts no wounds with melee strikes against Planar characters.
React: After target Planar character is hit with a melee strike by this cleric: the target permanently loses the Planar trait and gains +4 AC.

name: Lightstone Gargoyles
text:
You must have a cleric in your army to start with Lightstone Gargoyles or bring them into play.
React: After Lightstone Gargoyles moves into your 1st rank: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "They showed us the way centuries ago, when we first journeyed into the earth. I find that comforting." - Heart
"My first and brightest sons." - Sjonegaard

name: Kess
text:
May not equip a Steed.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank of perform a +3 melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "To call him a horseman is a bit far-fetched but otherwise he fits fine." - Kerebrus

name: Harvester of Souls
text:
Your characters may pay costs that require the killing of a Thrall with opposing Thralls.
React: Before you play a Daemon, kill a Level X Thrall: Reduce the rank the Daemon enters play in by X.

name: Pondstone Necklace
text: Order: Destroy Pondstone Necklace: This character gains +2 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The stones found in the holy ponds are rumored to bestow magical powers."

name: Armlet of the Glade
text: Order: Destroy Armlet of the Glade: This character gains +2 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: The Nymph's jewelry enhances their beauty even more.
