name: Girdle of Fertility
text: Spend Order: Destroy Girdle of Fertility: Shuffle target character from your discard pile into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "The gifts the Nymphs bestow upon humans are very much sought after in places."

name: Niobe's Neckpiece
text: Order: Destroy Niobe's Neckpiece: This character gains +1 to all die rolls until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "They are kind of tight, but make you walk straighter and swing your hips more. Looks weird on a Nothrog though."

name: Blinding Beauty
text:
Nymph only.
React: After target non-Monster, non-Daemon character targets this character with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a Will save (DC = 5 + this character's Skill) or must select another legal target of his choice.

setInfos.flavorText: "This must be heaven." - Arve and Giron

name: Sylvan Crown
text: Actions by this character that produce melee strikes are Water actions.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have no idea what it does, but wearing it you constatly hear the sound of gurgling water. Always makes me want to step outside."

name: Bracers of the Fey
text: This character gains +1 AC against ranged strikes until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "They don't look like much, but they are magical. I did not test them personally, though. I am not mad."

name: Niobe's Leaf (Treasure)
text: React: Once per turn, after this cleric performs a melee strike that killed the target: Retrieve a character from your discard pile and put it on top of your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "These Nymphs get really nasty when you try to take one of those-hence the high price."

name: Sledge
text:
Sledge does not ready during the ready phase.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Ready Sledge.

setInfos.flavorText: "We have fulfilled our duty to the world, will any fulfill their duty to us?"
The anvil lies at rest without the hammer. The hammer shatters bone while the anvil rests.

name: Diadem of the Dryads
text: Order: Destroy Diadem of the Dryads: This character gains Magic Resistance +0 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "These are gifts from the Dryads of the Isle to the court of the beauteous Nymph Queen."

name: Improvisation
text: React: Before this character makes a melee strike or skill check roll: Replace his base ATK with his base Skill for the roll, or vice-versa. If the strike hits or the check succeeds, draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "I didn't need a light source anyway."

name: Lead by Example
text: React: After this cleric kills an opposing character: Until end of turn, this cleric gains Charisma +5 and any adjacent characters gain +3 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "He is ever at the fore, proof that the gods are with us always." - Redu Bir

name: Decompose
text: Order: Target a lower-Level opposing character within three ranks: The target must succed with a Magic save (DC 18) or attach Decompose. While the target has one or more Decompose attached, he gains the Poison trait and must discard a card to ready.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now you know how it feels." - Raclesis

name: Incessant Waves
text: Order: Target up to two characters in an adacent rank: Perform a +5 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds at each target. If the strike hits, spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "He who thinks to drown, cannot fight." - Niobe

name: Replenish
text: Spend Order: Remove up to two wounds or attached action cards from target character you control within two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "What was taken from us, I shall restore." - Inquisitor Dmitir

name: Fire Seeds
text: Spend Order: Target up to three characters within one rank: Remove up to one wound from each target you control. Each opposing target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 7 + this cleric's Skill) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "A gift from the gods. They heal or they destroy, it's up to you." - Niobe

name: Rapid Regeneration
text: Spend React: Before target character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one. The target gains Medicine +7 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Behold what is possible, free from the Elements' hunger!" - Raclesis

name: Speed of the Falcon
text: Spend Order: Target lower Level non-stunned character you control performs an attack without spending.

setInfos.flavorText: "Strive to emulate the bird in flight, young one, seizing upon your prey with no other thought in mind." - Pehtu

name: Phalanx
text: Order: While there are three or more characters in this rank, all characters in this rank gain +2 AC and Defend +5 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, we know that trick as well, thralls." - Set'rokh

name: Tinker
text: Tinker may equip items regardless of class and has +1 Level for equipping items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your primitive intellect couldn't understand things with... alloys."

name: Sudden Reversal
text: React: After target character in your front rank is targeted with a melee strike: Move this fighter forward one rank or within this rank, if possible. If this fighter is adjacent to the target, redirect the melee strike to this fighter, if possible.

name: Wedge
text: Order: While there are three or more characters in this rank, all characters in this rank gain +2 ATK and Powerattack +5 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Put the strongest and fastest on point and let the others fan out from there and broaden the gap, all in one violent push." - Sir Robert of Andover

name: Beyond the Grave
text:
React: Before this fighter is killed: Perform a melee strike. If this fighter is Level 4 or higher, he gains Powerattack +7 for the strike.
React: After this fighter is targeted with an action to spend or stun him: Succeed with a Will check (DC 17) to cancel the action.

name: Accelerated Attack
text: Spend Order: Target a non-stunned lower Level character you control: Move the target forward one rank, if possible. The target may perform a melee strike (base +3 ATK).

setInfos.flavorText: "He pushed off our shields, vaulted over the enemy phalanx and wreaked havoc in their midst. Such style. Such breavery." - Lady Winifred

name: Improved Bull Rush
text:
Order: Move forward one rank.
React: After this fighter moves into your front rank, target an opposing character within one rank: The target must succeed with a Dexterity save (DC 6 + this fighter's ATK) or move backward one rank and become spent.

name: Choke Hold
text: React: After target character performs a melee strike that missed this rogue: Melee strikes against the target gain +3 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "If you're going to try to kill me, the least you could do is make the fight challenging." - Mad Mel
"Get him now!"

name: Flank Attack
text: Spend Order: Spend a rogue within one rank: Perform a +5 melee strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "A simple diversion put them off guard. These are not enemies, they are chaff!" - Set'rokh

name: Backflip
text:
React: After this rogue is targeted with a melee strike: Move backward one rank.
React: After this rogue is targed by a melee strike: Gain +3 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "You're no ordinary slave girl, are you?" - Redu Tam

name: Desecration
text: Spend Order: Remove up to 3 characters in an opposing discard pile from the game, target an equal number of characters within one rank: Each target must succeed with a poison save (DC 12, 17 if the target has the Poison trait) or suffer a wound.

name: Double Shot
text: Order: Stun a ready Bow equipped to this rogue: Perform two +4 ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bah, these goblin bows have a lousy pull, Scyrax!" - Yemat
"Bah, these goblin bows have a lousy pull, Scyrax!" - Yemat

name: Atone
text: Spend React: After Atone enters play, target another Dwarf: Remove one wound from the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "He speaks not of his sins, but since his quest for absolution has continued these past ten yesrs, I for one am content not to know." - Chant
"Our leaders see a corrupted world, but without a king to guide them. We face dark days."
"Heroism isn't about doing things right for others, it's about doing right by others."

name: Now I Am Not
text:
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike. If this rogue is an Assassin, gain +5 ATK for the strike. If the strike killed the target, move to the target's former location, regardless of formation.
Order: Gain Stealth +5 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now I am here, now I am not. And now you are dead." - Talin Tzin

name: Set for the Charge
text:
React: After a character within one rank is targeted with a melee strike: Move forward or backward one rank.
Spend React: Before target stunned character falls forward into his front rank: The target suffers two wounds.

name: The Slightest Cut
text:
Assassins gain +1 Level for performing this action.
React: Before making a melee strike roll: If the target of the strike has one or more wounds, gain +5 ATK for the strike and the strike inflicts an additional wound.

name: Viper Whip
text:
Level 4 or higher wizards perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike that may target an additional rank away. If the strike hits, spend the target before inflicting wounds. This strike does not gain any modifiers or effects from this wizard's items.

name: Blood Price
text: Order: This wizard suffers a wound: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may choose a wizard spell and attach it to this wizard, as if it had been successfully scribed. Shuffle your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Very effective, and very dangerous for mortals." - Sanga-Kish

name: Icy Surge
text:
Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. After the strike, the target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 12) or become spent.
Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike. After the strike, the target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill) or become stunned.

name: Shards
text: Spend Order: Perform a +15 ranged strike. If the strike hits, the target may not have wounds reduced or removed until end of turn (including this strike).

setInfos.flavorText: "Dwarven wizardry in nothing to laugh at, boy!" - Fancy

name: Sunder
text: Order: Target up to two items within two ranks, target the characters that have them equipped: Succeed with a skill check (DC 6 + twice the items' Levels) to destroy the items.

setInfos.flavorText: "You won't need those weapons in the mines, beast." - Atiratu

name: Teleport Object
text: Order: Target an item equipped to target character within three ranks: Succeed with a Spellcraft check (DC 10 + the item's Level, +5 when targeting an opposing character) to return the item to its owner's hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "How nice of you to bring me a gift." - Yahia

name: Venom Vines
text: React: Before this wizard kills target opposing character: Until end of turn, characters in the front rank of the target's formation gain the Poison trait and suffer -2 ATK and AC. If this wizard is a Necromancer, you may put up to two Level 1 characters from your discard pile into play. Remove the target from the game after it dies.

setInfos.flavorText: "I hate Elves." - Set'rokh

name: Feldspar Gargoyle
text:
You must have a cleric in your army to bring Feldspar Gargoyle into play.
React: Before fixing an illegal rank caused by a Dwarf in your army dying: Move Feldspar Gargoyle into the rank in front of the illegal rank.

name: Create Golem
text:
Dwarves gain +1 Level for casting this spell.
Spend Order: remove up to one item and up to one character in your discard pile from the game: Put this card into play adjacent to this wizard as a Level 4 classless character with the Construct trait, +3/+0 ATK, 12 AC, +2 Skill, and 2 HP. If you removed an item, it permanently gains +4 ATK and AC. If you removed a character, it permanently gains +1 HP and has the removed character's feats (at +0) and classes.

name: Aureliane
text: Spend Order: Remove a wound from an adjacent higher Level Deverenian.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sire, the common soldiers are wounded and weak. Give me time to tend to them as I tended you."

name: Squire Cambrie
text: React: After a Level 3 or higher Deverenian in this rank performs an attack: Squire Cambrie performs an attack, spending as normal
errata: In SE, the collector number should be 12.

setInfos.flavorText: "For lack of noble scions even the bastards now are squired. What have we come to?" - Argen d'Ilchant

name: Flavien Genecourt
text:
Flavien and adjacent higher Level Deverenians gain +1 Level for equipping Steeds.
Flavien gains +1 HP while he has a Steed equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "His love for horses alone keeps our knights in action." - Aurelius

name: Dautien
text: React: Once per turn, after target character targets Dautien with a melee strike that was redirected: Perform a melee strike against the target. This strike is a Fire action.

name: Liliane
text:
Liliane's ranged strikes are Fire actions.
Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the number of Fire spells in your discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yavlo, teach me the secrets of fire and I am all yours."

name: Ghed Romus
text: Order: Spend a cleric: Romus gains +4 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Storm doth once again show interest in thine affairs, Inquisitor."

name: Guillaume Rellion
text: Order: Once per turn, target a higher Level Deverenian: Until end of turn, whenever the target rolls a die, if the die roll is less than 6 and not a Critical Failure, change the die roll to 6.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even the ones too young to be squires get embrodied in the war now. When is it going to end?" - Brymin

name: Bataar
text: React: Once per turn, after a character you control performs a Fire action: Perform a +4 ranged strike. This is a Fire action.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have found a people just to my liking." - Yavlo the Kindled

name: Thibaud Rellion
text:
Your Warlord gains +1 to initiative rolls.
React: Once per game, after winning initiative by 10 or more: Thibaud permanently gains +3 ATK, +3 AC, and +1 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "Proper lances and oats are long gone."

name: Morale
text: Lower-Level Dwarves' melee strikes inflict an additional wound while in the same rank as one or more Morales.

setInfos.flavorText: "Few of Ironhall's survivors have made it to Worldfall, and Morale does not speak of the journey." - Kiyar Undying
There is no change. There is only the soul, and its destiny.

name: Lord Aurelius Rellion
text:
Aurelius gains +1 ATK and AC for each other Paladin in this rank.
React: Once per turn, after a character spends a Steed to move: Ready the Steed. This is a Tactics action.

name: Inquisitor Dmitir
text:
Dmitir gains +1 to his Initiative rolls for each Seer you control.
React: After you win initiative: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any number of those cards at the bottom of your deck. Return the rest in the same order.
React: Once per turn, before another Deverenian you control makes a die roll: The die roll is a 10.

name: Sandscoured Gargoyle
text: Order: Once per turn spend a cleric: perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "They are the forgotten ones - enduring out in the desert and waiting for the clans to return." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Valdimar
text: React: Once per turn, after an adjacent Dwarf equips an item: Ready Valdimar.

setInfos.flavorText: "Too young to learn our secrets, yet he benefits from our craft." - Hallvardur

name: Blunder
text: Spend Order: Until end of turn, Blunder gains the ability, "React: After target character targets a character in this rank with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a Dexterity save (DC 10) or suffer a wound. This is a Trap."

setInfos.flavorText: "He's a specialist for traps. If only he would not need all that patching up..." - Kohn

name: Noose
text: React: Once per turn, before a character makes a save roll from a Trap: The save gains +3 DC.

setInfos.flavorText: "His works don't look like much, but they are very effective in keeping our bellies full." - Gethseme Steelshard

name: Fancy
text: Spend Order: Ready target item equipped to a Dwarf in your front rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ornaments were more precious to the Thessyrian court than a straight blade. He still works that that way." - Sigurdur

name: Salvage
text: React: Once per turn, before target Dwarf is killed: Return an Armor, Shield or Weapon equipped to the target to its owner's hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nobody ever cleaned up these battlefields, makes me wonder why. We for sure need all we can get."

name: Hallvardur
text:
React: Once per turn after Hallvardur equips a Weapon: Ready Hallvardur.
Order: Destroy an equipped Level X Weapon: Perform a +X melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "His demeanor proves him a royal guardian, but what is he hiding from us?" - King Alaric

name: Ice Gargoyle
text: React: Once per turn, after target character targets Ice Gargoyle with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 13) or become stunned. This is a Water action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Vicious ones best left alone." - Thekk

name: Mountain
text:
You are considered to have an additional character for determining illegal ranks in the rank behind Mountain.
React: Before Mountain suffers wounds from an opposing character: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Knight, we have a word for heroes like your Sir Geoffery: Villans."

name: Hallur
text:
Hallur may performs Earth action cards regardless of class restrictions and gains +1 Level for performing them.
Spend Order: Until end of turn, Hallur gains +5 AC and does not stun when falling forward.

setInfos.flavorText: "The earth still listened, e'en when the gods wouldn't answer."

name: Hurl
text: Order: Once per turn destroy a Weapon equipped to Hurl: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "He has taken a liking to Sigurdur's axes." - King Alaric

name: Grimur
text: Spend React: Once per turn, before target non-stunned Dwarf suffers wounds from an action by an opposing character: Ready the target or the target performs a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I followed your advice. Last night Kor talked to me. We are not godless anymore!"

name: Sigurdur
text: Order: Twice per turn, equip a card from your hand face down to a Dwarf you control as War Axe, a Level 2 classless item with +3 ATK, the Weapon trait, and the ability "Spend Order: Perform a melee strike that inflict an additional wound."

name: Crypt Guardian
text:
Crypt Guardian gains +2 ATK while performing a melee strike against a character with the Poison trait.
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Crypt Guardian: The target permanently gains the Poison trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Run! The crypt is guarded." - Blunder

name: Ghast
text: React: After target character targets Ghast with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 14) or suffer -2 ATK and gain the Poison trait, until end of turn.

name: Naala
text:
React: Before Naala is discarded from your hand, target a ready character: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 12) or become spent.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target.

name: Kornell Calix
text: While one or more Kornell Calix are in your discard pile, opposing characters with the Poison trait suffer -2 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "The frog, like the spider, contains killing power beyond its stature. Like the elves, it can kill long after its own death."

name: Fayed Dythanus
text: React: After Fayed enters play: Cast a spell from your discard pile. Remove the spell from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dythanus has passed many secrets down his line. They need to be ours." - Tepheroth

name: Atheris
text:
Atheris is a cleric and a rogue.
After a non-Undead within one rank is killed, remove it from the game.
React: Once per turn, after Atheris kills an equal or higher Level character: Atheris permanently gains +1 HP.

name: Prince Alaric
text:
Prince Alaric has +1 AC for each adjacent cleric.
React: Before fixing an illegal rank: If your Warlord is a Dwarf, put Alaric into play from your hand into the rank in front of the illegal rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Where am I?"
Strength is in the body, in courage and steel, Knowledge. So my father taught me.

name: Eldoreth
text:
Eldoreth is a rogue and a wizard and enters play as if he was Level 4.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand: Perform a +4 ranged strike. If the discarded card was a Level 1 or 2 Undead, put the Undead into play in your front rank from your discard pile.

name: Cyrus Netheryn
text: React: After Cyrus enters play, kill a Level X Elf: Put an Undead of Level X or lower into play from your discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "A fine vessel. Allow me a moment to assemble a crew."

name: Remorna
text:
Order: Once per turn, attach a card from your discard pile face down to Remorna: Perform a +4 ranged strike. This is a Water action and a spell.
React: Before Remorna is killed: Reveal all face down cards attached to Remorna. Shuffle all revealed spells into your deck. Remove all other revealed cards from the game.

name: Suul
text: Spend Order: Perform two +4 ranged strikes. Each strike may target up to two additional ranks away, if the target has the Poison trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Feel the Waves' teeth, human."

name: Dark Monolith
text:
May not equip items.
Before Monolith is killed: Reveal all face down cards attached to Monolith. Put up to 7 Levels of revealed Elves into play, if possible. Remove Monolith and all other revealed cards from the game.
Order: Once per turn, attach a card from your discard pile face down to Monolith: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a Magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound.

name: Raclesis
text:
Opposing characters with the Poison trait suffer -2 ATK and Skill.
Order: Once per turn, target a character without the Poison trait within two ranks: Attach a card from your dicard pile face down to the target. While attached, the target gains the Poison trait and the text "After the ready phase: Succeed with a poison save (DC 12) or suffer a wound after spending until end of turn."

setInfos.flavorText: "It's you or me. You better make your first strike count, or I will."

name: Grace Heyward
text: React: After Grace hits with a melee strike. The strike inflicts no wounds: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have never seen one so skilled with a simple dagger." - Devlin

name: Alanna
text: Spend React: After a Free Kingdoms targets a strike: The strike gains +2 to the die roll, is an Earth action and spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "What scandalous attire for one gifted with the power of the earth." - Aithlynn

name: Jethro
text: Order: Once per game, inflict one wound on Jethro: Jethro permanently has an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do not fight it. It is no curse, but nature's loving embrace." - Pehtu

name: Craft
text:
Craft ignores class requirements when equipping items with the Charges trait.
Spend Order: Put a Charge on an item in your army.

name: Devlin Cormac
text: React: After a character you control performs a melee strike that hit: Move Devlin forward or backwards one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "It turned out the woodsmen, light of foot, survived the longest." - Logan

name: Lasco Cormac
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
Spend React: Once per turn, after a Free Kingdoms within one rank performs a ranged strike: The Free Kigndoms performs a +0 ranged strike against the same target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Right into my sights..."

name: Lyconos
text:
Lyconos is a cleric and a rogue and enters play as if he were Level 4.
Order: Once per turn, target a non-Warlord character within one rank: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 17) or he does not ready during the next ready phase.

setInfos.flavorText: "Inhibitions? What for?"

name: Pehtu Mennanakh
text:
Adjacent Lycanthropes and Rangers gain Powerattack +5.
React: After Pehtu enters play: Shuffle a Lycanthrope from your discard pile into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Rathemen were thought to be no more." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Lady Winifred
text:
While Winifred is in your discard pile your characters do not receive any bonuses or penalties from cards in any discard pile.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Free Kingdoms in your discard pile from the game: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "When all seems lost, we still have our faith."

name: Brigid
text: Order: Once per turn, discard a spell, target a character withing two ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 18) or become spent. If the target critically fails, or fails by 10 or more, stun the target instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "How she still charms them is a mystery to me." - Talin Tzin

name: Moira Dunbar
text: React: Once per turn, after Moira succeeds with a Defend check: Ready Moira.

setInfos.flavorText: "My father died for the Duke of Andover. That end is the only part of his legacy I don't intend to uphold."

name: Talin Tzin
text:
Talin may perform the Riposte feat twice per turn.
React: Up to three times per turn, after Talin performs a strike: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kedric taught me to fight on quicksand."

name: Alaya
text: React: After Alaya enters play, shuffle a card from your hand into your deck: Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Chosen eye with mistrust the prophetic power of Alaya, as they cannot fathom it. They would take her life, but the Thralls protect her at all costs." - Graham Heyward

name: Twisted Hyenas
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target character within one rank must succeed with a fear save (DC 13) or become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "They are not content merely to feast upon carrion." - Azam
"They are not content merely to feast upon carrion." - Azam

name: Magnite Gargoyle
text: Magnite Gargoyle gains +1 HP for each adjacent Cleric.

setInfos.flavorText: "Their own king is dead, but the children of the earth willingly aid us still. Their pragmatism is an example to us all, and Kor knows we cannot win without them." - Rockbender
"Even a dwarven town in the world above needs a protector. It will defend this place for time everlasting." - The Broken Earth

name: Ardenal
text:
Ardenal has +1 Level for performing Gargoyle only spells and may cast them as if he were a Gargoyle.
React: Once per turn, before Ardenal suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one.

name: Scaly Sycophant
text:
Sycophant gains +1 HP while a Level 4 or higher Dragon is in play.
Sycophant gains +2 ATK, AC and Skill while a Treasure card is in play.

name: Bog Fiend
text: React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Bog Fiend: Spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not a pure ghoul like our Severed of Flesh, but some being rising naturally within the swamp. I wonder why." - Raclesis

name: Burrowing Basilisk
text: React: Once per turn, after target character is hit with a melee strike by Basilisk: The target suffers one wound the next time he spends or stuns this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Poisonous creatures from the deep desert, their bite can be deadly long after you have slain one." - Lady Tornhawk
"Poisonous creatures from the deep desert, their bite can be deadly long after you have slain one." - Lady Tornhawk

name: Azelot il Dawud
text: Spend React: Before a Monster within one rank is killed: Search your deck for a character with the same name, shuffle your deck and put the character on top.

setInfos.flavorText: "Beasts are bountiful."

name: Jacob Windrider
text: React: After Jacob enters play: He permanently gains the non-Warlord traits, class(es), and alignment of your Warlord.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ever been in an inverted dive with a plummeting Hippogriff?"

name: Azam
text:
If your Warlord is a Mercenary, Azam gains Riding +4.
Azam may equip Steeds regardless of class restrictions.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes I can break these beasts in for you. At a price, of course."
"Yes, I can break these beasts in for you. At a price, of course."

name: Nyla Silvertongue
text: Spend React: Before a character enters play: The character ignores any loyalty penalties.

setInfos.flavorText: "I never lie, Kerebrus. It's just that some men unfortunately read more into what I say to them than I actually said."

name: Landshark
text:
May not equip items.
React: After Landshark performs an attack that hit with the first two strikes: Perform a +7 melee strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "A mindless creature that never lets go. And the stench, once it swallows you... ugh." - Jonah the Burglar
"A mindless creature that never lets go. And the stench, once it swallows you... ugh." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Ebonscourge
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, target a character within one rank: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 15) or suffer two wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even The Chosen fear him." - Logan

name: Causticus
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, target a character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 17) or suffer -5 ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn.

name: Frenzy
text: React: After Frenzy suffers one or more wounds: Frenzy's melee strikes have +6 ATK and inflict an additional wound until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The eastern sky never changes. It's always night there..."
"That's right! Run, ya half-real cowards! The Abyss won't keep you safe from me!"
"The Deverenians had a most appropriate name for him: lunatic." - Purge

name: Queen Yahia
text: Order: Twice per turn, target an opposing character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 14) or perform a melee strike against a target of your choice.

setInfos.flavorText: "To not pay proper respect may prove fatal, milord." - Gustave

name: Gee'ch
text: While performing a melee strike against a character with an item equipped, Gee'ch gains +4 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "They lord it over us with their shiny magic items. I for one am not going to take it anymore!"

name: Ter'til
text: React: After a character performs a Tactics action: Put Ter'til into play from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Prepare the way ahead of my legion. The army needs you as its eyes. Wait for my signal before striking." - Set'rokh

name: Rid'ar'rak
text: React: Once per turn, after a character performs a Tactics action: Gain +4 ATK and Powerattack +5 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Discipline is all. Forget allegiance, save to the warrior beside you, and curb your petty hatreds. I will define your wants from now on." - Set'rokh

name: Kast
text: Spend React: After target Nothrog moves into your front rank: The target performs an attack, spending as normal.

setInfos.flavorText: "Maybe it's time to expand my ambitions beyond this wood..." - Krenthor Gouge

name: Jistik
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike. After the strike, if it hit, the target must succeed with a poison save (DC 10) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fascinating new poisons your forest offers, troll lord."

name: Hovrakk
text: React: Once per turn, after Hovrakk performs a melee strike that killed, target a character that was adjacent to the killed character: Succeed with a Powerattack check (DC 20) to inflict a wound on the target.

name: Scyrax' Spear Streamer
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
React: After target character is hit with a ranged strike by Scyrax' Spear Streamer: The strike inflicts no wounds. Move the target backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fixed it!" - Snegrob
"Lukkot would never have built that... thing." - Goza

name: Korvos
text:
Spend Order: Put a Charge on or remove a Charge from a Nothrog Siege you control.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Found 'dis Flashstick, Scyrax."

name: Vels of Clan Manaka
text:
May not equip items.
While Vels has no Charges he gains +6 ATK and inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge: Perform a +7 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Me luf when 'dem skweek like skoo'ered pigs."

name: Kiyar Undying
text: Order: Remove Kiyar Undying from the game: Ready all your Dwarves in the rank Kiyar Undying was in. (Fix any illegal ranks first.)

setInfos.flavorText: "It is done. Weep not of salvation's price, but at those who refuse it at no cost to them."
"Our king would forsake his kingdom to save it? Insanity!" - Gate

name: Snegrob
text:
Snegrob inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against spent characters.
React: Once per turn, after Snegrob succeeds with a Stealth check: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Scyrax sends me."

name: Ar'dak
text: Spend Order: Target lower Level non-stunned Nothrog within two ranks performs an attack without spending or gains +8 ATK and Powerattack +8. This is a Tactics action.

setInfos.flavorText: "I cannot run, but I can fight! And so can you."

name: Set'rokh
text:
Once per turn Set'rokh may perform a Tactics action without spending.
Spend Order: Once per turn target another non-stunned Nothrog you control: Move the target forward one rank or the target performs a melee strike. This is a Tactics action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Brawn is good. Brawn and Smarts is better."

name: Forest People
text: React: Up to four times per turn, after a character you control is killed: Forest People gain +1 Level until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "These thickets are not yours, bone brows. Leave now, lest the masters punish your trespass."
"They simply call themselves the forest people. For The Chosen, they were easy prey - already they offered gruesome sacrifices to their gods." - Ursala Yscar

name: Amand d'Ilchant
text:
Amand gains +3 ATK and AC while there is a Daemon in this rank.
Spend Order: Kill Amand: Move a Daemon you control forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Thessyrians have captured the Emperor's nephew and... there can be no quarter now." - Aurelius Rellion

name: The Giving
text: React: Before The Giving is killed by a character you control, target any adjacent The Chosen: Until end of turn, the targets gain +4 ATK while performing a melee strike against a spent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Some of the undomesticated yield more than ours." - Naram-Sin

name: Shonta
text: Order: Once per turn: Target other non-Warlord Thrall gains +1 Level until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Galam-Reth has been dispatched to end the threat of the newcomers. The masters are finally taking an interest, and I weep at that."
"That little which the gods cannot give us, the forests can."

name: Bar'rax
text:
May not start in play.
You must spend a The Chosen you control for Bar'rax to enter play from your hand.
Order: Kill a Thrall: Move forward one rank or remove a wound from Bar'rax.

name: Shirti
text: Spend React: After a Thrall is killed by a character you control, creating an illegal second rank: Before fixing the illegal rank, move target Thrall in this rank forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Coming of age, they adopt a name mimicking the sounds of their totem animal, most often the tree snake." - Ursala Yscar

name: Redu Tam
text: React: Before Tam is killed as part of an action's payment: If Tam does not have the Daemon trait, he is not killed but the cost is considered paid, and he permanently gains +5 ATK, -6 AC, +1 HP, and the Daemon and Planar traits. Remove all wounds from Tam.

setInfos.flavorText: "Service is rewarded." - Naram-Sin

name: Rampage
text: Order: Once per turn, remove a Dwarf card in your discard pile from the game: Rampage's melee strikes have +5 ATK and inflict an additional wound until end of turn.

name: Lilith
text: React: Once per turn, after target character is hit with a melee strike by Lilith: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 12 + 2 for each Daemon you control) or suffer a wound and become spent.

name: Nemrah
text: Spend Order: Target an equal or lower Level opposing character within two ranks: The target performs a melee strike (base +3 ATK) against a target of your choice.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nobody knows its real form." - Alaya

name: Mistress Sanai
text:
React: After a Thrall you control is killed as part of an action's payment: Put Charge on Sanai.
Order: Twice per turn, remove three Charges: Ready target The Chosen.
Order: Once per turn: Target non-Warlord character gains the Thrall trait.

name: As'sa
text: Spend React: Once per turn, after a The Chosen within two ranks declares an action whose payment includes killing a Thrall: Perform a melee strike, that inflicts no wounds, against an equal or lower Level non-Warlord character. If the strike hits, the target gains the Thrall trait and is under your control for the duration of the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "It hasn't been seen since." - Samanya

name: Flayer of Dreams
text: Spend Order: Kill up to three Thralls, target all opposing characters in an adjacent rank: Each target must succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 13 + the combined Levels of the killed Thralls) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "To behold him is to lose your mind."

name: Sanga-Kish
text:
Spells cast by Sanga-Kish gain +2 DC and +2 to ranged strikes for each wound on him.
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on Sanga-Kish or kill a Thrall: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may choose a wizard spell and attach it to Sanga-Kish, as if it had been successfully scribed. Shuffle your deck.

name: Mask of Command
text: Order: Once per turn, spend Mask: This character may perform the Charisma feat an additional time this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Obey!" - Naram-Sin

name: Cuirass of the Elements
text: This character gains +3 Skill and AC while targeted with Water, Fire, Earth, or Air actions and +3 Skill against poison saves.

setInfos.flavorText: "It was used by the old empire's messengers - didn't feel cold in the passes nor heat in the desert. Not to mention the poisonous jungle frogs." - Alaya

name: Potion of Strength
text: React: Before target character in this rank targets a melee strike, discard Potion of Strength: The target gains +4 ATK and Powerattack +5 until end of turn.

name: Storm Stela
text: Spend Order: Target an equal or lower Level character in the rank in front of this cleric: The target performs a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Behold the proof: The power of the Storm is on the rise again." - Inquisitor Dmitir
"He abandoned us in the hour of our need, and returns to us after our greatest victory. He is guileful and quick, but never trusted." - Trespass
"Poison takes a bit of clothing from each of his victims-a memory of his duties to the King. He has made a patchwork cloak of his murders, and calls it the defense of a nation." - Kohn Peacehand
"Poison takes a bit of clothing from each of his victims-a memory of his duties to the King. He has made a patchwork cloak of his murders, and calls it the defense of a nation." - Kohn Peacehand

name: Dayaa
text:
Druids with Dayaa equipped gain +2 Skill.
Order: Once per turn, spend Dayaa: Perform a +4 melee strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits spend the target. This strike does not gain any ATK bonuses from this cleric's items.

setInfos.flavorText: "So like the lost ones we held dear." - Pehtu

name: Beacon of Salvation
text:
If this cleric is a Cantor, he gains Charisma +5.
Spend Order: Choose ATK or AC: While in this rank, other characters gain a bonus equal to this cleric's Level to that stat, until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The daemons fear the light." - Sister Amanda

name: Potion of Vigor
text: Order: Destroy Potion of Vigor: Unstun target character within one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "No, it doesn't work the way you think it does!" - Niobe

name: Caliphate Mail
text: React: Once per turn, before another target character within one rank suffers wounds: The target gains +1 HP until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The script says the Caliph was the High Priest in ancient Thessyria and that with the office came an armor of extraordinary power." - Samanya Dumisa

name: Dunewalker's Staff
text: React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by this cleric, spend Dunewalker's Staff: Move the target backward one rank (two ranks if this cleric is a Druid).

setInfos.flavorText: "It unleashes the power of the Desert Winds, revered by the people of the Sands." - Azam

name: Imperial Chariot
text: Order: Spend Imperial Chariot: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The prince's chariot was enchanted to inspire his followers and thus made him near invincible in open battle." - Samanya Dumisa

name: Spear
text: React: After you win initiative: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "It offers all you need for a great army: It has reach, it is cheap, and you need hardly any training for it." - Naram-Sin

name: Spiked Spaulders
text: React: Twice per turn, after target character targets this fighter with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 12) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "The warrior who seeks to prevail on the battlefield seeks every advantage he can." - Set'rokh

name: Belt of Bear
text: If this fighter is a Barbarian, he may perform the Powerattack feat an additional time per turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "You need to let Bear become part of you for it to work properly." - Hrunting
"You need to let Bear become part of you for it to work properly." - Hrunting

name: Wildman's Mail
text: React: Once per game, before target character is killed with a melee strike by this fighter: Wildman's Mail permanently gains an AC bonus equal to the target's HP. If this fighter is a Barbarian then Wildman's Mail also permanently gains an equal bonus to ATK. Remove the target from the game after it dies.

name: Mirin Faithbearer
text: Spend React: Before target character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one and move the target backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kor does not turn his back upon his faithful, but we are allied to evil as great as the Abyss. What path can we take now?"
"You are mortal, Xod. Weak. Kor has faith in you anyway. Trust in him, and you will never falter."

name: Sandbox
text:
Spend React: Before your Warlord makes an initiative roll: He gains +5 to the roll. This is a Tactics action.
React: After you win initiative, destroy Sandbox: This fighter performs an Order.

name: Scimitar
text: React: After this fighter performs an attack: An adjacent character performs an attack, spending as normal.

setInfos.flavorText: "The traditional Thessyrian design. Even the gods could not change it." - Redu Tam
"The traditional Thessyrian design. Even the gods could not change it." - Redu Tam

name: Krenthor's Club
text: React: Once per turn, before this fighter makes a melee strike roll, suffer -5 ATK for the strike: The strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Krenthor found deep in mud. Very hard. Bash all."

name: Rellion Truebred
text:
Order: Once per turn, spend Truebred: Move forward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, spend Truebred, discard a card: The next melee strike performed by this fighter this turn gains +4 ATK and inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Rellion's finest are bred both for strength and speed."

name: Dreamsand
text: React: After target ready character is targeted with a melee strike by this rogue, spend Dreamsand: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 13) or become spent.

name: Thorns of Anger
text: React: Once per turn, after target character is hit with a melee strike by this rogue: Until end of turn, any melee strikes performed by the target must target this rogue, if possible.

setInfos.flavorText: "The vendor told me it'd protect against all kinds of lizards, too. Does not. Dragons it just riles up." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Dirk
text: This rogue's melee strikes ignore AC bonuses from Armor, Helms, and Shields.

setInfos.flavorText: "Always little spots there are you can sneak this one in to find weak, weak flesh, yes." - Gee'ch

name: Dragon Pipes
text:
If this rogue is a Bard, he may perform Fire actions regardless of class restrictions.
React: Before targeting a strike, discard a card: The strike gains +3 to the die roll, is a Fire action and a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "Whoa!" - Keziah

name: Tiger Trap
text: React: After target opposing ready character moves into an adjacent rank without spending, spend Tiger Trap: The target must succeed with a Reflex save (DC 15) or become spent.

name: Whirling Swamp Spear
text: React: After this rogue performs a melee strike that killed: Perform a +2 ranged strike. This is a Water action and a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "Got this from a little nymph I netted myself. Does not work for me as well as the nymph did, though." - Scyrax

name: Bonebreaker
text: React: Once per turn, after a melee strike kills another Dwarf in this rank: Perform a melee strike targeting the attacking character.

setInfos.flavorText: "He once championed the alliance to the Deverenians, but even he wonders at the Eternal Emperor's evil." - Hope
"I've taken the cloth of too many soldiers. I have too many destinies to meet."

name: Poison Arrows
text:
May be equipped by Rangers, ignoring class restrictions.
This rogue's non-spell ranged strikes gain +2 to the die roll.
React: After target character is targeted with a non-spell ranged strike by this rogue, remove a card in your discard pile from the game: If the strike hits, the target gains the Poison trait until end of turn and must succeed with a poison save (DC 15) or become spent.

name: Swordman's Cape
text: This rogue may perform the Riposte feat an additional time per turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Catch your opponent off-balance or use it as a last resort - it's always good to have." - Talin Tzin

name: Green Dragon Essence
text:
Order: Equip Essence to an adjacent character, regardless of class restrictions.
Order: Destroy Essence: Perform a +3 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, until end of turn, the target suffers -3 ATK, AC, and Skill and may not maneuver.

name: Dark Heart of Kylnion
text: Order: Succeed with a Scribe check (DC 20) to attach a spell from your discard pile to this wizard, as if it had been successfully scribed, otherwise suffer a wound. Remove Dark Heart from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "I found it where you said it would be, master. But I nary know what to do with it." - The Lady of Pain

name: Castux
text:
+2 Skill
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on a character within one rank: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the wounded character's Level (gain +2 if the character was a Thrall).

setInfos.flavorText: "They favor mistresses and are extremely jealous." - Atiratu

name: Flying Carpet
text: Order: Spend Flying Carpet, target up to one adjacent character: Move both this wizard and any target forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The only one left supposedly carried the last princess of Thessyria to safety. She was never heard from again." - Samanya Dumisa

name: Gravity Rod
text: Order: Spend Gravity Rod, target a character within four ranks: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 14) or count as an additional character for determining illegal ranks until end of turn. Characters may choose to fail the save. This is an Earth action.

name: Incendiary Glove
text:
React: Once per turn, after target character targets this wizard with a melee strike: Perform a +3 melee strike against the target. This is a Fire action.
Order: Spend Incendiary Glove: Perform a +3 ranged strike. This is a Fire action.

setInfos.flavorText: "It seems to have a life of its own." - Yavlo

name: Heart of Embers
text: React: Once per turn, after target character suffers exactly one wound from a spell cast by this wizard: The target suffers one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ohhh, that's a hot one!" - Muddflek

name: The Broken Earth
text:
Broken Earth is a cleric and a fighter.
Your other Gargoyles have the ability "Spend React: Before Broken Earth dies, kill this Gargoyle: Broken Earth does not die, destroy all his equipped items, remove all wounds from him, ready him and move him to this Gargoyle's former location.

name: Black Sun Helm (Treasure)
text: This fighter gains +1 Level for equipping items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Most of them have been lost in the cataclysm. Which is great-it drives the price up!"

name: Blade of Syneri (Treasure)
text:
+1 HP
Mercenary only.
This character has an additional melee strike (base his primary ATK) when he attacks.
Order: Destroy Blade: Ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Made by the foul Archmage Syneri, now it can be turned to good uses." - Kerebrus

name: Blue Wyrm Helm (Treasure)
text: React: After target character targets this character with an action that does not produce a melee strike, spend Blue Wyrm's Helm: Perform a +4 ranged strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's supposed to do that, but I haven't tried myself."

name: Cei
text:
Actions by Cei that produce melee strikes are Fire actions.
Cei gains +5 AC and Skill while targeted with Fire actions by other characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fire has other uses besides destruction, Deverenian."

name: Double Bladed Sword (Treasure)
text: React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that hit, spend Double Bladed Sword: If the strike roll was 11 or better, this fighter performs a melee strike with an ATK equal to the previous strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothrog in front, Elf behind you? Then this is the weapon you need!"

name: Dragon Buckler (Treasure)
text:
This fighter inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that hit, target up to two items equipped to the target of the strike that provide an AC bonus: Destroy the items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Made from a younger Dragon's scales, more supple."

name: Dueling Saber (Treasure)
text: Order: Spend Dueling Saber: Target a character within one rank, who performs a melee strike targeting this fighter. Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "It was the weapon used by Araphone Genecourt!"

name: Fors
text:
React: After Fors enters play, kill a Thrall: Fors permanently gains the fighter class and +4 ATK.
Spend Order: Target all opposing characters within one rank: Each target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 17) or suffer a wound.

name: Golden Circlet (Treasure)
text: Order: Spend Golden Circlet, remove a card in this rank from the game: Perform a +4 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "What do you mean 'Is it made of real gold'?"

name: Heat Metal
text:
Druids perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks: For each equipped item he has, the target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 13) or suffer a wound for each failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your weapons are not welcome here." - Niobe

name: Priam Ironsoul
text:
Each of your ranks with at least one character in front of it may contain an additional character before becoming illegal.
React: Once per turn, after Priam performs an action which reduced or removed wounds from a target Dwarf: Ready the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "This not a time of men, but of heroes."

name: Ice Elemental
text:
Fire actions ignore Ice Elemental's Planar trait and inflict an additional wound on it.
React: After target character is hit by a melee strike by Ice Elemental: The target must succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 15) or become stunned.

name: Ivory Scepter (Treasure)
text: Order: Spend Ivory Scepter, target an opposing character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 8 + number of characters in your discard pile) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Made of Mammoth tooth. Don't show it to a Nothrog."

name: Long Bow (Treasure)
text: Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, the bone is probably from humans, fused by unholy elven magic. But now I use it against them." - Graham Heyward

name: Lothian, Law-Hammer (Treasure)
text:
+1 HP
Deverenian only.
This character has an additional melee strike (base his primary ATK) when he attacks.
Order: Destroy Lothian: Ready this character.

setInfos.flavorText: "If Deverenia had a rightful rule, he would wear this hammer with pride." - Brymin

name: Phraistos
text:
Magic saves from Phraistos' actions gain +5 DC for each wound on the target.
Order: Once per turn, target an opposing non-Warlord character within one rank: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 10) or any wounds on the target are removed and it permanently comes under your control.

name: Red Wyrm's Mail
text: This fighter gains +5 AC and Skill while targeted with Fire actions by other characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "No fair!" - Yavlo the Kindled

name: Spawn of Ellil
text:
Spawn may not equip items and does not enter play normally.
Put spawn on top of its owner's deck after attacking.
React: After a character you control targets an Air action: Put Spawn into play from your hand adjacent to the target of the action, regardless of rank or formation.

name: Sigrida Valora
text:
After starting armies are revealed, search your deck for a Helm, Armor or Shield card of Level 8 or lower and put it in your hand.
Order: Spend one of your Dwarf wizards: Ready an item equipped to Sigrida.

setInfos.flavorText: "Svanna protected Xod as Xod protects us."

name: Commander Kaiten
text:
Your Level four or higher Deverenian Paladins may cast Level 1 and 2 cleric spells.
Your Deverenian Paladins gain +2 ATK, AC, and Skill while they have a Steed equipped.
React: After you win initiative: Target Paladin performs an attack, spending as normal.

setInfos.flavorText: "...and so begins our mission of justice."

name: Count Brutan
text: Spend Order: Perform a +7 melee strike against target stunned character. Brutan gains Powerattack +10 for the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Honor only applies when fighting honorable opponents, Thessyrian. You I shall put down like the dog you are."

name: Gorlen the Pitiless
text:
Gorlen is a fighter and a wizard and enters play as if he were Level five.
React: Once per turn, after Gorlen performs a melee strike that killed: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Gorlen may cast or attach, as if scribed, one revealed spell. Shuffle your deck.

name: Inquisitor Slayne
text:
While Slayne is adjacent to your Warlord, your Warlord gains +3 to initiative rolls.
React: After you win initiative: Target higher Level Deverenian gains +2 ATK until end of turn.

name: Mother Deiane
text: Spend React: After a strike targets a Deverenian you control: Cancel the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: The priestess stood inviolate. This proof of The Storm's power left the tribes of fire with no choice but to admit defeat.

name: Sir Chretien Rellion
text: React: Before Chretien suffers wounds, spend an equipped Steed: Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "You shouldn't be so free with the life of your steed. Treasure your horse as a companion, and not a tool to be used and discarded." - Temur

name: Sir Treguard
text: React: After Sir Treguard succeeds with a Defend check: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "These people are under my charge, just as this city doth belong to Deverenia. Be on thy way thrall, and tell thine masters to make peace with their false gods. Our commander is eager to meet with them."

name: Sister Wanda
text: Wanda gains +1 ATK and AC for each Paladin or Stormwraith in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Aye, she is a blood relation, but we both owe more to The Storm than each other. When I call her sister, it is not with compassion, but the respect I would show any servant of the church." - Commander Kaiten

name: Squire Marie
text: While Marie is adjacent to your Warlord, your Warlord gains +1 ATK, AC, and Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Once a happy girl, she has seen too much now. You never hear any light tunes from her anymore." - Brymin

name: Temur
text: React: Once per turn, after target character's melee strike is redirected: The new target of the strike must succeed with a Riposte check (DC 15) to perform a melee strike against this action's first target. This is a Tactics action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Armor and magic do not win wars alone. Truely, Knight, you will benefit from our spirit."

name: To the Pain
text: Spend Order: Kill this character: Kill a target non-Warlord character within three ranks if he target is of lower Level and has no items equipped.
errata: If the target manages to equip an item or gain a level after being targeted, it doesn't die.

setInfos.flavorText: "You dare to steal from the Temple of Lore?" - Xienar

name: Vilina Steadfast
text: Order: Once per turn, target one of your Dwarf clerics within one rank: Vilina has a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the target's Level until end of turn.
errata:
The bonus is set when the action's cost is paid.
If the target leaves play, the bonus remains.

setInfos.flavorText: I have read the expectations of humans; it is only fair that we give them what they want.

name: Trespass
text: Spend Order: If Trespass is in the second rank, succeed with a Stealth check (DC 24) to move him to the first rank of a different formation.

setInfos.flavorText: "We do horrible things to put the world aright. Take pride in your work, boy - it's the highest duty any dwarf can know."
"Poison has abandoned us. I charge you with his duties." - King Xod

name: Tybert the Worthy
text: Spend React: After a character you control within one rank is targeted with a strike or action: Redirect the strike or action to a Level 3 or lower character in the same rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Worthy of my trust?" - Kaiten

name: Amber Gargoyle
text: React: Before Amber Gargoyle is killed, spend a cleric: Put Amber Gargoyle into your hand after it dies.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't think of its size. Look for the weak spots. Tell me it has a weak point." - Reynold

name: Barb
text: React: After an opposing character fails a save from a Trap: Move Barb forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Traps are effective. I just wish they weren't so messy."

name: Coral Gargoyle
text: React: After Coral Gargoyle is targeted with a Water action, spend a cleric: Cancel the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "The perfect amalgam of water and earth. Much harder than mud, too." - Thekk

name: Fortress
text:
Fortress' Traps gain +4 to DC saves.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Retrieve a Trap from your discard pile and put it into your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "If it gets shattered anyway, you might as well reuse whatever you got."

name: Fridgeir
text: React: Before another character in this rank suffers a wound, spend an equipped Shield: Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Every Dwarfhold has their legendary heroes. Most often times they are long dead." - Chant

name: Isolfur
text: React: Before Isolfur suffers a wound: Isolfur gains +5 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Chosen tend to avoid the mountains. Not because of the cold, but because of me."

name: Mend
text: Gargoyles in this rank gain +3 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "I fear this land will never be a home to us."

name: Pendulum
text: React: Once per turn, after target character within one rank makes a Trap save roll: Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Can't always rely on a trap to finish a Nothrog. Bloody tough, they are."

name: Pinion
text:
May equip two Traps.
React: After target character targets one of your Dwarves within one rank with a strike: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 14) or suffer a wound, the strike is canceled, and this react may not be used again until end of turn. This is a Trap.
Order: Once per turn: Ready a non-stunned Level 5 or lower Trap.

name: Javvyn
text:
React: Before Javvyn is killed by target opposing character: Attach Javvyn to the target.
While Javvyn is attached to a character, that character does not prevent the rank behind him from being illegal.

name: Quicksilver Gargoyle
text: React: Once per turn, before Quicksilver Gargoyle suffers a wound: Ready Quicksilver Gargoyle. This action may be performed while stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Earth's blood can take many forms. Be glad that it is on our side." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Snare
text: Spend React: After target character targets a character in this rank with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 16) or suffer a wound and the strike is canceled. This is a Trap.

name: Ardanaalis
text: React: After entering play from the discard pile: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Forget the humans. It is the Vaneris that interest me now. Them and their bubble of a kingdom." - Morghen the Unliving

name: Ayaaba Waverunner
text: Spend Order: Put a Level 1 or 2 Undead from your discard pile into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Vaneris, too, learned to make good use of their resources. And the sea has so many more of those resources to offer. The forest just can't compare, Ebal." - The Lady of Pain

name: Caliopea
text:
Caliopea's spells gain +2 to DC saves and strike rolls against characters with the Poison trait.
React: After target opposing character is targeted by Caliopea: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or permanently gain the Poison trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fall in disgrace and the Queen will fuse you with her venomous pets." - Leelu

name: Diirena Ebb
text:
React: Once per turn, after a character performs a Water action: Move forward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, discard the top card of your deck: Perform a melee or +4 ranged strike. This is a Water action and a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "You've been around humans too long, brother."

name: Ebal
text: React: After entering play: Target non-stunned opposing character with the Poison trait must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is natural selection that sets elvenkind in its position of dominance. Why should any hide themselves beneath the waves?"

name: Flesh-Feeder
text: React: Once per turn, after target character with the Poison trait is hit with a melee strike by Flesh-Feeder: The target suffers a wound. You may remove a wound from Flesh-Feeder.

setInfos.flavorText: "Zombies decay and collapse, but my creations can sustain themselves by feeding on the living. They are infinitely superior." - Raclesis

name: Hydriel
text:
Your Elves' Water actions gain +1 to DC saves and strike rolls.
Fire actions against your Elves suffer -1 to DC saves and strike rolls.

setInfos.flavorText: Deverenians discovered the Vaneris before the elves, but with their magic undone, none lived to tell of it.

name: Leelu
text:
Leelu gains +1 Level for casting Water spells.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike. This is a Water action.

setInfos.flavorText: "In the waters I have found a kindred spirit. Together, the two of us could save the elven peoples from the madness and evil that threatens to drown their souls." - Yanthorine

name: Maingal Tansiq
text: While you have 12 or more cards in your discard pile Maingal Tansiq has +4 ATK, +4 AC, +1 HP, the Paladin trait, and the text "Wounds from this character's melee strikes may not be reduced."

setInfos.flavorText: "My hunger is sated... for now."

name: Thalaasa
text:
Thalaasa's spells are Water actions.
Spend React: After the decree phase, remove up to four spells in your discard pile from the game, target all opposing characters within three ranks: Each target must succeed with a stamina save (DC 9 + 2 per removed spell) or suffer a wound and may not ready during the next ready phase. This is a Water action.

setInfos.flavorText: "They call her Terror from the Deep." - Alera

name: The Moon and the Sea
text:
The Moon's actions that produce strikes are Water actions.
React: After target opposing character is hit with a melee strike by The Moon: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or perform a melee strike against a target of your choice.

setInfos.flavorText: "On a full moon fishermen tell a tale of a terrible hunter walking on the sea." - Blacknose

name: Undead Sahuagin
text:
While adjacent to Undead Sahuagin, opposing characters gain the Poison trait.
React: Before Undead Sahuagin is killed: All opposing characters witin one rank gain the Poison trait until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "One plague carrier can destroy a village. I will unleash hundreds." - Raclesis

name: Captain Alera
text:
Your Rangers may equip two Weapons.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
React: After an opposing character enters play: Put a character into play. If you put a Lycanthrope into play, it may maneuver.

setInfos.flavorText: "War? What's in it for us?"

name: Eloise
text: React: Once per turn, after Eloise is targeted by a strike: Eloise gains +4 AC for the duration of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's rude to stare."

name: Ersten Cormac
text: React: After another Free Kingdoms moves without spending or stunning: Move Ersten forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The first time is awkward. Despite the amulet working just fine you think you are drowning. After a while, though, you learn to appreciate the beauty of the depths."

name: Llyr Veterans
text: While Llyr Veterans is in the discard pile, your Warlord gains the ability: "Order: Remove Llyr Veterans from the game: Search your deck for a Level 1 Free Kingdoms and put it into your hand."

setInfos.flavorText: "Will any of us ever go back to Llyr?"

name: Maddock Yscar
text: While adjacent to a cleric, Maddock has an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: Without the influence of their elders, the Yscarites descended into bestial fury, all trace of their humanity lost. They needed a guide to save them from themselves.

name: Reese
text:
Reese may perform the Marksmanship feat on ranged strikes from spells.
Spend Order: Perform two +2 ranged strikes. This is a Water action and a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Vaneris are increasing their attacks. They hunt our ships coming back laden heavy from their raids."

name: Reynold
text:
Reynold is a fighter and a rogue and enters play as if he were Level 4.
Spend Order: Once per turn: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +0 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away.

name: Jigoral
text: Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The threats of daemons are nothing compared to the promises of the monsters in my head. Indeed, it's The Chosen that will learn to know terror from our Lady of Pain."
"They whisper, they instruct, they make me do terrible things! Drown the voices in screams my lady, please please please..."
"They whisper, they instruct, they make me do terrible things! Drown the voices in screams my lady, please please please..."
"Kennet sings softly to him at night. He lives for her, and her alone." - Eirlas
"Never steal from a Deverenian sorcerer, or you'll end up like Jigoral, muttering in unknown tongues and possessed by a thousand demons." - Valanthe
"Never steal from a Deverenian sorcerer, or you'll end up like Jigoral, muttering in unknown tongues and possessed by a thousand demons." - Valanthe

name: Rolando
text: React: After Rolando enters play, target an equal or lower Level character: Move Rolando forward one rank. Move the target forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The seagulls will always tell you about the winds. You just need to ask."

name: Selkie
text: React: Once per turn, after a higher Level Lycanthrope attacks: Selkie gains +3 ATK, +3 AC, and Powerattack +5 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I love to see the innocence in their childish play. I fear that is just one of the many things we will lose in this war." - Niobe

name: Shannon the Daring
text:
Adjacent Level 1 and 2 characters gain +2 ATK.
React: Once per turn, after Shannon enters play or performs a melee strike: Level 1 and 2 Free Kingdoms in your front rank gain +2 ATK and AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is whispered that she has found the old god of the sea." - Captain Alera

name: Snuff Garrett
text: Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "These Fish Devils are a true pest to any ship. Throw them overboard and their mistress just sends them back with amber-glowing eyes."

name: Tabisia
text: React: Twice per turn, after target character is hit with a melee strike by Tabisia: If the target is spent, perform a melee strike against it after the current strike resolves. If the target is ready, it becomes spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hers is the blood of ancient kings." - Captain Alera

name: Angry Crew
text:
May not equip items.
React: After a Siege in this rank is killed: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "If you destroy their engines, it only makes their crew all the madder to get you." - Scyrax

name: El'can the Wily
text: Spend Order: Target Nothrog gains Stealth +4 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "He stole the title from a Deverenian. No one ever found the body." - Grilt Fenwalker

name: Grilt Fenstalker
text:
Grilt's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against stunned characters.
React: Once per turn, before targeting a melee strike: If Grilt is in the front rank of your formation, the strike may target an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nobody pays attention to a threat unseen."

name: Kel'suk
text:
Kel'suk is a fighter and a rogue and enters play as if he were Level 5.
Kel'suk's melee strikes inflict an additional wound.
React: Once per turn, after killing an opposing character with a melee strike: Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Chosen hide behind pathetic foot soldiers. I want a real challenge."

name: Mollo
text: Order: Once per turn, target an opposing Warlord whose player has one or more cards in hand: The player reveals a random card from their hand, then chooses to discard that card or allow Mollo to perform a melee strike (base ATK = Level of the revealed card).

setInfos.flavorText: "Mine, something for me."

name: Kariel Glyn
text: Spend React: After an opposing character kills an adjacent character: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Glyn slew Glyn not so long ago, and now we're to keep the other Houses in line."
"We expected casualties, of course, but never due to arrowheads of bone."

name: Ra'Zul
text:
May not equip Armor or Helms.
Ra'Zul's melee strikes from an attack inflict an additional wound for each wound he has.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Remove a wound from Ra'Zul or Ra'Zul suffers one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "He drinks troll blood before a battle, something Krenthor may never know." - Set'rokh

name: Re'Tal
text: React: Once per turn, after Re'Tal succeeds with a Riposte check: Re'Tal inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Harvester is dead. No need to hide any longer! For Krenthor!"

name: Sappers
text:
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, after Sappers kill an opposing character: Put a Siege into play from your hand or move target Siege you control forward one rank.

name: Zen'tis
text: React: Once per turn, after target character is targeted with a strike by a Nothrog within one rank: If the strike hits, move the target backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The swamps and forests themselves don't want you here. Neither do I."

name: Bal-Benoth
text: You must kill a Thrall for Bal-Benoth to enter play.
errata: Erratum 2012/05/05: The static text should read "Bal-Benoth must kill a Thrall you control in order to enter play."

setInfos.flavorText: "What if the savages defeated the Harvester? You are not meant to feel fear! Must I blind you to wring obedience from your hide? Very well. I do know that your kind feels pain..." - Atiratu

name: Blood Cauldron
text:
May not equip items or play action cards.
React: Once per turn, before a Thrall you control is killed as part of an action's payment: Put a Charge on Cauldron.
Spend Order: Look at the top X cards of your deck, where X is the number of Charges on Cauldron. You may reveal a Thrall from the cards and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Garowl
text: Spend Order: Kill a Level X Thrall, target up to X characters: Remove a wound from each target.

setInfos.flavorText: "The old willingly give their lives that the young and the strong-the favorites of the gods-may be saved from death. It is a selfless act, not monstrous by any means." - Nin-Gula

name: Hastari
text: React: After Hastari performs a melee strike that hit by 5 or more or was a Critical Success: Search your deck for a Level 1 or 2 Daemon and put it into play. At end of turn, kill the Daemon or a Thrall you control.

setInfos.flavorText: "I tire of these pirates. Let's see them try to sink a daemon." - Mistress Tamine

name: Master Ezdeha
text:
Ezdeha's actions that produce strikes are spells and cannot be cancelled.
React: Before a character you control is killed by a character you control: Move Ezdeha forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "With the Harvester fallen, we must quash the disruptive elements immediately."

name: Master Fabas
text:
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Until end of turn, Fabas gains +4 ATK, the Planar and Daemon traits, and the ability "Fabas' melee strikes ignore AC bonuses".
React: Once per turn, before a Thrall you control is killed as part of an action's payment: Perform a +3 melee strike.

name: Nuhad Glyn
text: While you have fewer characters in your first rank than each opposing first rank, Nuhad Glyn has the ability: "Order: Once per turn: Perform a +3 ranged strike."

setInfos.flavorText: "The Houses scramble to regain their former power."
"Perhaps you need a king instead, Bren?"

name: Mistress Tamine
text: Spend Order: Kill a Level X Thrall: Perform X +4 ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "These raiders think that they are free, yet by refusing the help of the gods and daemons they have become slaves to their own need. Without this city to prey on, they would starve and die."

name: Nin-Gula
text:
React: Once per turn, before a Thrall you control is killed as part of an action's payment: Target Thrall gains +1 HP until end of turn.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Target non-Daemon The Chosen that has not gained any permanent bonuses gains +2 (+3 if the Thrall was Level 3 or higher) ATK, AC, and Skill permanently.

name: Pazu-Gara
text: Pazu-Gara gains +3 ATK and AC for each adjacent non-Thrall The Chosen.

setInfos.flavorText: "Thralls must be supervised closely in time of war, lest their devotion waver. We will apply this lesson learnt from the past to our own battles." - Master Ezdeha

name: The Devoted
text: Spend React: Before The Devoted are killed: Search your deck for a copy of The Devoted and put it into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "My children are plenteus and ever-ripe with seed. While I lament their deaths, ever are there more willing to do the gods' work." - Nin-Gula

name: The Promised
text: Your non-Thrall non-Daemon The Chosen gain the ability, "Order: Kill The Promised: Put a Daemon from your discard pile on top of your deck".

setInfos.flavorText: "To birth the daemon is without pain, thralls. Now join me in song to welcome it to our world, alongside the delighted screams of The Promised." - Nin-Gula

name: Winti
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
React: Before Winti is killed as part of an action's payment: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The culmination of a life well-lived is the ending of it. This is no time for sorrow, as even the last, gasped breath can be given for something wondrous." - Nin-Gula

name: Bosun Blacknose
text: Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike. If the strike hits, spend the target before inflicting wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nobody knows how he did it, but when the blacksand went up, all he showed for it was his nose half burned off." - Alera

name: Dragon Turtle
text:
Dragon Turtle gains +4 AC while ready.
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target all characters in an adjacent rank: Each target must succeed with a constitution save (DC 18) or suffer one wound. Characters who fail the save by 10 or more suffer an additional wound. This is a Water action.

name: Drasek Berenj
text:
Spend React: Before you put a Dragon into play: Reduce the Dragon's entering rank by one.
Order: Once per turn, target an opposing character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or move backward one rank and become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Isn't that an exotic looking male. Just my kind of guy. Wait here." - Keziah

name: Dryad
text: Spend Order: Move a Monster in the rank behind Dryad forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "In times of compassion they can guide the lost traveler back to the path, but they are fickle creatures. Just as often, they lead the unwary to a Brine Fiend nest." - Dame Martha

name: Kelaris
text:
Kelaris may apply Marksmanship to ranged strikes from spells.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Ten still live, but precariously. One of their number is ours now."
"The Deverenians think they alone are masters of war magic? Fools."

name: Green Hag
text: React: Once per turn, after Green Hag or an adjacent Warlord targets an opposing character with an action, target a character within two ranks: The target suffers -2 AC and Skill until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nasty carrion eater she is. More than once has stolen my kills." - Grilt Fenwalker

name: Leviathan
text:
May not equip items.
React: After target ready character is hit with a melee strike by Leviathan: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 15) or become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "On one of these the Vaneris built their first city." - Captain Alera

name: Sahuagin Shaman
text: React: After a character in this rank is targeted with a Water action: Succeed with a Magic Resistance check (DC 25) to cancel the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Some of them are freaks of nature. They never stop growing and are the only one able to withstand the rigors of channeling magic." - Alera

name: SS-Slik
text: React: After SS-Slik enters play: If your Warlord is a Mercenary, SS-Slik gains +2 ATK and Powerattack +8 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "We have done well here for a long time. Too long for a new plan to disrupt! Who is Shah'syss to demand we follow him?"

name: Udar
text:
Udar's strikes inflict an additional wound against higher Level characters.
Order: Spend your Warlord: Move Udar forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Open warfare benefits neither side in the hungry Fire Wastes. It is far more efficient for but a single man to die, his tribe defeated yet alive."

name: Zendik
text: Spend Order: Target stunned character does not count as a character for preventing illegal ranks until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Preparation is everything. To tire in the wastes is to be swallowed by their sands, and forgotten by the world. Even worse is to then return..."

name: Call to War
