text: Spend Order: Target up to one (three if this cleric is in the front rank) opposing character(s) in an opposing front rank: Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 6 + this cleric's Skill) or move backward one rank. Move X characters you control forward one rank (X = number of targets that failed), if possible.

name: Debilitating Venom
text: Spend Order: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a poison save (DC 10, +5 if this cleric is in the front rank, +10 if the target has the Poison trait) or permanently lose one HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "Watch your step. The yellow-headed bushwhacker makes you weak as a kitten if it doesn't kill you outright." - Maxt Stormcrow

name: Distribution
text: React: Before target Level X opposing character is killed with a melee strike by this cleric: Remove up to X wounds from other characters in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Well, we distribute their blood to the ground and bandages. Sounds fair, doesn't it?"

name: Fervor
text: React: Before another character makes a melee strike roll: The strike gains +4 ATK. If this cleric is a Cantor, the strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fight for your Emperor! Fight for the Empire!"

name: Naia Calix
text: Naia Calix has +1 Level for casting spells.

setInfos.flavorText: "The concerns of royalty are so tedious, and Kennet's tales so interesting..."
"Distant cousins hold so much potential-not just for talent, but for ambition." - Ichaerus

name: Just a Little Scratch
text: Spend React: Before target character inflicts a wound on a character you control: Attach this card to the target. While it is attached, the target gains the Poison trait and must succeed with a poison save (DC 18) to ready during the decree phase.

setInfos.flavorText: "You believe you won? Can't you feel that scratch on your neck starting to itch and burn?" - Raclesis

name: Precognition
text: Spend React: After target character pays the costs for an action card: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + this cleric's Skill, +5 if this cleric is a Seer) or the action is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your actions were anticipated and will ultimately prove futile."

name: Putrescence
text: Order: Target all opposing characters within one rank: Until end of turn, any opposing characters within one rank of this cleric suffer -5 AC and Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Who would wither and blight my crop? My loved ones... Who would DARE!?!" - Nin-Gula

name: Song of Strength
text:
Bards may perform this action regardless of class restrictions as if they were Cantors.
Order: You may spend this cleric, target one (two if this cleric is a Cantor) other character(s): Until end of turn, each target gains +4 ATK and AC, and, if you spent this cleric, +1 HP.

name: White Squall
text: Spend Order: Target all ready Level 1 characters: Spend each target. Until end of turn, Level 1 characters enter play spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Pirates plague the coast. I want them eliminated." - Nin-Gula

name: Ardent
text: Spend React: After target lower Level character performs a melee strike that killed an opposing character: The target performs a melee strike with the same ATK as the previous strike that inflicts an additional wound. If this fighter is a Paladin, you may ready the target instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "I am with thee." - Commander Kaiten

name: Desperate Grab
text: Order: Target an item equipped to target opposing character within one rank: Succeed with a Powerattack check (DC 7 + the item's Level) to destroy the item or perform a +5 melee strike, the item's controller chooses.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your hatchet or your life!"

name: Faith in Steel
text: Order: Choose Armor, Helm, Shield, or Weapon: Reveal the top five (ten if this fighter is a Paladin) cards of your deck. This fighter may equip a revealed item with the chosen trait, if possible. Shuffle your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "No steel is stronger than that tempered in The Storm's Tears." - Commander Kaiten

name: Glory of the Black Sun
text: Order: Until end of turn, this fighter gains the ability, "React: After target character targets this fighter with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a fear save (DC 10 + this fighter's Skill) or the strike suffers -4 ATK. If this fighter is a Paladin, the target is considered to fail (regardless of the roll)."

setInfos.flavorText: "May they fear us. I wouldn't mind that." - Lord AureliusRellion

name: New Orders
text:
Order: Move forward one rank.
Spend Order: Move any number of characters in your front rank to a different position in the rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Their retreat may be a ruse. Have the swiftest of our men pursue and the others set up a trap of our own." - Sir Robert of Andover

name: Elemere
text: React: Before Elemere dies: Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've filled elven lands with human bones, and now call the Freemen allies. How odd."
"The depths of Myreth hold graveyards filled with the bones of creatures whose names even we do not remember."

name: Out of Breath
text:
Spend Order: Target a stunned character within two ranks: Move forward one rank, if possible. Perform a melee strike or, if this fighter is a Ranger, perform an attack without spending. These strikes must target the target.
Order: Perform a +2 melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mobility and stamina counts as much as a strong sword arm." - Set'rokh

name: Savage Strike
text: React: After targeting a melee strike: Succeed with a Powerattack check (DC 15) to have the strike inflict an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "The average Sutek has the strength of three men. Some are considerably stronger than that." - Shah'syss

name: Shelter the Weak
text: React: After target character targets a character in this rank with a strike: Perform a melee strike against the target that does not inflict wounds. The target gains +5 AC for the duration of the strike. If the strike hits, cancel the target's strike. If the strike misses, redirect the target's strike to this fighter, if possible.

name: Death from Below
text: React: After target opposing character moves into a rank two ranks away: Perform a +4 ranged strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "The air-breathers always forget there is up and down too." - Yvaalis

name: Essence of Eban-Tarsis
text: Order: Until end of turn this rogue gains the ability, "React: Before target character suffers wounds from a melee strike by this rogue: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 14) or suffer a wound."

setInfos.flavorText: "In the swamps poison mirrors the circle of life and death. I use it for the latter." - Grilt Fenstalker

name: Lure
text:
Bards perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Move target ready opposing character of equal or lower Level forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Be wary if a beautiful woman beckons to you all too near to the waterline." - Shannon

name: Pick Pockets
text: Order: Target a Level 6 or lower item equipped to target opposing character within one rank: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 15) to equip the item to this rogue, regardless of class and Level requirements.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not that these folks have pockets, mind you..." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Ranging Shot
text:
React: After target character is hit with a ranged strike by this rogue: Perform a +2 ranged strike against a character in the rank behind the target.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Loose an arrow to gauge distance by all means, but don't waste it." - Shadith Glyn

name: Sting of the Lionfish
text:
Order: Attach this card to target equal or lower Level character within one rank. While ths card is attached, the character has the Poison trait and suffers -1 Skill against poison saves.
Spend React: After target character with the Poison trait pays the costs of an action without spending: The target becomes spent or, if already spent, stunned.

name: Stormfront
text: Spend Order: Reveal the top card of an opposing deck: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the revealed card's Level. If this rogue is a Scout and the card is either an item or equal or lower Level, discard it.

setInfos.flavorText: "Best head back to port now. That's no natural storm." - 'Snuff' Garrett

name: Eirlas
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
React: Before Eirlas dies: Perform a +4 ranged strike. Eirlas may perform this action while stunned.

name: Submerge
text: React: After target opposing character does not spend to pay the costs of an action to move: Cancel the action. You may move this rogue forward or backward one rank.
errata: Erratum 2010/05/01: The React should read "React: Before target opposing character moves without spending or stunning: The target does not move. This rogue may move forward or backward one rank."

setInfos.flavorText: "You need air. As you can see, we do not."

name: Uninvited
text: Order: Perform a melee strike against target character that is spent or has the Poison trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "You feast for the last time on the weak, my 'masters'. Tonight you shall dine on justice, bitter and sharp, 'til you can eat no more." - Taisia

name: Churning Wrath
text: Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Pirates and sea-elves, let them both attack! By my blood, I will dash them against the rocks with the very element they use to hide!" - Sanga-Kish

name: Confound
text: Spend React: After target character targets a strike: Redirect the strike to another character, if possible. If this wizard is an Illusionist, you may cancel the strike instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "One arrow. I'm willing to chance my life, but are you prepared for my reprisal?" - Azelot il Dawud

name: Dancing Lights
text: Order: Target a non-Warlord lower Level character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill, +5 if this wizard is an Illusionist) or may not perform actions until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The low-born are so easily distracted. They make for tiresome company." - Queen Yahia

name: Elemental Bolt
text:
Elemental (Choose Fire, Water, Air or Earth)
Spend Order: Perform a +X ranged strike, where X equals this wizard's Level. If this wizard is Level 5 or higher, perform two additional +X ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Human magicians know nothing. The Four elements are Blood, Bone, Flesh, and Spirit. I will educate them in their manipulation." - Morghen the Unliving

name: Hallucination
text: Spend Order: Target an opposing non-Warlord character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a Will save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill, +5 if this wizard is an Illusionist) or you gain control of the target until this wizard readies, stuns, or leaves play. Until then, this wizard may remain spent during the ready phase.

name: Hoarfrost
text: Spend Order: Target a character two ranks away, target any characters adjacent to the target: Perform a +7 ranged strike against the target. After the strike, all targets must succeed with a magic save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill) or become spent or, if already spent, stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "The water witch controls more than the waves. They say she can twist the very climate to her whim." - Keziah

name: Life is Magic
text: Spend React: Before target equal or lower Level character you control is killed: Remove the target from the game. At end of turn, return the target to play in the same rank, if possible.

setInfos.flavorText: "...and Magic is Life." - Shirti

name: Korin Blackstone
text: Order: Once per turn, if Korin has one or more wounds: Remove a wound from Korin. Perform a melee strike.
errata:
This action is technically healing, and can be prevented by effects that prevent healing.
If Korin has no wounds, he cannot perform the Order.

setInfos.flavorText: "We shall make a new home, alliance or not."

name: Elees
text:
If Elees is ready at the beginning of the Ready phase, he has Marksmanship +6 until end of turn.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Take your time. Do it right, or don't bother."
"Every time a captain dies, the Deverenians promote a new one. Almost tiresome."

name: Ride the Wave
text: Spend Order: Move forward one rank, if possible. Perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Chosen shun the pirates of the coast, but the Vaneris are the true dangers of these waters. They leave no trace of those to carry to their terrible grottoes." - Captain Alera

name: Tidal Mastery
text: Order: Attach Tidal Mastery to this wizard. While this wizard has one or more Tidal Mastery cards attached, he gains +1 Level for casting Water spells and Water spells cast by this wizard gain +3 to DC saves and ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "There can only be one High Queen" - Tepheroth

name: Tsunami
text: Spend Order: Target all characters in a rank within two ranks: Each target must make two magic saves (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill). If one save is failed, the target becomes spent. If both are failed, the target becomes spent and suffers two wounds.

name: Punitive Strike
text:
React: Before this character makes a melee strike roll: The strike gains +3 ATK.
Order: Perform a melee strike against a stunned character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hit 'em when they're down. It's easier that way." - Krenthor Gouge

name: Armor of Pearl
text: Opposing characters of opposite alignment than this cleric within one rank suffer -2 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "Made of whalebone and completely covered in mother of pearl, it clearly is for show, not for use in battle." - Kerebrus

name: Chariot of Shell
text:
Order: Spend Chariot: Move forward one rank.
Order: Until end of turn, any adjacent characters gain +3 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "These elves have a greater command of the sea than I had feared." - Sir Robert

name: Corystes
text: Order: Spend Corystes, reveal the top card of any deck: The next melee strike by a character you control gains an ATK bonus equal to the revealed card's Level. Return the card to the top of the deck. If this cleric is a Seer, you may place it on the bottom instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've heard of hermit crabs, but mystics? Do you take me for a fool?" - Inquisitor Dmitir

name: Fountain of Tears
text: Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge from Fountain, target another character within two ranks: Either succeed with a magic check (DC 17) to remove a wound from the target, or the target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or suffer a wound. This is a Water action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Water drawn from the holiest of sources." - Grimur

name: Revsheth
text: Your Level 3 or greater Necromancers have the ability "Spend Order: Return Revsheth from your discard pile to your hand."

setInfos.flavorText: "I know a place of many secrets, my queen, but they are not unguarded..."
"Remember the fallen. They'll remember you." - Cear Adinerach

name: Healer's Pact
text:
React: After this cleric removes or reduces one or more wounds: Put a Charge on Healer's Pact.
React: Before a character you control suffers wounds, remove 4 Charges: Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kor's blessing helps, too." - Kohn

name: Mace
text: This cleric inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against characters of opposite alignment than their Warlord.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have seen this before. Who did you take it from, scoundrel?" - Inquisitor Dmitir

name: Mollusk Helm
text: Order: Spend Mollusk Helm: All players reveal the top card of their deck. You choose whether the cards are all drawn or all discarded.

setInfos.flavorText: "It was the war-crown of my father. I do not require such paltry protections, as I have surpased him in power." - Thalaasa

name: Quake Hammer
text: React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by this cleric, spend Quake Hammer, target any characters adjacent to the first target: All targets suffer -3 ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "A thunderbolt is bound within the iron." - Sigurdur

name: Sanguine Shield
text: Adjacent characters gain Riposte +3 and Defend +4 for each wound on this cleric.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, let the blood flow, hear its call to the beating heart of all creation!" - Nin-Hula
"An inexperienced combatant will be easily intimidated by this and likely never even come close to you." - Validan

name: Gilded Chariot
text: Order: Once per turn, spend Chariot: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is where a chieftain displays his wealth, that both his men and his enemies may know of his right to lead. It makes good loot, too." - Temur

name: Great White
text:
Order: Spend Great White: Move forward one rank.
Order: Spend Great White: Perform a +7 melee strike that may not receive any other bonuses or inflict more than one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "The most fearsome beast in coastal waters that you can imagine. Except their riders." - Bosun Blacknose

name: Helm of the Deep
text: While this fighter has an Armor and a Shield equipped, he gains +2 Skill and the Aquatic trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Trinkets and baubles are all well and good, but true treasure tends to be more practical." - Captain Alera

name: Leviathan Hide
text: React: Before this fighter suffers wounds, destroy Leviathan Hide: Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "The seas of Thessyria are home to many dangerous creatures, but even the deadliest to the elves are only tools." - Bosun Blacknose

name: Heigel Syneri
text: Order: Discard a card: Target character of Level 3 or lower gains a class of your choice until end of turn. (In addition to their current classes.)

setInfos.flavorText: "Calix is Queen, as long as she keeps her word."

name: Repeating Crossbow
text: Spend Order: Perform two +3 ranged strikes. If this fighter is a Ranger, perform an additional +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Where in the thousand isles did you get that thing? Nevermind, you, bosun, keep them pinned down-all others, prepare to board!" - Captain Alera

name: Shell Armor
text: While this fighter has a Helm or Shield equipped, he gains +1 ATK and AC for each.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why work on it, when the turtles grow it for you?" - Diirena

name: Tortoise Shield
text: While this fighter is adjacent to another character with a Shield equipped, this fighter and any adjacent characters gain +2 AC and Defend +3.

setInfos.flavorText: "No, it's not from a metal turtle. Those live in the Ocean and it would rust to nothing, idiot. It derives its name from the defensive advantage you get from using it." - Set'rokh

name: Tortoise Stance
text: This fighter may perform the Defend feat an additional time per turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now imagine your tortoise had a sting, and you get the picture." - Redu Tam

name: Tulwar
text: While this fighter has a Steed equipped, he gains Powerattack +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "Longer than a standard sword, it is balanced for use on horseback. But it's better than nothing." - Sigurdur

name: Bared Heart
text:
If this rogue is a Bard, Bared Heart loses the Trap trait.
React: After target character targets this rogue with a melee strike, spend Bared Heart: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 12, DC 15 if this rogue is a Bard) or the strike is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "..., Naked Steel" - The Lady of Pain

name: Conch Horn
text:
If this rogue is a Bard, he gains +2 ATK.
Spend Order: Target all ready lower Level opposing characters within 2 ranks: Each target must succeed with a will save (DC 7 + this rogue's Skill) or become spent. This is a Water action.

setInfos.flavorText: "It takes a staunch heart to hear that siren shell song and not weep for a past abandoned." - Blacknose

name: Jewel Spider Web
text: React: Once per turn, after target character targets this rogue with a melee strike, spend Jewel Spider Web: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 15) and a poison save (DC 12) or suffer a wound for each failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Pah. How intelligent can these spiders possibly be?" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Rustled Mount
text:
While this rogue is in an opposing formation, he gains +1 AC.
React: After Rustled Mount is equipped in an opposing formation, target a steed within two ranks: Destroy the target.
Order: Spend Rustled Mount: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Serpentlash
text:
This rogue's melee strikes gain +2 ATK against characters with the Poison trait.
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by this rogue: The target permanently gains the Poison trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "We been make our weapons from animals long time. Sometimes we kill 'em first even." - Scyrax

name: Saliel
text:
Spend Order: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + number of Charges on Saliel) or suffer a wound.
React: After Saliel kills a character: Put a number of Charges on Saliel equal to the victim's Level.

name: Shifts and Gears
text:
This rogue may equip an additional Trap.
This rogue's Traps gain +2 to DC saves.

setInfos.flavorText: "You need a stronger back for this kind of work than you think, young one." - Pinion

name: Skyfire
text:
This rogue inflicts an additional wound with non-spell ranged strikes against spent characters.
Spend Order: Perform three +5 ranged strikes. These strikes ignore the Planar trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "The old tomes speak of a weapon to protect against the daemons. I pray that it was not a myth." - Taisia

name: Sugvira the Scamp
text:
+2 Skill
React: Once per turn, after this rogue is targeted with a melee strike: Redirect the strike to Sugvira as if it were a Level 1 rogue with +2 ATK, 17 AC, +0 Skill, 1 HP, and Riposte +10.

name: Weighted Net
text: Order: Destroy Net: Perform a +4 ranged strike against a character within one rank that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, the target becomes spent and must succeed with a strength save (DC 14) or may not ready during the next ready phase.

name: Black Pearl
text: React: Before target character is killed with a spell by this wizard, destroy Black Pearl: Target character adjacent to the first target must succeed with a magic save (DC 12 + this spell's Level) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hmm. It appears that there is more raw power to the seas than we thought possible." - Samanya

name: Cloak of the Leech
text:
After the ready phase: Put a Charge on Cloak.
Spells cast by this wizard gain a bonus to ranged strike rolls and DC saves equal to the number of Charges on Cloak.

setInfos.flavorText: "Be wary, in magic nothing is ever given freely." - Samanya Dumisa

name: Extension Scroll
text: React: Before targeting a spell: Succeed with a spellcraft check (DC 18 + the spell's Level) to allow the spell to target an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, it's somewhat cumbersome, but wouldn't you like to get a few more fireballs in, before the enemy crashes into the fragile ranks before you?" - Yavlo

name: Golem Manual
text:
Your Constructs gain +2 ATK, AC, and Skill.
Spend Order: Put a character into play from your hand. The character permanently gains the Construct trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "A very detailed treatise of somebody named Loki, apparently a dwarf." - Yavlo the Kindled

name: Living Statue
text: Spend Order: Put this card into play in the rank behind your last occupied rank as a Level 1 Monster with +0 ATK, 11 AC, +0 Skill, and 1 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sometimes, in times of need, the essence of the exiled gods has their effigy come alive." - Atiratu

name: Necklace of Spell Storing
text: React: Once per turn, after this wizard casts a non-scribed spell: Succeed with a Scribe check (DC 22) to attach the spell to this wizard as if it had been successfully scribed.

setInfos.flavorText: "Raw power elevates a wizard above his fellows. Artifice on top of that makes him nearer a god." - Loki

name: Skyyrek
text: React: Before Skyyrek dies, remove him from the game: Retrieve a lower Level Undead Elf from your discard pile and put it into play. This action may be performed while stunned.

name: Orb of Mud
text:
React: After this wizard casts a Water or an Earth spell: Put a Charge on Orb.
Order: Once per turn, remove X Charges from Orb: Perform a +X ranged strike. If X is 3 or greater, the strike gains an additional +3 and, if it hits, spends the target.

name: Ring of Ice
text: Order: Spend Ring of Ice, target a non-Warlord character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or, until end of turn, may not perform actions and gains +4 AC and +1 HP. The target may choose to fail the save. This is a Water action.

name: Giant Turtle
text:
Water actions gain -2 to strike rolls and DC saves against this character and any adjacent characters.
Order: Spend Turtle: Move this character and up to two adjacent characters forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Awkward on land, but pure majesty in the water." - Shannon the Daring

name: Trident
text:
This character's actions that produce melee strikes are Water actions.
This character's melee strikes gain +3 ATK against stunned characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Is there no escaping the reach of the elves?" - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Chalice of Life
text: React: Once per turn, after this cleric performs a Water action: Remove one wound from another character in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "You cannot dam the flow of life." - Arla Favorsight

name: Sir Robert of Andover
text:
Your other Free Kingdoms in the same rank as Robert gain +2 ATK.
Order: Once per turn, target up to two Free Kingdoms adjacent to Sir Robert of Andover: Until end of turn, the targets have an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when they attack.
errata:
Erratum 2010/12/21: He receives an additional Hit Point (4 HP total).
Erratum 2010/12/21: The Order should read "Order: Twice per turn: Until end of turn, target adjacent Free Kingdoms has an additional melee strike (base = target's primary ATK) when he attacks. If Sir Robert is in the first rank the target may perform an order."

setInfos.flavorText: "When he leads us into the final battle, I am going to be by his side, like my father was." - Lieutenant Dunbar

name: Takaxras
text:
May not equip items.
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Takaxras: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 15) or become spent and suffer a wound.

name: Axe of Fury
text: React: Once per turn, before target opposing character is killed with a melee strike by this fighter: This fighter gains a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the target's Level until end of turn.

name: Chime of the Aerie
text:
React: Before target stunned character moves forward or backward, spend Chime of the Aerie: The target suffers a wound. This is an Air action.
Spend Order: Ready a non-stunned item or spend a ready item.

name: Conjure Storm
text: Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound. Perform a +4 ranged strike against a target three or more ranks away.

setInfos.flavorText: "Those who know how to manipulate the power of the desert are not to be trifled with, as they can strike anywhere they wish." - Azam

name: Talyn
text: Spend Order: Discard a card: Perform a number of +0 ranged strikes equal to Talyn's Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "If you entreaty the Free King, do so honestly. He's no stranger to treachery."
"Anton leaves us for months, and Arak Spire falls in that time. They need a new warder, and the Kabal are best to choose him."

name: Han of the Ferry
text:
Han is a cleric and a rogue and enters play as if he were Level 4.
Other Free Kingdoms in a rank with one or more Han gain +2 to all die rolls.

name: Ka-Nissus
text: Order: Once per game, target an opposing character: Until end of game, Ka-Nissus inflicts an additional wound against the target. If Ka-Nissus kills the target, remove all wounds from him.

name: Massacre
text: React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that killed an opposing character, target any characters that were adjacent to the target of the strike: Each target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 5 + this fighter's primary ATK) or suffer a wound.

name: Minor Miracle
text:
Your characters may only perform one Minor Miracle from your hand each turn.
React: Before target character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one.

name: Mo'can
text:
Spend Order: Perform two +4 ranged strikes.
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character moves without spending or stunning: Mo'can moves forward one rank or performs a +7 ranged strike.

name: Nightmare Blade
text: While performing a melee strike, this rogue inflicts an additional wound against a stunned character and gains +3 ATK against a spent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "It twists and torments the unwary soul, damning it for all eternity. It should not heedlessly be wielded. Better you throw it back in!" - Reese

name: Okull the Defiant
text:
Okull is a fighter and a wizard and enters play as if Level 4.
Order: Once per turn, after Okull is targeted with a strike or action: Make a Magic Resistance check (DC 16) to cancel the strike or action.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the number of action cards in your discard pile.

name: Oloidynatos
text:
May cast cleric and wizard spells.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Ready Oloidynatos.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not all of them are just vicious beasts. Some have innate abilities." - Samanya

name: Ring of the Savant
text:
This cleric gains +1 Level for scribing and casting scribed spells.
Scribed spells cast by this cleric are removed from the game.
Order: Once per turn: Choose a cleric spell in your discard pile and succeed with a Scribe check (DC 22) to retrieve and attach the spell as if scribed.
errata: Erratum 2010/05/01: The Order should read "Order: Once per turn: Choose a cleric spell in your discard pile and succeed with a Scribe check (DC 22) to retrieve and attach the spell as if scribed, otherwise remove it from the game."

name: Slash and Lunge
text: React: After this rogue performs a melee strike that hit: Perform a melee strike against a spent character in the rank that was behind the target of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "What? You didn't think you'd see me here, friend?" - Talin Tzin

name: Bis
text: React: After Bis enters play: Return target Level 1 or 2 non-Warlord character to its owner's hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's possible to slay the Emperor, Tepheroth, but why? Corruption is a finer art than murder."
"So the Deverenians have found Dythanus' city? No bother, then. Let us see how Anandale Reacts to a reunion with Lekar Osud."

name: Surge
text:
Surge may equip fighter items.
React: After Surge kills an opposing character: Surge gains Medicine +5 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "There is twofold use for anatomical knowledge, I presume." - Kohn

name: Tyyphera
text:
While one or more Tyyphera are in your discard pile, if your Warlord is an Elf, opposing characters have -2 Skill.
Order: Once per turn, you may spend Tyyphera: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a poison save (DC 11, 15 if you spent Tyyphera) or suffer a wound.

name: Ancient Scimitar
text: React: Once per turn, before target opposing character is killed by this fighter: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 21 - the target's Level) to remove a wound from this fighter. Remove the target from the game after it dies.

name: Flurry of Knives
text: Spend Order: Perform three +2 ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sometimes it's just as important to give them an incentive to keep their heads down." - Logan

name: Raak
text:
Order: Once per turn, target a charcter within two ranks: Until end of turn, your Elves gain +2 to ranged strikes against the target.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

name: Shah'syss
text:
Your other Monsters gain +2 ATK.
React: After Shah'syss kills an opposing character: Move a Monster you control forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The gates are open finally and the Sssutek Empire shall rise once again."

name: Sharkbone Bow
text:
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Once per turn: Perform a +2 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away.

name: Sta'ash
text: React: Before target character is killed by Sta'ash: If the target is higher Level, remove a wound from Sta'ash. If the target is lower Level, remove it from the game after it dies.

name: Stubborn
text:
Order: Move forward one rank.
React: After this fighter is targeted with an action that could spend, stun, or move him, inflict 1 wound on this fighter: Cancel the action. Until the end of the turn this fighter cannot be spent, stunned, or moved by opposing card effects.

name: Yvaalis
text:
Yvaalis gains +1 to ranged strikes and Marksmanship checks for each Charge on her.
React: Once per turn, after Yvaalis kills an opposing character with a ranged strike: Put a Charge on her.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

name: Maxt Stormcrow
text:
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I don't care how many slaves they bring, I've got an arrow for each of them."
"I don't care how many slaves they bring. I've got an arrow for each of them."
"He was at the Emperor's coronation. He was moments too late, but if any know his weakness, it is he." - Bis
"I warned you of the Emperor's designs, and you mocked me for it. I think I might enjoy watching a few fires."
"...for the payment and price of all treachery is death." - Lord Corwin Lorath of Rellion

name: Ancestral Wraiths
text:
Spend Order: Move forward two ranks.
React: Once per turn, after Ancestral Wraiths moves into your front rank, target an opposing ready character within 1 rank: The target must succeed with a fear save (DC 18) or become spent.

name: Dhamir il Maliq
text:
Dhamir is both a fighter and a wizard.
Dhamir gains +1 ATK for each spell in your discard pile.
Dhamir's actions that produce melee strikes are Fire actions and ignore the Planar trait.
React: Once per turn, after target character targets Dhamir with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 18) or suffer a wound. This is a Fire action.

setInfos.flavorText: "You freed me, but I fulfil my own desires."

name: Ghed Kazouf
text:
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one (up to two if you won the initiative) rank(s).
React: Once per turn, after a Deverenian you control performs a Fire action: Kazouf performs a melee strike or a +6 ranged strike. This is a Fire action.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Stormborn now burn with fury."

name: Herick the Venomous
text:
Your Warlord gains +2 to initiative rolls for each Charge on Herick.
React: After Herick kills a character: Put a Charge on Herick.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yavlo hath unleashed a questionable ally, Dmitir."

name: Markhan
text: While adjacent to a Stormwraith, Markhan gains +1 HP and Defend +10.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do not presume to assault the holy ones. Sand and Storm have both blessed them, and we are not worthy to stand in their presence."

name: Nu'man il Maliq
text:
Nu'man may perform Level 1 wizard spells.
React: Once per turn, before target higher Level Deverenian you control makes a die roll that was not preset: The target uses two dice for the roll. You may choose which one to use for the result.

setInfos.flavorText: "The efreet's tale is not one for mortal ears."

name: Rellion Pikeman
text: If you won initiative this turn, Rellion Pikeman gains +2 ATK and AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Letting thy guards blister in the burning sun doth woe for their heedfulness." - Taisia

name: Sir Pelimere
text:
Sir Pelimere has the same alignment as your Warlord.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Until end of turn, any characters adjacent to Sir Pelimere gain +3 ATK and AC.

name: Squire Fenric
text: Order: Once per turn, spend a character in this rank: Move forward one rank. If Fenric moves, he may perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Master Anandale hath joined us! He is a hero and a legend, an inspiration to us all! Victory shall be ours!"

name: Tegus Herders
text:
Tegus Herders gains +1 ATK and AC for each Steed within 1 rank.
Spend Order: Target Deverenian gains Riding +3 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Tegus tribe hath agreed to provide us with fresh steeds in exchange for the open plains, as I knew they would." - Inquisitor Dmitir

name: Vivian
text: Order: Twice per turn: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "If the Freemen want our help, they can give us their graveyards."
As she drew the arrow back, she wondered if she dared fire on another elf.

name: The Sable Knight
text:
Your Warlord gains +3 to initiative rolls.
React: Once per turn, after a character you control performs an order: You may perform a Decree.
errata:
Erratum 2012/05/05: The static text should read "Your Deverenian Warlord gains +3 to initiative rolls."
Erratum 2012/05/05: The React should read "React: Once per turn, after a Deverenian you control performs an order: You may perform a Decree."

setInfos.flavorText: "E'en I thought him a myth..." - Dmitir

name: Vachir
text: React: Before Vachir makes a strike roll, remove a Fire spell in your discard pile from the game. The strike gains +4 to the roll and is a Fire action.

setInfos.flavorText: "With the help of the outsiders, we finally have a chance to burn the usurpers from this world."

name: Bludgeon
text:
Bludgeon gains +4 AC and Skill while targeted with an Earth or Fire action.
Order: Stun BludgeonL Perform a melee strike that may target an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "Strength breeds true."

name: Brom Frostbeard
text:
While you control a Dragon, Brom's actions gain +3 to DC saves.
React: Once per turn, after Brom casts a Water spell: Ready target lower Level non-stunned Dwarf.
React: Once per turn, after Brom casts an Earth spell: Until end of turn, target Dwarf gains +3 ATK and AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "The first to have regained priestly powers. For this we revere him." - Sigurdur

name: Dress
text: Your Dwarves in this rank gain +3 AC while they have one or more wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "Such wounds are a mark of pride, so don't tie these bandages too tightly. I could do with a few new scars." - Vex Duntan

name: Dust Gargoyle
text:
Dust Gargoyle is a fighter and a rogue and enters play as if he were Level 4.
React: Once per turn, after Dust Gargoyle is hit with a melee strike, spend a Dwarf cleric: Dust Gargoyle gains +1 HP until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Plentiful materials, endlessly replenishing." - Thekk

name: Glorgrim
text: React: After Glorgrim performs a melee strike that killed an opposing character, target a character within 1 rank: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 14) or become spent or, if already spent, suffer a wound.

name: Pinion's Vise
text:
Gains the Trap trait while in play.
May not attack, equip items, or perform action cards.
Spend React: After target character targets a Dwarf within 1 rank with a strike: Perform a +6 ranged strike against the target. If the strike hits, the target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 17) or his strike is canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "The calculations to actually make it work are beyond your simple mind." - Pinion

name: Rimefang
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Characters in your front rank gain +3 to ATK, AC, and Skill.
Spend Order: Target character within 2 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or become stunned and suffer -3 AC.

name: Rumbling Gargoyle
text: React: Once per turn, after a wound is reduced or removed from Rumbling Gargoyle: Rumbling Gargoyle permanently has an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "When the rumbling stops, that's when its anger awakens." - Glorgrim

name: Dex Glyn
text:
If your Warlord is an Elf, Dex Glyn may enter play into an illegal rank.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
React: After Dex Glyn falls forward: Perform a +5 ranged strike. Dex may perform this action while stunned.

name: Sentinel Gargoyle
text:
May not equip items.
Dwarves adjacent to one or more Sentinel Gargoyles gain +2 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Untiring eyes. They do make me feel a little redundant." - Guardian

name: Tumble
text:
React: After a Dwarf in your front rank is killed and before fixing any illegal ranks: Put Tumble into play from your hand.
Spend React: After Tumble enters play, target a character within 1 rank: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 11) or suffer a wound. This is a Trap action.

setInfos.flavorText: "I brought a few friends with me."

name: Warden
text: Spend React: After target character targets a Gargoyle you control with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 14) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "They're all like children to me, and I protect them as any parent would."

name: Amon-Ka
text:
Amon-Ka is a cleric and a wizard and enters play as if he were Level 5.
Order: Once per turn, kill an Undead or a Thrall: Remove one wound from Amon-Ka.
React: Before target character kills Amon-Ka with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or suffer 2 wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "Living or dead, slaves are all the same."

name: Austerion
text:
Austerion's ranged strikes gain a bonus equal to the number of Elves in your dscard pile.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Follow behind the forests. Your task shall merely be to ensure the death of any Thessyrian that escapes their branches." - Khilkhameth

name: Baracuuda
text:
While in your discard pile, this card is also a Level 1 wizard spell.
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds and may target within 1 rank. If the strike hits, spend the target.

name: Forest of Bone
text:
Forest of Bone gains +1 ATK and AC for each other Forest of Bone in play.
May not maneuver or equip items.
React: Once per turn, after target character moves into this rank: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "...The first the vermin will know of our arrival is when our domain rises around them, to choke thair carcasses into ivory perfection."

name: Khilkhameth
text:
Opposing stunned characters suffer -3 AC.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Put a Forest of Bone from your collection into play in an opposing front rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Trees are but life grown from the dead; much stronger is the death that sprouts from the living..."

name: Mormaenion
text: Order: Discard a card: Mormaenion may perform the Marksmanship feat an additional time this turn. Perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Her legend is one that requires a choir of fifty strangled throats to relate in its true nuance, and grows daily." - The Lady of Pain

name: Nothiel Elestra
text:
Order: Once per turn, remove a card in any dicard pile from the game, target a non-Warlord Undead that has not received any permanent bonuses: The target permanently gains +2 ATK and AC.
Spend Order: Move an Undead you control forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "A new dynasty begins here." - Morghen

name: Lava Gargoyle
text:
Order: Kill one of your Gargoyles in this rank. Put a Charge on Lava Gargoyle and it permanently gains +1 Level and +1 HP.
Order: Remove 2 Charges: Ready Lava Gargoyle.
errata: Can use his ability even if there are no other Gargoyles in the rank (He kills himself).

setInfos.flavorText: "It watches the Abyss, lest history repeat." - The Broken Earth

name: Kyrthelia
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

name: Orlanon
text:
React: After Orlanon enters play: Perform a +4 ranged strike against a character with the Poison trait.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is time for priests of all the Elements to work together as one." - Raclesis

name: Sachiel
text:
Undead in this rank gain +3 ATK while targeting a stunned character with a melee strike.
React: Once per turn, after target non-stunned character is hit with a melee strike by Sachiel: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 15) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "The gates are mine to guard."

name: Soulless Scavenger
text: While Soulless Scavenger is in your discard pile, your Warlord, if he is an Elf, has the ability, "Order: Remove three characters in your discard pile from the game: Retrieve Soulless Scavenger from your discard pile and put him into play."

name: Thrinnas Glyn
text: React: After a melee strike misses an Elf you control: move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Calm yourself, Shadith. We lack the numbers to attack now, and must wait for Raclesis' plagues to do their work. Then, once the forests have grown, we can string the trees with human entrails."

name: Alfred
text: Spend Order: Perform a number of +1 ranged strikes equal to the number of characters adjacent to Alfred.

setInfos.flavorText: "I may not be able to run with you lot, but there is still some power in these old bones!"

name: Carmag Hammerfall
text:
Carmag gains +1 Level for equipping Traps.
React: Once per turn, after target character targets Carmag with a strike: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 14) or suffer a wound. This is a Trap.

setInfos.flavorText: "What might remains to us should avail to all who would defy the outsiders."

name: Dune Wolves
text:
May not equip items.
While targeting a wounded character with a melee strike, Dune Wolves gains +2 ATK.
React: Once per turn, after Dune Wolves or a Lycanthrope you control wounds an opposing character with a melee strike: Move a Monster or Lycanthrope you control forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Those lost in the sands should pray that the wolves don't find them." - Darian Windson

name: Hamadryagh
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target any number of characters you control within 2 ranks: Each target must succeed with a Skill check (DC 17, 12 if the target is a Monster or Lycanthrope) to move forward or backward one rank.

name: Keziah Firehair
text:
Order: Once per turn: Target lower Level Free Kingdoms has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) the next time he attacks this turn.
React: Up to twice per turn, before a Free Kingdoms makes a die roll: Add 3 to the die roll's result.

name: Leonora
text: Order: Once per turn: Until end of turn, Leonora has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when she attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "My captain is eager to explore the possibility of coming ashore, but she wants certain assurances made first. What do you have to offer?"

name: Duon
text: Duon may apply Marksmanship to ranged strikes from spells. Wounds Duon inflicts with spells may not be reduced.

setInfos.flavorText: "House Glyn's loyalty is unquestioned, but we've never fought alongside living men. It may be too much for us to bear."
"If the Tansiq rumors amount to anything, I will remind them why Flesh is the weakest Element."

name: Nephela
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.
React: Once per turn, after Nephela performs a melee strike that hit target character: Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Cute little things. Careful though, or they'll bite your finger through to the bone." - Keziah

name: Pierce Devon
text: Order: Once per turn: If Pierce has no items equipped, move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I will fight beside you, but I refuse to take the Yscar name."

name: Ryan Mornington
text: React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Ryan: The target cannot perform Reacts until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Get off my ship, filth!"

name: Scarlett
text: React: Once per turn, after an adjacent character performs a ranged strike: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why Keziah, I do believe you're jealous."

name: Xeanara
text:
May only equip Weapons.
React: Once per turn, after Xeanara moves into your front rank: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Centaurs are far from creatures of myth, although the greatest of their number fight with a strength forgotten by humanity." - Keziah

name: Dar'rak
text:
Dar'rak is a fighter and a wizard.
Action cards performed by Dar'rak are spells.
React: Once per turn, after Dar'rak casts a spell: Until end of turn, Dar'rak's melee strikes inflict an additional wound. If it was an Earth or Fire spell, Dar'rak also gains +4 ATK and AC until end of turn.

name: D'nath
text:
While in an opposing formation, D'nath gains +3 ATK.
Spend React: After D'nath enters play: Move him to the front rank of an opposing formation.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Deverenians continue to harry us. Delay them." - Set'rokh

name: G'rath Firefist
text:
G'rath may equip fighter Weapons.
Order: Once per turn, discard a spell: Until end of turn, Grath's melee strikes gain +2 ATK, inflict an additional wound, and are spells.

setInfos.flavorText: "They have what we lack-numbers."

name: Gush
text: React: Before Gush dies: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Each good warrior knows that their own survival is irrelevant to victory. As long as they can eliminate their opposite numbers, they have done their commander proud." - Set'rokh

name: Mel'crah
text:
While in an opposing formation and targeting a spent character with a melee strike, Mel'crah gains +3 ATK and the strike inflicts an additional wound.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a melee strike against a spent character that is a Critical Success or ready Mel'crah (opponent's choice).

setInfos.flavorText: "How easily a sharp sword parts your flesh. Do you feel it, too?"

name: Jevae
text: Spend React: After Jevae enters play, target an opposing first rank: Each character in that rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 9) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Without flesh, the spirit withers."
"Perhaps the High Queen may listen to reason. For all the Emperor's power, he is only flesh, and who knows that better than Tansiq?"
"We offer you much, Netheryn, and ask for so very little."

name: Pelanth
text: Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on Pelanth: Your Nothrog gain +3 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Drink and grow strong."

name: Qar'Dak Stonerender
text:
Qar'Dak may equip fighter items.
React: Once per turn, after Qar'Dak kills an opposing character with a spell: Move forward one rank or perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even stone crumbles before our might. From you I am willing to simply accept unquestioning servitude."

name: Sir'kan
text: React: Before a Nothrog targets a strike: Put Sir'kan into play from your hand. If Sir'kan entered play, the strike gains the Earth trait and cannot be canceled or redirected.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your baubles mean nothing to me. The lowest of us own riches you'd dream of."

name: Tass'daesh
text: React: Once per turn, after Tass'daesh performs a melee strike that hit: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
errata: Erratum 2010/05/01: Has +2 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is my chance to be accepted by the Sapphire Circle."

name: Tra'kelt
text: React: After Tra'kelt succeeds with a Magic Resistance check: Tra'kelt permanently gains +4 ATK and permanently has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Scarab is with us still."

name: Zul'Tan Bloodletter
text:
May equip fighter Weapons.
Zul'Tan's ranged strikes from spells may target characters in an adjacent rank.
React: Once per turn, after target character is targeted by a spell by Zul'Tan: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

name: Bixvrexe
text:
Spend Order: Move forward one rank. If Bixvrexe is not stunned, perform an attack without spending.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Until end of turn, Bixvrexe gains +5 ATK or an additional melee strike (base +1 ATK) when she attacks.

name: Dala
text: Your The Chosen Warlord and Daemons you control have the ability, "Order: Kill Dala: Move forward one rank."

setInfos.flavorText: "The invaders are a sign of the gods' displeasure. If I must die to appease them, so be it."

name: Darkspawn
text: Darkspawn gains +1 ATK, AC, and Skill for each other Daemon in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "They have started to breed and thus created monstrous new abominations." - Azam

name: Galam-Reth
text:
Galam-Reth and your Daemons gain an ATK bonus equal to the Level of the highest Level Daemon in your discard pile.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Galam-Reth or target non-stunned Daemon you control performs a melee strike.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Move target Daemon forward one rank.

name: Blood Spirit
text: While Blood Spirit is ready, your Elves may cast wizard spells as though they were in Blood Spirit's location.

setInfos.flavorText: "The blood of dwarves sustains it now... the dwarves, and their enemies." - Bis
"So great was the slaughter that Blood sent one of its servants to bask in the mayhem." - Behlial

name: Harem Guard
text: Your The Chosen Warlord and non-Daemon, non-Thrall The Chosen you control have the ability, "Order: Kill Harem Guard: Perform a melee strike."

setInfos.flavorText: "He has seen our true forms. Can we still trust him?" - Bixvrexe

name: Master Kelkrys
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. This is a spell.
Order: Inflict a wound on Kelkrys or kill a Thrall: Until end of turn, Kelkrys' spells may target an additional rank away.

name: Raging Hungerer
text:
At the end of each turn, kill a Thrall or Raging Hungerer permanently loses 1 HP.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Never speaking, always killing." - Atiratu

name: Sharru
text: Your The Chosen Warlord and Daemons you control have the ability, "Order: Kill Sharru, target a lower Level character within 1 rank: The target must succeed with a fear save (DC 15) or become spent and move backward one rank."

setInfos.flavorText: "Sometimes an example must be made." - Naram-Sin

name: Wailing Scrambler
text:
Wailing Scrambler's actions that produce strikes are Fire actions.
Order: Once per turn, you may spend Wailing Scrambler: Perform a +2 ranged strike. If you spent Wailing Scrambler, the strike inflicts an additional wound.

name: Yil-Grayl
text:
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: All opposing characters within 1 rank suffer -4 ATK, AC, and Skill.
React: After Yil-Grayl enters play: Put each of the top two cards of your deck into play as Yil-Grayl's Dream Guard, a Level 3 classless character with the Thrall trait, +2 ATK, 12 AC, +0 Skill, 1 HP, and the ability, "This character may enter play in an illegal rank."

setInfos.flavorText: "I am the bringer of nightmares."

name: Ygrassyne
text:
While you have one or more Ygrassyne in play, your Stormwraiths gain Magic Resistance +4 and your Thralls have the ability, "React: Before this character is killed as part of an action's payment: Perform a melee strike."
Order: Once per turn: Target non-Warlord character gains the Thrall or Stormwraith trait until end of turn.

name: Amr Qadir
text:
May equip two Weapons.
May perform Level 1 (Level 3 or lower, if your Warlord is a Mercenary) action cards, regardless of class restrictions.

name: Burning Basilisk
text:
May not equip items.
May perform Fire actions regardless of class restrictions and gains +1 Level for performing them.
React: After the initiative phase, target a character within 1 rank: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 13) or suffer a wound.

name: Fesoof
text: React: After an opposing character becomes stunned: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fesoof can track anything. For the right price, he'll even kill it." - Azam

name: Lorfinnin
text: Spend Order: Target all characters in a rank two or three ranks away. Perform a +5 ranged strike against each target. Remove Lorfinnin from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm not long for this world, but who is?"
"You're throwing away your life by attacking Calix." - Kellis

name: Fire Bats
text:
May not equip items.
Fire Bat's actions that produce melee strikes are Fire actions.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The fire bats are wonderful creatures. They tend to keep unbidden visitors away." - Yavlo

name: Giant Scorpion
text:
May not equip items.
Opposing characters with the Poison trait within 1 rank suffer -2 AC.
Order: Twice per turn: Perform a melee strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, the target permanently gains the Poison trait and suffers -2 AC until end of turn.

name: Gnoll Archer
text: Spend Order: Once per game: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The brutes were foot soldiers in our armies long ago. It is time they returned to their old ways." - Zara

name: Haseeka
text: React: Once per turn, after target stunned character moves forward without stunning: The target suffers a wound. This is an Earth action.

setInfos.flavorText: "The old gods still hold some sway here."

name: Mad Mel Reyvilo
text:
Order: Put a Level 3 or lower character into play from your hand, ignoring loyalty penalties.
React: Twice per turn, after a melee strike roll against Mad Mel: If he succeeds with a dexterity check (DC 5 + the roll's result), the strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sure you are, lass. And I am the frog king."

name: Magma Elemental
text:
While you have a Fire spell in your discard pile, Magma Elemental gains +3 ATK.
While you have an Earth spell in your discard pile, Magma Elemental gains +3 AC.
While you have 5 or more Fire and/or Earth spells in your discard pile, Magma Elemental has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks and gains +1 HP.

name: Verdigris
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike. Verdigris may perform a +7 ranged strike against any characters that were adjacent to the target of the first strike. Ready characters hit with these strikes become spent.

name: Zara
text:
Zara gains +2 Levels for performing Poison actions.
Spend Order: Discard a card: Retrieve a Poison card from your discard pile and put it into your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "My cousin, too, was raised to fight the usurpers. In that we are alike." - Taisia

name: Dominate
text: Spend Order: Target a non-opposing character: If this cleric is a Cantor, the target gains +5 ATK until end of turn. The target performs an attack, spending as normal. Strikes from this attack inflict an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Every man hath a price, and there's not one that the Church of the Storm cannot pay." - Scelus

name: Guilt-Ridden
text:
While this card is in your discard pile, your Seers have the ability to perform it with an additional effect of removing it from the game.
React: Before target character kills a character you control: The target suffers a penalty to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to your character's Level until end of turn.

name: Corsis
text: React: Once per turn, after Corsis casts a spell: Return the spell to your hand from your discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "Take that, and that!"

name: Purify
text: Order: Target a character: Unstun the target. The target permanently loses the Poison trait. You may remove a card attached to the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let them see your power, and they will fight for you willingly." - Mistress Dagani

name: Return to Us
text:
Necromancers may perform this spell regardless of class restrictions.
Spend Order: You may discard a card, target one (two if you discarded a card) lower Level character(s) in your discard pile: Retrieve the target(s) and put them into your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Tell me-what did you see, in oblivion's depths?" - Raclesis

name: Teshur's Thunderfist
text: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike. If this cleric is not in your front rank, the strike may target an additional rank away. If the strike hits, characters in your front rank gain +3 ATK and AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "This cannot be, Tesur has left his people to perish long ago. There shan't be hope." - Besh-Kar

name: Back into the Fray
text:
This card is also a Level 1 cleric spell.
React: After target character within 1 rank readies during the Decree phase: The target performs a melee strike.
Order: Target character gains Riposte +10 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm not dead yet." - Darian Windson

name: Blood for Blood
text:
This card is also a Level 1 cleric spell.
React: After this character performs a melee strike that was a Critical Success or hit by 5 or more: Remove a wound from this character. If this character is a cleric or a Paladin, you may remove a wound from a character in this rank instead.

name: Coordinated Assault
text:
Spend Order: Target up to two non-opposing characters: Each target performs an attack, spending as normal. If this fighter is a Ranger, he may move forward or backward one rank.
React: After you win initiative: Perform an attack, spending as normal.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your garrisons were unprepared." - Galam-Reth

name: Hunter's Quarry
text: Order: Target an opposing character within 3 ranks: Until end of turn, this fighter's melee strikes against the target gain +5 ATK. If this fighter is a Ranger, his ranged strikes against the target gain +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "They are strong. And it is surprising how stupid that makes them at times." - Maxt Stormcrow

name: Measured Blow
text:
This card is a Level 2 rogue action.
React: After this character targets target character with a melee strike: Either the strike gains +5 ATK or if it hits the target becomes spent or, if already spent, stunned. If the target is not already stunned, his controller chooses.

name: Obliterate
text: Spend Order: If this fighter is in your front rank, target up to two non-Warlord characters within 2 ranks. Perform a melee strike against each target. If the strike hits, move the target forward one rank, if possible. Perform an attack without spending.

setInfos.flavorText: "One woman did all this?" - Master Anandale

name: Seek Out Thine Enemy
text: Order: Target an opposing character within 2 ranks: Until end of turn, this fighter has the ability, "React: After the target character moves or targets a character other than this fighter with a melee strike, perform a melee strike against him." If this fighter is a Paladin, he also gains Riposte +10 until end of turn.

name: Salace
text: Spend Order: Target a card in play within three ranks: Increase or decrease all numerals on the card by 1 until end of turn. This effect will not reduce a numeral below 1.

name: Seize the Moment
text: React: Before your Warlord makes an initiative roll: He gains +10 to the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "The thinnest rapier can fell a giant if only thou achievest the target with precision and at the exact right moment." - Brymin

name: Whirling Blades
text:
React: After this fighter pays the costs to perform an attack: Gain +3 ATK for the attack: If this fighter has a Weapon equipped, gain +5 ATK instead.
Order: Inflict a wound on target stunned character within 1 rank.

name: Battle Tunes
text: Order: Until end of turn, this rogue gains +3 ATK and, if he is a Bard, your other characters gain +3 ATK while within 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The tunes start out slow, but when they reach their crescendo, your warrior's blood will boil, trust me." - Keziah

name: Fancy Footwork
text: React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike: Gain +4 AC until end of turn. You may redirect the strike to an adjacent character, if possible. You may shuffle Fancy Footwork into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sometimes I think Talin lets them get that close just so he can show off." - Keziah

name: Market Day
text: React: After this rogue kills an opposing character: Retrieve target action card from your discard pile and put it into your hand. Remove Market Day from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "You won't need this anymore. But me it will grant access to the palace." - Taisia

name: Merciless Strike
text:
This card is also a Level 4 cleric spell.
Spend Order: Target a stunned character within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with four fortitude saves (DC 17) or suffer a wound for each failed save.

setInfos.flavorText: "We cannot afford mercy anymore." - Sir Robert of Andover

name: Mischief
text: Order: Target ready character within 1 rank must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 17, 22 if this rogue is in an opposing formation) or become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "If you are quick enough your enemies' numbers will indeed work against them." - Reynold

name: Tainted Wine
text:
Order: Attach this card to target character within 2 ranks. While it is attached, the target gains the Poison trait.
Order: Target a character with the Poison trait within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 15) or suffer 2 wounds.

name: Unbalanced
text: React: After target character performs a melee strike that missed this rogue: Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "A bit hasty you are, are you not?" - Mormaenion

name: Unerring Shot
text:
Scouts gain +1 Level for performing this action.
Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this rogue's Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "What do they expect? That your arm gets tired when you have that long to get your aim? Rediculous." - Shadith Glyn

name: Nekrast
text: Spend Order: Remove any number of cards in your discard pile from the game: Put an Elf into play from your discard pile with a Level lower than the number of cards removed.

name: Counterspell
text:
Bards may perform this action regardless of class restrictions.
React: After target opposing character pays the costs for an action card that is a spell: Succeed with a magic check (DC 3 + the target's Skill) to cancel the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Didn't your mom tell you not to do such a thing?" - Keziah Firehair

name: Detonate
text: Spend Order: Target a character 1 or 2 ranks away, target each character in the first target's rank: Perform a +10 ranged strike against the first target. All targets must succeed with a reflex save (DC = this wizard's Skill) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "The secret is the right mixture, not the magic." - Loki

name: Dimensional Rift
text:
This card is also a Level 3 cleric spell.
Order: Kill target summoned character.
Order: Target an opposing non-Warlord character that has no items equipped and is in the front rank of his formation: Return the target to his owner's hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Some mistakes are easily undone." - Atiratu

name: Fire Odem
text: Spend Order: Target a character 2 ranks away, target up to two characters in a rank behind the first target: Perform a +7 ranged strike against the first target. All targets must succeed with a magic save (DC = this wizard's Skill) or suffer a wound.

name: Hungry Spirits
text:
This card is also a Level 5 rogue action.
Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds and may target within 1 rank. If the strike hits, spend the target, if possible. The target must succeed with three dexterity saves (DC 15) or suffer a wound for each failed save.

name: Power Word Pain
text:
This card is also a Level 3 cleric spell.
Spend Order: Target a character within 3 ranks: Until end of turn, the target suffers a penalty to ATK and AC equal to this character's Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "For the frail mind, it does not matter whether it is real or not." - Raclesis

name: Puppet Mastery
text:
Bards may perform this action regardless of class restrictions.
Spend Order: Target a Cursed character: Destroy a Cursed item equipped to the target, or if the target is not wounded, inflict a wound on him.
Order: Target item within 3 ranks permanently gains the Cursed trait.

name: Soul Transfer
text:
Spend React: Before this wizard is killed by an opposing character: Put a character into play from your hand.
Order: If this wizard is a Summoner, put a character into play from your hand. Move the character forward one rank, if possible.

setInfos.flavorText: "You do not want to know how it is done." - Atiratu

name: Summon Stone
text: Spend Order: Until end of turn, this wizard has the ability, "Order: Twice per turn: Perform a +4 ranged strike."

setInfos.flavorText: "We do not build the weapons, the earth offers them to us." - Fancy

name: Wither and Bloom
text: Spend Order: Target an opposing character within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 20) or suffer a wound. If the target is killed by this action, you may put a Level 1 character (a lower Level character if this wizard is a Necromancer) from your discard pile into play.

name: Etra Bloodvine
text:
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character becomes stunned: Move a character in your army forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend a Druid in your army: Move target character in any first rank backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Free from Majeral at last."

name: Cowl of Knowledge
text: This cleric gains +1 AC for each spell currently scribed (up to +5).

setInfos.flavorText: "It knows all the terrible histories of Thessyria, but always hungers for more. Whisper secrets to it, and it will repay the kindness." - Nin-Gula

name: Earth Mephit
text:
+2 Skill
This cleric may not be moved with actions by opposing characters.
Order: Spend Earth Mephit: Gain +2 AC until end of turn. This is an Earth action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even the smallest son of stone is an ally I would gladly fight beside." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Gnarled Club
text: Order: Spend Gnarled Club, target a character within 1 rank (2 ranks if this cleric is a Druid): Until end of turn, while performing a melee strike against a stunned character, the target gains +4 ATK and the strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Those that falter shall be our prey." - Khilkhameth

name: Maul of Justice
text:
This cleric gains +3 ATK for each wound on characters you control.
While this cleric has a primary ATK of +15 or more, he gains Powerattack +10.

setInfos.flavorText: "Long have I pondered just how exquisite a punishment I shall bestow upon the traitors. Breaking their bones with this will do." - Dmitir

name: Nabu's Necklace
text:
Cantors gain +2 Levels for equipping Nabu's Necklace.
React: Before a die roll, spend Nabu's Necklace: Add 2 (3 if this cleric is a Seer) to the roll's result.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nabu? He is not a god, but just a myth." - Besh-kar

name: Scepter of Life
text: Order: Spend Scepter of Life: Target character gains +1 HP and Medicine +6 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "To the Chosen it is merely an instrument of power, but they do not mention the fact that it was crafted as a gift to the priestess of Inanna in ages past." - Brom Frostbeard

name: Baraxton Courage
text: Order: Destroy Baraxton Courage: Until end of turn, this fighter and any adjacent characters gain +3 ATK, -3 Skill, and Powerattack +4.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's a good vintage, and better than any drool the Thessyrians can offer. We're not getting more any time soon, so a single barrel's worth fighting for." - Darian Windson

name: Dancing Scimitar
text:
This card is also a Level 5 rogue item.
This character's melee strikes may not be canceled.
React: Once per turn, after a melee strike roll against this character: Gain +3 AC for the duration of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I swear sometimes it moves on its own regard." - Talin Tzin

name: Fists of Kor
text: React: Once per turn, before a melee strike roll: The strike ignores the Planar trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "We have lost much, Alaric. But those belonged to your brother and should smite Daemons just as well as they did Abyssals." - Mentor

name: Frostscale
text:
Dwarves gain +1 Level for equipping Frostscale.
React: After this fighter is targeted with a spell, spend Frostscale: Gain +6 AC and Skill for the duration of the spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let Loki do his worst - he'll not breach this defense, lad." - Sigurdur

name: Cairbre Netheryn
text: Order: Discard a card: Target character within one rank must succeed with a poison save (DC 14 + 1 for each Undead in this rank) or either suffer a wound or become spent (your choice).

setInfos.flavorText: "He earned his place by slaying his master. He is perfect." - Black Tom of Corinth
He steals bones from his kills, not for magic, but for trophies.

name: Iridescent Armor
text:
+1 HP
Fighters gain +1 Level for equipping Iridescent Armor for each wound on them.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, it is easy to forget about the hood. Once you wear it, it snakes out as if the piece had a mind of its own." - Sigurdur

name: Sky Splitter
text: React: Twice per turn, after this fighter hits with a melee strike: Target character within 1 rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 10) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "This will cleave your skull as surely as lightning rends the horizon. Only with more gore, of course." - Zul'tan Bloodletter

name: Stormwolf
text:
This card is also a Level 7 cleric item.
Order: Spend Stormwolf: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Stormwolf, target an adjacent character: Move the target forward or backward one rank.

name: The Dark Horse
text: Order: Spend The Dark Horse: Move forward one rank. If this fighter moved, he gains +3 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "It hasn't got a name because it isn't a single horse. Many have served as my steed over the years, and few of them have survived more than a single skirmish. Some say that's a bad omen, but I say a worse omen would be for me to die and the horse to live." - Kerebrus

name: Blowgun
text: Order: Spend Blowgun: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this rogue's Skill that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, the target must succeed with a poison save (DC 7 + this rogue's Skill) or suffer a wound and permanently gain the Poison trait.

name: Face Kit
text:
While adjacent to two characters, this rogue gans +2 AC.
While in an opposing formation, rogues gain +1 Level for equipping Face Kit.
While in his own formation, this rogue may perform the Stealth feat an additional time per turn.

name: Giant Toad
text:
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.
Order: Once per turn: Move backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have never seen a steed as unlikely as this one." - Kerebrus

name: Gloves of the Fang
text:
This rogue's Poison actions gain +2 to DC saves.
Order: Reveal a Poison action card in your hand that this rogue can perform: Succeed with a Scribe check (DC 15) to attach the action as if it had been successfully scribed, otherwise discard it.

name: Log Trap
text: React: After target character targets this rogue or an adjacent character with a melee strike, spend Log Trap: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 15) or you may destroy an item equipped to the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Try and catch me, daemon!" - Pinion

name: Parak Soulsaver
text:
Opposing card effects cannot change Parak's Level if there is another Dwarf in this rank.
Order: Three times per turn: Parak has +2 ATK and +2 AC until end of turn.
Order: Once per turn, discard two item cards from your hand: If Parak is in the front rank, ready him.
errata: His ready ability has no effect if he is not in the front rank, and so may not be used.

name: Laurena Kennet
text:
Other Elves in this rank add +3 to their die rolls.
Laurena may play Level 1 and 2 wizard spells.

setInfos.flavorText: "Calix's heart is not with the Houses, but with her people."
"History is all we were, and all you will be."

name: Mask of Past Lives
text:
May not be destroyed with card effects.
This rogue may detach and perform action cards that were attached to Mask with its Order. After such an action resolves, he must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound.
Order: Once per turn: Attach a card from your hand face down to Mask.

setInfos.flavorText: "Long after its bearers have turned to dust, it remembers. Their nightmares, too." - Taisia

name: Scourge of Fangs
text:
This card is also a Level 4 cleric item.
Order: Once per turn, spend Scourge of Fangs, target an opposing character within one rank: Perform a melee strike against the target that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, the target permanently gains the Poison trait or, if he already has the Poison trait, suffers -5 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Raclesis is a fool to believe he has found an escape from the Elements." - Khilkhameth

name: Spiritrender
text:
This card is also a Level 8 fighter item.
This character's melee strikes ignore the Planar trait and are Critical Failures on a roll of 5 or less.
Order: Once per turn: Until end of turn, this character's melee strikes inflict an additional wound. This character must succeed with a poison save (DC 17) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Some weapons should have never been forged." - Sigurdur

name: Troglodyte Egg
text: React: Before target character makes a melee strike roll against a character within 1 rank, spend Troglodyte Egg: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 20) or the character gains +5 AC for the duration of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "He sold it as the egg of a Sutek queen." - Angus

name: Tzin's Blades
text:
This card is also a Level 4 fighter item.
If this character is a fighter, he gains Powerattack +5.
If this character is a rogue, he gains Riposte +5.
If this character has both Powerattack and Riposte, he gains Defend +5.

name: Venomward
text: This rogue gains +3 Skill against poison saves and +2 AC while targeted with a melee strike by a character with the Poison trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "And how is this supposed to help me?" - Keziah

name: Eternity Gate
text: Spend Order; Spend and destroy (stun if this wizard is a Summoner) Eternity Gate: Return a character you control to his owner's hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "You should not use the gate without the supervision of one of my people, Nothrog." - Zul'Tan Bloodletter

name: Fire Dance
text:
React: After this wizard performs a Fire spell: Put a Charge on Fire Dance.
React: Once per turn, after target character targets this wizard with a strike: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + twice the number of Charges on Fire Dance) or suffer a wound.

name: Flamecaster
text: Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike. The target of the strike must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Acquiring an efreet's essence is the hard part, but other than that, it works beautifully." - Scyrax

name: Symbiotic Bracers
text:
This wizard's melee strikes do not inflict wounds but, if they hit, spend the target instead.
React: After target character enters play: Equip Symbiotic Bracers to the target regardless of class, control and, if this wizard is a Summoner, Level restrictions. The target may not perform this action.

name: Coreos Bodach
