text: Order: Once per turn, kill an Undead in your army: Your next melee strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "War breeds such interesting bargains. I know what the humans dread in us, and they are right to..."
Some children told of Coreos, and dreamed of terrors at night. Now, the dream walks the street of dead Corinth...

name: Spitting Cobra
text:
+3 Skill
Order: Spend Spitting Cobra, target a character within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 12) or suffer a wound. This is an Earth action.

name: Tome of Oblivion
text:
Necromancers gain +2 Levels for equipping Tome.
Elf clerics may equip this item regardless of class restrictions.
Order: Once per turn, remove 5 cards from the top of your deck from the game: Retrieve a character from your discard pile and put it into play.

name: Atu the Fallen
text:
Your Monsters and Undead inflict an additional wound against stunned characters.
React: Once per target per turn, after a target character within two ranks performs an action: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or become stunned.

name: Blackstone Spaulders
text:
This is a cleric and fighter item.
The rank behind this fighter will have an additional character in it before it is illegal.
Characters in the rank behind this character gain +3 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Many a Blackstone Raider stood in the abyssal's way with it. Wear it proudly." - Stonefist

name: Blessings of Granite
text: Order: Until end of turn, target character gains +3 ATK, +1 HP, Powerattack +6, and if this cleric is a Gargoyle, +3 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our cousins of this land know nothing of the earth's blessings. From whence do they receive the meager magic they possess?" - Thekk

name: Drasek the Furious
text:
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, target up to 2 characters within two ranks: Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or move backward one rank and become spent.

name: Glacial Axe
text:
Actions performed by this character that produce melee strikes are Water actions.
React: After target non-stunned character is hit with a melee strike by this character, spend Glacial Axe: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 15) or become spent. Spent characters who fail become stunned. This is a Water action.

name: Hood of Distraction
text: React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike or action, spend Hood of Distraction: Gain +4 AC and Skill for the duration of the strike or action.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've had to use some strange disguises to get into port sometimes, but I think that this was the one I'd like to forget." - Mad Mel Reyvilo

name: Ikzi
text:
If your Warlord is a Mercenary, Ikzi gains your Warlord's classes.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Put that down before you annihilate yourself!" - Loki

name: Aida
text:
Adjacent characters gain +2 Skill.
While one or more Aidas are in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms gain +3 Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "My powers are waning, Niobe! It's as if the gods themselves were growing more distant..."
"Her ways are strange, this islander. But the conviction that burns in her eyes... Yes, I will follow her."
"Everything has changed. Enemies become allies, allies become adversaries..."
"Creigh is an unholy fiend, and Mnettaor's little better, but both go if we get Ygraine. She's the one we don't see, so she's the one in charge."

name: Imperial Scepter
text:
This cleric gains an ATK bonus equal to his Charisma bonus.
This cleric may use Charisma on non-opposing characters within 2 ranks.
React: After this cleric kills an opposing character: Imperial Scepter permanently gains +1 to its Charisma bonus.

setInfos.flavorText: "Maybe people will take note of me now!" - Gixu

name: Judge Dacaus
text:
While performing a melee strike against a Dragon, Dacaus gains +8 ATK and the strike inflicts an additional wound.
React: After Dacaus performs a melee strike that killed a Dragon: Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Have you heard of a certain Drasek Berenj? I am looking for him."

name: Kraken Cave
text:
May only start in play when Queen-Mother Nyssara is your Warlord.
At end of turn, all non-Aquatic characters must succeed with a stamina save (DC 18) or suffer a wound. Stunned characters suffer an additional wound.

name: Mistress Dagani
text:
Gains +1 Level for casting spells.
React: Once per turn, before target Thrall suffers wounds from an opposing character: Until end of turn, the target gains +1 HP and Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "No mask? She had the 20 prettiest Thralls fetched to serve in her harem. None of them were ever seen again..." - Baraz

name: Moldering Cur
text:
May not equip items.
React: After an opposing character moves without spending or stunning: Move Moldering Cur forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "It looks almost fresh. Morghen's defilers have adapted quickly to this world." - Samanya

name: Nellia Yscar
text:
Nellia is a fighter and a rogue and enters play as if she were Level 4.
Spend Order: Once per game: Nellia permanently gains +5 ATK. Until end of game, her items are considered blank, except for traits. Move forward one rank, if possible. If Nellia is not stunned, she may perform an attack without spending.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nice tattoos, sister!" - Barrett Yscar

name: Scrap Golem
text:
Scrap Golem may equip items regardless of class, Level, and trait restrictions.
Scrap Golem gains +1 ATK, AC, Skill, and Powerattack +2 for each equipped item. All items are considered blank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even the garbage has its uses." - Loki

name: Sea Wasps
text:
Sea Wasps may not equip items.
Spend Order: Target all opposing characters in an adjacent rank: Perform a melee strike against each target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Another of Nyssara's misguided experiments has turned so many males into mindless, but beautiful drones." - Thalaasa

name: Seleesa
text: Spend Order: Perform two +3 ranged strikes. This is a Water action and a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "How do you think I was never raided? You just need to find the right Vaneris that accepts your price. Or your... attention." - Mad Mel Reyvilo

name: Sir Valance
text: While Sir Valance is adjacent to your Deverenian Warlord, he has the ability, "React: Once per turn, after a strike or action targets your Warlord: Redirect the strike or action to Sir Valance." and they both gain +2 ATK, AC, and Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "I deemed all of Rhawn's guard perished." - Commander Kaiten

name: Jiyacin Fret
text: While Jiyacin Fret is in your discard pile your Warlord has the ability "Order: Remove Jiyacin Fret from the game: Move target Free Kingdoms you control forward one rank."

setInfos.flavorText: "We've got a friend in Baraxton, Free King, but does Cartwright have a friend in you?"
"Sometimes we need more than hope, Darian. Sometimes we need a sacrifice to drive us on." - Jaqueline Windson

name: Stone Golem
text:
You must spend a Level 4 or higher wizard for Stone Golem to enter play.
May not equip items.
React: Before Stone Golem suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds to 1.
Order: Once per turn, target a character within 1 rank: Until end of turn the target's attack has one fewer melee strike, losing his last strike first and up to a minimum of 1.

name: The Undying
text:
For each Charge, this caracter has +2 ATK, +2 AC, +2 Skill, +2 Hit Points, and +2 Levels.
Your Elves are wizards (in addition to their other classes).
React: Before any character is killed: Place a card from your hand, face down adjacent to the target regardless of location (this may cause illegal ranks and be in an opposing formation). While in play the card is a Level 3 fighter with +4/+1 ATK, 14 AC, 2 Hit Points, +4 Skill, and the Elf and Undead traits.

name: Gixu the Jester
text:
Gixu is a wizard and a rogue.
Guxu may perform and Scribe action cards regardless of class restrictions.
React: After target opposing character performs an action card: Attach the card to Gixu as if it had been successfully scribed.

name: Here-There Mask
text:
May not be targeted by opposing characters.
React: Once per turn, after target rogue or wizard you control is targeted with a strike or action by an opposing character, target a character you control: The targets switch locations. Redirect the strike or action to the second target, if possible.

name: Tome of Wondrous Jests
text:
May not be targeted by opposing characters.
Action cards performed by this character may not be cancelled.
Order: Up to twice per turn: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a lower Level character, put it into play in your front rank; if it is an action, attach it to this character as if it had been successfully scribed; if it is an item, shuffle your deck and suffer a wound. This action may be performed by any Warlord.

name: Black Sun Shieldman
text: Characters in this rank gain +2 AC against ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hold your ground, men! The unbelievers cannot harm those with true faith!"

name: Brother Neris
text:
Your Stormwraiths gain +2 ATK.
Order: Once per turn, target a lower Level non-Warlord character within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with magic save (DC 18) or may not ready during the next ready phase.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Storm-blessed continue to arrive through the portals. Cut the tongues from any that suggest they are fleeing Deverenia."

name: Count Vyacheslav
text:
While Vyacheslav has a Weapon equipped, he gains Riposte +5 AND Powerattack +3.
While he has a Weapon and a Steed equipped, he gains +1 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Tegus are more than they appear, Kaiten. They were noble like us, long ago, before the Daemons came."

name: Father Jourdain
text:
Order: Once per turn, target a Level 3 or higher Deverenian you control. The target permanently gains the Stormwraith and Planar traits and suffers -6 AC.
Order: Once per turn per target, spend Jourdain or a Stormwraith: Target character suffers -X ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn, where X is the spent character's Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "Harken me! The Storm cometh!"

name: Percy Dorn
text: Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is my last burn-weed. You don't want to be here when its gone."
"Alliance or not, elven rangers will not learn my secrets."
"I can take you to the mainland, Dukat. Just step where I step, and for the love of Ishara, keep your head down."

name: Ghed Headrix
text: React: Once per turn, after target higher Level Deverenian in your front rank is targeted with a strike: Move Headrix adjacent to the target. Redirect the strike to Headrix, if possible.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Stormwraiths cannot be killed. When banished we only need to ride the ephemeral winds to heed the beckoning."

name: Ghed Symion
text: Order: Once per turn, you may spend a character, target a Stormwraith you control: The target moves forward one rank. If you spent a wizard, the target has an additional melee strike (base +4 ATK) when he attacks until end of turn. If you spent a cleric, remove one wound from the target.

name: Iphigenia
text: Deverenians you control in the rank in front of one or more Iphigenia gain +2 AC. While in the same rank as one or more Iphigenia, your Deverenians' spells against opposing Deverenians gain +3 to strike rolls and DC saves.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dmitir hath declared Yavlo a heretic. All who follow him shall be judged."

name: Squire Packard
text:
May not start in play.
Your higher Level Deverenians have the ability, "Order: Destroy a Level X Steed equipped to this character: Move forward one rank or perform a +X melee strike."

setInfos.flavorText: "No one minds their tongue around a stable boy, Evon. They do not suspect your involvement in Lord Kestrel's disappearance."

name: Stanchion
text: Order: Spend a character in this rank, target a character within 1 rank: The target gains +3 ATK or +2 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have been sent by King Alaric himself. He proposes an armistice."

name: Tempest Guard
text:
While Tempest Guard has a primary ATK of +4 or more, he gains the Planar trait.
React: After the decree phase: Tempest Guard permanently gainst + 2 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "Some of the locals have become true believers, Father Jourdain. Cannot you see their devotion?"

name: Aguas
text:
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, after a character you control performs a Water action: Move Aguas forward one rank.
React: Twice per turn, after Aguas performs a melee strike that missed target character: Perform a melee strike against the target.

name: Dreadfang
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Dreadfang: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 16) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "An excellent trophy." - Judge Dacaus

name: Dwarf-Eater
text: Dwarf-Eater's melee strikes gain +4 ATK against Dwarves and gain +3 for each wound on the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "His name cannot be spoken in Common."

name: Harun Qadir
text:
Harun gains +1 Level for casting Air spells.
React: Once per turn, after Harun moves, target a character that was adjacent to him before he moved: Move the target forward or backward one rank. This is an Air action.

setInfos.flavorText: "If we act swiftly now, Amr, we can be free forever!"

name: Tyron Yscar
text: Spend Order: Once per game: Tyron Yscar permanently gains: +3 ATK, +3 AC, +3 Skill and Riposte +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "We will meet changes with changes of our own."

name: Menhetiri
text:
React: Once per turn, after an opposing Level 0 character is killed: Retrieve a character from your discard pile and put it into play.
Order: Once per turn, target a lower Level opposing character within 3 ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14 + Menhetiri's Level) or permanently lose one Level and Menhetiri permanently gains one Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "I cannot stay with you forever, Kerebrus. My gods will return soon and I must be here to greet them."

name: Narutep
text: Spend Order: Stun Narutep: Remove a wound from a Monster within 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Brine Fiends are only beasts, a nuisance. I know everything about them you might ever want to know." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Swamp Hydra
text:
Hydra may not equip items.
For each charge on Hydra, it has an additional melee strike (base +5 ATK) when it attacks and +1 HP.
React: Once per turn, after Hydra kills an equal or higher Level opposing character: Put a Charge (2 if the character was a The Chosen Daemon) on Hydra.

name: Vengeful Spirit
text:
Vengeful Spirit gains +3 to strike rolls and DC saves against Dwarves.
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Vengeful Spirit: The target must succeed with a Magic Save (DC 13) or permanently lose one Level.

name: Whizzwhir
text: Reaxt: After your Warlord rolls initiative, reveal a Level X action card from your hand: Until end of turn, Whizzwhir gains the card's class(es) and +X ATK, AC, and Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "A most versatile creation." - Roshni

name: Wogh
text: React: Twice per turn, before Wogh suffers wounds: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 15) to reduce the wounds by 1.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hmm. He might be a pup of mine. Won't help him much." - Krenthor Gouge

name: Call Lightning
text:
This card is also a Level 4 wizard action.
Spend Order: Until end of turn this character has the ability, "Order: Up to three times per turn: Perform a +7 ranged strike."

setInfos.flavorText: "Even if the gods are silent do not underestimate the force of nature itself!" - Niobe

name: Cauterize
text: Spend React: Before target non-opposing character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one. The next wounds suffered by a character you control this turn are reduced by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Heat does not only damage, it also prevents evil spirits from entering the body." - Brom

name: Ferocious
text: Order: Target up to three characters: The target(s) gain +X ATK, where X equals this cleric's Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "You worms will never truely be like me, but maybe this way you'll be able to keep up." - Krenthor Gouge

name: Mayara Wadreth
text: Spend React: Before Mayara Wadreth is killed by an opposing character: Ready an adjacent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Spike traps? Who uses those anymore? We're fighting last year's villains!"
"Oh, Farrel, you'd think we weren't any good at surviving dark gods' curses."

name: Quicksand
text:
Level 4 or higher clerics perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Target an equal or lower Level non-Warlord character within 2 ranks: The target does not ready during the next ready phase.

setInfos.flavorText: "Oh, he'll live. If you choose to help him." - Azam

name: Soothing Waters
text:
React: Before target character you control suffers wounds, inflict a wound on a different character: Reduce the target's wounds by one.
React: After this cleric performs a Water action, target up to three characters you control: Remove a wound from each target.

setInfos.flavorText: "A miracle of our ancient kings." - Meri-es-anch

name: Precise Strike
text:
This card is also a Level 2 cleric action.
React: Before this character makes a melee strike roll: Gain +X ATK for this strike where X equals this character's Skill. This strike ignores Critical Failures.

setInfos.flavorText: "Something burrowed these tunnels beneath Winterhold. If they tell me the truth and it is Daemons, it sounds all too familiar." - King Alaric

name: Beckon the Sea
text:
Spend Order: Target character within 2 ranks must succeed with a Magic save (DC 10 + this wizard's Skill) or suffer two wounds.
React: After this wizard performs a Water action, target up to two characters within 2 ranks: Each target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 2 + this wizard's Skill) or become spent and suffer one wound.

name: Disorient
text: React: After this wizard is targeted with a strike by target character: The target must succeed with a perception save (DC 10 + this wizard's Level, +5 if this wizard is an Illusionist) or the strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Leave me be, barbarian. I do not have time to deal with your kind at the moment." - Yahia

name: Heaven's Wrath
text:
Spend Order: Perform two +4 ranged strikes that may target an additional rank away.
React: After this wizard performs an Air action, target up to two characters within 2 ranks: Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

name: Kiss of the Mummy
text:
This card is also a Level 3 cleric action.
Order: Target a character within 1 rank: Succeed with a dexterity check (DC = target's AC) to attach Kiss of the Mummy to the target. While it is attached, the target gains the Poison trait and suffers -2 ATK, AC, and Skill.
Spend Order: Inflict a wound on target character with the Poison trait within 1 rank.

name: Rite of Power
text: Order: Spend an adjacent Level X wizard: Until end of turn, this wizard gains +1 Level for casting spells and his spells gain +X to DC saves and strike rolls.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yeg-Igryll is displeased, Atiratu. Further failure will not be tolerated."

name: Sunder the Soul
text:
Necromancers perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Target a non-Warlord character within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + this wizard's Skill) or attach Sunder the Soul. While it is attached, the target gains the Cursed trait and suffers -2 Levels.

name: Burial Shroud
text: React: Before target character you control within 1 rank is killed, destroy Shroud: Retrieve the target from your discard pile after he dies and place him on top of your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's best if no one knew he was even dead. Belief is so much weaker when miracles are so common." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Nemamiah
text:
Nemamiah may not start in play, is a fighter and a rogue, and enters play as if he were one Level higher.
React: After Nemamiah targets a spent character with a melee strike, discard a character card: The strike has +6 ATK and inflicts an additional wound.

name: Golden Tablet
text: Spend Order: Once per turn, target up to two characters: The target(s) gain +X ATK, AC, and Skill, where X equals this cleric's Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "It symbolizes the hope that the old gods held for their children to survive without them-a hope that the deities of The Chosen have thus far kept repressed." - Niobe

name: Totem Crawler
text:
+3 Skill
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character moves forward without spending or stunning: Move a character you control forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "With no totem of its own, Centipede is content to serve others, scurrying to win favor like a goblin." - Pelanth

name: War Eagle
text: Order: Once per turn, War Eagle performs a melee strike that may target an additional rank away as if it were a Level 3 fighter with +4 ATK, 13 AC, +4 Skill, and 1 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "Appearances can be deceptive, as well you know." - Drasek Berenj

name: Mischievous Sprite
text:
-2 Skill
Order: Once per game: Equip Sprite to target character regardless of class and Level restrictions. Sprite permanently loses this ability.
Order: Once per turn: Succeed with a perception check (DC 20) to destroy Sprite.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nice to look at, but boy, do they sting." - Herick

name: Whirlwind Ring
text: Order: Once per turn: Perform a +5 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, move the target backward one rank. This is an Air action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Trinkets our fathers gave to our mothers to soothe their pains after bedding them." - Zul'Tan

name: Consort's Crown
text:
Deverenian only.
Order: Spend Crown, discard a card: Target Stormwraith gains +5 ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "We will have a new emperor." - Corinne Drac

name: Sumptuous Feast
text:
Mercenary only.
Order: Spend Sumptuous Feast, discard a card: Move a non-opposing Monster or Dragon forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "When dealing with their kind you better have some snack ready. Provided you mind not ending as one yourself." - Azam

name: Dal'kir
text:
Dal'kir may not equip Armor or Helms.
Order: Once per turn: Remove a wound from Dal'kir.
React: After Dal'kir enters play: Move him forward up to X ranks, where X is the number of wounded Warlords in play.

name: Tacus Fylde
text:
While Tacus is Level 5 or higher, he gains the Warlord trait.
React: Once per turn, after Tacus kills an equal or higher Level opposing character: He permanently gains +1 Level, +2 ATK, +2 AC, +2 Skill, and +1 HP.

name: Faerie Bolt
text:
Scouts gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, this rogue's next ranged strike this turn against the target is a Critical Success.
React: Before a ranged strike by this rogue is cancelled: The strike is not cancelled.

name: Sarakian Battle Cat
text: Sarakian Battle Cat may not equip items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Oh, sure, it looks ferocious now, but before Lucian, it cringed at the first sign of trouble." - Corten Lye
The beast's roar echoed above the pounding rain as it locked eyes with its hapless foe.

name: The Sweetest Death
text: Order: Spend a rogue in this rank: Perform a melee strike that may target an additional rank and does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, move the target forward one rank and he cannot perform actions to move until end of turn.

name: Volley
text: Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike. You may spend X Levels of non-opposing characters to gain a +X bonus for the strike. If you spent 2 or more characters this way, the strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "That's why they call the first wave to break up the dwarves' defenses the Forlorn Hope." - Set'rokh

name: Risk's Reward
text: React: Before this character kills target opposing character within 1 rank: Reveal X cards from the top of your deck, where X is twice the target's Level. You may retrieve a revealed item and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "You don't mind if I borrow this, do you?" - Amends

name: Feathered Gauntlets
text:
Order: Discard a card: Ready Gauntlets.
React: Before this rogue makes a ranged strike roll, spend Gauntlets: Use two dice for the roll. You may choose which one to use for the result.

setInfos.flavorText: "These aren't magical, I just like the feel. The truth is, I'm just better than you." - B'alam Nak

name: Gudleifur
text:
Your Dwarves gain +1 Level for equipping Armor.
Adjacent Dwarves have the ability: "Order: Stun this character: Perform a melee strike."
React: Once per turn after Gudleifur suffers two or more wounds: Reduce the wounds by 1.

setInfos.flavorText: "Gudleifur is a champion in his own right." - Sigurdur

name: Amends
text: Order: Kill Amends: A non-stunned Dwarf or The Chosen Warlord that was adjacent to Amends may perform an attack without spending.

setInfos.flavorText: "Disregard me, my king. I go willingly. Just make sure it is not in vain and strike now! End the siege of Winterhold!"

name: B'alam Nak
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike. Perform a +4 ranged strike.
React: Once per turn after target Nothrog moves into or enters play in a front rank: Either discard the top card of any deck or the target performs a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "This land was Jaguar's, long before any city."

name: Blazing Medallion
text: Spend Order: Once per turn: Ready target non-stunned Level 1 or 2 character. Warlords may perform this action without spending.

setInfos.flavorText: "Once, I was as they. Yet they shall have aid where I had none." - Gudleifur

name: Coup d'arret
text: React: Before target character makes a melee strike roll against this fighter: Roll a die. If the target's strike roll is equal to or greater than the fighter's strike roll, cancel the strike, destroy a Weapon equipped to the target, and perform a melee strike against the target. Use your die roll as the melee strike's roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Knights want to dispatch a levy as swiftly as possible and won't be prepared for this." - Brymin

name: Find the Seam
text: React: After target character is targeted with a melee strike by this rogue: Gain +X ATK for the strike, where X is twice the number of items equipped to the target. A target with no items equipped may not react to or during the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "A small, clean cut. Elven kill. How did those scum get here before us?" - B'alam Nak

name: Dreiga
text:
Characters adjacent to Dreiga gain +3 ATK.
While Dreiga is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms gain +1 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Chosen chain the soul as well as the body. Once more, we must become liberators."
"Who Ygraine didn't take, the nothrog did. Those who survived, starved. Bicker into your graves for all I care-I'll have my revenge."
"It's been two hours since we fought the Deverenians, paladin. How long's it been for you?"

name: Gris' Double Bit Axe
text:
Fighters gain +1 Level for equipping Double Bit Axe for each wound on them.
React: After this fighter makes a melee strike roll, spend Double Bit Axe: Re-roll the die.

name: Pikes Set
text: React: After target opposing character moves to within 1 rank of this fighter without spending or stunning: Perform a +10 melee strike against the target. If the strike hits, destroy all Steeds equipped to the target and move him backward one rank.

name: Pillage
text:
Order: Target an item within 1 rank: Succeed with a strength check (DC 9 + target's Level) to destroy the target. You may shuffle Pillage into your deck.
Spend Order: Until end of turn, characters in this rank gain +3 ATK. Perform an attack without spending.

name: Pyre
text:
This fighter gains +2 ATK while he does not have a Shield equipped.
React: After this fighter is targeted by an opposing character with a ranged strike or action that does not produce a melee strike, spend Pyre: Perform a melee strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "It belonged to a sightless warrior, once." - Brymin

name: Reconnaissance
text: Order: If this rogue is in your front rank, move him into an opposing front rank. This rogue gains Stealth +3 until end of turn. At end of turn, if this rogue is in an opposing formation, you may move him into your front rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "See not only the city, but its mirror below. There is our entry-point." - B'alam Nak

name: Red Steel Gauntlets
text:
Fighter and wizard only.
This character gains +1 to non-save Skill checks for each item he has equipped.
Order: Spend Red Steel Gauntlets: Ready an Armor, Shield, or Weapon equipped to this character.

name: Scorpion Stance
text:
This rogue has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks.
React: After this rogue performs a melee strike or moves as part of an action whose source is not a Steed: Gain +1 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The only way you will learn it, is by watching it. And then you will be dead." - Zara

name: Sharkskin Gargoyle
text:
May not start in play.
It is a fighter, a rogue, and a wizard, and enters play as if it were Level 4.
Higher Level Dwarf fighters in this rank gain +X ATK and Skill, where X is this character's Level.
React: After target Dwarf in this rank kills an opposing character of equal or higher Level than the target: the target permanently gains +1 Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sharkskin fortifies it against Vaneris magic. Loki wasn't dumb." - Respite

name: Veteran Training
text: Spend Order: Target non-opposing character within 1 rank performs an attack, spending as usual, but uses the printed ATK of this fighter instead of his own.

setInfos.flavorText: "I keep tellin' ya - practice, practice, practice!" - Sir Wallence

name: Ghed Invictus
text:
Your Warlord gains +1 to initiative rolls.
Ghed Invictus may enter play as if he were Level 6.
Order: Once per turn, you may spend Ghed Invictus: Spend target lower Level character within 1 rank (2 ranks if you spent Ghed Invictus).
React: After entering play as if he were 6th Level: Ghed Invictus permanently gains +4 ATK, AC, and Skill, +2 Levels, and +1 HP.

name: Duri Earthwalker
text:
When Duri uses a feat, he has a bonus equal to the highest Level item he has equipped.
Order: Once per turn, target and stun a ready equipped item: Ready Duri.
Order: Once per turn: Ready an unstunned equipped item.
errata:
Duri's bonus to feats doesn't affect special abilities that require feat checks, such as Hide in Shadows.
Only when he is using the feat, as written in the rulebook, does he gain the bonus.

name: Selai Yscar
text: React: After Selai Yscar enters play, target a character in an opposing first rank: Move the target backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Back daemons, or learn the true price of ambition!"
"You don't have to like me. You are in no position to refuse my help."
"Pretty Anasasia, how I wish I could have seen it when you failed."

name: Nepheline Gargoyle
text:
May equip items regardless of class restrictions.
While in your hand, your Warlord has the ability, "Order: Reveal and discard Nepheline Gargoyle: Until end of turn, you may reduce the entering rank of your Gargoyles by one, if possible."
Spend React: After entering play: Search your deck for an item and put it into your hand.

name: Revenant
text:
Before Revenant leaves play: Remove from the game any cards attached to him.
Order: Target a Level X character in an opposing discard pile: Put a Revenant into play from your hand as if he were Level X. If you do, retrieve the target and attach it to Revenant. While it is attached, Revenant gains the target's stats, traits (except factions and alignment) and abilities.
Order: Put Revenant on top of its owner's deck.

name: Aristaios
text:
Regardless of location, Aristaios gains +1 Level and has an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks for each other Aristaios in play.
While in play, your other Lycanthropes gain +2 ATK and, if Aristaios is Level 6 or higher, he gains +1 HP.
Spend React: Before a Lycanthrope enters play: The Lycanthrope's entering rank is reduced by one, if possible.

name: Karn of Clan Manaka
text:
Karn gains +X ATK, where X is twice his Level.
While Karn is Level 5 or higher, he gains +1 HP.
While Karn is Level 6 or higher, he inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
React: After one of your Nothrog kills an opposing Level X character: Put Karn into play from your hand. His entering rank is reduced by X. Karn permanently suffers -X Levels.

name: Shan-Kassyn
text:
While in your hand, your The Chosen have the ability, "Spend Order: Reveal and shuffle Shan-Kassyn into your deck: Draw a card."
React: Once per turn, before you put a Daemon into play: Reduce the Daemon's entering rank by one, if possible.

name: Kardak-Vash
text:
Kardak-Vash may only target Monsters with Medicine, but may perform the Medicine feat on Monsters within 1 rank.
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on target character: Until end of turn, the target gains +5 ATK and, if he is a Monster, has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks.

name: Vash-Arrosh
text:
Your Sutek may perform Level 3 or lower rogue action cards, regardless of class restrictions.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +7 melee strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target.
React: After the initiative phase: Until end of turn, other Monsters in the same rank as Vash-Arrosh gain +3 ATK, -3 AC, and inflict an additional wound against equal or lower Level characters with melee strikes.

name: Embolden
text: Order: You may spend this cleric: Until end of turn, characters in the same rank as this cleric (your front rank if you spent him) gain +X ATK and AC, where X is this cleric's Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "I see a whole army, here in defiance of tyranny. You've come to fight as free men... and free men you are. What will you do with that freedom? Will you fight?" - Sir Robert

name: False God's Council
text:
This is not a spell.
Spend Order: Kill target character: Reveal X cards from the top of your deck, where X is twice the target's Level. You may retrieve one revealed card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Spiked Ale
text: Spend Order: Attach Spiked Ale to target equal or lower Level character within 3 ranks. While it is attached, the target has the ability, "All characters in this rank gain the Poison trait."

setInfos.flavorText: "Fool. How likely is it a beautiful woman you ne'er knew before will buy you a mug?" - Taisia
"Markappal's dead've been acting strange. Well, beyond walking' and eatin', I mean."
"Something's brewing 'neath the mud. Best to have a care, Dukat."

name: Champion of the Faith
text:
This is not a spell.
React: After this cleric kills an opposing higher Level character: This cleric permanently gains +1 Level, +1 HP, +3 ATK, and +3 AC, and has the ability, "Other characters in this rank gain +2 ATK and AC." Remove Champion of the Faith from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "Abyssbane has fallen, let our deaths be as good!"

name: Order of Battle
text: Spend Order: Each character you control may retrieve and equip an item that he can legally equip from your discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "You call that ready for inspection? Fetch that bloody sword from your tent right NOW or you'll wish you were never born!" - Sir Wallence

name: Superior Armament
text:
Order: Move forward up to X ranks, where X is the number of items equipped to this character.
Order: Until end of turn, this fighter gains +1 ATK and AC for each item equipped to him.

setInfos.flavorText: "Isn't that just like those hovel dwellers? Brings a stick to a battlefield."

name: A Single Motion
text: Spend Order: Until end of turn, this fighter gains +2 Levels for equipping items. He may equip an item. Perform an attack without spending.

setInfos.flavorText: The Nothrog didn't fully appreciate the knight's fluid drawing of his sword, a single motion that chopped through his foe's neck.

name: Dreadnaught
text: React: After this fighter kills an opposing higher Level character: This fighter permanently gains +1 Level, +3 ATK, and +1 HP, and has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks. Remove Dreadnaught from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "I hope he doesn't turn around." "He won't turn around. We'll creep up on him, nice and slow, so he won't notice."

name: Anticipate
text: React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike or action by target character: Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sometimes the best way to riposte is to hit them before they hit you." - Talin Tzin

name: Finishing Move
text:
React: After this rogue hits target character with a melee strike that is a Critical Success: Kill the target. If the target is a Warlord, inflict an additional wound instead.
React: Before this rogue makes a melee strike roll against a lower Level character: The roll is a Critical Success.

name: Lucky Shot
text: React: Before this rogue targets a ranged strike, you may destroy an Arrow equipped to this rogue: The strike may target an additional rank away and gains +3 to the die roll. If you destroyed an Arrow, the strike either gains an additional +5 to the die roll or inflicts an additional wound.

name: Prince Among Thieves
text: React: After this rogue kills an opposing higher Level character: This rogue permanently gains +1 Level, +1 HP, and Stealth +4, and has the ability, "This rogue's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against spent characters." Remove Prince Among Thieves from game.

name: Harness the Storm
text: Spend Order: Spend any number of wizards: Target character within 2 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC = this wizard's Skill) or suffer 2 wounds. For each wizard spent, the spell either gains +5 DC or may target an additional rank away.

name: Lost Pack
text:
React: Once per game, after killing an opposing character: All Direwolves in play permanently gain +2 ATK and +1 AC.
React: Before Lost Pack dies: All Direwolves in play permanently gain +1 ATK and +2 AC.

name: Mind Over Body
text: Spend Order: Target non-Warlord character within 3 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + this wizard's Skill) or perform an order of your choice. You gain control of the target for the duration of the order.
errata: Erratum 2012/05/05: The Spend Order should read "Spend Order: Target non-Warlord character within 3 ranks must succeed with a will save (DC 8 + this wizard's Skill) or perform an order of your choice. You gain control of the target for the duration of the order."

setInfos.flavorText: "With me all your brawn is for naught, since your mind is weak." - Menhetiri

name: One Last Time
text: Order: Target a character in any discard pile: Retrieve the target and put it into play ready in your front rank and under your control. The target performs a melee strike. Remove the target from the game, regardless of location.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's impossible! You can't be here, I saw you die!"

name: Archmage
text:
This is not a spell.
React: After this wizard kills an opposing higher Level character: This wizard permanently gains +1 Level, +1 HP, +3 Skill, and has the ability, "Order: Once per game: Attach a wizard spell from your hand to this wizard. While it is attached, this wizard may cast the spell once per turn (do not remove it unless that is part of its effect)." Remove Archmage from the game.

name: Dragon Throne Crown
text:
Your characters' actions gain +3 to DC saves.
React: Before one of your characters kills target Level X opposing character, spend Crown: Retrieve a Level X - 1 character from your discard pile and put it into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "You will give that to me." - Drasek Berenj

name: Corvus
text:
Corvus may remain spent during the ready phase.
Order: Spend Corvus, target another character: While Corvus remains spent, the target gains Defend, Magic Resistance, Powerattack, AND Riposte +6.

name: Canticle
text: React: Once per target per turn, after this cleric casts a Level X spell: Target character gains +X ATK or AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The power of The Storm is returning, slowly." - Inquisitor Dmitir

name: Blight
text: Order: Spend Blight: Target equal or lower Level character suffers -3 AC and Skill until end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sickness and plague have beaten more enemies than battles." - Raclesis

name: Crimson Dragon Shield
text:
+5 Skill
React: After this fighter is targeted with a melee strike or action by an opposing character, spend Shield: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "It not only turns the spines of enemies into puddle, it is actually useful, too."

name: Fiendish Plate
text:
This fighter may not be moved backward and gains +X ATK, where X is the number of Charges on Fiendish Plate.
While Fiendish Plate has 4 or more Charges, this fighter gains +1 HP.
While Fiendish Plate has 8 or more Charges, it may not be destroyed and gains +2 AC.
React: After this fighter kills a character: Put a Charge on Fiendish Plate.

name: Panthera
text:
Scribed actions performed by this fighter are removed from the game.
React: After this fighter kills an opposing character, spend Panthera: Choose a fighter action card in your discard pile and retrieve and attach it to this fighter as if scribed.

name: Ariella
text: Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "We cannot face the Storm for you. This is your time, mortals, for good or for ill."
"How great Albrecht's love must be, that he risks himself anew for these men."

name: Ghoststeel Gauntlets
text: Order: Spend X items equipped to this fighter: Perform a +0 melee strike against target Level X character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't forget: Your shield, your mail, your helmet, even the spurs on your boots can be used as weapons." - Sir Wallence

name: Shadowborn Harness
text:
React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike or action, spend Harness: Succeed with a Stealth check (DC 20) to cancel the strike or action.
Spend Order: Spend Harness: If this rogue is in the last rank of a formation, succeed with a Stealth check (DC 25) to move into the last occupied rank of any other formation.

name: Blood Hawk
text:
+2 Skill
Scribed actions performed by this rogue are removed from the game.
Order: Spend Blood Hawk, remove a card in your hand from the game: Choose a rogue action card in your discard pile and retrieve and attach it to this rogue as if scribed.

name: Perpetual Pouch
text:
React: After an item that was equipped to another character is put into a discard pile, spend Pouch: Put a Charge on Pouch.
Order: Remove a Charge from Pouch: Target character you control either may retrieve and equip an item that he can legally equip from your discard pile or gains +1 Level for equipping items until end of turn.

name: Firewisp Orb
text: While in the front rank, this rogue may perform the Defend feat to redirect strikes or actions against characters you control that are within 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "You peer into it, hard, and for a moment you can be there! The uses are manifold, really." - Roona

name: Infinity Codex
text:
This wizard's spells gain +2 to strike rolls and DC saves for each Charge on Codex.
Order: Twice per turn: Put a Charge on Codex.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a Level X character and put it into play adjacent to this wizard, where X is the number of Charges pn Codex.

name: Cloak of Thousand Eyes
text: React: After target character in this rank is targeted with a strike, spend Cloak: The target gains +5 AC for the duration of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Useful in battle, but it gives me the creeps when I try to go to sleep at night." - Reese

name: Curious Mephit
text: React: Before target character within 2 ranks makes a save roll, spend Mephit: The target uses two dice for the roll. You may choose which one to use for the result.

setInfos.flavorText: "A truely obnoxious creature, but it has its uses. If only you could get rid of its sulphurous stench." - Herick the Venomous

name: Great Wyrm Potion
text:
Order: Equip Potion to an adjacent character, regardless of class or Level restrictions.
React: After this character pays the costs of an action, destroy the Potion: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Belt of Corruption
text:
May not be targeted by opposing characters while equipped to Atu the Fallen.
Order: Spend Belt: Search your deck for a Level 5 or lower Monster or Undead and put it into play in any rank in your formation.
React: Once per turn, before this cleric suffers wounds, inflict the same number of wounds on a Monster or Undead: Reduce this cleric's wounds to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Free King is a traitor. I will not have him sully Michael's name so."
"Oh, go rattle your chains elsewhere. I'm busy." - Anton Cyldragen

name: Gorget of Soul Binding
text:
May not be targeted by opposing characters while equipped to Atu the Fallen.
React: Before target opposing character is killed by this cleric: The target is not killed. Remove all wounds from the target. The target is permanently under your control and while it remains so, gains the Monster and Undead traits.

name: In Death Ground
text:
Warlord only.
Order: Until end of turn, characters may not move out of the front rank and gain +1 HP and Riposte +10. Until end of turn, Riposte is triggered by melee and ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Plunge them into death ground and they will vanquish." - Set'rokh

name: Reflection of Power
text:
+4 Skill
Effects from this character's spells have +3 to ranged strikes, melee strikes, and DC.
React: Once per turn, after a character you control wounds target opposing character with an effect from a spell: Inflict a wound on the target.

name: Winter, Eternal
text:
Wounds inflicted by Winter may not be reduced.
Winter may perform Water actions regardless of class.
React: Once per turn, after Winter suffers wounds: Ready Winter. If the wounds were inflicted by an opposing character then this action may be performed while stunned.

name: The Lost Bride
text:
The Lost Bride is a fighter and a rogue and enters play as if she were Level 4.
Remove The Lost Bride from the game after she dies.
React: After The Lost Bride enters play: Draw a card.
React: Before target character is killed by her: Remove the target from the game after he dies. Remove all wounds from her.

name: The Biting West Wind
text:
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character spends or stuns due to a card effect or falling forward: Perform a +6 ranged strike.

name: Drasek Resplendant
text:
May not equip items.
You may begin the game with a Dragon in rank 3.
Your Dragons are non-Unique Mercenaries and enter play in rank 3.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, target all opposing characters in an adjacent rank: Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 18) or move backwards 1 rank and become spent.

name: Baraz
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
React: Once per turn, after target character pays the cost of an action to draw or retrieve card(s) from the deck: Perform a +5 ranged strike against the target.

name: Cutlass
text: React: After this rogue succeeds with a Riposte check: Move backward one rank or to another position in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The best tool for profitable sea journeys." - Mad Mel Reyvilo

name: Sahuagin Raider
text: React: Once per turn, after a character performs a Water action: Move Sahuagin Raider forward one rank, if possible. He gains an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Viciously evil even before, they reacted badly to the invasion into their realm." - Alera

name: Farrel Wadreth
text: Spend React: After a character in the rank in front of Farrel dies: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "It amazes me-we never stumble upon a dungeon before the final act of some nefarious lord's dark rites."
"Oh, look. A swampy temple ruin. Can we leave it alone just this once."

name: Warmaster Sceth
text:
May not equip Steeds.
Order: Ready target non-stunned Siege.
Order: Kill a Siege: Until end of turn, Sceth gains +3 ATK and his melee strikes may target 2 ranks away.
errata: Erratum 2011/12/20: The Order should read "Order: Once per turn, ready target non-stunned Siege."

setInfos.flavorText: "Follow me, maggots. You haven't seen war yet."

name: The Bloody Mistress
text:
React: Before making an initiative roll, kill any number of target Thralls or spend any number of target non-Thralls: Gain +3 to the roll for each target.
React: After winning initiative, discard up to two cards: Draw that many cards.

name: Rabinus the Elder
text:
Rabinus is a cleric and a rogue and gains +1 Level for performing Water actions.
React: Before target character you control suffers wounds, inflict a wound on a different character: Reduce the target's wounds by 1.
errata: Erratum 2011/12/20: The React should read "React: Once per turn, before target character you control suffers wounds, inflict a wound on a different character: Reduce the target's wounds by 1."

name: Phoenix Rising
text:
May not equip items.
Phoenix may not be removed from the game and may perform Fire actions regardless of class restrictions.
Fire actions inflict one less wound on Phoenix.
Before Phoenix is killed: Shuffle it into its owner's deck after it dies.
Order: Discard a card: Move Phoenix forward or backward one rank.
React: After Phoenix performs a Fire action: Remove a wound from Phoenix.
errata: Erratum 2012/05/05: No longer has the text "May not be removed from the game."

name: Mercurial Phoenix
text:
May not be targeted by opposing players' actions while equipped to Harvester of Souls.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Level X Thrall: Draw X cards or perform X +6 ranged strikes.

name: Mask of Dominance
text:
May not be targeted by opposing players' actions while equipped to Harvester of Souls.
Your Thralls have +2 ATK, AC, and Skill.
All opposing non-Warlord characters within two ranks gain the Thrall trait.

name: Kestrel the Deceiver
text: Order: Once per turn: Until Kestrel uses this ability again, target other Level 3 or higher Deverenian you control gains +2 ATK, AC, and Skill and, while not stunned, has the ability, "Kestrel may target spells as if he were in this character's loccation."

name: Judgment Day
text:
Warlord only.
Order: Until end of turn, good characters gain +4 ATK against evil characters, and all characters have the ability, "Order: Stun this character: Perform a melee strike."

setInfos.flavorText: "We're not going to make it, are we? People, I mean."

name: R'Veeka
text:
Strikes that inflict more than 1 wound only inflict 1 wound on R'Veeka.
React: Once per turn, before target character suffers wounds from a strike, discard a card: The strike may only inflict 1 wound. If your Warlord is a Mercenary, you may reduce the wounds by 1 instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't be fooled, her mind's as sharp as her blades."

name: Roona
text:
Your Level 1 characters gain +2 ATK.
Order: Once per turn: If Roona is in your front rank, target Warlord or Hero must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or suffer a wound and become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "A true rogue. Charms anybody's pants off."

name: Josef Krieg
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
While Josef Krieg is in your discard pile your Free Kingdoms have the ability "Order: Remove Josef Krieg from the game: Perform a +4 ranged strike."

name: Dawn of the Dead
text:
Warlord only.
Order: The player to your left must target a character in his discard pile and put it into play, ignoring illegal ranks. Each other player may choose a Level X or lower character and put it into play, ignoring illegal ranks, where X is the target's Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "Every dead body that is not exterminated becomes one of them. It gets up and kills! The people it kills get up and kill!"

name: Cairn Rowan
text:
Cairn gains +3 ATK and Skill for each character with the Warlord or Hero trait in play.
Order: Once per turn, spend a character. If you spent a wizard, Warlord, or Hero, you may move Cairn forward or backward one rank. If you spent a cleric, Warlord, or Hero, ready Cairn.

name: Envoy Soraya
text:
Order: Spend a Treasure equipped to Soraya: Perform a melee strike or a +6 ranged strike, or move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, target a Treasure within 3 ranks: Destroy the target or equip it to Soraya regardless of class or Level restrictions.

name: Phoenix Feather
text: Order: Rip Phoenix Feather in half: Put target lower Level character from any discard pile into play under your control within 1 rank. Opposing characters may not react to or during this action.

setInfos.flavorText: "A single feather of the phoenix holds power over life and death."

name: Chill's Razor
text:
Undead you control gain +2 ATK.
This character's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against wounded characters.

name: Circlet of Veiled Sight
text:
Rogue and wizard only.
React: Before a striike roll, spend Circlet: The strike suffers -3 to the die roll. After the strike, you may move this character forward or backward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "One of the gifts our ancient gods would bestow upon a mortal who pleased them."

name: Dragontear Shield
text:
This character gains +6 AC and Skill while targeted with an Earth action.
React: Once per turn, after this character performs an Earth action: All characters in this rank gain +2 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Some say gems are the tears of dragons." - Dacaus

name: Orvac Granitefall
text:
Orvac gains a bonus to ranged strikes equal to his ATK.
Opposing non-Gargoyle characters suffer -1 Level for equipping items for each item equipped.
React: After an opposing character performs an action to move: Move Orvac forward or backward one rank.

name: Pog'myrmex
text: Order: Once per turn, put a card from your hand into play face down as an Insect Swarm, an evil Level 1 rogue with +3 ATK, 10 AC, +1 Skill, 1 HP, and the ability, "Insect Swarm's melee strikes do not inflict wounds. If it hits with a melee strike, the target becomes spent or, if already spent, stunned."

name: Queen-Mother Nyssara
text:
Starts the game with Giant Kraken in rank 3.
Water spells cast by Nyssara inflict an additional wound and may be cast without spending.
Your Aquatic characters may enter play adjacent to Nyssara.
Your characters gain the Aquatic trait while in play.

name: Za'beth Candlebane
text: Spend Order: Target a character of equal or lower Level: Move the target forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The orb is just a bauble, a focus. The real power is within me."
"Mine."

name: Rica O'Shea
text:
Rica's strikes inflict an additional wound against characters that share a faction with your Warlord.
Order: Once per turn perform two +4 ranged strikes.
React: Once per turn, after killing an equal or higher Level character: Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "One into the heart, and one into the eye."

name: Roshni
text: Order: Once per turn, target an item within 2 ranks: Until Roshni leaves play or uses this order again, the item gains either +2 ATK, +2 AC, or +2 to DC saves and ranged strikes from the item's actions.

setInfos.flavorText: "Loki's brother made trinkets for the Thessyrian kings and accepted their naming." - Brom

name: Shadowhide Armor
text:
Fighter and cleric only.
React: Before this character suffers wounds from a strike, spend Shadowhide Armor: Reduce the wounds to 1.

setInfos.flavorText: "Strong, yet subtle. But even after cured it takes a monster of a while to get used to the smell." - Mayara Wadreth

name: Stone Sling
text:
May not be targeted by opposing characters.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a 2 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, the target permanently suffers -1 HP.
Order: Discard a card: Perform a +0 ranged strike. If the strike hits, and the discarded card was a Gargoyle, put that Gargoyle into play ready in the same rank as the target regardless of formation.

name: The Conflagration
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Spend an adjacent character: Put a Charge on The Conflagration.
Spend Order: Remove X+1 Charges: Perform a +5 ranged strike that may target X additional ranks away.

name: The Cutting North Wind
text:
May not equip items.
The Cutting North Wind's melee strikes inflict an additional wound.
Order: Inflict a wound on target spent character within 1 rank: Move the target forward or backward one rank.

name: The Howling East Wind
text:
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, after target opposing equal or lower Level character enters play: The target may not attack or maneuver until end of turn.
Spend Order: Spend target equal or lower Level character within 2 ranks.

name: Tyrantslayer
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
This character gains +3 ATK and inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against characters of Level 6 or higher.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is for certain the weapon we saw the prince wield in the tomb murals." - Samanya Dumisa

name: Valanthe Theridiae
text:
Valanthe gains +4 ATK against characters with the Poison trait and +4 AC and Skill when targeted by a character with the Poison trait.
React: After Valanthe hits with a melee strike: The target permanently gains the Poison trait.

name: Wasteland Rod
text:
May not be targeted by opposing characters.
This character may perform Earth actions regardless of class.
Your Gargoyles ignore enter play restrictions, are evil, gain Stealth +3, and gain the ability, "React: Before target opposing character kills this character with a strike or action: The target must succeed with a will save (DC 16) or suffer -3 ATK, AC, and Skill."

name: Sipho Hamisi
text:
Sipho is a rogue and a cleric.
Sipho enters play as if he were level 4.
Sipho is removed from the game if discarded from your hand.
While at least one Sipho is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms have an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when they attack.

setInfos.flavorText: "Some gods rely on brains, not brawn."

name: Wisps of Fate
text:
Wizard and Cleric only.
Spend Order: Destroy Wisps: Reveal the top card of all players' decks. Choose for all players to put the card into their hand, or discard it.

setInfos.flavorText: "Weaving the strands of fate will transform you. Always. Even shouldest you merely glimpse but a wisp..." - Toren Yscar

name: Eresh q'Shedim
text:
Eresh is all classes.
Eresh may not suffer more than 1 wound from a strike or action.
Eresh starts the game with an additional Daemon in the 2nd rank.
React: After Eresh hits target non-Warlord character with a strike: The strike inflicts no wounds. Until end of game, the target gains the Thrall trait and you may kill him to pay the "kill a Thrall" cost of an action.
Order: Kill a Thrall: Draw a card or move a Daemon forward one rank.

name: Mistress Flavia
text:
Flavia is a rogue and a wizard.
Before Flavia leaves play, remove her from the game.
React: After Flavia enters play: Put target lower level character in an opposing discard pile into play ready, under your control. The target permanently gains the Thrall trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "They say her Thralls die in the throes of passion."

name: Utnapishtim
text:
Utnapishtim is both a cleric and a wizard.
May not equip items.
React: Before a strike roll against Utnapishtim, remove a scribed spell: The strike is a Critical Failure.
Order: Put a lower-Level Daemon into play from your hand adjacent to Utnapishtim regardless of formation.

name: Day of the Raven
text:
Warlord only.
Spend Order: Stun target Cursed character. Remove Day of the Raven from the game.
Order: Cancel all ongoing effects. Remove Day of the Raven from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "Enough blood has been shed today. We bury our fallen. Let them bury theirs."

name: Sal'Azar
text:
Your Daemons do not suffer a loyalty penalty.
Your characters that are not Daemons or Monsters gain the Thrall trait.
Order: Twice per turn, kill a Level X Thrall: Reveal the top 7 cards of your deck. You may put a Level X+1 or lower Daemon or Monster into play into the former location of the Thrall and with the same orientation.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kneel before your master!"

name: Nisroch
text:
Water actions inflict an additional wound on Nisroch.
While ready, Nisroch may not be targeted by opposing characters if there is another legal target in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "If one of those things gets down here, then that will be all."

name: Urshambi
text:
Order: Once per turn, kill target character: The next strike against a character you control this turn is a Critical Failure.
React: Once per turn, after target character within 2 ranks (3 if your Warlord is a Mercenary) performs a melee strike that was a Critical Failure: Perform a melee strike against the target.

name: Boots of Water Walking
text:
This character gains the Aquatic trait and, while targeted with a Water action, +6 AC and Skill.
React: After a character performs a Water action, spend Boots: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Enki
text:
Enki is a fighter and a wizard and enters play as if she were Level 4.
Enki gains +1 Level for equipping Weapons.
React: Once per turn, before a strike roll: The strike is a spell and gains +3 to the die roll.
React: After entering play with an action: Move forward 1 rank.

name: Koren Zon
text: Spend React: After a character in your army dies: Target character in your army has a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the Level of the killed character until end of turn. If the killed character was a Warlord, the bonus lasts until end of next turn instead.

name: Serj Vorvallyn
text:
After an initiative roll: Put a Charge on Serj.
Order: Remove X Charges from and kill Serj: Before fixing illegal ranks, put a Level X Dragon that is format-legal from your collection into play in Serj's former location and orientation.

setInfos.flavorText: "A waif, always dreaming to fly away."

name: Bastion
text: React: After a character in this rank is targeted with a strike: Until end of turn, Dwarves in this rank gain +1 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "To raise an arm against a single dwarf is to attack our nation. The ruler of this city will regret treating our ambassador so shamefully."

name: Clockwork Scarab
text:
While Clockwork Scarab is stunned, adjacent Dwarfs gain +1 HP.
Order: Stun Clockwork Scarab: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Some of the brothers' greatest work-while they were still talking to each other. You might think it a piece of pretty jewelry, but it has a sting!"

name: Pilfer
text: React: Once per turn, after Pilfer kills an opposing character, reveal the top five cards of your deck: You may retrieve one revealed item and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "City of Gold. That last word's the important one."

name: Respite
text:
Spend Order: Once per turn, target a Dwarf within 2 ranks: Succeed with a Medicine check (DC 20) to remove a wound from the target.
React: Once per turn, before target Dwarf falls forward: He does not stun before moving.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kor endures. As shall we."

name: Savvy
text: Order: Once per turn, target a non-Warlord Nothrog or Dwarf within 2 ranks: Until end of turn, if the target is a Nothrog, his melee strikes inflict one less wound. Until end of turn, if the target is a Dwarf, his melee strikes inflict an additional wound.

name: Soil
text: React: Once per turn, before Soil becomes stunned: Ready target Level 3 or lower non-stunned Gargoyle.

setInfos.flavorText: "Leaving his home has scarred him forever. Now he hardly speaks with anybody but the creatures of rock and gem." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Wrath
text:
Wrath is a cleric and a fighter.
Wrath inflicts an additional wound against The Chosen.
Melee strikes by Wrath and adjacent Dwarves ignore the Planar trait.
Order: Once per turn: Target Dwarf gains Powerattack +8.

name: Yoke
text:
May not start in play.
Yoke is a cleric and a fighter and enters play as if he were Level 3.
While Yoke is the only character you control in this rank, he gains +5 ATK, AC, Skill, and +1 HP.
React: After Yoke enters play: He counts as an additional character for determining illegal ranks until end of turn (permanently if Yoke entered play as part of a card effect).

setInfos.flavorText: "He carried me out on his back." - Gethseme

name: Bithkrid
text: React: Once per turn, after Bithkrid kills an equal or higher Level opposing character: He permanently gains +1 Level, +4 ATK, +2 AC, +2 Skill, and +1 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "It can be a hard life in the legions. The pillaging makes it all worthwhile."

name: Shadowstone Gargoyle
text: Order: Once per turn, if Shadowstone Gargoyle is ready: Succeed with a Stealth check (DC 20) to spend it and move it to the front rank of another formation.
errata: Success on the check is what causes him to spend, so if you fail, he doesn't spend.

setInfos.flavorText: Silent, still; until the moment it strikes.
Cold. Silent. Waiting.

name: Corten Lye
text:
Characters adjacent to Corten gain +2 AC.
While Corten is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms gain +1 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "While one of its members draws breath, the Order of Aroch. And while it exists, it fights for justice."
"Quiet that rumbling. Sir Lucian leads us now."
"I don't like going against orders, but Lorden's right. The Denscans won't wait for Terak, but if we don't help them, they won't live to regret it."

name: Chaltak
text:
May equip fighter Weapons.
Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound. This is an Air action and a spell.
React: After Chaltak kills an Elf: Remove up to two cards in a discard pile from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "He was waylaid by an elf named Daedelia, who thought he'd reveal critical information. Wasn't her best idea." - Zul'Tan

name: Kar Longblade
text:
Kar's strikes against Deverenian Paladins gain +4 ATK and inflict an additional wound.
React: After Kar performs a melee strike that hit target character: Move the target backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The magi are forbidden from entering the city under ancient edict."

name: Skozt
text: React: After target character misses Skozt with a melee strike: Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "A swampie could learn to like it here."

name: Sphlyrix
text: React: Once per turn, after an opposing character is killed: Gain +5 ATK until end of turn. You may discard the top card of any player's deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Goblins have no concept of 'shame'. They take advantages wherever they can find them, and damn the consequences." - Set'rokh

name: The Retiarius
text:
The Retiarius' melee strikes inflict an additional wound.
While The Retiarius is in your front rank and not stunned, all characters enter play as if they were one Level higher.

name: Vannod
text: Spend Order: Target a character within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with a Poison save (DC 13) or suffer a wound. If the target fails by 10 or more or rolls a Critical Failure, you may remove one wound from target Nothrog.

name: Velk
text: Deverenians and spent characters may not perform reacts to or during Velk's strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Merely tell me which of those pampered dandies has offended you, my battle-mistress, and I shall bring you his heart."

name: Witchwood Catapault
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge, target a Nothrog in this rank: The target's next strike this turn inflicts an additional wound against Daemons and ignores the Planar trait.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hard to get, but worth the pains." - Scyrax

name: Take a Rest
text:
This card is also a Level 1 rogue action.
React: After target equal or lower Level character within 1 rank readies or unstuns during the Decree phase: Stun the target. Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "You look tired. Let me help, friend." - Taisia

name: Advance
text:
Warlord and Hero only.
React: After an opposing character performs a melee strike against a character you control: Up to two fighters in this rank may perform an attack, spending as usual.

setInfos.flavorText: The legions hit the city walls, and the world trembled at the impact.

name: Dame Martha
text:
Martha has +5 AC against ranged strikes.
Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +3 ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why does everyone assume I'm a paladin?"
"We need a plan. The Free King has one. If you don't like it, maybe the Emperor's hiring."
"There's proof of the angel's claims, but our enemy has thus far eluded us, milady."

name: Countershot
text:
This card is also a Level 1 rogue action.
React: After target character performs a ranged strike against this character: Perform a +5 ranged strike against the target. If this character is a Ranger, the strike inflicts an additional wound.

name: Fire and Steel
text:
Spend Order: Until end of turn, this fighter has the ability, "React: After hitting target character with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or suffer a wound." Perform an attack without spending.
React: After this fighter performs a Fire action: Perform a +7 melee or ranged strike that is a spell.

name: Goodwife's Parry
text: React: Before this fighter suffers wounds from a strike, stun an equipped Shield or, if this fighter is in the front rank, permanently suffer -2 AC: Reduce the wounds to zero. Remove Goodwife's Parry from the game if the -2 penalty was chosen.

setInfos.flavorText: "What in the Abyss are you doing? My goodwife could parry better than that!" - Sir Wallence

name: Onslaught
text:
Each of your characters may only perform one Onslaught each turn.
If Onslaught is revealed from your deck, you may retrieve it and put it into your hand.
React: After this fighter kills an opposing character: Reveal the top 7 cards of your deck. You may retrieve a revealed action card that this fighter can perform and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Shoulder Charge
text: Spend Order: Move forward up to two ranks. Perform a melee strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "With the physique some of them have, it's as if you are hit by a running Land Dragon - and equally as effective." - Azam

name: Taking Trophies
text:
While this card is in your discard pile, your Rangers have the ability to perform it with an additional effect of removing it from the game.
React: Before this fighter kills target opposing character within 1 rank: Until end of turn, this fighter gains +X ATK, AC, and Skill, where X is equal to the target's Level +3.

name: Cobbler's Lane
text: Order: You may spend this rogue: Until end of turn, this rogue (all of your characters if you spent this rogue) has the ability, "This character's melee strikes inflict an additionl wound against spent equal or lower Level characters and gain +3 ATK against spent characters."

setInfos.flavorText: "Even in these days, you can get all the tools you need. You just need to know where to ask." - Taisia

name: Empty Racks
text:
Spend Order: Discard X cards from the top of any player's deck, where X is this rogue's Level.
Spend Order: Remove X cards in any player's discard pile from the game, where X is this rogue's Level.

name: On Silent Wings
text:
This card is also a Level 3 fighter action.
React: After this character performs a melee strike that killed an opposing character, target a spent character within 1 rank: Perform a melee strike against the target. The strike gains +5 ATK or, if the target is stunned, is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't pity these fools. Death for them came on silent wings and they didn't suffer a bit." - Taisia

name: Precious
text: Order: You may discard a card: Target character within 1 rank must succeed with a will save (DC 15, DC 25 if you discarded a Treasure) or perform a melee strike against a target of your choice. If you discarded a card, return Precious to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "...And that is how this city has claimed so many souls." - B'alam Nak

name: Maia Casey
text: Spend React: After target character in your army makes a Skill check roll: Reroll the die, adding Maia Casey's Skill instead of the target's.

setInfos.flavorText: "This wouldn't happen if Robert were here."
"Robert's not in Andover, Jack. We need to hurry."

name: Thimblerig
text:
React: After this rogue performs an order: He performs an order.
Order: Move forward or backward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Have you ever seen a good thimblerig in action? Imagine what those hands can do, when they hold a blade. Like this." - Talin Tzin

name: Rabble Rousing
text:
Order: Ready target non-stunned Level 1 or 2 character.
Spend Order: If this character is a Bard, ready up to 2 target non-stunned Level 1 or 2 characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Rise, you dogs! Victory can yet be ours!" - Mad Mel

name: Backbiter
text:
This fighter's melee strikes inflict an additional wound.
After this fighter performs a melee strike that missed, inflict a wound on a character you control that may not be reduced.

name: Cobalt Land Dragon
text:
Order: Spend Land Dragon: Move forward one rank.
Order: If Land Dragon is ready, put him into play adjacent to this fighter as a Level 2 classless character with only the Monster trait, +3 ATK, 12 AC, +0 Skill, 1 HP, and the text, "May not equip items."

setInfos.flavorText: "Not related to dragons at all, they're just dumb lizards. But they sell much better this way." - Azam

name: Commanding Presence
text:
Adjacent lower Level characters gain +3 ATK.
This fighter gains +1 ATK, AC, and Skill for each other character in this rank that is gaining an ATK bonus from this fighter.

setInfos.flavorText: "Alric, the human Robert - both are leaders that warriors would follow to the hall of the First Chosen. I can but show myself worthy to inspire such loyalty." - Gudleifur

name: Common Blade
text:
You may have more than 3 copies of Common Blade in your deck.
Common Blade gains +1 ATK for each other item in this rank.
While Common Blade has +6 or higher ATK, this fighter's melee strikes inflict an additional wound, and Common Blade cannot be destroyed by card effects.

name: Engraved Plate
text:
This fighter gains +3 Skill against saves.
React: After this fighter is targeted with a spell: Gain +2 ATK, AC, or Skill until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I may not have this magical cloth of yours, but I'll cover myself in this tonne weight and still outfight the lot of you." - Gudleifur

name: Cloak of the Wisp
text: The rogue and adjacent characters gain +3 AC while targeted with a ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Those who would dare hide from me-ME!-had best hope that I do not find them in time. I cannot abide subterfuge in others! To emulate me is to court death." - B'alam Nak

name: Nightfall Mask
text: React: Before this rogue targets a melee strike, spend Mask: Choose a player who must reveal a random card from their hand. Copies of that card cannot be performed in response to or during the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Leave this city, beast!" the cursed mask growled. "Make me," B'alam Nak replied.

name: Norn's Stinger
text: Order: Target an opposing character within 1 rank, spend Norn's Stinger: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 6 + this rogue's primary ATK) or become spent or, if already spent, stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "I knew Norn, once. A witch and a hellcat, all in all. Heard she made the mistake of fighting Queen Taoth, and no one's seen her since." - Velk

name: Vorgurn
text: Spend Order: Choose a rank in your army. Free Kingdoms have +4 AC while in that rank until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The eastern lands burn, and the Free King bemoans the price of power."
His people held their ground, and the Nothrog had to burn the villages around them. No man nor woman screamed, no child cried. They went to their gods in strength.
His people held their ground, and the Nothrog had to burn the villages around them. No man nor woman screamed, no child cried. They went to their gods in strength.

name: Tempest Arrow
text: React: Before making a ranged strike roll, spend Tempest Arrow: The strike does not inflict wounds. If it hits, target all characters in the same rank as the target of the strike. Each target must make two magic saves (DC 13). If one is failed, the target becomes spent. If both are failed, the target becomes stunned and suffers a wound.

name: Frosttalon
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
This character's non-spell ranged strikes inflict an additional wound (an additional two wounds against Dragons instead).
Melee strikes by Dragons inflict an additional wound against this character.

name: Radiant Symbol
text:
Dwarf only.
Order: Spend Radiant Symbol, discard a card: Ready target lower Level non-stunned Gargoyle.

setInfos.flavorText: "I knew not of this Kor before the Accordlanders came, but now I cannot imagine a life without his guidance." - Gudleifur

name: War Plans
text:
Nothrog only.
Order: Spend War Plans, discard a card: Target Siege gains +8 to strike rolls until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'll consider your tactical suggestions Set'rokh, but never regard me your servant." - B'alam Nak

name: Acanothropis
text:
Acanothropis may Scribe rogue actions and his Poison actions may target an additional rank away.
Order: Discard a Level X card: Target up to X (X + 2 if a character was discarded) characters within 2 ranks who gain the Poison trait until end of turn.

name: Ayloch Glyn
text:
Ayloch's ranged strikes against Deverenians may not be redirected or cenceled and gain +3 to the die roll.
Spend Order: Perform two +3 ranged strikes.

name: Flesh Gorger
text:
Flesh Gorger gains +1 ATK for each Charge on all Flesh Gorgers in play.
While Flesh Gorger has 3 or more Charges, he gains +3 AC and +1 HP.
Order: Once per turn, remove a character in any discard pile from the game: Put a Charge on each Flesh Gorger in play.

name: Indariel
text:
Opposing characters with the Poison trait within 1 rank suffer -1 ATK, AC, and Skill.
React: Once per turn, after Indariel kills an opposing character with the Poison trait: Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do you feel weak yet? Short of breath?"

name: Knight of Falun
text:
Knight may cast wizard spells.
React: Once per turn, after Knight kills an opposing character: Knight permanently gains +3 ATK and Skill. If the character was of equal or higher Level, Knight permanently gains +1 HP, +1 Level, and the Hero trait.

name: Loncah Tansiq
text:
Loncah's melee strikes against Free Kingdoms Lycanthropes gain +3 ATK and inflict an additional wound.
While there are 5 or more characters in an opponent's discard pile, Loncah has the ability, "Order: Once per turn: Until end of turn, Loncah gains +4 ATK. Ready Loncah."

name: Sir Thomas of Celinar
text:
Adjacent Free Kingdoms' melee strikes inflict an additional wound.
