Order: Remove Sir Thomas from the game: Your Free Kingdoms' melee strikes inflict an additional wound until end of next turn.

name: Menketh Adinerach
text:
Menketh is a rogue, a wizard, and enters play as if he were Level 4.
Menketh's strikes against Mercenary Dragons gain +5 ATK and inflict an additional wound.
React: Once per turn, after killing an opposing character: Put a Level 1 or 2 Undead from your discard pile into play in your front rank.

name: Pridayn Glyn
text:
Wounds from Pridayn's Poison actions cannot be reduced.
Pridayn's actions that produce strikes are Poison actions.
React: After target character is hit with a strike by Pridayn: The target must succeed with a Poison save (DC 18) or suffer one or, if stunned, two wounds and become spent.

name: Rethriel
text:
Rethriel gains +X ATK, AC, and Skill, where X is the highest Level of a character in any discard pile.
While Rethriel is in your discard pile, your Elf Warlord has the ability, "React: After killing an opposing character, remove an Elf in your discard pile from the game: Put Rethriel into play spent. If the killed character was a Nothrog, you may ready Rethriel.

name: Agnieszka
text:
Agnieszka may equip two Weapons.
Agnieszka has an additional melee strike (base +1 ATK) when she attacks for each equipped Weapon.
Order: Spend a Weapon equipped to Agnieszka: Move forward or backward one rank or, until end of turn, gain Riposte +5 or Powerattack +5.

name: Clerimonde
text: While Clerimonde is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms Warlord has the ability, "Order: Remove Clerimonde from the game: Ready target Level 1 or 2 Free Kingdoms."

setInfos.flavorText: "Damn you, Sal'Azar!"

name: Felens Rowan
text:
Spend Order: Perform X +1 ranged strikes, where X is Felen's Level.
Spend React: After entering play: Move to the rank behind your last rank of your formation. Perform a +2 ranged strike against target character in the last rank of an opposing formation. Felens permanently gains +2 Levels.

name: Kinyon Yscar
text:
While Kinyon is not stunned, adjacent ready Lycanthropes gain Stealth +5.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +5 melee strike that does not gain any modifiers or effects from Kinyon's items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even the Elves never saw him." - Elissa

name: Lady Isabelle
text:
Characters in this rank gain +3 Skill against DC saves.
React: After Isabelle is targeted with an action that does not produce a strike, kill Isabelle: Cancel the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "The king desires peace."

name: Leon Yscar
text: React: After Leon hits target character with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a Poison save (DC 14) or the strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "He is a new breed. He willed his abilities to change and they did. Amazing." - Toren Yscar

name: Mairead
text:
Opposing equal or lower Level Lycanthropes cannot perform abilities printed in their text box.
Spend Order: Target a Level 1 or 2 character: The target gains +2 ATK and AC until end of turn. Ready the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Merely music? It gives yeomen hearts of lions and feet of flames. It is pure magic!"

name: Sanguicorn
text:
Sanguicorn may not equip items.
Sanguicorn's melee strikes inflict an additional wound if the roll was odd.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dark times, dark bargains, and dark prices. We're capable of terrors, too."
"The last unicorn is dead and gone, la, la. Only the dark brothers remain to feast on the flesh of their companions." - Vehdred

name: Ragnell
text:
Ragnell's ranged strikes may target stunned and Undead characters an additional rank away.
Ragnell gains +3 to strike rolls against Elf Undead.
Spend Order: Perform three +2 ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "After what they did to him and his family he has nothing but hate for them." - Scarlett

name: Raimi Mennanakh
text:
React: Twice per turn after Raimi kills an opposing character: Perform a melee strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's a trick. Get an axe."

name: Serif Al Havoc
text:
Other Free Kingdoms in this rank gain Riposte +4 and have the ability, "React: Before this character is killed by an opposing character: Perform a melee strike."
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Remove a wound from one of your other Free Kingdoms within 1 rank.

name: Victoria
text:
Victoria is a cleric and a fighter and enters play as if she were Level 3.
Victoria may not start in play.
Other equal or lower Level Free Kingdoms in this rank gain +2 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "Meek? Never underestimate a mother who is protecting her young."

name: Kalih
text: Non-opposing Thralls within 1 rank gain +1 ATK, AC, and Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "It takes a person of the utmost depravity to want to join the usurper's ranks. In order to be acquitted they perform an act of unusual cruelty which hast to please the masters. And then they drink a Daemon's blood, which only few survive. Those are my targets." - Taisia

name: Master Ashtaroth
text:
Astaroth is a cleric and a fighter and enters play as if he were Level 5.
While in play, non-opposing characters may treat Astaroth as if he were a Daemon.
Order: Twice per turn: Astaroth performs an Order printed on target The Chosen, whose payment includes killing a Thrall (paying its costs as normal).

name: Mistress Alhana
text:
Order: Once per turn, spend Alhana or a Thrall: Put a Charge on Alhana.
Order: Remove a Charge from Alhana: Until end of turn, target Daemon gains +5 ATK or target non-Daemon The Chosen gains +3 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "It makes me naseous to think that she joined them by her own will." - Dmitir

name: Mitrasz
text:
May not attack.
Order: Once per turn, spend a higher Level The Chosen: Mitrasz performs a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "It pleases my mistress to keep her... companions close by. She reckons it might redirect the Bane's wrath away from her." - Redu Carr

name: Redu Carr
text:
React: Before one of your Thralls is killed by a character you control: Move Carr forward one rank.
React: Before Carr is killed by a character you control: Remove Carr from the game after he dies. If you do, draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "He watched over her this time. He didn't really think she was beautiful, did he?" - Keziah

name: Redu Firam
text:
While Firam has 3 or more Charges, he gains the Daemon trait, +3 ATK, +3 AC, +1 HP, and he inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
React: Before one of your Thralls is killed by a character you control: Put a Charge on Firam.

setInfos.flavorText: "Soon, soon he will be rife." - Ruash-Shan

name: Zagreb Umbala
text: React: After Zagreb Umbala performs an attack: Perform a melee strike that may not target a ready character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Well, if I wanted to find some old, dry text, I'd hit a library. Why?"
"Quit your whining, Jonah. You've had worse."

name: Redu Zayd
text: React: Before Zayd is killed: Put a Charge on or remove a Charge from target card.

setInfos.flavorText: "His body was delicious, but breaking his mind was so much sweeter." - Nin-Gula

name: Rhomel'zard
text:
Order: Once per turn, kill target Thrall: Move target Daemon you control forward or backward one rank.
React: After one of your characters is killed by a character you control: Until end of turn, Rhomel'zard gains +1 Level for casting spells and +2 Skill.

name: Ruash-Shan
text:
Ruash-Shan is a cleric and a wizard.
Your non-Thrall The Chosen have the ability "Order: Kill target Thrall: Until end of turn, this character gains +1 Level and the target's classes."

setInfos.flavorText: "Destroy all life on these isles and Thessyria will be ours entirely!"

name: Split-Tongue
text:
Split-Tongue inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes that are Critical Successes.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Split-Tongue either gains +5 ATK until end of turn or performs a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "You don't want to soil your mouth with their real names." - Taisia

name: Tri-Claw
text: React: Before Tri-Claw is killed by an opposing character: Move target non-opposing Daemon forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "They look daunting, but they are maggots, really. It's their piercing death cries that attract much bigger daemons like flies to a carcass." - Taisia

name: Void Stalker
text:
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike against target Level 1 or 2 character. If the strike hits, remove the target from the game.
Order: Kill a Level X Thrall: Move forward or backward up to X ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "And from the cellars a terrible beast rose. Whoever it touched ceased to be." - Fragments L.3

name: Yeg-Igryll's Altar
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Kill a Level X character: Put X Charges on Yeg-Igryll's Altar.
React: Before target character makes a melee strike roll, remove a Charge: The target gains +4 ATK for the strike. Wounds from the strike may not be reduced.

name: Bandage
text: Spend React: Before target character within 1 rank suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one. Shuffle Bandage into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Magic is all good and well. But after the gods left we had to learn other methods." - Meri-es-anch

name: Defiant
text: Spend Order: Until end of turn (next turn if this cleric is a Cantor), target character within 2 ranks gains +2 HP, an additional melee strike (base = target's primary ATK) when he attacks, and the ability, "This character may not be spent or stunned by opposing card effects."

setInfos.flavorText: "Fear? Pah. Those mud-loving boneheads only fear their death not be colorfully violent enough." - Naram-Sin

name: Draw the Essence
text: Spend Order: Until end of turn, this cleric has an additional melee strike (base +3 ATK) when he attacks. Perform an attack without spending. After a strike from the attack hits, remove a wound from a character you control.

setInfos.flavorText: "Their life is the most delicious if they struggle to the end." - Naram-Sin

name: Thaddeus Bied
text: Spend Order: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 18) to move a character in this rank forward or backward up to two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "My former queen has not changed her heart, Free King. No good will come of alliance with her."
"Close your eyes. The road is long and deadly."

name: Incentives
text:
This card is also a Level 3 rogue action.
Spend Order: Target up to two characters, you may inflict a wound on each: Each target performs a melee strike. If he suffered a wound, he gains +5 ATK and Powerattack +5 for this strike.
errata: Erratum 2012/05/05: The Spend Order should read "Spend Order: Target up to two non-opposing characters, you may inflict a wound on each: Each target performs a melee strike. If he suffered a wound, he gains +5 ATK and Powerattack +5 for this strike."

name: Innocence
text:
This is not a spell.
Paladins may perform this action regardless of class restrictions.
React: After this cleric is targeted by a strike or action: Redirect the strike or action to an adjacent target, if possible.
Order: Until end of turn, this cleric's strikes and actions may not be canceled or redirected.

name: Invoke Entropy
text: Order: Target an item within 2 ranks whose Level is up to twice this cleric's Level: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 8 + the item's Level) to destroy the item, otherwise succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + the item's Level) or suffer a wound.

name: Nature's Noose
text:
Druids gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
Rangers may perform this action regardless of class restrictions.
Spend Order: Target an equal or lower Level character: Attach Noose to the target. While it is attached, the target has the abilities, "This character may not perform actions to move," and "Order: Inflict one wound on this character: Remove from the game all Nooses attached to this character."

name: Show of Strength
text:
This card is also a Level 2 fighter action.
Order: You may spend this character: Until end of turn, your characters within 1 rank gain +3 ATK and, if you spent this character, Powerattack +8.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is the way of the legions to prove your prowess once and again, to inspire your lessers."

name: Spectral Guardian
text:
Illusionists may perform this action regardless of class restrictions.
Spend Order: Attach Guardian to target lower Level character. While one or more Guardians are attached, the target gains +3 AC, Defend +8, Riposte +8, and the ability, "Before this character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one. Remove all Guardians attached to this character."

name: Bellicose
text:
After performing Bellicose, this fighter may remove any attached cards.
Order: This fighter gains +5 ATK until end of turn.
Order: Move forward one rank. Equal or lower Level characters may not react to or during this action.

name: Blindside Tackle
text: React: After an opposing character falls forward: Move forward one rank or perform a +5 melee strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, the target moves backward one rank and becomes spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "He was an exceptional warrior, wild and strong. On the field he would always heed the ebbs and tides of battle, and throw the enemy back wherever needed."

name: Code of Chivalry
text:
Order: Until end of turn, characters in the same rank as this fighter gain +3 ATK and AC.
Order: Target a character of opposite alignment within 1 rank: If this fighter is a Paladin, until end of turn, your characters' melee strikes against the target inflict an additional wound.

name: Cold Iron
text: React: Before this fighter makes a melee strike roll against target character: The strike gains +5 ATK and ignores the Planar trait. If this fighter is a Paladin and the target is either of the opposite alignment or Cursed, the strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "The old folk tales tell of creatures from another place who bled easily from crude weapons of cold iron."

name: Gunter
text: Spend Order: Once per turn, reveal your hand and discard all non spell cards: Your good characters have a bonus to ATK and ranged strike rolls equal to their Skill until end of turn.

name: Cut a Path
text:
Spend Order: Perform an attack without spending. Move up to X characters you control forward one rank, where X is the number of strikes from the attack that hit. If this fighter is a Ranger, you may move characters backward instead.
React: After this fighter performs a Tactics action: Perform a melee strike.

name: Grapple
text: Order: You may spend this fighter: Perform a melee strike that does not inflict wounds and may, if you spent this fighter, target an additional rank away. If the strike hits, spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "When her master told her to fetch, te barbarian huntress lept over her enemies and brought back her prey, both slick with her blood." - The Annals

name: Heart of the Warrior
text: Spend Order: Perform an attack without spending. If this fighter killed an opposing character during the attack, remove a wound from him. If this fighter killed two or more opposing characters, attach Heart of the Warrior to him. While it is attached, this fighter gains +3 ATK and +1 HP.

name: Sword Master
text: React: After this fighter kills an equal or higher Level opposing character: This fighter permanently gains +1 Level, +2 ATK, +2 AC, +2 Skill, and +1 HP. Until end of turn, this fighter gains +1 Level for equipping items. You may search your deck for a Weapon that this fighter can legally equip and equip it to him. Shuffle your deck. Remove Sword Master from the game.

name: Drops of Drowsiness
text: Order: Target character within 1 rank must succeed with a Poison save (DC 20, 25 if he has the Poison trait) or attach Drops. While it is attached, the target has the ability, "This character is considered spent or, if already spent, stunned for opposing card effects."

name: False Haven
text: Order: Perform a melee strike. If the strike hits, the strike does not inflict wounds and you may move the target of the strike forward one rank. If he is in the front rank, you may move him to your front rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "You didn't think you could hide here, did you?" - Han of the Ferry

name: Nightshade
text: React: After this rogue hits target character with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 15 + this rogue's Level, +3 if this rogue is an Assassin) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is amazing, what the plants in this forest do to survive. Take this flower for example..." - Grilt

name: Plague Bomb
text:
Spend Order: Target all opposing characters within 1 rank: Each target must succeed with a Poison save (DC 16) or suffer a wound and permanently gain the Poison trait.
React: After this rogue performs a Poison action, target up to 2 characters within 2 ranks: Each target must succeed with a Poison save (DC 18) or become spent.

name: Prey on the Hunter
text: React: After this rogue is targeted with an action that does not produce a strike: Cancel the action. This rogue may perform the canceled action, regardless of class and Level restrictions, paying costs as normal.

setInfos.flavorText: "We chased him into the woods. It is only a matter of time before he will bear your chains!" - Redu Carr

name: Spring the Trap
text: React: After an opposing Level X character moves into the front rank without spending or stunning: Move up to X rogues you control forward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hold. Hold. Now!"

name: Hola Haben
text:
Remove Hola Haben from the game if she is discarded from your hand.
While one or more copies of Hola Haben are in your discard pile your Free Kingdoms have +1 Hit Point.

name: To My Side
text: Spend Order: Move target ready character you control adjacent to this rogue, regardless of formation. The target succeed with a Stealth check (DC 15) or become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: Acanothropis slid through the bushes like the snake that gave him his name.

name: Wigglewort Poison
text: Order: Perform a +8 melee strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, attach Wigglewort Poison to the target. While it is attached, the target suffers -2 Skill, gains the Poison trait, and has the ability, "After the ready phase: Succeed with a Poison save (DC 13) or suffer a wound."

name: Cataract
text: React After the initiative phase, target a character (two if this wizard is an Illusionist): Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + this wizard's Skill) or he may not target this wizard with strikes or actions until end of turn or until this wizard targets him with a strike or another action, whichever comes first.

name: Crevice
text: Spend Order: Target character within 2 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + this wizard's Skill) or be removed from the game. If the target is a Warlord, he suffers 2 wounds instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "And hence the earth opened and swallowed them whole." - The Annals of Servitude

name: Entomb
text:
React: Before one or more target cards are retrieved from a discard pile: Remove the targets from the game.
React: Before target character is killed: Until end of turn, the target suffers -2 Levels or, if this wizard is a Necromancer, is reduced to Level 0. The target does not die from this Level loss.

name: From Dust to Dust
text: Spend Order: Target Level X character within 3 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 12 + this wizard's Skill) or suffer a wound. If the target is killed (or wounded if this wizard is a Summoner) by this action, you may search your deck for a Level X or lower character and put it into your hand.

name: Tether
text:
Summoners gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
Spend Order: Attach this card to target lower Level character within 2 ranks: While one or more Tethers are attached, the target gains +1 HP, an additional melee strike (base target's primary ATK) when he attacks, and the ability "This character is not considered Summoned and may not be returned to your hand or deck."

name: Embrace the Eternal
text:
Rogue and wizard only.
While this card is in your discard pile, your rogues and Necromancers have the ability to perform it with an additional effect of removing it from the game.
React: Before this character targets a melee strike: Until end of turn, wounds from this character's melee strikes may not be reduced.
Order: Remove a Level X card in any discard pile from the game: This character gains +X ATK.

name: Eternal Champion
text: React: After this character performs a melee strike that killed an opposing equal or higher Level character, remove Eternal Champion from the game: This character permanently gains +1 Level, +1 HP, and the ability, "This character's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against equal or lower Level characters."

setInfos.flavorText: "It is the color of bleached skull, his flesh..."

name: Flame Blade
text:
Fighter and wizard only.
While Flame Blade is scribed, this character gains +2 ATK and his actions that produce melee strikes are Fire actions.
Order: Perform a +5 melee or ranged strike or attach Flame Blade to this character as if scribed.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not advisable to touch it with your own skin."

name: Crystalline Gargoyle
text: While Crystalline Gargoyle has one or more wounds, it has the ability, "Order: Spend a cleric within one rank: Remove one wound from Crystalline Gargolye and ready it."
errata: Like Korin Blackstone, this is a healing action, and preventing a healing action prevents this.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fascinating" - Atiratu
"Kor's pet." - The Loremaster

name: Huntress Volda
text:
Volda is a cleric and a fighter.
React: Before Volda dies: Target Free Kingdoms you control permanently has +1 Level, and the Druid, Ranger, and Warlord traits. (You do not lose the game.)

setInfos.flavorText: "For the King!"

name: Bascaron's Blessing
text:
Free Kingdoms only.
Order: Spend Bascaron's Blessing, discard a card: Target Lycanthrope gains the feat of your choice with a +10 bonus until end of turn.

name: Appeasement
text:
Melee strikes by characters in this rank gain +3 ATK against characters of opposite alignment compared to their own).
Spend Order: Spend target non-Warlord character.

setInfos.flavorText: "It takes sacrifice to gain the god's favor."

name: Blessed Bangle
text:
This cleric has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks.
Order: Spend Bangle: Unstun target adjacent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "The bangle will only work if your heart is pure. Or very rotten." - Niobe

name: Brilliant Scales
text: Adjacent characters gain +3 ATK and +1 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sir Robert had them dispersed among his army, so when the Deverenians attacked with the first morning rays, they were dazzled and diverted. A great victory that was!" - Sir Wallence

name: Cerberus
text:
Non-Warlords with Cerberus equipped gain +2 ATK, AC, and Skill.
Order: Equip Cerberus to a character you control within 1 rank, regardless of class and Level restrictions.
React: Before this character is killed: Put Cerberus on top of its owner's deck.

name: Daemon Bile
text:
This card is also a Level 4 rogue item.
Order: Destroy Daemon Bile: Perform a +X ranged strike that does not inflict wounds, where X is this character's Skill. If the strike hits, the target permanently gains the Poison trait and, if the strike roll was 11 or higher, becomes stunned. This is a Poison action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Use it sparingly. It's a bit tricky to get."

name: Helm of Swiftness
text:
An Assassin may spend before equipping Helm to equip it as a Level 6 rogue item.
Your Warlord gains +2 to initiative rolls.
React: After target character you control readies during the decree phase, spend Helm: The target may perform an order.
Order: Spend Helm: All players make an initiative roll. If you win, you may perform 2 decrees.
errata: Erratum 2012/05/05: The static text should read "An Assassin may spend before equipping Helm to equip it as a Level 6 item."

name: Blood God's Basinet
text: While this fighter has 3 or more other items equipped, he gains +2 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "Each race claims to have fathered the original wearer of this helm, an artifact from the dawn of time. He that wore it stood against The Dragon. He died, yes, but that he lasted longer than any. Never to surrender, even against the end of all things, that is his lesson." - Keziah

name: Command Post
text:
Adjacent characters gain Defend +4.
React: Once per turn, before target other character within 1 rank performs a melee strike from an attack: The target gains Powerattack +5 until end of turn. This is a Tactics action.

name: Invision
text:
Your Warlord gains +2 to initiative rolls.
This fighter's melee strikes ignore AC bonuses not from items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bataar found it in the fire mountain's tunnels. He was sure it hadn't been there, when they entered the lair. A sign, sire?" - Inquisitor Slayne

name: The Lady of Mercy
text:
The Lady of Mercy is a Cleric and a Rogue.
After one of your Free Kingdoms rolls a natural 17 or greater, the roll is a Critical Success.
React: After a character rolls a Critical Success on a melee strike: Stun the target of the strike.
errata: Erratum 2006/10/18: The Lady of Mercy is, in fact, level 4.

name: Jirar Heirloom
text:
This fighter has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks.
React: After performing a melee strike that killed an opposing character: Perform a +6 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Outwardly a simple yew bow, it has been infused with the magic of generations upon generations of Jirar bowmen. And their prey." - Logan

name: Savage Blade
text: React: After target character pays the costs of a react to or during this fighter's melee strike, spend Blade: Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's the price of overextending. They just never watch their backs." - Talin Tzin

name: Skittish Charger
text: Order: Spend Charger: Move forward one rank or to a different location in this rank. If this fighter moved forward, he may perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "If you know how to ride, your steed will do wonderful things for you in battle. If you don't, it'll just get in the way." - Kaiten

name: Skull Mace
text:
This fighter's melee strikes become Critical Successes when the die roll is an 18 or 19.
This fighter inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes that are Critical Successes.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is possessed by an intelligent evil spirit. It will talk to you, if you carry it long enough. It will want you to... do things." - Valeria Tremayne

name: Thessyrian War Chariot
text:
This fighter may equip two additional Steeds.
Order: Spend an equipped Steed: Perform a +0 melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Steering an old Thessyrian War Chariot was considered an art. It was so sleekly built, the charioteer couldn't fit any armor, and the whip was used against both, the horses... and any enemies." - Kaiten

name: Boots of Stupendous Speed
text: Order: Spend Boots: Move forward or backward up to two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "It takes a few tries to get used to them." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Coils of Cobra
text:
This rogue's actions gain +2 to strike rolls and DC saves against characters with the Poison trait.
React: After target opposing character fails a Poison save from this rogue's action, spend Coils: The target becomes spent and permanently gains the Poison trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "I advise not to step on her." - Acanothropis

name: Dank Cloak
text: Order: Once per turn, target a non-Warlord character: Until end of turn, this rogue and the target may not target each other with strikes while there is another legal target.

setInfos.flavorText: "See the good side: Even in the desert it remains damp and mouldy. You'll at least stay cool."

name: Diadem of Contagion
text: React: After an opposing character fails a Poison save, spend Diadem: Target character within 2 ranks must succeed with a Poison save (DC 14) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "You have to admire its simplicity. A little touch beats the largest elephant."

name: Dragonbone Cuirass
text:
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: After this rogue hits target opposing character with a melee strike, spend Cuirass: The target must succeed with three Poison saves (DC 12) or suffer a wound for each failure.

name: Jin Valford
text:
Spend Order: Play Cyldragen from your hand, spent, into play in rank four. He gains Jin Valford's wounds and the Warlord trait. Remove Jin Valford from the game.
Order: Once per turn: Move another Lycanthrope in your army forward one rank.

name: Keen Dagger
text:
This rogue gains +1 ATK for each other character in this rank.
While this rogue is in an opposing formation, his melee strikes inflict an additional wound against characters in any front rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Shush, it's going to be over soon. Just relax and make it easier for both of us." - Zara

name: Riding Dog
text:
Order: Spend Dog: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend and destroy Dog: Destroy target Steed within 2 ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's perfectly safe. As long as you feed it enough."

name: Sandtiger's Fang
text: React: After this rogue kills an opposing character with a melee strike, spend Fang: Draw a card. If the rogue is a Bard, your other characters gain +2 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Well, I don't run around and write songs about how I call my daggers. Would you?" - Keziah

name: Dusty Shelves
text:
Actins from items performed by this wizard gain +2 to strike rolls and DC saves.
React: Before target character you control equips an item, spend Dusty Shelves: The target gains +1 Level for equipping the item.
React: After performing a Spend Order from an item, spend Dusty Shelves: Ready this wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "Beware the dust devils." - Takson

name: Orb of Light
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
React: Before this wizard is killed: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Half as long, twice as bright."

name: Phantasmal Steed
text:
Phantasmal Steed gains +X ATK and AC, where X is the number of spells scribed to this wizard.
Order: Spend Phantasmal Steed: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Rod of Power
text:
A character may spend before equipping Rod to gain +2 Levels for equipping it.
React: After declaring a spell, wound 1 or 2 characters: For each character wounded, the spell may either target an additional rank away, gains +2 to DC saves and ranged strike rolls, or may not be redirected.

name: Thunderclap Bracers
text:
This card is also a Level 6 fighter item.
React: After this character hits target character with a melee strike, spend Bracers: Move the target backward one rank.
Order: Discard a card: Perform a +0 ranged strike (+4 if this character is in the front rank). Ready Bracers. This is an Air action and a spell.
errata: Erratum 2012/05/05: The Order should read "Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Perform a +0 ranged strike (+4 if this character is in the front rank). Ready Bracers. This is an Air action and a spell."

name: Armor of Absolution
text:
+2 Skill
Cleric and fighter only.
React: After this character declares an action: Permanently change this character's alignment.

setInfos.flavorText: "When I must, I perform deeds I regret. At such times, I lose a little of my soul." - Serif al Havoc

name: Aspis
text:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: After an opposing character performs an action that looked at, searched for, or revealed cards from their deck, spend Aspis: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "If they leave an opening, take it. Make them pay. Make them die." - Set'rokh

name: Trevor Magson
text:
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
Spend React: After you roll Initiative: Ranged strikes against target character add +5 to the roll until end of turn.

name: Bloodstone Rose
text:
Elf only.
Order: Spend Bloodstone Rose, discard a card: Retrieve a Level 1 or 2 Undead from your discard pile and put it into play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Exquisite worksmanship. Too bad she had to die for it." - Morghen

name: Boomstick
text:
Rogue and wizard only.
Order: Discard a card, spend Boomstick: Perform a +X ranged strike that may not inflict more than 1 wound, where X is this character's Skill.
Order: Discard a card: Ready Boomstick.

name: Fields of Sorrow
text:
The Chosen only.
Order: Spend Fields, discard a card, target a Thrall: The next time the target is killed by a character you control this turn, return the target to play from the discard pile after it dies, ignoring illegal ranks.

name: Adela Ghenis
text:
Adela Ghenis is a fighter and a rogue.
Your Stormwraiths have the ability, "Spend Order: If this character is in the front rank, move him into another front rank."
Order: Spend target Level 3 or higher Stormwraith: Switch locations with the target, regardless of formation.

name: Ana Myredeth
text:
Ana Myredeth's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against stunned characters.
Ana Myredeth can only be moved by maneuvering or falling forward.

setInfos.flavorText: "For the Eternal Emperor and Deverenia!"

name: Brother Sterrance
text: Order: Summon 1 Ghed Eliss and then kill Brother Sterrance.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Storm hath given many gifts. Shalt I show you?"

name: Duchess Becca
text: React: After Duchess Becca is targeted by an opposing character: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have been gifted these lands. For the glory of the Empire."

name: Ghed Eliss
text: React: After entering play from your hand: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Storm unleashed."

name: Ghed Marsus
text:
Good characters within 1 rank suffer -1 ATK, AC, and Skill.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Submit or perish."

name: Ghed Xevios
text:
Ghed Xevios' melee strikes inflict an additional wound against spent characters.
React: After being moved by target other character: Ghed Xevios and the target gain +2 ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn.

name: Bascarite Vermin
text:
Bascarite Vermin may not equip items. You may have more than 3 copies of Bascarite Vermin in your deck.
Bascarite Vermin has +1 ATK for each other Bascarite Vermin in this rank.

name: Sir Oscar Ghenis
text: React: After a summoned character enters play: Sir Oscar Ghenis permanently gains +1 ATK, AC, and Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Commander, you will need no further reinforcements."

name: Sister Agnes
text:
Summoned characters within 1 rank cannot perform actions.
Sister Agnes' strikes ignore the Planar trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "I serve the Church, but that does not mean I trust the Stormborn."

name: The Cerulean Knight
text: React: After The Cerulean Knight targets a summoned character with a melee strike: Kill the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "What is my quarry?" "Yavlo."

name: Uriens the Aged
text: Order: Once per turn: Target equal or higher Level Deverenian gains +1 Level until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "I hath seen much in my life. But nothing that compares to this new world."

name: Anger
text:
Anger gains +3 ATK for each wound on him.
While Anger's primary ATK is +8 or greater, his melee strikes inflict an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "I did not survive this long to die this far from home. I shall see my son again."

name: Berserk
text: React: Twice per turn, after Berserk suffers wounds from an opposing character: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "To die facing a dragon is no different than to die facing an Abyssal. Don't remember me, brothers; remember the Accord."

name: Debris Gargoyle
text: Spend Order: Target 2 Debris Gargoyles you control: Summon 1 Mortar Gargoyle and then kill the targets.

setInfos.flavorText: "That which was shattered can be again made whole. Symbolic of our people, don't you think." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Grind
text: Spend Order: Summon 1 Dwarven Axe and equip it to a non-opposing, non-stunned Dwarf within 1 rank, regardless of class restrictions.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'll rest once we've won."

name: Hethrhod Aialla
text:
Aialla is a cleric and a wizard.
React: Once per target per turn, after casting a Level X cleric spell: Ready a non-stunned Level X or lower Gargoyle.
React: Once per turn after spending to cast a Level X wizard spell, spend a Level X or higher Gargoyle: Ready Aialla.

name: Inferno Gargoyle
text:
May not equip items or attack.
Inferno Gargoyle may perform Fire actions regardless of class restrictions.
Spend Order (Fire): Discard a card: Perform a melee strike or a +6 ranged strike.
React: After another Dwarf readies during the decree phase: Ready Inferno Gargoyle.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't make any sudden moves, or we're all dead." - Angus Hammerfall
"May I feed one? May I?" - Jonah the Burglar
"Don't make any sudden moves, or we're all dead." - Angus Hammerfall
"Do you smell that? Just like that spirited washery maid I once knew..." - Jonah
"They have an uncanny knack for finding a chink in your armor. Let's lead those knights on a merry chase that ends just at this lair." - Graham Heyward
"I know these things are among the most lethal creatures in all the Accordlands, Ablung. How do we keep it in line?" - Tyren Ruskin
"Myreth and Tyraniel are ours by right, but Tseleuse has its own denizens and keepers." - Tepheroth
"Bascaron, the broken moon, passes closer to our mountains with each day, leaving behind abominations that once were beasts." - Rahku Mennanakh
"Bascaron, the broken moon, passes closer to our mountains with each day, leaving behind abominations that once were beasts." - Rahku Mennanakh

name: Mantle Gargoyle
text:
The rank behind Mantle Gargoyle will have an additional character in it before it is illegal.
React: After performing a Fire action, kill Mantle Gargoyle: Before fixing any illegal ranks, summon 1 Inferno Gargoyle into Mantle Gargoyle's former location.

name: Mortar Gargoyle
text:
React: After Mortar Gargoyle is summoned: Target character in the front rank must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 17) or become stunned.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "They're... shooting back." - Shadith Glyn

name: Resilient
text: React: After Resilient redirects a strike or action: He permanently gains +2 AC and Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "She speaks the word of Kor, Alaric. Not even a king can gainsay that."

name: Shatterstone Gargoyle
text: React: Before Shatterstone Gargoyle is killed: Summon 2 Debris Gargoyles.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'd always wondered where new gargoyles came from..." - Tumble

name: Tempered Gargoyle
text:
Tempered Gargoyle gains +6 AC and Skill while targeted with Earth and Fire actions.
React: Before Tempered Gargoyle is killed: Summon 1 Tempered Armor and equip it to a non-opposing, non-stunned Dwarf within 1 rank, regardless of class and Level restrictions.

name: Alket Calix
text: Spend React: After entering play from your hand: Summon 1 Mummy or 1 Karem Tansiq.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've brought friends..."

name: Cordeos Reborn
Disease
text: React: Before Disease is killed by target opposing character: Attach Disease to the target. While attached, the target gains the Poison and Cursed traits and suffers -1 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't let it touch you." - Azam

name: Graphiel
text:
Graphiel is a fighter and a wizard.
Graphiel's spells gain +1 to strike rolls and DC saves for each Undead in this rank.
Order: Once per turn, kill target Elf or Undead: Either perform a melee strike or remove a wound from Graphiel. If the target was Level 4 or higher, you may do both.

name: Isis Winterborn
text: React: After entering play from your hand, target up to three opposing characters: Remove up to 3 attached cards from the target(s). If 1 or 2 cards were removed, summon 2 Mummys. If 3 cards were removed, summon 1 Poison Avatar into your front rank. Banish Isis Winterborn.

name: Misearean Trader
text: Spend React: After a melee or ranged strike targets Misearean Trader, move him to another position in this rank: Cancel the strike.

name: Karem Tansiq
text: React: After entering play from your hand, banish target Steed in any discard pile: Move forward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I bring news from home. The queen is dead."

name: Mummy
text: React: After entering play from your hand: Target character within 1 rank permanently gains the Poison trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Such odd burial rites. How fortuitous." - Morghen

name: Otin Dythanus
text: Spend Order: Banish target character in any discard pile: Summon 1 Mummy.

setInfos.flavorText: "We need no rest. The armies of death will engulf this world."

name: Poison Avatar
text:
Characters with the Poison or Cursed trait cannot ignore the Planar trait of Elves in this rank.
React: After Poison Avatar hits with a strike: The target permanently gains the Poison trait. If the target already has the Poison trait, then they must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or permanently lose 1 Level.

name: Toma Glyn
text:
When Toma Glyn uses the Marksmanship feat, he gains the additional option: "This strike may target a character in any rank."
After Toma Glyn fails a Marksmanship feat check, the strike is a Critical Failure.
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike that cannot be canceled or redirected.

name: Vermus Rowan
text:
Vermus may cast Level 1 and 2 cleric spells.
React: After entering play: Name a non-faction, non-Warlord trait. Until end of game, Vermus Rowan's strikes inflict an additional wound against characters with the named trait.

name: Aisiat
text:
Aisiat's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against spent characters and gain +5 ATK against stunned characters.
Spend React: After entering play, Aisiat permanently loses 2 HP: Summon 3 The Rebellious.

name: Anton Everchanging
text:
Anton Everchanging is a rogue and a wizard.
Anton Everchanging may perform actions printed on Lycanthropes in play (paying costs as normal). Each action may only be performed once per turn, regardless of how many Lycanthropes have it or any usage restrictions, and its duration is "until end of turn" if it is normally longer.

name: Brother Westman
text: While in play and your Warlord is a Free Kingdoms, cards in your discard pile are not affected by opposing card effects.

setInfos.flavorText: The necromancer's smile dropped shortly before the freeman's mace broke his skull.

name: Essek the Creator
text:
Essek the Creator gains +2 Skill for each Lycanthrope in this rank.
React: After Essek the Creator moves into your front rank, kill him: Summon 3 Yscarite Pack.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yavlo does naught but destroy; thou appreciate mine talents more."

name: Tower of the Steel Rose
text: Tower of the Steel Rose may not perform actions or start the game in play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Any who remain after my call are defiant, and enemies of the direst breed." - The Eternal Emperor
"Build your walls as high as the mountains, my beloved Ersane, and still I will come for thee. Thy promise thou shalt keep." - Sir Magnus Arcadis

name: Picella
text: Spend Order: Once per game: Summon 1 Dire Boar.

setInfos.flavorText: "They want to help. The natural order itself desires the downfall of The Chosen."

name: Quaint Luffield
text: React: After entering play: Target equal or lower Level Free Kingdoms permanently gains or loses 1 Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "Listen to the man. I mean the wolf. I mean... Whatever he is. Listen to him."

name: Smidgley Adams
text:
Adjacent Free Kingdoms gain +2 (+5 if the target is evil) to ranged strike rolls.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 (+8 against evil characters) ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "He's no Terak, but Serif knows the true foe, right enough."

name: Tetbas Yscar
text: React: After Tetbas kills an opposing summoned character: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Return them to whence they came. I can still put things right. I can still save you all. Trust in me." - Anton

name: The Rebellious
text: React: After being summoned: The Rebellious permanently gains the ability "React: After The Rebellious succeeds with a Stealth check: Perform a melee strike."

setInfos.flavorText: "A token of trust, Ebonwoulfe." - Taisia

name: Threndil Yscar
text: React: Twice per turn, after Threndil Yscar hits target opposing character with a strike: The target gains the Lycanthrope and Cursed traits until the end of turn, and must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or become spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "My way is better than Anton's." - Essek the Creator

name: Yscarite Pack
text: React: After entering play from your hand: Until end of turn, Yscarite Pack gains an additional melee strike (base +0) when attacking.

setInfos.flavorText: "We're being hunted." - Maxt Stormcrow

name: Admiral Veso
text: React: Once per turn, after Admiral Veso kills an opposing character: He performs a Tactics action without spending.

setInfos.flavorText: "Make ready the fleet. We will show these pretenders who truly rules the waves."

name: Dire Bear
text:
Dire Bear is the same alignment as your Warlord.
Order: Spend a Druid or Ranger: Move forward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dire just means it's bigger, okay?" - Rolando

name: Fire Elemental
text: React (Fire): After entering play from your hand: If your Warlord is a Mercenary, perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "There's a whole Plane of Fire, you know. Most of my best friends live there." - Yavlo the Kindled

name: Joan Drake
text: React: Once per turn, after a character within one rank is killed: Remove the character from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: The steel giant pressed the dagger into her hands, and sent her away. She dreads its purpose... and hers as well.
The automaton stood before her, silent... until she touched it.

name: Hardened Cut-throat
text: Hardened Cut-throat has +1 ATK, AC, and Skill for each other Hardened Cut-throat and/or Press Ganger in play.

setInfos.flavorText: "On sea or land, my boys can't be beat." - Mad Mel

name: Mantus Heed
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike.
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character pays the costs for an action that will draw one or more cards from the top of their deck: The cards are not drawn.

setInfos.flavorText: "With an air elemental at the sails, no ship is faster."

name: Phantom Beast
text:
Wounds suffered by Phantom Beast may not be reduced or removed.
Phantom Beast's melee strikes ignore the Planar trait and AC bonuses from items.

setInfos.flavorText: "Some manage to escape the Plane of Secrets. None realize when they do." - Anton

name: Phantom Warrior
text:
Wounds suffered by Phantom Warrior may not be reduced or removed.
Phantom Warrior's melee strikes ignore the Planar trait and AC bonuses from items.

setInfos.flavorText: "The gods have awoken? Then our crimes will soon be punished." - Thalaasa

name: Press Ganger
text: Order: Once per turn: Perform a melee strike. If the target is killed, banish it and summon 1 Hardened Cut-throat.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sea-farers get to keep their throats."

name: Purifier
text:
Purifier's strikes ignore the Planar trait.
Purifier gains +5 AC and Skill while targeted by summoned characters.
Purifier's melee strikes hain +5 ATK and inflict an additional wound against summoned characters.

name: Shabiri
text:
React: After target character wounds Shabiri with a melee strike, discard a card: The target suffers 1 wound.
React: After entering play from your hand: Shabiri permanently gains +5 ATK, +1 HP, and the Planar trait.

name: Skeleton Warrior
text: Spend React: After entering play from your hand: Inflict 1 wound on target character within 1 rank that has the Cursed or Poison trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Order Loth has stolen too much of my work." - Morghen

name: Amak
text: React: Once per turn, after target summoned character enters play: Kill the target.

setInfos.flavorText: A fallen legion born again on a new world.

name: Ettres
text: React: Once per turn, after an opposing character performs an action to draw or retrieve a card from their deck: Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "I see what you did there."

name: Amoudasi's Fire
text:
Amoudasi's Fire may not attack.
Spend Order: Target character within one rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "When Amoudasi touches Narawat, all that is left is ash." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Fo'Nak
text:
Fo'Nak may only target Sieges with the Medicine feat.
Order: Once per game: Target Siege within 1 rank permanently gains or loses 1 Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course it can be repaired. Mostly."

name: Hechun Wolfheart
text:
Spend Order: Move target adjacent character forward 1 rank.
Spend Order: Once per game: Summon 1 The Wolf. Unless you control 3 Hechun Wolfheart, The Wolf permanently loses 1 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "Krun has not forgotten his oath. Have you forgotten yours, Set'rokh?"

name: Nothrog Cavalry
text:
Nothrog Cavalry is a fighter and a rogue and enters play as if Level 4.
May not equip items.
Nothrog Cavalry inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against lower Level characters.
Spend Order: If Nothrog Cavalry is wounded: Perform three +6 melee strikes.

name: Pike Cart
text:
May not attack.
Pike Cart may use the Riposte feat any number of times per turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let the Deverenians come and try to take the lands we rightfully conquered!"

name: Rostukk
text:
Rostukk is a fighter and a cleric.
While Rostukk is ready, adjacent Siege may target strikes an additional rank away.
React: Twice per turn, before Rostukk suffers wounds, inflict 1 wound on target adjacent Siege: Reduce the wounds by 1. The target inflicts an additional wound with its next melee strike this turn.

name: Tek'a
text: React (Air): After Tek'a enters play: Either move target character you control forward or backward one rank or Tek'a performs a +5 ranged strike. (Opponent's choice)

setInfos.flavorText: "Choose wisely, knight."

name: The Big One
text:
The Big One gains +1 to ranged strike rolls for each Charge on it.
Spend Order: Once per turn: Eithre put a Charge on The Big One or target 1 character in each rank of an opposing army and then perform a +0 ranged strike against each target. (Opponent's choice while The Big One has 3 or less Charges).

name: The Wolf
text:
May not equip items.
The Wolf's melee strikes inflict an additional wound if there are 3+ Hechun Wolfhearts, or another Totem, in play.
Order: Three times per turn: Move forward 1 rank. You must kill a character as a cost the second and third time you perform this action this turn.

name: Ur'lok'r
text: Order: Once per turn: Either target opposing player discards a random card from their hand, or Ur'lok'r performs an attack without spending. (Opponent's choice)

setInfos.flavorText: "We learned much following Uthanak's death. We endure."

name: Kre-kota
text: Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Until end of turn when targeting a spent character, Kre-kota's melee strikes gain +4 ATK and inflict an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: They needed no daemonic power to infiltrate the camp, and no magic to slit the commander's throat.

name: Kaimi Fateseeker
text: Order: Once per turn, remove a dungeon card in your hand from the game: Succeed with a perception check (DC 15) to search your deck for an item Kaimi can legally equip, and equip it to him.

setInfos.flavorText: I've got an adventure for you...

name: Lilah
text: Spend Order: Once per turn, return a higher Level non-Warlord Mercenary in your army to its owner's hand: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Everyone wants power, and who's to say you won't do better with it than your enemies? We've got an offer for you..."

name: Leimoniads
text: React: After entering play from your hand: Leimoniads permanently gain +1 Level and HP.

setInfos.flavorText: The smaller the sacrifice, the smaller the daemon. A swarm can be deadlier than a single daemonlord.

name: Master Gesar
text:
Spend Order: Until end of turn, your Daemons gain +5 ATK and +1 HP.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Target non-Warlord Daemon permanently gains or loses 1 Level.

setInfos.flavorText: "I believe we will no longer require the race known as humans."

name: Mistress Nanak-min
text: Spend Order: Kill target Level X Thrall: Before fixing illegal ranks, put a Level X+1 or lower Daemon from your hand into play in the target's former location and orientation.

setInfos.flavorText: "They can kill all the thralls they want; it saves us the trouble of doing it ourselves."

name: Pavaxtag
text:
Order: Kill a Level X Thrall: Inflict 1 wound on target Level X or lower stunned character within 1 rank.
React: Twice per turn, before a strike roll targeting Pavaxtag, kill target adjacent character: The strike is a Critical Failure.

name: Pun-Egusse
text: React: Once per turn, after a Thrall you control is killed as a cost: Summon 1 Leimoniads.

setInfos.flavorText: "Consider it reincarnation, of a sort." - Master Fabas

name: Redu Herm
text:
Redu Herm is a fighter and a cleric and enters play as if Level 4.
Redu Herm's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against lower Level characters.
Order: Once per game, target non-Warlord The Chosen you control permanently gains the Daemon trait.

name: Render of Sanctity
text:
Render of Sanctity may not suffer more than 1 wound from strikes or actions.
React: After Render of Sanctity kills a character: Remove a wound from it.

setInfos.flavorText: "There will be nowhere they can hide. This extermination is long past due." - Nin-Gula

name: Soul Rider
text:
React: After entering play from your hand: Soul Rider permanently gains +2 ATK and the Planar trait.
React: Before Soul Rider kills target opposing character: Permanently take control of the target, remove all wounds, and the target is not killed. Attach Soul Rider to the target. Before the target is killed, return Soul Rider to its owner's hand.

name: Tarcheti
text: Spend Order: Kill a Level X Thrall: Reveal the top X cards of your deck and put a revealed rogue action card into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Taisia has been free long enough."

name: The Emaciated
text: Spend React: Before The Emaciated is killed by an opposing character: Summon 1 Soul Rider adjacent to The Emaciated.

setInfos.flavorText: "They subsist on the love of the Masters." - Taisia

name: Mourn Imp
text: Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Quit your cackling, beast. My bargain with Ablung doesn't include your life."
"They were sentries once, before Mournwater learned how little can hold their attention." - Yscar the Elder

name: Close Shot
text:
Only characters with the Marksmanship feat may perform this action.
React: Before targeting a ranged strike: The strike may target within 1 rank and, against a stunned character, is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "I prefer to kill from afar, but I would be a fool to decline this opportunity." - Mormaenion

name: Moment of Reflection
text:
Only characters with the Scribe feat may perform this action.
Order: Perform an action card scribed to this character. The card remains scribed unless it detaches as part of its effect.

setInfos.flavorText: "One part inspiration, one part desperation."

name: Random Encounter
text:
Order: All players roll a die. The player with the highest roll rolls again on the below chart to determine which effect applies to him.
1-2: Spend or, if already spent, stun your Warlord.
3-6: Summon 3 Phantom Warriors.
7-9: Summon 2 Fire Elementals into your front rank.
10-11: Destroy a random item equipped to your Warlord.
12-16: Summon 3 Skeleton Warriors.
17-18: Summon 1 Phantom Beast into your front rank.
19: Summon 1 Shabiri into your front rank.
20: Your Warlord suffers 2 wounds.

name: Second Wind
text: React: After you pass your second decree in a row: Discard your hand. Draw 2 cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "I just needed to catch my breath. Now where were we?"

name: Swamped
text: Spend Order: Until end of turn, all characters enter play spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Leave the horses, we must continue on foot."

name: Arise
text:
Characters with the Powerattack feat may perform this action regardless of class or Level restrictions, but must be the target.
React: Before target character becomes stunned: The target does not become stunned. If this action was triggered by an opposing character's action, the target may perform a melee strike.

name: Curse of Thorns
text:
Spend Order: Attach Curse of Thorns to target character within 3 ranks: While it is attached, the target has the ability, "After target character enters this rank: The target must succeed with a Poison save (DC 13) or suffer a wound and put a Charge on Curse of Thorns."
When this card has 3 Charges, banish it and summon 1 Poison Avatar into your front rank.

name: Endure Injury
text:
This is not a spell.
Characters with the Defend feat may perform this action regardless of class or Level restrictions.
React: Before this cleric suffers wounds from a strike: Reduce the wounds by 2.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Chosen can destroy our bodies, but our indomitable spirit will endure to tear down their empire." - Strak

name: Forbiddance
text:
Seers perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Until end of turn, characters may not be put into play with card effects, and summoned characters may not perform actions.
Order: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck: You may discard the revealed cards or put them back in the same order.

name: Forsake Riches
text:
This is not a spell.
Spend React: After target opposing character pays the costs for an action from an item: Cancel the action. If the item is Level 6 or lower, destroy it.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sever your attachment to possessions. You cannot take them with you, beyond the veil." - Sachiel

name: Kabal Spire
text:
May not start in play.
May not perform actions other than to maneuver.
Saves from actions performed by characters in a rank with one or more unstunned Kabal Spires, have +3 DC.

name: Invisibility Purge
text: Spend Order: Until end of turn, characters critically fail all Stealth checks.

setInfos.flavorText: "The assassin may be coming for the high masters, but she will have to learn some new methods first. We are wise to her tricks, and the daemons are eager for her soul." - Nin-Gula

name: Project Doubt
text:
Order: Target character's next die roll suffers a penalty equal to this cleric's Skill.
Spend React: Before target character rolls a die: If this cleric is a Seer, the target suffers a penalty to the roll equal to this cleric's Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "I wouldn't try that if I were you." - Inquisitor Dmitir

name: Severed of Destiny
text: React: Before wounds on target character are redirected or removed: Until end of turn, wounds on the target cannot be reduced or removed.

setInfos.flavorText: "Teufeltiger has given me a great gift and freed me from the Curse. I will not betray him and I will not rest until I have repaid his favor." - Raclesis

name: Summon Nature's Ally
text:
Druids gain +1 Level for performing this action.
Rangers may perform this action regardless of class restrictions.
Order: Summon 1 Dire Bear.
Spend Order: Summon 1 Purifier.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not living in the woods does not make something unnatural." - Eloise

name: Wither
text:
React: After target opposing stunned character falls forward without stunning: The target may not ready or unstun until end of next turn.
Spend Order: Until end of turn, target stunned character suffers -3 AC and an additional wound from melee strikes.

name: Backhand
text:
Barbarians gain +1 Level for performing this action.
React: Before killing target opposing character with a melee strike: Inflict one wound on target lower Level character adjacent to the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "The only mercy I bring is a quick death." - Adela Ghenis

name: Channel the Soul
text:
Paladins gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
Order: Target up to X summoned creatures within 1 rank, where X is this fighter's Level: Inflict 1 wound on each target.
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike. The strike inflicts 2 additional wounds against characters of the opposite alignment.

name: Combat Medicine
text:
Characters with the Medicine feat may perform this action regardless of class or Level restrictions.
Order: Remove a wound from this fighter or adjacent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Count yourself lucky that you only lost a hand."

name: Contingencies
text: Order: All players reveal the top two cards of their decks. Choose one revealed card from each player to be discarded. The remaining cards are put into the players' hands.

setInfos.flavorText: "If we cannot hold the keep, detonate the blacksand. I will not surrender it to the Deverenians." - Set'rokh

name: Focused Strike
text:
Characters with the Riposte feat may perform this action regardless of class restrictions.
React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that hit: Perform a melee strike against the same target. The strike gains +3 ATK if performed during an opponent's decree.

setInfos.flavorText: "Leave no Deverenian alive." - Set'rokh

name: Thunic Wyvern
text:
Wyvern may perform rogue action cards.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Far cousins. And not too intelligent either." - Su-tatra
"Foolish mammal. You cannot best a child of The Dragon."
"Months after the dragons' attack, their simpler cousins only now return..." - Joan Drake
"They be lesser cousins to Dragons, which means one is only about twice as smart as thou and I." - Sir Diotram
"They be lesser cousins to Dragons, which means one is only about twice as smart as thou and I." - Sir Diotram

name: Honorless
text:
React: After target opposing stunned character forward without stunning: Until end of turn, strikes against that character gain +5 to the die roll.
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike. The strike inflicts 2 additional wounds against stunned characters.

name: Sundering Strike
text:
This is a spell.
React: After this fighter hits target character with a melee strike: Target each character in the same rank as the target. Each target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 9 or this fighter's primary ATK, whichever is higher) or become spent and, if summoned, suffer a wound.

name: Tactical Retreat
text:
Rangers gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
Order: An adjacent lower Level character performs a melee strike. Move this fighter backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Run cowards! Run from the might of the Chosen!"

name: Ward
text: React: After this fighter is targeted with a strike or action from an opposing character's spell: Cancel the strike or action. If this fighter is a Barbarian, perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Shah'syss charged the wizard, unhindered by the mage's binding spell."

name: Detour
text: Spend React: After target opposing character moves without spending: Spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Nothrog, and now the Deverenians, encroach from the east. Teach them a lesson." - Morghen

name: Duck
text:
Scouts gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
React: After an equal or lower Level opposing character targets this rogue: Perform a decree that does not produce a strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not so fast, 'Admiral.'" - Mad Mel

name: Hoist the Black Flag
text:
Mercenaries gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
Spend Order: Summon 2 Hardened Cut-throats. If your Warlord is Mad Mel Reyvilo, summon 1 Press Ganger. Until end of turn, your characters have the ability, "React: Once per turn, after killing an opposing Level X character: Gain +X Levels for equipping the next item this character equips this turn."

name: Master Poisoner
text: Order: Reveal the top 7 cards of your deck: You may retrieve a revealed Poison card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have no love for Morghen, Raclesis. He is powerful, but Winter possesses even more. Choose your allies wisely." - Acanothropis

name: Rattled
text:
Characters with the Charisma feat may perform Rattled regardless of class restrictions.
React: Before target character within 1 rank makes a die roll: The target suffers -X to the die roll, where X is 3 or this rogue's Charisma bonus, whichever is greater.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your mother handles a sword better, you mangy cur!" - Mad Mel

name: Ride Until Dawn
text:
Characters with the Riding feat may perform this action regardless of class or Level restrictions.
React: Before this rogue suffers wounds from a strike, destroy an equipped ready Steed: Reduce the wounds by 2.

setInfos.flavorText: "We ride the steeds unto the brink of death. We have little time." - Commander Kaiten

name: Tyren Ruskin
text: Spend React: Before target character in this rank suffers wounds, Tyren Ruskin suffers one wound: Reduce the wounds suffered by the target by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ablung offered me something, and I accepted. If it damns me, so be it."
"Kavara's mood is never stable, but she is implacable, and merciless." - Toren Yscar
The rumors have already begun, blaming King Michael of Andover's death on the elves. But I am not so sure...
The rumors have already begun, blaming King Michael of Andover's death on the elves. But I am not so sure...

name: Silent Strike
text:
Rogues in opposing factions gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
Order: Gain Stealth +5 until end of turn.
React: After canceling a strike with Stealth: Perform a melee strike. If the strike hits, spend the target.

name: Song of Madness
text:
This is a spell.
Bards gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
Spend Order: Target lower Level non-Warlord character must succeed with a will save (DC 18) or you gain control of the target until end of turn or, if the target is summoned, permanently.

name: Stumble
text:
Assassins gain +1 Level for performing this action.
Spend React: After target equal or lower Level character performs a melee strike that missed: The target either performs a melee strike against the target of your choice or suffers 1 wound, your opponent chooses.

name: Waylay
text:
React: After target opposing stunned character falls forward without stunning: Inflict 3 wounds on the target.
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "You have ventured too far afield, Nothrog. A pity you will learn nothing from this lesson." - Indariel

name: Animate Dead
text: Spend Order: Discard 3 cards from the top of your deck or, if this wizard is a Necromancer, you may banish 3 characters from any discard pile instead: Summon 3 Skeleton Warriors.

setInfos.flavorText: "The elves say they have committed to our alliance, but so far have risked none of their lives." - Angus Hammerfall

name: Attend Me
text:
Summoners gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
Spend Order: Reveal the top X+2 cards of your deck, where X is this wizard's Level: You may retrieve a revealed equal or lower Level character and put it into play or into your hand. Discard the other cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "Each page, a bound soul, eagerly awaiting my release." - Atiratu

name: Denounce
text:
Cantors may perform this action regardless of class restrictions.
Order: Target player must choose a character they control: The target character becomes stunned or, if already stunned, suffers 1 wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "The daemons are at bay for now. But we cannot defend forever. We must strike back." - Paymaster Corr

name: Devour Breath
text:
React: Before an opposing stunned character falls forward without stunning: Target character in the same rank falls forward instead.
Spend Order: Target character within 3 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + this wizard's Skill) or become stunned.

setInfos.flavorText: "No quarter. End any that dare challenge our supremacy." - Mantus Heed

name: Expeditious Retreat
text:
Characters with the Stealth feat may perform this action regardless of class or Level restrictions.
React: After this wizard is targeted by a strike: Redirect the strike to an adjacent character, if possible. Move forward or backward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "One of a wizard's most annoying talents is living to fight another day." - Taisia

name: Inanimate Curse
text:
Bards may perform this action regardless of class restrictions.
Spend Order: Target an item within 3 ranks and succeed with a Skill check (DC 10 + the item's Level) to attach this card to the item. If the target is Cursed, then the Skill check is a Critical Success. While this card is attached, the item gains the Cursed trait and is considered blank except for its traits.

name: Brett Lund
text: While Brett Lund is in a rank with at least three other characters his base ATK is changed to +4/+1.

setInfos.flavorText: "I don't care what the others say. I won't watch another massacre."
The Horseman parted as Orban walked past, swords drawn high in salute.

name: Patience Exhausted
text: Order: You may spend this wizard: Target character within 2 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill) or suffer 1 wound. If you spent this wizard, then all characters with the same name as the target suffer 1 wound instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "Slayer the Unkind lives yet. Methinks he will not be happy to see thee, Yavlo." - Magellan

name: Phantasmagoria
text: Spend Order: Summon either 1 Phantom Beast or 2 Phantom Warriors. If this wizard is a Level 4 or higher Illusionist, summon all 3 instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "We are not so different. We both understand the military need for arrow fodder." - Envoy Soraya

name: Release Shabiri
text:
Summoners gain +1 Level for performing this action.
Spend Order: Target opposing character within 2 ranks must succeed with 3 magic saves (DC 17) or suffer 1 wound for each failed save. If the target is killed, summon 1 Shabiri in his former location, regardless of formation. Banish this card.

setInfos.flavorText: "It... It... inside him..." - Darso the Mad

name: Siphon Magic
text:
Characters with the Magic Resistance feat may perform this action regardless of class or Level restrictions.
React: After this wizard is targeted by a spell: Cancel the spell. You may remove a wound from this wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "I suffered in fire once. Now it nourishes me." - Castus the Burning

name: Nightmare's Reach
text:
Nightmare Set item.
Spend Order: Target a Level X or lower summoned character within 3 ranks, where X is the number of Nightmare Set items in play: Permanently gain control of the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Send men, send beasts, send legions - I shall slay them all! And they will praise me as they die..." - Naram-Sin

name: Release
text: React: After this cleric inflicts a wound on target opposing character, spend Release: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15, 20 if the target is a Lycanthrope) or any ongoing effects that are affecting the target are canceled.

setInfos.flavorText: "An end to evil." - Sister Amanda

name: Sacrosanct Helm
text: React: After a character within 1 rank is targeted by a spell, spend Sacrosanct Helm: Succeed with a Magic Resistance check (DC 22) to cancel the spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "The gods still hold power. It is your sorcery that is dying, 'Master'. Pray for my mercy." - Brom Frostbeard

name: Tempered Armor
text: This cleric and adjacent characters gain +2 AC and Skill. Increase the bonus to +5 against Earth and Fire strikes and actions.

setInfos.flavorText: "Too far? There are no lengths I would go to to free myself from this flesh prison! The gargoyle king will live again!" - Thekk Rockbender

name: The Master's Mark
text: Order: Spend The Master's Mark: Until end of turn, target non-Cursed character you control inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against characters of the opposite alignment (from this cleric) and gains the Cursed trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Good, evil, and the other." - Alaya

name: The Messenger
text:
Order: Spend The Messenger: Move forward or backward 1 rank.
Order: Remove 1 Charge: Equip The Messenger to an adjacent character, regardless of class or Level restrictions.
Spend Order: Kill this character: Summon 1 Shabiri into this character's former location.

name: Ciera Eyes-of-Fire
text: React: Once per turn: After Ciera performs a melee strike: If the number of characters in your army is equal to or less than the number in target's army, perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Got my fill of revenge. Now it's time for fun."
"Watch her well, Uther. She remembers you..."

name: Water of the Gods
text:
Order: Destroy Water of the Gods: Target character within 1 rank may remove 1 wound and permanently loses the Poison trait.
Order: Destroy Water of the Gods: Target Undead within 1 rank suffers -2 ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 18) or suffer 1 wound.

name: Winterhold Armory
text: Order: Spend Winterhold Armory: Summon 1 Dwarven Axe and equip it to a character you control, regardless of class restrictions.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Accordlanders speak true. We must no longer hide here in our selfishness! As Kor would, we must march out to fight this evil!" - Grimur

name: Dwarven Axe
text:
This fighter's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against Monsters.
React: After equipping Dwarven Axe from your hand: It permanently gains +2 ATK and +1 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's been an honor, my liege." - Helt Royalwarden

name: Gauntlets of Power
text: React: Before this fighter makes a melee strike roll, spend Gauntlets of Power: For the duration of the strike, this fighter gains either +4 ATK or Powerattack +8.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't need 'em. I'll defeat this Sin with my bare teeth." - Krenthor Gouge

name: Helm of Expertise
text: React: After performing a feat, spend Helm of Expertise: This fighter may perform that feat an additional time this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The knowledge of the ancients. I hope that it is enough." - King Alaric

name: Hippia
text:
Order (Fire): Spend Hippia: Target lower Level character within 2 ranks must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 20) or suffer 2 wounds.
Order: Twice per turn: Move forward or backward 1 rank.

name: Holy Avenger
text:
This fighter's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against Monsters and Cursed characters and ignore the Planar trait.
This fighter may not equip Cursed items.
React: After this fighter is targeted by an action that does not produce a strike, spend Holy Avenger: Succeed with a will check (DC 18, 13 if this fighter is a Paladin) to cancel the action.

name: Sir Orban
text:
If this fighter is not Cursed, his other items may not be destroyed.
Order: Spend Sir Orban: Sir Orban performs a melee strike as if it were a Level 3 fighter with the Paladin trait, +5 ATK, 15 AC, +2 Skill, and 1 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: He insists that his place is but to serve.

name: Stance of Vengeance
text: Spend Order (Tactics): Until end of turn, this fighter has the ability, "React: Twice per turn, after target character performs a melee strike against the fighter: Perform a melee strike strike against the target."

setInfos.flavorText: "It is not the way of the havat-lahn. But they never had to face The Chosen." - Brymin

name: The Forest's Seed
text:
Skeleton Warriors gain +1 ATK for each Charge on The Forest's Seed.
React: Twice per turn, after this fighter kills a character with a melee strike: Summon 1 Skeleton Warrior and put a Charge on The Forest's Seed.

name: Crusher
text: Crusher's melee strikes inflict an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fun to beat on for a while, but then I get bored..." - Samope
"Not all our ancestors saw the wisdom in proper breeding." - Kzarrik

name: Cloak of Phantoms
text:
While targeted by a summoned character, this rogue gains +4 AC and Skill.
React: After this rogue is targeted with a melee strike, spend Cloak of Phantoms: Summon 1 Phantom Warrior adjacent to this rogue. You may redirect the strike to an adjacent character, if possible.

name: Dust of Obscurement
text: Order Destroy Dust of Obscurement: Until end of turn, characters in this rank gain Stealth +0 and +3 AC. You may move this rogue backward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Sometimes, cover of night alone is not enough to hide from the daemons.

name: Finisher
text:
Strikes against this rogue may not be canceled or redirected.
This rogue's melee strikes against spent characters gain +2 ATK and inflict an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Cursed? It gets the job done." - Mad Mel

name: Nightmare's Edge
text:
Nightmare Set item.
Order: Spend Nightmare's Edge, target up to X summoned characters within 1 rank, where X is the number of Nightmare Set items in play: Each target suffers a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "It used to be Tom's. I swore I'd never use it. That's how much I want you dead, Sin." - Logan

name: Precise Arrows
text: React: Before this rogue makes a ranged strike roll, spend Precise Arrows: The strike inflicts an additional wound against Sieges and ignores AC bonuses from items.

setInfos.flavorText: "One archer took out the makusog division? Unacceptable! I will not tolerate lies and excuses!" - Scyrax

name: Riding Bear
text:
Order: Spend Riding Bear: Move forward 1 rank.
Order: Spend and destroy Riding Bear: Summon 1 Dire Bear adjacent to this rogue.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's not the strangest thing I've ridden." - Talin Tzin

name: Sniper Crossbow
text:
Spend Order: Perform two +7 ranged strikes.
React: Twice per turn, after this rogue hits target character with a ranged strike: Move the target backward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Morghen plans to betray us. I plan to be ready for him." - Yvaalis

name: Sword-breaker
text: React: Before target character makes a melee strike roll against this rogue, spend Sword-breaker: The strike loses any ATK bonus from Weapons. If the strike misses, you may destroy a Weapon equipped to the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Oops." - Mel'crah

name: Charreon
text:
Before Charreon leaves play: Kill all Skeleton Warriors in play.
Order: Spend Charreon, discard the top card of your deck: Summon 1 Skeleton Warrior.

setInfos.flavorText: "This final battle? All shall die. My kingdom of the dead..." - Morghen

name: Cloak of Levitation
text:
Order: Spend Cloak of Levitation: Move backward 2 ranks.
React: Before this wizard falls forward to fix an illegal rank, spend Cloak of Levitation: This wizard does not spend or stun before moving.

name: Mourn Worm
text: Order: Once per turn, put a card from your hand on top of your deck: Perform a +5 melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "They eat, and they kill, and they eat their kills. Sometimes, they even get bigger." - Tyren Ruskin

name: K'Hallaek's Eye
text:
+2 Skill
React: Before target character within 1 rank makes a strike roll, spend K'Hallaek's Eye: The strike inflicts an additional wound against Stormwraiths and is a spell.

setInfos.flavorText: The Medusan Lords planned the control or destruction of every major force in the Accordlands... even The Storm.

name: Nightmare's Breath
text:
+3 Skill
Nightmare Set item.
Order: Spend Nightmare's Breath: Kill target Level X or lower summoned character within 3 ranks, where X is the number of Nightmare Set items in play.
