setInfos.flavorText: "The armies all meet to fight, yet their struggle shall burn and fail..." - Yavlo the Kindled

name: Puzzle Box
text:
Order: Remove 1 Charge, spend Puzzle Box: Summon 1 Phantom Warrior.
Order: Remove 3 Charges, spend Puzzle Box: Summon 1 Phantom Beast.
Spend Order: Target X Phantom Warriors and Phantom Beasts: Kill the targets. Put X Charges on Puzzle Box.

name: Staff of Supremacy
text:
While in the front rank, this wizard gains +3 AC.
Spend Order: Target all summoned characters within 1 rank: Inflict a wound on each target.
Order: Once per game: Attach a spell from your hand to Staff of Supremacy. While it is attached, whis wizard may cast the spell once per turn (do not remove it unless that is part of the effect).

name: Tome of Ills
text: React: Before this wizard makes a strike roll from a spell, he permanently loses a HP: The strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "One more page couldn't hurt..." - Renslo the Curious

name: Wand of Earth
text:
While targeted with Earth actions or by Gargoyles, this wizard gains +4 AC.
While Wand of Earth is in the discard pile, your wizards have the ability, "Order: Discard a character from your hand: Retrieve Wand of Earth from the discard pile and equip it to this wizard."
React: After casting an Earth spell, destroy Wand of Earth: Ready this wizard.

name: The End of Times
text:
Your lower Level Daemons have an additional melee strike (base = Primary ATK) when they attack.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Level X character in an opposing discard pile from the game. Choose an opposing player who must inflict X wounds on a character they control.
React: After another player performs a decree, kill a Thrall: Perform a decree.

name: The Curse of Hope
text:
The Curse of Hope inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes, and suffers -1 ATK for each opposing Bard or Paladin.
Order: Once per target per turn: Move target Daemon forward or backward one rank.
React: Before rolling initiative, kill a Level X Thrall: You gain a 3X bonus to your initiative roll.

name: The Death of Dreams
text:
The Death of Dreams suffers -1 Skill for each opposing Bard or Paladin.
React: Before target opposing character is killed: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC = this character's Skill) or the target does not die, removes all wounds, moves to your front rank, permanently gains the Daemon and Thrall traits, and you permanently gain control of the target.

name: A Time for Heroes
text:
Hero only.
Order: All non-opposing characters that share a faction with this character gain +3 ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn. You may shuffle A Time for Heroes into your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "An inspiring performance, I have to admit. In vain in the end, but still." - Galam-Reth

name: Fer-Lith
text: React: Once per turn, after an opposing character rolls a Critical Success: That character's next roll this turn is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: A look of horror, the Abyssal Lord realized what was done. The Abyss... sealed.

name: Holy Warding
text: Spend Order: All characters in this rank gain +4 AC and Skill while targeted with strikes or actions by evil characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Keeps fiends away, no matter their breed." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Sal'Azar the Gilded
text:
Sal'Azar may target spells as if he were in the same location of any ready Monster or Daemon you control.
Order: Kill target Level X character: Put an X+2 or lower Level character from your hand into play in the target's former location.
React: After Sal'Azar targets a strike or spell: Destroy an item equipped to the target or discard a card attached to the target.

name: Nightmare's Skin
text:
Nightmare Set item.
React: Once per turn per Nightmare Set item in play, after a summoned character targets this fighter with a strike: The strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nothing can stop me now." - Naram-Sin

name: Draxon the Stormbreaker
text:
Draxon is a cleric and a fighter.
Your Dragons gain the Daemon trait.
While Draxon is ready, your Dragons may enter play adjacent to him.
React: Once per turn, after target character enters play: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC = Draxon's Skill) or he may not perform actions until end of turn and you may reveal cards from your deck until you reveal an action. Retrieve the action and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Dragon Frenzy
text:
Order: Target Dragon performs an attack without spending.
Order: Switch locations with target Dragon, regardless of formation.

name: Hand of the Storm
text:
If Draxon the Stormbreaker is your Warlord, he may begin the game with Hand of the Storm equipped.
Order: Once per turn, kill target character or wound target Dragon: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Daemon. Put the Daemon into play in the same rank the target was in. Shuffle your deck.

name: Ol' Jack Hollows
text:
Ol' Jack gains the Warlord trait on October 31st.
Spend Order: Target non-Warlord character within 1 rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or be banished and you may summon 1 Grumpkins in the target's former location, regardless of formation.

name: Grumpkins
text:
* is equal to the number of Grumpkins in play.
Order: Twice per turn: Perform a melee strike. If the strike misses, all Grumpkins gain +2 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Trick or treat!"

name: Muck'Olla
text:
+4 Skill
Order: Spend Muck'Olla, target a character you control: You may remove a wound from the target or he may perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: On Ol' Hallow's Eve, pity those that don't leave gifts for Jack; by next morn the spindle-kin will surely pay them back.

name: Red Prisken
text: Order: Once per turn, target an item within three ranks with Level equal to or less than twice Red Prisken's Level: Ready or stun the item.

setInfos.flavorText: "My future lies elsewhere. Goodbye."

name: Urchat
text:
Urchat may not equip items.
Spend React: Before Urchat dies: All other characters within one rank must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 11) or suffer one wound.

name: Ablate
text: React: After this cleric is targeted with a melee strike from an attack by target character: Stun the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "You are as a child to me. You shall not harm me. I will make the very ground you walk upon strive against you." - Khilkhameth

name: Ablung's Riddle
text: Spend React: After target lower Level opposing character within 2 ranks pays the costs to perform an attack: Cancel the attack. Ready the target. Until end of turn, the target may not perform an attack.

setInfos.flavorText: As intricate as knitted lace, as unyielding as the living rock... The Maker has outdone himself.

name: Invocation of Steel
text: Order: If this cleric is a Dwarf, you may discard a card: Search your deck for a Level X or lower item, where X is twice this cleric's Level. Reveal the item, shuffle your deck, and put the item on top of your deck. If you discarded a card, put the item into your hand instead.

name: Ferocity
text: React: After target character pays the costs of a React to, or during, a melee strike from this fighter's attack, if this fighter is a Nothrog you may discard a card: Cancel the action. If you discarded a card, perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Finesse is for cowards that lack strength." - Krenthor

name: Forward Thinking
text:
Spend Order: Your Warlord permanently gains +5 to initiative rolls.
React: After winning initiative by 10 or more: This fighter may either perform a melee strike, or move forward or backward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I always think two steps ahead of my enemy. That's why I win." - Set'rokh

name: Ruash-Shan's Supremacy
text:
React: After target lower Level non-stunned character enters play: Succeed with a Charisma check (DC 15) to allow the target to perform a melee strike.
Order: Put a character into play from your hand. This character may create an illegal rank as long as there is at least one other character in that rank.

name: Slow Death
text: Order: Attach Slow Death to target character within 1 rank that does not have a Slow Death attached. While it is attached, Slow Death has the ability, "At the start of the turn: Put a Charge on this card," and the target suffers -X ATK, AC, and Skill, where X is the number of charges on it.

name: Stutter Step
text:
While it is in your discard pile, your Elves have the ability to perform this action with the additional effect of banishing it.
React: After a character enters play: Move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Move forward or backward up to three ranks.

name: Sudden Shot
text: Order: You may spend a Bow equipped to this rogue: Perform a +2 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound on a Critical Success. If you spent a Bow, the strike is a Critical Success when the die roll is 17, 18, or 19, and after the strike, this rogue may perform an Order.

name: Arcane Adaptability
text:
Spend Order: Perform four +0 ranged strikes.
Spend Order: Perform two +4 ranged strikes.
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "As easy as breathing..." - Dhamir

name: Cal Blackborne
text:
Cal Blackborne is +1 Level for casting spells.
React: After a melee strike or action targets Cal Blackborne, shuffle him into your deck: Cancel the strike or action.

name: Dark Wings, Dark Words
text: Spend Order: Target character must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound. If the target has a Familiar equipped, increase the DC by twice the Familiar's Level and destroy the Familiar if the save is failed.

setInfos.flavorText: "Morghen... dearest Morghen, our queen would have words with you."

name: Yavlo's Diplomacy
text: Deverenians gain +2 Levels for Performing this action and any revealed action.

setInfos.flavorText: While in your hand and your Warlord is a Deverenian, Hannah has the ability, "React: After an opposing character targets a Deverenian you control with an action that does not produce a strike, put Hannah into play: Cancel the action. Hannah may move forward or backward one rank."

name: Master of the Hunt
text:
React: Twice per turn, after performing a melee strike: Perform a +3 melee strike that may not gain bonuses from items or inflict more than 1 wound.
React: Once per turn, after target lower Level character inflicts a wound on Master of the Hunt with a melee strike, discard a card: Inflict 1 wound on the target. This React may be performed while stunned.

name: Mikel the Learned
text:
Mikel the Learned gains +2 Levels for scribing spells and casting scribed spells.
React: After entering play, choose a spell in any discard pile: Retrieve the spell and attach it to Mikel the Learned as if scribed.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even the Stormwraiths have fallen before the might of the Abyss, but I shall find the answer to Deverenia's salvation."

name: Mother Ileana
text:
React: After entering play: Search your deck for a non-character card, reveal it, shuffle your deck, and place the revealed card on top.
React: Once per turn, before target character makes a die roll that was not preset: The target uses two dice for the roll. You may choose which one to use for the result.

name: Astasia
text: While in your hand and your Warlord is a Dwarf, Astasia has the ability, "React: After target opposing character readies during the decree phase, put Astasia into play: Spend the target. Ready a Dwarf of equal or lower Level than the target."

setInfos.flavorText: "Back into the fight! We're not out of this yet."

name: Gadget
text: Spend React: After target Dwarf within 1 rank is targeted by an opposing character: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. The target may equip a revealed Trap regardless of Level requirements, if possible. Shuffle your deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "Here, take this! It should be useful."

name: Pathfinder
text:
Pathfinder inflicts an additional wound against stunned characters.
React (Trap): Once per turn, after target opposing character moves: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 16, 20 if stunned) or become spent, or if already spent, suffer a wound.

name: Rockfall
text: React (Earth): Once per turn, after Rockfall hits target opposing character with a melee strike: Target character in the rank behind the first target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 17) or fall forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hmph. Daemon. Abyssal. They all die the same."

name: Aphotican
text:
Aphotican may not attack.
Aphotican may Scribe any spell of 5th Level or less. Aphotican may perform scribed spells regardless of class and Level.

name: Amara Bodach
text:
React: After target Elf in this rank unstuns: Ready the target.
Spend React: After a card is discarded from your hand or deck: Retrieve the card and put it into your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: A dark aura radiated from the Bodach and wherever she roamed the dead arose.

name: Korra Sorrowsong
text: While in your hand and your Warlord is an Elf, Korra Sorrowsong has the ability, "React: After an opposing player draws one or more cards from his card effect, put Korra Sorrowsong into play: The cards are discarded. Draw a card."

setInfos.flavorText: "Such a lovely song." - The Lady of Pain

name: Vythia Tansiq
text:
Vythia Tansiq gains +3 ATK while performing a melee strike against a character with the Poison trait, and gains +3 AC and Skill while being targeted by characters with the Poison trait.
React: After entering play: Until end of turn, opposing characters in any front rank gain the Poison trait.

name: Zaro of Bones
text: While ready, Zaro of Bones has the ability, "Order: Once per turn, banish target character in any discard pile: Perform a +2 ranged strike."

setInfos.flavorText: "I have discovered the secret to immortality. Kill your enemies first."

name: Aukos
text: Order: Once per turn, spend Aukos or discard a card: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to Aukos's Skill. If the strike hits, Aukos may move forward or backward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I don't know where he came from but I'm glad he's on our side." - Bradley

name: Basil the Bold
text: Spend React: After Basil the Bold is targeted with a melee strike by target character: Perform a melee strike against the target. If it hits, the next strike roll against Basil the Bold this turn suffers -10 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sigh... seen one unstoppable army of demons, seen 'em all."

name: Crypt Serpents
text:
May not equip items.
While in your hand and your Warlord is a Free Kingdoms, Crypt Serpents has the ability, "React: Before target opposing character retrieves cards from any discard pile, put Crypt Serpents into play: The cards are not retrieved. Move Crypt Serpents adjacent to the target, regardless of formation."

name: Sir Davin Rellion
text:
Sir Davin Rellion is both a fighter and a wizard and enters play as if he were Level 5.
Sir Davin Rellion gains +1 to strike rolls for each Free Kingdoms in your discard pile.
Order: Once per turn, discard X cards from your deck: Until end of turn, Sir Davin Rellion gains +X ATK, AC, and Skill, where X is between 1 and 5.

name: Dagomir
text: Spend Order: Banish Dagomir: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck. Reacts may not be performed to or during this action.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Dragon hangs like gallows fruit between two worlds, tearing at reality, whilst its children wage war with its corpse spawn. Where can mortals find refuge in such times?"

name: Fantome
text:
May not equip items.
React: Before Fantome is killed by an opposing character: Summon 3 Phantom Warriors.
Order: Once per turn: Switch locations with target character within 1 rank, regardless of formation.

name: Conviction
text: Spend React: After an opposing character pays the costs of a React while making a melee or ranged strike: Cancel the React.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Dark Horsemen can't afford free, so you can't afford us. Sorry."
"Actually, I was a lawyer. Kerebrus found me more honest work."

name: Viktor Amak
text:
Viktor Amak has the same faction as your Warlord.
Spend React: After the draw phase, if it is the first turn: Shuffle your hand into your deck and draw the same number of cards. Reacts may not be performed to, or during, this action.

setInfos.flavorText: "I can no longer see the future, only chaos."

name: Wolves of the Sea
text:
Wolves of the Sea gain +1 ATK and AC for each Hardened Cut-throat in play.
While in your hand and your Warlord is a Mercenary, Wolves of the Sea gains the ability, "React: After an opponent plays a character that is not the same faction as his Warlord, put Wolves of the Sea into play: Move forward up to 2 ranks.

name: Bar'zi
text:
Spend React: After a character you control pays the cost for an action whose effect is determined by an opponent's choice: You make the choice instead.
Order: Once per turn: You and an opposing player either draw a card or discard a card. (Opponent's choice)

setInfos.flavorText: "Hmmm... yess... Bar'zi can see. Can you?"

name: KolTzik
text:
Order: Once per game: Move KolTzik to any rank in your army. Until end of turn, KolTzik may not perform Orders.
React: Once per turn, after KolTzik kills a character: The target's controller must skip their next decree.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Nothrog have never been our allies ShiLara, merely pawns in a greater game."

name: Kratchling
text: React: Before Kratchling kills target opposing character: Banish the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Where did they come from? Are they native here as well or did some fool carry them through?" Rrok mused aloud. "It matters not where they came from," Sceth rumbled from above. "Only that I can make use of them."

name: ShiLara the Lost
text: While in your hand and your Warlord is a Nothrog, ShiLara the Lost has the ability, "React: After an opposing character moves without spending or stunning, put ShiLara the Lost into play: You may move a Nothrog you control forward or backward 1 rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Where is this place... and when?"

name: Anih
text: While in your hand and your Warlord is The Chosen, Anih has the ability, "React: Before an opposing action reduces or removes wounds from target character, put Anih into play: Until end of turn, wounds cannot be reduced or removed from the target. Perform a melee strike against the target."

name: Mistress Elabis
text:
Spend Order: Target character within 3 ranks must succeed with a will save (DC 15, 20 if the target is a Thrall) or suffer 1 wound and become spent.
React: After entering play, up to three target non-Warlord characters permanently gain the Thrall trait.

setInfos.flavorText: Night Stalker's strikes against spent characters ignore AC bonuses. Order: Move forward or backward 1 rank. Night Stalker must succeed with a STEALTH check (DC 20) or permanently lose 1 HP, and until end of turn, Night Stalker cannot perform actions.

name: The Fallen
text:
While a Daemon, The Fallen gains the fighter class and inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
While a Thrall, The Fallen gains the rogue class and the ability, "React: Before The Fallen is killed by a character you control: Move a character you control forward 1 rank."
React: After entering play from your hand: The Fallen permanently gains the Thrall or Daemon trait.

name: Belsamoreth
text: Order: Once per turn: Remove one wound from Belsamoreth.

setInfos.flavorText: "Found a dead man, knows what's what."
"Not all trolls are evil. 'Course, I wouldn't go 'round betting my life that I'd found one of the exceptions." - Jack Casey
"Not all trolls are evil. 'Course, I wouldn't go 'round betting my life that I'd found one of the exceptions." - Jack Casey

name: Blood Bond
text:
This character gains +1 ATK, AC, and Skill for each Charge on Blood Bond.
React: Before this character is killed by an opposing character, banish a card in your discard pile: Equip Blood Bond to an adjacent non-Warlord character. Put a Charge on Blood Bond.

name: Manual of Mirrors
text: React: Once per game, after an opposing character performs a feat: This character permanently gains the same feat with a +3 bonus.

setInfos.flavorText: "It can show you what was and what could yet be, but it will never show you what will be. That is for the gods alone." - Niobe

name: Excoriating Slab
text: React: Before a non-opposing character suffers wounds, spend Excoriating Slab and put a Charge on it: This cleric must succeed with a Medicine check (DC = 5 x the number of Charges on all Excoriating Slabs in play) to reduce the wounds by 1, otherwise he permanently loses 1 HP.

name: Font
text: Spend Order: Discard a card: Summon 1 Water of the Gods and equip it to this cleric.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is the Isle of the Gods and any are welcome to worship here. But you Elves, you have no gods, and your abominations are not welcome here!" - Eloise

name: Rod of Ruin
text:
Order: Remove 2 Charges from Rod of Ruin: Destroy target Level 6 or lower item within 3 ranks.
React: After this cleric hits target character with a melee strike, remove a Charge from Rod of Ruin: Destroy target item equipped to the target. If this cleric is Free Kingdoms, after this strike, perform a melee strike.

name: Helbreach
text:
While there are Charges on Helbreach, it gains Powerattack +5.
React: Before making a melee strike roll, remove a Charge: The strike ignores AC bonuses from items and, if this character is a Mercenary, gains +3 ATK.

name: Hidden Crossbow
text: React: After this fighter is targeted with a strike by target character, spend Hidden Crossbow: Perform a +X ranged strike against the target that cannot gain any other bonuses, where X is this fighter's base ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not what you were expecting, eh?"

name: Shattersteel Helm
text:
+1 HP
After Shattersteel Helm is discarded or destroyed by a card effect, you may banish it and draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is blessed by our master to take the form of whatever you need most. Wear it well." - Galem Reth

name: Gloves of Oblivion
text: React: After this rogue kills an opposing character with a melee strike, spend Gloves of Oblivion: The character's owner must discard a random card from his hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "I will not kill you yet human. I will ruin you. I will lay waste to your plans and destroy all hope in your pathetic race. Only then will I kill you." - Pavaxtag

name: Shiv
text: React: After this rogue hits target character with a melee strike, spend Shiv: The next strike the target performs this turn is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Chosen have sent an assassin after Robert, and I figure it takes one to stop one. Will you help us, Aisiat?" - Sister Amanda

name: Dinal
text:
Dinal may equip two Weapons.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
Order: Once per turn: Move target character in this rank backward one rank.

name: Tome of Expertise
text:
Mercenaries gain +1 Level for equipping Tome of Expertise.
React: After equipping Tome of Expertise from your hand: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. Choose up to X rogue actions that this rogue can perform and attach them as if scribed. Your opponent may banish up to X of the remaining revealed cards, where X is between 0 and 2. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.

name: Ghostwalk Mantle
text:
This wizard gains the Planar trait and may not perform non-spell strikes.
Order: Spend Ghostwalk Mantle: Move forward or backward one rank, regardless of formation.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'm not the only one hiding in your walls, Atiratu. But I will have your blood first." - Taisia

name: Mind Missile
text: Order (Spell): Spend Mind Missile: Banish a scribed action card within 3 ranks. If you did, perform a +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "It... it ripped the very magic from my mind and turned my own spells against me. How can we defeat them when they wield such a power?" - Mikel the Learned

name: Sacrificial Altar
text: React: After a character you control pays the costs of a spell, kill target Level X character: The spell gains +X (X+2 if the target was a Thrall) to strike rolls and DC saves.

setInfos.flavorText: "Indeed. There is no greater purpose for a slave than as a sacrifice for its master." - Sanga Kish

name: Ruuslik
text:
Spend Order: Move forward two ranks.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Faster than a speeding arrow!"
"Everyone just calls me 'Shanks'."

name: Gharin Suul
text: While Gharin Suul is in an opposing player's formation, that player must play with the cards in his hand revealed.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hmm. A holy army. What are you up to, Behlial?"

name: Jacarra
text: Order: Once per turn: Target character other than Jacarra in your army has Riding +10 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Sarakia's wastes now belong to the Deverenians, and the savages that dare prey upon them.
The legendary beasts of the Selempria plains are fast and strong, and are worth 12 men and their swords.

name: Ilar Rowan
text:
Ilar Rowan may enter play into an illegal rank.
Order: Remove Ilar Rowan from the game. At end of turn, return him to play in any rank in your army.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's not what you see that should worry you. Nothings happens on its own."
"Seek what my people and the Deverenians have, Orban, and why the Nothrog don't share it."

name: Shambling Flesh
text:
If you control 3 or more Necromancers, Shambling Flesh has +5 ATK.
If you control 3 or more Summoners, Shambling Flesh has +3 AC and +3 Skill.
errata:
If you have both 3 or more Necromancers and 3 or more Summoners, then Shambling Flesh gets both bonuses.
A character that has both traits would help meet the requirements for either effect.

setInfos.flavorText: "These seem stronger than the last..." - Aquiela

name: Ivaas
text:
Spend React: After looking at one or more cards from your deck, discard a card: Draw a card or shuffle your deck.
Order: Once per turn: Look at the top five cards of your deck. (Return them in the same order.)

name: Blitzer
text:
Blitzer may not equip items.
Blitzer's melee strikes inflict an additional wound.
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike that may target an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: Faster than falcons to his summons they came. He shouted to the demons and called their true names:

name: Validan
text: While Validan has a Shield equipped, he ignores any of its restrictions on making multiple strikes during an attack or turn.
errata: Erratum 2008/08/17: Has 2 HP.

setInfos.flavorText: "Step into the ring and I'll break you."
"Step into the ring and I'll break you."
"Pay enough coin, and anybody'll take a dead man's place."
"Misearis' greatest gladiator, and most popular slave." - Keziah

name: Zhul
text: Order: Once per game: Attach a Level 1 or 2 wizard spell from your hand to Zhul. While attached, Zhul may perform the spell once per turn, as if from your hand and Zhul were a wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "Survival? We offer much more."
"We told you what was to come, and you would not listen. Now you will burn." - Truth

name: Nightscale
text:
Nightscale may not equip items.
Spend Order: Move target character in this rank backward two ranks.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Sirenspawn
text:
Sirenspawn may not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike. If this kills the target then a perform a +4 ranged strike targeting a character in the rank behind the first. Both strikes inflict two wounds.

name: Ashreign
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Target a character within one rank: The target must succeed with four consecutive magic saves (DC 23) or suffer a wound for each failure.

name: Ablung the Maker
text:
Ablung is a cleric, a fighter, a rogue, and a wizard.
Order: Once per turn: Ablung permanently gains +4 ATK, +4 AC, +6 Skill, +1 HP, +1 Level, or any feat with a +1 bonus.

name: Black Tom of Corinth
text:
May start the game with rogues from other factions in play.
Your rogues do not suffer loyalty penalty.
Spend React: After target character performs a melee strike that missed: The target suffers one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course they suspect the truth, master. They just can't afford to refuse our offer."
Never turn your back on a sharpened blade.
Never turn your back on a sharpened blade.

name: Allisara
text: Order: Once per turn, reveal and shuffle a character from your hand into your deck: Search your deck for a character with Level equal to or less that the shuffled character's, reveal it, and put it into play.

name: Strengthen
text: Order: Target character has +1 Level until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Thy Hieroplant beseecheth thee. Destroy the blasphemous tome." - Brother Ansel

name: Noelani
text: Order: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 12 + 1 for each Elf in your discard pile) or permanently lose a Level. Kill Noelani.
errata:
The DC is set when the action's cost is paid; Noelani's death wont help the ability.
Characters with level 0 or lower are killed.

setInfos.flavorText: "Just a quick peek. So much to learn."

name: Ter-Soth
text: Order: Once per game: Attach a lower Level wizard spell from your hand to Ter-Soth. While attached, Ter-Soth may perform the spell once per turn, as if from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is chaos' time, and I am anarchy's king."
I will reign.

name: Wyvern's Talon
text:
Wyvern's Talon may not equip items.
React: After Wyvern's Talon targets a melee strike, spend an adjacent character: The strike has +4 ATK and inflicts an additional wound. The strike inflicts two additional wounds (four total) against Siege characters.

name: Lorik
text: Lorik's melee strikes may target an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: The remainder of the legions stood in neat ranks as the first of the magi strode past to meet with the commander. Discipline was maintained, but there could be no mistaking the loathing in the warriors' eyes.
"We are not all barbarians, Scyrax. The legions are a disciplined host, and the greatest army in the Accordlands."
"Save for their attacks on the Kabal, the war machines are gone from all Nothrog fronts. What is Krun planning?" - The Free King
"If Kez lives you won't." - Ar'kon

name: Trugg
text: Characters in the rank behind Trugg have the ability: "Spend Order: Perform a melee strike that may target an additional rank away."

setInfos.flavorText: "Bring him to me." - Krenthor Gouge
"A warrior truly worth an arm and a leg."

name: Muddflek
text: Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike. Kill Muddflek.

setInfos.flavorText: "Wow. Hehe. Who is that guy?"
"Don't run, I am your friend!"
Burn...burn... BURN!
Heh, heh... heh, heh... heh, heh... BOOM.

name: Rress
text: Spend React: After Rress enters play: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "One thrust of his knife will end more lives than a thousand of your barbarians, Krenthor. Just tell me who to stick it in."
"Hate's Guard is long gone, and its survivors now serve new masters." - Trevaine Cartwright
"Assassins? I have no need of assassins. Be off with you." - Vronish Kez

name: Nalak
text: Spend React: After a character within one rank performs a melee strike: That character must succeed with a poison save (DC 12) or suffer a wound.

name: Hellbringer's Quill
text:
May not attack or equip items.
Put a Charge on Hellbringer's Quill after you roll Initiative each turn.
Spend Order: Remove any number of Charges: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the number of Charges removed.

name: Skash
text: React: Before Skash dies: Target Nothrog's melee strikes inflict an additional wound until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mi'lady doesn't really roll off the tongue."

name: Tarvil
text: Spend Order: The next time an opposing character moves to within one rank of Tarvil, perform a +8 melee strike targeting that character after the move.

name: Cayden
text: React: Once per turn, after a character within two ranks targets or is targeted by a melee strike: Increase or decrease the character's Level by one for the duration of the strike, with a minimum of Level 1.
errata:
This will affect the level of action cards the targeted character can perform.
If the target also has an after-targeting React, then handle React priority in initiative order.
This effect cannot be used in conjunction with other effects to reduce the target's level below 1 (It stops working).

name: Arrag
text: Spend Order: If Arrag is in the first rank: Perform a melee strike targeting a character an additional rank away. If the strike hits, the target falls forward one rank instead of being wounded.

setInfos.flavorText: "Work! Work! Work! Tell me human, why am I here?"

name: Hagunk
text: Hagunk's ranged strikes may target an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "That's right, run! Run, and die as a coward!"
"Quickly, those ones are trying to escape!" - Taoth

name: Sakal
text: Spend Order: Put 2 Charges on a Siege character within one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Lukkot's Hell, but better the one of our making that the Storm's!"
"So much bluster for a walking munitions dump. We ever run out of shot, I know what to use for a replacement." - Varin

name: Temb'w'bam
text: React: After Temb'w'bam performs an action that moved her: Perform a +2 ranged strike that may not receive any other bonuses or penalties to the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "I'll cook 'em, and you can eat 'em!"
"No secret's hidden forever. You just have to look in the right place..."
Suffer and burn, fools.

name: Blacksand Cannon
text:
May not attack or equip items.
Spend Order: Put two Charges on Blacksand Cannon.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge: Perform a +7 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

name: Hurr'aal
text:
Hurr'aal is both a fighter and a wizard.
You must discard a card from your hand to bring Hurr'aal into play.
React: Once per turn, after Hurr'aal casts a spell: Move Hurr'aal forward one rank.

name: Lukkot Warplow
text:
Lukkot Warplow may not equip items, maneuver, or play action cards.
Order: Spend another character in this rank: Move the Warplow forward a rank.

setInfos.flavorText: The plows roared down the Kaballite hills, and behind them stood ruined towers back to the horizon.
"...mother..." - Basil Nemis

name: Machine of Lukkot
text:
May not manuever or equip items.
Machine of Lukkot inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
Order: Spend another character in this rank: Move Machine of Lukkot forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Push, boys, and put your backs into it!"

name: Rugal
text:
Rugal has +3 ATK and -1 AC for each Charge on him.
React: After Rugal kills an opposing character: Put a Charge on him.

setInfos.flavorText: "De'zicrah, where's Uthanak?"
"He's a scout, of a sort. He's cutting a path to the Dwarven king."

name: Samope
text: For each wound on Samope, she performs one fewer melee strike per attack.

setInfos.flavorText: "As with my people, true battle cats require proper breeding."
"Tempting lass, for a Nothrog." - Count Damien

name: Oren
text: Order: Once per turn, target a character: Until end of turn, after the target performs an action printed on an item he must succeed with a reflex save (DC 16) or stun.
errata:
Actions are Orders or Reacts.
Feats and abilities granted through static text (e.g. Blacksnake Whip) are not actions printed on the item.

setInfos.flavorText: "If this is a temple, where are its worshippers?"

name: Stoneblight Cyclops
text: All characters have the ability "React: After targeting Stoneblight Cyclops with a melee or ranged strike, Stoneblight Cyclops has +10 AC for this strike: The strike inflicts two additional wounds."

setInfos.flavorText: "The Southern Mountains, now, they ain't as hospitable, even underground..." - Stalwart

name: Kray
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
Spend React: After Kray enters play: Perform a +5 ranged strike targeting a spent character in an opposing first rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Think Taoth wore white?"
"Nothing like the love between a mother and her son. Nothing like it at all."

name: Bruu'kaal
text:
Bruu'kaal is a fighter and wizard, and enters play as if he were one Level higher.
React: Once per turn, before a character in this rank falls forward: The character does not spend, stun, or wound.

name: Flamespitter
text:
May not attack or equip items.
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike. After the ranged strike resolves, perform consecutive +4 ranged strikes against any characters who were adjacent to the original target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Nuthin' like da smell of roast enemy in da morn'g." - Scyrax
"We need more. We need to burn an army in a single volley." - Taoth
"Don't run in front of it, you idiot!" - Sethusk

name: Light Catapults
text:
Light Catapults not attack or equip items.
Spend Order: Perform five +0 Ranged strikes: These strikes may receive no bonuses to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "All I found in Merrick were cowards picking over the ashes of the dead." - Dakat
"Look, you paid me for my sword and my time, not for me to be quiet about whatever daft plan you think I should just follow meekly."
"Some humans choose to work with the Nothrog-for gold, and for the power. Damn all those who care for money more than pride." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Jarz'an
text: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike against each opposing character within one rank. These strikes inflict an additional wound. Remove Jarz'an from the game.

name: Vornath
text:
React: Once per turn, after Vornath performs a ranged strike that killed the target: Perform a +5 ranged strike against a character in the rank behind the original target.
Spend Order: Perform two +5 ranged strikes.

name: Sargok
text:
Your Nothrog have +3 ATK for each wound on any opposing character.
Your characters with +8 or greater ATK inflict an additional wound with melee strikes.

name: De'zicrah
text: React: Once per turn, after a character enters play: Move forward or backward one rank or perform a +4 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Surprised to see me, Taoth?"
"New Goldenaxe belongs to Uthanak."

name: Andeel Smrti
text: Opposing characters have -1 Level for each wound on them.
errata:
This effect only happens once the wounds actually go on a character. If, say, a level 3 cleric tries to banish a wound from himself, he will do so before the wound prevents him casting it.
If suffering a wound is a cost of an action (e.g. Primal Rage) the level loss incurred doesn't hinder the ability to meet the level requirement of THAT action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Death is too permanent for elven sensibilities; we have other choices. Let me show you the way..."

name: Taoth
text:
Taoth adds +4 to her ranged strike rolls.
Magic saves from Taoth's spells have +3 DC.

setInfos.flavorText: "A joining of equals, more powerful as one?"
Peace is a waste of time.
Peace is a waste of time.

name: Syvonne Ashenstorm
text:
Your Siege characters' melee strikes inflict an additional wound.
If any opposing Warlord is spent, your Siege characters' ranged strikes may target an additional rank away.

name: Ghed Carel
text: React: After a melee or ranged strike targets Ghed Carel: The acting character must succeed with a fear save (DC 9) or the strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Art thou master of earth and sky? Then begone!"

name: Lady Helene
text: While Helene has +5 or greater ATK, she has an additional melee strike (Base +0) and +4 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Black Sun draweth nigh, e'en as the very earth shakes with terror before it. All hail Signon, and all glory to his Eternal Emperor."

name: Kiandra the Utile
text: React: After Kiandra targets, or is targeted by, a melee strike or action, target an opposing character within two ranks of level 3 or less: She has the target's ATK, AC or Skill for the duration of the strike or action.

name: Julien
text: React: After Julien enters play: Equip a Steed of level 6 or less from your discard pile to a Deverenian.

setInfos.flavorText: "Careful, boy. They have a mean temper, and like to kick. Tell me... what is your name?" - Terak Justicebringer

name: Kenton Rellion
text: React: Once per turn, after a character within 2 ranks rolls a Critical Failure on a melee or ranged strike: Perform a melee strike targeting that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "If thou art the Emperor's Champion, then show me the symbol of thy power! Only then shalt thou pass."

name: Squire Kent
text: React: Once per turn, after a melee or ranged strike is redirected to Kent: The strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "An he beareth armor that shattereth blades or shield that turneth bludgeons, any man is feeble that he hath a heart." - Lady Thalia

name: Cardinal Durand
text: Spend Order: Until end of the turn, all melee strikes are Critical Failures, if the target has a higher level than the ATK of the strike, and is not a Warlord.

setInfos.flavorText: "Scelus hath betrayed us to Stormlost, and the Hierophant is mad. The Cardinals must find a new voice."

name: Sir Gautier
text: While Gautier's AC is 19 or greater, he has +3 ATK, +1 level and Riding +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "Milord, dire portents in the east: the Storm hath come to Luthlarius."

name: Sebes
text: React: After Sebes kills a character of equal or higher Level: Sebes permanently gains +2 Levels, +1 HP, and a class of your choice.
errata: The class he gains is in addition to his existing classes

setInfos.flavorText: "Just have to disarm this trap."

name: Alestair the Attentive
text: While Alestair has 10 or greater skill, he has +2 levels for casting spells, and any time he inflicts wounds with a spell he inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why would Modred cast a Stormwraith out of the Storm?" Slayer glared at his pupil. "I-I will scour the text for answers."

name: Ghed Daucet
text: React: Once per turn, after a target character within one rank attacks: If that character's ATK is lower than Daucet's level, stun the target.

setInfos.flavorText: The Storm knoweth an thou turn 'gainst it.

name: Caran Tremayne
text: React: Once per turn, after a Deverenian in your army is targeted by an action or melee strike: Redirect the strike to an adjacent character of lower level than the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "The duchess is no more, milord, but her brother yet lives."

name: Ghed Morak
text: React: After you roll Initiative, name an action card: If your Warlord is a Deverenian, copies of that card may not be played until end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: Those who defy fate, invite it. Thinkest thou different, O Emperor?

name: Gant Foundation
text: Spend Order: Succeed with a Medicine check (DC 20) to ready an adjacent unstunned Dwarf.

setInfos.flavorText: ...raising each other up...

name: Havalt Trotter
text: Spend Order: Target a character within one rank with lower ATK than Havalt: Move the target backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: ...and finally, with Kor's grace...

name: Vad the Cudgel
text: Order: Once per turn: Succeed with a Powerattack check (DC 20) to gain +5 ATK until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: ...with weapons in hand...

name: Arla Favorsight
text: Spend Order: Target a Dwarf: The target gains a bonus (or penalty) to his ATK equal to his AC - 10, until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Be as hard, as unyielding as the rock which sheltered us for so long, and then turn resilience itself into a weapon."
...won the day...

name: Fortitude
text: React: After an action in which Fortitude is wounded: Ready Fortitude.

setInfos.flavorText: ...our people stood their ground...

name: Zel Freed
text: Order: Once per turn: Gain a bonus to ATK equal to an adjacent character's skill, until the end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: ...and our destiny.

name: Aislynn
text: React: After Aislynn hits with a melee strike, the strike inflicts no wounds: Stun the target. The target is -1 Level permanently.
errata:
The cost for the react is to reduce the wounds to 0. If somehow her action is cancelled, she still inflicts no wounds with the strike.
The react cannot be used if the strike would already inflict no wounds due to other card effects.

setInfos.flavorText: "Only one can survive."

name: Drea Nexus
text: While you have one or more spent or stunned Drea Nexus in your army, your Dwarves inflict an additional wound with melee strikes, if the strike hits by 5 or more, or is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: ...as clerics prayed...

name: Dunkirk Guide
text: React: Once per turn, after a Dwarf you control hits with a melee or ranged strike: The strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: That battle, all strikes found their mark...

name: Malice
text: React: After Malice hits with a melee strike against a character with lower skill: The strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "Killin' Nothrogs ain't like puttin' down animals. Animals got more sense."

name: Brin, Pillar of Kor
text: Spend React: After a target character rolls a Critical Success: Ready the target.

setInfos.flavorText: ...while all fought with near-unending strength...

name: Vex Duntan
text: While Vex has 1 or more wounds, he has a bonus to his ATK equal to his Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "You cut me once, Deverenian. Now it's my turn to carve my name into your fancy armor."
...and knocking each wave of Abyssals down...

name: Pride
text: React: Once per turn, after Pride performs a melee strike against a spent character that was a Critical Success, discard a card: Kill the target of the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hitting someone is easy. It's what you hit inside them that matters."

name: Lasan Warbreaker
text: Your Dwarves have the ability "React: After this character is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, spend target Dwarf within one rank: Gain a bonus to AC for the strike equal to the target's ATK. If the strike misses perform a melee strike."

name: Manifested Spirit
text: Manifested Spirit has +1 ATK for each other Undead in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "They abound now-without the rites or sacrificies. What has Rustiq done?!" - Cybille

name: Keir Tansiq
text: React: After a target character within one rank rolls a Critical Failure on a melee or ranged strike, kill Keir: Inflict one wound on the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "The queen has triumphed. No witnesses." - Bronwen Tansiq

name: Kyra Squib
text: React: After any player rolls a Critical Success or Failure, remove a card in your discard pile from the game: Put Kyra into play spent from your discard pile.

setInfos.flavorText: "Guess I don't know when to give up, manling."

name: Calliope
text: Order: Once per turn: Target character within one rank has -3 AC and inflicts an additional wound on spent characters with melee strikes until end of turn.
errata: May use her ability on both friendly and unfriendly targets.

setInfos.flavorText: Melodic sound flowed through the trees. One by one the knights fell still.

name: Liam Rowan
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike with a bonus to the roll equal to the number of charges on Liam.
React: After a character enters play from the discard pile: Put a charge token on Liam.

name: Corinth's Refuse
text:
Whenever you would draw a card from the top of your deck, you may instead return Corinth's Refuse from your discard pile to your hand.
React: Before Corinth's Refuse dies: Target character suffers -2 Skill until end of turn.

name: Amon Dythanus
text:
While Amon has 6 or greater skill, he has +1 level.
Spend React: Before a character of equal or lower level performs a melee or ranged strike, kill Amon: The strike is a Critical Failure.

name: Kaelin
text: React: Once per turn, After an Elf in your army hits with a ranged strike: The strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "The well held Osud's power. I think would make a fine tomb for Ichaerus' soul." - Ilvion

name: Beia Tansiq
text:
Beia has +3 ATK when performing melee strikes against evil characters.
React: After targeting a good character with a melee strike, inflict one wound on Beia: The strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "Heroes sacrifice themselves, and where's the fun in that?"

name: Visant Glyn
text: React: Once per turn, before an Elf performs a ranged strike: The strike has +2 to the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's no mean trick, making the arrow lust for blood, but it helps to give it just the slightest taste first..."

name: Crimson Rigel
text:
React: After a character dies: Put a charge token on Crimson Rigel.
Spend Order: Remove 4 charge tokes from Crimson Rigel: Your next die roll is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "Died in vain? Nonsense. Let me show you..."

name: Finola Calix
text: React: After an action in which Finola killed a character: Finola gains +2 levels until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Killing Ichaerus is a simple task, but like any good elf lord, he does not stay dead."

name: Keres
text: React: After a character rolls a Critical Success or Failure: Shuffle a character from any discard pile into its owner's deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "You saw a ghoul. Just a ghoul." - Krait

name: Leigh
text: React: Before Leigh dies: Target a character within one rank who must succeed with a Magic save (DC 16) or move backwards one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Why call Kun Vian, the 'Lady of Mercy'?" Leigh grinned. "That's what her enemies shout when they see her coming."

name: Saran
text:
Saran has +1 ATK for each wizard spell in your discard pile.
Order: Once per turn: If Saran cast a spell this turn, perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "If you will not fall to my magic, you will fall to my blade."

name: Llyr Militia
text: Spend React: Before Llyr Militia dies, shuffle him into your deck: Search your deck for a level 1 non-Llyr Militia Free Kingdoms, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "This is what happens when we put our faith in Toris Kelt fops. 'Free King'? Might as well hunt the Quest Beast."

name: Rosalie
text: Order: Once per turn, target a Free Kingdoms in your army of equal or lower level: The target has an additional melee strike when he attacks, until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The tide turns, still no Free King. The alliance can wait no longer."

name: Jada Latham
text:
Jada does not spend or stun when she falls forward.
React: After Jada falls forward, she gains +3 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "What, Spencer, you think you'll be any less dead than the bluebloods?"

name: Glenn the Blaze
text:
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
React: Once per turn, after Glenn performs a ranged strike that wounded its target: Perform a +0 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Quickly, an it pleaseth thee, milord Terak."

name: Brother Averill
text: React: Before a Free Kingdoms in your army performs an Attack: His next two melee strikes this turn are Critical Failures. His next strike after those this turn is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: Some men are heroes for their valor. Others, because they always buy a round.

name: Gunnar Yscar
text: While Gunnar has 1 or more wounds, he has +5 ATK, +5 AC, an additional strike (Base +0) and adjacent Free Kingdoms have +2 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "It takes effort to look this good. Don't distract me."

name: Caedmon Yscar
Sir James Reed
text:
Melee and ranged strikes targeting, and targeted by, Sir James are Critical Failures on a natural roll of 10 or less.
Sir James' melee strikes that hit are considered a Critical Success.

name: Peyton Latham
text:
Peyton has a bonus to his ATK equal to his Powerattack, and a bonus to his ranged strikes equal to his Marksmanship.
Order: Once per turn, Perform a +0 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away.

name: Kinnell
text:
Kinnell inflicts an additional wound with ranged strikes against lower Level characters.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
errata: The comparison of levels is checked at the time wounds are being inflicted.

setInfos.flavorText: "It was my brother, if you must know."
"It was my brother, if you must know."
"Allow me to introduce my friend Yorick."

name: Headsman Brock
text: Spend Order: Perform a number of +0 ranged or melee strikes equal to half Brock's skill, rounded down. These strikes may not gain bonuses to the die roll.

name: Kass-Kel
text: React: Once per turn, before a die roll: The die roll has a penalty equal to Kass-Kel's skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Master Simon! The brine fiends have found something!"

name: Spot
text: Spot's melee strikes ignore AC bonuses.

setInfos.flavorText: "...where'd you get that bone, boy?!" - Bradley

name: Deidra Price
text: React: Once per turn, after a character rolls a Critical Success or Failure: The roll is no longer considered a Critical Success or Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not really sure which is which, and I found them! Keep on your toes, Varson, and try not to stare."

name: Argus Gawk
text: Spend Order: Choose an opponent: That player reveals a card from his hand, Argus Hawk performs a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the level of the revealed card.

setInfos.flavorText: "You took my eyes, demon! I return favor!"

name: Light
text: Spend Order: Target an opposing Warlord: The next die roll the target's controller makes this turn is a Critical Success. Your next die roll is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "The prophecy lives on."

name: Shadow
text: Spend Order: Target an opposing Warlord: The next die roll the target's controller makes this turn is a Critical Failure. Your next die roll is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your father is dead, Varson."

name: Ghed Parcifal
text: React: Once per turn, after a melee strike targets an adjacent character: The target gains an AC bonus equal to Ghed Parcifal's skill for the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Where is Lothian? Where?!" - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Baeddan
text: React: Once per turn, after a target character rolls a Critical Failure: Stun the target.

setInfos.flavorText: The abyssals scrambled to the surface, only to find their loyal cultists waiting...

name: Kester
text: Spend Order: Remove target character in your discard pile from the game, discard a character from your hand: Search your deck for a character with the same name as the target, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
errata:
Only the removed character is targeted.
As this is a search effect, shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: Celestine
text: Order: Once per turn: Gain the Seer, Druid or Cantor trait, permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "The gods grant many gifts. Ask for them wisely, or not al all."

name: Brack Fiend
text:
May not equip items.
React: After an opposing character rolls a Critical Failure: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: The creature took another piece of demon flesh and chewed it, glaring at Simon balefully.

name: Nestor Price
text:
When Nestor comes into play choose either cleric or wizard. Nestor gains the chosen class.
React: After Nestor casts a spell: Nestor's next die roll this turn is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "Got some friends you should meet, Varson. Won't take long..."

name: Simon Abraxas
text: Order: Once per turn: All players discard their hands and then draw that many cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "You demons thought us your lackeys, but now we know another way to harvest your power."

name: Mudan
text:
Mudan has +4 ATK while targeting spent characters with melee strikes.
Mudan's melee and ranged strikes are a Critical Success on a die roll of 16 or greater.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't see what the fuss is. They gotta speak to cast, right?"

name: Urnack
text: Spend React: After a Nothrog enters this rank: That Nothrog performs an attack (spending as normal).

setInfos.flavorText: Krun nodded to Urnak, and both charged into the alley.

name: Albino Novice
text: React: Before Albino Novice dies: Your next melee or ranged strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "They're so fragile. It's a wonder any of them survive long enough to get our attention." - Mudan
"If it's warfare they want, they shall find the Nothrog ready and willing to school them in its intricacies. Then we kill and eat 'em, right?"
"You and me, we're gonna play us a game. I'll ask a question, and every time I don't like the answer, I take a finger. Ready? Good. Where's Taoth?"

name: Kish
text:
Kish's ranged strikes are a Critical Success on a die roll of 16 or greater.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 Ranged strike. If this strike is a Critical Success, Kish may move forward one rank.

name: Tarya
text: Order: Once per turn, choose an opposing player. Perform a +6 ranged strike or gain +1 level permanently, the chosen player decides.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mmm, yessss... Hyena delights in your fear..."

name: Blessing of Swiftness
text: Order: Target character has an additional melee strike (base = target's primary ATK) when he attacks, until end of turn.
errata: May target teammates' or opposing characters.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ah, the feeling when you tear through flesh and bone of your enemies. And again. And again!" - Naram-Sin
"Not that even a zombie needs such a blessing to catch a dwarf, but still..." - Sileth Elestra
"Not so fast Yscar." - Cayden

name: Serket
text: Spend Order: Kill Serket: Put a Monster or Undead of Level 5 or lower into play from your hand in Serket's former location.
errata: He is spent when he is killed. If you Consume from Within him, he returns to play spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "I will be your ruin."
"One life to give is not enough."

name: Omil
text: Spend Order: Choose an opposing player: That player's next melee or ranged strike is a Critical Failure, or your next melee or ranged strike is a Critical Success, the chosen player decides.

setInfos.flavorText: "Scarab was her, Norn. We're close."

name: Garak Mirhault
text: After Initiative each turn choose an opposing player. You each reveal a card from hand simultaneously. If the other player's card is higher level he gains control of Garak.

setInfos.flavorText: "We keep him in chains until it's time to summon him, and never leave him out long. If Fasolt's this dangerous, we should just run." - Hechun

name: Ganek
text:
May not maneuver.
React: After an opposing player rolls a Critical Failure: Ganek's ranged strikes may target an additional rank away until end of turn.
Spend Order: Perform two +4 ranged strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Sulak, something's brewing in the east. Something big."

name: Verusk
text: React: Once per turn, after Verusk performs a melee strike that hit or a Nothrog performs a melee strike that was a Critical Success: Perform a +8 melee strike that inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Make war on The Chosen? I can work with those orders."
"Hmph! Wastin' time in Phrygai. When're we gonna get back ta fightin'?"

name: ArLorr
text: Spend Order: Target two Nothrogs in your army of different level and choose an opponent. That opponent chooses one of those two Nothrogs. The chosen Nothrog is stunned, the other is moved to your first rank.

name: ImSana
text: Spend Order: Kill one of your Nothrog within two ranks, and target a character: Move to the Nothrog's position, and the target is considered two additional characters for determining illegal ranks until end of turn.

name: Sulack Bloodgullet
text:
All Warlords have the ability "React: After you roll Initiative: Discard any number of cards."
Spend Order: Choose an opposing player: Perform a number of melee strikes equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "We have our orders. Hold Phrygai."

name: Bribe
text: Order: Put a character into play from your hand, ignoring loyalty penalties. If your Warlord is a Mercenary, you may reduce the target's entering rank by one, and it may create an illegal rank if there is already at least one character in the entering rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Welcome to the winning side, 'hero'." - Talespinner

name: Invoke Doom
text:
Deverenian Warlords play this action without spending.
Spend React: After a player rolls a die that was not preset. That player's next die roll is considered to be the same as this one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Terak has gone to face Rhawn a final time. May our fates be kinder." - Sir Lucian

name: Rally to the Cause
text:
Free Kingdoms play this as a level 1 action.
React: Before a character performs an attack: Each strike from the attack must target this character, if possible, and this character gains +4 AC and +2 Hit Points for the duration of the attack.

name: Donatien
text: Order: Once per turn: The next time Donatien casts a spell this turn, if the spell kills an opposing character, Donatien permanently gains +2 Level and +4 Skill.
errata: The effect only cares when the spell was cast (the next one this turn) and not when it actually killed someone. For example, if Donatien cast Contagion as his next spell, and that contagion kills a character on the following turn, he immediately gains +2 levels and +4 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Both life and death serve us."

name: Aid
text:
Dwarves do not spend to perform this action.
Spend Order: Remove a wound from a target character. If this character is Free Kingdoms, the target gets +3 ATK and +3 AC until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "The dragons have fled the skies, but cast long shadows. Give the people hope."

name: Tempt the Wind
text: Spend Order: Target a character within three ranks, and an item equipped to that character. The character must either discard the item, or succeed with a Magic save (DC 12 + caster's skill) or become stunned. Skill bonuses from the target's items are ignored for the save.

name: Beg Forgiveness
text: React: After a target character rolls a Critical Failure: Stun the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Tremayne half-breed escaped thee into the Storm?" Creigh smiled kindly. "Then follow him."

name: Cast Asunder
text: Spend Order: Spend X characters in your army, and target an opposing Warlord: The target's controller must then spend X characters in his army.

setInfos.flavorText: "Kneel, Navdai. Your queen is here." - Slovien

name: Awake to Nature
text: Spend Order: Stun all items in play. If this character is a Druid, items do not unstun during the next ready phase.

setInfos.flavorText: "I have sought your counsel for so long, Miracus. Just grant me a moment of your time." - Leun Moonstone

name: Blind the Gods
text: React: After you roll Initiative: All players place the cards in their hands on top of their decks in any order. Until the end of the turn, Warlords have the ability "Order: Once per turn: All players draw 3 cards."

setInfos.flavorText: "On days such as this, my champion, mortals form their own destinies." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Fulfill Destiny
text: React: Before a character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds to zero. Choose an opposing player who draws a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "We abandoned Duncan, Kor, but he never abandoned us. He was a true hero." - Atone

name: Prolong the Fight
text:
Dwarves do not spend to perform this action.
Spend Order: Target a character you control of equal or lower level, choose an opponent who targets a character they control with a level equal or lower than your character: Ready both targets.

name: Command Horror
text: Spend Order: Target all characters in an opposing first rank. Each target has -5 ATK and -5 AC. If this character is not a Deverenian, each target may perform a Magic save (DC 17) to suffer -3 ATK and -3 AC instead.

setInfos.flavorText: "Stand aside, beggars. I must have words with our Emperor." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Seize Life
text: Spend Order: Before a character suffers wounds, target a number of characters up to this cleric's level: Reduce the wounds by one and each target has +1 hit point until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our people are divided at our very core, our past as uncertain as our future. For all things, a price..." - The Stone Spider

name: Aquiela
text: Order: Once per turn, put a card from your hand into play in this rank face down, as a Unique Level 3 fighter named Lorand with +3/+1 ATK, 8 AC, +4 Skill, 2 HP, and the Ethereal trait.
errata:
Cards such as Consume from within, or No Rest cannot revive a killed Lorand. However, cards like Forgotten can return whatever card he is made from to its owner's hand.
The ability to put him into play cannot be used if a Lorand is already in play under your control.

setInfos.flavorText: Old flame, return to me.

name: Sucker Punch
text: React: Before this character performs a melee strike: After the strike, if the strike hits, spend the target if this character is a Deverenian; inflict a wound on the target if this character is a Nothrog, perform a +2 melee strike if this character is Free Kingdoms.

name: Decapitate
text: React: After this fighter rolls a Critical Success: Ready this fighter.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do thy worst, thou disgusting, maggoty, cowa-"

name: Lock in Death
text: React: Before this character dies: Perform a melee strike. After the strike, if the strike hit and this character is a Nothrog, return this card to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Good timing. I only needed one more anyway." - Kang'Xi

name: Murder Fate
text: React: After this character performs a melee strike that hit the target: Inflict a wound on the target. Choose an opposing player who draws a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "The spirits take hold. Accept their blessings." - Hrunting

name: Contest Thy Title
text: Spend Order: Choose an opposing player who targets a character he controls. This character and the opposing character both roll a die and add their ATK to the roll (Deverenians add +5). The character that wins permanently gains +3 ATK, +3 AC, +1 hit point, and is readied.
errata: Erratum 2007/10/08: The Spend Order should read "Spend Order: Chose an opposing player who targets a character he controls. This character and the opposing character both roll a die and add their ATK to the roll (Deverenians add +5). The character that wins permanently gains +3 ATK, +3 AC, +1 HP and is readied. Remove this card from the game."

name: Cry Havoc
text: Spend Order: Target all opposing characters within one rank: Perform a melee strike against each target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Time to do my father proud. Kill them all." - King Alaric
"Time to do my father proud. Kill them all." - King Alaric
"Our barbarians demand their leaders earn their titles," Ar'tek grinned, "and dethrone the unworthy."

name: Rise to Power
text: React: Before this character performs a melee strike: Until end of turn, after this fighter performs a melee strike that hit, the target of the strike must succeed with a fear save (DC 12 + this fighter's Skill) or move back a rank and spend.

setInfos.flavorText: "You thought us few, Rowan? We are legion!" - Jorn of the Summit

name: Stab
text: Order: Perform a melee strike that may only target a stunned character (spent character, if this character is an Elf), and inflict an additional wound if it hits. If this character is a Mercenary, the strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "If you quit squirming, it'll hurt less."

name: Strain the Shot
text: React: Before this character performs a ranged strike: The strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits. This character suffers a wound after the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't be afraid to pull the string 'til it hurts. If they survive, odds are you won't." - Kapix

name: Put Down
text: React: After a character within one rank rolls a Critical Failure: Perform a +3 ranged strike targeting that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Given how your queen treats failures, consider this a favor." - Farrel Wadreth

name: Colter Arden
text:
Colder may not start in play, is a fighter and rogue, and enters play as if he were one Level higher.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike for each lower Level Free Kingdoms in your army.
errata: The number of +0 strikes he makes is set when the action's cost is paid. Characters that enter or leave play will not change that number.

name: Hide in Shadows
text:
React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike: Succeed with a Stealth check (DC 15) to cancel the strike.
Order: Gain Stealth +5 until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's easier to hide if one employs a decoy, and also easier to escape when discovered." - Grilt Fenstalker
"Going somewhere, Hagen?" - Krun

name: Steal Fate
text: React: After an opposing player plays an action card: Cancel the action. Choose an opposing player who draws a number of cards equal to the action's level.

setInfos.flavorText: "No cheating, Keziah." - Dusan Drake

name: Dupe
text: React: After this character is targeted by a melee strike, move to a different position in this rank: The strike is a Critical Failure and the acting character must succeed with a Dexterity save (DC 8 + this character's skill) or be unable to perform additional melee strikes this turn.

name: Move as One
text: React: Before another character in this army performs an Order: Until the end of turn, this rogue gains the ability "React: After another character in your army performs an Order: This character performs an Order."
errata: Erratum 2006/04/14: The ability granted by Move as One should read "React: After another character in your army performs an Order: This character performs an Order."

setInfos.flavorText: "I got a better offer, 'my lord.' So sorry." - Caibre Netheryn

name: Deny
text: React: After this character is targeted by an action card: The acting character must succeed with a Magic save (DC 15, two Magic saves if this character is a Deverenian) or the action is cancelled and placed on top of its owner's deck.

setInfos.flavorText: "...of course, the alliance with the Dwarves lasts only so long as the Dwarves remain below." - Lady Gracia Ghenis

name: Suffer
text: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks who must succeed with a Magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound. If the target fails and has an item equipped, return Suffer to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: Impossibly, the fallen wizard stood again, leveling his blood gaze at Cador. "Suffer."

name: Awaken Curse
text: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks, who may discard any number of items: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 10 + highest level equipped item) or suffer two wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: "All Ablung's weapons are cursed, Sir Lucian. Avenger has chosen you, and you cannot escape it." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Ride the Lightning
text: React: After a character in your army rolls a Critical Success: Move a character in your army forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "All things are possible in the Storm, an thou knowest the way." - Kassia the Saint

name: Betray Fate
text: React: After a target character enters play: Inflict a wound on the target. Choose an opposing player who draws a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "The three moons' alignment doth blind gods and fates alike, your majesty. You mayest act without fear of Signon's prophecies." - Kassia the Saint

name: Claim the Soul
text: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks who must succeed a Magic save (DC 5 + caster's skill, +5 for Elves) or permanently lose one hit point. If this kills the target, remove it from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "How pathetic-a dwarf in the seat of Ichaerus' power." - Tepheroth

name: Kenrick
text:
If Kenrick is discarded from your hand, remove him from the game.
While one or more Kenricks are in your discard pile, Free Kingdoms in your army have +1 Level and opposing Warlords have the ability "Spend Order: Remove Kenrick from the game."
errata:
He doesn't modify how characters enter play.
The ability granted to the opposing warlord will only remove ONE Kenrick, even if several are in the discard pile.

name: Turn Flesh to Bone
text: Spend Order: Place this card in your first rank as a level 1 Undead Skeleton with +3 ATK, 10 AC, +0 Skill, 1 hit point, and the ability "React: Before this character dies: Return an Elf card from your discard pile to your hand."

setInfos.flavorText: "Ichaerus desired a place in our kingdom, and so he shall have it." - Tepheroth

name: Boil Blood
text:
Characters of level 6 or higher do not spend to perform this action.
Spend Order: Target character within 2 ranks must succeed with three consecutive Magic saves (DC 5 + caster's skill) or suffer a wound for each failed save.

name: Corrupt Chance
text: Order: Until end of turn, whenever this character forces another character to make a Magic save, they roll two dice instead of one. You get to choose which die is kept. This character may perform another Order after this one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come Elaneor. Let me purge thy Order of thy shameful blood..." - Adonis the Cozener

name: Dythanus Mantle
text:
Cleric and wizard only.
Order: Spend the Dythanus Mantle, and remove a character in your hand from the game: Put a target character of equal or lower level then the removed character into play from your discard pile. If that character is an Elf, he may perform an Order after this one.

name: Aspare
text:
+4 Skill
Mercenary only.
Spend Order: Once per turn, target a number of lower level Mercenaries up to the number of wounds on this character: Ready the targets.

setInfos.flavorText: "A drowned warrior woman of the past will be your guide." - Light

name: Black Shuck
text:
+2 Skill
Elf only.
React: After this Elf targets a melee or ranged strike, cancel the strike and discard a card: Succeed with a skill check (DC = target's AC) to inflict a wound on the target.

name: Cartwright Agent
text:
Free Kingdoms only.
This character has an additional melee strike (Base +0) when attacking. Other Free Kingdoms in this rank have +2 ATK, AC and skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ssh. Don't look up, and don't react. It's a trap."

name: Kyne
text:
Dwarf only.
Spend Order: Each of your Dwarves has a bonus to AC equal to his Hit Points until the end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Wouldn't be so bad, if he didn't whistle the whole time." - Grim

name: Tempest Corona
text:
Deverenian only.
React: After one of your Deverenians dies: Put 1 charge token on Tempest Corona.
React: After one of your Deverenians is targeted by a melee strike or action, remove 2 charge token: Redirect the strike or action to an adjacent character.

name: Toadwort
text:
Nothrog only.
React: After this character performs a melee strike that killed a character, spend Toadwort: Perform a melee strike using the same die roll against an adjacent character, who gains a bonus to AC equal to the first target's AC for the strike.

name: Novice Minown
text:
React: Once per turn, after Minown casts a spell that targeted one of your equal or higher Level Free Kingdoms: Minown permanently gains +1 Level and +1 HP.
Order: Once per turn: Target character has +3 ATK and +1 HP until end of turn. Minown has -1 Level permanently.
errata:
The target can be himself.
Effects that change the wounds on a character target that character, however preventing wounds from being inflicted does not.
Compare levels after the spell has been cast (e.g. Strengthen).
He can use his ATK pump ability even if it will kill him.

name: Corinth Ward
text: Spend React: Before a character suffers wounds from a character with lower skill than this cleric: Reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "We found these hanging in the trees around Corinth." - Warren Brood

name: Zephyr Armor
text:
+1 HP
If this character has +10 or greater skill, Zephyr Armor loses the Armor trait.

name: Cyldragen's Token
text:
May only be equipped to characters with 20 or greater AC.
Spend Order: Discard Cyldragen's Token, and choose a player: That player must stun a number of unstunned characters he controls with combined level equal to or greater than this character's level.

name: Divine Will
text: React: After a player passes, spend Divine Will: That player must reveal his hand. If this character is a Seer, discard one of the revealed cards.

setInfos.flavorText: "We are Deverenia. Boundless, friendless, merciless. Kneel to us and live, or die where you stand." - The Eternal Emperor

name: Mercy's Crown
text: This character and your Free Kingdoms characters ignore Critical Failures.

setInfos.flavorText: "Keep calling it that. Maybe she'll smile." - Brother Averill

name: Fineltour's Brooch
text:
Dwarves, Free Kingdoms, and Mercanaries with Fineltour's Brooch equipped have +3 skill.
React: After one of your characters rolls a save, spend Fineltour's Brooch: Add +5 to the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's a gift. No strings attached." - Tavis Jape

name: The Storm
text:
At the beginning of each turn, put a charge token on The Storm.
Spend Order: Discard The Storm, this character suffers a wound: Kill all non-Warlord characters in play with level equal to half the number of charge tokens on The Storm (rounded down).

name: Volda's Mantle
text:
Order: Spend Volda's Mantle: Target character must succeed with a Magic save (DC 10 + this cleric's skill) or be stunned.
Order: Suffer a wound: Return Volda's Mantle to your hand from play.
errata: Erratum 2006/10/20: The first Order should read "Order: Spend Volda's Mantle: Target character within three ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + this cleric's skill) or be stunned."

setInfos.flavorText: "I'll rest. Someday."

name: Sandals of Fortune
text: React: After an opposing character rolls a natural 19 or Critical Success in a melee strike or ranged strike targeting this character, discard the Sandals of Fortune: The strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "But Mingan, they bring out your eyes so." - Tavis Jape

name: Hero's Blade
text: React: Once per game, after this character rolls a Critical Success: Rusted Blade permanently gains +6 ATK and the text "This character's melee strikes are a Critical Success on a 15 or greater."

setInfos.flavorText: "The moons have undone fate. It is no curse to choose our own destinies, friends." - Kun Vian

name: Edwann Ruthard
text: Spend React: After you put a character into play: Move target character with the same Level as the character that entered play backward one rank.
errata:
The levels must be exactly the same.
Compare levels after the character enters play (It may be affected by Lilika Zane or Kenrick).

setInfos.flavorText: "Nations rise and fall but the earth is forever."

name: Noble Steed
text:
Deverenians with Noble Steed equipped have Riding +4.
Free Kingdoms with Noble Steed equipped have Riposte +4.
Order: Spend Noble Steed: Move forward one rank. Opposing characters may not React to or during this action.

name: Light Hammer
text: If this character has 3 or greater Hit Points, Light Hammer loses the Weapon trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "I crawled to the surface to share the tale. The destiny of our race and the true name of our land: Worldfall." - Duncan Kinslayer

name: Massive Boulder
text:
Massive Boulder may only be equipped by a character with 15 or greater ATK.
Spend Order: Choose an opposing player and discard Massive Boulder: That player inflicts one wound each on two different characters in his army.

setInfos.flavorText: "Move those rocks. We're not dead yet." - Uthanak

name: Rellion's Scepter
text:
This character may use the Defend feat an additional time per turn.
