React: Once per turn, after a melee strike is redirected to this character: Perform a +0 melee strike (+5 for Deverenians) against the attacking character.

name: Uther's Shroud
text:
This character is a Barbarian. Nothrog with Uther's Shroud equipped may use the Powerattack feat an additional time each turn.
React: Before making a Powerattack check, wound this character: The check is a Critical Success.

name: Token of Favor
text:
Deverenians, Dwarves and Nothrogs with Token of Favor equipped have +3 ATK.
React: After this fighter makes a melee strike roll, spend Token of Favor: Add +5 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "What game doth Dashkova play now?" - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Blacksnake Whip
text:
If this character is a Nothrog, Blacksnake Whip loses the Weapon trait.
All characters in your army have the ability "Order: Spend an equipped Steed: Perform a +0 melee strike." Deverenians get a bonus to the strike equal to the level of the spent Steed.

name: Alholland Bramble
text:
Order: Discard a card and spend Alholland Bramble: Target each character in an adjacent rank. Each target must succeed with a Dexterity save (DC 10 + this fighter's ATK) or suffer a wound.
Order: Discard two cards: Return Alholland Bramble to your hand from play.
errata: Erratum 2007/10/08: The Order should read "Order: Discard a card and spend Alholland Bramble: Target each character in an adjacent rank. Each target must succeed with a Dexterity save (DC = this fighter's ATK) or suffer a wound."

name: Lucky Boots
text: React: After this character rolls a Critical Failure on a melee or ranged strike, discard Lucky Boots: The strike is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bad Spot! Bad! I spent a copper on those!"

name: Destiny's Hand
text: React: Once per game, after an opponent rolls a Critical Failure: Destiny's Hand permanently gains +3 ATK, +3 AC, and Riposte +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "Today, we are not peasants. We are heroes." - Kun Vian

name: Tavon
text:
React: Before your Warlord dies: Tavon permanently gains +1 Level, Medicine +3, and the Warlord trait.
Order: Once per target per turn, Inflict a wound on your Warlord: Move target equal or lower Level character forward of backward one rank.
errata:
When Tavon becomes the Warlord, he can wound himself to use his movement ability.
He cannot target the same character twice with the movement ability during a given turn, but can otherwise perform it any number of times per turn.
If you have more than one Warlord in play, you may choose which to inflict the wound upon.

name: Offhand Dagger
text: React: After target character within one rank rolls a Critical Failure, spend Offhand Dagger: Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "A claw for each hand, just as with the beasts of nature." - Kiras Yscar
"Allow me to retort, Tom." - Trevaine Cartwright

name: Shield of Waves
text: If this rogue has +8 or greater ATK, Shield of Waves loses the Shield trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "ShiLara sold it for seventy-six silvers by Celinar's stormy shores." - Jarga Reach

name: Blacksand Trap
text: React: After target character targets a character in this rank with a melee strike, spend and stun Blacksand Trap: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 15, DC 20 if this character is a Dwarf) or suffer a wound and become stunned.

name: Fineltour's Reeds
text:
May only be equipped by a character with 20 or greater AC and 10 or greater ATK.
Spend Order: Choose another player and discard Fineltour's Reeds: The chosen player discards two cards. If they cannot, you draw two cards instead.

name: Roc Fletching
text:
Free Kingdoms, Elves, and Mercenaries with Roc Fletching equipped add +2 to their ranged strike rolls.
React: After this rogue makes a ranged strike roll, spend Roc Fletching: Add +3 to the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: The elf ducked, but Hawthorne's arrow followed anyway.

name: Darkhart's Tears
text:
Nothrogs may equip Darkhart's Tears regardless of class.
React: Before performing a melee strike, spend Darkhart's Tears: After the strike, if the strike hit, the target must succeed with a poison save (DC 15, 19 if this character is an Assassin) or all numerals on the target are reduced by one permanently.

name: Wild Mammoth
text:
Order: Twice per turn: Move forward or backwards one rank.
Spend Order: Return Wild Mammoth to your hand from play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Shh. They don't like riders, so don't let on that we're here." - Ricart Darpor

name: Frostbite Wand
text: Spend React: After another of your characters in this rank inflicts wounds on a target character with lower skill than this character with an action (not a melee strike): Inflict a wound on the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "This isn't over." - Ichaerus

name: Gawk's Trinket
text: Order: Discard Gawk's Trinket: The next level 1 spell this character casts this turn does not require spending as cost.

setInfos.flavorText: "I don't care if I can't use it. They were mine to start with!"

name: Hat of Fire
text:
+3 Skill
If this character has 16 or greater AC, Hat of Fire loses the Helm trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "...well, I suppose not all of the Kabal's trinkets can be practical." - Syvonne Ashenstorm

name: Samuel
text: Order: Twice per turn, target another Free Kingdoms within one rank: The target has a bonus to ATK and AC equal to Samuel's Level until end of turn.
errata:
The bonus is set when the action's cost is paid.
May target other people's Free Kingdoms as long as they are within one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "An entire order gone. I must know the truth."

name: Kaballite Charm
text: React: Once per turn, after a target lower level character falls forward: Move the target backwards one ranks. Mercenaries have +1 level for performing this action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Enough nonsense. I will speak to your queen." - Zartoch

name: Keziah's Orb
text:
Keziah's Orb may only be equipped to a character with 15 or greater skill.
Order: Discard Keziah's Orb and choose another player: That player must discard two items they control in play.

setInfos.flavorText: "Thank you, Sali," Keziah whispered. "We know what to do now."

name: Fortune Lost
text:
Deverenians, Elves, and Nothrog with Fortune Lost equipped have +3 skill.
React: After an opposing character rolls a save, spend Fortune Lost: Subtract 3 from the roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Alas, Elaneor. All are so harsh to thee?" - Adonis the Cozener

name: Skyborne Tome
text: Order: Once per turn, if this wizard has a +5 or greater bonus to their printed skill: The next spell this character casts does not require spending as a cost. If this character is a Deverenian, he may perform another Order after this one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Flamma cum me ambulant..." - Kassia the Saint

name: Nature's Cowl
text:
+2 Skill
Order:Spend Nature's Cowl and target an opposing character within 3 ranks: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 18) or permanently lose 2 skill and this character permanently gains +2 skill.
Order: Discard a card: Return Nature's Cowl to your hand from play.

name: Barton of Llyr
text: React: Once per turn, after a target character misses with or is missed by a melee strike: The target adds +3 to all rolls until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "His sight is fine, but why should he need to use it?" - Trevaine Cartwright

name: Betren
text: React: Once per turn, after a Nothrog within one rank suffers a wound, discard a card from your hand: Search your deck for a level 1 Nothrog and add it to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Rhino's fury drives it... and us."

name: Brikta
text:
May use the Powerattack feat any number of times per turn.
For each wound on Brikta she has +3 ATK, and an additional melee strike with a base of +3 ATK.

name: Bryanne
text:
Bryanne has the same alignment as your Warlord.
If Bryanne is evil, she is a fighter, has +5 ATK and inflicts an additional wound when she hits with a melee strike.
If Bryanne is good, she is a cleric, has +5 skill, and Medicine +4 and Defend +4.

name: Charlotte d'Ilchant
text:
Your Deverenians are +1 level for equipping Steeds.
Order: Once per turn, target a Deverenian fighter in this rank: The fighter permanently gains the Paladin trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "No better man could serve the Ghed Mnettaor than Sir Rhawn's cousin."

name: Jeffrey
text: Jeffrey has +2 ATK, AC, and Skill for each Level he has.
errata: He gets a bonus for having his initial 1 level.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bradley? Never met him."

name: Cuirass
text:
React: Once per turn, after Cuirass suffers a wound, discard an equipped item: Reduce the wounds suffered to 0.
React: Once per turn, after Cuirass equips an item: Cuirass performs an Order.

name: Durin Kortouched
text:
Your Dwarves may equip and use items while stunned, and may equip fighter Weapons regardless of class.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a Weapon, and equip it to one of your Dwarves.

name: Kadin
text: Order: Once per turn, move a Steed in play to its controller's hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Isadran? He seems Deverenian to me." - Sir Aleron D'Ilchant

name: Keira Syneri
text: Order: Once per turn, target an opposing non-Warlord character within two ranks. The target must succeed with a will check (DC 15), or until the end of the turn the target has Stealth +0, may not equip items, and is under your control.

name: Kenyon
text: React: Once per turn, before a target character you control performs a melee strike: The character may use action cards during the strike as if he were a level 4 rogue Assassin.

name: Leane Calix
text: Spend React: Before one of your Elves performs an action: Increase all DCs from that action by 3.

setInfos.flavorText: "Had she grace as well as power, she'd succeed us well." - High Queen Tepheroth

name: Mentor
text: Spend React: After target Dwarf equips an item: Ready the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "The army that is better equipped will always carry the day, Alaric. Take up your father's weapon; it is your destiny."
"It is easy-all too easy-to die in Kor's name. Live for him, and live forever."

name: Mingan
text:
Mingan has the same alignment as your Warlord.
React: After Mingan hits a character of the opposite alignment with a melee strike: Spend the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Tavis I trust; his god's the one I'm unsure of."

name: Nezdra
text:
Reduce Nezdra's rank when entering play by 1 (to a minimum of 1) for each wound on your Warlord.
React: Once per turn, after your Warlord suffers one or more wounds: Ready Nezdra.

name: Sir Aleron d'Ilchant
text:
Your Paladins have Riding +5.
Your Stormwraiths have Riposte +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "Let our ranks swell as the Black Sun dawns that it shall never set."

name: Rejuvenate
text: Spend Order: Target any number of characters. Remove a total number of wounds from those characters equal to or less than this character's Level.
errata: You may target a character with this and not remove a wound from it. You may leave wounds on a character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Life is hard, we must go on. That is what we do." - Denali Sagebound

name: Constable Juris
text:
Constable Juris has a penalty to ATK and AC equal to your Warlord's Level.
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on your Warlord: Perform a melee strike.
errata: If you have more than one Warlord in play, you may choose which to inflict the wound upon, however you subtract ALL your Warlords' levels from Constable Juris' stats. The difference is between static text that is always on, and ability text which only tries to find a Warlord.

setInfos.flavorText: "Elves! He barters with the safety of the nations."

name: Tavis Jape
text:
If Tavis is good, your characters gain +3 to all die rolls.
If Tavis is evil, opposing characters suffer -3 to all die rolls.
React: Before one of your characters performs an Order: Permanently change Tavis' alignment.
errata: Erratum 2007/01/01: His React should read "React: After you pass: Permanently change Tavis' alignment."

name: Trevaine Cartwright
text:
Other Free Kingdoms characters in this rank have Riposte +5 and +2 AC.
React: After another character misses with a melee strike, discard a card: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "As faceless as his servants..." - Ursala Yscar

name: Ursala Yscar
text: React: After Ursala performs a melee strike from the Riposte feat that hit: She permanently gains +3 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "Mask or no, Logan remains a hero. We Yscarites are with him."
"...but who knows the flesh beneath the steel?"

name: Piffany
text:
Spend Order: Place a Henchman from your discard pile into your hand.
Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike targeting an Undead character within one rank.

name: Yeager
text: React: Before Yeager suffers one or more wounds, discard an equipped Henchman: Reduce the wounds to zero.

setInfos.flavorText: Next, we can celebrate victory by doubling my bar tab!

name: Artax
text: React: Before Artax casts a spell which inflicts wounds on or kills himself, discard an equipped Henchman: Artax is not killed and does not suffer wounds. If the wounds or death were a cost of the spell, the cost is still considered paid.

name: Baphuma'al
text:
Baphuma'al is a cleric and a wizard.
Baphuma'al enters play as if he were level 9.
Spend React: After an opposing character dies: The character enters play spent in your first rank under your control and permanently gains the Undead trait.

name: Check for Traps
text: React: After this character fails a save, discard an equipped Henchman: The save is a Critical Success.

setInfos.flavorText: He tripped and fell right into it. We swear.

name: Piffany's First Kiss
text:
Piffany has +2 levels for playing this card.
Spend Order: Attach this card to a target character. Remove all wounds from the target. While this card is attached, the character has +1 HP, +1 level, and +3 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: Everything will be made 'all better.' EVERYTHING.

name: Nodwick
text:
If Nodwick is discarded by an opposing action the opponent may discard up to two other items equipped to this character.
Order: Spend Nodwick: Equip an item in your discard pile this character can legally equip.

name: Sir Lucian
text:
After starting armies are revealed, Sir Lucian may swap positions with another of your characters.
React: Once per turn, after a Free Kingdoms in your army kills an equal or higher Level opposing character: That Free Kingdoms permanently gains +1 Level, +3 ATK, +3 AC, +2 Skill, and +1 HP.
errata:
Starting armies are revealed before your first hand is drawn.
Lucian's leveling ability compares the killing Free Kingdoms to the killed opposing character, not Sir Lucian to the opposing character.
He may use his ability on himself.

name: Duct Tape
text: Spend React: Before a character within two ranks is killed by an opposing character, discard the Duct Tape: The character does not die. The character is spent and has a total number of wounds equal to one less wound than his total hit points.

name: War Chest
text: React: Before making a melee strike roll spend the War Chest: Gain +4 ATK until the end of the turn. Succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: Results guaranteed to satisfy someone involved.

name: 13th Edition Spellbook
text:
This character has +2 levels for casting spells.
After casting a spell, this character succeed with a magic save (DC 15 + level of spell) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: Now bundled with crystal ball media player and future event browsing.

name: Acolyte Miroslav
text: Spend React: Before a target Deverenian suffers one or more wounds, inflict a wound on one of your Stormwraiths: Reduce the wounds the target is suffering by one.

name: Sir Kolya Genecourt
text: Sir Kolya has +3 ATK while there are any wizards in this rank, +2 Levels while there are any rogues in this rank and +5 AC while there are any clerics in this rank.

name: Ghed Imogene
text: React: Once per turn, after Ghed Imogene is targeted with an action or melee strike: Perform a magic check (DC 20). If successful, cancel the action or strike. Reduce the DC of the check by 3 for each non-wizard in this rank.

name: Acolyte Dorra
text: React: Once per turn, before character rolls a die: The character rolls two dice. After the roll, you choose which die is kept.

setInfos.flavorText: "Rejoice! The Voice hath heard thy prayers, and favored you with our services!"

name: Alexa Genecourt
text: React: After a strike or action targets an adjacent Stormwraith or non-fighter Deverenian: Succeed with a Defend check (DC 20) to cancel the strike or action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Death afrights the paladin not, cur. Canst thou claim the same?"
"I am a paladin, as my mother was before. Seek thy treasons elsewhere."

name: Apprentice Jarl
text: React: Once per turn, after a Deverenian within one rank hits with a melee strike: The strike's target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or spend and move back one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "A student seeketh truth in passing odd places."

name: Bishop Ionna
text: React: After a Stormwraith targets a melee strike or action, discard a card: The target loses -4 AC until the end of the turn and may not have wounds removed or reduced this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Emperor Hierophant. All that doth matter is the Storm."

name: Aroch Knights
text: Spend Order: Put up to two lower Level Free Kingdoms from your hand into play. Each has +2 ATK and +2 AC until end of turn.
errata: The lower-level check applies to the level of the characters while in your hand. Kenrick or Lilika help him put much higher level characters into play with this ability.

setInfos.flavorText: A man once led them. Now it is a child they follow.

name: Mistress Edrea
text: Non-fighter Deverenians in this rank gain +2 AC and Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "No heathen blade shall lay upon The Storm's appointed prophets. Such is our charge."
"As thou asketh, dearest Ygraine, so must thou offer sacrifice."

name: Bascia Tremayne
text: Once per turn for each class, Bascia may use the Charisma feat on a roll from a character of that class. This does not count as the feat's normal once per turn use.

setInfos.flavorText: "Honor-'tis a gift most unfit for Deverenia's foes."

name: Ghed Solan
text: React: Once per turn, after one of your Deverenians within one rank is targeted by an action: The acting character may cancel the action. If he does not, he must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

name: Solus d'Ilchant
text: React: Before attacking, spend an adjacent Stormwraith: Do not spend for this attack.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dark times indeed, an the Church war upon the Empire, the Storm-heirs upon the Stormborn."

name: Shiri the Stormkissed
text: For each Stormwraith in this rank, Shiri gains +1 level for casting spells and +2 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Verily, Ygraine, all things art possible with the Storm's graces."

name: Ghed Jaroslav
text: React: After an action in which one of your Stormwraiths is wounded: One of your Deverenians performs an Order.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Hierophant hath changed the sacred texts!"

name: Tempestroyal
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target up to 5 characters within one rank. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound and become spent.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Pious
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, opposing characters suffer a penalty of -1 ATK and -1 AC for each other character in that rank with the same class.

name: Coal Gargoyle
text:
While the player to your left has no cards in his hand, Coal Gargoyle has +1 ATK for each cleric in your army.
React: Once per turn, after an opponent passes: If you have not passed this turn, ready Coal Gargoyle.

name: Opal Gargoyle
text:
After the draw phase, return Opal Gargoyle to your hand from play.
React: After an opponent passes, play Opal Gargoyle from your hand: If you have a cleric in play, ready a Dwarf fighter with one printed strike.

name: Lilika Zane
text: Order: Remove Lilika from the game: If Lilika was Level 5 or greater, until end of game, your Free Kingdoms have +1 Level, +1 HP, and Magic Resistance +10 while in your army.
errata:
Can't use her ability unless she is level 5 or greater, as it would do nothing otherwise.
The benefits she gives are not permanent; they are until end of game. A very fine line, but important.
She doesn't affect how characters enter play.

setInfos.flavorText: A voice as beautiful as she.

name: Focus
text: React: Once per turn, after target Dwarf readies during the decree phase: The target performs an attack, spending as normal.

setInfos.flavorText: "Be relentless in your attack and we will see forgiveness."
"Garn has shown me the way. Well, this way."

name: Demented
text: React: After Demented suffers a wound: Target a character within one rank (two if you control a rogue) who must succeed with a will save (DC 13, DC 18 if you control a wizard) or become spent (stunned, if you control a cleric).

name: Reckless
text:
While Reckless is spent, he has +1 AC for each Dwarf rogue in your army.
Spend React: After an opposing player passes: Move forward one rank, if possible, and perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Patience? How long'll that take?"

name: Fetter
text:
May remain spent during the ready phase.
Spend Order: If Fetter is in the first rank, target a stunned character. Until Fetter readies or leaves play, the target does not unstun during the ready phase.

name: Lodestone Gargoyle
text:
For each Dwarf wizard within one rank, Lodestone Gargoyle has +1 Level for equipping items.
React: After Lodestone Gargoyle unstuns: Ready Lodestone Gargoyle.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, my king, your weapon is... Now where did I put it?" - Supply

name: Jet Gargoyle
text: React: Before an opposing character casts a spell or performs a ranged strike, spend a cleric in your army: Put Jet Gargoyle into play adjacent to the acting character. If you don't control a wizard, Jet Gargoyle enters play spent.
errata: Erratum 2006/08/08: Its react should read "React: Before an opposing character casts a spell or performs a ranged strike, spend a cleric in your army: Put Jet Gargoyle into play adjacent to the acting character, even if he is in an opposing formation. If you don't control a wizard, Jet Gargoyle enters play spent."

setInfos.flavorText: "What atrocity is this?" - Sjonegaard

name: Athril Gargoyle
text:
You must have characters of each class to play Athril Gargoyle.
Athril Gargoyle is a cleric, fighter, and rogue, and enters play as though he were level 5.
Order: Once per turn, spend two of your Dwarves: Ready Athril Gargoyle.

name: Balance
text: Order: Once per turn, stun a ready Dwarf in your army: Unstun a target Dwarf.

setInfos.flavorText: "Run. Now. Don't ask why, and don't stop until you see the sun."

name: Alloy Gargoyle
text:
Cannot ready unless adjacent to a cleric.
May not equip items.
While Alloy Gargoyle is spent, it has +2 AC and adjacent Dwarves have +2 ATK. If Alloy Gargoyle is stunned, both bonuses are +4.

name: Etor Chance
text: Your Gargoyles have Defend +7 and the ability, "React: Once per turn, after this Gargoyle is targeted by a melee strike or ranged strike: Succeed with a perception check (DC 16) to ready."

setInfos.flavorText: "Show me where you found this."

name: Taya Cooper
text: While one or more Taya Coopers are in your front rank, your Level 2 Free Kingdoms enter play as though they were one Level lower.
errata: Only checks the character's actual level, not the level they enter play at (Colter Arden still enters play one rank lower).

setInfos.flavorText: "He was a good man and taught me much wisdom. In my heart I know he still lives."

name: Flamefang
text:
May not equip items. After Flamefang enters play, search your deck for an item and place it in your hand.
React: Before one of your Dwarves suffers wounds: Flamefang suffers the wounds instead. Move forward of backward one rank.
errata: Erratum 2006/04/14: His React should read "React: Once per turn, before one of your target Dwarves suffers wounds, inflict that many wounds on Flamefang: Reduce the wounds suffered by the target to zero, move forward or backward one rank."

name: Osis Tansiq
text: Osis is both a wizard and a cleric.

setInfos.flavorText: "Well, Flesh smiles upon me today. What do I owe you for such a fine specimen, Fundisi?"

name: Fel Rowan
text: Fel copies all classes and non-Warlord bold traits of characters adjacent to him.

setInfos.flavorText: "A little dwarf blood spilled, and suddenly I'm in a royal house. Isn't death grand?"

name: Tybast
text: While Tybast is in your discard pile, opposing characters have -2 Skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Free Kingdoms and dwarves lack the power, High Queen, and the nothrogs act blindly. Only the Kabal or the Deverenians could have stoked the dragons' ire."

name: Elwyn Rowan
text:
After Elwyn enters play, choose a class, Elwyn becomes that class permanently.
Order: Spend two characters with different classes in this rank: All opposing characters have -2 skill and -2 AC until the end of the turn.

name: De Mors
text: Order: Kill an Undead in this rank: Target an opposing character within one rank who must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or have his ATK changed to -2 (only 1 strike) until the end of the turn.

name: Kyros Calix
text: Spend React: Before a target Level 3 or lower Undead within one rank dies, kill Kyros: Remove all wounds from the target, who does not die. The target gains the Ethereal trait and loses -5 AC permanently.

name: Carrion Fiend
text: React: Once per turn, before an opposing character within one rank (two ranks if Carrion Fiend is adjacent to rogue) dies: Gain +1 Skill, +1 ATK, and +1 AC permanently. If Carrion Fiend is adjacent to a Necromancer, gain +1 HP permanently.

name: Terlacha
text: Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. If Terlacha is adjacent to a rogue he gains Marksmanship +5 for this action. If Terlacha is adjacent to a wizard, this action can not be cancelled or redirected.

name: Brack Ghast
text: React: After initiative is rolled each non-undead non Necromancer in this rank must succeed with a poison save (DC 16) or be spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "A potent servant best kept downwind." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Oliver Zane
text: Order: Target lower Level non-Oliver Zane Free Kingdoms has +1 Level permanently. Oliver has -1 Level permanently.
errata:
Can give other player's Free Kingdoms levels, as long as they are not Oliver Zane or of equal or higher level.
Losing a level is not a cost of the action, and his new, lower level, doesn't take effect until after the levels are compared.

setInfos.flavorText: "Lilika's a good kid and I promised I would watch out for her."

name: Severed of Bone
text:
Saves from Severed of Bone's actions gain +1 DC for each Necromancer you control.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Target character within three ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or become stunned.

name: The Hungry Dead
text: React: After Hungry Dead wounds a stunned character with a melee strike: Kill the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Slay a dragon, but bring it home to our master." - Absinthe

name: Severed of Spirit
text: Spend Order: Name a class: Until end of turn, your characters in play with the named class have ATK equal to their printed Skill (for each strike). Modifiers to their ATK instead affect their Skill, and vice versa.

setInfos.flavorText: "Experiments gone mad, but grown powerful." - Morghen

name: Rotwing
text:
May not equip items. Rotwing may ignore the spend cost of one spell per turn.
Order: Once per turn, move forward of backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "It lairs in Dythanus' city, pining for a bride long since left it." Phon

name: Brother Dominy
text: While one or more Brother Dominy's are in a rank with a fighter, all characters in this rank have +3 ATK, and +3 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "I save them from Deverenian wounds to send them into dragons' jaws."

name: Jal Forsyth
text: While in a rank with a rogue, Jal has an additional melee strike while attacking (base +0 ATK).

setInfos.flavorText: "I've lost much, but I don't fight for revenge. I fight so my son can rebuilt what I've lost."

name: Kylia Smythe
text: While in a rank with a cleric, Kylia has the ability, "Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, move the target forward one rank. Perform a melee strike (even if the ranged strike misses)."

setInfos.flavorText: "Fineltour provides, Keziah."

name: Warren Brood
text: Spend React: After an opposing character falls forward: Move a Lycanthrope forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dragons, madness, and blood. We could do worse than listen to Valford."

name: Kiras Yscar
text: Spend Order: Target an adjacent Free Kingdoms, remove Kiras from the game: Until end of game, the target has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks.

name: Barrett Yscar
text:
Barrett is both a fighter and a rogue.
Barrett enters play as if he were Level 4.
Order: Once per game: Until end of game, Barett gains +5 ATK and +1 HP, has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks, and his items are considered blank.

name: Pentel Yscar
text:
Order: Discard a card: Pentel has +1 Level until end of turn.
Order: Once per game: If Pentel is Level 5 or greater, he permanently gains +5 AC, +2 HP, +6 Skill, and the ability "Spend Order: Perform three +4 ranged strikes."
errata:
His morph ability can only be used if he's level 5 or greater.
If the action is cancelled, he cannot use it again.

name: Elissa Yscar
text: Order: Once per turn: Until Elissa uses this ability again, either Elissa is a fighter and gains +4 ATK and Riposte +5, or Elissa is a cleric and gains +4 AC, +4 Skill, and Medicine +5.

setInfos.flavorText: "I came here to be at one with nature. Well I got what I wanted. Now I have to live with it."
"Father is gone to war, and Varson gone from his sight. Who leads us now?"

name: Markappal Hag
text: Spend Order: Spend a wizard in your army: Ready a spent Lycanthrope.

name: Reginald Tzin
text: Spend Order: Target one of your non-Warlord characters within 2 ranks and replace him with a Lycanthrope of equal or lower level from your hand, putting the target on top or bottom of your deck. The Lycanthrope keeps wounds, attached cards, and the orientation of the target.

name: Tahmores Yscar
text: React: After Tahmores kills an opposing character: Permanently gain +5 ATK, an extra melee strike (base +0) or +1 Hit Point. Tahmores may only gain each bonus once per game.

setInfos.flavorText: "Bascaron rises, Valford, help me-I feel the madness."

name: Banyon
text:
May not equip items.
While in this rank, fighters gain +4 ATK, rogues gain +4 AC, other clerics gain +1 HP, and Lycanthropes have an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when they attack.

name: Cyldragen
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target all characters in a rank within two ranks. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or be stunned.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Brinespawn
text: At the end of each turn, Brinespawn gains 1 Hit Point permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: "Even the swamp-beasts frolic and play, though not in the shadow of dragons." - Kara Wardeth

name: Abyssal Larvae
text: React: Once per turn, after one of your Abyssals uses an attached action card: Ready Abyssal Larvae.

setInfos.flavorText: "Lies. All Lies." - Antaelus
"Get away from me! GET AWAY FROM ME!" - Madness

name: Dragon's Lair
text:
May not start in play.
May not perform actions other than the following:
React: Before a non-opposing Dragon enters play, kill Dragon's Lair: The entering rank of the Dragon is reduced by one, if possible.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come, Garn. I think this explains much." - Etor Chance

name: Grim Teller
text: After grim Teller is killed, each player may reveal the top 5 cards of their deck. For each card revealed, that player may return that card to the top or bottom of their deck.
errata: The player who won initiative goes first, and takes the five revealed cards and puts any number of them on the top or bottom of his deck.

name: Mad Yscarite
text:
May not equip items.
May not gain charge tokens from other cards.
While there are 3 charge tokens on Mad Yscarite he has +10 ATK, +10 AC, +10 Skill, +3 HP, +5 Levels, and the Dragon trait.
Order: Once per turn, put a charge token on Mad Yscarite.

name: Minor Dragonkin
text:
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, target an item within one rank: Succeed with a magic check (DC 8 + the item's Level) to destroy the item.

setInfos.flavorText: "As Deverenus' blood to us, so the dragons to this." - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Markappal Mire
text: Order: Once per turn, permanently copy the printed ATK, AC, Skill and class of a target character within two ranks. If you control the target, his level must be equal or lower.

setInfos.flavorText: "Not as noteworthy as a host of dragons, but deadly all the same." - Kara Wadreth

name: Awena
text: Spend Order: Choose a card from your hand. Target opponent guesses the card's type (Item, Action, Character). Reveal the card. If your opponent guessed wrong, search your deck for another copy of that card and put it into your hand. Otherwise, remove it from the game.

name: Carm Sengri
text:
Carm ignores class requirements while equipping Familiars.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I will Scour the Yscarite heretics from this land, and then loose my pets upon Mourn itself."

name: Antaelus
text:
Antaelus is the same class(es) as your Warlord.
Order: Once per game: Attach a level one or two non-classless action card from your hand to Antaelus. While attached, Antaelus may perform the action once per turn, as if from your hand.

name: Ssithiss
text:
Ssithiss is both a fighter and a rogue.
Ssithiss enters play as if he were level 5.
React: Once per turn, after Ssithiss is targeted by a melee strike or action: Perform a melee strike targeting the acting character. If his strike hits, cancel the strike or action.

name: Venomhiss
text:
May not equip items.
If your Warlord is a Mercenary, Venomhiss has +1 level for casting spells.
Before rolling initiative, put a charge token on Venomhiss.
Order: Remove a charge token: Move forward or backward up to two ranks.

name: Caitlyn the Free
text: Order: Once per turn, discard any number of cards: Search your deck for a spell with level equal to the number of cards discarded. Caitlyn may immediately cast the spell.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Kabal nor the Guild mayeth proffer peace, Zartoch, e'en as the giantess maketh war 'gainst both."

name: Goldenpeak
text:
May not equip items.
Goldenpeak is both a fighter and a cleric.
Goldenpeak enters play as if he were level 7.
Order: Once per turn, all characters in this rank gain +3 ATK, +3 AC and +3 Skill.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Corrupted Cultist
text: Order: Once per turn, Corrupted Cultist has -1 Level permanently: Corrupted Cultist permanently gains either +4 ATK, +4 AC, +4 Skill, or a class of your choice.

setInfos.flavorText: It followed Teufeltiger once. Now Prodit is its god.

name: Arrax
text: React: Once per turn, after Arrax kills an opposing character with a melee strike: Perform a melee strike that may only target a character who shares a class with the killed character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Without Krun, your men are in chaos, Ar'tek. Perhaps this is a test." - Mekk'iah

name: Wheeled Pikes
text: Spend React: After an opposing character moves within one rank: Perform a melee strike (base +5 ATK) targetting that character.

name: Vaxon
text: Spend React: Before a Nothrog in this rank dies: Spend a character within one rank.

name: Brel
text: React: After a Nothrog Siege character hits with a melee or ranged strike, kill Brel: The melee or ranged strike inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "...of course, it'll take more than this to stop a dragon."

name: Rretrok
text: While adjacent to one or more Nothrog Siege characters, Rretrok and adjacent Siege character(s) have +4 ATK and add +2 to ranged strike rolls.

setInfos.flavorText: "Course I realize Hate's dead. You still need someone to grease the gears, don't you?"

name: Blacksand Catapult
text:
May not attack or equip items.
Spend Order: You may spend a wizard you control. Target character within two ranks must succeed a dexterity save DC 13 or suffer a wound (two if you spent a wizard).

name: Prototype
text:
May not equip items.
Prototype inflicts an additional wound if it hits with a melee strike.
While adjacent to a fighter, Prototype gains the ability, "Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to Prototype's current ATK".

name: Makusog Cavalry
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks and the characters adjacent to him. Perform a +1 ranged strike against each target. Add +3 to any strike roll targeting a character that shares a class with another target.

name: Goza
text:
React: Before Goza makes a ranged strike roll, kill an adjacent Siege: Goza gains +5 to the roll and the strike inflicts two additional wounds.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

name: Syvonne's Secret
text:
May not maneuver or equip items.
Characters in the rank in front of Syvonne's Secret have the ability, "Spend Order: Move Syvonne's Secret forward one rank".

setInfos.flavorText: "Knock, knock, Kaballite cowards."

name: Jinkini
text:
Jinkini may target your characters with melee strikes from an attack.
React: After Jinkini hits with a melee strike, the strike inflicts no wounds: Remove a wound from the target of the strike.
errata: Cannot perform his React to do no wounds unless the target of the strike has a wound on him. (Zero Effect rule)

name: Clantz
text: React: Before making a melee strike roll: Gain +5 ATK for the strike, or the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits. The opposing character's controller may discard a card to cancel this action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Hagen? I'll tell you! Just get me out of here, Krun."

name: Lars Trunk
text: Spend Order: Perform a +15 ranged strike that may target a character up to 3 ranks away. Any opposing player may discard a card before targeting to reduce the range to 2 ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "That's right, Lars. Show the scary dragons where we are. Idiot." - Ar'tek

name: Icefall
text:
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike that inflicts three additional wounds if it hits.
Order: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Assault on Mourn
text:
Lycanthrope only.
React: After this character hits an opposing character with a melee strike: Attach Assault on Mourn to that character. While one or more copies of Assault on Mourn are attached to opposing characters your Lycanthropes have: "Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank".

name: Bones of the Earth
text:
Gargoyle only.
You may have any number of Bones of the Earth's in your deck.
React: Before this character dies: Shuffle it into your deck.
Order: Gain +2 ATK and +4 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Dragon's Fury
text: Spend Order: Move backwards up to three ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Two men have done this-Altus Darkheart, through his theft, and the false Emperor, through his vanity." -Morrigan de Danaan

name: Pardon
text:
Stormwraith only.
React: After a melee strike or action targets this stormwraith, kill another character in this rank: Cancel the strike or action.

setInfos.flavorText: "The storm knoweth its true faithful, fleshless or mortal." - Ghed Jaroslav

name: Piercing Strike
text:
Monster only.
React: After this Monster targets a melee strike: Armor equipped to the target is considered blank for the duration of the strike. The target may not perform Reacts during this melee strike.

name: Unfeeling Flesh
text:
Undead only.
React: Before this character suffers wounds from an opposing character's action: The opposing character must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or the wounds are reduced to zero. If he succeeds, return this card to your hand.

name: Mentorship
text: Spend Order: Target a character in your army who has gained no permanent bonuses and remove Mentorship from the game: The target permanently gains +1 Level, +3 ATK, +3 AC, +2 Skill, and +1 HP. If the caster is a Cantor, the target permanently gains an additional strike (Base +0) when he attacks.
errata: "Bonuses" refers to positive increases of the numeric stats of a character, not counting feats.

name: Gaban
text: React: After another character performs an action to change a character's Level: Gaban has +3 ATK and AC until end of turn, or remove a wound from him.
errata:
The React occurs after the action, not when the level changes.
A single action that modifies many different levels would only trigger Gaban once (Such as Oliver Zane using his ability).
His ability gives you the choice of either gaining both the +3 ATK and AC OR removing one wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Knowledge to heal, knowledge to harm. It's all the same."

name: Rain of Fire
text:
Siege only.
Order: Target an opposing character. Until the end of the turn, while targetting that character, Siege characters have a +4 bonus to melee and ranged strikes and ignore AC bonuses from items.

name: Crunchy Peasants
text:
Dragon and Monster only.
React: After killing an opposing character: Remove a wound from this character. Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "Their progenitor nearly devoured the world, but I don't know that Its descendents have such high-minded hunger." - The Loremaster

name: Metamorphosis
text:
Monster only.
Order: Kill this character: Put a Monster up to two levels higher from your hand into play in this character's position before fixing any illegal ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our enemies will not change, not unless we make them." - Jin Valford

name: Healing Affinity
text: React: Before a character performs an action to remove or reduce wounds, succeed with a Medicine check (DC 13) to increase or decrease the wounds reduced or removed by 1.

setInfos.flavorText: "Death. Life. Nothing is forever." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Withering Gaze
text:
Spend Order: Target stunned character does not unstun during the next ready phase.
Order: Target a character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 9 + twice this cleric's HP) or become stunned.

name: Final Faith
text: Order: Until the end of the next turn, opposing characters have -5 AC while stunned. If you have any copies of Final Power in your discard pile, target a character of equal or lower level who does not unstun during the next ready phase.

name: Kor's Patience
text: Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, stun the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "...has its limits." - Wall
"...has its limits." - Wall
"Just because it's ugly and mean, don't make it our enemy." - Labor

name: Lightning Strikes
text:
Spend React: After an opponent passes: Ready an unstunned character of equal of lower level.
React: Before a character rolls a save from an action: If the roll is a failure and the action inflicts wounds on the character, the action inflicts one more wound.

name: Sacrificial Bond
text: Order: Target a character in your army: Until the end of the turn, while this cleric is in play, any melee or ranged strikes targeting that character targets this cleric instead.

name: Shared Fates
text: Spend Order: Spend one of your rogues: Target two characters within 3 ranks. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + cleric's skill) or be spent. If both targets fail the check they are both stunned instead and may not unstun during the next ready phase.

setInfos.flavorText: "Remember, Anandale." - Lekar Osud

name: Xienar
text:
Opposing Warlords have the ability "Order: Remove a Charge from Xienar: Perform a +0 melee strike targeting Xienar."
Order: Four times per turn, Put a Charge on Xienar: Xienar gains +4 ATK and +2 AC until end of turn.
errata:
Opposing Warlords using the granted Order may target Xienar regardless of rank.
The ATK and AC bonus Xienar gains is not based on having any Charges; removing them won't remove the bonus.

name: No Escape
text: Spend Order: Until end of the turn, after any opposing character inflicts wounds on one of your characters, the opposing character must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or he does not ready or unstun during the next ready phase.

name: Elemental Madness
text: Spend Order: All opposing spent characters must succeed with a magic save (DC 13, DC 18 if opposite alignment to caster) or becomed stunned. Each who was already stunned suffers a wound and remains stunned during the next ready phase.

name: Face Me
text: React: After a non-fighter in this rank is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, redirect the strike to this fighter. If the strike hits, reduce the wounds by one.

setInfos.flavorText: "Your fight is with me!" - Achilleus

name: Strategic Strike
text: React: Before making a melee strike roll: Gain +1 ATK for this strike for each non-fighter in your army. For every +5 ATK gained in this manner this fighter inflicts an additional wound if he hits with this melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Fools. We slew thy forebear." - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Final Rage
text: Order: This fighter's next melee strike has +5 ATK and inflicts an additional wound if it hits. If you have any copies of Final Trickery in your discard pile, perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: They were enemies in life...

name: Power Shot
text: Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike. If the strike hits, move the target back one rank instead of wounding him.

setInfos.flavorText: "Forget the lackeys. We just want the magic." - Synnove Ashenstorm

name: Cover Me
text: React: After a character within one rank targets one of your non-fighters: Perform a melee strike targeting the acting character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dragon Keep must stand, Ahdi, damn the cost." - Etor Chance

name: Lightning Charge
text: Spend order: Spend one of your wizards: Perform a melee strike (base +0) against each opposing character in an adjacent rank. Perform a number of consecutive +3 ranged strikes equal to the number of characters killed by the melee strikes.

name: Raid the Armory
text: React: After an item is equipped to any character: Equip any number of items to your characters.

name: Ar'tek's Rampage
text: Spend Order: If this character is in rank one, perform a melee strike targeting one character in each rank of an opposing army. These strikes cannot inflict additional wounds, and this fighter may not React to these strikes.

name: Xantin
text:
Order: Put a Charge on Xantin: Move forward one rank.
Opposing Warlords have the ability "React: After you perform an Order, remove a Charge from Xantin: Perform another Order after this one."
errata: Cannot use his movement ability while in the front rank. (Zero Effect rule)

name: Crippling Strike
text: React: After hitting a target character with a melee strike: Until the end of the next turn, the target inflicts no wounds with melee strikes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Superior stance. Sure, I believe that one." - Hagen

name: Mimicry
text: React: Before playing an action card, target and spend one of your characters: This rogue performs the action as if he had the target's class.

setInfos.flavorText: "I hear it takes you wizards years to do this. What a colossal waste of time." - Cairbre Netheryn

name: Cunning Shot
text: Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target and move him forward one rank, if possible.

setInfos.flavorText: "Dragons do, after all, epitomise cunning." - Magellan
The dragon's spines struck at the rear ranks, drawing the nothrogs closer to it...

name: Final Trickery
text: Order: Target character within one rank must succeed with a poison save (DC = this rogue's AC) or become stunned. If you have any copies of Final Faith in your discard pile, inflict a wound on a stunned character within one rank.

name: Administer Poison
text: React: After one of your other characters targets an opposing character within one rank of this rogue with an action or melee strike: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 10 + this rogue's skill) or become spent. If this character is an Assassin, stun the target if he fails.

name: Brutal Cut
text: Spend Order: Spend one of your fighters within one rank: Target a spent character within one rank. The target permanently loses -5 ATK, -5 AC and -5 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "You'll never hit the high notes like that, Forlourne." - Trevor Cartwright

name: Lost Cause
text: React: After a melee strike targets a character in this rank: Direct the strike to a random target in this rank. After the strike resolves, this rogue performs a melee strike targeting the attacking character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Better you than me." - Robin Jirar

name: A Simple Plan
text: Spend Order: Target an opposing character within two ranks. Until the end of the next turn, this rogue has the ability, "React: After the targeted character performs an action: Perform a melee strike targeting that character."

setInfos.flavorText: "Mind if we borrow it?" - Nitesh Imaran

name: Behind the Scenes
text: Order: Target a character you control in an opposing formation: Move the character forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I would trust the Duke of Myerdeth, but that I know him." - Albrecht

name: Commanding Energies
text: Spend Order: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + this wizard's skill, 13 + this wizard's skill if he is adjacent to a cleric) or suffer one wound (two if this wizard is adjacent to a fighter).

setInfos.flavorText: "Come to me wizards. Show me what you can do." - Syvonne Ashenstorm

name: Tanfess-sh
text: Tanfess-sh's melee strikes have a bonus to ATK equal to the target's Level.
errata:
The bonus starts affecting him as soon as he targets the character, and is modified if the target's level changes.
This bonus will not help him target someone with an ATK restriction.

setInfos.flavorText: "Strange people think they can hurt who they want. Tanfess-sh will show them different."

name: Final Power
text: Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. If you have any copies of Final Rage in your discard pile, perform another +5 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: ...but the dragons united them before death.

name: Stolen Substance
text: Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, until end of turn the target does not count for preventing illegal ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Now you know what it feels like to be a Stormwraith. Only powerless." - Ghed Headrix
"Thou shouldst thank me, given the dragons." - Lord Kestrel

name: Phantom Steed
text: Spend Order: Target a character within one rank: Move the target forward or backward up to two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's not just daemons that I command. The spirits of the air know better than to refuse my summons also." - Atiratu

name: Twisting the Omens
text: Spend Order: Spend a cleric within one rank: Perform a +4 ranged strike which inflicts an additional wound if it hits. If the strike kills the target, all characters in your first rank gain +4 ATK and +4 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Absorb Energy
text: React: After an opposing character uses an action card: This wizard performs a Scribe check (DC 14). If successful, the next time this wizard casts a spell of level 3 or less, he does not need to spend.

setInfos.flavorText: "A valiant effort, milady elf. Allow me to teach thee a lesson thy master hath forgot." - Castus the Burning

name: Forgotten
text:
Spend Order: Target non-Warlord character card must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or return to its owner's hand.
Order Discard a non-item card attached to a character.
errata: Erratum 2007/04/21: The Spend Order should read "Spend Order: Target non-Warlord character card must succeed with a will save (DC 20) or return to its owner's hand."

name: Flash Freeze
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn this wizard has the ability, "React: After an opposing character attacks: Target a character within two ranks who must succeed with a magic save (DC 6 + caster's skill) or suffer a wound."

name: Soul of the Dragon
text: Spend Order: Target all characters in an adjacent rank. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 18, 23 if this wizard is a Dragon) or move back one rank. Dragons may cast this spell regardless of class.

name: Heart of the Earth
text:
Gargoyle only.
This Gargoyle has +1 AC for each charge token on Heart of the Earth.
After each melee strike targeting this character, remove a charge token from Heart of the Earth.
React: Before this character dies: Equip Heart of the Earth to another Gargoyle.

name: The Storm's Truths
text:
Stormwraith only.
May be equipped to characters who may not equip items.
React: After this character is targeted with an action (not a melee strike), spend Storm's Truths: The acting character must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or suffer a wound.

name: Aswadsem
text: Order: Once per turn, choose a rank two ranks away: Until end of turn, after a character performs an action to move into that rank, if Aswadsem is unstunned, he performs a +2 ranged strike targeting that character.
errata:
He may not target characters that fall forward (no 'action' was performed).
His ranged strike targets the character that performed the action to move, which may be different than the character that actually moved.
The ranged strike is not limited by rank restrictions.
It is performed after the entire action has completed.

name: Wagon Team
text:
Siege only.
May be equipped to Siege characters who may not equip items.
Order: Spend Wagon Team: Move forward one rank.
Order: Spend Wagon Team: Equip Wagon Team to another Siege character.

name: Dragonhide
text: This character has a +4 Skill bonus for checks and saves.

setInfos.flavorText: "I found it in the Arcane's tower. Another gift for Krun." - Syvone Ashenstorm

name: Poisoned Talons
text:
Dragon and Monster only.
May be equipped to characters who may not equip items.
React: After hitting with a melee strike: The target of the strike must succeed with a poison save (DC 11) or suffer a wound and become spent.

name: Yscar's Rage
text:
Lycanthrope only.
All Lycanthropes have +1 ATK and +1 AC for each charge token on Yscar's Rage. At the end of each turn put a charge token on Yscar's Rage. When Yscar's Rage has 5 or more tokens remove all tokens.

setInfos.flavorText: "Wait no longer. Come to Mourn." - Otho Yscar

name: Altar of Flesh
text:
Undead or Necromancer only.
React: After a target undead in your army dies, spend the Altar of Flesh: Shuffle the target into your deck, then look at the top five cards of your deck. You may reveal an undead character and place it into your hand.

name: Morrigan's Coils
text:
+6 Skill
React: After this character is targeted with a melee or ranged strike: The acting character must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

name: Orb of Dragonkind
text:
-4 Skill
Your Dragons are not Unique and enter play one rank lower.
Your hand size is reduced by one.
Spend Order: Spend or ready a target Dragon.

setInfos.flavorText: "I found it! It's mine!" - Altus Darkheart

name: Dallen's Eye
text:
+2 Skill
Dallen's Eye may remain spent during the ready phase.
Order: Spend Dallen's Eye: While Dallen's Eye is spent, target fighter gains +3 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Stormlost's trinket has found its way to Thessyria? What does that mean?" - Brymin
"Carry this with thee, my champion, and let no defiler know thy true calling." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Blackruby Mail
text: For each item in this rank with "Blackruby" in the title, Blackruby Mail gives this cleric Medicine +1 and other characters in this rank +1 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Behold Kor's bounty! Take this, and share it with the nations of the Accord in their time of need." - Garn Hearthstone

name: Poultice Sack
text: Order: Discard Poultice Sack: Remove a wound from a character within one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "No, Alaric. Don't die. Don't you dare. We have work for you still, Zeal and I." - Pious

name: Xiathe
text:
You may start with characters from other factions in your starting army.
Your Level 1 characters do not suffer a loyalty penalty.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
errata:
Starting characters don't suffer a loyalty penalty.
Xiathe doesn't change faction traits, so Ghed Nuri isn't going to be able to save Mercenaries.

name: Shadow of Sloth
text: After you equip Shadow of Sloth, name a class. While Shadow of Sloth is in play, characters must succeed with a will save (DC 14 + number of characters of the named class in the same army) to unstun.

setInfos.flavorText: "To devour the sick and the old." - Carm Sengri

name: Kallistone
text: Order: Spend Kallistone: Name a non-faction trait, and target all characters in play with that trait. Until the end of the turn, the targets have -3 ATK, -3 AC, and -3 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "To see it is to want it, to hold it is to dread its loss. A potent weapon against an enemy as greedy as a dragon, wouldn't you say, Etor?" - Garn Hearthstone

name: The True Word
text: Order: Spend The True Word: If this cleric is cleric is adjacent to a fighter all of your characters gain +3 ATK. If this cleric is adjacent to a rogue all of your characters gain +3 AC. If this cleric is adjacent to a wizard all of your characters gain +5 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Lost to an age of spite and avarice, Sir Rhawn, but not lost to me." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Soulwing
text:
+1 HP
Characters of the opposing alignment within one rank have -3 ATK and -3 AC.
Order: Spend Soulwing: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Soulwing: Target character within one rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 23) or be stunned.

name: The First King's Crown
text:
+1 HP
React: Before this fighter dies, spend a cleric in your army: Return the First King's Crown to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "Lost and found again, lost and found again. Do not simply exhume and restore history, improve upon it." - Jin Valford

name: Valanthe's Web
text:
+2 Skill
Valanthe's Web may remain spent.
Order: Spend Valanthe's Web: Target another wizard in play, who has +4 Skill while Valanthe's Web is spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course the High Queen suspects nothing, my parlor is a better place for such an exchange."

name: Blackruby Sword
text: For each item in this rank with "Blackruby" in the title, Blackruby Sword gives Powerattack +2 and +1 ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "Thank you, noble dwarf. TO ARMS!" - Albrecht

name: Whetstone
text: React: Before making a melee strike roll, discard Whetstone: The melee strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

setInfos.flavorText: "Keep your blades shard, and your wits sharper." - Ahdi Akkhar

name: Shadow of Murder
text:
After you equip this item, name a class.
React: After another player puts a character of the named class into play: Perform a melee strike (base +3 ATK).

setInfos.flavorText: "A fate they've earned a hundred time over." - Carm Sengri

name: Wyvern's Claw
text:
While this fighter has one or more wounds, he has an additional +2 ATK (+5 if he is a Barbarian).
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on this fighter: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, flee, giant! Let Krun's champion face Hate's legacy!" - Padrig

name: Troas
text: React: After a lower Level opposing character targets Troas with a melee strike, that character permanently gains +2 Levels: Cancel the strike.
errata: Gaining 2 Levels is a cost which must happen or the action is annuled.

setInfos.flavorText: "He neither eats nor drinks, nor even sleeps." - Baruuk al-Semmeya

name: Cutting Stone
text: Spend Order: Name a non-faction trait, and target all characters in play with that trait. Until the end of the turn, the targets have an additional melee strike while attacking (base +0 ATK).

setInfos.flavorText: "A prize indeed; send it as tribute to Baraxton." - Syvonne Ashenstorm

name: Ironfang
text:
+1 HP
Order: Spend Ironfang: Move forward of backward one rank.
Order: Spend Ironfang: Target all characters in an adjacent rank. Each must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

name: Efrit Fire
text: React: Before this rogue dies from an opposing character's melee strike or action: The opposing character must make a magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound. You may spend a wizard in your army to return Efrit Fire to your hand.

name: Fool's Fortune
text:
+2 Skill
Fool's Fortune may remain spent.
Order: Spend Fool's Fortune: Target another cleric in play, who has +1 HP while Fool's Fortune is spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "An amulet consecrated to Fineltour. It has caused more wars than all Deverenia's ambitions. A gift to you, my dearest." - Bronwen Tansiq

name: Blackruby Dagger
text: For each item in this rank with "Blackruby" in the title, Blackruby Dagger gives Defend +1 and Riposte +1.

setInfos.flavorText: "Pretty fancy for a parrying dagger." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Farglass
text: React: Before making a ranged strike roll, discard Farglass: Either add +5 to the roll or inflict an additional wound if this rogue hits with the ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "An enchanting trinket, O Saladin. What dost thou want in return?" - Lord Kestrel

name: Shadow of Jealousy
text:
After you equip this item, name a class.
React: After this rogue is targeted by a melee or ranged strike by a character of the named class: Redirect the strike to an adjacent character.

setInfos.flavorText: "They change their faces to hide their secrets, even from each other." - Carm Sengri

name: Fool's Gold
text: Spend Order: Name a non-faction trait, and target all characters in play with that trait. Until the end of the turn, the targets each have the ability, "React: Once per turn, after a melee or ranged strike targets an adjacent character: Redirect the strike to this character."

name: Open Contract
text:
After Open Contract enters play, name a class.
Spend Order: Target a character of the named class within 3 ranks: Perform a melee strike against the target that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, stun the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "That's a terrible likeness." - Logan

name: Bloodspite
text:
+1 HP
Order: Spend Bloodspite: Move forward of backward one rank.
Order: Spend Bloodspite: Target spent character within one rank must perform three consecutive magic saves (DC 20). Each time the target fails, he suffers a wound.

name: Barnas
text:
React: Once per turn, after Barnas kills a character of equal or greater Level: Barnas permanently gains +1 Level, +1 HP, and Stealth +3.
Spend Order: Target lower Level character has -1 Level permanently.

name: Jaqueline's Amulet
text:
+2 Skill
Jaqueline's Amulet may remain spent.
Order: Spend Jaqueline's Amulet: Target another rogue in play, who has +3 AC while Jaqueline's Amulet is spent.

setInfos.flavorText: "If Duncan didn't give it to her, who did?" - Jack Casey

name: Blackruby Helm
text: For each item in this rank with "Blackruby" in the title, Blackruby Helm gives Scribe +2 and +2 Skill.

name: Vellum Press
text: Order: Discard Vellum Press: Attach a spell face-up from your hand to this wizard. The wizard may later discard the spell to cast it as if it were played from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "To my esteemed subjects: the Time of Naming is at hand..."

name: Shadow of Greed
text:
After you equip this item, name a class.
React: After an opposing player plays an action card of the named class during the Order phase, discard a card: Draw a card.

setInfos.flavorText: "The heretics want keenly for something beyond them, and this is how they will fall." - Carm Sengri

name: Smoke Imp
text:
+3 Skill
Smoke Imp may cast wizard spells as if he were a Level 3 wizard with the Summoner trait, +0 ATK, 10 AC, +6 Skill, and 1 HP.
errata: Erratum 2008/08/17: Has 10 AC, when it is a character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Just listen to it. It makes a persuasive argument, does it not? Join us." - Ygrassyne
"A petty thing, but less hungry than its greater kin." - Atiratu
"Now, Xaros, 'tis perfectly safe." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Resonate Stone
text: Spend Order: Name a non-faction trait, and target all characters in play with that trait: Until the end of the turn, the targets have the ability, "Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this character's level."

setInfos.flavorText: "This is my forest. Not Rellion's. Not Signon's. Not the dragon's. Mine." - High Queen Tpheroth

name: Ironrule
text:
+1 HP
Order: Spend Ironrule: Move forward of backward one rank.
Order: Spend Ironrule: Perform a +7 ranged strike. Then, perform another +7 ranged strike targeting a character an additional rank away.

name: A Line in the Sand
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, while in your first rank each of your characters is considered to be an additional character for determining illegal ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "People do not fight for neutrality, Prince Regent. Vronish Kez knows that now." - Albrecht

name: Forceful Decree
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, while you have fewer characters in your first rank than each opposing first rank, each melee and ranged strike targeting a character in your first rank has a -3 penalty to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Calm down, Yarr. We're here for a reason, remember?" - Jianna

name: Backs to the Wall
text: Spend Order: Target all characters in an adjacent rank who share a faction with this cleric. Until the end of the turn, each target gains an AC bonus equal to the number of characters in the rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Abyss below, the Nothrog above. Find your kingdom's name quickly, Xod, or it will be an epitaph." - Valhala Abyssbane

name: Stygian Wraith
text:
Stygian Wraith does not inflict wounds with melee or ranged strikes.
React: After Stygian Wraith performs a melee or ranged strike that hit the target: The target is -1 Level permanently.

setInfos.flavorText: Nightmares born of many.

name: Sanctuary
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn any time a card would be put into the discard pile, put it on top of the owner's deck instead. Players may not draw retrieve, or discard cads from their deck this turn. Each Player may shuffle his deck at the end of the turn.

name: Call the Faithful
text: Order: Until the end of the turn, your entering characters may cause illegal ranks if you already have at least one character in the rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Praise be to the Eternal Emperor, Vyacheslav Drac, and to all who live but to die for him." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Valhala's Praises
text: Spend Order: Target a rank. Until the end of the turn, while in that rank, characters have the ability "React: Once per turn, before this character suffers wounds: Suceed with a Medicine check (DC 20) to reduce the wounds by one."

name: Haunted Forests
text: Order: Remove up to 3 characters in a discard pile from the game: Target the same number of characters in an opposing first rank, who must each succeed with a fear save (DC 8 + caster's skill) or be unable to attack for the rest of this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Go and remind the world who did this to you." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Sigil of Salvation
text:
Spend Order: Attach Sigil of Salvation to another character.
While it is attached, that character has the ability "React: Before suffering wounds discard Sigil of Salvation: The character inflicting the wounds must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or the wounds are reduced to zero and the character suffers and equal number of wounds."

name: Glyph of Loyalty
text:
Spend Order: Target up to three of your other characters. Attach one card from the top of your deck to each target as a Glyph.
While the Glyph is attached, the character has the ability: "React: Once per turn, before this character suffers wounds, inflict a wound on another of your characters with a Glyph attached: Reduce the wounds suffered by one."

name: Finish Them
text: React: Before this fighter makes a melee strike roll: If there are more ranks in this army than in the target's army, either add twice the number of ranks in this army to the ATK for this strike, or the strike inflict an additional wound (your choice).

name: Height Advantage
text: React: Before making a melee strike roll: If there are fewer ranks in this army than in the target's army, either this character an ATK bonus equal to his level until the end of the turn, or the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits (your choice).

name: Maul
text: React: Before making a melee strike roll: If this fighter counts as more than one character for determining illegal ranks, until the end of turn, he gains +5 ATK and his melee strikes inflict an additional wound if they hit.

name: Achilleus' Slaughter
text: Order: Kill one of your characters in each rank of this army in front of this fighter: Move this fighter to your first rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Where is a challenge worthy of my blade?"

name: Lenox
text:
After you put Lenox into play, put a Charge on him for each card in your hand. You may not play cards from your hand until end of turn.
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike for each Charge on Lenox.
errata:
The effect is not optional.
Only affects 'playing' cards from your hand. Discarding them, revealing them, etc, is still okay. Other effects may put cards into play after Lenox has entered play.

name: Back to Back
text: React: Before this fighter performs a melee strike: If this fighter has no subclass, target an adjacent non-stunned character. Add the combined printed ATKs of the adjacent character to this strike. If the adjacent character is a fighter, this fighter inflicts an additional wound if he hits with the strike.

name: Knights' Charge
text: Spend Order: Spend an adjacent character: Move this character and the target forward one rank. They may each perform an attack without spending.

setInfos.flavorText: "Huh? Goblins. Wait here." - Karkos Tzin

name: Easy Mark
text: React: Before making a melee strike roll against a spent character: If this rogue has no subclass or does not have a Weapon equipped, gain +7 ATK for the strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "I needed new strings anyway." - Phon

name: Harassment
text: React: Before making a melee strike roll against a character with no more than one adjacent character: Gain +5 ATK for the strike. If this rogue hits with the strike, inflict one fewer wound than usual and stun the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ah, ah. This is between mother and son." - Kray

name: Brutality
text: Order: If you have at least 3 other characters in this rank, perform a melee strike against a spent character within one rank. If this rogue has no subclass and hits with the strike, he inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Real men aren't afraid to dirty their hands." - Laird Jon Hawthorne

name: Hagen's Escape
text:
Rogues without a subclass have +2 levels to perform this action.
React: After inflicting a wound on a spent character with a melee strike: Inflict a wound on a spent character adjacent to the original target with lower AC than the original target.

name: Death for Death
text: Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike. Kill this wizard.

setInfos.flavorText: "Power has no limit. If you have life in your body, there is still more energy that you can channel into your spells. Do not allow mortal concerns to stymie your potential, thrall. Now, show me that you understand." - Sanga-Kish
"All things in their place and time, Ar'tek." - Mekk'iah

name: Out of Step
text: Spend Order: Target a number of characters within two ranks up the caster's level. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or, until the end of turn, he does not count as a chacracter to prevent the rank behind him from being illegal.

name: Crushing Weight
text: Order: Target a character. Until the end of the turn, after each time the target moves forward, his controller must select a character in the rank in front of the target to succeed with dexterity save (DC 16) or suffer a wound.

name: Flame Waves
text: Spend Order: Perform a number of consecutive ranged strikes equal to the number of ranks in your army. The bonus of each strike is equal to the number of characters in each rank, starting with the first.

name: Facing Down a Mob
text: Order: This character is +1 ATK and AC for each opposing character within one rank until end of turn.
errata: The bonus is set when the action's cost is paid.

setInfos.flavorText: "Doth they think this time will be different? Denska is Deverenian, now and forever." - Master Eryk

name: The Nemesis
text:
Order:Once per turn: Kill an opposing non-Warlord character with 4 or more Levels lower than The Nemesis.
Order: Once per turn: Kill one of your characters and remove all wounds from The Nemesis.
errata: In The Nemesis' second ability, killing a character isn't a cost. If you negate the death all wounds are still removed.

name: Energy Barrier
text: Spend Order: Target a character. Until the end of the turn, while the target is in your first rank, characters may not move into opposing first ranks and opposing second ranks are never considered to be illegal.

setInfos.flavorText: "Oh, sit down, Max. We're going to be here for a while." - Angus Hammerfall

name: Paradigm Shift
text: React: Before an illegal rank is fixed: Target a character in that rank. The target must fall forward to fix the illegal rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Ichaerus has made war upon the people he would lead. Tell me, Sileth how could any accept him as king?" - Tepheroth

name: Gravity Well
text: Spend Order: Target up to two characters within four ranks who must each succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + caster's skill) or count as three characters for determining illegal ranks until the end of the turn. If the caster has no subclass, this spell's effects last until the end of the next turn. Characters may choose to fail.

name: Denskan Eagle
text:
+4 Skill
Order: Spend Denskan Eagle: Move this cleric and up to one other target character in this rank backward one rank or to different positions within this rank.

name: Viper's Token
text: If there are any characters in the ranks in front of this cleric, he is not counted for determing this rank's legality.

setInfos.flavorText: "What have you wrought, Krun?" - Skiall

name: Spirit's Bonds
text: The rank behind this character can hold two more characters before becoming illegal, and is always considerd to have at least one character in it.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Deverenians are not brave, my queen. merely stubborn." Sileth Elestra

name: Glyph of Faith
text:
Other characters in this rank have +1 HP.
If this cleric has no other classes and no subclass, Glyph of Faith loses the Armor trait.

setInfos.flavorText: "Of course mortals do not understand the gods, Xod. Such is the dominion of faith." - Truth

name: The True Faith
text: ATK, AC and Skill bonuses from items equipped to characters in this rank are increased by +2.

setInfos.flavorText: "An the Storm scoureth the unclean from its sight, 'tis an age of miracles." - Cardinal Creigh

name: Dallen's Blood
text: React: After target character targets this cleric with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a fear save (DC 13 + number of characters in this rank) or the strike is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Stormlost's armor is as much a curse as a blessing."
"Wear it, and thou shall have no other evil to fear." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Athanae's Armor
text: Fighters with no subclass may equip this as a fighter item.

setInfos.flavorText: "Behlial wore it, then Deima. None hath seen it since." - Lord Kestrel

name: Strak
text: Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Target Siege you control within two ranks moves forward one rank or performs a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, I can make you many such machines, Scyrax."

name: The Simurgh
text:
+5 Skill
React: After this cleric casts a spell, spend the Simurgh: Target another character and remove a wound from the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "It is Modred's pet though 'tis far older than he or I. An the Storm take the world, yet the Simurgh would yet be its first." - Ghed Mnettaor

name: Boots of Mobility
text: React: After being targeted with a melee strike: Move to a different position in this rank. Gain +2 AC until the end of the turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Father was here just a moment ago..." - Kenia

name: Ablung's Hammer
text: While you have the same number of characters in this rank as you do ranks on your army, Ablung's Hammer gives an additional +5 ATK (+7 ATK total) and this fighter inflicts an additional wound when he hits with a melee strike.

name: Dueling Saber
text: Order: Spend Dueling Saber, target a character within one rank: The target performs a melee strike against this fighter. Perform a melee strike against the target.

setInfos.flavorText: "There is no need for our followers to die for our causes. Merely face me in honorable combat to decide this battle." - Brymin
"What doust thou know of honor, elf?" - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Rockhome Grizzly
text: Order: Spend Rockholme Grizzly: Move this fighter and up to one other target character forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Blasphemy!" - Uthanak

name: Royal Chariot
text: Order: Spend Royal Chariot: Move forward two ranks. Succeed with a dexterity check (DC 18) or become spent. Characters who count as more than one for determining illegal ranks automatically succeed.

setInfos.flavorText: "I saw it myself, milady. The Duke of Myerdeth is in Denska." - Magellan

name: Belt of Giant Strength
text:
Order: Until the end of turn, this character counts as four characters for determining illegal ranks.
Order: Once per turn, kill an adjacent character: Perform a +8 ranged strike that can target a character one to three ranks away. If the strike hits, it inflicts an additional wound.

name: Flare Trap
text: React: After this rogue is targeted with a melee strike, spend Flare Trap. Any bonuses the opposing character has received to his AC, ATK or Skill this turn are reduced to 0. His base ATK is also reduced to 0 for this strike.

name: Potion of Mist Form
text: Order: Discard Potion of Mist Form: Until the end of the turn, gain the Ethereal trait. This rogue may not attack for the rest of this turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Delvin. Genecourt. Xaros. Dallen Stormlost." - Inquisitor Chyre

name: Tansiq Mask
text: Tansiq Mask gives an additional +4 AC (+5 total) while there are no other characters in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Do you now, little burglar."

name: Gunda
text: React: Once per turn, before Gunda suffers wounds: Gunda gains +5 ATK, +1 HP and +1 Level until end of turn.
errata:
"Wounds" can still refer to a single wound.
She can perform the React to gain +1 HP before she would die.

setInfos.flavorText: "See? I am hardly bleeding. Now let me try."
"C'mon, I'll give you one free swing."
"Taoth experimented and returned Red Wolf. Is scarab next?"

name: Blinding Mirror Trap
