text: React: After this rogue is targeted with a melee or ranged strike, discard Blinding Mirror Trap: Until the end of the turn, the acting character must succeed with a perception save (DC 17) before rolling a strike (including this one) or the strike is a Critical Failure.

name: Chained Claw
text: Order: Spend Chained Claw, target an opposing character within three ranks: If this rogue is in the front rank, the target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 8 + this rogue's Skill) or move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, try to free yourself-that makes it hurt more!" - The Lady of Pain
"Deverenians talk too much." - Ahdre

name: Wardog Steed
text: Order: Spend Wardog Steed: Move this rogue and up to one other target character forward or backward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "You. I know you. You died!" - Johan the Burglar

name: Kabal Trials
text: Order: Discard Kabal Trials: Target a character in play who must succeed with a magic save (DC 18 minus the number of ranks away) or suffer a wound.

setInfos.flavorText: "Anton is gone. You know what must be done." - Zartoch

name: Dragon Fang
text:
Order: Once per game, attach a wizard spell to Dragon fang.
React: After an opposing character targets this wizard or a card attached to this wizard: Cast a spell attached to Dragon Fang as if this wizard were perfoming an Order. The acting character must be the target of the spell. Discard the Dragon Fang.

name: Mephit Cage
text: React: Before a character enters play, spend Mephit Cage: The entering character may cause an illegal formation if there is already at least one character in the rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "It follows orders, if it knows what's good for it!" - Maximilian

name: Golden Circlet
text: Order: Spend Golden Circlet, remove a card in this rank from the game: Perform a +4 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "All hail the queen." - Mistress Allandra
"You can count on my loyalty, High Queen." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Owl Steed
text:
+3 Skill
Order: Spend Owl Steed: Move this wizard and up to one other target character forward or backward two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Try not to squirm so much, Angus, or he'll think you food..." - Maximilian

name: Staff of Command
text: Order: Spend Staff of Command: Target a character within four ranks. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or count as three charactes for determing illegal ranks unitl the end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Come, Mr Windson, we simply must talk..." - Sorscha

name: Kassia's Bracers
text:
Opposing characters may not use Reacts during melee and ranged strikes targeting this wizard.
React: After this wizard targets a character within one rank with a spell, spend Kassia's Bracers: Increase the DC save or ranged strike produced by that spell by +3.

name: SanUris
text:
SanUris' melee strikes inflict a number of wounds equal to his Level.
React: Once per turn, after SanUris performs a melee strike that killed an equal or higher Level character: SanUris permanently gains +1 Level, +3 ATK, and +1 HP.
errata: Other cards may further modify the number of wounds he inflicts.

name: Rellion Guard
text:
Your Warlord adds +1 to initiative rolls.
Rellion Guard has a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the highest level of a Deverenian in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "An I yet live to share mine, they need no ambitions of their own." - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Ghed Auric
text:
Adjacent higher-level Deverenians have +2 ATK and +3 Skill.
While adjacent to a higher-level Deverenian, Ghed Auric may be targeted by no more than one melee or ranged strike per turn.

name: Ianavae the Condign
text: React: After a melee strike targets one of your non-warlord Deverenians within one rank, return the Deverenian and all equipped cards to the top of your deck: Cancel the strike.

name: Baron Fabrice Rellion
text: While Fabrice is adjacent to a Deverenian Hero, your Deverenians have Riposte +3 and you roll 20 for initiative each turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Such is my love for my sister, Fabrice, that I commend her husband to the Storm." - The Emperor

name: Lady Keithia
text:
Lady Keithia has +1 ATK for each Deverenian in ranks behind her.
React: After Lady Keithia enters the first rank: Perform a melee strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "Truely, the dwarves know how to train their pets."

name: Cardinal Daris
text: Melee and ranged strikes targeting your Deverenians are Critical Failures on any natural rolls that are equal to or less than the number of ranks in your army plus two.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Emperor doth need the Church alone as his savior."

name: Kassia the Saint
text: React: Before Kassia targets a spell, kill one of your Deverenians within one rank: This spell either has +4 DC or may target characters one additional rank away.

setInfos.flavorText: "Honor me thus, dear Kassia and thou might find a thrown a crown by my side." - The Emperor

name: Fault
text: React: Once per turn, before Fault performs a melee strike: All other Dwarves in this rank lose -1 AC for the rest of the turn. Fault gains +1 ATK for each Dwarf in this rank.

name: Steadfast
text: Spend Order: Other Dwarves in this rank gain an AC bonus equal to the number of Dwarves in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "What's there to worry about? It's one halfbreed army against a kingdom. Our kingdom."

name: Dragon's Eye Gargoyle
text: React: After an opposing character moves to within one rank of Dragon's Eye Gargoyle, spend a cleric in this rank: Perform a melee strike targeting the opposing character.

setInfos.flavorText: "What do you mean, 'no'?!" - Ardenal

name: Seneval
text:
Your Nothrog may equip two Weapons.
Order: Spend a Weapon equipped to Seneval: Until the end of turn, Seneval has +3 ATK and an additional melee strike (Base +1) when he attacks.
errata:
The ATK bonus adds to the (base +1) strike.
He does in fact allow ALL of your Nothrog to equip two Weapons.

name: Labor
text: Spend React: Before another Dwarf in this rank equips an item: The Dwarf is +2 levels for equipping the item.

setInfos.flavorText: "May Kor protect and keep you safe... Next! May Kor protect and keep you safe... Next!"

name: Skill
text: While adjacent to two Dwarves, Skill has +3 ATK and +4 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "Yes, Yes. Impregnable defenses, death traps, guards. Sooner we get back New Goldenaxe, the sooner we save the world."

name: Humility
text: Spend Order: Discard a card: Move a Trap from your discard pile to your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "I used to be 'Skill'. Got five easy reminders why that's not true, but does the new guy listen?"

name: Gate
text: If Gate is adjacent to a Dwarf Hero, the rank behind him is never illegal and other dwarves in this rank have +5 AC.

setInfos.flavorText: "No. It will work, it has to." - Kiyar Unying

name: Tripwire
text: Tripwire is +2 levels for equipping Traps.

setInfos.flavorText: "Don't worry, Poison. If we've learned anything here, it's how to make things fall apart just the way we wish."

name: Cocoran
text: React: Before a character in your army casts a spell, kill Cocoran: All ranged strikes and DC saves produced by the spell gain +2 for each character (including Cocoran) in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I am at your service, Osud."

name: Bren Glyn
text: Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus to the roll equal to the number of characters in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "I turn my arrows on my brothers for my queen. Each time, I pray to Blood that this one is enough... And then I notch another arrow."

name: Eiyamon
text: React: Once per turn, after a character falls forward to two ranks away: Perform a +6 ranged strike targeting that character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Stand down, my loyal servant. Orban's not unexpected..." - Yarr

name: Soma
text:
Soma may remain spent.
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks: Until Soma readies or leaves play, the target does not count as a character to prevent the rank behind him from being illegal.

name: Hungry Dead
text: React: Before Hungry Dead is killed, remove a charge token: After dying, return Hungry Dead to play in its current rank and orientation and without any charge tokens.

name: Lukkot Buzzsaw
text:
May not maneuver or equip non-Weapon items.
May equip any number of Weapons.
Order: Spend another Nothrog in this rank: Move forward one rank.
Order: Spend an equipped Weapon: Lukkot Buzzsaw's melee strikes inflict an additional wound until end of turn.
errata:
May equip ANY item so long as one of its traits is Weapon.
However, it may not equip any number of Shields so a Double Bladed Sword and Nothrog S'sike can't both be equipped.

name: Kellis
text: While Kellis is adjacent to an Elf Hero, all Elves in your army have Marksmanship +0, may use the feat on spells, and may use the feat one additional time per turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "No, they're killing themselves by staying to fight me." - Lorifinnin

name: Croupir Dythanus
text: Spend Order: If Croupir is in your last occupied rank, stun Croupir: A target Warlord's player discards a number of cards from his hand equal to the number of other characters in this rank.

name: Bronwen Tansiq
text: React: Once per turn, before another target Elf plays an action card, discard a card: Until the end of the turn, the Elf gains a number of levels for using action cards equal to Bronwen's current rank.

name: Anguli Mala
text:
You may have any number of copies of Anguli Mala in your deck.
React: After Anguli Mala enters play: Play a copy of Anguli Mala from your hand.

setInfos.flavorText: "I've killed enough for one lifetime Atu. Teach me to forgive."

name: Kella Hawthorne
text: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike equal to the number of other Free Kingdoms characters without subclass in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "At this rate, the Free King will be here just in time to surrender to Gahid."

name: Tonvan Veen
text: React: After a Free Kingdoms character moves to a position within one rank: That character has a +2 bonus to the next ranged strike roll he makes.

setInfos.flavorText: "Veen's gone, Anyah... Anyah?" - Bradley

name: Calinar Archer
text: Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the number of characters in the target's rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "Our sister-city of Celinar has lost too much blood to elven attacks. Calinar must strike now, while there is still time!"

name: Celinar Guard
text:
Spend Order: Equip Celinar Guard to a Free Kingdoms character as a Familiar item (with no attribute bonuses).
White it is attached, the character has the ability: "Order: Spend Celinar Guard: Move forward or backward one rank."

name: Finlay
text: Finlay has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when attacking for each two ranks in your army.

setInfos.flavorText: "If we fight like heroes, we can sill save Denska."

name: Lady Grey of Calinar
text: React: After Lady Grey receives a bonus to AC, ATK or Skill: If Lady Grey is adjacent to a Free Kingdoms Hero, give an identical bonus to all other Free Kingdoms characters in this rank. Others copies of Lady Grey may not React to this action.

name: Grantuk Rageblade
text:
Grantuk may equip two Weapons.
Order: Spend a Weapon in your army: The character it was equipped to gains an additional strike (Equal to his highest base ATK) when he attacks until end of turn.
errata: The strike granted by the ability has a base ATK, and bonuses to that (Say from the weapon you spent) add to it.

name: Nayarr Hawthorne
text: React: After anoher character in your army is killed, kill Nayarr: Give a Free Kingdoms character in the same rank as the one that was killed a permanent bonus to ATK and skill equal to the rank Nayarr was in.

name: Xiantha
text:
May not equip Steeds.
Xiantha has one additional strike while attacking (base +1 ATK) for every rank in your army.

name: Cpt. Gallagher Reed
text: Order: Once per turn, target a Free Kingdoms character in this rank. Until the end of the turn, give the target a bonus to ATK, AC, Skill, or Hit Points (your choice) equal to the bonus Cpt. Gallagher is receiving from another character.

name: Brogan
text: Order: Spend a Free Kingdoms in this rank: Move Brogan forward one rank. If Brogan moves, he has an additional melee strike (base +1 ATK) when he attacks until end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "Gang way, coming through!"
"King or no king, we fight or we fall."

name: Laird Jon Hawthorne
text: React: After Jon moves to a different rank: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: They stood, arrows drawn against each other. Dukat winked, and Hawthorne let his missile fly...

name: Ferrol Tremayne
text: Order: Once per turn, move backward two ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "But soft, Orban... Thou hast a quest, and I a cousin who doth wish to share thy burden."

name: Lost
text: React: After killing a spent character with a melee strike: Perform a melee strike targeting a spent level 1 character.

setInfos.flavorText: "No Orban... my people have never heard of such an enchanment as afflicts Yedraw."

name: Skrit Yscar
text: React: Before making a melee strike roll: Gain an ATK bonus for this strike equal to the current rank of an opposing Warlord.

setInfos.flavorText: "It's easy to be brave when Crucin's so far away, isn't it?" - Yscar the Elder

name: Hack
text: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks. Inflict a penalty to AC on the target equal to twice the number of characters in the target's rank.

setInfos.flavorText: The two beasts paused over their kill, snorting at Darian...

name: Slash
text: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks. Inflict a penalty to ATK and ranged strikes on the target equal to the number of characters in the target's rank.

setInfos.flavorText: ...then one calmly licked Windson's palm.

name: Kovit Treeraiser
text:
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Kovit's melee strikes inflict an additional wound until end of turn.
Order: Kill target Nothrog within one rank: Before fixing ranks, move Kovit to the target's location.

name: Pit Gargoyle
text: Order: Once per turn, if you have another cleric in play, Pit Gargoyle counts as three characters for determining illegal ranks unti the end of turn.

setInfos.flavorText: "You assured us of you loyalty, Sjonegaard. You said you people would stand by us." - King Xod

name: Tseleuse Worm
text:
May not equip items.
Tseleuse Worm may be equipped as a level 8 rogue item (with no attribute bonus). The equipping Rogue has Tseleuse Worm's printed ability.
Order: Spend Tseleuse Worm: Move forward or backward 2 ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "Try not to think about what we're riding."

name: Annsi the Black
text: React: Before making a melee strike against a character that counts as more than one character for determining illegal ranks: If Annsi hits with this strike, she inflicts two additional wounds.

setInfos.flavorText: Angu hath seen the signs Crucin. The Father moveth in the sky.

name: Fylgia
text:
May not be targeted with strikes or actions by characters more than one rank away.
Order: Once per turn: If Fylgia is in your first rank, perform a +6 ranged strike.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Chosen you face are neither the true masters of their kind nor was the Harvester their greatest agent. But soon they will notice you Kerebrus."
"'Tis a vision most inspiring my Emperor." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Fasolt
text:
May not equip items with traits, except for Weapons.
React: After Fasolt hits with a melee strike: Target each character in the struck character's rank whose Level +8 is less than the natural die roll. Move each target backward one rank.

name: Ar'ick
text: React: After Ar'ick wounds an opposing character: Inflict a -3 AC penalty to a target character in the same rank as the opposing character.

setInfos.flavorText: "The battle is on the field. The war is in the shadows."

name: Bakas
text: At the end of the turn, if Bakas has not killed an opposing character, he must perform a melee strike targeting a character of your opponents choice within one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: Bohst frowned as he inspected the battlefield. Several of Ar'kons fallen had suffered attacks from behind.

name: Hesfral
text: DC Saves and ranged strikes from Hesfral's spells have +1 for each Nothrog in this rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "If Krun does not take command, sharply all paths lead to chaos and ruin... To Wyvern."

name: Ikdal
text: Spend Order: Perform two +6 melee strikes. Kill Ikdal.

setInfos.flavorText: "Learned from the best, didn't I, Dad?" - Muddfleck

name: Krika
text: React: After Krika kills an equal or higher level character: Permanently gain +3 ATK, +3 AC, +1 level, and +2 skill.

setInfos.flavorText: "Can't hardley fight Krun if he's gone. What now boss?"

name: Laith
text: Spend Order: Put a Level 2 or greater Siege character from your hand into play. Move that character forward one rank.
errata: You must be able to legally play the Siege character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Quiet! Don't want those fool knights to hear, do ya?"

name: Egik Aedroud
text: Egik has +2 ATK for each rank in your army, and performs an additional strike while attacking (base +0 ATK) if you have four or more ranks.

setInfos.flavorText: "An honorary membership, but Aedroud cares who bears their name." - Kzarrik

name: Regh
text: While Regh is adjacent to a Nothrog Hero, Regh gains an additional strike with a base of +10 ATK during attacks and inflicts an additional wound if he hits with a melee strike.

name: Ralak
text:
Order: Once per turn, perform a +1 ranged strike.
Spend React: Before performing a Marksmanship check: Ralak adds +15 to the die roll.

setInfos.flavorText: "Krun's missing, but we're not attacking?"

name: Kranig
text: React: Once per turn, after Kranig moves forward: Until the end of the turn, if Kranig hits with a melee strike he inflicts an additional wound.

setInfos.flavorText: Norn growled, grinding her teeth as she crushed the letter. "Kranig! Find Hagen before Krun does, or we'll be in up to our necks."

name: Ar'tek
text: Order: Move forward one rank.

setInfos.flavorText: "The thinnest webs catch the most prey, Ar'tek. If the world thinks itself free, we should indulge that fantasy." - Mekk'iah

name: Be Still
text:
Mentalist and wizard only.
This is a spell.
Spend React: After a character spends an equipped item or removes a Charge token from an item: That character must succeed with a magic save (DC 15, DC 20 if caster is a Mentalist) or suffer 1 wound and discard the item.

name: Certain Doom
text:
React: After an opponent readies a character outside of the ready phase: Stun the character.
React: After a stunned character moves forward or performs a melee strike: Wound the character.

setInfos.flavorText: "Throw me the ido-" - Jonah the Burglar

name: False Hope
text: React: After an opponent's action retrieves one or more cards from his discard pile: Remove those cards from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "Is there any other kind?" - Rustiq Umbala

name: Spirits' Wrath
text:
Astral and Ethereal only.
React: Before this character is wounded, moved, spent, or stunned as the result of an opposing action (not a melee strike): Inflict the same effect on the character who performed the action.

name: Waste of Life
text:
Rogue and wizard only.
This is a spell.
React: Before a stunned character performs a check or save: The check or save is a Critical Failure.

setInfos.flavorText: "Keep them intact next time." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Tunneling Crew
text: Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike. If the strike hits, move the target backward one rank instead of wounding it.

setInfos.flavorText: Sometimes the walls really are too strong.

name: Tzin's Legacy
text:
Mentalist and Seer only.
This is a spell.
Spend Order: Attach Tzin's Legacy to this character. While it is attached, opponents must play with their hands revealed. Opposing Warlords gain the text, "Spend Order: Make a Will save (DC 10 + caster's skill) to discard Tzin's Legacy."

name: Wizard Eye
text:
Mentalist and wizard only.
Mentalists have +1 level for casting.
This is a spell.
React: After an opposing character equips an item: Return the item to that player's hand. That character may not equip items with that name until the end of the turn.

name: Athanaen Threats
text: React: After an opposing character performs an action to reduce, redirect, or remove wounds: Cancel the action.

setInfos.flavorText: "Athanaes cannot allow the Denskan atrocities to continue. Tell the Cardinal to leave, or we will force him to." - Dexton Feldark

name: Meddling in Nature
text:
Druids play this without spending.
Spend Order: Put this card into play in your first rank as a level 2 fighter with the Monster trait, +3 ATK, 13 AC, 0 Skill and 1 HP and the text, "React: After this card readies: Permanently gain +1 ATK and +1 AC".

name: Treason's Wages
text: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, your characters have +2 ATK and inflict an additional wound with melee strikes while they have a Weapon equipped.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Denskans prove deaf to hymns. Mayhap they prefer screams." - Cardinal Creigh

name: Hammer into Anvil
text: Order: Remove all lower Level characters in all discard piles from the game.

setInfos.flavorText: "What belongs to the Earth is to remain there!" - Grimur
"'You are only one or the other,' as Ablung used to say. Which are you, Nitesh?" - Forge

name: Treeshape
text: Spend Order: This cleric may not perform actions, has +3 HP and -6 AC (-1 AC if the caster is a Druid), and his items are considered blank. The effects of this spell end when the cleric becomes ready. The cleric may remain spent during the ready phase.

name: Not in Vain
text: React: After a character is targeted with a melee or ranged strike: Until the end of the turn, the target has a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the number of action cards in your discard pile. This effect lasts until the end of the next turn if the caster is a Cantor.

name: Black Dawn
text: Spend Order: Attach this card to another character. While it is attached, the character has the text, "React: Once per turn, before this character suffers wounds, remove 1 Charge token from Black Dawn: Reduce the wounds by one."

name: Costly Lessons
text: React: Before making a melee strike roll, remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Gain an ATK bonus for this strike equal to twice the removed character's ATK.

setInfos.flavorText: "The Rowan have forgotten the color of their blood. Remind them." - Rathe
